links_Review_Text: Thicker material than expected, which I think was actually nice and supportive for the girls :) super cute and goes with a lot
Don't rent this unless you have a C+ breast size. This made me look huge and I couldn't fill the top!

This was really cute but I was not able to wear it. I usually wear a medium quite comfortably but this was too tiny. I couldn't get it on properly. It was way too tight around the rib cage, and it was much more of a crop cut than I expected, so it showed more belly that I was willing to show, plus it was so tight that it cinched the midriff in a very unflattering way.

links_Review_Title: Dinner date with the girls, girls night!
links_Review_Text: This dress felt amazing to wear, although I think I should have worn the 4. I enjoyed it on me, but I don't think it is very photogenic. I don't think it really captured how it truly fit me in reality.

The dress was a lovely silky material. I was looking for something appropriate for my son's winter baptism. The dress was a bit too low cut for my liking and was not easy to pin shut because of the silky material. I'm usually a size 6, but easily wore the 4 and could have possibly even sized down to a 2. Overall I liked the dress and it was a reasonable price but not sure I'd ever have a reason to rent again.

I started a new job but I wanted some fun dresses to wear the first week. I got this one and I love it! You will have to wear a tank top underneath it so your boobs don't fall out. It's very soft and beautiful. I got so many compliments on the dress.
Wore this for a rehearsal dinner. Perfect, classy length. I did use fashion tape to make the neckline a little more appropriate but would be a great for any occasion. Definitely would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress! Little big in the chest
links_Review_Text: This dress was beautiful and elegant. It was a little big in the chest for me so I needed some garment tape to be safe but otherwise fit perfectly.
Definitely more conservative in length and shape- so perfect for festive work event - but the layering flows beautifully with movement and the silk fabric is gorgeous

PROS: This dress is so comfortable. Can't really say why. It just fits so nice. The skirt is flowy and you feel so pretty in it. CONS: None really. I just wish it had shorter sleeves. I may have it altered since I bought it.
The material is smooth and soft, very comfortable however the cleavage opened so wide. Need to wear something under
Loved the hemlines and the fabric felt so good. Very pretty dress! Lots of compliments!

links_Review_Title: I did rate it true to size but it was a little tight on the stomach for me
links_Review_Text: I did rate it true to size but it was a little tight on the stomach for me

The dress is pretty fabric and nice quality, but ultimately was not my favorite because it was a bit robe-like with the wrap style front and the pattern. I ended it up wearing it though, so it's not terrible, just not my fav. For reference, I am 5'4" 118lbs, 32 A, petite frame. When I would sit down with the dress on, the chest would gape open where the fabric crosses. Luckily I have a maroon slip from another dress that matched perfectly, so I had to wear that underneath or else my entire chest would be exposed! But I always have this issue with dresses that have a wrap-type of bodice. If you have that issue usually, then expect that with this dress. Otherwise, the length was a bit long for me, but with some high heels, it worked. Overall, the fabric itself is pretty, it's nice quality, but I wouldn't rent it again.

links_Review_Title: Wanted this to work so badly - beautiful material, bust fit WAY off!
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a "warm and cozy winter wedding" - the fabric is a bit shiny, a little heavy, and higher quality than I was expecting, so big points there. There is a strange seam that hits across the hips and stomach - looked terrible in the 14 because it accentuated my "hip dip", but wasn't a problem in the 12 as the length was right (fit me like a glove from ribcage down). However, there is so much extra material at the bust that I couldn't even modify this to work as it is a faux wrap - it wasn't just a lot of cleavage, it flopped open to show my entire bra and both of the girls. Pinning across just looked lumpy, and wearing a cami underneath took it way too conservative and just looked like I was making up for a dress that didn't fit rather than something open and flowy. It needed to be taken in at the shoulders by about an inch (too much material to pin there too, but man, if I could have gotten that alteration done it would have been a fabulous dress). Might work for someone with a longer torso or more sophisticated boob taping skills - I'm so sad this one was unwearable for me :(

It was first recommended that I rent the 8 so I ordered it and it was huge. Then I got the six and it fits some places and is too big in others. The fabric is beautiful and I really wanted this dress to work but it did not.

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a murder mystery where I was a bratty socialite bridesmaid in 1985.
links_Review_Text: This dress was amazing. It fit my body and the part really well. The slit was high, but not so much that I was nervous about showing any unintended skin. I loved the fit, the length and the lining. It was very comfortable.

I wore this sequin beauty to a black tie wedding and it was the perfect choice. Days before I was panicking that I had nothing to wear but I found this and received so many compliments from everyone at the party! I danced all night long and was super comfortable.

links_Review_Title: I felt like the best dressed at an event with over a thousand people.
links_Review_Text: Quality material. Perfect fit. It was a hit.

Beautiful dress and seriously thought about keeping. The only reason why I knocked off a star is because as the night progressed a feel like the dress got even bigger. It was a tad big when I tried it on but the small was already taken. As the night when on I felt like it stretched out more. Even with all that I'm so glad I wore it and would totally rent it again! I received so many compliments and it was very comfortable. I didn't feel like the slit was too much.. it was perfect!

links_Review_Title: Jordan E. was incredible. He guided me every step of the way + was so invested in my costume party!
links_Review_Text: This dress was killer. It fit like a glove. I wore it to a costume party. I went as Ginger from Casino. It's fun, sexy, playful, and sophisticated.

links_Review_Title: I felt like majic in this golden dress.
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect. I have long arms and usually struggle with sleeve length but these were prefect. The color complimented my skin nicely and the side split was everything!
Wore this to a NYE party and felt amazing. The dress got a little itchy toward the end of the night but it was worth it to feel like a disco ball all night ;)

links_Review_Title: This dress worked perfect for my birthday photo shoot. It was a perfect fit. A perfect style.
Life of the party dress for sure
links_Review_Text: This dress is definitely an attention getter. The gold is very vibrant and shiny and the dress is very sleek and hugs every curve. It does it stretch a whole lot but it definitely is a true to size fit. I was very comfortable in the dress and loved it.

links_Review_Title: The color just pops and overall beautiful dress!
beautiful timeless dress. i got so many compliments.
links_Review_Text: the dress was snug on my upper body, but i'm smaller in stature and build and it was a little loose on my butt and legs, and longer than it shows on the tall leggy model in the picture. still flattering nonetheless!! also it has shoulder pads which i did not expect. they're not dramatic so it was no big deal. overall i felt so confident and beautiful in this dress!! it's shiny like liquid gold. so classic and pretty.

Stunning gold sequined dress, fits really well. I think it runs on the large side, I had a lot of wiggle room and would size down next time. The whole dress is lined, no itchy sequins. Wish the sleeves were a tad longer, I'm 5'10. I received a lot of compliments tonight and felt like a sparkly disco ball. Definitely rent this one!
Very shiny- sequins are two sided so sometimes it looked sloppy if the sequins weren't in same direction. Got lots of compliments though. Nice back- didn't need a special bra to wear it.

links_Review_Title: Every pic felt like I was on the red carpet!
links_Review_Text: I think it ran slightly large. Im size 6 with curves (36D), and I wore a small. The fabric is stretchy and very comfortable. I'd recommend going smaller if you are between two sizes.

Rented this and the Katie dress. The Katie dress was not a fit , however, I'm glad I listened to my instinct and ordered a backup dress. This dress fits amazing. I received so many compliments and actually loved the way it fit my curves that I wanted to keep it! You won't be disappointed!
I wore this to a James Bond themed Birthday party, it was so sparkly and so comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Able to keep up with dance moves!
links_Review_Text: The dress is true to size a d fits great. It has some stretch and forms beautifully to your body. I felt like a Oscar statue. I wore it as a costume where i was the sun!

links_Review_Title: I looked like a trophy (Oscar) in this dress! Made my birthday unforgettable!
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit and true to size

Loved the fit. It was comfortable and fabulous. The sequins were amazing and in pictures as well. I got many compliments. I'd have bought this if I could've. One thing, the hem lost some stitching so please take a look and repair for the next person

links_Review_Title: Felt likexa million bucks in this dress
links_Review_Text: It was so comfortable and so beautiful just amazing
This dress was so eye catching! I had tons of compliments! It was super comfortable too!!
This dress fit perfectly. I got so many compliments. It was classy and eye catching. Also very comfortable.
Absolutely loved this dress. Was heavy so hid many imperfections. Came in brand new. Wore it 2x in one week!!
Great fit! Long enough in the arms too for those taller ladies! Loved this dress. Felt amazing! Wore it for NYE and looked great!

This dress was perfect. I have a lot going on up top, but with this dress I didn't need to wear a bra at all. The entire dress has a really soft lining on the inside as well. I received so many compliments about the cut, as well. In general, lovely lovely dress. You just have to make sure you're good with looking like C3P0
I loved this dress. True to size, and super flattering. Received soooo many compliments and I truly felt beautiful. Amazing quality.

links_Review_Title: Great for ladies who like to be noticed!
links_Review_Text: If you like attention and don't mind showing some leg, this dress is spectacular! It speaks for itself, but I can add that it is super-comfortable. The slit is serious, which offsets the classic sheath line and mid-calf length. I'm 5/3, 41-31-36 with a bit of a tummy, but this was super-flattering if my husband and all the many compliments are to be believed. The sequins did not scratch or shed. They are the softer kind that you can shade a bit with your hand. I picked the red shoes because it was a holiday party, but for a different occasion I would have chosen more neutral shoes. I would definitely wear this again, with a different crowd. It is MEMORABLE and a showstopper.

links_Review_Title: This was a back up not my original pick but it was better than my original choice!
links_Review_Text: This was actually sent to me as a backup because the original order I placed was delayed for being lost in the mail. Well, needless to say I'm happy I had to get a back up because this dress was PHENOMENIAL!!! Awesome dress and I loved it it fit like a glove
The event I was going to wear this to got cancelled, and I was devastated. It was SO gorgeous and fun without being over the top. Will be renting again as soon as I have an excuse!
Pretty but too tight

links_Review_Title: Very fun, but not for me ( and here's why)...
links_Review_Text: I wanted to love this item so bad, but unfortunately I did not find the cut and volume of the sequins and material flattering for my shape (I have the same issue with feathered clothing as well). For perspective, I'm a 34B in bra size but have slightly larger hips, and I think this brought too much attention to the width of my hips (if that makes sense)! Otherwise, the dress is fun and definitely a statement piece!

I ended up not wearing this dress only because the sequins were so much and if they all weren't facing the right way it looked awkward. However, the dress size fits perfectly, and it is a gorgeous dress!
Not great fit for me.

links_Review_Title: I love the color on my skin tone. I received so many compliments. I felt sexy but classy.
links_Review_Text: i work out so it form fitting on the arms and thank god for the stretched in other places
Show stopping incredible dress! Everyone will notice you in this! Fits like a glove, comfortable, the slit gives it some sexiness while the long sleeves keeps it classy.

This was one of the most amazing dresses ever I loved the fit! I got so many compliments. It was sexy and beautiful my date and I matched and it went perfect. It was one of my favorite dresses I ever worn.

I absolutely LOVED this dress. People were stopping me on the street to tell me how amazing this dress was. It had an amazing soft kind of heavier lining so it laid flat and slim against your body and kept me warm. I wore the size XS but the Small looked almost exactly the same. I’m 5’4” and 119 pounds.
Bulky, weird shoulder pads. Didn't sit right with my long torso, so not fitted where my waist hits. Didn't like that sequins didn't all lay flat, so some parts looked odd. Did not wear.

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments on this dress! It was really fun to wear!
links_Review_Text: Fits true to size. The dress is beautiful and looks just like the photos. It is very high quality. I would have given it a five stars except that I feel like sequins are hard to wear.

links_Review_Title: This dress is absolutely stunning. I gold sequin are just so rich and royal.
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to a holiday gala for my church and received compliments as soon as I walked into the door and throughout the evening. I was a cold night to appreciated the fact that it was long sleeve. The entire dress is also lined so there was no itching from the sequins. The length was also perfect and the side slit added a nice and sexy touch.

links_Review_Title: Rent this slightly 60s mod dress with gorgeous colors and pattern!
links_Review_Text: I got this dress NWT during the corona isolation. I wore it WFH (looked great on camera), walking the neighborhood and running out for dinner pick up. I wore with flat strapped sandals. It is short (hit my fingertips at 5'9" in flats) but not too bad for casual wear. The sleeve length and volume were perfect. Mock neck fits nicely- not too tight. Material is a little on the thick side. Could be warm in extreme temps. I will def rent this again when I have some wear fun to go!
I'll try to rent this again when it warms up because it really needs sandals. Or gogo boots.

links_Review_Title: Good but not great retro vibe
links_Review_Text: Dress is a huge hit except at the neck line which doesn't quite fit right and looks odd
I rented this for Easter dinner. It screams Spring but was also warm! The colors are too vibrant to explain! Love this dress! Rund big!

links_Review_Title: Love, definitely need a safety pin
links_Review_Text: This top is SO CUTE. I got compliments all day wearing it!! I'll probably rent it again, I wish I owned it! I did notice like pen marks on the back after I wore it, but I don't think it was that noticeable and still loved it!

links_Review_Title: Perfect top for a sunny day
links_Review_Text: The print is beautiful! This top looked great with hi rise jeans. I wore it on vacation in Miami. The only negative thing was the snap closure. I had to wear a cami underneath it because the snap didn't feel secure, I wish they added multiple snaps or a tie to ensure it would stay closed! Still beautiful and flow. I loved the sleeves.

links_Review_Title: Such a fun flirty and versatile top!
links_Review_Text: Loved the sleeves and the print. It's definitely cropped--paired with a good high-waisted denim it was perfect.
Super cute top!! It was a little loose and low cut but I loved it. Wore it to class and got a lot of compliments!

Wore this to work on the last day of summer because it's so festive and summery. It's a little big in the chest, but I didn't mind and still felt it was work appropriate for my super casual office. It's a real eye-catcher and I'm definitely planning on dressing it up to wear out at night. Would rent again!

I love Rhode and this top is absolutely adorable. Cropped style, comfortable/lightweight fabric and fun pattern, I got lots of compliments! My only complaint is that the top sometimes popped open (which is fine as long as you wear a tank underneath!) It's only attached by a small snap, so just be aware of that!

links_Review_Title: I wore this Top multiple times dressed up or down! Everyone complimented it and looked cute in photo
links_Review_Text: Fits more like a baby doll like top. I love it but should have sized down. Also it only has the tiniest button to keep shirt closed and it kept coming undone. Luckily i had a safety pin that day.

links_Review_Title: If it was just a tinge longer it would be perfect!
links_Review_Text: This is super cute you do have to pin it or it will come undone all day. I also had to wear a tank under it bc I didn't want my tummy showing and I wore super high waisted pants.... loved the sleeves and the roses :)

I will say- the inside overlaps and there is only one snap. I needed to pin it. You can also size down depending on how big you want things. I like to wear things on the looser side so the small worked.
The shirt needed another button or something. It seemed like it didn't want to stick together. But the fabric is cute and fun shoulders.

links_Review_Title: Super cute! Def need a safety pin
links_Review_Text: Super cute top and got lots of compliments! I typically wore a M and ended up ordering the S and I'm glad I did. The top is secured by a small button that comes undone super easily so I ended up using 2 safety pins. Would rent again though

This top is DARLING - i got tons of compliments wearing it with very high waist jeans. I used fashion tape so my bra wouldn't show. I'm not sure how this top would work on tall or large chested ladies!

I wore this with high waisted jeans and it was perfect. I have a shorter torso, so it only showed a sliver of skin when my arms were raised. I did use two safety pins to secure the wrap - the included snap is not enough, in my opinion. Will rent again!

links_Review_Title: Unfortunately I didn't get to where
links_Review_Text: This top is very cute and the colors are great! Only problem is I wasn't able to wear it because the tiny button is so small and flimsy that it kept popping open even when just trying it on. Not secure at all they need to upgrade the button
Definitely size down! I ended up not wearing this because I was too nervous of giving everyone a show, the clasp didn't make me feel very safe I wouldn't get exposed!

links_Review_Title: Love it! It was perfect flirty and girly paired with light jeans.
links_Review_Text: I do agree the button holding it together seemed "week" but I just used one piece of fashion tape to keep it closed and never had a problem with it opening. Super cute!

links_Review_Title: Snap does not hold so don't wear it to work like I did.
links_Review_Text: This one needs to be retired. The snap does not hold and I realized that the hard way on the way to work so I pinned it at the office as I realized after my touch base with my boss that that didn't hold soooo yeah

links_Review_Title: I wore this on a trip over the summer and received a lot of compliments!
links_Review_Text: This top is great and so cute! I ordered this top to wear on a trip and should have ordered the M instead of L. It is more cropped and cute with high waisted jeans. I really liked wearing this!

Absolutely loved the sleeves and style of the top. However, this top was held together by a small clasp in the front and it kept flying open!! If you are looking to rent it, wear a cute bralette under it just in case you flash someone on accident.
rented this for my trip to Italy but didn't end up wearing as I looked like a football player! Very boxy, I wish it had worked out and looked better on me because it's such a fun top!

not a great shirt-- but a wonderful over-shirt accessory? pretty and light, but not a shirt. not even in summer. it had one snap in the middle that kept coming undone. not sure that I would rent this again, unless it had at least two more snap closures.
This shirt kept popping open (there is only one button to keep it together) and it was mortifying to wear to work. I spent the entire day holding it together so I didn't flash my office

Super cute with high-waist Jean shorts/jeans. Definitely feels like there's a button or hook missing, because the single snap barely keeps it closed. But if you're small on top, it's not as big a deal.

links_Review_Title: I loved this top -- just like the photos! Cute ruffles and floral pattern.
links_Review_Text: Fit TTS and was great to wear on the weekend, at work and for date night.
Seriously so freaking cute. I wore it once with jeans and packed it for vacation but didn't wear it because it looked kind of weird with the shorts I brought. My shorts were too long.

links_Review_Title: It was super cute for a date night
links_Review_Text: A little big - Had to hold together with a safety pin

Many reviewers have said this dress is short. I think it would work for a hot vacation. The material has gold thread woven in. The threads come out of the material by at least one inch. There are strings at the neck and the waist. If you leave the strings at the neck untied they fall just below the hem of the dress. The dress is pretty but I would likely to select something more flattering.
Cute, but veeery short. Arms are a little tight, but otherwise comfortable
Another stellar piece from Hemant and Nandita. I could have sized down. It has a metallic shine to it, but not in a tacky way. This is something I would consider re renting/buying!
I rented this for my birthday! I loved the colors! It has gorgeous hints of gold. It is a little short depending on shoe choice. It has a flowy fit but still flattering.

links_Review_Title: Glam dress worn to my small town county fair!
links_Review_Text: This dress was so cute & flirty! The shimmer on it is just enough to shine. Would also be perfect for a baby shower! Not the most comfortable, but I only worried about it in the beginning of the day, then never thought about that again.

links_Review_Title: Loved the babydoll, romantic style of the dress
links_Review_Text: Loved the babydoll, romantic style of the dress but it was on the short side. Also had a lot of strings hanging from it, maybe rented out a few too many times

Be warned it is short and I wore white monkey shorts beneath just in case. I'm only 5'3", so anyone taller may have a tough time wearing. The drawstring around the waist is needed otherwise the dress has no shape on its own. I did find it a tad too tight in my biceps almost as if I was wearing rubber bands around them. That's the only reason the dress didn't receive 5 stars. Tons of compliments as the colors are beautiful and whimsical.
Loved this dress! It's made of beautiful material. Loved the casual fit. Wore it many times.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful print, but not the most flattering fit
links_Review_Text: Dress itself is gorgeous and luxe with the gold detailing but the structure of the dress kinda made me look like I was wearing a bag. There's no shape to it. Size down to avoid I guess?

links_Review_Title: I wore this as a bathing suit cover up in Trinidad and it was a hit! It's very short in length.
links_Review_Text: I would have worn it during the day to site see but it was so short in length there was no way it would pass. I'm 5'6" with long legs. The elastic around the arms was very tight and slightly uncomfortable and the material is a little itchy but that wouldn't stop me from wearing it again. I just wish it were 2-3 inches longer. Got tons of compliments!
Fit perfect! No bra needed- incredibly comfortable and true to size!
Cutesy and pretty color - but at 5'2" it's still very short. Wore white shorts underneath or I would have flashed everyone. Slightly scratchy.

links_Review_Title: Perfect outfit for my Golden Birthday
links_Review_Text: Loved the subtle gold shimmer and how flowy this dress was. It was the perfect outfit for dinner and to celebrate a special night out.

I wanted this in size small but it was unavailable so I took a medium and it worked out perfectly. The dress fit me oversized so I simply wrapped the string around my waistline to give me a cinched waist look. The dress is definitely prettier in person. Check out my Insta for more @FarahPink
This fabric is so pretty in person. All over gold sheen. May be a little short if you're taller. Will rent again. Love trying new designers through RTR

links_Review_Title: Made me feel like an off duty princess
links_Review_Text: This dress is so feminine and cute. The light pink and gold fabric makes me feel like I'm a princess traipsing through a rose garden. I received so many compliments wearing it too. The only drawbacks are that it is like a babydoll dress so it isn't very form fitting like the picture makes it seem. Also the elastic in the sleeves cut into my arms which was a bit uncomfortable. Overall however it made for a very pretty outfit that I felt great wearing.
The gold on this dress is just so pretty. I would have bought it if it wasn't so short. I wore it as a shirt outside the house.

links_Review_Title: I LOVE this dress!! Super special.
links_Review_Text: It came w the tag on! I love the look of this dress. It's a little shorter than expected, you can tie waist pretty tight so maybe size up & just tie waist tight for length.

links_Review_Title: Ordered this dress for a backyard wedding.
links_Review_Text: Beautiful, whimsical dress. However, the material was very itchy. Not the most comfortable dress, but definitely makes a statement! I wasn't able to wear it because it wasn't very hourglass friendly—ran large in some places and small in others, unfortunately.

I mean- maybe it's just me, but I have an athletic body type and I could not pull off this boho styled dress. LOVE it on the model though! Just does not work for me. I had to get replacements for this one. Wanted to love it :/

links_Review_Title: SO SHORT, like comically short - couldn't wear.
links_Review_Text: SO SHORT, like comically short - couldn't wear.

links_Review_Title: I got a lot of compliments. It was very flattering even though I had to size up. No medium available
links_Review_Text: They only had a large available. It ran big but I was still able to wear and it was flattering. I got a lot of compliments. It was referred to as a fairy look. Super light and comfortable. The sleeves were a little itchy but not a problem.

I wore this for a country club party and it was so unique! I'm overall glad I wore it because it was so feminine. I love renting items I wouldn't normally have in my closet. However, I'll caution you that I'm 5'2" and this was SHORT on me. I put nude tights on and that helped but I wouldn't recommend for anyone taller than me. There's a lot of cleavage as well so I wore a tank underneath. I probably would avoid wearing this to a wedding or somewhere you'd bust a move!
This dress was super pink and super short. More like a tunic. Returned immediately.
Received so many compliments on this dress. Wore it more than 5 times; you can dress it up or down. So cute and romantic and girly!

links_Review_Title: too short I'm 5'7 and I couldn't wear it.
links_Review_Text: Too sheer too :( Shiny material

I wore this for our family pictures. The material is really pretty and looked great in pics. The dress is shot, but I am 5'1" so it wasn't too short on me. It did run a little large, I probably could have worn a small. Maybe the size difference is mostly in the length. My only complaint was that it wasn't the most flattering on my short frame, but it was still cute.
I'm 5/4 and this was too short for me. I considered wearing it with white shorts or jeans, but it is really late in the season. I thought it was itchy.
cute short dress that got compliments everywhere I went!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, however extremely short and the arms are uncomfortably tight. Did not wear.
links_Review_Text: Although I knew this might likely run short for me (I'm 5'8" 130lbs), I thought I would give it a try. The colors of the dress were beautiful and the event I was attending would be full of 20 somethings so shorter dresses would be "ok". ;) I requested the Medium. The length was on the shorter side but even if I had tried to wear it, I wouldn't have been able because the arm elastic was painfully tight. I have very small arms and read this in other reviews and thought that it wouldn't be an issue for me...Unfortunately, it was! :( The waist is adjustable which is nice. I did not end up wearing the dress.

links_Review_Title: A tunic, not a dress. So short. Beautiful fabric.
links_Review_Text: I should have listened to the other reviews. This is more of a tunic than a dress. It is so short that it barely covered my crotch. And I'm 5'4", can't imagine on tall women. Beautiful fabric, really wish I could have worn it.

links_Review_Title: Dinner for my boyfriend’s birthday while on vacation
links_Review_Text: I ordered this in a M and a S as back up. The S was WAY too big. I normally wear a size 6-8 in women’s clothing if I cannot get a petite size, but this was huge. The material was a shimmery gold, much more than shown in the photos, and the material was very stiff and scratchy. It doesn’t seem like it would have been comfortable at all. I did not wear it.
Such a pretty unique fabric but was so short and I'm 5'3"! Could not wear sadly.

This dress looked so cute on some of the other reviewers and their cute pics led me to take the plunge and rent this dress even though it's not in my typical style wheelhouse. I was very disappointed to find the dress looked like a nice wedding or Christmas gift wrapped by a sassy grandmaw with a glitter problem. I did like the fit but for the few minutes I had it on, it was so itchy and tight on the arm elastics! So be warned it is not subtle at all and you'll have to iron in :) true to size though

i hated almost everything about this dress, it runs very small and the fabric is SO uncomfortable. (for reference, i am 5'6, 125 lbs, 34B, fluctuate between 2-4 or s/m and the small was too small, dont know if the medium would have been much better)

links_Review_Title: Nice but a bit too much fabric on top
links_Review_Text: I did not wear the dress. It had a lot of material on top. And the sleeves were itchy.

I rented this as it looks Zimmerman-esque from the photos. When I received it, it looks super cheap and is so small. VERY short and narrow in the shoulders (I don’t even have broad shoulders). The shimmery fabric too makes it very itchy. Immediately sent back to RTR and would not recommend
This dress is really sparkly, itchy, and has a strange waistband.
This dress is extremely short. Therefore I could not wear it, but I absolutely loved the look of the dress, it would look really cute with a pair of white jeans/shorts.
I got the Medium and it was so short I couldn't wear it out.

I loved this dress! The only problem (and the reason I only gave it 4 stars) is the high part of the hi-lo is very, very short. I am tall, but I ended up wearing tights because I felt uncomfortable without them. Its also pretty tight, which contributes to the tightness. That said though, it's great fabric, a beautiful color, and I got compliments all night!

I rented this dress for a wedding. Immediately after removing my coat I received compliments! At first I was unsure how the dress would fit my body type since I have wide hips but the fabric was perfect and the gathering in the center was super flattering. The high low is great. The high is a bit high but I felt like I could own it. I did add a few pieces of fashion tape to keep the neckline in place but it wasn't absolutely necessary. I'm glad I took the risk, it was a home run.

Rented for a winter wedding. Was very comfortable and loved the look of the high-low seam but let me tell you the high was very high! It was almost uncomfortable short and if it wasn't for the longer back I would not have been able to wear the dress.

Wore this for Valentines Date with my honey. Va va va voom. He enjoyed this dress. I have some curves and it was stretchy enough for me to fit into a small. Quite short, and I dont normally wear short, but the high/low made me a bit kess self conscious about it.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to my law school's formal!
links_Review_Text: Great dress! Comfortable, flattering, and got a ton of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! Was great for a semi formal party I attended. Received lots of compliments.
links_Review_Text: True to size.

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments--sexy, but classy look for the gala I went to.
links_Review_Text: Overall great dress! Top--could make as open/closed as you want (sexy vs more conservative) Middle-very slimming with the ruched material around the waste Bottom-skirt was a little on the shorter side in the front, but nothing crazy When putting the dress on over my head I was scared it was going to be too tight, but once on, it felt great. If getting two sizes I would choose true to size and a size up!

links_Review_Title: Great dress but too small on top for me
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'4" 32G bra 115lbs. I usually wear size 3-4 on bottom. Size 6 on top. This dress was very very comfortable and stretchy. MR fit me like a glove but way too tight on top (as you can see). Anyway, I loved it!

links_Review_Title: I wore this for a friend’s wedding and received endless compliments all night
links_Review_Text: It is lower cut so it can’t be worn with a bra. It’s a very stretchy fabric so it’s very forgiving. I fit in the xs but preferred the modesty of the small for the event
So many compliments. Comfortable, flattering, unique
I thought high / low was Over until I wore this dress. Got so many compliments all night
A perfect dress for dancing! I wore to my belly dance birthday party. So comfortable & sexy. I would wear it again!

Wonderful fit for a girl with curves. The design also hides any pooch and accentuates legs. I like that it was short in the front. The neckline was deep so I pinned it up. I usually wear a size 6 or 8, and the medium fit very well. This is quite sexy. I can't think of another occasion I would wear it again, but I'm so tempted to buy it. I usually don't wear red, but this was a stunning color. Got many compliments :)

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments on the color!
links_Review_Text: It fit perfectly and was so comfy. The train in the back was a little long though and sometimes caught on my heels.
I rented this for NYE and it was a head turner! I received lots of compliments. The dress fits wonderfully, the only thing is the short part rides up as you walk. Overall though, it is perfect!

I'm 5'6", 110lbs, 32C. This dress fit me perfectly. The skirt is a bit short and would ride up from time to time....so I guess I'd say walking long distances might provide a problem (that's when it would ride up). Gorgeous red color. Super flattering fit. I received so many compliments.
I really liked this dress, lots of compliments. I am 4'10 and thought the under part was a little short (which I liked) but would think it would be very short on taller person.

If I was younger and single I would have worn this in a heartbeat. But I'm not. It was sooooo short and just felt a little inappropriate for me. Maybe if I had longer, thinner legs I would have gone for it! Absolutely gorgeous dress though, for someone brave and ready to make a statement

links_Review_Title: Great color lots of compliments and lots of stretch
links_Review_Text: The material is stretchy and it is very comfortable. The color is really pretty.

This was outside of my comfort zone for sure - I don't think I've ever worn a red dress, and this was a dress that announced your arrival wherever you went! The material is stretchy and soft, extremely comfortable, and flattering. It did not wrinkle in my suitcase. The only watch out would be the length in front - it's short, so unless you're comfortable with your legs, may not be right for you. I would 1000% rent this again. Amazing piece!
I like how the top is adjustable to how much cleavage you want to show. The material reminds me of a spandex like material but it’s unflattering in anyway. Even hides a pouch!
I picked this one up for an exchange in DC. It fit well and was comfortable. I received a few compliments.

I can't believe 6 other red dresses at the wedding. Mine was the most unique. The fabric is thin. I had to wear tights because we had snow. Would be better with no hosiery. Loved the deep v-neck. Just the right cleavage. The waist is so flattering too.
Rented this for my birthday dinner. Fit well was very pretty love the high low
This dress was so comfortable and stretchy! (Two best things when you're dancing like the red dress dancing lady emoji) this dress was a little short, but nothing that biker shorts couldn't fix.

Absolutely love this dress! Will definitely rent again. Got a ton of compliments. Was very flattering on. Like the other reviews say, the skirt part is very short. I'm petite so it didn't really bother me but it would have if I was much taller.

links_Review_Title: Much sexier than in the photo!
links_Review_Text: At first I thought this dress was going to come in and look a little old ladyish but it's super sexy! I ended up going with another dress but I'll consider this one again in the future.

Super cute, very short but with the longer skirt overlay it was still classy. The sleeves are awesome and the color is bright and rich looking. No zippers, elastic waist. This will be great at holiday parties!
Fits beautifully and extremely comfortable. I wore this for a benefit and it was the perfect choice!

Super flattering and comfortable. Pretty short in the front, but I felt like the long back made up for that. I have broad shoulders, so it was a little snug getting the fitted waist over my shoulders. But overall, great dress.

I wore a medium in this dress to a wedding, it was flowy and forgiving. I recently had a baby and the mid-section of this dress was forgiving. The high-low cut made me feel sexy and formal. I would rent this dress again, it's very flattering. True to size and the material gives great coverage and has just the right amount of stretch. The color is a vibrant red and I paired it with gold strappy heels.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful! But didn’t get to wear :(
links_Review_Text: The dress was beautiful! Unfortunately I did not get to wear it because the charity event I was supposed to go to got cancelled because of COVID-19 :( hopefully I can rent it another time

links_Review_Title: VERY short for a girl with long legs. It rode up every step I took. :( Eye catching though.
links_Review_Text: I was going to add some sort of body glue to my legs to try to keep it from riding up with every step, but I just didn't want to fuss with it and worried it might damage the dress. Luckily I had a backup outfit. I did wear it for an hour and got a lot of looks, but not the kind I wanted.
It was too short. I didn't wear it.

links_Review_Title: Very sexy dress, definitely gets a ton of compliments!
links_Review_Text: This dress is REALLY short in the legs, so just make sure you are comfortable with that. the skirt section didn't ride up from walking, unless I went up or down stairs. The sleeves and train flow beautifully.

links_Review_Title: Loved the style but it was big. I'm typically a 2 & wore the XS but wish it had been more fitted.

links_Review_Text: Really liked this dress although the deep V-neck does drop a little lower than I would have liked and the front of the dress has a tendency to ride up a bit high on the leg, both requiring some attention to avoid getting a little too much "attention". That said I'd definitely wear it again! I wore spanks just to add a little concealment to some normal lumps and bumps. Can be worn with a normal bra, however, some may get a little peek, so choose your bra wisely ;-)

links_Review_Title: It was a beautiful dress that I would not have ever treated myself too otherwise
links_Review_Text: I loved the gathered fabric around the waist it has a slimming effect. I didn't like how the dress rode up when I walked and left me feeling like it was too short.

links_Review_Title: Runs very small & is extremely short in the front!
links_Review_Text: This runs very small and was incredibly short in the front (and I'm 5'3). I was really disappointed and couldn't wear the dress. I would not recommend this dress unless you are short, very slim & are ok with wearing short dresses.

links_Review_Title: Obsessed with this dress it was stunning.
links_Review_Text: I was obsessed with this dress, I was a little nervous at first when I rented it because I was nervous it would be too tight and not flattering. I was wrong this dress was stunning and I got so many compliments on it. This was a sexy but elegant dress and would 100% recommend people to rent it. I am 5’1 and 133 pounds the fit was perfect just kinda big up top could have went with an XS but really happy I went with the small.

links_Review_Title: It's the perfect dress and it makes figuring out what to wear very simple.
links_Review_Text: This is a great dress for so many occasions. I've worn it for work events, to a daytime wedding and out for a nice dinner date. I always get so many compliments on it and it is so flattering. It's not tight but it's cut snug to the body so if you're conscious about your stomach area, you may want to go up a size. It's also very thick so it's not great in warmer temps.

links_Review_Title: Fun, flirty and oh so stylish!
links_Review_Text: Sooo many compliments, wore it twice but could've kept it forever!
Really fun sleeves & color but way too short to cover my bum --leaned into a kooky aunty vibe here

links_Review_Title: Warm, well made and fun print!
links_Review_Text: Rented for work and got a ton of compliments. Love print and fabric. Sleeves are pretty puffy so definitely be ready to make a statement. Would definitely wear again!
This was very flattering, warm and not itchy. Some reviews said it was short but I didn't think so. (I'm 5'6) i really enjoyed this dress.

links_Review_Title: @thanksitsrtr finally got my hands on this!!! Amazing sweater dress
links_Review_Text: The pattern and sleeves are so fun and the color!!! The color is gorgeous. This was comfortable to wear all day & night. I jumped around like a maniac at a concert in it & it stayed looking perfect. More on @thanksitsrtr

This. Dress. I ordered it the second I saw it and didn't know what to wear it for. But the truth is, you can wear it for anything! (Get this dress) I'm a true size 6 and the medium fit fine. Thick knit. Excellent placement of the pattern. Actually makes you look smaller. (Get this dress). Warm. But not enough to make you suffocate. Great with or without black tights. Color is on point (Get this dress). I really shouldn't be returning it and keep it for another week but I'm a RTR junkie.
Overall, I liked this dress. It was stylish and different. The sleeves are very full, and almost made my upper body feel in proportionate.

links_Review_Title: True to size, flattering, super thick and warm, not itchy at all. A bit shorter than I expected
links_Review_Text: The burned orange color, animal print and super dramatic puffy sleeves make this dress so trendy. Still totally comfy and warm. Get it!

Loved the print. Very warm to wear for cold weather. Dress have good amount of stretch. I went up a size so it won't be too short. Got lots of compliments from both men and women. Would def rent this price again.
This was a cute sweater dress. It was so tight!

Ulla is one of my favorite designers, but this dress is especially great. A little edgier than her normal prices and the perfect dress for Fall. I definitely will be adding this permanently to my wardrobe.
Short but love the style

links_Review_Title: Obsessed with this dress & got SO MANY compliments
links_Review_Text: The fit is super cu yes and I LOVED wearing it! Got a million compliments!
So many compliments on this dress. Pattern and shoulders made it even better. Not too snug.

links_Review_Title: This style is high quality, holds you in, is a little sexy, but can also be worn to work.
links_Review_Text: High quality fabric, flattering silhouette, perfect length, hugs all your curves, cute pattern, tons of compliments!
fits beautifully, very flattering LOVE it - I've rented this one before!
Good quality, thick stretchy sweater material. Hugs body well.

links_Review_Title: Cute for Cold Date night and sexy boots
links_Review_Text: I like the sleeves, but it wasn't meant for me. I'm 5'9 and it was fit really short on. Very well made though!
I'm very short and this dress was a little long but it was so flattering. It compliments any body type!

links_Review_Title: Very comfortable! Loved it so much that I bought it on sale on Ulla Johnson website.
links_Review_Text: Fit perfect!
I was worried it was going to be too small but i paired it with black leggings and it looked very polished! I usually don't like big sleeves but this was very cute!
Wore this to a work event and received lots of compliments. Fit is comfy yet at the same time I felt very stylish! Would def wear this again.

Oh man, this dress saved my sanity last week! It's lightweight and comfy, with POCKETS! I wore it around the house for two days in a row and it made all of my day to day house activities that much more exciting. It's quite long as you can see, but should be perfect length for someone who is at least 5'6
Wore this in Lima in summer and got tons of compliments and great photos! A teeny bit on the larger side so size down if you're between sizes. Definitely great for tall ladies (I'm 6').
This will get attention for good reason. Amazing style. I wore 3 inch heels so I think it runs long.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress attracts compliments!!! great for pictures! Does not look new though.
links_Review_Text: I were the dress in two different occasions and most likely will rent it again in the future, if still available. I don't recommend it for formal occasions, since it does not look new. It feels like an old dress from our closet, what I liked.

The material on this dress is soo nice i just wanted to twirl forever in it. I dont know if i would love it as much without the 7m baby bump but i felt like a princess in it for sure for our beachy babymoon

I enjoyed wearing this dress a couple of times, once out to dinner with friends and another time for a catered dinner party with 3 other couples at my home. It was casual enough to not feel over-the top, given the fabric, but it was still dressy too. It is comfortable. I would say it runs large not because it's actually large, but because it's forgiving. It could have fit someone heavier and bigger than me because the waist and shoulder areas are stretchy, and the skit is extremely full through the hips and below. You're not going to run the risk of it being tight, so I would size down. I wore it with the highest heeled shoes I could find. If you're shorter than me- 5'6"- you should probably stay away. It is very long! I had to be careful not to step on the skirt- even with heels it is FLOOR length! This would probably be a fabulous dress for someone 5'9" or taller!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful, fun dress. But too much fabric for a hot day.
links_Review_Text: This dress was amazing & had pockets. But there was a lot of fabric so I wouldn't suggest it for a Summer dress.

links_Review_Title: Felt stunning at my Baby shower at 27 weeks pregnant
links_Review_Text: Definitely accentuated my bump with a belt but was the perfect dress for my baby boy shower

links_Review_Title: Super cute for a daytime date
links_Review_Text: This gorgeous dress got so many compliments, love the elastic waist and pockets. The colors are bold and the style is fun!
It was so beautiful I still think about it! But so memorable on that it was hard to wear a lot of times - a perfect rental.
Good fit but I just didn't like how poppy the color of blues and purples.
I loved this dress and it was an absolute hit! It's stretchy with no zippers, and there is a LOT of fabric so beware when sizing. If between sizes definitely size down.

links_Review_Title: The volume of the skirt is amazing!
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress & got a million compliments! The volume of the skirt photographed really well and overall the dress was comfortable to wear.

links_Review_Title: So much dress, so much fun
links_Review_Text: This dress was so fun to dance in but really hard to do anything else. I wore 6inch heels and it was still just barely above the ground. It was great for pictures.

This dress was absolutely perfect... except for its length. Even with heels on, this dress trailed when I walked to the extent that I knew I'd trip if I wore it. Ultimately I had to return it, but if you're taller than I, I hope you get the chance to wear this dress and show it off :)

I felt so pretty in this dress. It's comfortable and has pockets. I received so many compliments. I'm 5'4 and definitely needed heels or else it would drag on the floor. The medium fit well, I think a small would've been good too. The waist is elastic and it's pretty roomy.

This dress has the opportunity to be gorgeous but falls short because of the amount of material - not a flattering look and I usually wear a 10 but the medium was still huge on me. Only tall thin women can pull off this dress well - not a winner in my book

I loved this dress so much! I was nervous about renting because people hadn't given it great reviews...but it's perfect in every way. I'm normally an XS or a Small and the XS fit perfectly. If you're in between sizes because it's all elastic, I'd recommend sizing down because it'll stretch anyways :-)
At 32 weeks pregnant this dress made me feel great! It was incredibly comfortable and flattering, I got so many compliments!
Wore it to a garden party and loved it! Like other reviewers said, it's a lot of fabric in the skirt so I sized down and it was great!

links_Review_Title: It was so good that Nacho Figueras gave me a Polo ball
links_Review_Text: It fit really beautifully - tonnes of compliments on the day! Also no strap tans!

This dress in the small regular was long enough for me and I'm 6'1" so it might be long for normal people! It's a beautiful dress, stretchy and comfortable. I didn't wear a bra but you could definitely wear a strapless bra with it. The skirt makes me want to twirl around forever.
Pretty dress but so much fabric. The dress was a little big in the top for me and a little bit long even with wedges.
Wore to a tamale making holiday fete. Elastic waist and neckline extremely comfortable. Loved full skirt and pattern!

links_Review_Title: I wore this 36 weeks pregnant to my baby shower and got endless compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fits large, and pretty long. otherwise very comfortable and stunning!

Love this dress and the empire waist shape - have rented several different times over the course of the summer! Would buy if the price comes down. A great dress as long as you size down (there is a lot of fabric as other users have mentioned). I'm normally a S/M and could wear an XS or S in this. A very versatile dress - great for day to night.
For great, loved the flowy fullness! Didn't want to give this back.
Felt like a princess and just ran with it for the everyday. People stopped me everywhere to talk about the dress. Lovely material. Definitely theatrical, wear to feel special:)
Heavy dress, long- need heels/wedges 5’2” 120 lbs xs fit perfectly

I rented for everyday but it is so beautiful I kept to wear to two different events. This dress is worth the price tag and it feels it as you wear. I love love love this dress!!! It is long, I'm 5' 10" and it hit the floor. It has pockets too! Very comfortable, like 1000 thread cotton sheets. On the shoulder or off, compliments from everyone I saw!
lovely print and breezy fabric
Dress is HUGE. If you're between sizes definitely size down. Has a full skirt that isn't very flattering. Very heavy dress with cheap looking pattern and button on bodice. Returned immediately

I wore this dress to Hugh Jackman's one man show and it was perfect for the occasion. The medium fit slightly larger in the waist but nothing that was an issue. The dress is very long. I'm 5'6 and wore my highest wedges and it still touched the ground. I received a ton of compliments on the dress and will rent again for a summer wedding or garden party.

links_Review_Title: It was a one of a kind!
links_Review_Text: It was a summer dress made like a ball gown, I didn't realize until the end of the day it had pocket too! I'm petite, and pulled it off, but someone taller than 5'2" would look amazing in this dress. It makes you feel like cinderella:)

I wore this dress twice to 2 different rehearsal dinners this spring and its perfect. It is dressier but also that's what makes it so great! Beyond comfortable and the sleeves were so cute. I wore them up on my shoulders instead of off and I think its a better look.
This dress is super long so it must be worn with heels. There is so much fabric at the bottom which makes the dress very heavy. Will be returning without wearing.
I rented and decided not to wear it. It's very big at the bottom with a lot of fabric, very custom like.

I got this dress on a whim and ended up wearing it to a performance of the NYCB. I am 5'4 typically a size 10/12 in dresses and I am a 34G. This fit perfectly fine. To me it runs big, I think I could have gotten away with a medium. I literally gasped when I looked in the mirror. Its drama without being pretentious. I loved that you would wear the sleeves up on the shoulder or off the shoulder ( I opted for off) also....IT HAS POCKETS!!! It hit the floor with slight pooling on me because I went to the ballet straight from work and opted to wear flats. With heels though it would have been perfect. Maybe one of my favorite rentals of all time.

links_Review_Title: Its a beautiful dress makes you feel very special.
links_Review_Text: A little long for me but i loved it.
This dress was massive and looked ridiculous. So much heavy fabric I felt like I was wearing a comforter.

This is fun and cute, and worked really well layered over a turtleneck. Maybe it's due to my membership in the itty bitty titty club, but it felt like there was a ballooning effect going on up top. However a size down definitely wouldn't fit my waist - so this top requires you to have more of an hourglass or straight skin shape I would think. Super fun though!

I really liked this top but it was too small and I didn't end up wearing it. It has little give and while I could zip it up I wasn't going to be comfortable wearing it. Plenty of room in the cup size and a total possibility for larger chested girls. I just had an issue with the material as there is very little stretch to it. I needed a medium but they didn't have that size. It photographed well and was very popular amongst my IG followers.
Wore this on Christmas and on a night out during the holidays! This would be really cute layered over a turtleneck too!
Cute top looks great with high waist jeans

links_Review_Title: I felt like a Christmas present
links_Review_Text: Beautiful and perfect of holiday parties. I got so many compliments!
This top is absolutely adorable and looks gorgeous!!! It is very cropped though and the fit is on the smaller side, especially in the waist!! A truly unique and great top overall though!!

links_Review_Title: So fun, sexy, and still classy
links_Review_Text: Based off reviews I got a large, should have gotten a medium. But it was so pretty in person I made it work and was messing with the straps and the gap all day- still SO worth how fun this shirt is. The straps are not adjustable so it needs a snug fit with the boning in the stomach area. Super eager to rent this again in the right size.

This top was so fun for a holiday party! The straps are not adjustable and were a little long on me, so I found it more flattering to tuck them in and wear it as strapless. Even on my large bust and long-ish torso, the crop was long enough to meet the top of a high-waisted skirt, and I assume could also meet high-waisted jeans. For most RTR brands I'm a 14/16, and I was sure the largest option of this top would still be too small, but I'm so glad I gave it a try! Fit my bust perfectly and kept everything secure with only a little occasional tugging :)

links_Review_Title: A little snug in the rib cage but so fun!!!

links_Review_Text: Was t the quality I expected and ran super large in the bust area
Fits great! perfect crop, and festive!

links_Review_Title: Really made me feel special even in jeans
links_Review_Text: Super cute, wish i'd gotten the XS since I'm not busty there was a bit of extra room but made it comfy to dance in. Straps were a bit long.
Wanted to go out of my comfort zone but this was too much of a stretch. The top is very cropped, & complicated with this huge bow on the side. Didn't wear it. Felt too old for that...
Sometimes crop tops like this run small, and I have a bigger chest so I sized up to a medium which was way too big. Get your regular size

Size up if you have large breasts. I am a 32DD. I was able to zip up the shirt in the back, however I was unable to breathe and It squished my breasts. The shirt has zero stretch to it. It is beautiful though and unique. I may rent in a bigger size in the future

links_Review_Title: a great outfit for a sunday brunch
links_Review_Text: amazing fit, very comfortable

So i didn't realize that this was sort of rainbow and sparkily and that just made it 10x better! This was such a fun outfit! The only con is that i did leave a trail of glitter everywhere so if that's an issue you may not like this but i didn't mind! I'm 5'1 and it was a little long (not really midi length) but was fine with heeled boots

This skirt is so flattering and shockingly sparkly! I thought it was going to be greys and blacks but when it arrived you can see that it's varying colors of tinsel like thread. So fun and I got so many compliments.
The fibers of tinsel get all over everything.
Rented this for work and when it arrived it was much more shimmery than in the photo but decided to go with it anyway and dress it down with a casual sweater and sneakers. I got tons of compliments!
Very cute skirt if you like sparkles

Pros: Loved the sparkle, color, shape, fit Cons: I left a trail of glitter everywhere... I do RTR unlimited and the other items in my order were also covered in glitter. If you can get over that part, it's absolutely worth it. Colorful, fun, and comfy!
I loved this skirt but it was shedding glitter everywhere.
Fit is fine. The colors are much brighter in person. And the skirt is sparkly.
Fit perfectly. Not that comfortable to sit in. More pink than red.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to a large, formal corporate party - received several compliments.
links_Review_Text: Overall fit was great. The bodice fit my bust better when I wore a push-up bra with clear straps rather than when I tried it on with a strapless bra.

I wore this to a 1930s themed rooftop party. The dress was beautiful and I loved it. The only downside is that there is no stretch or give. I ended up sizing up two sizes so my hips and butt would fit comfortably since I'm much curvier on my bottom. Thankfully the top still fit perfectly even with me sizing up. The lack of stretch did require me to hike the dress up to get in and out of vehicles.

I didn't want to return this dress! Fit like a glove - no bra needed if snug enough! I didn't feel the lace under my arms like others and the compliments came all night long! So elegant and classy and different! LOVE LOVE LOVE

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress. Fits well. But not for black tie event.
links_Review_Text: I wanted to wear this for an evening black tie event. In the end I didn't wear it because it felt too "casual". This dress would be great for a work event, or partner meeting or daytime wedding.
I Love this dress! The dress stands out with the beautiful embroidery, lace, & colors! It is curve hugging & slimming! I Definitely recommend renting this dress!!

Loved this dress and it so many compliments! It is so beautiful and hugged my curves in all the right ways. Even though I am short at 5'2", the length was great. I normally wear a 10 but the 12 fit better since there isn't a lot of stretch in the fabric and I have full hips. Would definitely recommend for an hourglass figure.
This was a wowzer dress. So comfortable and easy to wear. True to size. So many compliments. Worn for a work Holiday Gala.

My normal size is 16 these days, but this dress is very fitted and I had to go two sizes up to be completely comfortable in this sheath style. My bust is 46 and hips 49 if that helps. I'm 5'3" and it came to my ankles. The rich embroidery over the black lace makes this a stand out dress, as so many others have stated! Couldn't have been happier.

I sized up after reading reviews that this ran small. It was definitely roomy and comfortable so I could have gone with the smaller size, but it is structured well enough so the bigger size didn't look sloppy. Very festive and didn't require any shapewear.

links_Review_Title: Well made, intricate dress great for winter black tie wedding
links_Review_Text: Good for hourglass body. Recommend black heels.
Be careful when bending over the way the dress is cut it's a little limiting but regardless totally worth it!!

Definitely stands out as unique among the usual cocktail party suspects. The pics don't do the net overlay and embroidery justice, and the quality overall is top notch. I chose to edge it up w/ a leather jacket over the shoulders and sexy zipper heels. Small in the chest for me so I'm glad I sized up. Bra band was visible in the back, but the dress had great structure so one was not necessary. I did wear high waisted shapeware for a smoother line given the fitted cut of the dress.

Beautiful dress, great quality. It arrived only two hours before the event started (which added tons of stress), but this was before RTR reworked internal operations to get things on track. Loved the dress, and the customer service was top notch, despite the delays!

I felt stunning at a gala for an arts organization in this statement dress and the compliments flowed freely... The embroidery is colorful and tasteful, the fit TTS, and the look chic and modest yet feminine. Slight rubbing under arms after some time but not uncomfortably so. Would rent again!

Dress was a beautiful color and true to size. Even though it's fitted it was easier to move in compared to other similar dresses. I did have to pull it up a little when sitting but no biggie. Highly recommend!
Wore this for a rehearsal dinner and received so many compliments. Fit perfectly
Fit snug but not tight. The dress is flattering for full figured woman and older too. It is lined and the dress looks very expensive.

Perfect for an afternoon wedding into the evening. Felt elegant AND could dance all night and move around in dress with ease. The size 4 worked for me; fitted enough with plenty of breathing room to spare. My measurements... bust 34 B, 27 waist, 36 hip.

Loved this dress so much! I received so many compliments. Over all it was pretty comfortable. There is no slit so you are a little limited. Enough to walk up steps but if you want to get down on the dance floor it may restrict your moves a bit. I was worried about it fitting me as typically this type of cut tends to be snug in the hips but big on top. It was really fitted in the hips with the 4 but it was ok. I was little confused about my return date being a Sunday as all the UPS stores were closed in my area. I tried to call but was on hold. I did find in the faq's that if you have a return date on a Sunday And there is not a drop off , you can return the following day by noon. Just panicked about it for a bit until I was able to confirm that info.

links_Review_Title: The compliments!!! I felt great wearing this dress and got tons of compliments as well.
links_Review_Text: This dress was a perfect fit without being too restrictive. I could still sit down and dance and walk without much additional effort - I did have to pull it up slightly for sitting. I have a 29 inch waist and 40 inch hips and the 6R was a perfect fit for me.

links_Review_Title: ABSOLUTE FAVORITE DRESS I'VE EVER RENTED!!! Total stunner!
links_Review_Text: I read all of the reviews and thankfully followed the suggestions of ordering up. I rented this for an important event and so I wanted to feel good that night and not have any fit issues so I actually ordered two sizes up (I typically wear a 16 and I ordered the 20), it was absolutely perfect and so thankful I did (I hate too tight things around my midsection so that tiny bit of extra room made it skim my silhouette and it made for a very flattering look). The embroidery is so expensive looking and especially the netting detail. I chose to style it with a body suit and sheer socks for a little something different which really made it shine. Absolutely my favorite dress I've ever rented.
Read the reviews and glad I went with an 8! I'm normally a 4/6. The fit and length were perfect! Very elegant. Had 2 weddings in 2 weeks and wore it to both!

Had a great time at the acquisition party and got so many compliments from my coworkers. The women coworkers asked where I got it and I was shameless. So happy I tried this one on. Wore with 6 inch heels.

links_Review_Title: My fav by far thus far
links_Review_Text: This dress is amaze balls. My only critique is that the red is not red it's more of a hot pink had a baby with fuchsia. The dress is tailored without being tight and is three dresses the shell the sheer black and nude dresses underneath where you look like ur naked but not. Love love love love. Good for all occasions I'm going to wear it at least once more before sending it back. Have to rent at least once

links_Review_Title: I felt so beautiful in this dress. The quality of the fabric was magnificent.
links_Review_Text: I had to re-order in a larger size because the 14 would barely zip, and I couldn't breathe. This dress is extremely tight through the rib-cage. Even the 16R was tight, but it better than the 14. Loved the quality of the dress.

I received many complements on the dress and it was perfect for a summer wedding. The fit was good all around and it was very comfortable. My only complaint was that by the end of the night the lace did start to irritate the skin under my arm a bit.

links_Review_Title: When I walked out of the bedroom my husband lit up at the sight of me
links_Review_Text: The dress was so comfortable and fit like a dream. Hugged in all the right places and none of the wrong ones.
Colors were vibrant, loved the embroidery.
I loved this dress and wore it for an evening wedding. It fit perfectly and was really comfortable. I would recommend it and wear it again.

links_Review_Title: Love Love Love - Perfect for opera dinner and premiere
links_Review_Text: This dress is just perfect. I was hesitant to order because of the initial unfavorable reviews, but this fit is TTS like other dresses from this designer. I felt beautiful and confident, and this dress elicited many compliments. This dress would be gorgeous for a formal outdoor wedding. I had no issues with tailoring of fabric. If you like the look of this dress, you should be very happy with this rental!

Beautiful dress for a black tie optional wedding. Got multiple compliments! I did not find the dress to be uncomfortable like some of the other reviewers but even if it was I wouldn't mind as it was such a unique and stunning design.
I wore this dress to church and later to brunch. I loved it. The fit was perfect and very comfortable. Highly recommend...just when you want to feel pretty.

This dress is absolutely stunning. I rented it during shelter-in-place, for basically no reason other than I'd been eyeing it for a while. I wore it for a date night at home and can't wait to have a legitimate reason to rent it again. The fit is snug, but the pattern and weight of the fabric help smooth things out. The sheer portion at the top comes quite low, but with the pattern you don't notice right away... it's sneaky sultry, which I really liked. Loved the length, loved that I could wear a normal bra, loved that I wouldn't see anyone else wearing this.
the fit was perfect! wore it in new orleans
The reviews stated this ran small, it does not! I sized up and it was huge. Couldn't wear it, but the gown is gorgeous

RTR recommended a size up from what I normally wear which is why I said it must fit small. Or perhaps it's just because it's a fitted dress. Regardless I took their recommendation and it fit perfectly. The dress is very classic yet elegant - also very comfortable. I was in this dress for about 9 hours at a black tie fundraising event. I received lots of compliments and highly recommend. I would definitely wear this again.

This dress was GORGEOUS! wish I had taken a pic :(....I didn't wear because theme of party was black and white (didn't know that until after I rented this dress). I will say order up a size if you carry weight in middle of body. I was a little concerned if I wore this I wouldn't be able to sit lol. But who cares. Just stand up looking fab in this dress! Because I had to order two sizes up , the top was a little big. Gorgeous dress-I will rent again if I have another occasion!

links_Review_Title: Pretty and well made but heavy with lots going on.
links_Review_Text: I sized up as suggested so a 12 fit well but the rope like netting, and embroidery and lining make for a heavy kind of stiff silhouette. The bottom seams kind of puckered and didn't lay evenly, as if parts shrunk and other parts didn't. I returned it and did not wear it.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, but I needed to size up due to bust.
links_Review_Text: This is a beautiful dress, but if you are curvy, size up. It fit in the hips ok, but the rib cage and bust area would not zip up. If I was less than 34DD, it would likely have been ok. This dress, though it is like others from Marchesa Notte on RTR, is cut a little smaller. I bought the butterfly one and that is cut a little more generously in the bust. I didn't wear this because I needed a 10R not an 8R.

links_Review_Title: Large and kind of weird opening in the front
links_Review_Text: It was okay. The opening in the front looks kind of weird but the weather is cool enough to wear a jacket over.
This dress fits so good and feel amazing. I would love to wear it every day!!! Worked perfect for luau!!!!

links_Review_Title: It was perfect for our vacation in Palm Beach!
links_Review_Text: Fun print! Overall flattering silhouette yet not for big-chested ladies (the front opening might be too revealing).

links_Review_Title: Loved the Dress but Needed Minor Adjustments
links_Review_Text: As previous reviewers have mentioned, the keyhole opening is very revealing. I covered it using some vintage lace and a brooch. This worked perfectly since I was wearing the dress for Dapper Day at Disneyland. I did need to wear spanx, but found the dress to be very comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful but needed a little extra coverage.
links_Review_Text: Loved how effortless this dress was with exception to the very large keyhole. I ended up wearing an olive green cami and everyone just thought it was part of the dress. So many compliments.

links_Review_Title: This dress opens in the front!
links_Review_Text: A little too revealing for the office but perhaps a cute weekend outfit.
I loved everything about this dress except for the stupid boob window. I tried it with a dress slip underneath and it still felt embarrassing. Such a disappointment!

This was a cute dress but it has some issues. The slit in the front was somewhat unpredictable. Most the of the time it was invisible then suddenly HELLO GIRLS. Also this fabric has no stretch. At first I didn't notice but after sitting all day it really started to get uncomfy. Ok for a rent, glad I didn't have it for keeps!
Yep. Gap in the front, must use pins. Belt cannot be removed and the slippy fabric makes it sag unflatteringly. I solved this by tying it in the back. Gorgeous print makes up for all of it.

links_Review_Title: I felt great in this dress l!
links_Review_Text: This dress was comfortable and very flattering!
Fit nice and great fabric. The key hole was a bit low for me so I did have to wear a bra that was low cut in the front.

So this dress is SO cute, right? Yes. It is. If you don't have DD breasts. The fit was perfect everywhere else, the fabric is great, the flow was perfect, the length was perfect. But the slit in the front was DEFINITELY not appropriate for work. Looking at the model pics, I didn't realize the front slit was soooooo deep. But yeah, this will sadly be staying on the hanger.

The print of this dress is very striking and generated a lot of compliments. The shape of the shoulders and skirt are also very pretty. Only cons are that the material doesn't feel particularly high quality and the hole in the top opened so much that I had to wear a tank underneath which I think took away from the look just a little bit. All that said I enjoyed wearing it and think it's a good rental!

links_Review_Title: Loved the print, the fit was a little off but I worked with it.
links_Review_Text: Like other users, had to pin the front together Bc I have big boobies, but I got a lot of compliments on it and I like the print.
Didn't realize there was a huge slit in the cleavage area. Was able to wear a white undershirt with it but made it feel a little awkward.

links_Review_Title: Chic summer look, keyhole is very low cut in the front though
links_Review_Text: I thought this was a very nice dress. The fabric was high quality and felt airy. I wore this for everyday and to be honest it was a little too low cut for everyday, at least if you're on the bustier side. Either wear for a fancier event or wear something underneath.

links_Review_Title: Pretty but not worth the hassle
links_Review_Text: This dress is really pretty and I loved the print. The dress has aspects that are a pain and make it not worth the hassle. The belt is sewn on to the back of the dress so it is not optional. The silky fabric makes the bow sag to the middle of the stomach. I had to pin it in place so it would stay up. The neckline has a slit that you can't see on the stock photo. The slit gaps open so I had to pin that as well. Even with the pinning, the neckline still gapped at times so I had to be conscious of sitting up straight so my bra wouldn't show. I also have a very small chest. This dress wouldn't work for anyone with a larger chest since the gap would be very exposing and show your bra.

I loved this print and dress arrived with tags still on..cute fit overall but hello!!! No way to make this look good. Collar is sewn together at the top, so ZERO adjustment for the clevage. Can't imagine how anyone can pull this off?? Major bummer because everything else on this dress was a win.

links_Review_Title: Simultaneously too small and too big!
links_Review_Text: There is no stretch in this fabric. My hips were too big for it, to the point where I could not walk or sit in it, but my chest was way too small. The odd top has a completely open front that flaps in the breeze if your breasts are too small to fill it. It's basically a giant window to the front of whatever bra I'm wearing, because there is no way I would skip a bra with a giant opening like that.
Longer than I expected but very functional
Thin in the hips! Gaping top. Could get over my booty so didn’t wear.
Looks like it'd be very nice, but didn't fit at all. Also way more open, exposed opening in the chest.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful print and fit, but bust gapes
links_Review_Text: Beautiful print, fabric feels polyester (maybe it is? I don't remember) -- not highest quality, but cut and details meant it still draped well. As others have noted, the gape in the bust area is much more pronounced than the photo indicates. I'm busty, so wore a wired lace bralette under. Fun for a birthday dinner on the beach, but wouldn't fly for work (and a full tank underneath might be too bulky).
Loved this dress. Be weary the chest area is very revealing. I wore the dress none the less but be ready to show cleavage!

links_Review_Title: If you have hips- size up.
links_Review_Text: Loved the beautiful print but unfortunately the area around the hips was SO tight I couldn't wear it. Ordering in the future one size up and hopefully it'll work because gorgeous dress.
Love the print! I though the fabric would be a bit more casual. In person it's much more formal, which didn't work for me.

links_Review_Title: Absolutely loved this dress. I don't really have a shape, it made me look great! Lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: No cons All pros

links_Review_Title: Weird Fit - I couldn't even wear
links_Review_Text: This dress is made for someone with large boobs and a small waist (I'm opposite lol). The top part has a slit in it that was gaping open on me, and I could barely get the waist to zip up. It is def not for a curvy figure.

links_Review_Title: Quality piece, just not for me
links_Review_Text: The sleeves were flowy so it felt like there was a lot going on on my narrow shoulders. I have a full C bust and I felt like the slit in the front was stretched open. The dress is a really nice material and I loved the tie wast and skirt.

links_Review_Title: Perfect fit; tons of compliments, even from strangers on the street
links_Review_Text: A lot of people review that the front slit is quite large. While that is definitely the case, the otherwise conservative style of this dress pairs extremely well with the slit and makes for a very sexy date dress. If you're uncomfortable showing cleavage, this is not the dress for you. But if you want a sexy dress that gets stares down the street and random strangers stopping you to compliment you, GET IT, GIRL.

links_Review_Title: The keyhole is the stupidest thing I have ever seen.
links_Review_Text: I stupidly did not read the reviews for this dress because I was so excited about the pattern that I didn't want to miss out on the opportunity to rock this dress.
