Oh what a mistake. I tried on the dress and was very confused.... why was the dress cut so that MY ENTIRE BRA showed?!? That doesn't make any sense. What happened to subtly?!? The cut ruins what could be a lovely work dress. After getting over my initial annoyance, I decided to get crafty with fashion tape but that didn't work either. If you have boobs, you need to either do wonders with a safety pin (if you even have any lying around?!) or you just have to succumb to wearing something underneath which is not sexy at all.... it just looks weird. This dress would be a ten out of ten if it didn't have this stupid key hole!!!
This dress was just weird, maybe best for straight shape. I didn't realize there was an opening in the top, so that would have been open upon wearing.
It's a beautiful print but it was a bit small for me on the bust area.

links_Review_Title: Very pretty but the keyhole front makes it unwearable
links_Review_Text: The dress otherwise fit really well, but the keyhole front made it not an option to wear out of the house. I should have read the reviews before I ordered, because the the keyhole doesn't show on the model AT ALL. Sent back unworn. Oh well.

links_Review_Title: i could not wear becaus it was too small
links_Review_Text: too small

I loved this dress. I was hesitant to rent it based on other reviews highlighting the chest construction. Admittedly, the other reviewers were right... I assumed I could use fashion tape, but the key hole is too large to do so. BUT, have no fear- I have a solution for you: simply pair the dress with a spandex/bodycon slip... It works perfectly, it will keep you covered up for the office, and the little pop off black with partial skin sticking out of the keyhole looks gorgeous, sexy, and classy. Just enough to cover you up, while still maintaining a slight peek-a-boo effect. If you don't have one, spend $20 on a black spandex camisole style slip via Amazon prime, and rent this dress immediately. I styled it with a wide brimmed cream & black fedora, with tan cap toed cream snakeskin pumps.... I looked and felt like I stepped out of a Cuban luxury photo shoot.
The top part is weird. You def need to use a Avery pin to hold it together. Otherwise it totally gapes open.

links_Review_Title: It runs small and it has a strange cut in front, so you need a top under the dress.
links_Review_Text: Not my favourite rent, but it is a great print.

links_Review_Title: Pretty print, not a pretty fit
links_Review_Text: As other reviews described, this dress gaps very strangely in the chest area and there's no way to remedy this because of how it's sewn together in the front. Also the fabric isn't very breathable which is what I was searching for in a summer dress.
Couldn't even zip up the dressed. So disappointed. It runs 2 sizes too small.
I liked this dress and received many compliments, but I felt wide in it. The liner was very tight. I have an hourglass figure and this dress didn't show off my waist the way I wanted.

Wore this for a work event themed Roaring 20s and it was perfect. Lots of compliments! Nicely made dress. Runs TTS - I wore a large but a M would have been a better fit. The shape of the dress is forgiving so it didn't matter.
Rented this for a 1920s themed event. Straps looked a bit cheap and it was definitely a loose fit but the dress moved well and was incredibly comfortable.

This was a perfect dress for a Roaring 20s party. Many compliments during the evening. Very comfortable dress and no need to wear a bra. Dress definitely runs large. I am am a size 6/8 and the M was too big.

This dress is a great backdrop for standout accessories. I wore this dress to a 30th bday party with an "End of the Roaring 20s" theme and got compliments on my look all night. Ordered a medium but could've definitely gotten away with a small--super roomy and comfortable, adjustable straps very necessary.

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress to a New Years themed party in college!
links_Review_Text: I absolutely loved the dress. It fits a little large and it was almost too short for my taste, but it worked perfectly for this party! It is a good quality material and the straps are adjustable. The detailing makes the dress stand out as more than just a traditional black dress.
The large fit well, but I went with the xl for length. It's pretty short for a leggy 5'9"
Perfect for a flapper dress. Definitely runs large. I felt very comfortable in the xs and a usually wear a small.

I am 21 weeks pregnant so deciding what to wear can be challenging. Had a 1920 themed wedding party to attend. Came across this dress which seemed perfect. With the non form fitting design I felt more confident. Rented the L and XL as a backup. The L fit just right!! I was comfortable in it all night and got lots of compliments. Would def recommend for a party & especially if you have a #Gatsbyparty. For reference I am 5'3" -- at this point of pregnancy I'm currently 166 pounds and 38D

Perfect for a 20s themed party! Feathery type strips of fabric are somewhat fragile. Very boxy and not very form flattering for hourglass figure, but super comfy and no spanx needed! Not my favorite RTR dress but would def rent again if needed for a similar situation.
Super comfortable. Pictures don't quite do it justice, but it was a really elegant 1920s-esque look! Adjustable straps, which is helpful!

I got so many compliments on this dress. I went to a Gatsby themed party, but didn't want to spend money on a dress solely for the occasion. Renting allowed me to get something fashionable and cute without committing to a purchase!

links_Review_Title: It was so much fun to wear this dress. Got to saw legs !!!!!
links_Review_Text: This dress was was very fun on the dance floor. It was easy to move it and hid all my flaws. It has those little thrills that makes it look very romantic. My date jaw dropped when he saw me.
Cute little dress, perfect for a Friendsgiving or a dinner party!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for Great Gatsby theme gala!

links_Review_Text: Runs a little big but still fit great!
The fit was cute, an extra small would've worked a little better but overall super cute and fun dress to dance and eat in!

links_Review_Title: Cute but this particular one is getting to the end of its rental life. Little bit too worn...
links_Review_Text: Fun, cute cocktail dress.

links_Review_Title: Just too much material not flattering
links_Review_Text: The fabric is really interesting and I thought it would be a nice change for LBD. But I should've know from the side view of the model it just does nothing for you. The dress is cut like a shift but should but more of a sheath.
Large size was much to big for a 6/8.

links_Review_Title: Put this dress on and strike a pose!
links_Review_Text: I love high necklines and body hugging lines that make you feel like a woman! This dress was incredibly comfortable I could've worked out in it, yet it's formal for a dress up occasion. Since we're in quarantine the only ones who appreciated it was me, my dog and my daughter. The photos will live on for everybody. I paired it with my vans to show the comfort level at the diversity. Great detail On the behind too!!

I had been dying for any excuse to rent this dress only to be incredibly underwhelmed when I tried it on. The material is bunchy, structure-less, staticky and seemingly picks up everything and anything around you. I gave it a hard pass, but man, was it a crushing experience after dreaming of wearing it for so long.
Favorite RTR dress to date! I even heard women whispering about the dress In the bathroom. I wore pasties but not necessary. Super comfy. Just perfect in all aspects.

links_Review_Title: I'm in love with this dress!
links_Review_Text: Absolutely comfy and classy. True size, perfect for a black tie wedding. Wish I could stay with it forever!
This dress felt a little too Elvira for me. It looks lovely on smaller busted body types but for me it was not street legal. I went with something different.

This dress fit beautifully and so many people told me how much they loved it. It's comfortable and easy to dance in since it hit me around the tops of my feet and wasn't dragging on the floor. I got a small and it fit perfectly, not too tight or loose.

links_Review_Title: This is one of the fanciest AND comfiest dresses I've ever worn
links_Review_Text: I absolutely loved this dress, I wish I had an excuse to wear it over and over again. It was unlike any other black dress I've worn, just very unique. The skirt material is very stretchy and fit like a glove. The top part was revealing enough without being "too much". I definitely recommend renting this one for your next black tie or formal event.

I received so many compliments in this dress, and I truly felt stunning and completely comfortable. I'm 5'1 and 130lbs with some curves that usually make finding formal dresses a tiresome process, but this was a perfect fit. I was only disappointed that I couldn't buy the HAH dress to keep forever! Highly recommend!

Material is super comfy yet classy. It revealed all the right places yet hid all the not so good places. I was worried about it being too long but it was the perfect length when I added a stacked heel. I was complimented all night long in this dress and felt amazing wearing it! Our formal event was Gatsby themed and although this dress most likely wouldn’t have been worn in 1920, it was a hit in 2020! Added a little head piece and cute bag and it was perfect! Like all the other reviews...didn’t want to return it. :)

links_Review_Title: The subtle sex appeal of the see through top is to die for. Show stopper indeed
links_Review_Text: Fit was great! the bottom of the dress had give so it didn't feel clingy. Moved well on the dance floor
This dress was amazing. Incredibly comfortable fit and photographed so well. I got some of the most compliments ever wearing this dress!
My hubby loved this dress!. I did need to use boob tape for the bust area I am a 36D. It was a pleasure finding a dress that was elegant and comfortable.
I loved the lace detail at the front. I am 5'5'' and it just hit at the most awkward spot. Like too long of a midi and too short of a maxi. Didn't keep this one

links_Review_Title: Very sexy, yet elegant and comfortable!!
links_Review_Text: Everything stays in place, so no wardrobe malfunction, and extremely comfortable. Fitting without being tight. Length was perfect for me with my normal 3” heels.
Fit great! I’m super tall so it wasn’t floor length but it hit at a flattering point on the ankle I think. Lots of stretch in the bottom for my hips. I’m a 4 on top and 8 on bottom.

Fit absolutely flawlessly. Wore for a music photoshoot. One of the most elegant and sexy dresses I've ever worn- classic, timeless, Victorian-esque. Could be for a black tie for sure. Wouldn't recommend for larger bust.

links_Review_Title: This dress is the best! Compliments did not stop from the second we walked it!
links_Review_Text: Fits true to size, with a little boob tape this dress was a dream! I considered never giving it back. I am 5'2 and with platforms it was the perfect length.
Great fit, and elegant however you wear it. This should have more reviews! Such a find.

links_Review_Title: Best formal dress you can rent!
links_Review_Text: Rented this for my holiday party and it was PERFECT. A little sexy but also classy. Also very unique. Would definitely recommend as a showstopper :)

Stretchy, comfortable IF you are comfortable wearing no bra. I duck taped but it's shear over boob so you can't really pull them up. I just felt a little better knowing that if my dress shifted, nipples were covered. Super sexy but still sophisticated look.

This dress is the dreamiest! Literally walked 5 steps into the event and got a compliment. It's stretchy so the fit works pretty much no matter what, I would assume. I'm flat chested so I didn't have to wear pasties as the previous reviewer said since there's no hope of a boob running loose!

links_Review_Title: I cried when I had to return it
links_Review_Text: This was the perfect dress for the event I went to. It was equal parts formal and edgy. I received so many compliments! I didn't want to take it off and really didn't want to return it. Because there's no possible way to wear a bra, pasties are a necessity.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress with equal parts classy, sexy and slimming.
links_Review_Text: Unfortunately, our event was cancelled due to COVID-19. But, it didn't stop me from putting on a little fashion show for my husband with our seven year old daughter. This dress was incredibly comfortable and just one of those styles that immediately says 'WOWZA'. I'm an athletic build (5'5, 130 lbs) and this dress was so flattering. I would recommend a pair of Spanx to go with it. Lovely item!

This dress is sexy and fun, but best of all--you can literally ball it up and throw it in a suitcase then unpack it and put it on without having to worry about wrinkles or creases. It's comfy and flattering. I'm a fan.
I would rent it again when I have an evening event/formal.

This dress fit like a dream! I'm between a size 10-12, and wore the Large. I am squarely built, but this dress actually gave me a shape. It is comfortable to dance in all night ... compliments galore!
Fit was a bit tight
Rented this to wear for a date but it's too long on me so it looks very formal.

links_Review_Title: I wish I could keep it!!
links_Review_Text: Love love love. The cut outs are beautiful and not sexy so work friendly and you can wear a NORMAL bra!!!! Color is gorgeous. Fabric has a bit of sheen to it. Sleeves have a little flounce to them. Very fitted around the ribs but roomy below. Pair with black heels and almost no jewelry. Loved loved loved.

links_Review_Title: Great fit. Lots of compliments. Very unique

links_Review_Text: This dress is a show-stopper. A little tight in the bust, but otherwise a wonderful fit. The fabric and design is beautiful. Would rent again!
Lovely color, cut and length. Very English duchess perfect for Easter, tea luncheons etc
Sorry for the picture, I wish I would have gotten a better one. So many compliments. The fabric is to die for. Rent!

links_Review_Title: Didn't like the fit in chest/waist
links_Review_Text: This dress for oddly in the chest. Maybe if my boobs were at my waist would this fit be less odd but it was droopy on top w wrong waist location and tight on lower tummy.

links_Review_Title: This was comfortable and I got a lot of compliments!
links_Review_Text: If you have a thinner waist and broader shoulders this dress fits very well.

I wore this to a luncheon and got a million compliments. It's an unexpected but beautiful color and the cut is so flattering! The plaid print makes it just conservative enough. I wore it with a black leather jacket and tall suede boots because of the weather, but would rent it again in the warmer months to show it off. I'm pretty tall and thought it was the perfect length. There's no stretch and the midsection is very fitted, so you may want to size up.

I am a huge TL fan. Beyond excited for this dress, received NWT and when I tried on it had a weird fit. I am always a UK 12 in Temperley, but this was a little bit big. The boob area was sagging and material was overall very lack luster and so sending back unworn....Which is really saying something.
Absolutely loved this dress for our Mexico vacation. Fit true to size and was so comfy. Could be worn during day or dressed up for night!
Great comfortable dress. I would have gotten a small although it recommended a med. The med was loose and I had to cinch the straps and the waist.
This dress was perfect for a girl's weekend in Texas. It was about 100 degrees and this was light weight and flowy!

I loved this dress because it was versatile, flattering, easy to wear, and had a beautiful pattern and colors. I was able to wear it to work, on a date, and a night out! Lightweight and seemed to be TTS!

links_Review_Title: Easy dress to throw on for a summer vacation
links_Review_Text: Lightweight, flattering and easy to wear summer dress. I rented for a trip to Italy and it was prob my favorite of the RTR update dresses.
Nothing super special, but is comfortable to wear and cute.

Wore this to some Napa wine tastings. Comfortable. A little bit big, I could have gone down to XS but it might have been too tight in the bust. I like the detail of the bottom of the dress. Straps are adjustable so that's nice too.

links_Review_Title: Pretty summer dress with a feminine pattern
links_Review_Text: Cute and comfy dress. Ties at the waist and the straps are adjustable. Cute but nothing too special.

Love love loved this dress super cute & comfortable. Has the high slit in front which makes it super flirty! Adjustable straps & draw string at the waist! Only reason that made me give it a 4 was that receiving the dress was such a mess. The dress arrived 2 days late and it was hard to get ahold of anyone from customer services. I was on hold for an hour and half before speaking to anyone.
So lovely, thought about purchasing but I'm not sure how often I'd wear it. Not for summer work, so just out & vacation. I'd definitely rent it again.

links_Review_Title: Fun dress for a warm weather vacation.
links_Review_Text: This dress has a fun hem line as you can see in the photos. It is made of a lightweight fabric and I decided to buy it. I'm giving it four stars because I don't love it, but I liked it enough to want to add it to my summer clothes.
Wore this at multiple dinners on vacation! Super comfy and light weight for warm weather. I don't have a large chest so it was a little roomy but that's my only con. I def should have purchased it :p

links_Review_Title: I loved everything about this dress!
links_Review_Text: I loved everything about this dress so much that I bought it!

links_Review_Title: Dressy Casual on the town look
links_Review_Text: This look was perfect for a date in the city. Simple like you didn't try to hard, but makes you stand out in a crowd. It was incredibility comfortable and flattering. I paired with bright yellow earrings to dress it up a little more. True to size.

I love the color/pattern of this dress, and it was super comfy to wear. However, the large was too big for me, and I should've ordered a medium. I was still able to wear the large because of the tie waist and a denim jacket over it.
Tried the dress on and it fit well, but I rented it for a wedding and it arrived too late to wear. The weather also turned cold on me so I couldn’t wear it after as part of my update.
I loved this dress. It was really comfy and flattering. I would rent it again.

links_Review_Title: Very cute dress! Super comfortable, wore without a bra.
links_Review_Text: Fit well, loved the top and breezy feel to it on vacation. Considered purchasing but didn't love the slit up the front.
Easy to wear and comfortable material but too loose and saggy around the bust.
I ordered this for my birthday dinner and even though I am 5'10 this was great with heels and hugged my body in all the right places! So cute
Dress it up or dress it down. Loved this dress! Almost bought it!

The waist has a draw string which makes the fit customizable. I found this piece to be very versatile in the variable early-fall New England weather. In cooler days, I paired it with a denim jacket. I was also able to wear this to work because the skirt length and bust coverage was appropriately modest when paired with a cardigan. The dress was fully lined, so I didn't need to wear any undergarments if I didn't want to. The color scheme allowed for a variety of shoe pairings: camel/tan, nude, pale pink, navy, or white shoes work great.
I absolutely LOVE this dress! And so sad to return it. It was so flattering and perfect!

links_Review_Title: Great Dress-Review Rails Size Chart Runs Big
links_Review_Text: I wish I had looked at Rails size chart before renting. RTR told me that people size 14 should rent XXL. It was huge on me. The bust measurement for size XXL is 43. XXL is their size 16 and it is a true 16 or even 18 not a designer 16. I should have rented a L probably. The waist was also big. So cute and great for fall transition dressing.
I wore this to work with a jean jacket and then I wore it out for dinner with different shoes. You can dress up or down.
t
Comfortable
So comfortable dress is lined and has weight but is still perfect for warm weather.
I loved this dress! Flattering and cute and perfect for summer. I ended up wearing it multiple times from nights out to work.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress. Comfy and stylish.
links_Review_Text: Need to blouse out the top. Very comfy and flowy...felt confident in it.

links_Review_Title: I got compliments on this dress EVERY time I wore it
links_Review_Text: This dress was great! I went with the XXL based on recommendations from RTR but I think I could have been comfortable in the XL. I did like the "oversized" style though; the drawstring at the waist allows you to make it more flattering. I loved the flow of the bottom of this dress and I don't normally like ruffles. I wore this to a bridal shower, on a date, and during the day at a farmer's market/brewery while exploring a new city and it was perfect for each of those locations. Literally every time I wore it someone, if not multiple people, stopped to tell me they loved the dress. 10/10 would rent again.

Easy to wear, adjustable straps. Felt great in it for work with a denim jacket or on the weekend for a party. Even picking up a toddler multiple times, dress was never inappropriate or uncomfortable. Great dress
This dress is easy to wear, a great length but ultimately average.
Cute dress. Love this and it's white and black polka dot sister from Rails. Nice lightweight dress for day-to-night. Will rent again.

links_Review_Title: Easy material, can be dressed up or down
links_Review_Text: Really cute dress, can be worn sexy with heels or super relaxed with sandals. Very comfortable and great option for ladies with big breast.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to a Fourth of July picnic party. The red, white and blue pattern was perfect.
links_Review_Text: I probably would have been fine with a medium, but the adjustable straps and pull-string waist made it easy to adjust the fit. This is a very wearable, comfortable dress. It is extremely well constructed and the fabric is not see-through or frothy, but has a lovely hand and moves beautifully when walking and dancing. Got lots of compliments and shared my little secret with a couple of women: It's from Rent the Runway!
This great was perfect for a backyard BBQ or to dress up for an event. It was so comfortable. I received so many compliments on it. I might actually buy this dress to have for future events.
Weird proportions. Cute idea didn't work well

links_Review_Title: New favorite summer dress! Can be dressed up or down.
links_Review_Text: Fits perfectly.
This actually the best shirt I've ever worn. The material is UNREAL and it's so sexy and cute

This was one hot top! Super slinky and sexy. Perfect for a bachelorette in NYC. Very low cut, so be ready to show some chest--and probably go braless. The color and the quality of the fabric was beyond what I even expected. I felt amazing in this top and I'd love to wear it again.

I loved this top! The color and the material are incredible and can dress up any outfit. The only thing is that if you have a bigger chest, it might give you some gaps between the buttons and the seams on the cups are not proportioned well. Otherwise, so cute.

Wore with cutoffs during the day, skinny jeans for a casual date and a leopard skirt for a fancier date. Beautiful quality and decent support so you can go without a bra. Runs a little small so size up.
Sooo beautiful. The color and the buttons are very pretty and it fits nicely. A little big in chest if you are flatter.
The L fit me (size 8) in a drapey, loose but not overly big way. The adjustable straps help. The silk is thick and substantial. Got a lot of compliments on this at a BBQ.

I automatically felt dressed up with this top. The fabric is luxurious and it's the perfect neutral color. Im in between an xs ans s and sized up because I didn't want it to be body con and that was the right choice for sure. This top is perfect for date night and if it came in a few colors I'd rent all. It's definitely versatile if you want cleavage or not ha the shape of cut is perfect to accommodate different strapless bras and it's not low cut enough in back that you see your bra straps. Can't wait to rent again!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful top, looked exactly like photo.
links_Review_Text: Will definitely be renting this again. Usually between sm and m in these kinds of tops and order both and liked the way the sm fit better. Wore without bra.

links_Review_Title: Obsessed with this classy silk cami top
links_Review_Text: LOVED this top so much. So beautiful and classy - easy to dress up and dress down. Would definitely rent again (I'm 5'3, 32C)
I sized up for this top, but it didn't matter because this top has adjustable straps. It's a really pretty material too!
Got this shirt to wear out. Only got to wear it once, but it was really cute and very flattering.
Loved this top, it's so flattering and perfect for anything from dinner or drinks to something more formal

links_Review_Title: Beautiful..but for a C cup max.
links_Review_Text: So beautiful, but cups are very small for above a b or c.

links_Review_Title: Great Quality and Design for tank lovers!
links_Review_Text: I am super hot natured and, being in Texas, I love a good silk tank that doesn't show sweat and stays in place all day. I wore this all day for football parties and then into the evening as well. Favorite rental so far!
Loving this top - it's a super luxe feeling material and fits great. Pair with jeans and you're set.
Every fabric from nanushka is just dreamy, this is no exception. Nice length, but straps were a little long. If you are between sizes, I'd go down

Very nice, interesting top. Very high quality and well made. The only issue I had was that it was very difficult to adjust the straps to be tighter on me. The fabric on the straps is so thick that I could barely get it through the metal adjustment piece. Once I did, the fit improved considerably, however, it was still difficult to find a bra to wear with this that didn't show. It's one of those shirts that doesn't really work without a bra, but doesn't really work with one. Once I got that sorted out, it was very cute.
So beautiful, but don't bother is you are over a C cup.
Great fit!
Worked perfectly for the occasion!
I loved this dress- great, soft material, fit well. I wore it multiple times the week I rented it. The straps were a tiny bit long but workable

links_Review_Title: Wore this everyday and was fine and looked good but nothing special
links_Review_Text: Got this for an everyday summer dress - it's fine but a few things that made this just ok for me. was super wrinkly so had to iron that out and then it became wrinkly as I wore it. I'm 5'1 so it's a bit long. The fit is a bit off - I am normally a 4 and I got a 2 and that was the right size but the buttons and fabric just didn't sit right and I felt like it was overall less flattering. Nice thing though is that it is lined which is great for a white dress!

Fit true to size and skimmed my curves just right. Wrinkles easily, but looks professional and polished regardless. Has pockets (major plus!) and hits below the knees, which makes it very work appropriate.

links_Review_Title: Really wanted to love this dress
links_Review_Text: The fit of the dress was spot on. The drawback was the length of the straps, they were about an inch too long. The other drawback is that it is very wrinkly. I'm just not a fan of ironing, so I had to pass on this dress.

links_Review_Title: Cute but wouldn't button around my chest area. Not for big busted girls
links_Review_Text: Super cute dress and length. Mine had been used too much and had a pink hue instead of white. But it would have been cute if it could button in the chest area. Everywhere else fit perfect.

links_Review_Title: Wore to my rehearsal at the venue, lots of compliments!
links_Review_Text: Didn't photograph quite as well as I wanted, but overall a high quality, nice fitting dress!
The dress fit beautifully and loved the POCKETS with the FULL skirt - lots of compliments :)

links_Review_Title: not as cute as I had hoped but lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: The dress didnt fit as well on my petite frame as I had hoped. I think maybe with more up top and a curvier shape I might have filled it out better. That being said I got lots of compliments, it was VERY comfortable, and had pockets! Wouldnt rent again but would recommend for someone bigger than 32b.
I needed safety pins for the chest area, but it still fit great and the length is past my knees. It is a very flattering dress. LOVE.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress for everyday in the summer. Went from brunch to Salsa to Dinner.
links_Review_Text: The dress was perfect, underlining makes it zero see tru and you can feel good in it all day

The fabric is heavy but breathable. I wore this one with a strapless bra. The dress was much longer on me than the model. It's simple and cute. The straps kept falling down though, which was annoying. Otherwise, it fit well.
the straps are too long so they kept falling off my shoulder.

My husband loved this dress, it felt very glamorous and refined. I'm a 12 or 14 in Kate Spade and I was able to wear the 12 (the straps would have been too long in the 14) but it definitely was a skimming not loose fit. I had to steam it before wearing, the fabric is a wrinkle hazard. It's supposed to be that way, but some people may find it too casual a dressy event.
Cute and nursing friendly
I wanted to wear this to work, but this was see through... I had to return. It fit a bit big.
Love this dress but more conservative than advertised :)

links_Review_Title: The dress is not as pictured
links_Review_Text: The dress is not as pictured and described. There is no cut out in the back. The back is solid, with a zipper all the way, and the hook and eye at the top of the zipper. That makes the dress pretty boring from the back. The front is fine, the fabric is thin and flowing nicely at the skirt part. Wish it was exactly as on the model in the picture, the cut out back would've been in sync with the overall style of the dress and gave it the captivating factor that attracted me to the dress in the pic.

links_Review_Title: Great fabric, neckline was too deep
links_Review_Text: Lovely, light fabric. Neckline was so deep, that a pin and double sided sticky tape didn't work. Not Disney appropriate :) and certainly not work appropriate.

links_Review_Title: Dress up or down - it's so cute!
links_Review_Text: I loved this shirt. Didn't want to send it back. Wore for a concert with jeans and also with navy pants for work. It's a bit low cut but if you have a small chest it's still super modest. Loved and wanted to buy it! Will definitely rent again.
The fit is kinda boxy but the sash helps give some shape

I got creative with the green accent tie. I'm busty, and the waist isn't quite long enough to be flattering on my figure. I wore the scarf crossed and then draped at the neckline. With the puffed sleeves and the shape of the blouse, now it evokes a French artist's smock. Ooo la la

links_Review_Title: Cute but always adjusting the ties
links_Review_Text: I loved the look of this shirt and felt it looked exactly like it did online. I felt that I was constantly adjusting the ties and felt it was awkward to tie and that they didn't stay in the right spot throughout the day. I did like the shirt enough to wear it twice!

links_Review_Title: RTR Customer Service Made it Right!
links_Review_Text: I was reasonably frustrated when I opened by new RTR shipment bag only to discover this top was missing a key piece - the cute green belt. I sent an email and the next business day, I received a response from RTR Customer Service. They apologized for the mistake (someone must have returned this w/out the belt) and they immediately opened up a spot for me plus gave me a bonus spot. I'm over the shipping error since I was taken care of, thanks RTR.
I wasn't wowed by this top, it was tough to keep it looking nice throughout the day. It was also short and arrived very wrinkled.
I rented this for work and it was perfect. Loose fit but the belt cinched everything together. So breezy and comfortable-- and so many compliments!!
This top is fantastic it's lightweight, easy to wear doesn't wrinkle through out the day. The sleeves were a little snug but not enough to stop me from wearing this 6x
I do wish the green belt was a little thicker like in the photo but overall love the look. I did have to use tape to keep the top flaps from falling over. Definitely recommend!
The arms should be bigger but they bunch over my elbow. I had to steam and starch the ties so they tie better.

Great Spring top. The vibrant green belt looks beautiful on the blue and white striped shirt. My only negative comment is that the top button kept coming undone I finally realized this after many males were "looking down" instead of my face when talking - I was mortified! Lol!

This shirt looks so cute on the hanger, but I just don't think it's a good choice for those with larger chests. There are two good-sized holes where the ribbon/belt comes out, and the top kept riding up so that those holes were flat against the underside of my bra cup. It felt sloppy on, which is too bad—I love the colors and pattern.
Loved the look of this more than I thought I would! Very different! Wouldnt buy something like this so RTR wins again with something different that I loved!

Rented this for a masters party when I was given a bonus choice when another piece was not available. Super comfy, I don't like short waisted things and worked well on me. I wore with white pants. The one thing that bothered me was that the buttons don't go up high and when I received the piece one side was folded the wrong way and even after ironing it didn't lay the way I wanted. Also the tie is more of a silky scarf like belt so didn't have much shape but looked super cute. I really liked the piece and friends gave compliments.

links_Review_Title: Cute spring shirt, great for work!
links_Review_Text: This shirt made me look slimmer, which was great! I think I didn't tie it properly but I still really liked the fit. The material was really nice!

I love, love, love this top! My only complaints are that the belt seems a bit short for the size, almost as if they used a belt from a smaller version of the same top. And the beautiful, cone shaped self covered buttons were tricky to fasten. The buttons are hidden behind a hidden button placket, so it seems odd that they are self covered... still, I highly recommend this top!

The patterns between the shirt and belt are really great. I had to pin the neckline a bit as it was a little too wide for me. The arm bands were also a little slim, but are elastic so it worked fine, just left a bit of a mark on my arm. Really loved this for weekend-wear!
This is such a cute and unique top! Fits true to size and pairs well with white pants.

I loved this statement work top and based on the constant barrage of compliments, everyone else did too! The fabric is much higher quality than it looks and wrinkle-free. The fit is perfect - I'm glad I sized a bit so it would fit around my arms, but it was pretty roomy everywhere else.
This was a great top thay could be dressed up or down easily. I would rent again
I sized up since I am tall and wanted to make sure top was long enough. I am normally a 6 and went for the 8. Could have worn 6 probably. Great for everyday! Flattering.
Cute details on this shirt but it absolutely runs large and has a lot of extra material. Be wary if you have a bigger chest it comes across as maternity wear
I don't have a good pic. It was cute. Wore with white jeans. I'm tall (5'9") so it was a little shirtwaisted but still cute

I love anything by Tanya Taylor and this top was no exception. Really fun nautical stripe with a puffy sleeve and great green sash. Wore this to work and then an outdoor birthday party. Would rent again!

I loved this top. I love almost everything Tanya Taylor. This fit a little big. It was okay but I think I would prefer one size smaller. I almost always wear a 12 in Tanya Taylor but probably should've worn a 10 in this. Still loved it and got compliments all day.

With a floral-print tie you can wrap around and around the waist, this striped Tanya Taylor top knows how to make a statement. Worn with the Colorblock Ace Jeans by Joie, the color contrast of the two pieces completed my fashion vision. I rented the 2 but wish I rented the 4 due to having a larger bust. I felt the holes for the ribbon often fell in an odd place on my body. Would recommend this top for desk-to-dinner or any datenight.

links_Review_Title: So flattering for an hourglass shape
links_Review_Text: I wore this on Easter. The green color is so beautiful and unique. The wrap around is so flattering. Perfect for spring. Would order again

links_Review_Title: Pretty blouse with longggggggggg waist sash
links_Review_Text: This was a nice blouse for the most part. It is very wrinkly though. I ironed it prior to wearing and it was wrinkled within an hour. Also I was surprised by how long the waist ties are. I'm not kidding, they're very long and awkward until you wrap around your waist several times. The buttons came undone several times when I wore to work, causing slight embarrassment for me. Lol
The elastic was gone in one of the sleeves. I was not able to wear. I also returned this piece.
So freaking cute - wore it with jeans and green pumps and got so many compliments!
Makes me look a bit wide but I don't care. Cute !

links_Review_Title: Cute in photos but top is cropped or short; didn't work for my body type; tall and slender
links_Review_Text: The loop holes for the green sash were too high and came across chest. If you are tall, I would take a pass on this. Runs large.
I really liked this blouse - the green ties make what could be a ho-hum dress shirt into something fun and different. First time I have worn this brand, but I'm renting another next month!
liked the bow detail
I wanted to love love love this, but the tendency for the waist tie to migrate up and become an under-boob empire waist tie had me tugging on this shirt all day, keeping me from truly loving it.

links_Review_Title: Really cute! Just not on me
links_Review_Text: I really wanted to love it but this top just ended up being too high maintenance for me; the 18 fit me well and it's what I usually wear, but the buttons wouldn't stay closed, the sleeves were too tight on my arms to where the elastic was uncomfortable and the neck opening seemed too big/floppy. Also you must wear a shirt underneath this for sure, and the whole thing shifted around way too much to not drive me crazy! I could tell from the photos that it was cropped, but it was not a flattering length for me-- and the movement of the piece meant it rode up even further to make the neck even more floppy.... kind of a nightmare, but maybe just not meant for a curvy hourglass shape.

links_Review_Title: Cuter in the photo than on me.
links_Review_Text: This just didn't flatter my apple-shaped body. It looked cheap in person and the tie sash was thinner in width than it looks in the photo online. Also, it didn't really stay put as I moved throughout the day, so I found myself readjusting it constantly and still feeling a little uncomfortable.

links_Review_Title: Super cute for a casual Friday
links_Review_Text: Would definitely recommend. Fits as stated. Cute with white jeans.
Loved the look, very cute
I wore this dress at a fancy high tea at Burj Al Arab hotel in Dubai and it didn't disappoint. Love how this dress flows and it fit me perfectly.

links_Review_Title: I could not stop twirling in this dress.
links_Review_Text: This dress was beautiful! I loved the bright yellow color. I wore it for a summer wedding and it was lovely. I felt like a princess and had a lot of fun dancing in it. It fit pretty comfortably too. It definitely runs more true to size. I would rent this one again.

Wore this in Tulum as a nice dinner dress and received a ton of compliments! The dress flows beautifully and the colour is stunning. The only minor flaw is a small section below the chest that bunches. I didn't try to fix it with an iron but for photos I just adjusted down and it was not a problem.

Dress fit perfect! I received so many compliments. The best being from my daughter who thought I was Belle! The only complaint I have is the dress had a lot more layers than I thought it would, making it less than ideal for a humid summer wedding.
This dress is gorgeous! I love the flowy skirt, but the straps were way too long for my short torso. I had to pair with a sun colored sweater to make it work, but def channeled my Stevie Nicks vibe!

Rented this for a trip to Savannah and it moves so beautifully. I want to rent it again and again, wish it came in other colors so I could post more on IG! I have more RTR on my feed if you like my style! @ashgidget
wore this to a wedding and couldn't be happier. I am typically a 2/4 and the 4 fit perfect around the chest area for me. It is comfortable and you can dance all night. loved it!
This dress was so fun to wear. Fit true to size and fit my 5ft 3 stature. It was flow-y and fun! I got so many compliments on it! I should have bought it. :)

links_Review_Title: The perfect outside summer wedding dress
links_Review_Text: This was a replacement for a dress that didn't. I am so glad that I ended up getting this one. It fits very snug in the chest. I ended up wearing a little self stick bra for more stability since the straps were a little too long for me, just a half inch or so. I loved the soft material and breezy feel of it. It ended up to be the perfect dress for the outside wedding. It also moved perfectly on the dance floor and had the prefect length for my height.
This dress was possibly one of my favorite rentals it was Floweli comfortable and I love the slits on the side it fits very true to size. No need to wear a bra

links_Review_Title: I felt like a princess! I felt confident and beautiful in this dress. The color was stunning!
links_Review_Text: The dress fit perfectly to my torso, it did become a bit snug after a few drinks and dinner. The straps were not adjustable which was a con because they would slip while dancing. Lastly the length of the dress was just right with my 2in heels - when I had them off it was a bit long. The material was comfortable and lightweight. Great for a summer wedding. Overall, I would recommend this beautiful dress!
Dress was beautiful. Flowy, light material perfect for summer. Lots of compliments: Favorite being "you look like Belle!"

Loved the dress overall and got so many compliments but as others mentioned if you're busty size up and be ready for a good amount of cleav! I never wear yellow as a blonde out of fear but loved this one and the cutouts - it's got Grown up Belle vibes

This dress was awesome. The pleats were so pretty and I got so many compliments and even the wedding planner came over to tell me she loved it. I never thought I could pull off yellow but this dress changed my mind.

Rented this for a coastal wedding in Massachusetts. Was the perfect blend of elegant but fun with the color and ruffle detailing. I received so many compliments and weeks later people are still commenting on how much they loved it! Rent!!
Wore for a 40th bday. Comfortable all Night and could dance and hang in it! Only annoying thing is that the shoulder straps are not adjustable and seemed too long.

links_Review_Title: Beyonce "Hold Up" meets Beauty and the Beast
links_Review_Text: This dress fits true to size and is comfortable. I wore it to a summer formal wedding. It is lined.
This dress was so much fun! It runs small, normally I am 6-8 but I wore a 10 R. The 8 fit as well but bunched a little bit in the front so the 10 was a better smoother fit. Highly recommend!

I'm usually a size 0 but had a baby 5 weeks ago so I went up a size to 2R. I'm 5'2 & 122 pounds. The length of the dress is perfect for not too high of a heel unlike most maxi dresses for petite women. Love the bright color and how it moves. Felt like Belle in it!
Get a size up a little loose. But it's still a very cute and fun dress.

links_Review_Title: Dreamy dress that makes you feel like Belle!
links_Review_Text: Rented this for a summer black tie wedding and got endless compliments. So comfy, great for dancing and great for short women! Only sizing note is that the chest area runs a little big, so if you're between sizes, i would size down. The color and details are just gorgeous, and it doesn't wrinkle!
This dress fit me perfectly and was so fun for a wedding! The movement of the fabric was perfect while dancing, the color is so bright, it was PERFECT! I love this dress!!
Loved the flow. It was a fun whimsical dress, only downside was the bust. The padding was permanently wrinkled which made it look at but cheap at the top.
Never ending compliments on this dress! Wore to a beach wedding in turkey. Was so perfect. Didn't wrinkle in packing. Fun to dance in. Adore.

This is a really beautiful dress with gorgeous material and an unbelievable color. Talk about grown-up Belle! It ran quite a bit smaller than a normal size 10 dress would on me, and I have a feeling that this would look much better on a taller, slender frame. No hate, just not ideal for my body type.
so I got a 2 and a 4 and forget which one fit honestly BUT it was amazing and I got so many compliments!!!! Loved this for some reason about me isnt updating but I am 5'6 133lbs!

I wore this dress to a black tie optional wedding in South Florida and it was a hit! The color and style is super fun and unique, especially with the side cutouts. I wore the 4R and it was just right for my frame (normal size 4, 5'0"). I rented the 6R as well because I thought it might run small but the 4R was actually perfect for me. It's not floor-length on anyone taller than 5'3" I think, but for me it was just right with 4" heels. It was very comfortable all night, and I would recommend to anyone wanting something a little more fun for an event!

links_Review_Title: It was the last of my husband’s brothers’ weddings. It was nonstop dancing from beginning to end!
links_Review_Text: I received endless compliments on this dress - the color, the fit, the style. I felt like a princess in it, and it was super comfortable. It was so much fun to dance in, too, because I could whip it back and forth!

links_Review_Title: So comfortable and such a fun dress for a spring/summer wedding! You will love this dress.
links_Review_Text: Fits true to size.
Fit like a dream, no bra needed which was a huge plus (I'm a 32D) and the length was perfect in a reasonable heel (I'm 5'2").

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress - great for dancing and bound to turn heads.
links_Review_Text: The straps were a bit too long and bust area was a bit too big. I typically wear a 0/XS but this one just ran large for me...

links_Review_Title: Tight in the chest. Didn't wear it
links_Review_Text: Beautiful material. The color is gorgeous. Just tight in the bust

links_Review_Title: Love this dress! Lots of compliments on the color.
links_Review_Text: Perfect for a summer wedding!

links_Review_Title: got so many compliments at a work gala
links_Review_Text: Loved it! was probably between the 0 and the 2, but went with the 0
This dress is very well made. It is a little dressier than I imagined, but I loved it.

links_Review_Title: Sexy jacket with great peplum accent
links_Review_Text: Really pumped up plain black work pants. Great jacket. Had to steam neckline to stay down, but overall a great jacket.

Reading other reviews, I sized up. I'm normally a 6 or an 8 to accommodate my bust, but this blazer at size ten still would not stay buttoned. Even so, it's a cute blazer and will elevate your look for work or for going out.

links_Review_Title: Fit and flare and pleats and stripe, oh my! --But in a good way (not TOO much going on)
links_Review_Text: I wore this blazer to work and loved it! I'm normally between a 2 and 4, and sized down to the European 2 (size 6 in this brand). The button was pretty tight, and I honestly would have popped the button off if I kept it buttoned all day, so I had to button at strategic moments, haha! Great find. I'd definitely rent it again.
x
Fit great on size 10. Im usually 6 to 8. 5'6" 164 lbrs.

links_Review_Title: The fit and flare waist were awesome
links_Review_Text: Cut, for and style were great

Rented for a cocktail attire wedding. Paired it with a black jumpsuit and necklace from RTR and the combination was stunning. The jacket gives one a great waistline. It was just right for tightness with its single button (am a size 10), little long in the sleeves, no issues with chest or length. At 5'4" a taller individual might find it too short at the waist. The stripes were not as gold as the photo but really overall a unique piece.
Perfect to wear over jeans or dress up.

links_Review_Title: Love, love, love! Rented for a fundraiser and this dress is a showstopper.
links_Review_Text: Everything about this dress is great!

Love the fit, pattern, color. Perfect dress for vacation- you can dress it up or down. I wore it casual but my sister wore it on NYE. Definitely recommend, next time I would get the 4 instead of the 6!
Straps were long but the high slit made it worth it. Follow me at @nicheindustriesstyle for my RTR style

links_Review_Title: Got me a private tour of a baseball stadium ..
links_Review_Text: Rented this for sightseeing while traveling. It got me a private stadium tour and impromptu lunch date so you can definitely check off the pretty box on this one. Comfy, fitted but not restrictive. Looked good with flat gladiator sandals but could easily be dressed up with heels. Ig@veganroyalty for more rtr styles
I wore this for our engagement party and loved it! The straps were long and you will want to steam it out, but it’s adorable!

links_Review_Title: So comfortable I ended up falling asleep in it
links_Review_Text: Fits is nice, but like others have mentioned the straps would be much better if they were adjustable. Dress definitely needs a bra which sucked for me because I didn't bring one that would work for this dress on my trip so I ended up using tape. I would suggest a bra over tape though lol. I think I regret choosing this for a family event. The slit isn't too too high but when sitting I definitely had to pay attention to keep the dress closed, plus having to fuss with the straps constantly.
I'm pretty thin and this didn't do much for my figure but I'll wear anything that polka dot!

As others said, the straps are too long, but it was as lovely as could be! Much better than in the website pictures. Polka dots do not overwhelm because the quality of the fabric and attention to finishes make it so sophisticated. Wore it to my son's rehearsal dinner and it was a big hit!
Straps are a little long but look ok They aren't adjustable Tons of compliments very summer prettty

Fit was true to size and a great fun print to wear to my friends wedding reception! I'm bad with white because I am messy but I was able to keep this clean and stay comfortable all night! Great fit and cut and I felt amazing in it!

links_Review_Title: Fun dress for fun family function!
links_Review_Text: First RTR experience was a success! This dress fit like a glove and camouflaged problem areas!

links_Review_Title: This dress was so comfortable and cute! I got a ton of compliments, It was great to dance in.
links_Review_Text: Fits well but definitely need white or nude undergarments.

I loved wearing this dress. I'm a large chested gal so I sized up a size but, didn't need to. The dress was loose in the chest (although you can't tell in the pics) but, that was my fault! I ended up keeping the dress for a month because I wanted to wear it over and over again! I'm only returning so that I can re-order and buy in the correct size!
Wore this for my boyfriends birthday the night he proposed! Loved it. Wore with black heels and leather jacket

links_Review_Title: I kept getting compliments all night!!! It made me feel so beautiful and sexy!
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect! The only issue I had were that the straps kept falling off. It seemed like it was made for taller women. I just tied safety pins with my bra and it was perfect.
I rented this cute dress for an outdoor wedding. Fit great. Received complements. Make sure you have a steamer to get the packing wrinkles out after it arrives.
Loved the dress, fit nicely and got a lot of compliments.
I received so many compliments on this dress! It fit like a glove, super comfortable, and classy.
A beautiful and unique dress - wearable with black slide on sandals or dressier with heels. The dress is more versatile than I expected!

links_Review_Title: Perfect fit for a city wedding.
links_Review_Text: The dress fit perfectly, not too tight and well fit for my body type. The material was light and the bust area fit me perfectly. I received endless compliments on this dress. I loved the fact that it was different, fun and still elegant enough for this event. Overall loveeed this dress!

links_Review_Title: This dress was EVERYTHING. I received so many compliments. It complemented my athletic build.
links_Review_Text: This fits true to size. Hits at true waist. Split at bottom of dress is appropriate for a formal affair

Loved this dress, the pattern, the fit, it was all very old school glam feeling. I gave it four stars because the straps were too long and not adjustable. I had to tie them together in order to wear the dress.

links_Review_Title: Very comfortable, would recommend going down a size.
links_Review_Text: I wore the dress for my bridal shower and it was definitely a hit. The Straps were a little long, other than that the dress was perfect.

Rented this for a movie premiere. It was a good overall fit and I got a ton of compliments. Unfortunately the spaghetti straps kept slipping off over and over all night. I'm not sure if they would have fit better on someone with a bigger bust or if someone stretched it out from previous wears. But it was super annoying to keep fixing all evening. I should have pinned them down to make them shorter but oh well live and learn! If I had owned the dress I would have altered it immediately that's how large the straps were compared to the great fit of the rest of the dress.

Starts we're a little long for me just since I'm petite, and they are not adjustable. But still wearable! Great fabric and fit. Not great for a windy day or a lot of walking unless you're willing to hold the dress in the front. I really enjoyed this dress, the way it draped kind of reminded me of an upscale version of the little mermaid's cloth and rope dress x-D
The dress is stunning, I had to safety pin a lot bc I am 5foot but overall it was lovely & very elegant..

I absolutely loved this dress. I wore it for a spring wedding and got so many compliments. It was different and didn't upstage the bride. It was very comfortable too. My only complaint was that it was a tiny bit big. I probably could've worn the 0 but the 2 didn't look huge. It wrinkles kinda easily so if you're going to be sitting a lot and are worried about wrinkles on the back, maybe not the best option.

links_Review_Title: I wish I got the next size up
links_Review_Text: If you have a belly, order the next size up!
figure flattering, comfortable, and forgivingly designed. loved this dress!
Felt very beautiful in this. Great for summer

I rented this as my backup and wasn't impressed. The fabric is really thin and flimsy and doesn't compliment your body well. So the dress kinda just hangs. It's also more casual looking than in a lot of the photos....I didn't end up wearing this but luckily loved my main RTR rental!
Had a weird fabric situation at the bottom, looked weird. Didn't wear it.

This dress draps beautifully. I'm 5' 4" and it was nearly floor length on me. The straps were too long on my petite torso so I had to pin them back to keep them from falling off my shoulders. The dress fit fine in the hips and waist but was big in the chest so I ended up putting in some pads to fill it out. But it was simple elegance, very comfortable and looked lovely!

links_Review_Title: Rented this for my bridal shower
links_Review_Text: I am 5'8" and 140 lbs, I don't have a large chest, so we had to improvise, as the straps were a little big as well as the chest. I got the 4R, and everything else fit perfectly. Would have fit great if I had a bigger chest.

links_Review_Title: Unfortunately, the dress was too large and I couldn't wear it.
links_Review_Text: Order a size down. I normally wear a 6 and it was extremely loose.
The straps were too loose for me, and kept falling down, so I didn't end up wearing this to the wedding I was going to. The rest of it fit nicely, and it was cute!
This dress is cut in a way that is forgiving and flattering. I love it. It's a bit sheer. But soo cute on.

links_Review_Title: The skirt just hung so weird I couldn't wear it
links_Review_Text: Weird skirt and didn't suit my waist

links_Review_Title: just stunning - had a hard time sending this back! the fit and silhouette are gorgeous.
links_Review_Text: the bust runs on the smaller side and the hips are very generous!
Flattering design and trendy print. Straps were a little long. Arrived very wrinkly.
This is one of my favorite Black Halo rentals! Beautiful floral details and the pockets were great for work!

I wore this dress to work, but it could easily be worn to a semi-formal affair. All day long people were stopping me to complement the dress, even people I didn't know! I am usually between an 8-10, as sometimes things don't fit my hips. But this dress fit perfect! At first it seemed a little tight around the arms/chest and I thought I wouldn't have full range of motion. However, it didn't bother me at all. I was even able to reach all around to straighten my hair wearing it. Something that may not be noticeable in pictures: It looks black with green leaves and pink flowers. However the dress is actually a DARK GREEN, with green leaves, and pink flowers. This was something I really liked about it, but if you are looking for a black dress, this is not the one.
Loved this dress. The 0 fit perfectly. Length was ideal on a petite frame. The fit and flare cut made me waist look smaller. A good basic dress.
Pictures don't do it justice but this dress is super flattering and such a beautiful print. And yay for pockets! Wore it to my work holiday party. Love it!!
Very pretty dress, fairly light material but not too thin, lined. A little big around my smaller chest but otherwise fit well overall. Hit just above knee on me

links_Review_Title: Love the color and the flare of the skirt, perfectly classy and very cute!
links_Review_Text: Good to dress up and has pockets!!

links_Review_Title: Not as flattering as other a line dresses I've worn.

links_Review_Text: Loved this. The forest green background is really different and makes this more fun than a standard print dress. Got so many compliments and felt very comfortable. Plus the cut is flattering in the waistline. Loved this dress and would rent again. It was perfect for a professional cocktail party for work.

I never wore this because it was too large on me. I'm typically a 6 and I'm a 34 D, but the area around my bust was too baggy so I looked frumpy. I like the thin material and pattern but sadly had to return it without wearing it.
I wore this to a work party and everyone loved it. Pockets are great. Very flattering. I sized up to an 8 and it was a perfect fit.

I wanted to try the fit of Black Halo's dresses so I ordered this dress even though I was hesitant about the prints. It looks better in person and the quality of the material is extremely good. It's very fit at the waist. I have a narrow waist so the fit was perfect. I would definitely recommend.

links_Review_Title: The dress was perfect...sparkly and easy to wear!
links_Review_Text: This was the perfect "I'm turning 60" dance party dress! I received so many compliments and it was super easy to wear....roomy and not too short for the dancing! The neckline is super flattering and it had just the right amount of sparkle and the velvet material was light! This was an A plus dress!

links_Review_Title: Perfect flirty but conservative enough dress for teen.
links_Review_Text: So cute! my daughter wore this dress, not me so she is 5'4", 140lbs, usual size 6/8 and 34b. She had the best time and felt so cute in this dress. Very 70's feeling.

links_Review_Title: Different look for a winter wedding
links_Review_Text: Loved the bow tie in the back. Shinier material than I expected and be aware of the elastic at the waist - size up if you want to hide it by having the top part hang over it. Fun dress!
Love the silk sash around the neck that tied in back

links_Review_Title: Love this dress - so many compliments on the color!

links_Review_Text: This fit terrible and was not right for my body type. If I had a long torso it might look okay. A drop waist isn't for everyone

links_Review_Title: I rented this dress for a sorority formal and it was amazing!
links_Review_Text: The fit runs true to size! It is a little looser on the top but was not an issue at all for me. The waist is fun to fold over or to wear straight, either way it looks great!

I didn't end up wearing this dress after trying it on. The velvet fabric and cut made it really bulky and unflattering around the waist - it made me look rounder and shorter. Perhaps it's better suited for someone taller with a longer torso.

links_Review_Title: This dress was so festive for Christmas and I loved the color but size medium was too big
links_Review_Text: Loved the color and style but was not very flattering on me- I think I needed to go down a size (to small from medium)
I was not expecting the sparkle. I liked the neckline. Dress was perfect for a chilly wedding event.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but not for short girls
links_Review_Text: Beautiful material. I got so many compliments. Being 5'1 the way the dress's waist elastic hit me made the top of the dress too long and baggy/bunched. If I were taller I would have given 5 stars.

links_Review_Title: Its very cute and sparkly. I got a lot of compliments.
links_Review_Text: super comfortable and hides the problem areas.
It was very christmas-y.
The dress was so flattering on me. I am 6 months pregnant but no one believed me I was expecting. The material is so comfortable. I got a lot of compliments on this dress. Will surely rent it again.

links_Review_Title: Fun and different look for work or play
links_Review_Text: 1st the butterflies are brighter and more metallic than I thought - which was a pleasant surprise for me. I wore this for an important presentation and it was such a fun and different way to stand out in a work environment. It needed the belt to break it up for me and the top was a tad baggy but I still loved it and got tons of compliments. I also wore a cami under as the top is sheer - which could make it fun and flirty in a non work environment
Great fit, very flowy, would be good for a fancier event too. Got lots of compliments, including from my male boss.

Poofier than I expected but received numerous compliments when I wore. I was disappointed that the collar tie was not as shown like picture on website. Website dress is more like a scarf tie. Actual dress ties are strings. Dress overall is different and fun! Had to give it another chance after initial try on to get use to it.

Wore this to my boyfriend's office holiday party and loved it! The top is sheer in the back, so I wore a black tank top underneath to make it more appropriate for a corporate event. The fabric has beautiful sparkly butterflies, so combined with the tiered fabric, it's a perfect dress when you have to dress conservatively but still want to look fun!
The pattern is much more prominent in real life but I loved it! The top is very sheer so wear a bralette or a body suit underneath and you are good to go!
this dress is really pretty, fun and comfortable. only annoyingness is the strings/ties at wrists. other than that - loved.
Wore this to an art museum event and felt very elegant and conservative. I wore with a black racer back tank underneath since it's sheer. Very comfortable and breathable.

Great dress! Nice and flowy but ITCHY on the neck where the strings are or any place where the butterflies were. Sheer so wear something under but it had the right amount of sexy! The drawstrings on the sleeves were definitely not necessary and a nuisance to keep tying.

This dress was comfortable, easy to wear and very flattering. The top half is pretty sheer- so for work, a tank top was definitely necessary! I got a ton of compliments and I definitely plan on wearing this again to an event. Flirty, girly with a little bit of a grunge feel.

This dress is very forgiving if your self-conscience about your stomach area. It hit and fell in all the right places. Also very comfortable and full coverage (arms covered)! Received a lot of compliments.
Amazing dress!!! Fun, comfortable, easy to wear. Wore it to a garden party and dinner. Felt confident and cool all night.
This dress was PERFECT! The fit, weight, look--everything!
Great fit, just a little itchy at arms! But love it!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful...Pictures Do Not Do It Justice!!
links_Review_Text: I got so many compliments on the dress! I wore this dress to MC an event on Friday, and it was so comfortable and fashionable. I just had a baby 3 months ago, so this dress made me feel super sexy without trying too hard. The sheerness and elasticity were perfect for my body type. This dress was EVERYTHING!
Agree not the softest, but it is so pretty! Wore to a conservative cocktail party with a tank like black sports bra. Lots of compliments. Rented a 2nd time!

No cons! Only pros! This is the most beautiful and classy chic dress. Sexy with the sheer back but still classy and cute! Very good elastic waist and super comfortable. The hand bag set it off in an amazing way!

Gorgeous fabric but a bit too much going on to wear to the office and I didn't have an appropriate event coming up so returned unworn. The skirt has three tiers. Would be more slimming/flattering if it didn't have the top tier which adds bulk. I didn't find the fabric too scratchy. As another reviewer noted it doesn't have one big neck tie as pictured on RTR, it has two lots of narrow strings that tie. Top portion is less sheer than RTR pic.

Wore it for a night out with dinner and bar hopping in Italy. Love the combo of the flashy, shiny print plus the conservative length. Layers make it feel so fun when you walk. Just a few things to watch out for: the top section was a bit baggy for me so I tied all 4 strings together really tightly to make a little knot of fabric at the top, the material can be a bit itchy though it didn't bother me too much, front is lined (unlike model pic) but back is not.
Wore this dress to the Andy Warhol Museum and blended right in with the art. Absolutely stunning.
I wore this to a western-themed party, so I added boots and a belt with a big buckle. Such a great dress!
The dress didn't look so great on the rack. But it looks amazing once you try it on. I got a lot of compliments.
I wore this to dinner and music concert in SF...perfectly festive. Comfortable, TTS. I styled it with a black Moto jacket...lots of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Itchy and made me look like I gained 30 lbs
links_Review_Text: Total disappointment. The cut is the opposite of figure flattering. So itchy I couldn't wear it.

The metallic thread in this dress was incredibly uncomfortable to me. Itchy and scratchy to the point I only kept it on maybe 6 minutes. The fit was also not the most flattering, especially for with tights for winter. Probably better in summer if the feel doesn't bother you.

I wore it to an art museum function and it got a lot of compliments--something different without being over the top. It ran big on me, and the elastic on the waist wasn't tight enough. I wore it with a thick black belt, which worked well functionally and aesthetically. Underneath, I wore a lacy bodysuit/teddy under it since the top is just slightly sheer. Both worked well since they just looked like part of the dress. I also had to overtie the top of the dress to get more of a crew neck (otherwise it was boatneck-ish).

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress to Studio 54 exhibit opening at Brooklyn Museum. Considered buying bc it's so cute
links_Review_Text: The only thing I wish this dress has was a belt. But that's an easy fix. Otherwise it was a great party dress. Lots of shimmer from the butterflies. I really love this dress!

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments! Loved the dress!
links_Review_Text: It was a very flattering dress Fell nicely, I wore it to a black tie event and loved the glittery butterflies. Just felt good wearing it!

links_Review_Title: Just the best for packing. Comfortable. Metallic so pretty
links_Review_Text: Got so many compliments. Sooo nice. Loved it
This dress to me was not as itchy as others described. I had no issue wearing it all day. It flows so nicely! I could have went down a size. Got lots of compliments on the butterflies!

I wore this dress to Christmas dinner and got a ton of compliments. Its really pretty and feminine. I had initially ordered this months ago for work, but it was a bit too much for everyday wear. Its sparkly, sheer and flouncy - so perfect for a party or festive occasion. It runs a little large, but worked anyway.

links_Review_Title: some many compliments on the dress! would definitely wear it again!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress with an awesome butterfly print and the shape/cut of the dress is great for curvy women
Beautiful dress! The butterflies are a nice touch but not overbearing. Top is sheer so I wore a black bodysuit underneath.
Lots of compliments!

I love the fit and style, but didn't realize those were butterflies on the fabric. I got it for a holiday party, and it wasn't quite appropriate for the event. I would wear to something else! Fit true to size, flattering, and fun to wear if I were going to wear it.

if only this dress wasnt so expensive, i would've bought in a heartbeat -- i loved every bit of it. the flowy ruffles, the tie ribbons at neck and cuffs, the length of the skirt, the fit of the top. WANT. IT.
Great fit. Past the knees. But so flowy and sheer you never feel frumpy
One of my favorite dresses ever! Fit great, felt glamorous!
I ordered the dress I my usual size and it was too big. I could have easily sized down 1-2 sizes.
I adored this print and the dress fit - but the elastic waist was not flattering and overall had a matronly effect so I didn't end up wearing to my event.

links_Review_Title: Stunning Dress in a Stunning Color
links_Review_Text: I absolutely looovvvveeedddd this dress, and I got so many compliments on it! It works well for those who aren't the most endowed in the chest lol. Only things I would say to be careful of are the length (it was still long in the back, even with my heels) and lighter/medium material in the chest area - you might need nipple covers if you're the "headlights" type. But I would still rent this again - it was gorgeous, and it was perfect.

Great color, material & cut. It fit well but the straps were a little long and I had to tie them together in the back, but wasn't a big deal because I wore my hair down. Would definitely rent this one again!

This dress was fitted, but I like that! I am a slightly curvy girl and I think it looked great! I'm usually not a fan of assemtrical skirts, but the fun flow of this one was perfect. The straps are long though, I had to pin them up and still had to be mindful of the girls spilling out (and my boobs are not large).

I could have worn either size. I went with the 4 and didn't wear a bra with it. It was the perfect length and fit well all over. If I was going to wear a bra though, I would have needed to size up to the 6 and it wouldn't have fit as perfectly through my stomach. Didn't have any issues with the straps being too long.

I really enjoyed this dress, the flow on it was super fun. Received a lot of compliments. The straps were a tad longer than I would've liked. I had to constantly fix them. Was a little more boob than I typically feel comfortable showing. Wore a strapless, so, that was fine. I wore spanx too just to manage lines. Fabric is thin, but, comfortable. I'd recommend this dress.
Wore this for a gala and really loved it. I'm a 32b bust though and didn't fill out the top well. Had to keep adjusting the top throughout the night.

Loved the style and color of this dress, fit like a glove but not uncomfortable. Only two cons were the built in slip kept bunching up and the straps were long on me so was pulling dress up most of the evening. I am 5’7, 145lb the 6 fit great and 8 was too large.
This dress is long in the back. If I didn't have 3" heels it would have dragged on the ground. I wore a nubra which did help the top stay in place but some fashion tap would also help.

links_Review_Title: Great dress that made me look and feel great!
links_Review_Text: I wore the 0R. I’m 5”4 and 112 lbs. The dress was a tad bit too long with the small heels that I wore. I could have worn a taller heel making the dress fit fine but I wanted to be really confortable. I got many compliments!

links_Review_Title: I was complimented on the dress and it was perfect for the atmosphere.
Loved it! The dress was perfect for the even I went to.
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! I wore it to the Barrister's Ball for my fiancé's law school. The length of the dress and color were perfect. I was between wearing the 8R or my backup 10R. I chose the 8 because the top of the 10 had extra fabric and the straps were loose on me and sliding. The 8 was a little tighter in some places than I'd normally like, but still fit well. The straps on the 10 also were a bit frayed while the 8 looked brand new. I felt like this was very true to size as I am often between an 8 &10.

I was celebrating a Christmas party for the first time at my job and I wanted to make sure it was extra special. My fiancé and I mad sure to keep it classy with a nice green and make sure the red popped out in my makeup. I'm usually wearing jeans and a top at work and have never dressed up like this. Needless to say, EVERYONE couldn't stop complementing me! I felt like the Belle of the ball with my Prince by my side. Thank you Rent The Runway!
Dress would be 5 stars but the straps were like a half-ish inch to long, so I felt like I had to keep adjusting. Overall, great look and beautiful dress.

links_Review_Title: The dress is a beautiful green. I felt very pretty in it. Received compliments .. would rent again.
links_Review_Text: I’m 5 ft. Usually wear a size 10 or 12... closer to 12. I have 38 D breasts so my gurls were pretty exposed. But I’m ok with that. I did have to see the straps about a half inch since I’m petite. The dress wasn’t too long, but I could have done without an extra inch. I just had to be careful since I did have a couple of people step on it. I wore spanx to help with the stomach area but dress felt very comfortable.
Worn for a New Year's Eve party. It fit well overall but is very form fitting. I was able to wear a strapless bra and used tape to keep it from showing.

links_Review_Title: Didn't wear but thought it was lovely!
links_Review_Text: Tried this on as a bridesmaid dress option. Didn't end up wearing but thought it was worth showing. It fit really well, shows some skin without too much. The color is a nice green, not teal.

I really enjoyed wearing this dress (with Spanx) to our holiday Christmas party (terrible lighting for photos). The front of the dress is eye catching, the color is perfection and the back is modest. I had to pull it up a little bit from time to time....But I felt comfortable enough to wear it for about 8 hours that night. The 6 and the 8 felt pretty much the same.....I went for the 8 so that I would be more comfy but the 6 fit snugly too.

links_Review_Title: Black tie Christmas party at the trump international hotel ballroom! Super swanky!
links_Review_Text: I received many compliments for this dress. It was nice and flowy as I was strutting which was a nice touch. The bodice was lined so it hid unsightly bulges. My only complaint was the shoulder straps in my opinion were too long so it caused my breasts to sag a bit. Granted I was wearing a nu bra so I didn’t have much support but I think it would be tough to wear a strapless bra because it is pretty low in the back and deep v-Ed in the front.
Loved the style and fit. Perfect for Christmas season!
Loved this dress for a December wedding. I normally wear a 0 or a 2. The 2 overall fit well, but was a little loose and straps were a little long on me (I'm 5' 3'')

I loved this dress! I usually run between a 6-10 in dresses depending on the cut and I'm glad I sized up in this, it fit perfectly. I wouldn't say it runs large I just think for my shape and the dress being fitted, the larger size worked for my hips. The straps are not adjustable so you may need to pin them to fit but it's worth it. So many complements on this dress!

I WISH I could have worn this dress to my Christmas Party! The body fit true to size, the only issue I had was with the length. I am petite, so the straps not being adjustable and the flowy train did not help my situation. If I was 2 inches taller it would have been amazing! Definitely a bombshell dress.
I loved the color and fit of this dress.
Gorgeous dress for a summer wedding. The color is even prettier and vibrant in person and the ruffles flow so well when you walk.
Great fit and comfortable to dance in.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress for any cocktail/formal event!
links_Review_Text: This was a beautiful dress and it fit perfect. I'm 5'6, 145lbs. with very athletic build. I'm typically a size 6 in dresses and this one ran TTS. The green is much more vibrant in person and a great "black tie" option when you don't want to wear black or navy.
Didn't end up wearing this for my event because I didn't have good shoe options to pair with it. The fit in the waist and bust is great. Very flattering. Wasn't as into the slit in the skirt.

I loved this dress and it was my first choice however the straps are not adjustable and it was much too big in the top for me to be comfortable wearing anywhere. If the straps had been adjustable it would have been perfect. The color is gorgeous and the fit was great everywhere else.
The cut of this dress was perfect hugged all the right places.
fit well but runs small
This was a back up dress that i didn't end up wearing but I really loved the look so will order again. It run slightly small and would definitely wear spanx under to keep it laying flat.
