Should have listed to other reviews about straps being too big. Runs TTS or a little big. Color is beautiful. Cut of the neckline is a bit lackluster. Wore it because my other dress didn't work out but it was too too big for me. Loved the color but probably wouldn't rent this style again.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous color but get ready for cleavage
links_Review_Text: This gown is beautiful. Unfortunately the straps seem too long/oversized for the dress and it makes the top fit loose and low, causing there to be a lot of cleavage. It would not have been possible to wear a bra.
I'm 5'8", but bigger on the bottom than up top, so the bust/straps were a little loose (and they aren't adjustable). Otherwise a great fit and length!

links_Review_Title: Fabulous dress but beware of length
links_Review_Text: Long dress, I am 5'2" and with heels on it still touched the ground. I was unable to wear it for my event. Otherwise very pretty and fit well except length.

links_Review_Title: Fun, festive dress for a December wedding
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress! It’s made very well and the color is a beautiful Christmas green. The only drawback for me was the length...at 5’3” the hemline brushed the floor in the back and had to be lifted in order to dance. I would purchase this dress in a heartbeat!

I didn't end up wearing this dress, which I rented as a backup for a family wedding. It looks so innocent on the hanger, but it was way too sexy to wear in front of a bunch of relatives! The top is very tight all over, and honestly if you eat one noodle it shows, so I suggest spanx. Also, the bottom is flowy and beautiful, but the "tulip" style in the front is pretty short, so it's pretty revealing there too. For the right event this would've been great, but it's deceiving and I wanted people to know!

links_Review_Title: A bit matronly but still a cute top for a cold weather vibe
links_Review_Text: Wore this in Dublin, nice loose shirt for some beer tasting and walking around. Not the most youthful or hip look, though

links_Review_Title: Nice looking but runs really large
links_Review_Text: This top is beautiful but runs really big. I normally wear a small to medium. I rented a small but could have easily gone with an extra small. It is very comfortable and could easily be dressed up for work or dressed down for a night out.
Love this shirt. Beautiful colors! I m normally a size 18 but the XL fit great
Gorgeous blouse for work! Voluminous shape, love the pattern! Fits true to size but on the looser/larger side

links_Review_Title: Great piece for work/fun night out
links_Review_Text: Loose fit and has a long tie in the front. Pretty yellow pattern. Fits true to size if not a bit large (although it is a loose fit/look)
Really loved this one - wore it twice, once with jeans, once with leggings. Very forgiving but flattering fit, feels amazing on and the pattern is beautiful. I got a lot of compliments on this one.

So right now I am an 18 up top and this XL fits which I can't say for all XL's so though I would say it is true to size compared to other XL sizes on RTR it might even be bigger. It fit me perfectly and it worked great with another RTR item. It is beautiful.
Would recommend sizing down, because it does run large. Very comfy and great quality!
Wore this for Thanksgiving and received so many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Loved it! Wore three times and had to return but rented again. Not fitted but still fabulous.

links_Review_Text: I chose this shirt as my backup shirt in case my 1st choice didn't look as great. I LOVED both so much it was hard to decide! I ended up not wearing this one to the even out of personal reasons. I'm very conscious of my back under-arms and it just showed a little too much for me in this one. I would highly recommend renting this shirt! LOVED IT!

links_Review_Title: Haven't worn it yet. Just received.
links_Review_Text: A little snug at the waist and hips but overall a good fit. Can't wait to wear it.
This top is great, but the fit was really weird on me. It was too big on top and too tight around the hips.

links_Review_Title: I loved this top but ended up no wearing it, very flattering
links_Review_Text: I loved this top but ended up no wearing it, very flattering

links_Review_Title: Very flattering top that paired with almost everything in my closet!! I got a lot of complements. It
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit. Flattering cut. I would rent this again!

Wore this top for night out. I normally wear an XS or S in shirts and got this in a 6 as I wanted it to be loose and sort of tunic length over pleather leggings. Worked well for the planned look. The arm holes are not too wide so your bra won't show. Chic and sexy for a night out. Couldn't get a good picture with detail because of it being black but you will like this shirt!
I really loved this top. It was very comfortable, draped nicely, and had with flattering neckline. I wore it with leather leggings for a party. Would rent again!
Absolutely loved this dress! The fit was super flattering and I wore it to work, on a date, and to brunch :)

This dress was perfection. Rented it for a wedding shower tea party. Struck the flawless balance between conservative yet flirty. Others had reviewed how short it would be, but I'm only 5'1", so the length was perfect for me! Others had also reviewed the front buttons revealing a little too much, but there are tiny clear interior snaps! So look for those and you won't have that problem. I will definitely rent this dress again.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, runs super small, and buttons cause the fabric to gape - next time I'll wear a slip
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress, got so many compliments, but runs small and short. I'm 5'6 (with a short torso and long legs though) normally a size 6 and the 10 fit perfectly. My only real complaint is the way the buttons closed (elastic loops rather than button holes in the fabric) they pulled and you could see skin in between on your torso - the skirt had a fabric insert that more or less worked (no underwear peeping through) though a full lining would have been better. Next time I'll wear a slip underneath
Tight in waist like others said which can leave a small gap. I ordered up in size. Fit nicely and was comfortable. Multiple compliments.

links_Review_Title: I went 3 sizes up and it fit perfectly. Lovely lovely dress - infuriatingly sized
links_Review_Text: I usually wear a 10, and when I hear that things run small size up to a 12. After reading the reviews I thought I might try a 14 in this one- but it wasn't available so I took a 16 thinking it would actually probably still look good a bit loose. The 16 fit like a 12. It was a gorgeous dress but makes me horrified for inclusive sizing that is absolutely not inclusive- makes me not like Veronica Beard, I've rented Veronica Beard blazers and they run pretty true to size so really confused about the dress. In short- rent this dress 2 sizes up if you want it properly sized and 3 sizes up if you want it roomy. And if indeed you wear a size bigger than a 12- I am so sorry- this brand thinks you like to feel shamed and fit one leg into their clothing allegedly in your size.
Fit small I didn't wear.

This dress definitely runs small. I wear between a 6-8 and ordered an 8 because that's all that was available. I probably could have used a 10 as the 8 was a little small in my midsection. Also the RTR pics aren't very accurate in my opinion. The waist is very cinched, which i don't think you can really see from RTRs pics. I wanted to wear this to work but the cinching makes it too short for the office so i wore it out instead.

links_Review_Title: Overall loved this dress but a little tight on the midsection
links_Review_Text: I thought this dress was so great but it did feel a bit tight on my midsection. The material is really nice and I received so many compliments! Also, I rented this for a party but wouldn't have felt comfortable in it for work or a more conservative event. I'm 5'10" and it is pretty short.

links_Review_Title: Not for the short waisted. Sizing is odd.
links_Review_Text: Beautiful fabric. Beautiful fabrication. The sizing is considerably problematic. I usually wear a size 18 and ordered a size 22 in this dress in order for it to fit properly. I never wore this dress because it's made for someone much taller than me. If you were average to long waisted I think you will love the dress, but order two sizes larger than you normally would.
I went up 2 sizes but it buttons all the way down the front and there were still 2 inch gaps between the 2 sides of the dress when buttoned! Not for hippy women even if you size up.
I'm 4'11". I love short skirts it's what I'm looking for. Im usually size 2-4, I got a 6, fits perfectly

links_Review_Title: It was a great dress but runs very small. Love the pattern.
links_Review_Text: This is a great pattern, but it run EXTRA SMALL. I typically wear a 0-2 (4 ft. 10 inches Petite), and I ordered a 6 after reading reviews. It fit perfectly in the shoulders and arms, but was tight around the hips. Ideal for Fall Wear, when you can layer up. Stockings/Tights are a MUST.
This dress buttons all the way down and if you have any kind of butt it won't fit.
Runs small on the bottom and in length, so sized up 2 sizes from what I'd normally wear and it fit really well - loose on top and tighter on the bottom, but very flattering.

links_Review_Title: Thanks girls for the heads up to size up!
links_Review_Text: I’m a 4-6 and got a 10 & it fit very nicely- even a tad on the small size.

links_Review_Title: Didn't wear. Ran way too small.
links_Review_Text: Waist was too small. Overall fit was too small and too short for work.

I listened to reviews and sized up one from my normal size and that was the perfect fit for me - comfortable and no issues with buttons gaping, and I have hips and a booty. It was mid-thigh on me which I could get away with at work, especially considering the rest of the dress is conservative, but I have a very lax workplace. Also wore to brunch with friends and it was very cute, multiple compliments. Would recommend!

links_Review_Title: Love this dress. Lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: Fits well. Light fabric.

links_Review_Title: Comfortable and cute, but reviews are correct!
links_Review_Text: Reviews are on point, it is a VERY cute dress, but if you are larger on the bottom half DEFINITELY size up! The top portion of the dress runs true to size, so if you are larger up top, regular sizing should be fine.
The ONLY odd thing about this dress is since it runs a little small, when the buttons pull there is no liner in between!
Large everywhere but somehow still pulls at the hips.

Cute cut, comfortable fabric & felt like the 6 fit TTS. I'm not sure if the dress I received was a little worse for wear, but the buttons left gapes on both the top & bottom - and not because the fabric was pulling too tight. If I had a slip that worked with this it would have been a perfect for weekend brunch with sneakers or heels. I'm 5'7'' so definitely was too short for work.

Big CON - there isn't enough lining fabric behind the buttons so I was easily exposed in the skirt part. Yikes. The dress fit well so not too small (note - I am usually a 4 but wear a 6 in Veronica Beard...so her style does run small overall). Was anyone able to make this dress work??
Love this dress so much. It's perfect for everyday, a night out, or a special occasion

I was really looking forward to this dress. The print is very pretty and it's an overall great fit. HOWEVER, the button hoops are elastic and once you start to move the dress pulls and you can completely see right through the center seam of the dress where it buttons up. The size I wore was just perfect, but the button hoops were too large and stretched too much. Was not able to wear the dress. Very disappointed.

links_Review_Title: I couldn’t wear this dress, it wouldn’t even button pretty much anywhere. The sizing is small
links_Review_Text: Runs small

links_Review_Title: Didn't wear it as it didn't fit.
links_Review_Text: It was tight, couldn't really button it up. So hard to tell what it would look like. It doesn't look like it online but you have to button up the whole front of the dress.

links_Review_Title: It's both too big and too small
links_Review_Text: If you're a busty woman, you're fine. If you have hips, you're fine. However, if you have any sort of bicep, the arms this dress will trap you in it *just* at that spot. The zero stretch means you can't do much of anything to help yourself. Be sure to have a partner or roommate on hand to assist.

links_Review_Title: Too short for work, better for party
links_Review_Text: Loved the idea for this dress on a cooler summer day. But the bottom is too tight. Usually a size four but need to size up.

I am usually a size 8, read the reviews and ordered 12, which was could not button, I ended up wearing a size 14, which was a decent fit, however I am 5'-4" and this dress was still short at bottom, wore short tights underneath to make it appropriate for work. Overall I would recommend going up 4 or 5 sizes
Beautiful fabric and cute dress, but way way too short for work. I normally wear a size 4 but got this in a size 6, which was the right size for me.

After reading the reviews, i decided to size up to a 10 and a 12 hoping it would be perfect from my normal size 8. Well... that was a mistake. The 10 wouldn't even button. It fit like a size 4. I would recommend sizing up 4-5 sizes larger than your normal size.
Such a cute dress, but I am between and 8 and a 10. I got a 10, but should have gotten at least a 12 or 14. Plus, I'm only 5'3", but it was quite a bit too short for this 45 year old.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful print and cut but runs small
links_Review_Text: I am typically an 8 in a dress but would have needed a 10. The 8 was also short and not sure how much longer then 10 would be. The colors and print and very pretty and the dress buttons all the way down

I ordered two sizes larger than what I generally wear in Veronica beard and it was still too small in the hips, any larger and it would have been too oversized up top. So disappointed as it looks beautiful

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress. I would have loved to have worn it.
links_Review_Text: I didn't wear it. It appears to true to size. I sized up based on reviews that it was tight in the waist but that was not the case with me.

links_Review_Title: lovely print and construction. the dress is super flattering and flirty
links_Review_Text: shoulders were a little too puffy for me but I wore it anyway because the dress overall is so lovely

This is a very pretty dress, but it is quite short in front (I'm 5'7"). My main issue was the buttons on the skirt portion of the dress. There is a strip of lining fabric behind the buttons, and this stays in place pretty well on top, and the skirt itself has a white lining, but it looks like you can see through the buttons when you're walking. I would recommend a (very short) nude full slip.
The fit is small go up a size. Beautiful dress

Only issue is that design is open buttons in the front and it does pull a little in problem areas. Chest was fine but just below waist was tight, even in the next size up. So I just wore my usual size and hoped no one noticed ;-)

links_Review_Title: Wore to a shower-tights at waist
links_Review_Text: Cute. Lots of compliments. It was tight at the waist and would be better for someone with a longer torso.

Skin shows a little in the middle and that part is not stretchy, so it gets a little tight on your ribs, may want to size up if you're between sizes. I don't love empire waist, but it was fine for work.

links_Review_Title: Demure and sexy at the same time
links_Review_Text: Great w boots or even flats. Good everyday dress.

links_Review_Title: Loved it! Comfortable & easy to wear
links_Review_Text: Lovely dress. Didn't require ironing. Light & comfortable. Perfect length.
The length was perfect for me, it was flowy and pretty. I choose to leave the top 2 buttons open so I didn't feel suffocated

Most amazing dress! So chic, so flattering and such attention to detail. Wow! This one is so pricey and I really can't justify the cost of it but I wish I could bc I loved this dress so much.. it's just fancy enough that I feel it could be worn to variety of events and the attention to detail with the design takes it to another level-- the sleeves, button details down the bust, hidden zipper and the sweetest pleated skirt. I felt like a million bucks in this dress!
I love this dress! Wore it with black tights but could be wore without. Fit perfectly and received many compliments. Would definitely rent again.

True to size. I'm a 4 top/8bottom and usually fit a size 6 dress. I found that this was a good work dress, but that, self consciously I felt it made my hips look a bit wider than usual. Neck was a bit itchy, but that's what a high neck does.

links_Review_Title: Love this dress and I'm short :)
links_Review_Text: perfect fit. super cute!
Fit really well and was sexy without being revealing.

I loved this dress!! It was perfect for the transition from summer to fall. It is definitely very formal material but can be dressed up or down with the right shoes. I wore this to a bridal shower and got so many compliments. So flattering and the perfect level of elevated for a daytime party.
I could have sized down in this one. Cute dress!
Dress fit beautifully. The fabric and fit are amazing.

I rented a size up for length and room in the top. The size was perfect and the fit was good, but there's just something about this dress I didn't like. If you wear it buttoned up all the way at the neck, you look very bulky in the chest/shoulders. When I opened up the buttons at the neck it was ok, but I still didn't love it. It's kind of gothic/Victorian/old fashioned doll, which wasn't what I wanted. But if you're into that, it's cute. A little short too.

loved this dress sadly it was too tight for me to wear it. I got it zipped and it fit me perfectly, however the front was buttons and was completely gaping/pulling open due to my larger chest (36c). Wished I had sized up because the dress really is super cute!
Lose waist but the neck was a little tight
Good for work
Adorable, love a short dress with long sleeves. Very comfortable.
Great dress, I couldn't tell from the picture but the waist area is exposed. I used a belt to cover it so it would be appropriate for my workplace.

PROS I wore to work, and later wore to a date The length of the dress is work-appropriate *Flirty fabric I was stopped for compliments multiple times CONS -None- *Flirty fabric I wore tights and an undershirt because the waist is see-through. I could have probably not gone throughout the workday with it, but I did for date night.

Beautiful, comfortable, flowy. Someone told me I looked like a doll wearing it! I wore this to work and on a date for my bday. One thing to note, the buttons have spaces in between them so if you are wearing this to work you will need some sort of undergarment or light shirt underneath so that you aren't showing too much skin at work.

links_Review_Title: Gothic-chic vibes for end of October!
links_Review_Text: Lovely dress, ran too large. Fabric was soft, but seemed over-worn.

I probably could've done the 16 in this, it was really roomy. you never know with this brand because it's all over the place!! however, it still looked super cute with tights! loved the sleeves. be mindful: - it's short - the detail around the waist shows your skin, there's no material behind it. not sure how to explain, zoom in on the photos - if you're sensitive to things around you neck, note that this does button and may be a little snug

It fit well, but it was way dressier than I expected for some reason, and that's my fault for not looking closely. The waist is actually see through to your skin. I thought it was a belt. The front gaps a lot even though it's loose so you could see into my chest. I thought about keeping it and wearing it with a cami underneath, but it was just too dressy and not worth it.
Wore this dress for brunch with my girlfriends, so many compliments! Fit perfectly and very flattering

links_Review_Title: Got lots of compliments but tight in the middle
links_Review_Text: I got a lot of compliments on this dress but the middle is see through so I had to wear a black cami, no big deal. The middle where the built in belt was a bit tight but not unbearable.
Cute in person but the waistline detail is see through which I didn't realize. I'm 5'3 120lbs, and it was a little too long and just hit in all the wrong places. Wish it fit.

links_Review_Title: I felt like a model! Luxurious, comfortable, and trendy, but size up if curvy (hips).
links_Review_Text: What a statement! I had compliments galore. This dress was so trendy, but comfortable and sexy. I got a medium because the small wasn't available and glad I did. While it does have stretch, if you're curvy like me (hips), I would size up. It was a cold night and I was comfortably warm from the velvet. I loved it so much I wish I had somewhere else to wear it to. If you want to take a risk without breaking the bank, this dress is it! You won't be sorry.

I rented this dress for a photo shoot, and it was perfect! It's an amazing, unique statement dress. It fit perfectly. I'm usually a size 2, and I wore an XS. The neckline is just low enough without plunging too much. The back is open, which eliminates your ability to wear a bra. It rides up a little when you walk, but isn't a big deal. I loved my photos and got the most compliments on the dress.

links_Review_Title: The package shipped early and the fit of the dress was perfect for my shape and my height.
links_Review_Text: Snug around the hips and waist line, not afraid to show cleavage in the front and back.
It was great! It was low cut on me and I couldn't wear a bra but I felt contained. Matched it with a body chain. Color was amazing and got so many compliments on the sleeves. Must rent!

Got so many compliments all night long! I'm 5'1 and the small fit great. I wore it with 3 inch heels and was fine with length. Probably could have sized down one size. Pulled the dress up a little so the back draped down really beautifully and exposed my back more versus having it pulled down which also helped because of how short I am. Highly recommend this dress if you're looking for that wow factor and not something basic and boring.
I wore this to a black tie winter event. I got a ton of complements on the awesome shoulders, but the dress is tight and the back seam opened from a few hours of regular wear!

I wore it for the dinner and show at the Magic Castle and it was perfect! The puffed sleeve detail is just stunning, the ruched part on the hips accentuates your figure and the color is to die for. I am 6 feet tall so it was shorter on me than on the model pictured, however, it still worked thanks to it's form and the slit. Of you're looking for something more unique that the usual formal gown, this is it!! ❤️❤️❤️

links_Review_Title: The dress was the outfit of the night! I looked straight off a red carpet which was exact what I was
links_Review_Text: Fits right in all the right places!
Wonderful and flattering fit; versatile for party or formal event. Very unique cut - definitely a standout piece.
It’s more open in the front and the back than what the pic shows.

This has been my favorite rental so far. I have kept this for over 2 months and it's my go to top. It fits really well and is very flattering. I'm thinking of purchasing it, but the price tag is a little steep.
I keep renting this shirt because I love it so much!
The shirt had a flattering style and was pretty comfortable. Fit true to size. Would definitely order again :)
Super flattering shape, black but still fun with the leopard pattern. Perfect for date night!

links_Review_Title: Cute , comfy, and fits well. Downside, snap at v-neck pops open even two seconds. Can't wear it
links_Review_Text: Super duper cute and comfortable I love the outfit. It's perfect for a night out, The v-neck is so adorable however I didn't realize there was a snap that held it closed. I have a full chest and there is no way that will ever stay closed on its own, maybe it's just the outfit I got but it's not working. I can't wear this out and I do not want to pin it or try to make it stay closed.

links_Review_Title: I never wore it - hard to pair with pants
links_Review_Text: Underwhelming

I'm usually a 0 in tops, so the 2 was a little big on me, but still worked. I did really like the lace - the leopard look is unique and interesting, but still pretty subtle. This is cute! Worked great for a little Saturday night cocktail get-together with jeans and booties. Not at all scratchy.
Very snug feeling, but didn't look too tight. Would recommend ordering a size larger (it wasn't avaialble for me)

links_Review_Title: Probably better if you are petite
links_Review_Text: I wanted to love this top. The cut and print are cute, but the length was a little short for me. The peplum hit at an odd spot, so was pretty unflattering. I think it would be really cute if you are 5'4" or under.

links_Review_Title: Cute shirt, but didn't look great on my body type.
links_Review_Text: I loved the idea of this shirt; I'm kind of lace-obsessed! Unfortunately, it seemed to be a little small and was tight on my 34A chest but loose in the body. It also had a lower neckline than I had imagined it would, so it wasn't really appropriate for work. It is a cute shirt, but I think it may look better on someone else.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous neckline, the rest is okay
links_Review_Text: I loved how this looked on me, but the sleeves were pretty tight. I would usually be a 12 in tops, but I'm glad I went with the 14 because I don't think my arms would've fit in a smaller size.

links_Review_Title: Dress it up or down or in between - Day to Night!
links_Review_Text: What fun top. The lace detail and fit is great. I feel I could have sized down to have a more fitted look, but I was very comfortable in my standard size 6. I wore this to work and also out to dinner and drinks.
The cutest lace shirt! Pairs perfect with any pants including jeans. Super comfortable.
This was great for a casual client meeting and for wearing while out with friends for a day. Really flattering on an hourglass shape.
Fantastic cut and seams in just the right places. Felt like it really made my profile look slimmer. Loved it, and would definitely rent again!
The top is super flattering and you can wear it to work and also night date!

links_Review_Title: Nice top - particularly on the shoulders
links_Review_Text: Fits large, but that can look nice with lace detailing on arms

I love this top! I wore it over a black leather skirt for my husband's birthday dinner. It's pretty and feminine, and very easy to wear. I wore a 6, but could have ordered smaller - I would suggest size down if you are between sizes.
Great black top with cute puff sleeve detail for a date/night out
Cute but ran a little big
I sized up for this since I have a larger bust and it fits perfectly and comes in perfectly in my ribs
This top is very feminine, puffed lace sleeves are so beautiful. Unfortunately the mid section wasn't so flattering on me. Felt wide, but it does run true to size.
The fit is true to size. Perfect for that dressy/casual event, that you aren't sure how dressed up to get.

This dress is gorgeous on!! I ordered this last minute for NYE and I was so glad I did. It's a basic LBD but it's figure flattering and is so easy to dress up! I am normally in between a L and XL, I wore an XL and the fit was great so I recommend sizing up if you're in between sizes. This dress is also a little short but it's not insane, I'm 5'10" and thought the length was good for a night out.

links_Review_Title: I didn't love the neckline cut. It didn't look great with something underneath
links_Review_Text: It accentuated my armpit fat lol and I didn't love the shape.
Wore it for everyday
Great fit and very comfortable.

I am 5'6" tall. And wore 2" heels and the dress just perfectly hit the ground. If you were any shorter, I wouldn't recommend renting. It is also very tight around the rib cage as another reviewer said.
I loved this. The fit and length were flattering and the detailing is so beautiful.

The dress was nice and light and beautiful! I will say that this probably fits a 26'' waist as it was slightly big around my own for a 0R. I'm 5'6'' and it showed the tips of my heels; about 2 inches off the ground.

links_Review_Title: Unique dress, received lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: I really liked this dress! Very pretty and something different than you typically see. I ordered for a black tie optional winter wedding. I'm a true size 4 and wore the 2R, but I'm pear shaped so I knew with it being empire waisted and loose fitting I could go down a size. The 4 would have worked also but the 2 fit better. The reason I didn't give it 5 stars was the length. I'm 5'7" and it was much longer on me than the model. It hit at ankle length.

links_Review_Title: Wore this dress to a broadway show, received several compliments
links_Review_Text: Comfortable, flattering for any body type. Strapless bra recommended. At 5'5', this dress hit my low ankle just off the floor. Not for a more petite person, unless wearing a substantial heel.

Loved this dress for a black tie wedding. I had to wear a very tall heel to make it wearable though, I'm only 5'2". Also my usual size is 12 but I have a large chest, the 14 fit snug but was still comfortable!

links_Review_Title: LOVED the neckline and sleeve details
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for a wedding in the holiday season - it was the perfect combination of classy and fun.

links_Review_Title: Comfortable and nice fit with pretty details
links_Review_Text: Rented this for a Chinese wedding tea ceremony. Loved the fit of this dress and the tulle fabric. Very comfortable. Length was just right for a petite like me as I only wore 2in heels. Simple with nice and elegant-looking details like the tulle fabric and the little florals. Liked it a lot.

I absolutely loved wearing this dress to a friend's wedding last night. The second that I tried it on, I knew that it would be perfect for the event. I received a ton of compliments on it, and felt like a million bucks. It's really comfortable, and easy to dance in. The one thing that I would watch for is that the length was longer than expected. It worked out for me since I'm on the taller side (5'7), but if you're shorter I would proceed with caution.

links_Review_Title: Pretty dress but didn't work for me
links_Review_Text: This dress looked way better in person than the photo; feminine, delicate fabric. I sized up thinking better too big than too small, but it felt shapeless, also a little too long, and I'm not short. Didn't end up wearing. Probably would've liked better in another size though.
Very easy to wear, looks expensive. Perfect for the fall wedding I attended.

Pretty dress! Loved the fabric and it was comfortable. I am 5'3" so it definitely was longer than the model picture and went almost floor length on me. I wore to a formal event in the fall so this fit the occasion. Usually a size 12 and wore a 14 so it was a little big at the top.

This dress is a damn dream! It's beautiful, ethereal, and is perfect for a wedding or other formal event. The issue I ran into is this: I ordered a size 2 and a backup in a size 4 (should have been the other way around) and they couldn't ship the 4. Picked up size 2 in store, had to contort my body for it to zip up the entire way. It was super tight around the top of my rib cage. By some stroke of pure luck I was able to zip it myself and wear it to the wedding. Did not stretch out much.
This was a fun rental that I loved wearing. The dress was lovely and fit perfectly. I received so many compliments

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments! Not your typical black dress
links_Review_Text: Ran a little long
Just felt so beautiful in this dress . It was so comfortable ! Rented it for a weekend upstate and wore it both nights out . The Tibi sweater overtop for colder evenings (also rented).
Wore to an outdoor wedding and got a ton of compliments. The dress ran true to size but was tight around the rib cage.
This dress was great for a spring wedding. Fit great and length was perfect.

This is a lovely dress and was perfect for the black tie optional February wedding I recently attended. I wore a size 14R (I'm normally a 12/14 - 5'6", 170lbs), which fit comfortably. I tried the dress with a strapless bra and with no bra, and found I was able to wear it confidently without a bra. I felt elegant and pretty in this dress, and received lots of compliments on it!
This dress fit great and I was pleased. Nice flow to it and made you look great!
Fits true to size. Longer than expected - but still looked great with heels.
This fit well, I loved the shape and the moody floral pattern was both feminine and fall-wedding appropriate. It was fun to dance in, and I got a lot of complements!

Wore to a very formal dinner while 7.5 months pregnant. It's very cute but I do think it runs a bit big. I'd usually be a size 0/2 but took a 6 (and still had plenty of room) in this. Very pretty though and I received a lot of compliments.
This is a beautiful dress, and it fit perfectly in the size 4.
Such a pretty and comfortable dress! Wore it to my 15th anniversary dinner! My husband loved it!
This dress was so fun to dance in! Being it was long, you had to lift it up to walk or transition. Glad I ended up renting this dress!

The model of the dress is probably five ten, so if you are under about five eight, the dress will be quite long on you. It fit me great, but it might not be for shorter women. I loved the romantic, "Victorian" style. It was great for a fall wedding.
A great dress for an October wedding. The overlay is gorgeous both with the subtle flowers and understated polka dots. I received compliments all night. Such a unique dress, I wish I owned it.

links_Review_Title: Kind of scratchy material, but you get use to it
links_Review_Text: The dress is great for dancing. I had a lot of fun with it!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for an afternoon gala event
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit, received many compliments, Pics don't do it justice.

links_Review_Title: This dress is beautiful and unique without being too loud. It is also very flattering at the waist.
links_Review_Text: It was a bit longer than I would have liked. It was very light and comfortable. I rented for a Sept. wedding and think it is too fall/wintery as its still 90+ degrees here now. I would definitely consider renting again for a colder wedding.

Its a beautiful dress but I could not wear it. The dress almost fit like a gown on because the length is too long and it is kinda more of an a-line poof than straight fit. If you are taller than 5'5 this dress will fit you beautifully but not recommended for anyone 5'5 and under.

links_Review_Title: Can't wait to wear on a tropical vacation
links_Review_Text: Decided to try fun things I might not usually rent while I'm quarantined. Would def rent for my next tropical getaway.

links_Review_Title: Pretty for a photo but not for our and about
links_Review_Text: I got this to wear at my baby shower but couldn't use it. It was pretty for one photo but couldn't walk out in public in it other then that. You can't wear a normal bra in it so being pregnant that wasn't working, with The back is open and the front low cut. I couldn't Buckle the back up fully so couldn't wear it just held it on for one photo, but couldn't clasp it other then that. Ended up returning it.
Perfect length for 4'11". Back is showing great for poolside coverup or a fancy bra is needed

links_Review_Title: I really wanted to keep this dress!
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! The sleeves were beautiful, the embroidery, the flowing skirt, all very romantic. I would have kept it but I'm about an inch and a half too short to make this dress practical for me. I'm 5' 4" and I wound up holding this dress up more than I would have liked.

I wore this dress on a tropical vacation and it was perfect. I love the flowy style and beautiful details and it was light and breezy without being see through. This is the second time I rented this dress - the first was over the Fourth of July. Definitely one of my favorite rentals of all time!

Wore this for our one year anniversary drinks/dinner and it was pretty much perfect! My small chest didn't need to use the front clip and the style was perfect for being in Mexico. The slip underneath needed to be ironed pretty well so it wasn't bunching up at the end. Overall super fun & flowy dress!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, although the front clasp kept coming undone
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress, I wore it for a costume but can see myself wearing it in other situations as well. Only problem is that the clasp in the front kept coming undone. Fortunately, I'm smaller-chested, so it just looked like a deep V-neck whenever that happened, but I could imagine it being trickier/more revealing for anyone larger than a B.
It have extra hook to get more modest look, fabric don't wrinkles almost, under skirt- needed a lot of ironing, other wise was beautiful vacation dress

I wore this to brunch in Wynwood on my bachelorette trip and it was the perfect dress! It was comfy, flowy and sexy and I received so many compliments! I'm 5'4, 128 pounds and have a 34DD and it couldn't have fit better. I can't wait to rent again.

Rented for a trip to Palm Springs and it was perfect! Didn't end up needing a bra, can't really wear one, just wore some of those sticky boob lifter things. There will be cleavage if you have a big chest!

As a tall girl, I was worried about length of the built-in slip under the dress. It was definitely a stretch at 5'11", as you can see in the pic. But ultimately it worked pretty well! Overall, a really fun and flowy dress. The top fit true to size and the only tiny issue was some embroidery coming loose.

links_Review_Title: Wonderfully Unique Dress, Tons of Compliments for my Bridal Shower!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress for my bridal shower and people kept raving about my dress asking where I got it. I wear a 32B and the top of the dress fit perfect. I normally wear a 2 and I'm glad I got the small. The band around my ribs was a perfect fit, but was a little snug if I bent over. The material was light and wrinkles came out easily with a steamer. I thought it was very comfortable.
I want to own this dress! Both the L and XL fit me, but the large was tighter in the boobs so it helped keep them perkier since i couldn't wear a bra. Love this dress!
I got so many compliments on this dress! It's gorgeous- will definitely rent another Cleobella dress!

I'm about 5'5" and I wore two inch heels so walking was fine, navigating the stairs was a little tricky. I received many compliments and looooved this dress. I had to tape my boobs up AND in or risk exposure when moving around too much. Great pick for almost any daytime event!

So I have breasts that sag from breastfeeding and therefore, make sure you get yourself the adhesive cups for cleavage! This dress is very revealing in that area! Aside from that it's a show stopper! Everyone was looking at my dress and some stopped me to compliment it. I hate attention! But if you like attention, RENT THIS DRESS. It would be perfect for a photo shoot, a cruise, the beach or if you want to post it on a dating site! My boyfriend absolutely loved the dress.

Being relatively short (5'5") and skinny with a small chest, I was worried that I'd look terrible in this type dress, but it was wonderful. The chest area is secured with an eye & hook, the back also has a button to keep the sleeves from falling. The style was perfect for dinner then walking around in France. The length is a little long, so I wore 4" heels and it was perfect. A memorable dress that garnered many compliments.

links_Review_Title: I'm 5'10, 135 pounds, 34B chest. I wore flats with this!!
links_Review_Text: I LOVED this dress. Fit perfectly! The top isn't as sheer as it looks on the actual designer website. I wore no bra and it was totally fine!

Loved this dress! I wore shapewear underneath to make sure the center section of the dress was nice and flowy. Also used fashion tape on the neckline to make sure I was secure! Such a fun dress to wear and felt like a little boho bride :)

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a hot night out in Paris!
links_Review_Text: Such a great date night dress... Hubby loved it!
Great fit. Love the material. It's so flattering.

links_Review_Title: Comfy and great for all occasions
links_Review_Text: Wore to dinner with girlfriends. I had to pin the front to cover my bralette. Would be fine unpinned with a cuter bra or swimsuit or stick on cups. This dress was super comfy. A little long for me but worked with platform heels.

Such a great, flattering dress with nice details. Length was perfect for my height (5'8). Fell in love with this dress. Despite the white color, it was fairly forgiving when it came to being see through.
This dress was gorgeous and perfect for my bachelorette in Miami!

links_Review_Title: Feminine, floaty, and perfect for summer
links_Review_Text: This was absolutely gorgeous, but took some figuring out. I'm about 5'6" and this absolutely required heels (or it wold have been dragging the ground). There's no way to wear a bra without it showing (low cut in front and open back), so I decided to roll with it and wear a pretty off-whit bralette. This dress is a major head turner and I got loads of compliments
I got so many compliments on this all day and night! So flattering and different!
I absolutely loved this dress! Im a size 12.. the waist was too tight in the large, the XL fit perfect. So fun and flattering!

This dress was beautiful, great material and being 6 foot hit my ankles so could be for shorter or taller ladies alike. Caution: I don't think you can wear a typical bra with this dress, the gap in the front and it's sheer. I have a Free People white bra-let that made it for no issues. Only double lining is in the skirt area so just wear beige undies and you will have no issues

Beautiful dress! Love the details! The one I received was torn in the back so I didn't wear. Also I'm 5'9" with a longer torso and the cutout around the thighs showed my butt! So wouldn't recommend for taller ladies or if your height is in your torso. Also ended a few inches above the floor, which I like my maxis to touch the ground--not a deal breaker but not my favorite. I would wear without a bra, but it's up to you ;) Wish this came in Tall sizes!

links_Review_Title: Hubby Loved it, but would not rent again
links_Review_Text: The dress was lovely and fit great -- I felt very pretty in it and it was a big hit with my husband -- but the slip kept riding up! I had to walk while holding it down. The dress was also pretty see-through, even with slip and nude colored underwear. Due to these things and some issues with the cleaning and quality of the garment, I will not be renting this one again.
Ok it's a long dress. But it's sheer between fabric. And then to hits (if your tall) in places that shouldn't be sheer!! Yikes!! And it super low cut. No thank you.
I wore this dress for a photoshoot and loved it. I would definitely rent it again, although maybe in XSR (which wasn’t available this time around).

links_Review_Title: Beautiful and flowy - perfect for beach vacay
links_Review_Text: I wore this in Mexico, and was perfect! I should have gotten a large, the XL was a little big. Also, the underskirt was wrinkled and looked a bit strange hiked up on one side, couldn't get it to smooth out.

links_Review_Title: Not for those with long torso
links_Review_Text: This dress is beautiful - the embroidery at the top, the colors, everything. Unfortunately I have a longer torso and the open area in the back completely showed my butt. I couldn't wear it. I wish that there wasn't the slit around the thigh portion, the dress would have been perfect without it.

Loved this dress, but not for anyone with a longer torso. The small fit my top great, but due to the peek-a-boo in the center of the dress, it was way too risque for a family party with the potential to flash my bottom half. I went with the medium for slightly more coverage. It was freezing this day, so I actually opted to wear a black Cami and leggings underneath for warmth and modesty-- because I was at a family party. Had this been a vacation and warmer weather I would've went for it!

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress! So cute and fun.
links_Review_Text: Definitely don't underestimate how low this neckline is! I had to add some tape to the neckline so it wouldn't gape when I leaned over, but overall the dress was super comfortable and fit perfectly.

This dress is stunning! I absolutely loved it. The fit was great and the embroidery is beautiful. It was a little long but I'm short. I wore it with heels so it actually turned out okay length wise. I actually purchased this dress because I loved it so much! All the details are lovely, it's very well made. You won't regret selecting this!
I wore this to High Tea for my birthday. Definitely an occasion to dress up and feel beautiful! This is what this dress did for me, loved it and would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Dress was perfect. Fit perfectly. Got so many complements!
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly

links_Review_Title: I wore this for my wedding in Vegas and it was the perfect boho fiesta dress.
links_Review_Text: The fit is true to size. I'm a 10/12 and I fit into both the medium and large. This dress MUST be steamed before wearing because it arrives crumply, which makes the underskirt ride up and the overskirt too short. The zippers on this dress are really cheap, in fact one on the dress I wanted to wear was broken so I sized down. The material is gauzey and more of an off white than a true white. The embroidery is gorgeous. You need a plunge backless bra as there is an open slot down the back and the front V is too low for a normal strapless bra. You could also go without a bra if you are comfortable. I got so many compliments on this dress and it would work well for a casual day dress or a not too formal evening dress.
Wore this out for some events on a friend's wedding weekend. Fit so well and so flattering. Loved it so much I bought it.

The only way this dress makes sense is if you are wearing it over a bathing suit or use some sort of pin or fashion tape to close the absurd gap at the chest. My very low cut Demi bra was completely exposed and the neckline was just flapping there. Did not wear

links_Review_Title: Girly, but a little big in top
links_Review_Text: This dress is super girly and cute. I didn't love the way the neck was cut, it was super big in the top. I was messing with it a night!
I really liked the dress but couldn't wear it because the chest area is too low and doesn't safety pin easily

I had to safety pin chest a little tighter but it worked just fine. You could get away with wearing a bralet to be safe if you wanted; fit would allow for that. Not too short but above knee. Most of the saylor pieces I have rented are made with thicker/heavier fabric. This one is SUPER thin/light. Not see through though. But would be perfect for a summer beach wedding as it would be cool.
I loved this feminine look! I never would have bought this in stores, I so glad I get to play around! Great dress! Light weight and comfortable! Slightly short for 5'8 but didn't mind- wore spanx
Fit and color are great. Material was amazing! Just a little too open in the chest area.
It fit perfect. Had to wear boob tape to keep them from popping out. Would wear again.
Fits well but super low cut!

I loved how light the dress was. Mine did not come cleaned which was weird and someone left a safety pin in it which you could go without if you wanted. It needed to be ironed but I believe that wouldn't be an issue if it was cleaned.
Dress is so flattering and the perfect every day sundress. Love the details
Pretty print and flattering. Loved the scallop edge detail and cutout around the waist

links_Review_Title: The dress is a super light material which makes it perfect for a summer day or beach vacation.
links_Review_Text: Love the fit everywhere except the chest - it was a bit too open for my boob size. Otherwise obsessed with it. If I'd had a pin on the trip I took it on I would have pinned it and it would have been an easy solve. Would rent again!
Lightweight, super girly, fun dress!
I rented this dress for a banquet and it was huge success! The dress fit great and I received several compliments on it. Would definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Such a cute dress! But might need to adjust top part...
links_Review_Text: I wore this for a date night in the desert with my husband. Pros - really cute material and super comfortable. It is very short (I'm 5'10") so wore with flats as we were walking a few blocks to dinner anyways. I loved the area under the bust that has cut outs. I'm super pale so I just looked like it was my skin. Lol. But wanted to point it out in case others not into cut outs. Cons - I am a size 4 on top and 6 on bottom and the hips fit me perfectly in a size M. I have a very small rib cage and this fit me perfectly which means it runs smaller than normal! The bust area is very low cut. I am a 36C so it actually didn't pucker on me but I had to pin it at the bottom of the v (I wasn't wearing a bra since the only one I had packed wasn't low enough for the dress). But the scalloped edging was adorable. All in all loved the dress and will wear again before I return it. My husband loved it which is a big plus!

links_Review_Title: Loved the flirty but fun style!
links_Review_Text: I wore this for a night out on the town for my bachelorette party in Scottsdale! Lots of compliments and loved that it felt pretty and feminine without being over the top!

links_Review_Title: I really wanted to love this but ....
links_Review_Text: This dress is so beautiful in concept but the fit is super weird. It's too big on the top - I have a small chest but even if that's not the case, I'm pretty sure it would gap. I used a safety pin and it was still gaping. I love the scallop and the cutouts but unfortunately, it was just a bit blah for me. A medium might have been better but I'm not sure if that would've fixed the neck issue either. Also, I have wider shoulders and the sleeves definitely made me look super broad - so, that's a watch out for anyone who has a broader upper body.

If you wear a size 4 I would consider an XS but any smaller you may find this dress isn't for you. The fabric is nice and the dress would be perfect for spring, summer, or vacation! I did have quality issues which RTR was quick to correct and make right. However, I wouldn't be able to rent a replacement with the top running very large and sizing down isn't an option.
cute dress! I wore this with high heeled sandals as I felt it was a little dowdy with flats/more casual shoes.

Husband loved this little number. Wore it to an Octoberfest celebration, wore it again to tour around Athens. Features prominently in all our Acropolis shots. A happy daywear option. Not too short, gladly, very soft, breezy, sweet, comfy. (I think getting the Medium helped in the appropriateness department.) Eye catching without trying too hard. Sleeves were especially good for puffing and de-puffing, depending on the mood of the day. Would buy new if it were still available from Saylor.
I received tons of complements on this dress. Love it!!
pretty tight / short

links_Review_Title: The sizing and fit on this is terrible, fabric is flimsy.
links_Review_Text: I ordered this thinking it would have structure and be a cute weekend dress. It is so flimsy, it reminds me of an old cotton shirt thats been washed a million times so its thin. I ordered up a size thinking it would be a little more roomy but comfortable, but it was massive. I have long arms that are relatively thin, but for some reason the elastic band on the sleeves would ride up too high (almost like it was too small) and make the puff look like I was in the 80's. Overall it just looked really cheap.
Love this dress. Low cut but fine with the right bra. My BF liked it too :) Would totally buy it but a bit pricey for an about-town kind of dress I can't wear to work.

I didn't end up wearing this because, although fit was overall loose, the zipper was extremely tough to get up and ended up breaking as I tried to zip it. The fabric is very thin and flimsy, the v neck flopped over and revealed my bra. Cute idea in theory but didn't work for me.

links_Review_Title: Pretty fabric and detailing, but unwearable.
links_Review_Text: Super weird fit at the bust--like wide open. I'm not sure how you wear this if you have boobs.
I wore this for a day of wine tasting. It was the first hot weekend of the year and this was perfect. I was comfortable all day. I did need fashion tape to keep the top more appropriate.

links_Review_Title: Not appropriate for event at school. Too revealing
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress, nice color/fabric. No reviews at the time ordered. Picture doesn't show how revealing the top is.

links_Review_Title: same issue as the other review. the top was completely open, not at all like the picture shown.
links_Review_Text: from above the waist the dress is completely open. it needs a snap so you're not totally exposed, otherwise cute and soft.

This is such a pretty dress, but was so short!! I am only 5"3 and it was way too short for me. I was so sad, because it is a beautiful print and in a light cotton material, which is great for Florida.

links_Review_Title: It was OK. Material will wrinkle easily
links_Review_Text: I loved the deep v-neck detail but the sleeves are SUPER puffy so I just looked like a clown. It definitely fit true to my size. I definitely didn't love the material either, stiff but wrinkly. I have pretty broad shoulders so the puffy sleeves are not a great look for that kind of body.

I rented this when there were 0 reviews so I'm hoping this will help someone. This is a cute feminine dress but the fit is off, the top pulls to one side after it zippers up and it's so short. I'm 5'9 and cannot wear it. If you are renting it for an event that you have to move around at I suggest getting a couple sizes up.

super cute fabric and design concept. the problem with the dress is the cleavage. It was hard to tell in the photo, but the front is extremely revealing--cut very low, and from the side you can see right into the dress. I couldn't wear it out. I rented it to wear for a girls' weekend in Nashville, and while it was extremely amusing to my friends when I tried it on, we all agreed there was absolutely no way I could wear it out in public! Shame as it was cute. One friend described it as 'a naughty Holly Hobby costume'.

links_Review_Title: Fit true to size but had to pin at the top. Not made for people with no chest
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size but had to pin at the top. Not made for people with no chest

links_Review_Title: Pretty, but not made for big chested women!
links_Review_Text: I liked this dress and was really bummed I couldn't wear it, but if you have a big chest (I would say C and up), you can't wear this without exposing yourself! When I put it on it was comical how it just splayed open and shower everything. Because the material is a thin cotton, the top portion isn't structured enough to hold closed. The only other alternative would be to wear a cami underneath. I think even if you have a smaller chest you would still have to use double sided tape. I had to return it!

Wore to a family party- comfortable but chic. Love the sleeves. The dress is the perfect combination of loose enough to be comfortable but also tight enough to be flattering. It is very low cut so I pinned shut where I felt it was appropriate.
Way too small. Not as cute as expected in person.

links_Review_Title: Loved but was tight in the rib cage
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress. I just wish it was a little bigger in the rib cage. It made the dress uncomfortable. I will totally rent it again but next time in a bigger size. (It was a little big though in the shoulders)
The sleeves overwhelmed my petite frame. I felt like I looked like a kid.

links_Review_Title: Very comfortable. Definitely an effortless dress. Would rent again.
links_Review_Text: The fit was true to size. I wore it in 90 degree weather and the fabric was very breathable.

Lots of comments about an awkward fit, but this really worked for my body type (larger chest, straight waist/hips). Nothing felt tight/constrictive or awkward. The fabric is really beautiful. Wore it for vacay, but could easily wear around anywhere in the spring/summer.
Absolutely loved this and will rent again!
Cute dress with a fun print and embellishments. Material is very lightweight. I wish it was little more fitted in the waist. Overall, it was comfortable to wear all day at a trade show.
So darn cute, light and flattering!

Loved this dress! Perfect light dress for work or for the weekend. Looks really unique, and a few people stopped to ask me where it was from. I paired this with white sneakers for running errands. From the photos I was a little worried about the neckline being too deep, but it looked totally fine on and I would be comfortable wearing this to work.

Loved this dress and got compliments all day while I was out. The only issue is that it's a little bit short for work, I work for a start up so I was able to get away with it, and a little tight around the waist. Hence why I am not giving it 5 stars!
Super comfortable but runs a little large. Great material and fun design. A nice length. A little low cut for work but perfect for going around town. I would rent it again!

Something was just a little off with the fit. It was too big in the shoulders and chest but snug in the stomach and hips. Cute pattern but I didn't think it was the most flattering. Fabric was a little hot.!
A little revealing at the top but super cute. Great print. Super comfortable.

links_Review_Title: I love a blue and white tie dye anything
links_Review_Text: A little loose in the waist but, very comfortable. Can dress up or down.
This dress is even more beautiful in person and so flattering. I got tons of compliments. I would've kept it if it was less money

Rent this dress. Fellow short girls, the length will work! It's flattering, beautifully cut, and I don't have a flat stomach, yet somehow I look like I did. I put a bandeau under it bc I wore it to work, but I wouldn't have needed it otherwise. #workproblems

Great cut and fabric. This was super easy to wear, even the light wrinkles throughout the day seemed purposeful thanks to the colors. Lots of compliments and easy to dress up and down. So glad RTR carries Tanya Taylor!
Fits true to size - Light weight Deep neckline No slip or shape wear required Perfect flouncy beach vacation dress - wore with heels on e night and flip flops another
Have rented this dress twice now & absolutely love it! Flirty, flattering, beautiful colors & fabric. Easy to wear!

links_Review_Title: Love how light and silky this dress is! Perfect for warm SoCal night!
links_Review_Text: I loved the color and style of this dress. It is light and airy and floats around your shape but isn't baggy where you can't tell you have a shape! I got a lot of compliments from men and women when we were out to dinner. I am a 4 on top and 6 on the bottom so I usually order a 6 in dresses. This did feel a little large overall though. It is slight a line on the bottom. I will definitely rent this again but will probably try a 4. Beautiful dress!

links_Review_Title: Perfect rehearsal dinner dress for destination wedding
links_Review_Text: Absolutely loved this dress. Flattering but not super form fitting. Hit just above knee. Better matches with wedge sandals than dressy heels. The perfect mix of float/breezy and dressy. Wish I owned it!
Comfortable, easy. Hope to wear this more than once:)

links_Review_Title: It didnt happen because of the pandemic, boo
links_Review_Text: Love this dress!
This is a fun casual dress. It fit TTS. I am a DDD so it was a little tight it the bust.
bought it

links_Review_Title: Cute for a cover up/beach dress
links_Review_Text: My first problem is that I ordered too large of a dress. It looked like a mumu and swimsuit cover up hybrid. Maybe if I ordered my correct size, I would feel differently.
Looks great on and very unique
Can be dressed up or down - lovely!

Loved this dress....so comfy & cute. I go between a 6 & 8, and 8 was definitely the way to go in this one. Can wear regular bra & make sure to wear light colored panties. Would have kept longer if wasn't end of summer....would have bought if cheaper!!
Fit is loose and comfortable.
Cute! I'll try it again in a bigger size.
Great for a date, too much for work. Loved it and will rent again!
I didn't end up wearing.

This is my second attempt at wearing this designer (Previous attempt- 18 was too large). I am a 16W or an 18 or an XXL. The 16 in this dress was too small, I recommend sizing up if in between a 16 and 18 in this dress. This was too snug to wear comfortably . It looks like a cute dress in the other reviews though!
Love the tie die. Light weight, beautiful fabric.
This is a fun dress for casual events or just being out and about in the heat.
The print of this dress is cute, but the shape was a bit "off". Probably could have sized down, but didn't think the fit was very flattering. I ended up wearing as a pool coverup.

links_Review_Title: I'm tall- this was too short for me
links_Review_Text: I wanted to love this but at 6'1" it was just too short for me to want to wear out.
Perfect cut if you've got an hourglass figure. So lightweight, amazing for summer. A little frilly for my more minimalist taste, but can't knock it for that. So cute.
This dress is gorgeous but runs small—my suggestion is to size up at least one size.
The best, please order :)

links_Review_Title: so comfortable and easy to wear on a hot day
links_Review_Text: fit loose - but comfortable-

I normally wear a size 18 and I tried this dress in a 18, 20, and 22 and all of them were too small on me. It isn't cut well for plus size/curvy girls because it is tight around the hip area. If you don't have larger hips/butt, then it would probably work.
Absolutely in love with this blouse! Stylish, constructed beautifully and feels fabulous!

Extremely flattering neckline. The body of the blouse is loose so to give myself some kind of waist I french tucked the front of the shirt into my jeans. I probably could have gone down a size and will probably try the size 14 next time. I absolutely loved it!

I picked this up in the store, new with tags! Such a gorgeous top, with silky soft fabric. The neckline and cutout make this top truly stand out. Looks almost deep purplish rather than blue. The length was just right on my petite frame, but may feel a tad short on taller gals. Runs slightly big, as I felt like I could size down to a 0 which wasn't available.
Hot damn! I looked EXPENSIVE. Comfortable. Was able to wear a normal skinny strapped bra. Fit was great. How I wanted to buy this one!
Way too short.
This shirt is beyond gorgeous. I felt like I was wearing a work of art, or a tulip. It is a little short but I wore it with a high waisted skirt. Very tempted to buy it.

I didn't end up wearing this out. It was a tad too short waisted for me and my husband said the sleeves reminded him of snow white. I would say it fit like an 8 used to fit, before everything got supersized. If you are petite and like to show off your shoulders, this would be a great top for you. If you are tall, the length will be a challenge.

I sized down to a 2 based on other reviews and am glad I did. That being said, I have a very small chest. The collar was a bit of a struggle to keep in place, and you will need to wear a strapless bra, but this is super cute! Wish I could afford to buy it (lol)

Unfortunately this runs a bit small. I ordered an 8 as that is what I wear in most tops and jackets/blazers but this was tight and short. I am 5'9" 155lbs and I do not have much in the way of breasts and it was pretty skin tight on my chest area and then hit me right above my pant line so I would never have been able to raise an arm without showing some stomach. I am not sure if a 10 would have done the trick. For a tall, more athletic build girl this may not be the best option. If you are tall and thin this could work well I think.

The neckline is just unique handsdown!! The only 2 points that you should notice: 1. I'm btw 4/6, I rented 4, the bust area is way too tight, I could only use nippie to let my breasts sty flat to fit in 2. Not great for long torso, as you can see this is a very short top around the torso area.
one reviewer thought it ran big so I sized down to a 2 and it was too tight on my average sized chest, and a bit short. will try a 4-- really special piece!

links_Review_Title: Avoid if you're busty! Otherwise, a chic blouse :)
links_Review_Text: It was a very nice color and the material was soft and comfortable. However, it wasn't very flattering. I was planning on wearing to work but it did not look good so I ended up sending it back.
High quality material, flattering cut. Definitely required high waisted jeans. The neckline moved around a bit but I didn't mind. Such a gorgeous look. Wore on a date

Rented this for a photo shoot, photographs beautifully, the fit was A little odd only. Excuse of my body shape. I'm small on top, larger in the middle with a booty that's more a smidge wider and flatter than I would like; however I felt gorgeous and the photos turned out well!

Adorable dress WITH pockets! I wanted to purchase and keep. But, the top is super snug. I typically fit a size 8R and I couldn't get this top zipped all the way. I'm going to try sizing up. It feels like it would be perfect for spring/summer, if I can get the right size for the top
The colour, the fit, the length, the bows... I love this dress! No complaints. Will rent a lot in the future!

I wore this dress to the Frida Kahlo museum in Mexico City. What a perfect choice! The dress is light, flattering and is the most beautiful shade of green! Runs true to size but would not recommend for heavier chested girls as it's a light tight in the boobs.

links_Review_Title: Fun, flattering dress perfect for vacation
links_Review_Text: Not the most comfortable because the straps kept falling down, but I felt great in this dress. Good even in strong winds.
Flattering for a large dinner! So many compliments, very classy but still trendy

So flattering. True to size. Pockets. Ties are adjustable. Straps are adjustable. Can be worn strapless. Stunning color. Got more compliments from strangers than maybe anything else this summer. So sad I couldn't afford to keep it.
Side note for my friends with big boobs - the neck line is low but otherwise it's so cute! Very green.

I decided to try rent the runway knowing as I had four weddings coming up over the course of two months. This was the last of the four dresses I tried on in my first unlimited shipment, and immediately fell in love. The color and fabric are so rich, and the line of the dress is incredibly flattering. I've never received more compliments! I wish I could buy this dress - genuinely haven't felt this pretty in years!

I am a true 6 in Kate Spade, wasn't available so rented the 4........ it was TIGHT. But still wearable. 6 would have been more comfortable. But, love the color, love the shape, got compliments all night.
Love the design and color of the dress, but fit is weird, runs super small in the chest area and normal sizing in the waist area.

links_Review_Title: Great color, kept cool in Southern heat
links_Review_Text: Got tons of compliments on this dress and it was super easy and cool in the Southern heat. Really comfy overall. I wore it to a work dinner and concert and it was great. Just be sure to adjust the straps so they don't fall off your shoulders!

pros: + amazing color + love the cut out + ties + shape of the top + holds you in on top cons: - wrinkles as soon as you look at it - odd length, wish it was an inch shorter - Kate Spade zippers are THE WORST and this one is on the side; had to lay down to zip it and pulled a muscle in my neck - runs a bit small if you have a wide ribcage; I don't have boobs and this was tight. loved this dress but I'd never pay full price for Kate Spade because their zippers are awful. RTR should do extra quality control on this brand.

Ok, so I normally wear a 4, but only a 2 was available! So, I SQUOZE into the 2, lol! It was very tight at the top (obvi a size too small for me) but perfect in the skirt. No bra, no Spanx - easy to wear. Hey, it worked! Received numerous compliments. $80 rental for a $428 dress!

A fun dress for my sister's luau engagement party. Fit was amazing, loved the pockets! And the bright green color was great! No bra needed which is the only way I could have worn it. There's no room for a bra . The cut out in front was barely visible.

links_Review_Title: Green dream, but tight in the bust
links_Review_Text: I love the dress, though it wasn't a perfect fit. It was too tight across my chest which made it a bit uncomfortable and also way too hot in the NYC summer heat.
Very striking dress that flatters- the cutout looks edgy but barely shows skin. Pretty and easy to wear

I ended up liking this dress a lot more than I thought I would. I almost didn't even wear it because I'm a bit busty and this dress did not especially cover that area as much as I would have usually liked. I am typically between a 12 and 14 and am glad I went with the 14 for the chest, but it resulted in the waist being a touch loose but that was okay. Very comfortable on a hot day outside, and the color was fantastic. Got multiple compliments from total strangers just as they were walking by. One thing to note, with the cutout, if you are busy, you wont be able to pull it up much higher without worrying about what you're showing through that. Overall it was great, and I'm sure I will get it again before summer is over. Perfect vacation dress.

I felt so good in this. Loose bottom half is forgiving for pear shaped folks. Fabric is a silk cotton blend that is gorgeous! Only warning is that it light night work for those with larger busts. I'm a 36B-C and the 12 was snug on top.
Long straps, tight in the chest with no stretch. Couldn't make it work unfortunately, but it's so cute!!

Wore to a casual wedding at an art gallery. I'm pretty consistently a 0 and was nervous about getting the 2, but it ended up fitting perfectly! The color is bold and looks true to the picture. The buttons and bows are super cute details. Straps are adjustable. Only complaint was that the cotton material wrinkled easily.

Got so many compliments. The color is gorgeous and it was a perfect summer dress. Only trouble is the straps would not stay shortened to where you adjusted them and kept falling down. More of a nuisance than anything. Still loved the dress.
Wanted to love this dress but it was soooooooo right in the busy area which made my chest look even bigger. I was very self conscious. Maybe sizing up would solve this.

links_Review_Title: Love it. It is very cute for summer date nights.
links_Review_Text: I really like the tie details. It helped make it a bit tighter which was nice. The buttons on the front don't actually button there is a side zipper. The straps are adjustable which helped with keeping them up. The length hit me mid calf and I am 6ft tall. So great for tall ladies. Love this dress.

This dress is perfect. I wore it to a casual outdoor wedding. I received countless compliments on this dress, even from the bride's mother! The green is bright and vibrant, a shade that would look good on anyone. The cut out is flirty without being too sexy. The pockets are deep enough to carry your phone, so no need carrying a purse and taking away from the fun details of the dress. I would definitely rent this dress again!
The dress and the color is beautiful. I wore it only once but just bc it was running big on the top. I will definitely rent a size smaller and keep wearing it bc it's one of my favorites.

links_Review_Title: Cute but TIIIIGHT in the Bust
links_Review_Text: Loved the shape and color of this dress but it ran super small in the bust. I'm typically a 14 in dresses. Sometimes Kate Spade dresses are tight in the bust so I occasionally size up depending on the shape of the dress and what RTR has available and I have never had a problem with a 16. This was a real problem. There was no hope in closing the side zipper whatsoever. I'm a 38D/DD for reference. If you have a more narrow rib cage, fit shouldn't be a problem.

links_Review_Title: Unique Dress! Best for women with small chests
links_Review_Text: I was sold on the color, designer and skirt of the dress. The top showed a lot of cleavage and underboob for me. If you wear an A or B cup you should be fine. I ended up wearing a white crop top under it. I also found it a little hot around my legs.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress! Great color but didn't fit.
links_Review_Text: I'm normally a size 6 in a top. The dress zipped but was way to tight for me to wear. My bust size is 34C/D. Tried it on without a bra.
Cute dress, nice fabric that has a sheen to it but runs a little small in the bust. Beautiful vibrant green.
Beautiful color. But too small to wear.
Fot like a glove

Loved this dress! The fabric stretched a lot, but it was the perfect fit! I was able to wear a normal bra and spanx with no problem, which I loved! I usually wear a 6 and float between small and medium...the 2r was great.

I actually chose this as my backup dress! Red is a bit outside my comfort zone but once I put the dress on, I knew it was perfect! Shows every curve ( or lump ) for sure! Don't wear this dress if you want to fly under the radar!
Fit great! I wore for a gala in February. I wanted to be warm. The material was thick but not constricting. I got both sizes but never tried on the 2r. The 3r was perfect!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful Dress for a cool winter night
links_Review_Text: The dress fit snugged but shapes my body perfectly. The sleeves were a little tight but I hold some weight in my upper arms. Overall I loved the dress and felt great in it!
It is tight and a challenge to get on. But it is perfect on. No shapewear needed. It did ride up a bit and the fabric is not soft or comfortable. Perfect for a romantic dinner.

links_Review_Title: This dress fit like a true glove.
links_Review_Text: It made me feel and look great for my family pictures. It fit like a glove in all of the right places. It was sexy and did not cut too low. Perfect dress for any occasion

links_Review_Title: Great dress for a winter birthday!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful red dress with thick, form fitting fabric. Was warm all night even in February in Washington state! I received compliments all night!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a winter wedding!
links_Review_Text: This dress was exactly what I was looking for! It's super sexy, and stretchy so I felt so comfortable too. The material was so thick so it kept me warm. Shapewear is definitely needed, but this dress looks good on every body type.

Warm, forgiving and smooth material. My only suggestion would be to ensure you wear smaller/unpadded bras with the dress to make sure your chest isn't too large for the way the mesh falls under the bodice. Luckily, it worked out great for my size and shape. Sleeves were great, neckline wasn't too low but the shape of it made me feel so sexy!

Great for hourglass figures. Very curve hugging and warm. Material can be constructing so if you get hot easily might not be for you. Great material very well made. Hard to tell but slightly see through in midsection but could still wear shape wear inconspicuously. Definitely a statement piece.

I loved this dress. The color was perfect for the Christmas themed wedding I was attending. I ordered a 0R and 1R. I found that it ran a little small and went with the 1R. The wedding was a family event and the neckline was extremely low. It would have been sexy for date night but I added a bralette for modesty for this occasion.
Sexy, but need a cami to wear to work because it's low cut. Thick fabric is very elastic. Good for cold weather

This is a body con dress. It's much more bright Chinese red than what I imagined. At first when I opened it up I was disappointed in the color, I thought it would be darker. My husbands jaw dropped when I put this dress on. It slides up when you walk, but because of the thick fabric it's easy to push back down from the waist. I wore shape wear and boob tape, I got compliments all night for my bday! I felt very sexy and glam!

This was an amazing fit. Snugs and hugs in all the right places. Red is such a vibrant color. Matches nearly all skin tones. However the weather in Vegas did not permit for the pairing of the faux fur, but that jacket is spectacular and I'd rent or offer to purchase!

Very fitted and thick warm material but not very forgiving. If I could I would have gone a size up but it was out of stock. Overall happy with the fit and would recommend. Got a 1R sleeves were long and so was the dress (as expected) make sure to pair with tall heels and not the best choice if you're really short.
I really liked this dress. Thicker material, very stretchy and hugs all your curves. Long sleeves which as a tall girl I appreciated.

This dress accentuates your curves, and it is very flattering. I didn't need to wear support garments underneath. It was also nice and warm for cool spring nights. My boyfriend loved it, so I bought it. I'm sure I will get a lot of use out of it.

I saw this dress worked for many reviewers. I was very hopeful and ordered this for a night out. I could barely get the dress on. And once I did it found every ounce of fat on my body and I looked 5 months pregnant. I did not wear this dress and was disappointed it didn't work for me. Even though I ordered a larger size, I wasn't comfortable enough to wear it. It has worked for some, just not for me.

Loved the color, the fabric. Definitely form fitting and super sexy. I'm normally a 4, but this dress ran a bit small in the hip area. But I will try to get it again for another night out and will be sizing up!

links_Review_Title: Wore this for Valentine's Day to surprise my hubby.
links_Review_Text: Hubby and I have a new 3-month old so wearing this bodycon dress to surprise him on Valentine's Day was a gift in itself. This dress hugged my curves and strangers were even coming up to tell me I looked stunning. This dress made this new mom feel like a million bucks! It was perfect for the occasion.
Hubby loved the dress. Very comfortable and form fitting. I’m 5’7 and 145 pounds and wore the 3r
This dress. You want to feel like a bombshell, rent this.
I loved the thick fabric of this- it was very form fitting but figure flattering as it sucked you in. I loved the combination of the fit and midi length.
Beautiful dress but runs small, need to go up a size.

links_Review_Title: Runs WAY small and low cut, undergarments are a challenge with this!
