links_Review_Text: After reading reviews I can't agree more its VERY small. Shapewear lines will show up as well unfortunately. It's not super obvious from the pictures but there are sheer panels on the dress.
Dress runs small, I was too short wasted for the fit, one of my friends with a long waste would have carried this dress much better than me with the three stripes around the rib cage.
Paired it with a leather moto jacket and looked very rock and roll. Loved it!

Very sexy body-hugging dress--clings to curves so you'll need shape wear but the material is thick and holds you in nicely. One thing that isn't really clear from the photos is that the lines around the waist are sort of sheer, not completely see through but not opaque either. Nice length, conservative cut except for the very deep v neck.

links_Review_Title: Item never arrived but customer service was very helpful and agreed to issue a refund right away. TY
links_Review_Text: Maybe better luck next time

links_Review_Title: Big hit at my Christmas Party!
links_Review_Text: Flattering, standout but not overtly sexy. Perfect for my work party

I nearly broke my shoulders trying to get this on. I'm exaggerating but you get my point. This really hurt to try to get on so I said no. May try a 2 in the future as the fabric/style is lovely. Recommend just size up for sure.

links_Review_Title: was a cute dress needed a bigger size
links_Review_Text: This is super cute fitted dress would not recommend for wedding very low cut boobs wanted to pop out

The print is so beautiful and the fabric is soft. The dropped waist is flattering if your are a tall girl. I wore ir for a Christmas Eve dinner and it was perfect. I wore a white platform sandal and it gave it more of a casual look but it can be easily dressed up.

This dress fit perfectly!! And I loved it! I ordered it for a work conference and wore it with a denim jacket and it was super cute. I then went on vacation, and decided to bring it with me and wore it out to sunset cocktails and dinner. Loved it for both occasions!
Bright colors, flattering and comfortable

I loved the print of this dress. Although it could have easily been dressed up for a fancy event, I dressed it way down with cowboy boots and a jean jacket to wear to a country concert. It's very comfortable, flirty, feminine. My only complaint is that the straps are not adjustable and it fell too low on my chest- I kept having to pull it up all night.

Really fun, light weight floral dress. Made out of a beautiful material and bound to get a ton of compliments! Perfect for late spring, all summer, and early fall. Wore this with flats to run errands one day and dinner with my mom, and to a musical. The straps a bit long like everyone says but I am 5'10 and they worked fine. My measurements are 36, 29, 41 and I could have worn the 6 as well.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for a summer or early September wedding!!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress and received compliments all night. Only problem is it's a little tight around the chest area and the straps are not adjustable (they were a little too big for me) but other than that great rental for a wedding!
Super fun! Bit snug in the hips but I wouldn't size up because it looked good fitted. The straps are way too long though.

Like all saloni dresses this one is made from high quality fabric and has beautiful colors. Ran large in the chest and straps were a little long and slipped without a big bust to hold them up ;) still loved it!

links_Review_Title: Lovely feminine, springy, easy to wear
links_Review_Text: The only downside was the straps. I felt the should be adjusted tighter so I would have less "Cleve" but they didn't so I found myself pulling them up all night. Otherwise it's really a very pretty dress, falls nicely mid calf on my 5'4" frame. Perfect for an outdoor springtime event.
Super comfortable and flattering. I sized down and the dress was perfect.

I love the colors in this dress. It is so comfortable. The straps run a little long. The slip underneath make sure to always check that it is pulled all the way down. It can creep up a little while walking! Would rent again!
The floral print is pretty. The straps are a little long and not adjustable. Not the best dress for large chest women. I put a body suit on to wear to work.
I loved this dress- it was bright, elegant, and comfortable. It was a little large up top but that always happens to me so I just wore a push up strapless bra.

links_Review_Title: Very bright and pretty, straps fell and had a little gap around the bust
links_Review_Text: I got a lot of compliments on the dress. The straps didn't stay on my shoulders very well, and there is a weird bubble gap thing around the bust area. Cons aren't enough to keep me from renting it again, it was very comfortable. I'm 5'7 and 167lbs.

links_Review_Title: Beautifully flows but really long straps
links_Review_Text: Fit well everywhere except straps are super long. I used a bra strap clip to secure the straps and it worked really well. Gorgeous and light fabric.
Perfect dress for a fun night on vacation. I thought it ran big. I usually wear a 10 and an 8 would have worked better. Compliments all night on its beauty! Easy and comfortable to wear.

This dress has a beautiful flattering fit. The print is very bright and lovely I wore to a polo match and party. My only complaint is that the straps are not adjustable so it hung a bit low for me, which was showing more cleavage than I normally would.

links_Review_Title: Felt wonderful in this comfortable yet beautiful dress.
links_Review_Text: The dress fit perfect save for the straps were a bit long so I just pinned them. Other than that the fabric, style and pattern were beautiful and I received many compliments.

This dress is beautiful, colorful, and fit me to perfection in size 6. The material is light and airy and I really enjoyed wearing it. I was tempted to buy this dress because my husband loved it on me but the straps fell down a lot throughout the night. I almost regret not buying it but that was the reason I didn't. Perfect for vacation!

links_Review_Title: Pretty dress but the straps were really long and not adjustable
links_Review_Text: Loved the bright colors in this dress and the fit. The only issue was that the straps on the dress were way too long and not adjustable.
I usually wear a 4 but the 2 felt great and was really flattering.
Great Summer Dress

I wanted this dress to work, but it just didn't. The bust was off. If the straps had adjustments it would have been perfect. It seemed like there was too much material in the bust so the material sagged. The color and the rest of the dress was perfect! Sadly, I did not wear.

Overall, really liked the dress. The straps were too long like other reviewers noted so I came prepared with safety pins. It didn't wrinkle, held it's shape and was flattering for the shape. The print was stunning!

Fit well- I'm 36C and was able to wear with a strapless bra-- everything stayed in place. Fabric is silk but hung a little bit droopily like rayon. Colors are gorgeous IRL - easily could've worn as a sundress for more casual look. Great for summer wedding with strappy sandals.

This dress is so pretty! The colors are vibrant! I received many compliments through out the night. It fits tight in the waist, which I like to give more shape. The straps are a little long, but it still worked with a little double sided tape.

The print of this dress reminds me of a fruit salad (and I mean that as the utmost praise...kiwi green is natural and lovely!) - so pretty. The length concerned me but ended up fine for my 5'4" frame. I wore with chunky fuchsia sandals for an afternoon party but could easily glam this up for evening; would be divine for a summer wedding. The fit was large all around for upper body but I used a small safety pin in the back (gathered at zipper) and all was good. Will absolutely rent again next summer!
nice dress - it was just a little big so didn't work at all.
Beautiful maxi sun dress!

links_Review_Title: Very pretty but not a good fit for me.
links_Review_Text: Beautiful fabric, but for me, it was a bit large in the chest and straps and a bit small in the rib cage. Wish it had worked!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous - perfect when dressed down for work
links_Review_Text: I work a denim jacket over this to dress it down for work. I got so many compliments! As other reviewers mentioned, the lack of adjustable straps caused some issues -- they kept falling down because they were too long. It wasn't too much of a problem for me though since I kept the jacket on all day. The fabric is flowy and comfortable; the print is gorgeous.
The size 8 was a perfect fit and the length was just as pictured online. The colors are vibrant and bright. Bodice fit well with a strapless bra.

links_Review_Title: Didn't wear it even though it was so pretty
links_Review_Text: Dress pattern is so pretty but fit around the chest was tight and looked puffy. Weird fit. Also, wish straps were adjustable, would've liked it a little longer.

links_Review_Title: Nice fit, received alot of compliments
links_Review_Text: fit true to size
Fits well. A bit snug in the bodice, but true to size. The straps are long as others have mentioned, but I would certainly rent again.

links_Review_Title: I could wear with heels or sandals and it still looked great.
links_Review_Text: Fitted around waist which was perfect, not too billowy, width of the straps was super flattering.
The dress fit to size, was fun for my event and comfortable. But, it was very low cut and I needed to wear my jean jacket to cover up.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress that can be dressed up or down.
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly and was a good length.

links_Review_Title: Great fit and looked brand new!
links_Review_Text: The dress easily accommodated a strapless bra. I recommend a short slip to keep the lining from riding up. It was so comfortable and easy to wear. I received tons of compliments on it.
I received a lot of compliments. I wore a jean jacket over this for an everyday work look. My only challenge was that the straps were too long and kept sliding down.

links_Review_Title: Wore this for my 50th birthday party, and got so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fit was true to size, I'm 5'5 and 125 pounds. Paired it with RTR black sequin pants for a fantastic party outfit.
This shirt did not disappoint! I received compliments from both men and women. Would definitely rent this again!
Nice fit and appropriate

links_Review_Title: Loved this, super classy and versatile
links_Review_Text: Great fit. On the more fitted side. Looks expensive. Wore with a leather skirt.
This dress is so comfortable and airy and chic. Rented twice and can be dressed up or dressed down
Mara Hoffman does it again! I loved this dress. Definitely oversized, the sleeves are long and wide, and it was full length on me. But the pockets and tie detail are so fun.
Elegant and easy to wear! Lots of compliments!!
This dress is a dream. Soft and cut to flatter. It runs pretty big, though. I'm normally a 20, but rented an 18 and it still fit a bit loose.

Yep - that is what my husband called me so I had to do the hair, too. As far as the dress it is pretty but a bit sister wife. It is comfortable and pretty good for hot weather. It seems like this is something you would wear if you needed to be modestly dressed.

I have to admit this dress DOES make me want to go wade down in the water a bit, but it's just such a well-constructed piece that I think the details saved it. The tie at the waist is very flattering and I love the balloon sleeves. Would definitely recommend!

I love this dress and want to wear it everyday! Fits like a dream- no need to even unzip: just pop over, tie and go! I wore this for a weekend trip and loved it so much I toned it up a notch for work on a 90degree day. Love it.

I never thought I could feel so great wearing an all white dress. The cut of it it is so versatile and it has great pockets. The neckline is a nice v neck. The tie can be tied in front or back. It's kind of see through so I put on nude foundation pieces. Love this dress soo much !!!

In terms of size, this runs large-ish and is forgiving - I do usually wear a zero or a 2 (the latter if it’s tight in the hips, which this is not) but although there is no stretch, with the ties untied there is a ton of extra space, and then you can tie it in front as shown, or in back if you prefer to whatever snugness you want. I liked it in front as I found it too plain without the front bow. It’s a great, basic dress, covers you up but is cool - perfect for a spring vacation in a city which is what I got it for. Very flattering because the tie can be made snug to show off the waist - my bag is rumpling the dress on the side in my picture making it look lumpy but it is super flattering. Roomy pockets are a plus. Fabric is not super light, but the cut feels breezy and somewhat seasonless.
Very comfortable but made me look large. The fabric is great but the shape of the dress is not very flattering.

Mara Hoffman is here to stay in my wardrobe. This dress was so breathable and I got plenty of compliments. Although the model wears it with the straps tied in the front, I'm petite and ties it in the back to cinch my waist a little.
Felt so chic and classic in this structures sun dress. I don't know if I'll ever be able to give it back!

This dress is cotton so it was light and airy! I wore it to church and then straight to a large (very hot) car show and had that perfect "not trying" but still "sooo beautiful" look going on! I'll definitely rent again

I did really like this dress, but it made me think of Mormon undergarments. I don't think that's necessarily a bad thing. It's just very plain. It fits as expected and the material is great for a baptism.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for springtime in the desert
links_Review_Text: I brought this dress with me as a backup option on a trip to Palm Springs and I ended up wearing it three nights in a row! It was perfect for the evening when the desert was just starting to cool off. The tie detail at the waist was flattering, and at 5'6" the hem hit me at the perfect midi length.
Great fit, lightweight fabric and beautifully crafted.
Very stylish, but definitely requires either a slip or another layer underneath if you aren't keen on your underwear showing through this dress.
Neck is lower than you might think. Beautiful fit.

I sized up, because I adored the way this dress looked and wanted to try it (wasn't available in my size). Sizing up wasn't smart, it looked voluminous! It's fairly long, but really fun to style. The neckline is lovely, makes all the difference

I loved this dress. I wore it for a work event luncheon type of thing and got a ton of compliments on it. I ordered a size 6 bc it was the only one available but I think I could've worn a 4 but because of the tie in the front, the 6 wasn't an issue for me at all. I think the tie lets it be flexible in sizing if they're out of your size. I paired it with pink kitten heels and it worked perfectly. It was effortlessly chic and very comfortable. It's very flattering and a great length. It doesn't look quite right in flats but heels look fabulous with it. It also isn't sheer either which was a relief. The sleeves are a little tight where they cuff but that's my only complaint. It was a great dress and I'd totally wear it again.

I was super excited to take this on vacation. The pics and reviews online looked great. I, however, looked like a pilgrim in this dress; it was frumpy and unflattering. I should have sized down, but I'm not sure that would have solved all.
Dress had ill fitting collar, it was see through and the fabric was very stuffy.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful way to stay cool in the summer!
links_Review_Text: I love this dress! This is my second Mara Hoffman dress and I'm in love. It's long and flowy and cool to beat the NYC heat. I'm usually between a 4/6 but only the 6 was available and is definitely big. I can cinch it at the waist so it's still fitting, but next time I'll get a 4. RTR - buy more Mara Hoffman things please!

links_Review_Title: I really wanted to like it....
links_Review_Text: I could have worn it but it was just a lot of white fabric. Looked too cultish and not flattering. Also it arrived really wrinkled and it seamed like Way to much work to iron/steam for a dress I wasn't excited about. Fits true to size though!

links_Review_Title: I didn't wear it, I didn't love it once I got it home.
links_Review_Text: Didn't wear it.

links_Review_Title: I didn’t order this! Not formal like pajamas from little house on the prairie no backup dresses!
links_Review_Text: Like a moomoo

links_Review_Title: Cute but came not ready to wear
links_Review_Text: Super cute but came completely wrinkled!!! Looked like it had been sitting on the floor for awhile.
AWESOME
This fit really nicely and was very comfortable. My only complaint was that it was a little too low cut in the front even though I am quite large chested.
I wear a size 34DD and there was not enough room for my chest in this dress. Boobs ended up looking flat so I couldn't wear this out.

My husband thought I looked like a Laura Ingalls Wilder cosplayer, but I loved the fit and the style. Unfortunately it's pretty sheer (outline of the pocket and undies and the bra and or the slip sheer), and the V hit a little too low for my current slip. I loved it but didn't love it enough to buy a whole new slip just to wear it out of the house.
I didn't like the fit of this dress. I'm 5'4" so maybe I was too short since it hit me below tea length and not ankle length. I also didn't think it was very flattering.
This fit well and at 20 weeks pregnant I took my pre-pregnancy size. The tie sits nicely above the bump! Can be worn for casual days or summer nights.

I love this feminie dress by Mara Hoffman. Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going down for your back-up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection with comfortable room at the hips. It works great for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear a NuBra or strapless bra since it has a low neckline. At 4’8”, the length hit floor length on me and was sadly too long for me. I really wanted to love this dress, however, I found the bell sleeves to be overwhelming for my petite frame. The material is somewhat sheer so I highly recommend wearing a nude slip underneath. Overall this is a great summer look! Pair with wedges and a layered necklace to complete your outfit.

links_Review_Title: Definitely loved the fit--except it was longer than I thought. Fun dress.
links_Review_Text: Flattering but long. Was really good for the ever changing weather--long sleeves but not too hot.
Super cute for summer/spring. Only complaint was that it wasn't the most flattering. Kinda made my lower half look large.
Great Dress, Great Shape and white, but not very very see-through. Excellent Fit. Loving what this designer is doing.
I'm a petite (5'2), so it looks like a maxi dress on me. Also the balloon sleeve looks a bit exagerrated. 3 star for the nice fabric
This all white dress was way too much for me. It was too long and too white...I felt like a nurse! I usually love Mara Hoffman so I was very disapponted, I wouldnt rent this again

I absolutely LOVE this dress! I rented it for a warm weather vacation. It is extremely well-made and very flattering because of the tie in the back. I have a large chest (34F) and it wasn't too low-cut. I am normally a 6-8 and normally find that Mara Hoffman runs small, but this dress actually runs a touch large - the 6 fit me with a little room to spare. As other reviewers have noted, it is somewhat sheer, but that doesn't bother me because I will be wearing it over a swimsuit. Love this dress!
I rented this for a New Years Eve party on a cruise. It's super cute but soooo short! It's also very tight around the waist, so maybe size up?
It was super cute absolutely loved it. Complements all night.

links_Review_Title: I got this dress for a New Years party and bachelorette party. It was a home run. Runs small though.
links_Review_Text: I almost always wear the same size but for this dress I had to size up. The size 2 wouldn’t zip up over my rib cage. The 4 was perfect though. Extremely comfortable and flattering. This dress is fitted but is forgiving around the tummy so you can eat what you want, always a win for me. I highly recommend this dress.

links_Review_Title: Wore this dress to a fraternity formal!
links_Review_Text: Extremely flattering, a little short, lots of compliments :)
Wore this to my work holiday party. Fit true to size and a good length. Velvet is super soft and the way it's draped is flattering. Would recommend!
I wore this dress for a New Year's Eve party and absolutely loved it!! It looked so cute yet was very comfortable and easy to dance in.
Fit is great and true to size. Not too short for a formal dinner
Fits beautifully, especially for a short girl. Felt so glamorous all night, I would buy this dress to keep forever if I could!
Fit like a glove. No bra needed. Perfect for cold weather wedding.
It fit like a glove on my daughter. The pleating on her waist made her waist look smaller.
Dress is a perfect LBD with be a little extra touch with the front tie. I wore this to a fashion show. Great for any party or date night.
I loved this dress! I sadly didn't get to wear it though because I didn't have time on my trip. Would absolutely rent again for another occasion or a date night!

links_Review_Title: Compliments all night (and oh so soft!)
links_Review_Text: This dress can seriously span any occasion. I wore this for a birthday dinner but you could easily have this be super formal. It's SO so so soft and comfortable, too! Would highly suggest going up a size as this runs small, but beyond worth it!
I got so many compliments on this dress. It was gorgeous!! I was able to move so freely in it because it was SO comfortable. So great for dancing and I loved that the straps were adjustable!!

Love this dress, it's so cute, love velvet, love the bow, but it's just not cut for tall women. It was about the length of a tanktop on me. Also runs a little snug in the ribs/chest. If you're between sizes, definitely size up!

links_Review_Title: Rented for a work christmas party- I found the dress to be very comfortable and super flattering.
links_Review_Text: The bow detailing was adorable and the dress gives you a great hourglass shape. I had issues with the zipper where it would always catch in the same place.
A little tight on the top

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but not for those over a C cup
links_Review_Text: This dress has a side zip, which always means to size up if you are in between sizes. There is no give or stretch and the top was quite tight on my chest while the bottom was very flowy and bigger. Beautiful dress if I wasn't so busty and I could wear my actual size. Great holiday dress as well!

links_Review_Title: My dress gave me extra confidence and I received many compliments!
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! I wanted a black cocktail dress and this one was very pretty. However, I did find that the zipper was a little difficult and the top part of the dress sort of flared outwards (this may be because of my smaller bust). Overall, I liked this dress and would rent from this website again!

When I saw this dress online, I immediately fell in love. When I opened my RTR package it looked longer than most blouses I own. Not only was it short but I couldn't get the zipper to. Definitely size up if you have any curves. I'm typically a size 6 and probably could have used a 10.
This dress was great material, sexy, and would have been great! They didn’t have a 12 so I order a ten with fingers crossed... my but was just too big!

Rented this dress for a fall wedding. I'm usually a size 4, however it was too big up top so I went with the size 2. It was comfortable, however I had to keep my arms down the entire time because there was so much extra fabric at the top. Don't think I'd recommend if you plan on a night of dancing.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress that runs very small
links_Review_Text: This dress has a side zipper, so if you are busty like me (34DD) but typically wear a 0 or 2, you will be able to zip up to your waist but once you get to your chest - forget about it. It also seemed extremely short, and I am only 5'1 so I recommend sizing up. I may try to order this again in the future in a bigger size.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, runs a little small
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress but i didn’t end up wearing it because it was too much skin for an event with Coworkers. It runs a little snug so I went up one size more than normal- still snug but zipped fine and the thicker velvet material really ended up synching me in so I felt good. I would totally wear for a fancy datebook night or birthday party in the future.
Wore this to my anniversary dinner and felt classy yet sexy in it. I'm 5'5 and about 105lbs, size 0 was perfect on me. Would definitely rent again.

Note that this is a very thick sweater dress with not a ton of stretch. I sized down to an XS so it would be more form fitting. Very comfortable and chic! You have to wear a strapless bra due to the cutouts.

This dress isn't just comfortable, it's like wearing a blanket if sexy love. The cut is flattering, the fit is fabulous and the cut-out turtleneck top looks amazing in Zoom meetings when working from home. I got compliments throughout the day from colleagues working from home in less interesting clothing. Will rent again!

links_Review_Title: Classy sweater dress, easy to wear
links_Review_Text: The thick material of this sweater dress made it warm, clingy but relatively forgiving (spanks may help over tummy). Classy lines. Simple but high quality.

links_Review_Title: fit was so comfortable and look was really stylish
links_Review_Text: loved everything about this dress. it was comfortable and form fitting but not constricting. the material was thick but not heavy. loved it

links_Review_Title: This is a really hot but conservative dress.
links_Review_Text: The A-line design of the dress slims the waist. The cutouts at the shoulder give it some serious flavor and a hint of sexiness. It runs true to size with lots of stretch. It's a heavy dress for cooler days.

links_Review_Title: I was the best dressed at the show.
links_Review_Text: Loved the thickness which was perfect for the winter weather. You will fill awesome because it is very slimming.

links_Review_Title: Fits like a glove! Love the cutouts
links_Review_Text: Such a flattering dress and will definitely keep you warm, despite the cutouts on the collarbone, which require you wear a strapless bra. It was super comfortable and I got loads of compliments. Will definitely rent again if the need arises!

links_Review_Title: My birthday was spent in quarantine during COVID-19 & I ordered this dress to make it feel special!
links_Review_Text: Fit was great. True to size. Loved it!

links_Review_Title: Super flattering goth fairy dream come true!
links_Review_Text: I wore this to be a bridesmaid, and I absolutely loved it. It was chic and feminine but still had that little edge that made me feel like I wasn't a pod person. Was told by many wedding guests that when the light hit the dress as I walked down the aisle, it looked amazing. I have a full bust and the dress was too tight to wear a strapless bra underneath, but it worked totally fine going braless; if you have a smaller chest, you should have plenty of room for a bra. To my eye the sparkle was more champagne/pale gold than silver, which I preferred anyway. Only complaint was the straps didn't stay up, especially while dancing, but otherwise absolutely loved this dress!

Beautiful romantic dress for formal affair. I wore this for a black tie wedding because it was so long on me (I'm 5"3). Tulle is a little itchy on chest. Good for busty women with small waist and assuming for both short/tall women.
This dress is so beautiful. It's comfortable, a little roomy up top, but great for a swirl on the dance floor. I felt very old Hollywood in it- very classy indeed.

I love a theme so when I had tickets to attend the Music of Star Wars live at the symphony - I couldn't pass up this perfect piece. I am not entirely sure how I ended up with a 2- it was too small in the chest and arm straps were very uncomfortable for me (usually 4/6) so be aware of you are larger chested or broad shouldered. But the dress itself was delightful and A sheer delight to spin in. Hard to catch the details in photos but overall another stunning piece from MN.

Loved this dress! Ordered the 6 (my usual size) and the dress fit perfectly in the waist. The bust was a little snug, so I had to wear no bra in order for it to zip up but thankfully the cups are lined so it made it possible to go brakes. Since the busy was snug the under arm area was a little scratchy, but it wasn't bad. Next time I would do a size 8 for more comfort up top.

links_Review_Title: Great fit, received compliments all night!
links_Review_Text: RTR sent me this dress when the original dress I ordered couldn't be shipped on time. They sent it because it was a "similar style", and I thought I would hate it based on the pictures. When it arrived I figured I'd still try it on and I LOVED IT! I wore a size down than I normally wear (which I recommend) and although the waist was tight the straps would've been way too long in my normal size. The sparkles are gold in person, not silver, and not at all over the top. Highly recommend!!

...that I thought it was planned "let's all love Stephanie's dress." Very comfortable, no pinching, no itching. I didn't have the strap problem some described. I wore with vintage rhinestone choker and earrings and it was just what I hoped for. Fun!

I received so many compliments on this dress when I wore it for a jazz concert on NYE at the Kennedy Center. It was comfortable, dazzling, and had my boobs looking fantastic!! Definitely renting again!

Super classic, feminine, and fun! It overall runs large, and the other ladies aren't wrong-- there's SO much room for boobs. I wore my biggest push up with cutlets to make the top look slightly filled out 🙄. Size down if you can!
This dress is phenomenal! The shape, length, design, everything is perfect! I rented both the 12 and 14 and the 14 just ended up being a little more comfortable even though I usually am a 12.

links_Review_Title: It was for my 60th Birthday and this Dress Was beautiful!!!!
links_Review_Text: Loved the dress, it was just what I wanted !!

Wore this to my company holiday party. Added a thin turtleneck under it to make it more work appropriate and warm. I got this in a 12R but I could have worn a 10. The straps and bust area were a tad big.

links_Review_Title: Just the right amount of sparkle
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress. I wore it it to a company Christmas party. The straps were a touch long but if I kept good posture it fit well and there was no gapping in the front. I liked that there were breast cups so I did not have to wear a bra and worry about straps. I would rent again. Tons of compliments.

I truly love this dress and would buy it if it wasn't $700! It is a classic silhouette but the tulle and sparkles make you feel like a fairy floating around the dance floor. The dress was pretty true to size but was a little tight in the chest for me. Im a size 36c and wore the 10. Luckily the top is thick and even had light pads in the chest area so I was able to go without a bra. Felt very secure and comfortable even when dancing. Love love love

I wore this for a New Orleans wedding. True to size and the only thing that didn't fit well was the straps. I have a short torso so the straps were too long and kept falling down. Otherwise this dress was perfect! I loved that it's between cocktail and black tie.

This is such a beautiful dress. The tulle is so fun for twirling, and the starry print is sparkly without being over the top. The silhouette is incredibly flattering and the bust has built in cups so you can go without a bra. This was the perfect dress for a grad school formal at the holidays.

I loved this dress! I wore it for a special occasion and recieved so many compliments! It was a little loose in the chest but I am smaller than average for my size in that department. The tulle makes it an easy dress to wear (no wrinkles)! 10/10 recommend!

This dress is absolutely beautiful and made me feel like a princess all night! The only thing is that the bust is a little big if you have a small chest. Overall this dress is perfect for a night wedding!

links_Review_Title: This dress is even prettier in person!
links_Review_Text: I wore this for a fly me to the moon themed charity event that I co-hosted. I got compliments all night long, the dress has a lot of gold glitter and little details that the light catches beautifully. I would definitely recommend this dress!

links_Review_Title: Love it worn with a jacket
links_Review_Text: Runs true to size. Didn't fill in the top part but that's because I'm only a 85b. Beautiful fabric. Leaves glitter everywhere (no big deal). Needed to gently iron it before wearing it as the bottom part was completely wrinkled.

I'm a pretty standard size 4, but the size 4 in this dress was too big in the chest and shoulder straps. The size 2 was still a bit loose in the chest, but that's more on me than the dress if you know what I mean (thanks, bra inserts!). The dress is really gorgeous, comfortable, and fun to twirl in. It's simultaneously whimsical and classic. I felt like a mystical princess of the night.
Unbelievable gown!! Fabric was so comfortable, tulle was elegant and I felt like a dream all night! Seriously every woman should rent!
I have never received so many compliments on a dress! I wore this for a formal wedding, and I'm a sea of plain, black dresses it really popped! I wish I had another reason to rent this again!!
This dress was so comfortable to wear. I'm in between a 16 and 18 and this fit perfectly.

links_Review_Title: Wore for a Haloween Themed evening out.
links_Review_Text: Fit great, many compliments, tulle has fantastic gold sparkles and black velvet details. Was great for a halloween themed night out at Disney.

links_Review_Title: It was nice to play around.
links_Review_Text: This dress is perfect for an occasion such as halloween and looks very cute, but it does not look or feel like it's good quality. I wouldn't wear it to a wedding.

Wore this for a formal wedding in NYC. Fit really nicely- didn't have to wear a bra but the chest area also wasn't suffocating! Might not be as great for smaller busts in larger sizes. Details are gold but don't show up super obviously in photos.
The fit of this dress ran slightly big so I'd size down. Overall nice hint of sparkle but a great flattering fit if you just need a good lbd that makes you look and feel great!

links_Review_Title: Gold, not silver, not for petites
links_Review_Text: I had high hopes for this but it was really tight. Stars are gold not silver so if you go for this, plan accordingly (I ordered silver sparkly earrings that would have clashed). It's a really pretty high quality dress but I think my frame is too petite aka short. Like other reviews said the straps are long too and not adjustable so it's just couldn't work for me.

I'm very picky and this dress fit the bill. Fit was perfect and material was glam. I hate cheap material. My teen daughters said it was the prettiest dress and I had a lot of dresses to choose from. This could be a keeper. Feeling very Sarah Jessica Parker in it!

links_Review_Title: Great dress for opera -- tons of compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fits true to size, the fabric is amazing!
Gorgeous dress, but I should have sized up for it to work with my straight frame. Better on an hourglass or pear shape

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a festive holiday party!
links_Review_Text: This dress was absolutely beautiful. It fit perfectly and has just the right amount of sparkle. It was also perfectly appropriate to wear to a work holiday party. Very comfortable and secure too.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to a semi-formal evening winter wedding.
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect other than the shoulder straps. They were super far apart and I spent most of the night pulling them up. Other than that, very pretty dress!

links_Review_Title: What a princess feel and look! Just loved this!!!
links_Review_Text: The make of the dress is magnificent along with the look! If you love the style you will live this dress!
This dress is adorable - the top is fitted so you with your chest size, and the bottom is a full skirt and very forgiving. I could probably get away with one size down.

This is a beautiful dress that I hated to send back, but unfortunately the straps on the dress were a bit long for me. It was so low in the front that I couldn't find a bra that wouldn't show and also would have been very inappropriate for a business function. I would recommend ordering up a size if you carry weight in the middle. It also was a bit scratchy under the arms but so gorgeous it would have been worth it had the dress fit.

links_Review_Title: The torso is cut wide and boxy. The skirt is full so it's overwhelming if you're petite.
links_Review_Text: The torso is cut wide and boxy. The skirt is full so it's overwhelming if you're petite.

The dress is lovely. The only drawback was the straps. They were a little too long which made the bodice a bit loose, However, this was fixable,. It is a dress made for a slim person with breasts. I received many compliments.
Dress is pretty but not comfortable for a night of dancing. Runs small if you are curvy, get a size bigger than you would normally.
Perfect for a wedding, the slit makes it just edgy enough! Runs small, definitely size up!

As lots of others have mentioned, this dress runs very tight. I typically wear a 10 and I wore a 14 with panty hose and spanx on. Even then it was snug and I couldn't lift my arms to well, so it may not be for any dancing event. However, I was just going to a NYE dinner, so it worked out for that occasion! The slit is sexy and is a nice added detail to an otherwise standard LBD.

The dress is beautiful. A well crafted structured dress. It's nicely lined and the slit is a zipper edge. The slit however does not zip, one cannot adjust how high it is. Now, I am a standard hourglass, most 4s fit without a hitch. This dress was a squeeze to fit over my hips to get on and it fits a bit tight across my hips on. In the picture with the tights it only adds to the girth across my stomach and hips. I would size up.
This dress runs very small. However this is a great dress!!

I didn't end up wearing this dress, unfortunately. The event I was originally ordered this for was canceled due to COVID-19 so I never got to wear it out of the house. I did try on however and the dress does run small so I would need to size up. I normally wear a medium (10) or large (12) but this dress was still a little snug in a large.
The dress was beautiful and looked very well made, however, it was at least 3 sizes too small.

I wasn’t able to wear this dress because it was too tight in the hips. It fit great everywhere else. Unfortunately the next size up wasn’t available. I am concerned that the next size up would have been too big in the waist and the chest though.
Gorgeous. Runs small size up.
I ordered a size up and I still couldn't fit it over my hips. I don't have large hips at all. Order at least 2 sizes up... maybe more. Material had no give whatsoever.

links_Review_Title: Could not wear this dress... runs very small!
links_Review_Text: Unfortunately I wasn't able to wear this dress even with the other reviewers' advice to size up. My normal dress size is a 2/4 so I ordered a 4 and a 6. I couldn't get the dress over my thighs/butt! If only the zipper came down a little bit further, it probably would have fit just fine. The quality of the dress seemed great but it just didn't work out for me.

links_Review_Title: Unfortunately, I could not wear this dress!
links_Review_Text: This dress runs SMALL! I listened to the other reviews and ordered a size up, and it was still too tight. I usually wear a size 6, but I ordered an 8. It's a beautiful dress and supposed to be fitted but unfortunately, I could not wear it.

links_Review_Title: A little tight through the chest
links_Review_Text: I have slightly larger boobs, and could have worn this all night, but it would have been very uncomfortable. Felt a little like a straight jacket.

links_Review_Title: Stunning dress perfect for theater or party. Covers arms while revealing figure and legs
links_Review_Text: Very form fitting with thick material and sturdy zippers (I know bc I was packing on more lbs than I should have been and the zipper held!). This is a beautiful dress on.
I usually wear size 12 but this fit great in size 14. Split was a little longer then I would have liked but I worked around it.
I'm 5'0 and 108lbs and the dress couldn't get over my backside ◉︵◉ oh well I had a backup so all good :)
I love the dress and the material, but it was too small and wouldn't past my hips. There is not a lot of give.
Runs very small. Unable to wear. Couldn't get over my hips.
It looked like it would fit my wait but I couldn't get past my booty.
The dress fits like a very tight bodycon. However, I usually wear a size 4. The dress barely got over my chest. I would have to order a size 8 just to be able to get the dress over my hips.

links_Review_Title: Comfy, and the ties add drama!
links_Review_Text: Red velvet with pockets and a draped feminine neckline? Yes please. Fit me like a dream and was not too low cut for work. The dress is lined which is a really nice touch.

links_Review_Title: Great weight for winter, but you need to be tall.
links_Review_Text: I loved wearing this dress, it was warm and fun to walk around it, but it would have been much better if it was 5 or more inches taller it but me between my ankle and mid calf in a very matrian-ish way. It also doesn't photograph super well because it so dark and the sleeves are so voluminous, my waist line looked like it didn't exist in all the photos of the actual event.

links_Review_Title: Velvet. Pockets. Comfortable. Need I say more?!
links_Review_Text: This dress was hard to return, absolutely perfect and so flattering! I received so many compliments. So classy, yet comfortable. Who doesn't want a dress with pockets?!
Loved wearing this out in Gettysburg, PA. The dress is lined and warm for winter. Fits really nicely and has pockets, too! Perfect rental for a special occasion.

This dress was too voluminous on me. I am 5 ft 4, so between full skirt, large sleeves and a bow tie, i got lost in it. The quality is great. The color is deep and lustrous. It would be even better on a taller person.

I love this dress. It is warm and comfy and it feels expensive. The fabric is high end and gorgeous and the color is lovely. Also, this is a Black Halo dress that wasn't too small in the shoulders for me! Win! Only drawback is the zipper is odd in that it even with it this still has to go on over your head. But it's a minor quibble.
Fit like a glove ! Laid perfectly , super comfy , would wear again and again

Loved this dress, very flattering, and comfortable. Received compliments all night. The fabric is nice, heavy, thick velvet. The top has some stretch and there are pockets!! Will definitely rent again. The 8 fit, although the top was tight and the sleeves a little short, went with the 10 which fit perfectly.
Love this dress

I liked this dark red velvet and conservatively-cut Black Halo dress, though it was not super flattering on me. For reference, I am 5'4" and normally a size 6. I rented a 6R and the dress fit true to size. On my height, the dress came down to mid-calf, which was not a great length for me. I was, however, very warm in the dress, which was nice, as I wore it in a drafty cathedral. Overall, I would not rent this Black Halo again, as the dress seemed to swallow me up, though the color was absolutely gorgeous.

links_Review_Title: This would've worked for my event in a pinch but would've made for a snug, hot (temp-wise) night.
links_Review_Text: It was pretty snug in the bodice and was definitely velvet. The color is gorgeous but for someone who tends to run hot in crowds, I would've been real sweaty, real fast.

I'm a 12-14, and the 12 was tight through the bust/waist but still comfortable and flattering. I thought I looked nice in the dress, but I honestly couldn't believe how many compliments I got on the color/fabric and my overall look. And this from a group of relatives who normally never notice what I wear! I was nervous about this dress, so glad I took a chance on it. Was perfect with black tights and ankle boots.

Wish I had a photo! This dress is gorgeous! And pockets! Very comfortable soft velvet. I rented for valentines but wore to work. Everyone loved it. I rented a size down and it fit perfectly. I'm in between a 10 and 8.

links_Review_Title: this dress has pockets which make it pucker out at the hips where the pockets are.
links_Review_Text: pros- great color and fabric cons- pockets make my hips look wider

The fabric, fit, and overall style were perfection! I received so many compliments while wearing this - I was sad to send it back. I thought it ran a smidge small on the top but I also have a larger frame/rib cage.
Glad I sized up to an 8 from my usual 6. Very pretty, luxe & comfy. A lot of fabric with very full skirt.

The velvet material is heavy and soft (and very comfortable), and the color is spectacular. I didn't end up wearing it though because the pockets made the dress pouf out in a weird way that created the illusion of love handles. I really wanted to love it! It does run a little small, so I would order a size up for backup.
Wore this dress to a formal event and got a lot of compliments

links_Review_Title: Super soft, rich fabric with a vintage look!
links_Review_Text: I LOVED this rental- the dress fit beautifully and it was so so so soft! I felt like a million bucks. Bonus- it has pockets!

I ordered this and three other dresses as options for a formal event. I chose to wear one of the others because it was more formal than this one, but I love this dress so much I am keeping it! Fits like a glove and the fabric is rich and lovely. I'll be getting some compliments on this one, for sure!
I got the large long and it was so cute in downtown Las Vegas. Yes, it really is as cozy as pajamas. I definitely bought it and have no regrets. Love!!!

This was the perfect jumpsuit for the 70's themed party I attended. The fit was very comfortable, as others have said, no bra is needed, but I did opt to add a ton of fun jewelry to camouflage the deep v a bit. I'm 5'6 and chose the regular length but should have worn the long. I'd say it is a little short. Ignore the comfortable clog look, I was dancing all night lol. You will not be disappointed with this outfit!
I got so many compliments on this romper. It fits true to size and the petite wasn't too long on me, but I definitely needed a heel boot. It is a tad sheer so I recommend wearing in the night time

links_Review_Title: A little long but I'm short
links_Review_Text: The material is great and definitely fit me perfectly but I did find that for the legs it was very long. I had to wear super high heels and it still drive to the floor. But I am also only 5 foot so that is probably why! Still it looks great!

links_Review_Title: The best jumpsuit I've ever worn
links_Review_Text: LOVED this jumpsuit. It fits like a glove and is so comfortable. A lot of plunging necklines don't stay put but this one doesn't expose you even when you move around. I ended up buying it.
Feels like pjs but ultra flattering
This jumpsuit is incredible. Fits like a glove, flattering in the right places, good quality, and beautiful! So many compliments. I felt like a queen.

This is the most perfect petite jumpsuit. I rented it for my birthday dinner and to make it a little more casual I wrapped the bow pieces and tied in the back. The length was perfect for me and it was super stretchy and comfortable. Will rent again.

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on this!
links_Review_Text: Feels like pajamas even though it looks fancy. Definitely Instagram worthy!

links_Review_Title: Fun, flirty, and a show stopper!
links_Review_Text: This jumpsuit is by far my favorite I've ever worn. Perfect for a party or special occasion. It was a head turner and very comfortable. It didn't even require a bra due to the fabric and pattern which I was very pleasantly surprised. I am considering buying this because I loved it so much!
Loved this jumpsuit!! Was super cozy and easy to get On and off... I got a lot of compliments saying I was the best dressed for the night! I wore to a NYE party! I would for sure rent again!

Stretchy but firm material, more sparkly than expected but it was okay. The small long was long enough to wear platform heels and still touch the ground. I'm 5'5" approx 130 and roughly 34c. The small long was perfect without being baggy.

links_Review_Title: Perfect fitting jumpsuit, received many compliments!
links_Review_Text: My daughter wore this for a fashion show, we're still getting people asking where to get the outfit!

Not usually one to wear tight clothes across my mid, but this was super flattering. Got tons of compliments and was perfect for NYE. I wore little (~3in) heels with it and am 5'8. Didn't have a highwaters issue. Very fun - highly recommend

I cannot rave about this jumpsuit enough!!! Wore it for a NYE's party and got a ton of compliments. The fabric is super stretchy and comfortable. It is sparkly but not in your face sparkles. A few things I think are important to know: this is a very form fitting jumpsuit and it will show off all of your assets, the v in the front is incredibly deep and I could not wear a bra with it so that does present some problems, and lastly it is quite long and could be an issue for some shorter ladies. Overall though I was a huge fan and would for sure rent again.

Wore this amazing jumpsuit on New Years and it was perfection! Extremely comfortable, like wearing PJs. I'm 5'2 and usually wear a size 2 and the small fit great. Obviously low cut but stayed in place. It's form fitting but wasn't super tight. Highly recommend!
Wore this for a 70s party and it was perfect! Received a lot of compliments!
A little sheer and if you want to wear heels I recommend the long length. Wore it out to the club, stayed in place and didn't tug on it all while dancing all night!
Runs pretty true to size, a little baggy in the arms. Got a lot of compliments and its more sparkly than I thought. Loved it!

This sparkly (comfy), curve hugging jumpsuit, is the answer to your prayers. I ordered a long because it was all that was available and I'm happy I did as the length with 2.5 inch heels was perfect. I opted to tie it around to the back which helped pair back the low neckline since I was attending a work holiday party. Still trying to come up with another excuse to rent this again.
This jumpsuit is fabulous for holiday parties! Easy to wear.
Feels like you're wearing pajamas, so comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Way too short for a tall gal, even in flats
links_Review_Text: This jumpsuit is beautiful and the perfect style for a party or night out. However, it's so short, there is no way that a tall woman can wear it, even in flats. I am 5'10 and even the Long versions were too short when barefoot. I think bellbottoms look cutest when the bottom slightly grazes the floor, and these pants were above my ankles without shoes on. Such a bummer but really made for short ladies!
This fit like a glove and was sexy and comfortable. I'm 5'4 and it was a little long with 3 in heels, though I wasn't tripping. Loved this!

links_Review_Title: I loved this jumpsuit! So comfortable and fun.
links_Review_Text: Ran true to size, but I'm 5'8 with a full bust and it ran slightly short on. Could have used a little extra length

links_Review_Title: Absolutely loved this and got many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fit was great! I am 5'8'' and wore 3" heels with the jumpsuit with no problems.

Wore this jumper for a New Years Eve house party and it was sooo amazing! Very comfortable and light weight. The bow in the front can be worn so many different ways. I actually wrapped the bow around me and tied it in the back.

If I were rich, I'd have a closet full of Hunter Bell. Because I'm not, I make sure to rent everything RTR carries. I wore this top in Paris and it was stunning. It won't fit under every jacket, but it's bold and amazing quality (reviewed by @mackinstyle)

This top looks better in person! High quality materials/design and very pretty siluotte when put on. It comes with a (non stretchy) cami to wear under. I just think it would look even better if my chest were smaller.
very unique
Loved this one! Can't decide if I want to buy or not!!!

I rented this for everyday and loved how it looked but the minute you move your arms you are instantly uncomfortable. The sleeves bunch up and are very tight at the ends. The neckline is also small so with certain movements it feels as if you have a choker on. Only wore once due to the fit but very flattering when worn.
Love the sleeves on this top. It is so pretty. Perfect for a special night out.
The fit was great and looked very polished. Great with jeans but could wear to work. I was worried ti was going to feel irritable but I enjoyed every part of this shirt! Would rent again
Cute and classic!
so cute!
Rented this for everyday wear at work but it was too tight around the neck & I felt like I was being choked. Super cute otherwise

links_Review_Title: LOVE this. Wearing it again it is so good!
links_Review_Text: fits TTS, great to wear with a midrise or high rise denim.
This dress was flattering and memorable. Really great for a night out on vacation. Definitely recommend trying it out!
Cute orange dress that looked very classy and high end, but also sexy

links_Review_Title: Like it was custom made for my body
links_Review_Text: Amazing dress, amazing color. Like several other reviewers I a) wore this in Miami and b) noticed that the zipper was an absolute beast to deal with. However, I loved how secure I felt without a bra- you can adjust the tie in front. Be careful in the wind because it will definitely fly up! But the cutouts hit in very flattering locations and it really makes you feel like you're wearing an extremely high end designer. I got compliments all evening, and the dress also photographs great.

I was planning to take this to San Diego for a vacation! Love love loved it. The fit was very flattering. I do have a small chest, but the tie at the top was super secure. I will definitely be renting it again!
Loved everything about this dress. The color was beautiful and fit was great. Perfect vacation outfit. If you are on the fence for sizing, I would size up.
This dress was so cute ! I loved the fit, it hugged my curves just right and looked great with a tan. I have a big bust and was able to wear it without a bra. True to size.
Gorgeous dress with a flattering fit and plunging neck line
This dress made me feel so confident and was perfect for my vacation to Miami! Got so many compliments and the fit was great.

Rented for a bachelorette party in Miami with a "Miami Chic" theme. I have very fair skin so was worried about the color, but it caught me by surprise. The cut out definitely gives it a somewhat "risqué" vibe, but it was balanced perfectly but the length of the dress. A standout for sure!

links_Review_Title: Very cool dress, but much baggier than I expected and the trickiest zipper you'll ever meet
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to a tropical brunch, and though I loved the mango vibe s, I was practically swimming in the heavy fabric that left little to be desired in the chest area. On top of that, the zipper was notoriously fickle and constantly opened when I leaned forward . The only reason I'm leaving a high review is because of how good it looked , but it is a high maintenance outfit

links_Review_Title: The color of the material everything about this outfit was spectacular!
links_Review_Text: If you're going on vacation and you want something super fun rent this piece!
Rented this dress for a Hawaiian vacation and loved it. The top runs big (I have a B cup), so would recommend sizing true to size or down

Without being too much much. The material of this dress is an odd choice it's like a business suit but oh well it classes up the cut. Very flattering! I am in between a 2/4 and went with the 4 and it fit perfect with a little extra room as to not have a muffin top ;)
I wore this for my engagement photos in Spain and it was such a fun piece! Comfortable and easy to move around in.

So I'm really not one to wear crop tops at all. This dress made me feel so comfortable because the openings are not around the stomach area, just the ribs. And it's so flattering on top you don't even need boobs. The material does not breathe, so wearing it in tropical weather was actually not a good idea. But the color is so stunning on olive/brown skin tones, it's worth trying out!!

This dress was really fun and sexy for my honeymoon in Mexico. At 5'5", I was a bit short for it to fit perfectly. Where the two pieces connect in the back folded over a bit because of this. Still really enjoyed wearing this! The ties on the bust fall in a way that covers any post-dinner bloat. Such a gorgeous, vibrant color!

This dress fits true to size, I was a little skeptical showing my stomach at a wedding but it was the perfect amount of skin. I received so many compliments and it was very comfortable the only thing you have to watch out is, is to make sure the top is tied tight so you don't have any slips. Love love!
This is the greatest dress I've ever worn. I got SO many compliments and literally cannot wait until I have something else to rent it for. Classy, but sexy and stylish. Rent this!!

I rented this for vacation in Mexico. Really loved the color and the tie up top, but the material was kind of weird. It was thick and a didn't really seem summery. Could have been prettier was if a more floaty material.

Such a statement. So many compliments. Wore in Brazil for a rehearsal dinner. The top stays in place once it's tied. I was worried about having to be careful it would come undone but it stayed tied tight all night. Couldn't get it to look good in a complete bow, so did a simple knot and it worked. The slit in the skirt is perfect and isn't too scandalous even on a windy beach.
This dress hit me in all the right places. I pinned the top so my boobs weren't out, but this dress might be my favorite rent so far. Hands down an incredible and memorable dress.

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect for a nice dinner on vacation!
links_Review_Text: I teeter between a 10 and a 12 and the 12 was perfect for me. It is high waisted and fits on the looser side from the waist down but since it is all one piece I never worried about it falling down. The top was adjustable so I was able to tighten or loosen the support as needed. I also received so many compliments from strangers while we were on vacation in Mexico! I absolutely loved this dress and highly recommend it!

This dress is DIVINE!!! I have completely fallen in love with it. I didn't expect it to be as flattering as it is. I am waiting for the size 2 to become available to try that because it is very roomy in the bottom half right now in the 4, but not unwearable!
Fit well, lots of compliments. I wore a swimsuit underneath, so it worked perfectly. I don't think I could have worn this for anything but a festival, though. The top was very breezy.
This dress is incredible it was absolutely a showstopper and totally luxurious material

links_Review_Title: Amazing outfit for a tropical vacation
links_Review_Text: This dress was definitely a show stopper - received so many compliments on the cut and especially the color! It does run large and I had already sized down once so will be sizing down twice the next time I rent.

This dress was totally terrific. It is very flattering as the tie that hangs + the draping on the lower half of the dress is very forgiving and hides any lower stomach bulges. Everyone loved that it looked like a 2 piece from the front. The color was bright and happy. I wore it with nude shoes to an engagement party.
I absolutely loved this dress! Got many compliments. Good for a wedding or night out. Super comfy!

links_Review_Title: Sexy dress that's just the right amount of classy
links_Review_Text: I wore this for a friend's 30th birthday party. I received so many compliments all night! The dress is sexy and fun and comfortable enough to allow me to dance. I paired it with nude heels and gold jewelry and felt great all night long. Only feedback is I have a bigger rib cage so they stuck out a bit in the cutouts but overall I loved the dress.
I got so many compliments! The color is beautiful and the fit is flattering. I would definitely rent again!
Super flattering for small busted girls. Forgiving mid and bottom section. Sexy
Very gorgeous color. I received so many compliments. I ended up pinning the chest area so I wasn't too exposed at work. Order 10 originally and had to size down to a 8 and still had room.
Fit was perfect for curvy girls. Top is a bit large if you are an A-cup so I paired with a sticky bra.
Too big.
Beautiful color but too large to fit just right!
Felt super chic and sexy in this. Perfect amount of skin showing for dinner out on vacation. Could size down if between sizes.
It fits precisely.
Waist runs a little large, so lots of midriff showing unless you adjust. Overall very fun and beautiful dress!
Fit a bit loose around the waist and was more business than party.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color and cut but gaped
links_Review_Text: Was a beautiful dress but I would say it runs tts or a little large. I'm a 10 or 12 and ordered the 12 but it was way too large everywhere. Because of the cut outs no amount of creative belting of pining could save it.

links_Review_Title: Rented this dress twice within six weeks
links_Review_Text: I absolutely love this dress. I rented it twice within a six week period.The first time I rented size 6 and the second time I went it size 4. Actually the second time I rented it I noticed that it was cut very low because it was missing a little snack between the breasts. I knew that because I had rented the dress before. I called a RTR and they immediately sent a new size four.It took me a while to iron it because it looked much better ironed and it was such a unique dress.

links_Review_Title: Easy, Comfortable, Great Fit, Flattering style
links_Review_Text: The only con is the wrap top was a little gappy, I have a large chest, as long as I sat up straight it was ok...I probably should have safety pinned it and it'd be fine.
Really cute and comfortable. Great pattern and colors
This dress was very flattering and fun! I loved the color and fit! Everything about this made me want to purchase it immediately!
Was a good one and done for me. Easy to wear. The top part is sewn together which is nice to avoid it being too low cut.

I felt so beautiful and confident in this dress! I ended up wearing it for not one, not two, not three, but SEVEN occasions. It hugged all the correct places and the sleeves were so dainty and flirty. Truly, my favorite piece I've ever received from a shipment of RTR.

This dress is sooooo flirty!! I could have sized down I'm 5'11 pear shape but with it being a little bit more roomy it allowed for amazing movement! I have a small chest so I didn't have to wear a bra! Length was perfect because it covered my thigh jiggle!

As a tall woman, it is often hard to find short dresses that work well like this one did. I was happy with how comfy it was and wasn't too revealing up top. Great fabric and colors and wore it a few times!
Cool gauzy dress perfect for hot weather.
Very large and gappy on top - could've sized down, but didn't want it to be too short. Worth renting if you can wear something pretty & lacey underneath, or pin it shut.

This is one of the best dresses I've ever worn. I wore this to a bridal shower. It's so comfortable and easy to move in. The fabric breathes and that made a world of difference on a hot summer day. I got so many compliments on this dress. It's so unique and i definitely felt special in it. My only complaint would be that my dress came with a small tear in the wrap sash. It really wasn't noticeable at all so I wore it anyways.

This dress is a lot of fun to wear on a beach vacation and I got a ton of compliments. It's super cute but not as figure flattering as some of Tanya Taylor's other dresses because of the skirt ruffles.

links_Review_Title: Short sleeves, short dress, breathable fabric for July wedding
links_Review_Text: It was cute! I read the reviews before renting and found just the right size. Perfect for a hot Summer wedding at a bird sanctuary.
Excellent flattering fit, lovely colors, & fabric! Would love to buy this one! Constant complements that evening!
Loved this dress! The overall fit was great, and a great piece for summer.
Fit true to size. Would have loved the 8 but 6 worked well! Easy to wear normal/strapless bra with. Not see through! Just a fun dancing dress that got TONS of compliments. Worth a try!!!
Wore this dress for Easter and it was so cute! Flattering fit and truly unique. Would rent again. Fits true to size.
Wore this in Miami and it was perfect for the hot days but cooler nights! The perfect dress that's classy with a little flare!

links_Review_Title: Very easy to wear and beautiful colors
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress. It was very flattering and the colors are perfect for spring. I wore it to Easter brunch and a birthday party and it was perfect for both occasions. So many compliments!

Loved this dress and received so many compliments! Dressed up with heels and it's a very nice material. I have a small chest and if it was big anywhere it was there but not noticeable to anyone else! Loved this dress!
Loved this easy spring dress. Tanya Taylor rarely disappoints! Silhouette and details are very flattering. Colors and ruffles standout in a crowd. Perfection!

links_Review_Title: I have 34DDD and it was tight up top but fit perfectly everywhere else. Great material.
links_Review_Text: The cut of the top wasn't too low, it just was tight and opened up too much. I had to keep pulling it together. A 6 probably would have fit perfectly. Love that it had a zipper, making it easy to get on and off, and wrap around ties to make it tighter around my waist. Fit well on my hips. Would definitely rent again for warmer weather.
Great fun and flirty dress! Would definitely rent again, accentuated all the right places
Great fit, so flattering and I received so many compliments! I have a large chest and i didn't have any issues!
Fit well. Very feminine.

links_Review_Title: Wore for a charity luncheon. Very flattering!
links_Review_Text: Loved it! Hid the belly. Super comfortable and would rent again!

I picked this dress for everyday wear. Ended up wearing to an anniversary party and it was perfect. GREAT summer dress. Comfortable and different. Fabric is lightweight and doesn't show a lot of wrinkles. It was great to dance in. Love love love. Feminine and a little sexy but not revealing. A perfect piece.

Wore this to work and cannot remember the last time I've gotten so many compliments. Seriously, 15-20 people said something nice about my outfit. Not sure if I'd want to own it but will wear a few times!
So fun and flirty - I was so sad it was SO big.

links_Review_Title: Loved this - comfortable and easy to wear
links_Review_Text: This dress is so cute and looks great on!

links_Review_Title: This is a great dress. I wore it for rehearsal dinner and received many compliments.
links_Review_Text: The lightness of the fabric is great, it was well into the 90's the day I wore it. It was a little tight at first until I found the side zipper. Highly recommend this dress!
Need to wear an undershirt but it is super cute and comfortable. The fabric is light, airy, perfect for hot summer days.

I got lots of compliments on this dress. It was a fun, light weight material - perfect for a very warm summer wedding. The colors are bright and let you stand out from the crowd. It was very comfortable. I did need to put a full length white slip under it because it was a touch see-through without it, even though it's lined. Overall, very happy with the process and how the dress looked!

links_Review_Title: It was too much material. I never wore it.
links_Review_Text: I didn't like how it gathered at the waist with the belt. Not flattering.
Loved this dress, and got SO many compliments on it. I wore mine with white sneakers, but you could easily dress this up with a pair of heels! Highly recommend!
I'm between a 14/16 and the 14 was even a little too big. It is slightly sheer so if you're in the sun wear a slip. I received a lot of complaints the cut of the dress was very flattering.
Ordered up a size to be safe but the dress swallowed me...I wish it would've worked!

Loved this dress - it's a faux wrap, so very easy to wear and you don't have to worry about it opening up. The prints are so cute and the colors are perfect for spring/summer without looking too beachy for work or the city. Love!!!!

links_Review_Title: cute but definitely went to the knee. I'm 5'5".
links_Review_Text: needed to pin the front. my chest is large and it was way way too low for me.
This is the worst RTR selection I've ever made. I'm a curvy girl, yet this dress was so incredibly big that it was laughable. Also didn't like the material. An overall mess of a dress.

links_Review_Title: Not my first choice but a good backup
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a wedding. It ended up being great for the occasion but as you can see even the petite was slightly too long on my. I'm 5'3" and wore shoes with a heel. Overall not a huge deal and didn't bother me much throughout the night. The fit everywhere else was amazing.

links_Review_Title: Many compliments but fit needed adjustments -- worth it?
links_Review_Text: Loved the style of the dress - received TONS of compliments on the colors, high low hemline, and movement on the dance floor. However, the shoulder strap length as is was very long and would've left a lot revealed. I had to pin the straps at the back of the dress and secure the front with fabric tape to ensure it was appropriate to wear in front of family and friends. With those alterations, I wish I owned this dress!

Fit like it was made for me and is a style I wouldn't necessarily buy. The top is looser/bustier than I anticipated but it worked, wore stick-on bra cups. Snug but comfortable fabric so I could move all night without having to worry about every roll or panty liners being seen! Got loads of complements :) felt amazing.

links_Review_Title: Great colors for a winter event!
links_Review_Text: The dress fit well overall, however the straps were WAY too long. They weren't adjustable so after several tries we were able to pin the dress to my bra for a semi-decent fix. If I bent over you could see my strapless bra from the gap in the middle of the chest area. Despite the technical flaws, I was comfortable for a winter wedding in New Orleans and received tons of compliments! The pattern gave it a little more pizazz than your typical blackout dress. 4/5 stars.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, little more casual than what I was looking for
links_Review_Text: Dress was flattering for my pear shaped figure. I did not end up picking it cause it was a little casual for the Gala I was attending. Unsure what bra I would wear cause you could see my strapless bra when I leaned over slightly. But fit nicely and made me feel good.

links_Review_Title: I was very happy with my selection!
links_Review_Text: This dress was a little bit long on me, and I ended up holding it up when I was walking around, but I'm used to that. It was also pretty chesty, which is not an issue I usually have. I didn't mind at all but it was not a conservative fit. It was very comfortable and easy to match with.

links_Review_Title: This dress made me feel sexy, yet, classy at the same time! I received several compliments.
links_Review_Text: The overall fit was true to size. However, if you are busty, a tank top is a must! My husband told me not to wear one, but I stuffed one in my purse just in case. I’m so glad I did because my girls would have been “out” the whole night! Other than that, it was a fun dress and comfortable enough to dance in. The train was long so you need to wear heals. I would definitely rent this one again!

I love this dress. It's flattering and elegant and perfect for almost any occasion. If it wasn't so expensive I would buy it. I'm between sizes 4 & 6 and went with the 6! I could've done the 4 but I was still comfortable! (I'm 5'4 and 128lbs for reference). Got so many compliments:

I'm a 16/18 and the dress fit well with some room to grow. The dress showed a lot of cleavage and the straps weren't adjustable. The dress was very pretty if you like that style. I don't usually like the short front and long back (mullet) style dress, but this one was nice.

I was very into this dress (disregard the different shoes LOL) rented a few different options for a fall winter. And although I loved this dress it didn't seem as fall/farm wedding as I wanted it. However I've kept it in my likes for future weddings!
Absolutely loved this dress! Perfect for fall wedding. Was comfortable and fit true to size

This was my first RTR rental experience and I must say the process was a bliss. I know that if you want more dress selections you have to rent way in advance but this was a week before the event and I was able to find something beautiful and a great fit. I also got a lot of compliments!!! I also encountered some issues but customer service was SUPER helpful! I will use RTR for future events!

I loved this dress but it was a little big/low cut in the chest area. I'm a 36C, double sided tape worked just fine but adjustable straps would have been better. If I had a little more time I probably could have pinned the straps and been set. I did get a lot of compliments though!

links_Review_Title: Dress looked great and was unique
links_Review_Text: Great fit, very flattering and comfortable. Was great for a winter wedding.

links_Review_Title: Very pretty dress. The size 6 was too big so I didn't wear it.
links_Review_Text: The material is very thin. It didn't fit, but even so I wouldn't wear it in the winter.

links_Review_Title: This dress got so many compliments! I attended a wedding with a formal dress code.
links_Review_Text: This dress was form fitting in the hip and stomach area, but the top was a little loose. I preferred the looser looser fit of the hip area with the size 10, but I ended up wearing size 8 because the fit was better at the top.
The dress is very pretty, but it isn't very breathable around the stomach, is tight. Also, if you are tall, the low part of the dress is a bit high cut. Didn't end up wearing this dress.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments on this dress.
links_Review_Text: Pro's comfortable, flattering for the figure, can dress it up or dress down Con's Sized up for a bigger chest (38 DDD). The straps kept falling and so did the front. The girls were definitely on display.
True to size
This dress is pretty but would be more flattering on a taller person. at 5'3" the bottom was dragging on the ground even in heals.
I'm in between sizes 2-4, 34B; and the 4R definitely ran a bit loose, perfect if you prefer comfort over a sexy skin-tight style. 10/10 recommend.

links_Review_Title: Everyone commented on my dress saying it was perfect for the theme!
links_Review_Text: It was perfect loved it!
I wore this dress to a fall wedding, and loved it. The colors were perfect, and it fit well with a strapless bra. The straps are a little long, and not adjustable, but can easily be pinned.

links_Review_Title: I loved the ruffled high-low look.
links_Review_Text: Usually a 4, the 2 fit very comfortably.

links_Review_Title: I wasn't able to wear it, too large in the top. It was cute otherwise...
links_Review_Text: Too large for me at top.

Beautiful, flowy fabric, very comfortable. Skims over curves without being too clingy or tight, just super flattering! Was a bit short, but I'm tall and because of the high/low cut it's not too noticeable. I'm between sizes and may try the 16 if I rent again because it was just a tad loose in the waist. FWIW, I was sent an 18 not 18W (which I prefer).
Loved this dress, perfect for pear shaped women. It fit like a glove!
I'm 5'4 and the veil hit the floor with short shoes but would be perfect for heels.
Sophisticated yet sexy !! Love this top !

links_Review_Title: Nice fabric, great cut by the shoulders
Short side is a little too short
links_Review_Text: Wore this wine tasting and it was the perfect style. Only problem is that the short side is really short and I kept having to pull it down in the back. I guess it's best with high-waisted pants?
Loved this, would rent it again

links_Review_Title: Love this! Beautiful top, could be a smidge longer
links_Review_Text: This top is amazing, absolute love. Only complaint is that I wanted. To be a little longer (all the way around), but I have a very long torso so I still think it's amazing and won't hold it against the shirt! Definitely might rent this again!
Cute, very silky!

I have broader shoulders so the medium fits better than the small in the back of the neckline. I would definitely rent this item again. It came in clean and excellent condition. This was my first experience with rent the runway and I am so pleased!

links_Review_Title: Cute but asymmetrical so one side really short
links_Review_Text: Cute top - I love this style and the color and print is nice for fall. But I am taller and have a longer torso. The asymmetrical cut on the bottom fit perfect on one side but the other was very short and went higher than the waistband of my pants. I had to wear higher waisted jeans. Might not be an issue for someone shorter.

links_Review_Title: Flattering - can be dressed up or down
links_Review_Text: Love this top! Flattering on shoulders, slims waistline, and is a cool look. Can be dressed up or worn with jeans. Loved it so much I bought it, and this was my first RTR order.
Fit nicely. It's very long on the side.

Wow wow wow! The cut of this shirt is a knock out - ultra-flattering. Slims the waist, accentuates the bust, hides the tummy if you're feeling bloated. Plan to wear a strapless bra. I took one star off because I felt like it gapped a little in the upper chest/arm area. Wore with a blazer for work but this could easily be worn out.

Wore this to my husband's company holiday party. I love to show off my arms and this was the perfect way to do so with a still modest neckline. Loved the silky fabric. Wish I'd had another occasion to wear it to.

links_Review_Title: Dress up or down, this silk top was a winner.
