links_Review_Text: I wore this top for a date night out with jeans and a leather jacket, then again with a jean jacket and leggings. The draping and cut of the arms were very flattering (better than expected). I had no problems with undergarments - a strapless bra worked for me!
It was a bit tight at the waist but it looked great.

links_Review_Title: So pretty, easy to wear & felt fab!
links_Review_Text: Wore this for a friends 40th birthday party. Was probably a bit overdressed but whatever. Lots of compliments - would rent again!!
Beautiful top in a nice material. The reviews said to size up but I thought the XS was perfect without a bra. Length was perfect because I'm short.

Very fun and playful top! Perfect for date night / holiday or valentines day with pops of red. Fits slightly snug through the bust and rib area but flares out slightly like a pemplum top. Very pretty and worth the rental! Material is slightly thick and quality. Wore an XS - 5’4, 115 pounds for reference.

As someone with a pear shape body this was great form fitting on top with flowy pants. Wore for NYE but good for dressy occasions. I am very petite on top so went with small which was perfectly snug and medium would have been too baggy.
Love this top, didn't want to send it back. It definitely does run about 1 size small so size up. This looked great with Spanx Leggings!!

links_Review_Title: A really unique and fun top to wear.
links_Review_Text: It was a snug fit. Worth wearing but tight. I did it with jeans but it can easily be dressed up too.
This top fits like a glove and I felt fabulous in it. So comfortable, flirty and feminine, I got TONS of compliments. Very flattering and slimming.

Got SO many compliments on this top!! Wore it to a holiday party. The small worked great- it is VERY fitted, this may need to be taken into account by someone with a bigger chest! Wore it with skinny jeans and heels, but could've done it with high waisted dress pants and open toe heels!
Perfect feminine and fun top for Art Basel in Miami. Got so many compliments
Couldn't zip up - too small at waist. Returned it right away.
Didn't actually wear it, it runs too small (or maybe I have a wide rib cage since zipper sit right on it) no give, I normally wear M or L in tops, and this L I could not zip it up :(

links_Review_Title: Runs small, did not end up wearing!
links_Review_Text: Love the style, the fabric. However, does runs small, size up. I returned without wearing. Will hopefully order a M when it becomes available. Really different top and can't wait to wear it out!
I sized up like everyone said and the chest was still too small. This is a gorgeous top but if you have boobs this is not the top for you!
Top runs small. Order up! Otherwise, beautiful.

I ordered some fun dresses to brighten up my day during self-isolation and this Proenza Schouler dress was definitely my favorite. The print is gorgeous and not overpowering and the cut is soooo flattering (especially for pear shaped girls like me). There's a waist detail that doesn't really translate in the picture, but it tapers the waist very nicely without being tight. Love it!!
Ran a bit small in the busy and neckline dips really low so I had to wear a tank under it for work.

links_Review_Title: One of my favorite dresses I've ever worn!
links_Review_Text: I absolutely LOVED this dress. I'm usually a 4, occasionally a 2, and the 4 fit perfectly. The length was amazing, hit mid-shin - I'm 5'10". I tied the neck fabric and thought it looked so cute. The low cut neckline felt very sexy, but still so classy, for a nice dinner out. My husband also said it's one of his favorite dresses he's seen me in. I wore it in the winter with high black boots and a coat and scarf when outside. So I think it works for all seasons. I would rent this again and again!!

I wore this to the office and it was a huge hit. The colors are vibrant and I received a ton of compliments on the pattern and fit. I was disappointed that it wasn't lined (especially given the retail price)!! And the fabric is a bit thin. You definitely need to wear a slip or shape-wear for coverage. There are a couple ways to wear the tie in front and I ended up using it to cover the bottom of the v-neck, which dipped a bit low. I will probably rent it again.
Such a lovely vibrant dress I wore to a workshop where I got ton of compliments! I also then wore it to work, but I wore it with a cami since it's a little low cut for the office. Loved it!

A beautiful, on-trend pattern and very good quality. It ran very large at the top and fit perfect at the hips on my pear shape. Would love to purchase; but 2-3 inches would have to be taken up in the shoulders because the fabric just sags down to the waist. I'm afraid the color combo won't stay in fashion long enough to justify the expense. I might try to go down one size.
Beautiful fabric, slimming fit, did not fit my bust and had weird gaping in the back as a result

links_Review_Title: Bright flowy midi dress with a bit of cleavage :)
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress, very feminine and flowy. Wore to dinner and a concert and got compliments at the venue. Highly recommend!
This dress made me want fo twirl around all morning. It fits nicely and the fabric is so vibrant it is pretty low cut so a cami is necessary if you are wearing it to work.

I loved the color and the contour of the dress. it showed a little bit too much cleavage so I had to use pins to hold it down a little bit. Too bad I had to wear it indoors due to the current situation!

links_Review_Title: Neckline was too plunging for me
links_Review_Text: Did not wear. Beautiful dress and lovely fabric but it was too low cut for me

Beautiful colors and pattern. Neckline was a lot lower than I expected so had to wear a bandeau to make it work appropriate--would be tricker for a larger chest. Probably should have gone for petite as the waist was a little looser than I wanted. Skirt is a nice full shape and moves well.

links_Review_Title: Not my favorite Proenza, but still pretty great
links_Review_Text: Size 4 Proena dresses normally fit me perfectly. This one seemed to pull a bit in the bust, although that could have been because of the pleating that begins under the bust and runs around the back. The neckline is also pretty low, although the bow covered my chest and made the dress modest enough for work. This was also pretty long -definitely a maxi on me, and the skirt was really voluminous. The length, volume of the skirt, and large print made this not my favorite dress, but still cute.

links_Review_Title: Stunning dress, print, fabric, and cut, slightly retro
links_Review_Text: I loved this and it fit me perfectly everywhere but the top/back. The front bodice fit me nicely, but its much higher cut up the back then Im used to, and was tight. I needed to wear a sweater to cover the top back of the dress. Next time I get a 12 only for that area, and hope the rest is not to large.
Fit great, wonderful fabric, feminine, loved it!
Sized up because of comments about women with large busts. One size up fit perfectly. Light material but not too sheer.
A little low cut and material is not very breathable but such a lovely dress. Will rent again.

links_Review_Title: Cute but wear something beneath for work!
links_Review_Text: Loved the fit and the length and basically everything about it, but I lowkey panicked when I put it on for work and realized it was SUPER low cut. Looked great, but not work appropriate lol. I wore a black bandeau which ended up looking good and tied in nicely with the black in the flowers.
This is a beautiful dress. Lays well on the body. The neckline is very low and I had to wear a cami underneath or you could see my bra.

5'2" 113lbs and this dress was a sizing mess on me The sleeves and shoulder were too big The neck (it zips very high up in the back) too tight Bust- too tight Length- was drowning in it High hopes for this one but definitely not for me

links_Review_Title: Beautiful, colorful and very comfortable dress!
links_Review_Text: Great long dress, very chic, very comfortable and fun!

This dress is gorgeous. I typically take a 2 in dresses but the 4 fit perfectly. The neck is pretty low cut, so you have to be careful with your bra selection. It gives you a nice hourglass look the way the fabric is cut and hangs. This was a really great spring/summer dress and I will definitely rent again.
Wore this dress to cocktail party. Beautiful fabric and cut. Slightly low V in front

I wore a 10R. It was comfortable with a little bit of room on the waist. Material draped nicely, and the prints are fun. If I wanted it to be more form-fitting, I probably could have gotten away with 8R. I might rent again.
I wore this for a trade show and work meetings. I got stopped repeatedly to compliment the dress, both men and women. It is classy and a standout with the bright pattern. Fit is normal true to size.
Dress run a bit small, but not uncomfortable. Fabric have no stretch. Very pretty blue and red. Light and airy. Great for spring and summer.
Cute top and so easy to coordinate with other pieces for dress up or down. Not form fitting and ran a little big. Still loved it and lots of compliments
I wore this tank for Madri Gras. Take a look at the picture. It speaks for itself.
This was a perfect top for a trip to Vegas. I usually wear a medium but went with the large. Tons of compliments. I would definitely rent this again.

links_Review_Title: Excellent fun top with great sparkles
links_Review_Text: Such fun and flattering top! Wore it to a New Year's Eve party and got many compliments. Great colors and lots of sparkle.

Such a beautiful glitter top that goes really well with jeans. The size was a great fit and it had adjustable straps which I loved. The colors were awesome for New Year's Eve. Recommended. A great find!

Wore this to a friends party! It was a hit ! I was comfortable all night and it was great for a night out . Recommend if you want to sparkle the night away . If you have long hair - be warned my curls kept getting caught on the sequin
Super cute with black blazer!

links_Review_Title: Great blouse for a night out
links_Review_Text: This top was so cute! I loved the colors. I wore a sweater over it because it was very cold outside.

Loved this top. I wore it with dark denim jeans for a bday/Valentines Day dinner with my husband and a few other couples. I felt special and fun without being too over the top. I would definitely rent this again.

links_Review_Title: Bachelorette Party Night! Super fun but underarms get irritated from sequins.
LOVED this. So bright and fun!! Standout Piece for sure.
links_Review_Text: good fit, a little large in the chest, but still so soft and good material.

I got so many compliments from random strangers! This top is so sparkly and made me feel like a million bucks. It was comfortable and the sequins did not chaff my arms. It is perfect with a pair of dark skinny jeans and heels!
Love this top. The sequins are fun and add some sparkle to date night. The straps are adjustable which is key for long torsos. I would say it runs true to size to maybe a little bit big.
very festive. Little large in the arm pits. Should have sized down.

Fun shirt! I paired it with leather pants and gold heels and it definitely turned some heads! I agree with another reviewer, even though it fit well it definitely wasn't as form fitting/curve flattering as the model, slightly more boxy in real life but not bad. I'd recommend and am considering buying it.

links_Review_Title: Was a fun top for New Year's Eve
links_Review_Text: Was slimming and fell at the right place to be flattering.
Great fit, loved the adjustable straps!

This fits like a regular camisole, however the body is shapeless, not figure hugging at all. I would say size down except it was plenty tight across the shoulders/bust and if I had ordered a smaller size I fear it would have been uncomfortably tight. I wish it was cut a little narrower in the rib cage. It didn't need to hug my body, but it was too shapeless to be particularly flattering. If you carry weight in your mid-section this would likely cover it nicely. I got lots of compliments and this can be dressed up or down. With jeans like the model or a pair of dressy palazzo pants or skirt. Lots of colors would match, black, navy, burgundy, light blue, and more. I paired with the Theory Red Multi Cropped Pants and it was perfect for a holiday party.
It was perfect!
It looked a little less formfitting on me than on the model but still very cute!
Not my style. Almost was frumpy looking on me, but I don't have many curves. Would look great on someone with more shape!

links_Review_Title: WOW! A head turner! Great fit, not for all occasions.
links_Review_Text: Wore this for New Years Eve date night with friends. While very comfortable and many compliments it draws a lot of attention so caution on making sure you are ready for that. Overall, HIGHLY recommend!
True to size and quite the showstopper but I couldn't wear it for more than an hour comfortably. VERY booby and sometimes every tape isn't enough.

This jumpsuit was super comfy, but whether you clasp the neck or not (I did), there will be LOTS of cleavage. I liked that since it was for a big NYE party, but it definitely did draw lots of attention so just know that. It rides up like most jumpsuits so you will have a wedgie. I loved it overall.

links_Review_Title: Sexy & worked for a costume party!
links_Review_Text: Wore this for a 20s themed NYE party and worked really well! Would have been great for just a regular night out too. I'm very short and LOVE when I find items that don't drag on the floor. Great length for shorties like me! VERY low cut but there's a closure than can be used. Otherwise you'll definitely need sticky tape. Even with sticky tape it slid around a bit but I was surprised that it wasn't falling on its own. It was pretty snug!

Loved loved this jumpsuit. I am short, 5'1 and the length was completely fine with heels. You will need lots of double sided tape to help keep everything in place. The material is of good quality. Thinking of buying!
A little loose in the upper portion - if you have small boobs like me you'll need lots of tape or just wear a dark bra with it!

The jumpsuit is super flattering and a great material! The navy is perfect and it was a good length. I needed the clasp to keep my boobs in place and the only con was the clasp was hanging on by a thread. But it stayed together all night so it was fine. BIG fan!
Loved this jumpsuit. It's definitely low cut but it zips all the way up the back so it keeps the top tight! you'll need some fashion tape just in case but I loved this for a night in vegas!

I somehow entirely forgot to take a picture in this outfit and am very sad about it because it was INSANELY flattering. It's low-cut, but not too much. It's great for a date night or night out. I wore it for NYE in a smaller hometown with some family friends so I wore a white bandeau to be more comfy and it was still completely adorable. I have bigger hips and usually jumpers are hit or (mostly) miss, but that was amazing and so flattering. My boyfriend LOVED it. DEFS RENT

links_Review_Title: Great classic that can be dressed up or down
links_Review_Text: I rented both the small and medium and ended up with the medium. I'm 5'9 and 135 lbs and found this ran a tad small - both in the torso where it was a bit short and in the fit of the arms. The material is lovely and it's very well made. It does split very low up front but it has a clasp a few inches up that offers the option of a bit more coverage. Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: Not made for those who are tall--
links_Review_Text: Amazing quality, just not made for those who are tall! Didn't end up wearing!

links_Review_Title: This jumpsuit is AMAZING. You could pretty much wear it to work, formal, a date, anywhere! Love it!
links_Review_Text: Th fabric is amazing, the fit is amazing. There is a small eyelit hook on the front that makes it a little less booby. I love it so much I'm buying it!

This dress is pure sophistication and elegance, wrapped up in one perfect, non-wrinkling, comfortable, and flattering package. I rented this for a formal dinner during a work incentive trip and it packed perfectly, no wrinkles upon arrival after being packed away during a long flight. Wears like a dream - the draping would be flattering on most any body type (I'm 6 months postpartum and along with my trusty Spanx, made me look like a supermodel) and bonus - you can wear a normal bra! Hit me about mid-shin and I'm 5'9". Received compliments all night. I loved it so much I rented it again right away for another event and have tried to find it to buy. You won't regret this dress!

links_Review_Title: Rented for my daughter’s wedding. My other daughter liked it so much that she wore the backup!
links_Review_Text: Super comfortable, easy to move around in, and just super classy.
This dress fits very nicely I thought the fabric might be too clingy but it's actually very smooth the dress does have a liner.
Love this dress and the brand! Rented it 2 times now, fits my hourglass figure so good, always compliments! It's a very modestly sexy dress! I will probably but it!
beautiful fabric, stunning color, didn't want to take it off

Here are the pros: - figure flattering - good for work and to dress up for a party - great navy color - fabric is comfortable and breathes Here are the cons: - neck chokes (anytime I went to sit down my air pipes were cut off) - arms are really tight (I'd move my arms up and I felt as if the dress would rip) - runs 2x small - don't spill- not even water (I had a sip of water and the glass condensation got on the dress and it never went away)
Beautiful dress! Pictures do not do it justice. I'm usually a medium and rented a large because the dress doesn't stretch and was very comfortable all night. Was not tight anywhere
Very classy look and shape. Perfect for winter wedding. Got compliments from everyone and for like a glove. Ruching also covers any parts that you are self conscious of :)
I got so many compliments on this dress it fit perfect on every curve and I am a curvy gal! Highly recommend

I loved this! So easy and relaxed to wear. I wore this for New Year's Eve dinner in NY. The shoulders are very "current" (a little puffy, not too much) but the rest of the dress is a nice solid navy with some structure. Went to mid calf on me and I am pretty tall! The satin material didn't wrinkle despite sitting a while for dinner. The 3/4 sleeves were really comfortable and not constricting.

For reference I'm 5'3", 127lbs and size DD. Because my chest is larger the rouching up top was a little too much, but I added a leather belt and it sinched the waist and was perfect. Very comfortable and soft silky fabric.
This dress fit perfect. I am a solid size 10, 42 inch hips and 29 inch waist. The material was silky and rich looking with no wrinkling problem. I wore this for family pictures.
Classy. Unique. Good for tall. Flattering. Dressy. Pulls a bit around the neck. Lovely fabric, cut, color. Large is a size 8.

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on the dress. It was flattering and comfortable.
links_Review_Text: It was a great dress for the most part. The only thing to keep in mind is the satin material might photograph weird. Between that and the rouching, there are a few less than flattering photos of me out there! :)
The most comfortable dress ever! It drapes so luxuriously. Many compliments. Wore to a fashion show.

links_Review_Title: A dress for the tall ladies!!
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'11 and this dress hit me mid to lower calf so I would not recommended for shorter ladies but if you are taller I HIGLY recommend. Wore it to a winter wedding and felt sexy and classy at the same time, a fun dress!
Loved this dress. Beautiful material and fit. Very easy to wear and I felt dressed up.

I felt confident and comfortable in this dress. It was extremely flattering and I received lots of compliments! My only complaint is that the fabric seemed to hold body odor from the last renter, which the RTR dry cleaning service didn't seem to remove.

links_Review_Title: Fit like a glove. Felt sexy and professional.
links_Review_Text: For true to size. Wish it wasn’t so long since I’m not that tall but still one of my favorites.

links_Review_Title: The fit and class of this dress.
links_Review_Text: Absolutely love this outfit. i want to buy it!

links_Review_Title: I got tons of compliments while wearing this dress!
links_Review_Text: I ordered both size S & M, the small one was a bit tight so I ended up wearing the medium one. It fit a bit loose but worked. Loved the style, the material, the overall feel of the dress. Gorgeous for a special event!
Love this dress. Soft fabric and great color. Dress is tts and very comfortable to wear. Hit right at the ankle on my 5'2 frame.
Tons of compliments, fits really well, can wear a bra!

links_Review_Title: so many compliments on this dress! It was beautiful!
links_Review_Text: Fit was true to size and the color was true to as it appeared online as well!

links_Review_Title: Style was not as expected in person.
links_Review_Text: This style is probably most flattering on someone with the same proportions of the model. I should have sized up as it was slightly tight across the hip/butt area. I ordered thinking this was going to be a chic style, unfortunately it was a little more old woman in person. The shoulder poufs are very large and the neckline was too mature for my preference...
Got a serious amount of compliments on this dress. Absolutely loved it. Sexy and glam without being too revealing :)

I wasn't sure about this dress at first. But I took a chance and wore it. It was absolutely perfect. Perfect color, perfect fit, and perfect look. I got so many compliments. I felt and looked radiant.

links_Review_Title: Didn't end up wearing - but cute!
links_Review_Text: This fit really well but I ended up liking another dress better! The puffy sleeves give it an 80's look - I think it would be flattering to wear to a winter party, for sure.
Loved the style, color and fit. The sleeves were a bit tight in their fit but looked great.
This dress was fantastic in both how well it fit and how lovely it looked. True to size with no stretch. The draping in the front was very forgiving. This was one I would rent again!

This dress was extremely comfortable and flattering. I have a straight figure, not tons of crazy curves and I felt this dress was super sophisticated and flattering on me. I'm usually a small or 2/4 and the small was perfect. Forgot my trusty spanx to smooth corners and things but didn't even need them with how the dress lays. The only thing that made me nervous was the dress material. It's satin so I was worried that my clutch was going to snag it all night. I would rent again!
super low cut in the front and the slit was way too high for my comfort so I didn't end up wearing. If the slot wasn't so high this probably would have been my top choice

I rented it for a 20s themed party and it doubled for an Oscar party. I chose it for its 1920s style and normally wouldn't have picked this silhouette, but I received many many compliments! Great dress, comfortable, flattering

links_Review_Title: Loved, so many compliments! A bit cleavage. . Slit does come up to your high thigh.
links_Review_Text: Top does fall a bit, fits loose.

links_Review_Title: For a 1920s party at my college. Made me feel transported to that time. Weird size though!
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a 1920s party at my college. I got so many compliments and I felt beautiful! It worked perfectly with the accessories. Other girls had on fringe dresses which were cute but I really liked how mine fit the theme but was unique. The only drawback was the size. It fit correctly in the waist, a little tight in booty and too big in chest. I have a pretty proportionate body so that was weird! I just used fashion tape for the top and a safety pin and it worked!

The dress was pretty- I would have preferred to wear the MR but the sleeves wouldn't stay up at all. It constantly fell down in the small as well. The slit is a little higher than expected but it's nice! Tiger print was hardly noticeable which I preferred.

Wore this to a roaring 20s party and it was such a fun festive dress!! It fit ok - was very large in the chest area so I had to pin it up to not gape open. Otherwise the slit and length were good. Order down a size for small chested gals

Wore this for NYE 20s party. It was great! Super comfortable. The front has a pretty high slit when you sit your legs are basically all the way out. I fit in both XS and S but went with the small cause it had more rooms in the hip area. I had some extra space in the top part. Would recommend! It's not really sequin it's got some shine to it.

I'm a tall athletic build with a large chest, this dress didn't fit perfectly, but with a little fashion tape around the chest it worked well. Only thing I didn't like was the flowy fabric along the slit was only one sided, so it looked a little weird if it curled the wrong way. Otherwise loved this dress, fabric was very comfortable and not itchy, kind of a shimmery velvet. Not much stretch. Got lots of compliments.

links_Review_Title: The dress was beautiful and easy to wear.
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress that was easy to wear. I had to be aware of angles because the belly was so flowing that I could have almost looked pregnant.

Loved this dress. Slit fell in the right place. However if you are hippy like I am then it does fit tight at the hip and the slit can possibly accidentally become a peep show. Just sit proper and you are golden. If I had sized up I feel the top would have been too large.
Got this to attend a speakeasy themed wedding rehearsal dinner. Material is very itchy. Straps didn't stay up. Otherwise, fit well. Just uncomfortable due to the material.
Just didn't live this. Black is supposed to make you look slimming and this just didn't do it for me.
Terrible. Fabric is tacky in person. Ended up not wearing.
I am 5'1 and 115 lbs with 32B chest. The bottom fit fine but the top was big. I fixed it with some Fashion tape and a padded strapless bra and that did the trick. I would wear this again!

I wear a size 10 dress and couldn't even get the large on. The xl technically fit, but was so unflattering. The dress is deceiving. It looks like it would be great for an hourglass figure, but in reality it would make an athletic figure look like an hourglass.

links_Review_Title: It's a very pretty dress with a bit of stretch.
links_Review_Text: The MR fit my hips and thighs comfortably, but the top was way too big and falling off. I didn't end up wearing it.

links_Review_Title: 5"3 106 lbs, 30DDD- Shoulders slid off all night. Very sexy, pretty and fun. Just a little big
links_Review_Text: Perfect with patterned nylons and 1920's accessories.
Way too large up top
Dress fit perfectly and sexy. Rented it for a date alright at home.
The dress fit amazing, and I wore tights and booties to dress it down.
Hugs all the right places, gorgeous fabric. Loved it!

This dress was absolutely perfect. It had just the right elements of sexy the fabric was fantastic, soft and comfortable. I bought an unlined plunging neckline Teddy from Victoria's Secret as my undergarment but it held me together so well I really didn't need anything. Maybe just some pasties. My boyfriend asked me to purchase the dress because he loved it so much on me. My favorite rental so far!

links_Review_Title: Fantastic velvet dress, fun to dance in!
links_Review_Text: Got compliments all night! Fit like a glove. Only complaint is that the sleeves are a little short - so more like 3/4 sleeve on someone my height (6ft).

This dress was beautiful, and felt so comfortable. As a "fluffy" women this dress accentuated the positive and eliminated the negative. The mesh inlay allowed the deep V to feel supported (I wore a traditional front snap bra). Despite "breaking" the rule of showing breast and legs it was done in good taste. I honestly couldn't fine a con unless you feel like too many compliments would be one.
Perfect dress, easy to wear, stretchy material, and looked amazing!

I usually am between a size 2 and 4 . Ended up going with the size 2 it was the perfect fit! , I am short 5"2 120 lbs and the length went right to my ankle . The dress was so comfortable and the velvet was so soft. Dress was classy and sexy without being over the top. The plunging neckline and slit was just right. There is a nude mesh that holds everything in up top. It was flawless and form fitting . My favorite RTR yet !

This dress is the definition of Perfection! The sheer mesh panel at the bust is sexy as well as supportive and the ruching at the waist creates a slimming waistline, while the lining holds you in!! The length was perfect if you are a shorty like me! And it was unbelievably comfortable!!!

links_Review_Title: The feel and fit of this dress is to die for. I would wear it again!
The most comfortable and sexy dress!
links_Review_Text: This dress was amazing! I wore it to a fundraising bar, it was February so the thin velvet long sleeves was perfect. The deep V-neck has a mesh cover, there is no need to worry about double sided tape! Not pictured is the high slit that comes just about mid thigh. The ruching in the front disguises anything you were trying to hide. I wish I could buy this dress!
Wore this dress for NYE and it was perfection! Its so soft and flattering! Highly rec!

First let me say I got so many dirty looks from people who were aghast I was daring to wear something JLO would rock- and I was flattered tbh. the mesh front is so invisible that even my friends did not notice until they demanded to know how I wasn't falling out of this dress. It smooths our every fault and comes across as sexy and classy- the velvet is amazing and it's warm for the cold months while still being comfortable. I have never felt more sexy in my life. Rent this ladies.

links_Review_Title: Tons of compliments on this classic piece!!!
links_Review_Text: This dress was the perfect combination of sass & class all together! I wish I could have kept it. One of those favs you want to wear again! It was comfy & stunning all at the same time! HIGHLY RECOMMEND! The hubs loved it too, so that was a bonus! I'm 5'5" and about 140 at the moment. 34DD & wore the 38R. I could have worn the 40R as well but it had a little extra material in the waist. Love the option of having two sizes to pick from! Rent it and you'll see!
Hugs the right areas. Elegantly beautiful
Loved the soft lightweight velvet material. Very form fitting but such a beautiful look. Stretch fabric was wonderful. No spanx required. I would definitely rent again.
Fit was great and the dress was so comfortable. Would absolutely rent again
I rented this for a Mardi Gras ball!!! I got several compliments and it fit like a glove! The ruching on the stomach made any stomach I did have not noticeable!!! I was very pleased!!

links_Review_Title: Wore this for my husband’s annual black tie work banquet!
links_Review_Text: Black velvet kept me warm and classic. The deep v neckline has mesh to hold it in place. I wore a sticky bra with this. Loved it!!!
It fit perfectly in all of the right places and was super easy to dance in as well. I would definitely recommend this dress and rent it in the future again!
This fit like a glove! Highlighted my curves and hid my gut. The slit is a bit high, but not revealing. The dip for cleavage is great and has a nude mesh to keep the girls in.

links_Review_Title: This dress made me feel so comfortable and confident!
links_Review_Text: This dress is so comfortable and flattering! Fits like a glove and I got so many compliments! The deep "V" is actually a see-thru fabric so I never had to worry about falling out. This was for a winter black tie wedding in New Orleans and it kept me warm! Would highly recommend.

Fit like a glove. Tight enough to keep my boobs in place and the mesh within the v made it less scandalous for the wedding I was attending. (For women with larger boobs it might be a bit too sexy for a wedding) The slit in the middle goes up pretty far, but as long as you’re aware of it, it’s not too much. The ruched mid section in front and back added such a unique and flattering look. I got a lot of compliments and inquiries about this dress! I’m 5’3” and 125 lbs and I loved wearing this velvet dress
Fit perfectly! I said runs small only bc this is a European size 2, which fits like a zero. Loved this dress so much!

links_Review_Title: The most compliments I have ever received on a dress:)
links_Review_Text: Fit like a glove, flattering, comfortable, perfect length. I would wear this dress over and over again!!

links_Review_Title: The most comfortable dress to dance in! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
links_Review_Text: The Cinching around the waist is very flattering. Sexy with the deep plunge but also very appropriate! I typically wear a size 12 in the designer dresses, but order the 14 as a back up. Both fit because they have a little stretch in the fabric, but chose to wear the 14 for comfort and ability to tear up the dance floor!!! Don't question, just order it!
So comfortable and cozy for a NYE black tie wedding. I would definitely recommend it for a winter wedding or any winter occasion. Compliments allllll night and I felt great in it too!

This dress fit me perfectly. The material has some stretch to it. The long sleeves were perfect for a December wedding in New Jersey. I could not wear a bra, so I used fashion tape, but it was fine. I highly recommend this dress!

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress. The slit was perfect and so was the drastic deep
links_Review_Text: Wore this to our annual holiday party and it was a hit. It gripped my curls perfectly. The cleavage deep did these Tata's all the justice and the slit up the middle was everything. Material was velvety and gorgeous. Got so many compliments. Loved it 😍🥰
I received so my compliments on this dress! My only complaint was the it kept twisting the the slit in front looked more like a side slit. Still loved it.

This dress made me feel stunning. It was fun to feel this fancy! The under bodice felt uneven a lot and slit is not appropriate to sit in ( full lap exposure).. the zipper puckered out at the bum BUT~ all worth it bc of so many reasons!!

links_Review_Title: Might buy this dress..best dress from RTR
links_Review_Text: I'm between a 6 and 8. The 6 fit perfectly. All other dresses I'm going to compare to this now. If you have an hourglass shape this is a great dress. It was warm and had enough stretch. Hit me mid calf which worked out (was worried looking at the model it wouldn't be flattering). The rooshing is front and back. So many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Wore to a formal masquerade work parry and got compliments all night long!
links_Review_Text: The great thing about this dress besides being comfortable, is that it's the perfect combo of sexy and conservative. I wore boob tape, but you don't necessarily have to. Because the plunging neck line goes so far down, you cannot wear high-waisted shapewear because it will show thru. I wore a mid-waisted shaper thong but you don't necessarily need to wear shapewear with this dress either. It's great. Classic black velvet with a classic sexy vibe.

links_Review_Title: Great deep V without the worry!
links_Review_Text: Amazing dress for a holiday party! I wore this to a work party wand it was classy even with the deep v. The best part was that there was zero risk of exposure with the neckline. The high Lakota in the front was a bit much but only when you sat down.

Absolutely loved this dress and I got a ton of compliments. It's beyond comfortable and looks amazing for a winter formal event. The only caution I will add is the front slit can be a little high if you're tall when you sit so cross your legs.

This dress is everything and more! Sexy without showing too much of the goods. I was able to wear a nubra without trouble. Even when dancing the entire night, I wasn't too hot. Shows off your great curves! I'd happy rent this again

This dress was beautiful. I am between 2-4 and the size 4 fit perfectly. The sheer nude Fabric makes the deep V not too revealing . The long sleeve velvet is great for cold weather. Wore to a black tie event.
Dress was comfortable, flattering and just the right amount of daring with the deep v

links_Review_Title: Show stopper! Perfect for cooler weather
links_Review_Text: This dress is AMAZING. The fabric is stretchy so it's incredibly comfortable, the illusion panel means no fear of any indecent exposure :) I also love the slight ruching down the front - I normally don't like that touch but it's very subtle and makes it extra flattering from the side.

links_Review_Title: Mad Men Themed Christmas Party Glam!!!
links_Review_Text: Perfect dress to sparkle and stand out at a fun 60's themed Mad Men Christmas.....party-dressed it up with pearls and fur!! The colors are beautiful, sequins are comfortable (not scratchy) fabric has a little stretch, but it is slim in the hips. I would love to rent again and wear for a night in Vegas!!

This dress is so much fun! The 6 fit, but the 8 was better. I went with black tights and ankle boots. The fabric / texture is so cool - black, white, and royal blue thread, clear reflective sequins. I got so many compliments! I would love to rent again!

It is a beautiful dress. It does not hug your body. It's a little too short but if you want to show off your legs, go ahead! I was trying to figure out what type of shoes to wear. It was great for a club party at Vegas.

This dress is cut very straight and short. I'm a 6/8 and could barely get it over my hips. The zipper is functional and could have been used to add more hip room, but then this would have been a weird tunic/dress. Not for me!

links_Review_Title: Tweed dress with sparkles sewn in!
links_Review_Text: This is amazing and fun! I layered as it was an office dinner setting
I am usually a 2, went with a 4 and it fit perfectly!

I made the mistake of ordering up because I thought the designer ran small. It's quite spacious and I felt a bit too boxy in it because of the size discrepancy. I may try it again in my normal size 12
Slightly uncomfortable in arm pit area- but that always happens with sequins!

links_Review_Title: Cute and great fit - but WAY too short for tall ladies.
links_Review_Text: Im 5'9 and there's no way it would've worked. The zipper detail and material are super cute though.
Loved this dress, it complimented my rose purple and rose gold hair perfectly. Styled for a co defense with lavender oxfords and a white 3/4 sleeve boyfriend blazer.

links_Review_Title: Cute fun, more sparkly than I expected.
links_Review_Text: Cute, fun, more sparkly than expected. difficult to zip up because of the sequins

links_Review_Title: AMAZING but it doesn't fit me!
links_Review_Text: Was concerned the cut would be too narrow for my pear shape, and I was right! I sized up and it was enormous on top, and too tight around hips (even when scandalously unzipping the front). Otherwise, material is gorgeous (softer than something sequined would usually be) and it would look amazing on someone with narrower hips!

Rented this for a couple of evenings out. Stretchy, form fitting fabric. Really comfortable. Felt sexy without showing skin. Only downside is you must wear a strapless bra, never my favorite. Will definitely rent again.

I think this is a great, versatile top and the picture doesn't do it justice. I wore it to work twice; once with a pencil skirt and once with black pants. I definitely would have worn this for an evening out with jeans if I'd had the opportunity.
Fun top, wore it out on the weekend and to work. It's a comfortable stretchy material. Small fit me perfectly.

links_Review_Title: I received compliments every time I wore this top!
links_Review_Text: Loved this top, comfy and can be dressed up or down!
Cute top for a night out with the girls. Runs a little large
Very easy to wear black top. Looks fashionable and dressy without trying. Looked good with different jeans. Size Medium looked great on me.
Kept this top for two months and wore it all the time! Loved it! Cute with jeans or with black pants to dress it up a bit.
Adorable shirt and great transitional shirt for fall. I received tons of complements on this, wore it multiple times, and will be renting it again. Great date night/ every day shirt.

links_Review_Title: Interesting spin on the black top
links_Review_Text: Great stretchy interesting top - very comfortable and cute .

links_Review_Title: Feels like a sweater, looks like a million bucks
links_Review_Text: This is surprisingly comfortable! The cut was perfect, and it's hard for me to find things that are not too tight in the shoulders but still look fitted.
I loved the velvet and little flowers. It highlights your legs since everything else is covered up.

links_Review_Title: I really liked the style of the dress, it's not too formal, but still elegant.
links_Review_Text: The dress is true to size.

links_Review_Title: Perfect fit for a short girl!
links_Review_Text: I'm only 5' feet tall so I was nervous about renting a dress I couldn't shorten but this was actually perfect. I wore it to the company holiday party so it was an appropriate length. The dress was a beautiful material and I'm slightly disappointed I don't get to keep it!
Wore this dress for a holiday party and LOVED it! Fits so well and was very flattering.

Pros : Super Slimming for hour glass figure. I am usually a size 6 and I'm glad I sized up... only a 10 was left and it fit perfectly for my large bust! Cons: it was a bit worn. I'm petite so it wasn't too short on me. Perfect for a family wedding in Canada!

Fit well and I loved the velvet look, but the buttons on the back are a pain. Even buttoning half of them before donning and using the zipper still took 10 mins to get dressed. I asked my bf for help but I guess he didn't have the dexterity needed. Cute though, and good length for petites.
Loved the velvet fabric, buttons, sleeves. A little juvenile/cheap overall but I still liked it. Went up one and fit perfectly.

links_Review_Title: Love! Wish I could own this!
links_Review_Text: This dress is exactly the same style of another Free People dress I ended up renting the same week but this is my favorite of the two. The velvet really makes this dress more wearable as it does not wrinkle. The floral pattern is subdued and pretty. Other renters note the buttons--yes there are tiny buttons up the back of this dress but it is not necessary to unbutton all of them to get this dress on as it does have a hidden zipper. The bust is small so I didn't wear a bra. If you have a more average or larger sized bust, definitely size up. The shape of this dress is fantastic and I received compliments all night--if I ever see this for sale, I will definitely purchase it and add to my regular closet. LOVE!

links_Review_Title: Got tons of compliments on my birthday!
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress. I usually wear a 10 but the dress is extremely short. I'd advised to size up.

Rented this with my Unlimited discount for a casual neighborhood party, I did not expect to like it as much as I did!!!! Free People typically runs large, this dress fit perfectly and was incredibly comfortable and easy to wear. The fabric was super soft, bell sleeves were adorable and fun, cut of the dress was very flattering in all the right places. Great dress for a cooler night, can easily be dressed up or down!! Would definitely consider renting again!!
Very flattering shape but tight and hard to button up in the back. Soft crushed velvet and kind of short so best with pants

I wore this to a family party that was more formal-y with tights. It was super cute! I'm a huge fan of Free People and actually own lots of FP dresses and if I found this in stores, I would have bought it! I'm pear shaped and usually a true 6 in most dresses. This fit true to size but because of my big butt, it was a little short and flared in the behind.

Adore this dress, one of my first rentals and it fits perfectly. A little on the short side but with stockings it worked perfectly. The buttons down the back are my favorite part but the velvet patterned material is also gorgeous.

Trust the reviews on this being small. They didn't have a 12 so I went with my normal size 10. My thoughts were that free people typically runs big so the 10 should fit like a 12. Nope! It was snug. But no one could tell. I got a ton of compliments and it was very flattering! I don't recommend wearing to dinner as it's a bit uncomfortable around the waist/rib cage. But if you're getting this for a party or a night out where you'll be standing, definitely! I'll definitely rent again in the bigger size.

Conservative but sexy. Black velvet, white with subtle orange and green flowers slightly above knee height for a petite person. A-line with comfortable flare sleeves. Mock turtle neck top. Many tedious buttons up the back. Due to Zipper up the side you can avoid buttoning/unbuttoning all of them. Just unbutton enough to slip over head. Easy enough to unbotton a few without assistance but definitely needed assistance buttoning the last few around mock turtleneck to get on. I sized up to a 6. It fit comfortably. I loved the dress and look forward to wearing again this fall
I wore it for a Friday work day. It's casual and the print is very cute. I am normally a size 4 but sized up after reading the comments and 6 was perfect. The buttoning of the back is a bit annoying.
Loved the little flowers and the button details, got tons of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Absolutely love this dress!! I wore it for two different occasions and received so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Very flattering, runs a little small. Typically I were a size 10.

links_Review_Title: Wore this all day on Thanksgiving day.
links_Review_Text: This definitely runs small. I'm usually a 6 in free people, but could have gone for the 8. It still fit, but was super snug around the waist line. The waist line is also very high, so very tight in the rib cage. Did get itchy around the neck after wearing all day. Love the pattern.

Very flattering fit! I liked that it was tight at the top and then flared out . If you have a larger chest you may want to size up though due to the fitted top part. For work, I paired with black tights because otherwise I felt it would have been too short in the back. You totally could wear this for a night out or casual event! Also on the back there are buttons that are super cute but you most likely will need help with closing the ones at the top of the back. Overall really loved this dress and felt like the material was nice quality. Definitely would rent again as you can truly dress it up or down!

I don't know how to describe this nightmare of a dress. If your bust is over five inches larger than your natural waist, this sucker is NOT going to go on over your head. If your hips are over four inches larger than your natural waist, it is NOT going over your bum. Unfortunately, I am both. After wriggling and writhing into this dress, I realized that it has no stretch, a strange gathering in the bust, and no easy way to close. Would not recommend for any hourglass gals.

I loved this dress, it fit however was slightly short but would've been fine with tights. I decided not to wear it however, because it has about 20 buttons up the back to close it! I was getting ready alone and literally wouldn't have been able to do them myself, so I wore something else.
Love the material, love the length, it has a gothic sexy feel to it, button down the back a bit tricky to button alone at home but I did it !

links_Review_Title: Very short and tight in the wrong places.
links_Review_Text: The neck is tight and the dress is incredibly shortly. If you are tall or have larger boobs it will likely be ill fitting
Loved this dress. Rented it for a photoshoot. Photographed well and was very cute on. There are a ton of buttons so make sure someone can help you!
Loved the Velvet texture

links_Review_Title: Itʻs a great twist on a throwback witch-y, goth style.
links_Review_Text: Very cute dress, especially with knee high boots. Buttons are only a tin bit finicky, however, thatʻs what makes it special.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! Perfect for a fall night out or date. Got many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fit it true to size- very comfortable and very flattering. Only thing I would say is make sure you have someone to help you with the buttons in the back, hard to do on your own!

links_Review_Title: Such a cute yet chic 90s throwback vibe!
links_Review_Text: Wore this for Christmas Eve dinner. Dressed it up with jewelry, black tights, booties. Material is super comfortable, dress is fitted and flattering, but forgiving. Hugs in the right places, doesn't squeeze you. Length is short, so if you have longer legs, be cautious. I'm 5'6 and with dark black tights, wasn't an issue.
Fit is a bit baggie if you’re shorter (5’2) it doesn’t tend to be flattering

links_Review_Title: Cute silhouette but wasn't my favorite dress
links_Review_Text: I thought this dress was cute on the hanger. On my body (I'm 5'2), it was a little longer than I'd hoped and very tight in the bust (I'm 34A). The sleeves were unique but a little bigger than my liking. We went out dancing and this dress just kept in all the heat!

links_Review_Title: Trying to button the whole thing
links_Review_Text: The buttons are beautiful, but tedious to button. Also, if you live alone, it could prove difficult to button the last few at the nape of the neck. Proportions of the sleeves aren't great. I should have gotten an 8. It almost fit, but I couldn't completely zip it up
So flattering, fits perfectly and is so comfortable!

links_Review_Title: VERY small. size up 1...2 sizes if you have curves
links_Review_Text: i am a true 10, and i could barely breathe in the 12. although the dress zipped, it was very tight on my chest (36 DDD) and short. I have a small waist but large thighs and bottom and the dress BARELY covered my whole bottom. was too inappropriate to wear out. however, very pretty & nice material and would be lovely option for petite women.

It was a little big for me as I sized up according to other people's reviews but I do think it's pretty true to size, it's just the type of fabric that doesn't give you any wiggle room should you need it (especially with the buttons).. but overall loved the look, it's super cute and comfortable and sophisticated

links_Review_Title: Sexy and classy, all in one!
links_Review_Text: While the dress runs true to size, the fit is a bit snug right under the chest. I found this to be flattering because it accentuates a narrow waist before becoming more lose on the hips -- perfect for someone that has a wider bottom, like me! Perhaps the only problem I found is that the dress tends to ride up so slightly, so I had to be conscious of this when I sat down. The material is super soft and the dress can be worn to both semi-formal and formal occasions depending on the shoes and accessories you pair it with. The buttons on the back look very elegant, although they can be frustrating to get through without help. Overall, flattering in the right places. Sexy, cute and classy while keeping it comfortable. Would definitely rent again.
Tiny dress , not true to size. I ordered a size 12 it looked like a size 4 immediately before I attempted to try it on
I wasn't into this one, not my personal style. It looked more cutesy and more kimono-y in person than in the photos.
Super tight across my shoulders and not flattering on me. Ended up not wearing. Probably would be cute on someone with a more petite frame.

I loved this dress but it's standing room Only ...even one size up. I called it my "Gloria dress"( Modern Family) cute classy but no stretch so you take really small steps and have to put your shoes on first.

This was the perfect vacation party dress. I would buy this dress bc of how comfortable and sexy I felt in it. The only part that was off was the fit in the bust under the arms. Otherwise the fit, length and front slit were absolutely perfect

links_Review_Title: It was nicely fitted but still comfortable
links_Review_Text: Great dress- I got lots of compliments on it all night. It does however run VERY small. I had to exchange 2x before finding the right size. Other than that it was great! Would totally rent again.
Fits true to size but very tight! I ripped the front slit. I'd rent again though!

I got so many compliments on this dress. I don't usually wear anything bodycon when I'm going to be eating/drinking but seam made this dress so slimming! I had the best time dancing the night away and I wish I took less pics so I could wear this everywhere, all the time!
Rented this dress for my birthday. Hugged in all the right places! Would be cute dressed down with some white sneakers too!

I loved this dress! However that being said the fit is off. I could get into it ok but through my hips it was super tight and would not have been wearable. I had plenty of extra room in the bust as well so ordering a bigger size likely would have made the top way to big for my small chest. But beautiful material and would have been perfect if I didn't have hips.

I normally wear a 4 in this brand but got several sizes up based on the reviews. This dress fits so weird!! It fit me really well in my mid section and hips but was HUGE around the bust and shoulders. I don't think I could have sized down though because of the fit on my hips. I really wanted to love this dress! Too bad
A little snug around waist. Black lining in front showed. Very low cut in chest.

I rented this for my bachelorette party in Miami and it couldn't have been more perfect! Extremely flattering dress, but I do see what others mean by it being a weird fit. I am not large chested by any means, but the top part of the dress seemed to have more given than the rest of it. I would rent again!
This dress was too small- while the app urged me to size up, I think I'd need 2-3 sizes up to make it work.
Rally liked this but it was a little too tight around my butt and thighs

I am a size 6/8 32DD with a long torso. While I was able to fill out the chest of a size 10, the slit in the front of the dress left less than 1/2 inch from slit top to indecent exposure. If I would have ordered a 12, the chest likely would have been too large and the slit would still have been dangerously high.

I am 5'8 155 34DDD and the 10 is a great fit for me. The top has ample room for the girls. It's tight in the hips and stomach and a tad little room still available at bust. I would definitely say this dress is best for larger busts. Definitely not good for pear shapes. Order based off your hips and beware if small chested.

links_Review_Title: Fun dress but runs super small in the hips
links_Review_Text: Rented this dress for an upcoming vacation. It is a gorgeous well made dress but runs very small. If you are pear shaped or have a booty, size up. I wear a 12 in majority of the clothes on Rent the Runway but this wouldn't go over my hips.

The fit was great! Little bigger on the top but able to wear strapless bra if needed. Hugged curves enough. I would have downsized if I had time so do that for the snug fit. Stretchy material will hold you in and look good!

Definitely snug in the midsection - even if you have a slight belly pooch it will be seen in this dress. Based on the reviews, I sized up but still found it a bit snug in the midsection through the hips.
This dress is great! Unfortunately my hips could not fit into the size 4. I will definitely order again in a larger size!
hugs all the right places, very flattering

links_Review_Title: Pretty cheetah dress that didn't fit
links_Review_Text: All of the reviews said that this dress ran way small, so I ordered up 1-2 sizes and it's way too big. If I had to guess, I would say it runs true to size. It is a pretty dress. Too bad it didn't fit.
I am about 5't 130 and fit. I couldn't get this size six on. Size way up. I sent it back.

links_Review_Title: not worn - party canceled due to corona virus scare.
links_Review_Text: not worn - party canceled due to corona virus scare. Strange fit. would not have been able to wear this even if I wanted.
I could not get this dress over my hips! Super cute, thought it would fit true to size. It may, if you have the right body type!

links_Review_Title: zipped it up....but couldn't move. size UP!
links_Review_Text: Cute dress, but very tight + no stretch. I rented for a bachelorette in Miami and am not bringing it bc I won't be able to dance!!

I'm obsessed with this dress, but I have to knock off a star for this ridiculous sizing. It runs two sizes too small so if you rent this, be sure to order up. I had to return the 6 and 8 and am now waiting on the 10. If you can get the size right, it's gorgeous.
The dress is fitted and has a wide V-neckline -- if you are chesty, the girls will be out. But it's otherwise fun and sexy!
Didn't like anything about this dress. The fabric reminded me of silk pajamas and the length was awkward for my height.

Luckily, I knew this brand ran small so I ordered a size up, BUT even the 6 is so form fitting and unflattering that I can't even zip it up. The material has no stretch. Unfortunately won't be wearing.

links_Review_Title: So small and has zero stretch. I am normally a 4 in dresses, but would probably need an 8.
links_Review_Text: Cute, but definitely small.

It's dark, so pictures don't do it justice! It was a lovely fit and easy to wear. I would say it was true to size- sometimes I'm a 6 on bottom, but the 4 fit me perfectly. There's stretch in the fabric. I did feel like the velvet on the but Area stretched out a bit by the end of the night. Would rent again!!
The jumpsuit was so comfortable and fit like a glove the entire afternoon/evening. I received so many compliments on the color and style. Will definitely rent again!
It fits true to size. If you have a smaller chest, the top could be a tad big, but easily pinned! I'm only 5'2", so the pants were a little long, but I just bunched. Overall a great rental!

links_Review_Title: Low maintenance and STILL A STUNNER!!
links_Review_Text: This outfit really was comfortable, just like I'd read in previous reviews when I was deciding if I should go for it or not. The color and the velvet is gorgeous -- everyone notices, in a good way! The only thing to think about is the bathroom. You'll want to have a bathroom buddy to help you with the clasp on the back of the neck. Or if you have an overactive bladder, maybe rethink the jumper route.

wore this to a rehearsal dinner and felt very fancy. the velvet material is so luxurious in person--comfy but elegant. The legs of the pants were a little long on me, but otherwise great fit, so comfy! got tons of compliments
I WILL be buying this. The fit is perfect, so flattering and had a million compliments!

This velvet jumpsuit was everything! Rented it for a vacation in Vegas and it was so comfortable that I did not want to take it off. It fits true to size and the velvet gives it a classy elegance. Loved the tie in front. Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: Was an amazing jumpsuit! Highly recommend for a winter wedding or event.
links_Review_Text: It fit like a glove. I sized up and it gave me a bit more room but the tie helped to lock it all in an extremely flattering way. It was so comfortable, beautiful color and great fabric.
Loved this jumpsuit! Found the fit to be perfect for me, v isn't too deep so you can still wear a regular bra. The zipper was a bit stiff at first, but by the end of the night it wasn't an issue!

This jumpsuit was for a high school senior photo shoot and the green velvet was perfect for the mood we were going for! She's usually a small, occasionally an extra small and the XS fit her like a glove. She's about 5'7". The length on her was mid shin or so, which was shorter than I thought it would be originally, but it was stunning. She felt so beautiful in the jumpsuit! I'm thinking about renting this for myself one day, but I am definitely not her body type ;)
I wore this for my winter bridal shower and felt sexy, confident and beautiful! I had so many compliments

I never wanted to take this jumpsuit off and honestly have already been trying to rent it again. The material had some stretch which made it comfortable and velvet is such an incredible fabric to wear! I fall between a 4 and a 6 typically and I found the 4 of this jumpsuit to fit perfectly. Can't recommend this enough!

I wore this for my family Christmas and it is so beautiful. The green velvet is amazing. I got so many compliments (someone even called me Beyonce!) and I loved it. The medium fit fine, but the vneck was a little low so I safety pinned it. But otherwise everything else was amazing- the length was fine, the fit was fine.
Amazing jumpsuit! Classy and sexy all in the right ways! Had so much fun wearing this for Christmas!

I rented this because I loved the look. I didn't really have an event, but wore it to a family Christmas dinner (which is why I wore odd socks with it). It was beautiful and super comfy. The picture isn't great lighting. It's more emerald green in real life. The front is cut low (for a family Christmas dinner), so I wore a tank under. If I wore it to a party I wouldn't have worn the tank. I wish it had pockets and would have given it 5 stars if it did. I'd totally rent it again!

links_Review_Title: So comfy and so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: This was the most flattering and comfortable jumpsuit! The material is stretchy so there is definitely some give on sizing. Highly recommend!!

links_Review_Title: And on the seventh day God created this green velvet jumpsuit
links_Review_Text: This jumper is EVERYTHING. Emerald green velvet. To die for. They only had an XL in the Chicago store and it was a little big on me but still got it. The waist tie in the center works wonders to tighten it – and it was great for curvy and busty women like myself. If I had to order online I would have gotten a size large instead. Rent this now! She's a stunner
I loved this jumper! It was very flattering. And perfect for a Christmas party. The hem was a little long, but otherwise it for very well. I would love to rent again!

links_Review_Title: It fit perfectly! It was lush, luxurious and a hit at the gala. It was warm, comfortable and sexy.
links_Review_Text: It fit perfectly! It was lush, luxurious and a hit at the gala. It was warm, comfortable and sexy. It ran just slightly smaller than I'd like but it highlighted my bum which was a lewk! CONS: Due to people stepping into the pants previously, the top was larger than it should've been. The hook and eye at the top of the back did not stay connected, it came loose multiple times causing the chest and cleavage area to enlarge. It was OK for me since I didn't mind showing my nice bra but it was a bit annoying to feel the hook hitching on to my hair. Other than that I have zero complaints.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for my office holiday party!!!
links_Review_Text: The color was so flattering. It ran true to size, maybe a little big but not in an unflattering way. The color is more beautiful in person. It is also so stretchy and comfortable -- I felt like i was wearing pajamas!! Everyone complemented me -- it was a hit.

I would buy this for myself and all my friends if I could! Wore this to my work holiday party this year. Semi formal affair so it was perfect. Great with flats or heels. I have a smaller bust and am between a 4 and 6 but needed the Medium so it's running small for sure. The small Spears tiny in person. V neck is not too deep for my small bust and I wore a normal bra. Rent this for sure!!!

I loved this suit! The color was beautiful and the velvet really made it pop. It was low cut and I had a hard time keeping my bra from showing so I had to use fabric tape. It was sooo comfy, it felt like I was wearing a velour tracksuit all night.

I wore this to see a broadway show and it was perfect! It fit great and was so comfortable. I received so many compliments too! My only complaint is that it didn't have pockets- that would've made it even better. Also, it's a bit big on top so if you have a smaller chest size like I do, I would suggest in safety pinning it.
Just gorgeous!

links_Review_Title: Standout color and style plus so comfortable
links_Review_Text: Wore this to receive an award at a work event - it was the perfect mix of style, comfort and a great color. I loved that the short sleeves came to my elbows for a little more warmth and coverage. Considered pinning the front but it didn't end up being too revealing so left as is. So many compliments on the style and color - I just had to buy it and expect to wear to every holiday event!
Highly recommend! Great jumpsuit, runs TTS. Perfect for the holidays! Sexy low cut front without being too sexy!
Only giving 4 stars because the neckline is a little too low for the undergarments I would prefer to use/I'll need to safety pin this to make it appropriate for myself.
I usually don't write reviews, but this outfit called for it! So many compliments all night. Definitely would recommend to everyone.
One of my favorite rentals! Loved it!

I wore this to my company's holiday party and got tons of compliments! I was 3 months postpartum and probably a size 6 ish. The medium was too loose; the small was a little tighter than I would have liked at my current comfort level but it still looked great. I am 5' 3" so the legs were full length on me but it looked fine. It was thick fabric so it was perfect for winter. Definitely will rent again!

I wore this jumpsuit for a charity event. It was so comfortable and fit perfectly. For being short (5'0") and rather busty (34DD), I was concerned about how this may fit but the length was perfect and it wasn't too low cut. My only complaint is that the zipper was terrible, very difficult to zip/unzip.
Fits true to size. Gorgeous, deep green color and soft fabric. Got tons of compliments. Zipper can sometime stick around the waist, but other than that, no complaints! Would rent again!

I loved this jumpsuit. I'm usually a size 4-6 and the M fit well. I did use some fashion tape to keep the neckline from gapping as I have a smaller chest and didn't fill out the top. I have somewhat wide calves/ankles for my body size and the lower legs were not as loose as on the model, but it wasn't a big concern. I liked that the tie lets you get the perfect waist fit. I'm 5'9" with a long torso and the length was fine. Overall I loved this jumpsuit and it was perfect for a work party.

Feels so soft. Very comfortable to wear. Wish I would of size down. Ran a bit large, but made it work with the stash that tied. The green is so pretty and it stands out. The front is very low cut. Got so much compliments while wearing this jumpsuit. Def will rent again.
I loved the fit, the material was pretty and it was well made. Loved the color as well. Received many compliments on this and would rent again!

This jumpsuit was so comfortable and perfect for a post-holiday date. It was really easy to wear (regular bra, not too form-fitting, heels and jewelry I already owned) but looked so special. I would absolutely wear this to a fall/winter wedding or fancier holiday party. Would highly recommend!
Comfortable fit, beautiful jumpsuit for a winter event! Tie at the waist made it perfect to cinch the waist!

An absolute knock-out outfit for a holiday party or other festive event. I got so many compliments and was so comfortable all night. As with all jumpsuits it's a bit annoying to go to the bathroom, etc. but definitely worth it.
Rented for thanksgiving with family. It was comfortable, warm, and gorgeous. Very stretchy fabric, felt like pajamas. I said it ram small because as a size 8/10 it fit me with a little room to spare.

links_Review_Title: Such a comfortable choice for dancing and sitting and standing!
links_Review_Text: Adorable jumpsuit that garnered many compliments. My only complaint was the cross style top. It was a little too revealing for a larger buddy. I just popped on a bralette and it was perfect!

links_Review_Title: Cute option for baby shower guest
links_Review_Text: Rented this an option for a baby shower (that's been postponed because the world is insane). It's very comfortable, easy to wear. But it's definitely long - I'm 5'6" plus 3" heels and it was just off the ground.
Just right length with 3 inch heels

I ordered this dress in a medium and it fit perfectly everywhere but the chest (see second pic). I returned for the large. It was a little too long, but manageable with wedges. The small snap on the front didn't stay closed very well and there was still a gap in the chest.

I love wearing maxis during the summer- always so easy to put on. The color is really pretty but I wasn't a fan of the fit. Fit somewhat like a maternity dress. It was also tight under the bust and a little short for length as I like being able to wear wedges with maxis but I wasn't able to. Last thing, watch out for the wind as the slit will fly open.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful flowing fabric and a great color! Perfect for Spring or Summer
links_Review_Text: I wore the large and it fit me well. The closures are nice strong snaps and which I liked as it stayed put during a 4th of July concert/dance fest at the Hollywood Bowl! I received compliment after compliment. A great choice for my larger bust size with a snap to hold the front closed. It was still a little low cut so if you're wearing it professionally it may need a pin. Length was fairly long on my 5'6" height but the low block heels I wore with it kept it just off the ground. I would rent this again!

Wrap dresses generally look awful on me but this one was both easy to put on because it has snaps and insanely slimming. It looks like a pretty basic dress off but when you put it on it's magic. It is WAY too long for a short person though. I wore 3 inch heels and it still dragged on the ground; I had to bustle it when I walked like it was my wedding dress. And the top part was pretty loose even though I'm very busty lol. Still loved it though!
Wrap style dress Light and breezy for summertime.

Comfortable, flattering, and luxurious. This dress is a dream. You feel like a goddess walking down the street. It does run small up top so if your a bustier lady who normally wears a small, go with the medium.

With wedges it actually wasn't too long for me, and the fabric was so soft that it felt like I was wearing pajamas. I was so comfortable all day! I pinned the top out of modesty, but the way this dress wraps covers everything comfortably; it was great. Would definitely rent again!
Long but flattering. I am average height 5'6" and had to wear heels with the Large. Thin material but not see through. Wore with a white tank underneath. Chest snap was strong and stayed in place.

links_Review_Title: Nice dress for a beach vacation
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'8 and size S was the perfect length for me. If you're petite, you'll need heels! The fabric is light and comfortable.

Definitely a cute dress! A little too summery for the time of year I was hoping to wear it but it will looked cute with a jacket and boots! Flattering throughout the waistline but not too overflowing the bottom. More fabric on the skirt portion than I was expecting but not terrible.
The dress was lovely but showed too much cleavage to actually wear, I'm a DD/E so probably not the same for all.

This fabric is gorgeous and made me feel like I'd stepped out of Pride and Prejudice. Definitely has an empire waist. As it is a true wrap dress, there can be some flapping open when walking and sitting, so some care is required, but I loved it.
Super lovely! I'm a c-cup and it worked great, but if you're larger in the bust you may need to wear something under it.
Love this dress. I've traveled in it and worn it to work, it's fun and flattering, and can be paired with sandals, heels, or canvas shoes. I highly recommend!
It's a keeper. Simple and slimming Flows nicely when you walk. Low-v but not too low. Gives a pretty and upbeat yet serene vibe.
This dress is gorgeous! Not too low cut, no need to wear a shirt underneath if your big busted. It flows and moves with you.

links_Review_Title: Pretty design but not the most flattering
links_Review_Text: The snaps felt like they were about to rip off and if you have boobs (34DD) it's not the most flattering. It's thicker fabric that with boobs adds extra to the belly area. BUT I did receive comments how pretty it was.
This dress was so comfortable and the material was beautiful — only complaint was that it was a little long and could get caught underfoot if I didn't wear a heel.
The dress fits well, and is super comfy. If you are under 5'6", you'll need to wear heels.
Loved this dress. It did run a bit big. And the pictures don't show it but down the back are crystal buttons. Too much bling for work so I hide them under a cardigan.
Even though I got lots of compliments, I wasn't excited about this dress. It was very comfortable and liked the fit a lot. The print is not overwhelming, I would recommend.
This dress is gorgeous but if you're short and curvy not flattering.
The slit is high, but with tights it worked great. The buttons are diamonds- so I wore a jacket over it for work. Very comfy and cute pattern

links_Review_Title: Baby shower canceled due to Coronavirus :(
links_Review_Text: I am really bummed I didn't get to wear this since CA has been shut down. This was my first time wearing a jumpsuit and I wasn't sure I was going to like it, but I really do! The fabric is flowy and breathable, and the colors are even better in person. I have the size 6 on and felt like it fit...but if I were really going to wear this I'd probably switch to the 8 just because of my large boobs due to breastfeeding. No bra needed though. I'm 5'7" and the length is perfect with some wedges.

links_Review_Title: Wore this in Costa Rica. It was gorgeous, comfortable and fit great! No complaints!

links_Review_Text: Fit well. No bra needed. Super cute and comfortable. Tons of compliments.

At first I didn't love this piece, but after about 30 min I fell in love with it. It is so cute and the colors are so fun. I wore it to a baby shower and got so many compliments on it and I debated buying it. If you like jump suits I would definitely recommend this. For taller women, I'm 5'10" and have a longer than normal torso - fit great in the torso and the length was perfect for flats.
Not one single bad thing to say. I want to buy it.

Wore this for my bachelorette party and it was perfect! I was a bit worried about the chest area as I'm a 36DD but I was able to go braless and the girls were held in. I'm 5'4" so it was a bit long but I wore is with a low heel and it was fine. Highly recommend!
Fun and fabulous. Fit great and comfortable.

Between the colors and the light fabric, this could not be a more perfect jumpsuit. Wore this to an outdoor party and got more compliments then anything I ever rented before. If you're a fan of Lilly Pulitzer this is the essential summer rental. I'm 5'4" and was able to wear 3 inch wedge and not have any pant length issues. Could not recommend this enough!!
In love with this jumpsuit! Pretty print! I'm only 5'3 but wore wedges with and it was perfect!

Love a great romper and this one doesn't disappoint! Fun colors and print, light and breezy fabric, great fit. I have a long torso and get nervous when renting a romper as they usually are too short in the crotch- this one fit perfectly!

links_Review_Title: I was complimented by literally EVERYONE at a pre-wedding brunch on just how cute this jumpsuit is!
links_Review_Text: The colors are much brighter in person! The material is a dream come true! I am going to buy one! Super light weight material and the cut is very flattering. Not too loose to make it look like a bag but not too tight to show unwanted areas. The cups are lightly padded so no bra necessary! If you are looking for something to go from day to night, this is the one! I am 5'7" and wore 3 inch chunky heels and it was the perfect length!

Overall the jumpsuit fits in nicely, a little bit of a puff in the pocket area but that's to be expected. Little tight when you sit down for more curvy ladies. But overall very light very bright and fun.

links_Review_Title: Exquisite color and print for summer
links_Review_Text: Loved it so flattering a little difficult for larger chests but I was comfortable in it!! Wanna buy it but I can see it needed dry clean so I will just rent again!

links_Review_Title: this made me feel incredible, and the fit was amazing. hugged every curve but it wasn't tight.
links_Review_Text: this made me feel incredible, and the fit was amazing. hugged every curve but it wasn't tight.
This jumpsuit is so comfortable and has pockets! The top is fitted but the legs are loose and breezy. Such a fun summer outfit. Don't have to wear a bra with it since it has cups.
Not only is the super cute it is very comfortable and easy to take off to go to the bathroom!
So pretty but it's runs large. I'm normally a size 2 and I think a 0 still would have been too big. It's also way too long so plan on wearing wedges if you rent it!
I rented this for a beach vacation but it was way too long on me.
The front tie is sexy without being too revealing. And it's very comfortable. Can be dressed up or doen. I wore with a Jean jacket &wedges. As with all lilly, it is extremely long.
I wore this on a girls trip to Palm Springs. It was so comfortable and cute! I will definitely rent again on my next vacation to a warm spot.

links_Review_Title: Very long jumper and fits very tight in the bust.
links_Review_Text: Wanted to wear this for engagement pictures on the beach but the bust was way too tight and the length was way too long for my 5'5" frame with short legs. The print is cute and fun. The material was awful dressy for a jumper, seemed very delicate for anything other than a formal affair.
I wore this to a bridal lunch. It was beautiful and fit perfect!
I wanted to love this dress because of the beautiful print... wish Lilly Pulitzer would make jumpsuits for petite frames. Even with heels this gorgeous jumpsuit was unwearable for me!

I loved this Jumpsuit. It fit great and the color really complimented my fair complexion. It is really long, I am only 5'4 but I wore 4" heels and it was just enough to keep the pants off the ground. I suggest tall shoes for us shorties! I legit got 7 compliments from total strangers while wearing it. Fun summer outfit. I would also suggest clasping the area on top of the zipper because if you have a larger bust it will most likely zip down unless you clasp it. Otherwise, loved it!

This was great for a summer evening out! The fabric is super breezy and fun. Only the 6 was available, but I was able to zip it and wear it comfortably all evening. Length was a little long, even with 3 inch heels.
I loved everything about this jumpsuit from the gorgeous color, padded cups (no need for a bra!), material, and overall fit. It's just lovely. Wish I could keep it but sadly not this time.
