I love the colors and pattern. This piece is so beautiful but the pants are way too long, even with tall heels or wedges. Other than the length, it fits great everywhere else.
VERY long.
Super cute jumpsuit! Very comfortable with room to breath in this Texas heat! Bright colors made the outfit pop!

links_Review_Title: Did not end up wearing this.
links_Review_Text: The overall fit was fine, it was just extremely long on me even with heels.
I wish there was a 4L. It was tight in the crotch area. I may try sizing up if I rent again.
The print on this was great and I loved the top half. However, the bottom was overly blousy on me and the torso seemed unusually short. It's a comfy jumpsuit, just not the best for my body.

links_Review_Title: Coronavirus cancelled my event but couldn't stop me from trying on this gorgeous dress!
links_Review_Text: This dress is beautiful and nicely constructed. The drape is flattering - I just had a baby a few months ago and was very comfortable in this. The lace inserts are more see-through than I was expecting so it would have been a little risqué for the event I was planning to wear it to (an attorney dinner for my law firm). The waist has no give, so I would have been the 4 rather than the 2, which would have fit a little better in the chest but wouldn't have been comfortable zipped.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful fabric and perfect for a black tie.
links_Review_Text: Beautiful fabric and perfect for a black tie. The dress fit well and was forgiving for curvy ladies. I'm short (5 feet) and the dress was floor length for me, but worked out fine.

links_Review_Title: Wow! I loved this dress! I received so many compliments all night long!
links_Review_Text: So as many of the reviews have stated, the waist band is pretty tight. Although I said the dress "fits small" it was really only the waistband. In fact, when I tried on my size-up back-up dress the other parts of the dress seemed too big, even though the waist felt more comfortable. It wasn't tight enough to ruin my night... but a big meal or any bloating could have changed that. I wore a strapless black bra with this dress and did not have issues with the bra showing in the back. The front is actually kind of low cut, but the lace hid/meshed in with the black bra really well. The only other issue was the zipper was very hard to close and not because it was too tight. Not sure why that happens but it got stuck and I felt nervous I might break it. Overall, I really loved this dress and am so happy I rented it! I was sad to send it back!

links_Review_Title: The dress was gorgeous and so easy to wear. No Spanx or fancy bra required!
links_Review_Text: I loved wearing this dress! I enjoyed wearing a color other than black to a formal winter event. The dress wasn't too tight or itchy, and the length was just right for dancing (you don't have to worry about stepping on a hem). It was true to size as well. The only reason I'm not giving it 5 is because my husband had a hard time zipping me into it, and not because it was too tight--the zipper itself seemed to be of poor quality. But he got it eventually, and I loved how I looked in it!
The 12 was nit available so I ordered the 14. It was a bit large but I made it work. Easy to wear.... no special undergarments required. The zipper was a bit wanky so glad it wasn't tight.

I had wanted to rent this dress for a while and it did not disappoint! This dress was perfect for a winter wedding. The midi length was perfect since it was cold but the sheer lace cut outs at the top added a unique twist! Loved dancing in this dress all night!

Definitely a unique dress - color and lace details are amazing. Cons - you really need a special bra for this dress. The cut in the back is low...which I had known this because spent a very stressful pre-event day looking for a bra that would work. Waistline is not stretchy at all - I had to size up.
Dress was great accept for the zipper. I'm normally a 6 and wore the 6, but my chest area may have worked better in a size up. Length was great. Would recommend.

This dress was incredible - perfect for a winter wedding. It was very flattering and classy enough for a church wedding but fun enough to dance in. The dress fit a little small in the bodice where the band is but otherwise was perfect.

Dress fit perfect and received compliments ALL night! However as others have said the band does NOT give so no room to expand and it definitely requires one (or two) people to get it zipped! If I rented again I might size up one size for more comfort.

links_Review_Title: The dress was amazing and somebody told me I looked so Great Gatsby!
links_Review_Text: The fit in the waist was great, I usually wear a 4 but the 6 fort better in the waist, but the sleeves were a little lose so they would fall a little every now and then but nothing crazy. Loved the gold shimmer of the dress and the lacy front.
This dress feels very "old Hollywood" to me and I loved it.

Dress was fabulous once I got it zipped. We struggled to zip both my actual size and the back up 2nd size at the point where the "belt" of ribbon was introduced. But once my original size was zipped, it was great. Built in cups offered enough support. Many compliments from total strangers!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress for a fall wedding
links_Review_Text: The fit of this dress was just perfect! It's classy and the simple lace detailing along with the slight sparkle is the perfect holiday piece. I got so many compliments and not only felt comfortable but also felt beautiful and chic!

I rented this for a November wedding in New Jersey. I sized up for this and I'm glad I did. The waist was snug but the chest was very loose on me (larger chested women would probably have a nicer fit!). If I wasn't being careful the sleeves would fall down but I didn't have any issues with that, even while dancing at the reception, and it was such a fun dress to twirl in. So many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, but oddly tight fit at waist
links_Review_Text: This dress is beautiful and roomy except where the zipper needs to make a transition on fabric just below the bust on the back of the dress. I needed help zipping up. It was great to wear to a wedding and the slight shimmer made photograph well.

Perfect for a November wedding! The color, cut, and black lace details are so gorgeous; I received many compliments all night on how unique and beautiful the dress is. I'm short and curvy, but never felt like I was spilling out of the dress even though it did accentuate my bust...in a flattering way. Would 100% rent again for a fall/winter semi-formal event.

This dress is absolutely gorgeous. Incredible quality, gorgeous details and moves like a dream. I had the most fun twirling in it. It was super comfortable, but the top did get a bit tight after eating and drinking. Overall I would wear it again though, my husband asked if I could keep it!

I got so many complements on this dress, and it was so fun to wear and dance in. I did have to buy a backless bra to wear with it, as the back was just low enough to show a regular bra. However, the bodice of the dress is structured enough that I still felt quite supported. This was my first rental with RTR and it was such a great experience!

links_Review_Title: Five stars despite the annoying zipper!
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! At the time of the affair I was probably around 151 pounds. I'm usually an 8, but sometimes a 6, sometimes a 10, depending on the brand. The 8 fit great. The shoulders slipped a little and the zipper was hard to zip, but I loved this classy, unique dress. I got loads of compliments.

links_Review_Title: This dress was magical to wear! Received so many compliments and felt amazing in it!!
links_Review_Text: I normally wear a size 4, but was able to wear a 2, probably could have gone either way, but the chest area was a little too big on the 4. I will say the zipper catches and is difficult to zip. I needed a few people to help me, but we got it zipped :)

The lace v does go down quite low so I used an adhesive bra, but could have gotten away without anything probably as the dress has good support on its own. As others have said, the zipper is very stubborn. I had to run a pencil down the zipper to get it to go up and down a bit easier. Other than that the entire dress was fantastic. Very elegant, not too flashy but special and flattering on pear shape!

I am small boned. The bodice of this dress was snug - but not uncomfortably. The fabric was gorgeous, nicely weighted but not heavy. I wore it to an outdoor wedding and the evening was cool - the dress is elegant, perfect for a wedding. Numerous compliments all night long! Literally! Catherine Dean designs beautiful gowns - I would rent another in a heartbeat. Note that the zipper IS tricky as others have mentioned. It was frustrating - I had to enlist a girlfriend to get it zipped.

Like everyone has mentioned the black band/ribbon around the waist does not stretch. I didn't have an issue with this. I preferred it to be tight. I like my dresses to have give below the waist for extra food :) I had plenty of compliments all night and really enjoyed its vintage flair. It is a gold and black dress but honestly even in person I think it comes off more metallic olive green and black than gold. I was fine with it though. Watch your heels in this dress as the pretty fabric can get caught if you aren't careful.

This dress was absolutely perfect for a cocktail/formal optional charity event. The gorgeous detailing had women complimenting me all night. I felt like I was drippin' in gold! I would 1000000% rent this one again! Sizing note: I'm a true 2 in everything I wear, but the 4 was perfect for this one. I'd recommend sizing up if you're unsure!

links_Review_Title: Wore it for a masquerade ball!
links_Review_Text: True to size. I rented the 6 because that was the only size available. I could have used the four due to the length and shoulder area but it wasn't noticeable. Very well made and the fabric is beautiful in different lighting

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! Endless compliments all night
links_Review_Text: Such a great dress! Rented this for a "fancy casual" fall wedding in Seattle. Built in bra is very comfortable and supportive. The difficulty with the dress is that the zipper is extremely difficult to zip in the area where the black belt is. Don't rent this if you don't have anyone to zip the dress for you. The shoulders were a bit loose and tended to slip a little bit. But overall I loved this dress and would definitely rent again.
This dress is a stunner!

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! Would love to wear again
links_Review_Text: So pretty in person - I got a ton of compliments. The super in the back is slightly hard to zip (this was true for both sizes I wore). I wore a low back undergarment. I think the dress would be very long on a shorter person.
Wore this to a friends formal attire wedding. Great dress. Beautiful color. Compliments all night. The only complaint I have is the black ribbon around the rib cage is a little tight.
The color, cut, and style of this dress are so unique and flattering. I loved the lace on the sleeves and in the center and just overall look. It's definitely a show stopper
I wore this beautiful dress to a holiday party. The zip was hard to get up as it kept catching, so it did take a while to get into it.

links_Review_Title: loved the dress but too small so couldn't wear it

links_Review_Text: The gold sheen on this dress makes it fun and luxurious. Rented it for a 20's themed party and got lots of compliemnts. However, this dress looks kind of conservative (even a bit matronly?) on a large bust (34E) because the waist line nips in low and the black lace cut away down the front is still fairly modest.

It was an amazing dress to wear and I felt so glamorous! The only issue is getting the zipper up ... I couldn't figure out what it was getting stuck on. Overall, it was the perfect dress for my the occasion!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous material and color, shape is very flattering
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a formal event and this dress definitely stood out above the rest. I got a lot of compliments all night. The only reason I had to size up was because I have a broader ribcage and my usual size would've been too tight. Not a problem to size up and I didn't need to wear a bra with this! Loved it so much I wanted to keep it

links_Review_Title: I LOVED this dress. So elegant and classy for a NYE wedding!
links_Review_Text: This dress is beautifully made and fits like a dream. I have a pear body and it worked great. Would rent again and again!

links_Review_Title: Dress was classic and glamorous. Really loved the look.
links_Review_Text: Fit really well. Looked gorgeous. Highly recommend.

links_Review_Title: Dress arrived ready to wear and was in great condition. Compliments from strangers before wedding.
links_Review_Text: Black tie optional winter wedding.

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect for Easter!
links_Review_Text: Super comfortable and flattering, great for larger chested women, loved the pockets!
Such a beautiful dress. The size 8 was a little big on me but you can tie the top tighter so it held up. No bra needed. Pockets!

links_Review_Title: Such a cute dress. I got so many compliments at the wedding welcome party I wore it to.
links_Review_Text: Fit was a little large in the chest and I wore a strapless bra with it to help with that. Overall great fit

links_Review_Title: I thought this would be more work appropriate but was definitely on the fancy side
links_Review_Text: Good fit. Weirdly my bra would only show on the left side but not the right and I kept having the readjust. Much more sparkly than the pictures show but I still wore it to work because I didn't have anywhere else to wear it this week. Might rent again, but only for a specific party and not everyday wear.
Fits great except straps a bit long for me. I didn't pin it but it would fit better if I did. I love the back!

links_Review_Title: Solid dress - I got it for vacation and was super cute and comfortable!
links_Review_Text: Wanted a cute, chic but also comfortable dress for vacation. Loved the cut and the backless design - be warned it is a bit sparkly which doesn't come off in pictures. Overall a solid rental! Fit true to size
Beautiful beautiful dress! I got so many compliments!

Received compliments all day long. Dress fell nicely with great movement. Pockets were well structured and held cell phone with it showing. With the tie in the back it was no problem wearing without a bra.

links_Review_Title: The pockets and sparkle big A+++
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! The material was thick enough that you couldn't tell I was carrying a cell phone and keys in them. HUGE plus! The tie in the back was a little interesting. Could not find a bra that would work but did not feel uncomfortable not wearing one (38DDD.) The sparkle made the dress even better. Will rent again!

The fit was right on. I wore this out for anniversary dinner (and tattoos) with my husband. I thought I would be uncomfortable with the open back and the fact that I couldn't wear any of my bras with it (I'm a 36D), but I wasn't. I got so many compliments! I'm

I loved this dress, it was a little big in the chest area but overall fit comfortable. I just had a baby so I wanted something loose in the belly area, I think this dress was very flattering. The pockets were a plus and length was perfect.
Rented this for a brunch after a wedding but didn't end up wearing it. Instead wore it to a birthday brunch. It's pretty thick material but still breathable. I would definitely rent this again!
This dress was very flattering, but the colored stripes are very shimmery! I wasn't expecting that, and it made the dress too fancy for everyday wear (IMO) so I returned it.

I'm normally a 12-14 but have lost weight so I got a 10 as my backup size. Ended up going with the 10. Pros: pockets, flattering cut, comfortable Cons: the line on the boob zone, too much sparkle (the 2% metallic looked like more) I wore this to brunch with my husband but felt it was more of a wedding guest style with the metallic

I absolutely loved the fit of this dress. The only downside (for me) was that I don't have the most 'fit' back so it was really unflattering in the back and I had to wear a shirt over it. I loved the dress so much that I didn't care. The only reason I gave this dress 1 4 star and not 5 star was because it has a lot of 'shiny' thread throughout it, which I did not realize, nor can you tell from the pic. Not my jam but I really liked the dress otherwise.

It's fancy enough to be worn to a formal event (I.e wedding) or you can dress it down. The fabric is beautiful. The shape of the dress accentuates any curves. I ordered a 6; however, I think a 4 would have been better. I did not wear a bra with this dress because the top is adjustable. You can tie the back to the level of support you want in the chest area.

links_Review_Title: Very cute and comfortable with the right amount of coverage!
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size.

You can't tell from the photos, but there is a bit of sparkle in the fabric, which is like a very lightweight tweed. The dress was really cute, but it was hard to wear a bra with it (which was problematic). I am also short waisted, so I found I had to pin up the straps. I wore it with a cropped jeans jacket, which hid the back.

links_Review_Title: Too formal for a beach vacay
links_Review_Text: Great fit! Super adorable dress. I chose not to wear it because it was a bit more formal than it appears in photos. Would be great for a summer or spring wedding!
Back looked a bit awkard but very pretty
Very comfortable and easy to wear. No bra necessary.

I wore this for my bachelorette wine tour party. It was a really cute dress! I loved the slight sparkle the dress had, but I don't think it's over the top like other reviewers. The dress overall fit, but was a bit snug in the bust.
Super girly and fits really nice
Difficult to wear a bra, but the top is not low cut, and can fit inserts.

links_Review_Title: A little sparkle goes a long way!
links_Review_Text: Fun to wear! True to size. The hints of sparkle were everything! The bow in the back was a little tricky, otherwise it was a hit.

What a great dress! Fits wonderfully and with the open back, it was perfect for a palm springs party. Would definitely recommend! Although be sure to get a smaller backup size. I ended up going a size down.

links_Review_Title: So cute i had to wear it twice.
links_Review_Text: I wore this to two events. I loved the back of the dress. Really flattering fit and I liked the pockets and fabric.

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments. Love the pockets
links_Review_Text: Cute dress. Material was thicker than I thought and straps a touch long. I wasn't sure I loved it but ended up getting tons of compliments

links_Review_Title: Cute dress, just runs big and didn't have time before my event to ship it back and exchange.
links_Review_Text: Runs large!

links_Review_Title: Unfortunately I did not get to wear this dress as the fit was not right.
links_Review_Text: This dress is very pretty (though like other reviews, more sparkly than shown in the pictures). Even though I ordered up a size, the dress was still too tight across the back and made my back look terrible. I did not even wear this dress.

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress for a day of wine tastings for my bachelorette, and it was amazing!
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! It is shimmery, so if you aren't expecting that, be prepared. It wasn't overwhelming for me, though. I was able to not wear a bra with it, but it was a little loose in the top. I had problems with the straps falling down a lot, but I seriously just loved how comfortable this dress was! 5'9" ; 155 lbs ; 36D

Wore this for a brunch post wedding (not my own wedding). Very comfortable and the top can be tied tighter so relatively adjustable for bust size. The positioning is such that you can cover up normal bra straps so easy to wear, though you could probably go without too bc fabric is thick enough. Fabric is thick without being suffocating so still ok to wear in warmer weather. Just maybe not too warm since it's also long.
Material quality could have been better and was a little big on me, but overall a pretty piece to wear for day.
I got a lot of compliments on this cute feminine dress with a little sparkle in the stripes.
I loved this dress but it was too lose in the straps, wish you could tighten them. The dress fit lose but I ended up not wearing it.

links_Review_Title: My husband loved this on me
links_Review_Text: You CAN wear a bra, so that's awesome. And... It has pockets!
I felt that the dress fit true to size to a little large, but it does tie in the back, so that made it easier to adjust the sizing.
Amazing dress with such a cool back. Runs slightly large but not too much to make a huge difference!
Lots of compliments, great fit!

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect for an outdoor summer wedding. I wore is with sandals for a more casual look!
links_Review_Text: This dress fit nicely but I think I could have gone down another size so I would not have had to tie the back so tightly. I wore a nubra--adhesive under it and with the tie I felt completely ok with this. I am not small on the top so this was a concern for me but with the tie for added support it was just fine.

A really great romper because it looks very formal and dressy, but it's so comfortable and airy. The tie in the front is a little adjustable so I was able to tighten it and I feel very secure without a bra. The material is a very high quality. I liked that you could keep it pretty simple accessory-wise and it was still a standout in a crowd. My friend a few inches taller than me also borrowed this and it fit her great as well!
I ordered this romper for my vacation, it was very versatile. I was able to wear it during the day and also in the evening with heels.

This was the first RTR piece I've ever rented. It's a cute romper I wore for a day out on vacation in Mexico. The fabric feels high quality and the fit is good. It's super short but was perfect for vacation. I would recommend it!
Loved this romper for a bachelorette! Got so many compliments I was tempted to buy it. Will definitely rent again for a similar occasion.
Loved this glamorous romper for my beach vacation. Perfect fit. Loved the pop of skin.

links_Review_Title: Great for dancing - so flattering - loved it so much! Quality, thick material too.
links_Review_Text: I am 5'10" ~165 and this was SO flattering - the length worked for me and the tie front made it nice to fit it to my exact size. I wore it on a cruise and it was perfect for dancing too.
This romper was my favorite rental so far - high quality material and great fit! Tons of compliments! Would rent it again in a second.
I LOVED this romper. My friends all stopped talking when I walked in and they said I looked like a movie star. So incredibly comfortable and flattering. I just wish it had pockets.

links_Review_Title: Such a fun, sexy romper - perfect for a night out in Vegas!
links_Review_Text: Loved this piece! Great material and fit. Felt sexy without being too much.
Wore this to a fancy dinner out and it was so comfortable, probably could have fit in the 6 but the 4 was too tight around my waist

Perfect for a bachelorette night out in Charleston. I am 5'7" and 145lbs and I was borderline too long in the torso, but definitely had room to spare around the waist of the romper. It has a liner in the shorts which is great for hiding any tightness in the outfit if you are a little tall, and the fact that it's black hides any areas that don't fit exactly perfect. This was a super fun outfit and I got a lot of compliments!
Such a cute replacement for the classic LBD.

links_Review_Title: Fun romper for a bach party
links_Review_Text: So, I LOVE this romper. It shows the right amount of skin while hiding the parts you don't want seen. My only issue was that I ordered an 8 and a 10 and only the 8 came. The 8 fit fine but was a little tight on the bottom and a little loose on top. I tied the top tight but then I had a lil side boob going on, so just beware! Still a great outfit and would recommend.

links_Review_Title: Absolutely stunning romper!!! Wore it twice and received tons of compliments!
links_Review_Text: Great design, the detail is incredible. It fit a little lose, but it wasn't a problem.

This fit so well. Would definitely rent again. I also like how the shorts area is more flowy and not tight. It is a pain to go to the bathroom in (even more so than other rompers IMO) but worth the wear still!

This jumper was perfect for our Bali honeymoon - it was a bit sassy but still conservative enough. The material was thick and the front toe could be adjusted for preference. I was so sad to return this sure to be summer staple.

This was super cute on. I was slightly hesitant at first to rent this because I look terrible in rompers, but this was great! I would either not wear a bra or a sticky bra, the front part just ties closed. I would rent this again!!!
I am normally between a size 4 and 6, but the 4 fit perfectly! Such a cute and comfortable romper. The material is a little thicker than I expected, but it was great!
Absolutely loved this romper for my 30th birthday! Fit perfectly, true to size, and was soooo comfortable! Definitely recommend!

I loved this romper! I was comfortable all night and the shorts look like a skirt. The only problem I had was that the clasps on the back kept coming undone while I was out. If they were snaps maybe it would stay better.
Omg I am SO obsessed with this romper! It fit like a dream and was so comfy and flattering!!

This was so fun to wear! Very comfortable. Ordered my usual size 6. The only thing is if u want to tie the top tighter then u get a lot of side boob so I had to leave it looser then I wanted but it looked great. Can't wait to rent again for vacation. Wish they had it in other colors!

I loved wearing this in Miami! It was perfect for a night out at the beach. It wasn't too revealing and I actually wore a bra with it. It was nude and the black tie was thick enough you couldn't really see it. Going to the bathroom did require some work but pretty much like any romper. Definitely recommend this!
Fit was roomy and comfortable, yet showed some skin. Loved it.
Easy to wear and flattering.

links_Review_Title: Spin on a basic black dress
links_Review_Text: I loved this but I did have to use a lot of double sided tape for my chest! I have a pretty small waist but my thighs are large so this romper was great Bc it's tight around my waist but very flows around the legs. Pretty lose on the shoulders and chest, had to keep adjusting at the table
Great look, high quality fabric. A little short

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a metal concert and it was a hit!
links_Review_Text: the fit is really nice. I did pin the cleavage a bit but if you tie it, it may work a bit better
Wore for a Bach party. Perfect flattering and flowy. I unfortunately didn't get a pic in it, but that just means I'll have to rent it again!

I loved this romper. It didn't pull weirdly on the bottom like so many do. I had to be careful with how tight I tied the top because you could easily create a side boob situation but nothing a little fashion tape couldn't help.

I loved this dress, and wore it to 4 different events. The bottoms have a liner so they stay loose and you don't have to worry about them riding up. The top portion is loose but I didn't feel a need to wear a bra or pasties even.

Loved this little black romper! It was sexy and didnt feel too short . It is an easy piece to dress up or down, and is super flattering! My one complaint is that the top hook in the back, up by the tag, did not stay clipped. Nothing a safety pin cant handle, but I was re-clipping mine all night. Even with that, I would recommend!
This is a really great formal romper
Really good quality, fits comfortably
Loved this romper. The fit was good since you can untie the front it made getting in and out very easy and could adjust fit accordingly.

links_Review_Title: Unique romper with a beautiful, thick material
links_Review_Text: Great fit, no need to wear a bra and really thick, luxurious fabric. Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: Length of romper/crotch too short for taller women.
links_Review_Text: Very cute but I'm 5'10" and was not able to comfortably sit in this - the length of the torso was too short. Probably would fit best on someone 5'8" or shorter.

links_Review_Title: I wore this for an evening, outdoor wedding and received a lot of compliments.
links_Review_Text: This romper was adorable and fit perfectly. I picked Size 4 so I would not worry about length. I am 5'7" and it was the perfect length. I did have to hang in shower to steam out wrinkles.
I wanted to like this but it showed a weird area of skin that I wasn't into. Didn't wear
This was way too tight for me in the hips!

Very elegant material. I couldn't tell if I liked it on myself or if it felt a bit matronly. The fit was good except for some boning structure in the torso that was stabbing me like the underwire can do on your bra's last legs. Because of this, I had to return. I don't know if this happens with all the dresses or if it was damaged? It is a long dress, so either get the petit or you're going to have to wear heels if you're short like me.
This was the perfect dress for my Senior Winter Formal! The dress was lightweight, comfortable, and easy to move in while I was dancing!

The 6L dress I received was well worn. The corset had been bent and it was missing the bow on the front. However, the 8L fit perfectly and was not worn out. I'm glad I ordered the 'long' because it reached the top of my shoes which made it just the right length to move around comfortably. I received many compliments and highly recommend this dress, as long as you get one that's not been broken down.

I felt like a fairy princess in this dress. So dreamy, romantic, girly, flattering. I was worried it might look too bridesmaid-y or too daytime/springy for a winter gala but it was PERFECT! Tons of compliments and felt amazing. Highly recommend

I used this dress for my first voice recital. Lots of compliments and praises. I really loved how soft and flowy it was. The color is perfect for darker skin. I wear a size 38 DDD so I was worried it wouldn't fit but nothing fell out so it was okay. A little short for my liking.
There was some piping around the chest area that was sticking through the fabric making it uncomfortable to wear. But gorgeous dress

links_Review_Title: Wore this to my freshman homecoming. Felt like a princess!
links_Review_Text: The dress was beautiful. I got so many compliments and it fit my body so well. It was very comfortable, but there were some pokey wires but that was just fine with me. Nothing could ruin my night with this dress. Made my homecoming. And you can't see your shoes so feel free to wear crocs.

links_Review_Title: I rented this for engagement pictures! loved the look of it! felt like a Taylor Swift-esque princess
links_Review_Text: fits true to size, wiring in bodice could be fixed a touch! but otherwise I loved the dress

links_Review_Title: Pretty princess dress but not for me
links_Review_Text: Loved the off the shoulder look and the petite length was PERFECT. Unfortunately I have a super short torso so the tulle bunched up in the middle and created a super unflattering poof :(

links_Review_Title: Size down! Runs large in chest/rib cage.
links_Review_Text: I usually opt for slim cut gowns and regrettably the 2P I had ordered was not available to be shipped when my order needed to arrive. This was my first truly terrible experience with RTR. Several unreturned calls to customer service, unanswered emails, and purchasing my own backup dress at the closest Nordstrom when an additional dress was never delivered later... I was emailed nearly a week after my event and given a $30 credit. Horrifying. I hope this never happens to another customer.

links_Review_Title: Enchanted evening with unicorns! This dress made me feel amazing.
links_Review_Text: I received compliments from several people on how this dress was perfect for the theme. Nailed it! The bust was a little small even in a 18 L. I'm a 40DD
It was very tight for me but luckily I still fit in! It was very lovely. I received lots of compliments:)

links_Review_Title: Wore this to my baby shower! Perfect!
links_Review_Text: Wore this to my baby shower and it is a dream of a dress. The length is long (I'm 5'4) and I had to lift it slightly to not trip but that wasn't huge. I chose to wear flats so if you wear heals you will be fine. I was 5 months pregnant (I'm not showing much just yet so could get away with wearing my original size) but it was a little snug on my bust. besides that it was a very good fit and I would recommend!

links_Review_Title: Great option for an outdoor wedding!
links_Review_Text: RUNS SUPER SMALL! I'm usually a 14/16 and I wore an 18, but wish I got a 20. The 18 fit, but my chest was really squished. Once you find your size, the dress is gorgeous! It has a very whimsical feel. The length was just perfect with heels on. I will say the outer tulle is longer than the slip so some people might trip on it. IG: @noellevenegas

I wore this dress for a formal wedding and it worked out perfectly. I felt beautiful in it and got a lot of compliments. It is a beautiful shade of pink and the floral overlay is so delicate. The sleeves were an added touch to make me feel like a princess.

This dress was beautiful! It's not something I would normally pick but it was so flattering and I was getting compliments all night. I'm 5'3, 140 lbs, and the 4R fit perfectly with 3in heels. I'm smaller in the chest so I would imagine you may have to size up with a bigger bust. The only issue I had was that the bottom of the dress arrived pretty wrinkled so I had to steam the tulle. Otherwise, I highly recommend it!
Felt like a princess in this unique tulle dress

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a summer wedding
links_Review_Text: I had so many people coming up to me at the wedding asking where I got the dress. The way the tulle flowed on the dance floor was beautiful. I felt so glamorous!! The fit was perfect. I tried on the 4R my normal size and didn't even have to try on the 2R the backup size. The 4R fit like a glove. I am 5'8", 130lbs, 34B. The dress was comfortable not like most dresses that are flattering but you can't wait to get out of them at the end of the night. I felt beautiful and elegant. Would def recommend for a summer wedding!!

links_Review_Title: Couldn't wear it. It wouldn't zip in the busy area
links_Review_Text: Pretty dress but runs small up top. Couldn't even get the hooks to meet and I am a 36c/d But the dress is pretty. Very whimsical fairy princess

This dress was stunning but I ended up not wearing it because I didn't want to be more formal than the bride. I couldn't think of any occasions formal enough for me to wear it so sadly I just played dress up and sent it back. My only complaint was that it was a little too long for me.

links_Review_Title: I received a lot of compliments and it fit well. It is a bit poofier than it looks in photos.
links_Review_Text: Very comfortable and fits well.

Fit was true to size, a little snug at first due to the boning and corset like top, but ultimately I relaxed into it and that boning helped the dress stay up. I loved the romantic style and felt beautiful. The flowing tulle skirt was so much fun on the dance floor and I received many compliments throughout the night!

I was really happy with my decision to rent this dress. It's not what I normally go for (style and pattern), but it turned out really great! I received so many compliments at a more formal wedding I attended. I realized I could have probably gone a size down, but the boning helped keep the dress up. My one comment is that the dress I had had two wires poking out from the bodice area. It didn't make me bleed, but was a little uncomfortable whenever it did poke my skin. Otherwise, super happy I ordered the dress!

Dress was perfect for my engagement photos. Since not for an actual event, length wasn't an issue. I ordered the 4L since that was the only length in my size. I'm 5'6" and wore 3" booties for the shoot since we shot mainly in a field. Uploaded picture with our dog to show length of dress with shoes. Lots of tulle-like fabric, so not the most "luxurious" material but it was fine for the occasion. Photographs well :)

The dress was a little on the tight side across the chest area. Definitely couldn't wear a bra. But I absolutely loved how it looks in our engagement pictures. I wore 3-4 inch heels in the photos with the long version and it wasn't dragging at all.
i am 145lbs 5'4 and the regular one fit perfect. got a lot of compliments on it

links_Review_Title: Love how everything is packaged and shipped!
links_Review_Text: Good fit, easy to walk in and perfect length! Im 155 5'4 and its was a perfect fit!

I wore this dress to a July wedding in DC. The look of the dress was great, airy and romantic for the 90 degree temperatures. Only complaint is the boning in the top to keep the strapless shape, not very comfortable with a larger chest. Should've gone up another size to make that a bit better.

I'm not one to usually opt for pastel pinks or florals, but this dress was a wonderful exception. I went with the 4L since the 4R wasn't in stock for the date needed, but it worked fine with some higher heels. Felt like a princess!
Beautiful pink dress. Delicate in its form and lace. Felt a bit like a princess

The dress was perfect for a formal summer wedding outside! It was relatively light and flowy and you could put the sleeves up onto your shoulders if you needed to do your hair or even when you were dancing.

links_Review_Title: It's a soft, romantic dress. When worn, the underarm area can get itchy
links_Review_Text: Flowy, comfortable dress.

links_Review_Title: This is so so so so small. I'm a size 14, and this didn't even zip up
links_Review_Text: This dress is beautiful, but runs very very very small. I'm busty and ordered the 14 & 16 and neither of them fit. I then got a 20 (3 sizes above my regular size) and still did not zip.

links_Review_Title: Was my usual size but too small
links_Review_Text: I was very disappointed in this fit. It looks so beautiful in the photos and I'm always regularly a 14-16 but I couldn't even zip this up! The length was also pretty short. I'm 5'7 and always get regular length but if you want to wear this with heels you should get a long.

links_Review_Title: This was a nice dress comfortable but was smaller then expected and didn’t zip up all the way.
links_Review_Text: Pros : the length was perfect and it was pretty. Cons : ran small didn’t zip up all the way but I made it work with a shawl. And was a darker pink then expected.

The colors were so so beautiful. But even when I took it out of the bag I checked the size I was given bc it looked so small, but I was an 18. I can ushually wear an 16 or 18 in formal dresses depending on the fabric, but this dress wouldn't even zip past my waist. It was very small. So small when I had to go order another dress before my event I didn't even risk trying to order the size 20. I ended up with a beautiful dress in the end, but be warned! This is small!

links_Review_Title: Got lots of compliments! Great dress for a black tie, in a dress that isn't black
links_Review_Text: Bust was a little tight but it worked

Beautiful gown. The sleeves get really crumpled up and folded in shipping. I wish I had done a little more "fluffing" of the sleeves, but the dress is still a stunner and made me feel like a princess. Note: waist very fitted tight. I'd size up if you're in between.

links_Review_Title: I got a size 20 as my back up, and I normally wear a 16. It was WAY TOO SMALL
links_Review_Text: Runs very very small
I didn't end up wearing this as it was a bit too "spring" for the fall wedding I was attending, but it was absolutely lovely. The detail in the floral made it so romantic and just lovely.
This dress was everything you're looking for on vacation. Cute pattern, loose and comfortable fit, and can be dressed up or down. 100% recommend!
I’m usually a medium or large. Wore the size medium and it fit great but if you’re on the fence between 2 sizes, I’d get the smaller one because it’s so flowy.

The size I got was big enough I could slip it over my head and did not need to use the zipper. I loved it so much I wore it both on my first and last night of vacation. It's so elegant yet perfect as resort wear. I'd consider keeping this one I liked it that much.
Nice and flowy. The material is silky, which I didn't expect from the pictures, but makes it more dressy. Everyone told me I needed to buy this dress.
Comfortable lose fit and very tropical, no form but hides all the bad bits and just feels great

links_Review_Title: REALLY cute and feels amazing (my strap broke)
links_Review_Text: So I loved this dress...wore it to a work dinner/party in Scottsdale. It feels super nice quality and the way it hangs on the bottom is amazing. I could see why people said it was a bit shapeless around the middle but I was OK with it. That's why I would take a star off... and the fact the strap broke as I was eating dinner. Fortunately it was cold so I kept my jean jacket on all night and my coworker had a safety pin. I was happy with how clean it was and seemed new.

links_Review_Title: Wore to dinner at a wedding rehearsal.
links_Review_Text: Comfortable, soft material. It was a bit too flowy for me so I added a belt.

links_Review_Title: So much fun! Needs a belt
links_Review_Text: This was so comfy for a party but needed a belt. Loved the length and material!

I wanted to review this just to give others a better perspective. I did not get to wear this as the bust was just awkward. Thankfully it was just going to be a fun piece for vacation. It is a beautiful dress and the overall feel and look was great, just isn't for larger busted ladies.
Great dress but bust area ran tight, I am a 34DD

links_Review_Title: Wore it for Thanksgiving in Mexico :)
links_Review_Text: Fantastic dress! Reviews are correct to size down - i'm typically a medium and wore a small and it fit perfectly.

I brought this gorgeous dress to vacation on Isla Holbox, Mexico. The fabric is just a bit satiny which elevates it from your typical cotton beach dress. It was cool, breezy, and perfect. The adjustable straps were a nice touch.
Perfect dinner vacation dress. I really appreciate that the straps were adjustable.
Flowy and beautiful perfect for vacation or a special occasion. I have a large bust and this dress did provide enough coverage, though not wearing a bra was tough.
Very light, comfortable!
I liked the dress but it wasn't the most memorable item I've rented. Very cute on and very comfortable, but just a bit boring. Nice for a casual Florida evening dinner.
Slightly loose around the armpits, but fun print

We had a beach wedding this past weekend down in FL. HOT & muggy. These dresses were perfect. They run a tad on the bigger side because of the flow so two of us belted the dress to make it a bit more flattering. I have a big chest and small waist so I ordered medium but ended up wearing the small, which never happens. So glad the dresses worked out and really looked great in pictures!

So glad this dress fit me really well! I read previous reviews that it was didn't offer much shape so was concerned it would be too loose, but for me it was just the right; Fit was on the more relaxed side yet I felt I still had a nice flowy shape. My size tends to run between smalls and mediums so SR worked well for me.

links_Review_Title: Great print, fun for a day event or night out
links_Review_Text: Fit a little big but still looked nice and was comfortable
Got so many compliments on this dress- the fit is flowy and so comfortable. Downside was when sitting the top didn't fit right but wasn't noticeable standing up moving around. Print is great!
I rented this because I loved the same dress that came in pink. I ended up not wearing it but it's flown and comfortable and very flattering.
Too baggy, didn't wear it

links_Review_Title: A little too baggy, no shape.
links_Review_Text: This dress fit well up top, but it fell around me with no shape at all. I had to add a belt to give it more shape and a more flattering silhouette.

links_Review_Title: Pretty print but didn't fit well
links_Review_Text: This was really tight in the chest for me and wasn't comfortable at all. May not work well for big chested women.
This is the perfect sunday funday dress. Its flowy and not clingy. There are two layers to the fabric so it's not revealing
Wore in Hawaii and it was light, airy, and perfect "resort wear". Fit better once straps were adjusted, otherwise felt a bit large and too loose, even for the style.
I sized down to a small and this dress fit like a glove. Love the adjustable straps. Fabric and hem are beautiful and it traveled great. No need to steam or iron!

I loved the length on this and wore it several times both dressed up and dressed down. No need to wear a bra even for larger chests since it's double layered. Perfect dress! Would definitely rent again.
I really loved this dress- almost kept it for myself!

I love this dress! Fit true to size and I only shortened the straps a little (but I could have gotten away without doing it). I just wore sticky boobs and could imagine that a strapless bra might show, so could be challenging for girls with bigger busts. The fabric is lightweight, but feels sturdy and expensive, while also not wrinkling easily. I wore with white tennis shoes to dress it down. Works really well in this Texas heat!

links_Review_Title: Dress was very flattering and I received many compliments.
links_Review_Text: Great fit, flattering, may need to pin top if larger breasted.
As much as I wanted to, I couldn't wear this. It fit too snug around the hips, perfect at waist and loose on top. Long fit me perfect length wise. If you've got wide hips, do not recommend.

Size way down, you won't regret it. I'm heavy chested but otherwise have an athletic build. There's a LOT of room up top, and some give in the bottom. I'm normally a size 10 in everything, but a 6 was perfect. So comfortable and so many compliments!

I loved this dress. It is large in the chest so if you have a small bust it probably won't work for you. I am a 36 double D and still had to wear a push-up bra. But it's gorgeous and it was perfect for this awards show.
I received a lot of compliments on the dress. Unless you are busty, it is a little gapy at the chest but nothing a little fashion tape can't handle.

links_Review_Title: Fun and beautiful dress, better for bigger boobs
links_Review_Text: Very nice and comfortable material. Wore 2.5 inch heels and the length was perfect (I'm 5'9"-10"). The sleeves are sheer which you can't tell from the picture. Only issue I had was the chest was a little gapey and I had to use lots of fashion tape. Would fit better for someone more well endowed in the chest area

links_Review_Title: Winter wedding ... I felt like a 1940's glamorous movie star!! Gorgeous dress!!!
links_Review_Text: I just had a baby about a year ago so still working on my "fluffy" bits and even with all my curves the dress was stunning and I got SO many compliments all night!! I'm normally a size 14 in regular clothes with a 38G bra and wore the 16L and it was perfect!!
I wanted to love this dress bc it's so beautiful but the 2P was still too long for me and the chest area was very large too so I wasn't able to wear this.

I LOVED this dress. Slightly high-low on the bottom so it wasn't dragging on the ground all night. I'm 5'9 without heels and it was a great length. I love anything that I can tighten around my waist and the belt was a great added touch to the dress. Fully covered me to make a great balance of classy and sexy
A little loose in the chest area, but a beautiful dress

The chest is ENORMOUS. I am definitely not a busty person, so I wouldn't have been surprised if it was slightly large on me, but this was comical. The chest of the dress flopped fully over my bra. However, it wasn't a roomy dress or a dress designed for curves. The hips were quite snug while the chest was so large. I don't know who the fit model for the dress was, but I don't think it would easily fit most bodies.

links_Review_Title: Runs big. Very revealing in the busy. Not long enough for 5'7".
links_Review_Text: Cons: Big in bust Runs big in waist 5'7" - order a Long

links_Review_Title: Even my DDs didn't fill the chest!
links_Review_Text: Sad it didn't fit.

links_Review_Title: This dress is GORGEOUS but the overall fit is a little off from the top to the bottom.
links_Review_Text: I am a busty woman and somehow this dress was too big up top and fitted at the bottom. The details and fabric were gorgeous though.

links_Review_Title: Loose on top but did not fit over my hips, should have tried an 8
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress but very tight on hips and loose on top.
Beautiful gown. Great quality, loved the feel of the materials. The top half was too large, the bottom of the dress fit perfectly, although it was a bit long. I selected another dress for my event.

links_Review_Title: Got tons of compliments on this dress! The color is great!
links_Review_Text: This dress is true to size. Only issue is that it is more low cut than I was expecting. You'll need to safety pin it if that bugs you!

This dress is gorgeous and is super flattering on those of us with curvy hips. Only thing that wasn't great was the fit of the top--quite big and gaped, I found myself fussing with double sided tape all night.
Fit funny...didn't wear

It gapes at the chest even though I am busty (32DDD) so I didn't wear it. Might work better on someone with a longer torso or a larger chest. If it had fit I would have been able to nurse in it, which is a plus.

Loved this outfit. It was elegant and dramatic and just the right look for an opening night celebration for a show I worked on. It runs a little bit so it was loose on top and really long on the bottom even with 3 inch heels. I made it work by tightly the waist and tucking some extra fabric in with the extra belt. Still so happy I got this outfit thought I felt like royalty!

links_Review_Title: Showstopper jumpsuit turns heads and makes an entrance
links_Review_Text: I was able to size down on this based on other reviews, so it was tight across the chest but fit everywhere else. I'm 5'9' and wore a 4" heel and the length was perfect. It was the hit of my friend's karaoke birthday party.

links_Review_Title: Felt like a million bucks and got compliments at night!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful material and so comfy!

Loved the fit, but opted to wear spanx tights (full set of tights, not the spanx shorts) underneath to hide cellulite which has a cottage cheese look through the fabric. With the tights as an undergarment this jumpsuit made me sparkle! Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Perfect fit, color and overall a show stopper !
links_Review_Text: If you are in between sizes I would size down just because of how flowy the silk is and for length , I'm short so with a nice size heel the pant length was manageable. I loved the style of this jumpsuit I wore it to a holiday party and got compliments left and right. Super flattering and just different.

links_Review_Title: Luxurious fabric -- although thin -- and super long and comfy
links_Review_Text: I am typically a 2 or 4 (more classically a 4 based on height/weight) and this XS fit perfectly. I have on thick fleece-lined tights underneath the jumpsuit in this picture because it was a very cold day and the fabric is very thin. Still it felt so luxurious yet effortless. Would definitely rent again! Also, it's quite long. I'm about 5'8" and had to wear 4" heels

This jumpsuit was perfect for my husband's company Christmas party. Not only did it look great, but it was also extremely comfortable. I got so many compliments! I'm 5'7" and 130 lbs and wore the small regular with 3 inch heels.
Fun jumpsuit- Medium fit great, if you're on the fence don't size up unless you have wider hips. Also, too long to wear even with my 3" heels. Perfect party jumpsuit for a taller gal.

Love this jumpsuit! It fits like a glove, hides all the chubby parts, makes your legs look miles long and makes you feel like a million bucks. Definitely worth renting for a fun party or special occasion. Great material. Compliments all night.

Eat your heart out, Kelly Clarkson! This little number made sure the office holiday party was entirely about me. Comfortable, well made and delicious to wear - I was sad to say goodbye. Pant length is on the long side, if you're short like me just wear your tallest and comfiest, they'll barely show.

This jumpsuit fit so well! The length was perfect for me because I'm 5'9" and wore a chunky heel. It was so comfortable and a nice silk material. The medium was the perfect size - my only complaint was on the left side where it zips. I had to put fashion tape there because it gaped below my bra a bit. I have smaller boobs so it was slightly loose on the side, but fashion tape did the trick!!! Would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Not flattering if you have a tummy.
links_Review_Text: Not flattering if you have a tummy.
Way too long for my petite frame even with 5 inch heels

links_Review_Title: This jumper was elegant and comfortable, I got so many compliments.🙂
links_Review_Text: I am 5'7 and had to wear high heels to prevent it from dragging on the floor so that should definitely be a consideration for someone not so tall 🙂
Beautiful jumpsuit. I wore it to a formal holiday party. Runs slightly big. It is also very long. I am 5' 6.5" and wore 4 inch heels - the length was perfect with the heels.

This was a very pretty sundress. It feels like a heavy linen fabric but the fit was off for me. I had to pin the straps because they were super long and I didn't really fill out the top either. Probably much better fit on you bustier girls.

I love Mara Hoffman, everything I own and have rented by her has always been high quality, fit well and been bright and fun and this dress was no exception! It was perfect for wine tasting in California! My only complaints were I wish it was a bit shorter on me (I'm 5'4) so I could have dressed it down with cute sneakers and it's also a little booby so beware! Other than those minor things, this dress is a winner!

Normally a 6-8 but rented the 10 which was a good call around the belly. Straps are def long and loose but if you tie the chest right, the dress isn't going anywhere. Very comfortable and perfect for vacation.
This dress was great - a little on the heavier side with material but very comfortable, easy to move in and received lots of compliments for a summer wedding!

Wore this to my luau themed baby shower and it was great! Quality and fabric were awesome. I am a size 4 normally but at 26 weeks pregnant, still wore a size 4. The bust is adjustable because of the ties and the empire waist with extra fabric in skirt allowed the dress to easily fit my bump. The dress hit right above my ankles and looked really cute at this length.
Beautiful summer dress! Def runs large so size down!
Wore this to a rehearsal dinner in montauk. Fits true to size and was the perfect mix of sass and class. The lacing at the top would allow this dress to work for various chest sizes.

Super flattering dress and fit perfectly. The tie up the front is a little scandalous though if you have a larger chest. It just shows the full cleavage, but it's not super noticeable. It was a little longer than mid calf length on me since I'm on the shorter side but it still looked cute.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful colors for a vacation getaway to Hawaii.
links_Review_Text: Great fit but the straps were a bit long. Stunning dress for a tropical getaway. My significant other kept complimenting me all night!

This dress was gorgeous, and made of the easiest breeziest material, like a sturdy structured cotton/linen blend. The colors really popped in photos, and the length was perfect on me - dress hit mid calf and I'm 5'11". I'm debating buying this permanently I loved wearing it so much!

Wore this at 21 weeks pregnant to a May wedding in Atlanta. It was perfect for the occasion and time of year. Not pregnant I would have worn the 4R. My only complaint it the clasp at the top of the zipper was missing.

I love this dress, and think I will buy it!! It fits so well, I normally would have ordered the 4 but it was available and he 2 fits so well especially since the bodice is a true adjustable lace up. So happy with this dress and in love with it.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous colors-amazing fabric- Small busts only!
links_Review_Text: Wore it to a rehearsal dinner. Perfect A-line fit for a body with a tiny waist and larger hips. The top is very low, no cups or bra required for my with itty bitty lady bits. I wore 3 inch heals and it was the perfect tea length for my 5'11" frame. It was not form fitting in waist or hips which is nice as it makes for more of an elegant look rather than a sexy fit. I wish I could keep it!!
Loved this fun, colorful dress for a beach vacation. Perfect for a fun dinner out at the end of the day. Fabric was sturdy and no bra necessary.
This dress fit perfectly and had the best expensive feeling linen material that was still breezy and not too hot in Hawaii. Loved the fitted top and flowy skirt.

Loved this. I really wanted a 6, but 8 was what was available, and even with a small chest, it still worked. The pattern is gorgeous, it's not too long (I'm 5"4), and it flows so nicely when walking. I loved wearing this.
Loved this. Beware, my fellow busties, it is very booby. Perfect for a tropical vacation!

This shows a lot of skin but amazingly the front was modest. The 'ribbon' closure did not hang open and fit very well. Perhaps if one had more chest that wouldn't be the case. We were on vacation with friends but I wouldn't wear it to a work event. Great for casual dinner/weekend in warm weather. The colors are lovely and it's comfortable because it's a princess waistline.
I rented this after my friend wore it and was obsessed. It is so beautiful and very sexy! Perfect for a friends birthday brunch but could be worn to summer wedding, wine tasting or date night!

I rented this for vacation, knowing after reading the other reviews that it would be a va-va-voom dress for me since I have a large chest. It did not disappoint! I'm between a 10 and 12 and the 10 fit great because the top lace-up is adjustable. Get ready to show some cleavage in this one - but the colors and fabric are really beautiful! Considered buying it!
It was my first time renting this brand and it did not disappoint! Very forgiving fabric (could have sized down 1), but perfectly tropical for the Bahamas

Absolutely loved this linen dress. Wore to a tropical wedding and received several compliments. Fitted on the chest, so recommend sizing up if you have bigger breasts. Great for those with small chests!
Only drawback was the top straps were a little long
A little tight and super faded. It looked like it'd been worn a lot... like too worn. But it was super easy to wear and has just enough sex appeal w the laced up chest. My husband was a big fan.

Great summer dress! Heavy linen draped beautifully yet was still breathable. I'm small cheated and loved the way the adjustable laces on the front could be cinched up to my size. Fuller chested gals may have some fit issues.

Length was fine, cut right above my ankles. Chest squeezed the girls in and lifted them up nicely. No bra necessary. Dress traveled nicely since the material is heavier than a typical linen. Got a bit hot when sitting idol outdoors in the heat. Colors and pattern were beautiful. Love the tie detail on chest. Straps were a good length for me.

I rented this for a summer baby shower and got a ton of compliments! The chest literally laces shut so it can be adjusted to how tight or loose you need it to be, and the rest of the dress skimmed down and was very flattering. By the end of a 12+ hour day the fabric had lost some of its stretch and I had to keep pulling the top up. Was a little risqué!

links_Review_Title: Dress for dinners on a cruise
links_Review_Text: I love, love, love this dress! I don't have a picture that shows the beauty of this dress. The colors were perfect for a recent cruise my husband and I were on. I loved this dress so much that I wore it twice even though I had plenty of items for dinner each night. My only complaint is the same as many other reviews I read. The straps. Who are these straps made for? Luckily I had a few straight pins from my husbands new shirt or I wouldn't have been able to wear this one. I was able to pin the straps in the back to make it perfect. I was a little worried about getting stabbed by the needles but I managed to place them in a way no one saw them and I forgot they were even there. I would definitely rent this again if I don't end up buying it first.

Love the fitted top that you can tighten or loosen. Beautiful colors. I probably could have sized down but top is adjustable. The material is amazing. Once you steam or iron it I found it didn't wrinkle during wear.

links_Review_Title: Wore at 33 weeks for baby shower
links_Review_Text: Wore at 33 weeks for my baby shower. I want to purchase it again at my regular size. It was perfect. I pinned the straps (a little long), but this could be because I went up from my usual 6 to a 10 to accommodate the bump.

Let me start by saying this dress is quite low cut. I have a small bust and I was uncomfortable in the dress without anything underneath. It was dangerously close to nip-slip territory. BUT!! I paired with a fitted black tank and it was cute and comfortable and SO pretty on. I received a ton of compliments and I wore it 3 times because I loved how I looked and felt in the dress. I want to purchase it! It's a heavyweight linen so it doesn't wrinkle too terribly but it's light enough for hot weather. Stunner.

I loved the length - I'm 5'2" and it hit above my ankle. But it made me look wide at my hips and wasn't fitted at the waist like I thought it would be. Not super flattering, but still such a pretty dress. It was fun to wear. And I loved the heavy linen fabric.

I love this dress! Perfect for an island vacation! Light weight, easy to pack and so bright and cheerful! If your bustier this dress will definitely show cleavage, but the lace tie front gives you awesome lift so no need to wear a bra!
Print was bold and beautiful, thicker fabric traveled well with minimum wrinkles. Straps were a tad long but otherwise loved it. Wore with and without a bra.

I wasn't expecting this dress to show so much cleavage. I have a big chest and if I tie it up all the way it squashes my boobs. Don't let that keep you from renting it!!! Just gorgeous and breathable material. Lots of compliments! I just discovered Mara Hoffman from RTR and loving all her stuff!! I want to buy it all!!

This bright and cheery dress was great. The material is more of a thick linen, better for a daytime affair. My only issue with the dress was the straps were a tiny bit too long on me. Still fit but had I bought it I would have had them tailored. My MAJOR issue with Rent the Runway is their delivery service in NYC. They say delivery by 8 pm but use a 3rd party service and only when I called at 8:30 pm do they mention that actually, they deliver until 10 pm. I was also told I would get a text just before delivery and upon delivery. I didn't get either. The lack of communication is terrible and is not my first time having this issue. On a past rental, I waited around my office for the supposed 8 pm delivery only to never get it because "they don't deliver to offices that late". I was told I would be top priority the next morning. I had to leave for the weekend at noon and did so without my dresses. I called and cancelled. At 6 pm, I got a call from the delivery service that my rental had arrived. I told the delivery man than I was not there, I had cancelled my order. He asked me "What am I supposed to do now? Go back downtown?" Not. My. Problem. Anyway, this dress was my attempt to give RTR a second chance but they didn't impress me. Until they can have clear communication and a reliable delivery service, this will be my last order.

I loved this dressed, the colors really popped! I rented the 0 and 2 and ended up wearing the 0 because the straps were a bit long on me. Since I'm 5'3" it was more of a maxi dress on me than a tea length dress ( which I liked). The lacing in the front was helpful to adjust and personalize my fit. Would definitely recommend this rental!
Love the bold pattern of this one! It is a nice thick linen and very flattering but the straps are too long. I wore an orange tank for modesty. Works for large busted girls.

So received so many compliments wearing this dress. The vibrant colors and floral pattern definitely draw the eye. I did wear a black tank top with dress as it was too low cut . Didn't want my nipples showing. Love the cut of this dress, hugged me in all the right place.

links_Review_Title: Obsessed doesn't even begin to cover it!
links_Review_Text: This dress is a dream! Mara Hoffman and bold florals are two of my favorite things, so I knew I had to rent this as soon as I saw it. I have worn it once a week or more for the past couple of months, and I am planning to make it a permanent part of my closet. It is linen so it does wrinkle but I don't mind steaming it! The tie on the front of the dress allows you to easily adjust the top to fit your bust. However, if you have a larger chest, it is definitely a bit revealing. I imagine you could size up but then I fear the bottom might be too large. One last thing to mention, the metal grommets might give you some issues if you have metallic allergies.

links_Review_Title: Saloni does it again: gorgeous print, beautiful flow.
links_Review_Text: The dress does not have a waist which makes it really easy to wear. If I had gotten the chance to wear it (thanks Covid19) I probably would have worn it with a belt. Really beautiful flow and the buttons are placed in all the right places which would make it easy to adjust any neckline choice.

This dress was so easy. It is lined and skims the body so comfortably. It buttons up the full front and has a sash belt. The pattern in the fabric is really interesting. I would have usually stayed away from ruffles, but they are very light and fluttery without feeling bulky. Would rent again!
Super easy for the office- paired with tights for a winter look.

This dress is so fun and easy to wear. I work for a high-end department store and I wore this to work. I'd rent it again to wear to a date or a party or even a casual wedding. If I do I may consider sizing down because it's so floaty. The dress is lined, but the only structure comes from the belt. The only thing I'd change about this dress is the ruffle on the bum. No one needs that.
Got tons of compliments on the dress. Oddly I would never pick this style of dress. Liked how it fit at elbow for the sleeve. Ordered a 12 could have done an 8/10.
Nice casual dress. Loved the color and print. Comfy.

I just love Saloni. Their fabrics are a dream. Uber feminine but also interesting details. This one didn't disappoint. Ran a bit large, would size down next time. I'm a true size 12, and 10 would have been perfect. It's a fun print. Kept accessories simple to let the dress do the talking.
I get super cute. Mine was missing the belt so I added my own but could be worn without a belt too. I'm a 6 or 8 and the 8 was comfortable. Just a tiny bit short but very fun to dance in.
Great for work with heels or traveling with white sneakers. I eventually figured out it came with a belt which looked better than this black one.
Great dress! Received tons of compliments at a pretty casual Texas hill country wedding.

Flattering fit. Wore this for a fundraising event with nude tights and low boots and again for a baby shower with navy tights and mid height boots to dress it down a bit. I felt really confident both looks! Length was perfect for me (5'3") but could be short on someone tall. Will rent again.

links_Review_Title: I wore this for a hosted dinner (food blogger) and it was so vibrant and perfect!
links_Review_Text: Perfect dress--tons of compliments! Only downside is RTR is showing I still have it at home but it was shipped back with another dress that shows it was returned & received. Wish they could get it together...
Will get a size 4 instead of a 6 next time (I'm between those sizes) - really cute and colorful pattern, loved pairing it with doc martens and a leather jacket for work.
The gig was perfect. Love the tie for the waist. So many compliments
Love these dresses! They always fit very well - true to size.

Very different silhouette for me - ruffle in back added more bulk than I would have liked but still loved the overall boho elegant vibe. Didn't wear with belt because it would have been too short on me (and I'm only 5' 2")
great dress, great fit, can dress it down with booties and stallings for the winter or dress it up with pumps for an occasion
Couldn't wear it, but even with the belt I wouldn't have liked it. Too much material going all over. Not flattering
No pockets, but otherwise a great work dress.

Saloni is one of my favorite brands and this dress is perfect. I had rented the Tilly dress in navy and gold before and loved it, and this pattern did not disappoint. Multifunctional dress - could wear to work or for fun. Would definitely rent again!
I did not like how this looked on me. I think I ordered a size too large.
So fun, comfortable and stylish! Wore for it for a wine tasting event.

This dress has a very nice pattern. It was brand new with the tag...great colors for fall. At first I had trouble locating the lace that ties around the waist. It is in a little pouch that is tucked in the garment bag.
perfect, very loose and comfortable. Very nice looking quality.

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments on the color and style
links_Review_Text: Fit was very comfortable. I am 5'3" and this dress hit 2-3 inches above the knee.
Too short for me, but I'm 6' so it might not be an issue for most. So many ruffles that it adds the illusion of bulk. Even with the included fabric belt, it was not flattering. Suggest sizing down.

Dress fit true to size. I ordered the extra small and small and ended up wearing the extra small. It ended up being a windy day so the back would blow up so if you're wearing for an outdoor event keep that in mind. Other than that I received a bunch of compliments and people askingfb where the dress was from.

links_Review_Title: I rented this dress for a three-day wedding in Dubai and wore it for one of the morning functions.
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress. It made me feel incredible! The fit was perfect. It was flowy, yet held its shape. It zips in the back syncing it in at the waist and had so much personality!
Rented for Valentine's Day. It fit well and was very forgiving. Wish the bow would have stayed tied well but overall great!

This dress was so cute on and fun to wear I rented it for two separate occasions. It has a cute small cut out in the low back. I got lots on compliments on it. I felt like a modern day Belle wearing it .

links_Review_Title: wore it for family photos, it was perfect!
links_Review_Text: beautiful color and perfect length, not too short; has to be choosy with undergarments not show through; the tie is a little long and may get loose easily; it didn't bother me for the photos, but may have been a little annoying if I had to wear this for a long time

This dress was super different and memorable without being over the top. I wore it out in vegas with booties, would've been cute with tights too. It's fits very true to size so if your between size up. Flattering waist also - would rent again!

This dress is so so so comfortable, but definitely size down. Not only is it comfortable but the cut is very forgiving in the midsection (much needed after 3 kids). The fabric is very lightweight so I froze in 45 degree weather during family pictures, but I would definitely rent again for any occasion that is mostly indoors or to wear during spring or early fall weather.

I wore this for my fall family photo session, and it was absolutely perfect! Felt really beautiful and the pictures turned out great. The belt area is hit or miss when it comes to being flattering. I'm a little self conscious of my belly/hip area, and while it did photograph very well, in person I feel like it kind of accentuated it in the wrong way. But that could just be my body shape.. also, the back rouching is not the ~best if you have any kind of 'hip dips' but overall really lovely!!

links_Review_Title: I picked this dress as a pop of color for family photos.
links_Review_Text: Great flirty fit...the rushing on the touché is a great detail. I felt great in this dress. Great color, great fit. Looking at buying other dresses by this designer. I am 5'7, athletic build, 34D. Wore a size medium. Was absolutely perfect!!

Full disclosure, i am too critical of myself and that will reflect in this review. The dress was very fun and I got a bunch of compliments on it. It is not something I would have purchased, but renting for a one time use was an absolute. But back to being critical, the dress was not super forgiving for my post baby pouch. Other than that, it was great. Would be careful if you are taller or have a big bum (like me) because it is short.
Nothing bad to say at all. I loved it so much!!! Just can afford to buy it!

This dress for super sexy! I have a big butt, so it was a little tight in the hips and resulted in the back riding up. Other than that, this dress was perfect for date night. Can be dressed up or down. I am 5'2" and 115 and wore an xs, but I would've also been comfortable in a s

links_Review_Title: Wore to tour my wedding venue, SO BEAUTIFUL!
links_Review_Text: This dress was too good! The color popped and the length was amazing. The sleeves were a little long/baggy but everything else was perfect. Would 10/10 rent again!

I was hesitant to order since there were no reviews and unfortunately it did not work out! I ordered the XS and it ran big. It alllllmost worked and I almost kept it anyways but I knew I wouldn't feel my best if I decided to wear it. Bummer!

Loved everything about this dress! The flirty skirt, blousy too and little tie sash around the waist! And the color was stunning! Needed a cami to make it work appropriate, but it didn't detract from the look. Big fan, will rent again for a vacation!

links_Review_Title: Pretty dress but didn’t fit. I’m usually a medium/large and it wouldn’t zip
links_Review_Text: Runs small

links_Review_Title: Felt radiant in this! Loved how it was a great mix between dressy and boho
links_Review_Text: fits great! little big (I'm 110lbs and 5'1) but it is very flattering though it covers everything up. only complaint is that the button holding it together shows

This dress is really cute and comfortable. It would fit a little better if my backside was smaller. I'll definitely rent again when I lose weight. The top gave me ample room, which I usually have a problem with. This dress is adorable, Rent it!
Im a size 4/6 and the Medium wouldnt zip. It zips in a weird spot and the back was see through. I'm only 5 feet tall and it would have been too short to wear without tights.

links_Review_Title: Color a little different than photo, but swingy and fun.
links_Review_Text: A little tight in the bust, but tie around the hips made nice and adjustable there.
Very fun dress, easy to wear.

Great fit, very flattering, gives a nice shape. The length is perfect. Very comfortable; hides a full stomach after eating, and the cleavage is nice but you don't need to be worrying something will show.

links_Review_Title: beautiful color, tight in the hips
links_Review_Text: perfect fit, just a little tight in the hips

Where the dress separates into two does not hit the right spot. It's a bit too far down and just wasn't flattering on me. If you plan on wearing it to work also do mind the opening that shows your back.

links_Review_Title: I felt comfortable the whole time.
links_Review_Text: It fit true to size, and was comfortable! The button created an awkwardly high neckline, but I wore it unbuttoned.
STUNNING dress absolutely elegant, great to hide lower abs and flattering I would rent it again

While the model looked great in it, I did not! Too much fabric for my medium frame. The top was very blousey and the skirt had too much going on. I think someone taller and thinner could pull it off well.
Easy dress to thrown on and go. Doesn't have a side zipper or much stretch so it's a little hard to get on

This dress was perfect for a Thanksgiving lunch and everyday wear. TTS and comfortable, although the wait hit a little too high. Top is sheer but easily fixed with a black tank, makes it look like all one slip underneath. Colors are brighter in real life!

I rented this dress to wear at my son's first birthday party. It was fall themed so the colors were perfect. The top was very sheer but it didn't bother me, you could only really tell from the back. I wore a full coverage black bra and it was fine. I would definitely rent again!

Loved this so much! The top is somewhat sheer so I had to put a tank under it work work but just wore a cut bralette when out with my husband. The length is great when paired with a heel or boot for us shorter ladies.

Didn't wear as I liked something else more. It is absolutely see through on the top which is strange. The bottom half has a slip and would make sense to have the top with a slip too. Guess I'd have had to wear a tank top to wear. Liked the dress fit and length and color.

links_Review_Title: Love this dress so much- wish I owned it!
links_Review_Text: This dress is so much more beautiful in person, than in the pics. The colors are perfect for fall, it is comfortable to wear, and can be dressed up or down! One of my favorite 'everyday' rentals

links_Review_Title: Cute but not great for shorter people
links_Review_Text: I love the look of this dress, but I'm 5'4" and this dress covered every inch of me. I don't think it's supposed to fit like a maxi dress, and unfortunately it just didn't look good on me. Heads up the top half of the dress is completely see-through.

links_Review_Title: sheer top, but not that big of a deal
links_Review_Text: Yes, the top of this dress is sheer, but it wasn't that big of a deal to wear a camisole underneath it. Depending on the event and person, you could get away with wearing a black bra under this dress and no camisole at all. Great fall/winter dress with booties. Easy to wear.

I loved loved loved this dress. The fit was great with an almost 6 month baby bump.. unfortunately when I put it on I noticed a giant hole along the seam in the back so I didn't get to wear it. Apparently the material is very delicate. Bummed!
