Perfect for fall with bare legs or even in early winter with tights. Definitely need a tank underneath it if wearing to work but still looks really cute

pattern on this dress is beautiful. The top really isn't too sheer- could get away with a nude bra. However the arms weren't tight on me but they appeared as so because there are these weird poofs right at each shoulder seem that are not big enough to qualify as a puff sleeve but do not lay flat on your shoulders so it looks like it was too tight on my arms and the fabric puffed up because of it. Also the empire waist with the cheap clingy cotton-ish liner made it verrrrry maternity-like.

links_Review_Title: Great dress - wonderful colors and easy to style up/down for travel. Packs easily.
links_Review_Text: Love it - wonderful fall colors. Can be styled up/down (with heels, booties, tall boots) making it really versatile for travel. Top is sheer, but that worked for me for a fall trip (easy to layer a cami underneath / sweater over).
I will rent this again, got so many compliments. One thing, the dress I received had a couple of snags in the delicate fabric of the sleeves but not noticeable to anyone but me.
Fit to size
It's a gorgeous dress, the skirt is lined but the top is sheer. I didn't wear it. I'm tired of layers and didn't want to wear a camisole
The top of this dress is very sheer and was see through.

This top is so stylish. I just got it and can already think of 4 more times I want to wear it. The boat neckline and zipper are very flattering. The Lycra fabric is very body conscious so be aware. I wore a jacket over this for client meeting which worked great. Based on other reviews I got a 42. Glad I did. 40 would have been much too tight. It does tend to stretch a bit during the day though. I would love to keep this but it's too expensive. Will keep for a couple of weeks for sure.

Full disclosure I did not read the description before I picked it, but I thought this top was going to be a sweater. It’s actually more of like a swimsuit material and the reviews said to size up so I did but the fit was a little loose on me. It looked great if I was standing perfectly still, but if I moved at all it folded up weird and looked dumb. I think sizing down would help, but I didn’t end up wearing it.
Beautiful, well made staple piece !
Euro sizing so glad I went up two sizes. This is one of those shirts that you can size up or down.
What a gorgeous top. Wore it to work. Extremely comfortable and flexible fabric and works with bigger chest. Zipper on top is cool. I felt great all day. Will rent again.
Fit beautifully and super flattering. Slimming across the tummy section and generous in the bust.

Like everything by this designer, this top is high quality, looks luxe, and feels comfortable, all at the same time! Fun diagonal zipper detail. I wore this dressed down with denim and dressed up with a pencil skirt. There's a lining but only on the top half -- a little awkward to get on and off but mostly stays put when on. Because of the fabric, it doesn't look great untucked unless worn over something smooth. I tried it untucked with jeans and you could see all seams and belt loops.
The zipper detail is nice. Fabric has a good amount of stretch and well-made.
Was very firm fitting, but really felt like a bathing suit top. My husband loved it though. Will most likely rent this again.
Great zip detail

I received so many compliments on this blouse! Its very snug at the the top and in the sleeves, which was great as it showed off my toned arms, but then its cut with actual 'hips' in the bottom have, so it wasn't awkwardly tight on my lower stomach. I paired it with an animal print skirt and black boots and it went together beautifully. Knocking a star as there is an additional layer of fabric on the inside that is laser cut, and rolled inward, creating an awkward seam around my ribcage.

links_Review_Title: Looks good but fits like a glove
links_Review_Text: This a a spandex top so getting it on is a bit of a challenge. Once on it looks great. Wore it with jeans and I needed to keep pulling it down a bit, but with a skirt and tucked it was good.

links_Review_Title: So tight it was like under armor on me
links_Review_Text: Had so much potential. Fit and felt like workout clothes
Loved style and look of this top. Slightly fitted.

links_Review_Title: 50+ and looked young and stylish without looking like I was trying too hard.
links_Review_Text: The headline says it all.
This blouse was beautiful, sexy and comfy , just perfect I ordered to wear for an evening with my friends.
Truly a nice looking top. Not too tight and very flattering!

links_Review_Title: Runs extremely small and will not fit if you have a large chest
links_Review_Text: This fabric is a great material and it's a beautiful shirt. I usually wear a 16 or an XL/XXL in shirts and the 52 was way too tight across my bust (42 DD). I was tugging on it all day because it kept creeping up since it was so tight in the chest.
Would totally buy this if it were like...$250 cheaper. Anyway, this was a flattering and comfortable top. Hugs in the places, sleeves are good length, and goes with just about any bottoms.

This was an amazing blouse with thick, almost diving suit quality and a lovely zipper. But be warned that the sleeves and shoulder area are super tight. I have very small arms and it didn't fit me correctly. I still got away with my usual size, but I would recommend sizing up.
jUST OK. Wouldnt rent again. Fitted

This is very form fitting, my husband likened it to a wetsuit but not in a bad way. It looks expensive, is elegant but a little edgy, however there was a little pucker where the tag sits on the waist that is a tad lopsided. Not very noticeable but it's hard to tell if it's from the tag or a sewing miscalculation.

There is a lining that goes only to rib cage, not all the way down. It creates a weird visible line since the shirt is tight (Lycra type fit). Would not recommend even though zipper detail super cool.
The material feels like a swimsuit. It's SKIN TIGHT and uncomfortable. Did not wear beyond trying on.

links_Review_Title: It’s a very cute type but runs small
links_Review_Text: I am a 32B under 110 lbs 5’3” and this top size 2 would not even go over my chest. Needed help getting it off. Definitely size up at least one size or even 2. More evening out than day time.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for the Bride to Be!
links_Review_Text: Rented this for my Bachelorette Party in Nashville - it was perfect and I received so many compliments!
This top is so flattering and so cute! I received so many compliments. Definitely grab a little fashion tape for the v-neck though - just to be safe.
Loved the top! Flirty amount of cheer being shown. Not too much. Got soooo many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Sexy and flirty top! Got lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: This top was true to size I got a medium. There is a deep v in this shirt so you want to make sure you have the right bra or you could wear a cami or bralette underneath if you wanted to be covered up more because it definitely showcases your chest area. I have broader shoulders which made the ruffle sleeve detail not as flattering on me but overall I really liked this top for a date night and got several compliments!
Loved this top! It fit perfectly. I didn't have to wear a bra. Loved the ruffle detail. I would buy this top to wear again!

links_Review_Title: Awesome top! Great fit. So many compliments.
links_Review_Text: Perfect top! It fit great and felt amazing. I would 100% rent this again!
Debated buying.. holding off for now. Love how it looks on. Wore for NYE with pumps. It's awkward to get on but the cuteness out weighs that.

I've been waiting patiently for this to become available to rent. It was worth the wait and I'm debating on how long I'll keep it. It does fit a little high above the waist and felt a little tight around the mid section. But don't think I needed to size up. It goes best with high waisted jeans. This was the perfect shirt. Got so many compliments and I can't wait to see it again.
I loved it. Lots of compliments. It is short but I used it with high waisted jeans and it looked great.

links_Review_Title: I'm probably going to buy this. WOW.
links_Review_Text: Hands down best item I've ever rented. So forgiving but fitted in all the right places. I'm usually a M in tops but this material has very little give in the bust and the L fit my chest great (a little loose around my waist but didn't bother me). I have kept it for nearly a month now and I will probably purchase it as a staple item. Stop thinking and just rent it!
Didn't want to send it back. Loooooooved it. Ive been working really hard to lose weight which I have (yay!) except now the top is too big. Boo. Looooooove!
Wore this with jeans and white boots for the first night of my bachelorette weekend in Austin Texas. Great fit - loved it!

I have been waiting two cycles for this top and boy was it worth the wait! I've already worn it three times. The flare at the waist is so flattering. It's a little low cut but not offensive. I dressed it up with slacks and wore it with jeans. Both received many compliments!
Perfect date top...classy + sexy!! Would definitely rent again!
I received SO many compliments wearing this top. I wore this out in the Hamptons and loved it. So flattering and the quality is amazing. Highly recommend!!! I might have to purchase!
Loved this! Wear with sticky bra. Fitted.
Fits well. Looks cute. Zipper doesn't work that well.

links_Review_Title: Cute if you can fit into it!
links_Review_Text: This top is beautifully made, but is REALLY hard to actually get into. It has a side zip that doesn't fully unzip, so I needed help getting in and out of the top. I loved the detailing and it's a stiff material, so I was able to go bra-less (and didn't need sticky tape). I wouldn't recommend for someone with a large chest or large rib cage just because of the way the top is designed.

links_Review_Title: Trendy cute but a little short
links_Review_Text: Fitted and flattering wish it was 2 inches longer to wear with jeans. Needed a high wasted pant

Having recently lost some weight, I wasn't sure what size to wear. I rented a medium and large and went with large due to my chest You can't wear a bra with it so you'll want to be comfortable with exposing some cleavage. I used lift tape and fabric tape and my chest stayed in place. The structure of the top does offer support as well. I received a lot of compliments and felt really comfortable and cute. The ruffles and eyelets are unique and I noticed a lot of eyes on me. The downsize is having to return it. Want to own this. Definitely will rent again.
Flattering!!
Fits really well, feels well made, very flattering on the shoulders. Would work ideally with high rise jeans or pants or pencil skirt.
I wish the top was maybe 2 inches longer. Other than that- I loved it. Fun and flirty! Perfect for a springtime date

links_Review_Title: Cute, but fit was a bit off
links_Review_Text: This lace detailing on this shirt is beautiful! Only problem was it fit almost too tight on my love handles and loose on my chest, so when I sat that the fabric would bulge out, almost exposing my cleavage! Wore it to dinner with a scarf over me the whole time I sat down.
It was the perfect vacation top!

links_Review_Title: Love this top. Is lower cut than I first thought
links_Review_Text: Not very much stretch but true to size
I loved wearing this top. On both occasions I wore it with high waisted jeans, it is a little on the shorter end (but by no means a crop top). Fits perfectly.

links_Review_Title: So easy so quick so cute!!!!

links_Review_Text: it fits great and the quality is amazing it does look like a expensive top.

links_Review_Title: A little big on me but it was still cute
links_Review_Text: Cute! Definitely runs on the smaller side

links_Review_Title: Didn't want to send it back!!
links_Review_Text: LOVED THIS MORE THAN ANY OTHER RENTAL. Wore it with a deep wrap around the back bra. Felt gorgeous in it with jeans and heels.
Form fitting, and doesn't gape so no need for tape. Went bra-less
This top is SO fun and flirty. It is a great fit and cool enough to wear in the summer with the lace. Got so many compliments and can't wait to rent again.
This shirt runs small. So, I rented a XS I am 5'2 and 115lb small frame but it was a struggle to get into. 4 stars because the shirt is very stylish but the way I struggled was annoying.

links_Review_Title: Great quality shirt and no bra required.
links_Review_Text: Really loved the quality and fit of this shirt. I wore this for a casual Friday evening out with jeans and heels. It's a little short in the torso but it wasn't too short for my liking. Will likely rent again. Fits TTS.

links_Review_Title: Wore this on a day trip to Napa with the fam. Got compliments everywhere I went. Love this top!
links_Review_Text: True to size. I’m not big busted, so I fashion taped the edges of the low v cut and it looked and worked great!

links_Review_Title: Cute but a lot of boob
links_Review_Text: Very cute top. It is a shorter top with a low cut. It was too much boob for me- probably better for a smaller chested girl.
Fits a little small but is very beautiful!
So cute, very flattering, back is somewhat see-through so best to not wear a bra or wear a nude bra.

Large was a little big on me, and I'm normally a 6-8. I wor e it to work but wish I wore it to something fancier/better because I had to wear a tank top underneath for work and that makes it lose the allure

I loved this dress. It was comfy and warm and hugged all the right spots. The only thing is, it did ride up at points so definitely would not wear this without tights. I'm also petite so would not recommend for girls over 5'4 as it'll be too short
Short but still modest. Very comfortable! I thought it was going to be too hot but it was surprisingly thin. Loved the velvety material
Lots of material around the midsection which made me wonder if this was that flattering. But it's soft and was fun to wear for a night out in the winter

The dress runs very fitted through the hip and flairs. Has a strong 80s vibe in person that I wasn't going for. The top bunch a little in the middle, it fit awkwardly. I should have sized up. Never wore.

This dress is really flirty and fun--if a little short. I wore the large and had no problem with any part of the fit. It was super comfy and the velvet was a perfect weight to be indoors and outdoors on a cool evening.

links_Review_Title: On trend but still work appropriate
links_Review_Text: Rented this for boyfriends work Christmas party and took a chance since the other reviews weren't great. I loved this! I sized up to air on the side of conservative but it didn't look too big. Loved the ruching and velvet. It is short, but I didn't think it was inappropriate--sizing up helped. I'm 5'4 135 and went with the Medium. Highly recommend!
Soft and velvety. Great for date night. Due to rouging the dress does ride up. I'd rank this in the middle. Didn't love it or hate it.
Super cute and fun velvet dress. The material and rushing made it really comfortable and flattering but it was very short. I'm 5'0 and felt like I had to wear tights under it in order to wear it.
Worked for a rehearsal dinner but was a bit short and rode up a bit when walking around. Did not need to wear a bra

links_Review_Title: This dress is even more beautiful in person. I got a lot of compliments in it.
links_Review_Text: The fit of this dress is good but it's a bit "bulkier" than I imagined. I think visually this dress looked fantastic but it was slightly heavy. I also had to pull it down sometimes which was annoying.

links_Review_Title: So comfy, Wore to church (even though it's SHORT)
links_Review_Text: This dress is adorable. The velvet is soft and comfy. The cut is short, but so am I. 5'2 on a good day. I wore it to church, (very liberal dress code wear I worship) I used a black shawl to cover up the extra leg that is exposed when you sit. My hubby loved it, just may buy it.

Material is a crushed velvet type- thick and warm, perfect for a February cocktail affair. The fit is great for someone with a larger bust (I am a 34D and was perfectly covered). Could be short on taller women.

links_Review_Title: I didn't end up wearing this style
links_Review_Text: The pattern is beautiful and fun but the fit in the top wasn't quite right for me and the ruching in the waist seemed to be stretched.

I'm 5'9, typically a 2/4, and sized up based on reviews. Wish I hadn't. It's too big on me in the bust and stomach so there's extra fabric that makes it unflattering. It is short but that's part of the lewk and shouldn't be sized up to accommodate. Just don't rent if you're not looking for a mini skirt. With black tights and boots it's cute and doesn't seem too short even with my height, IMO. I'll rent again in a small and see if it works better.

links_Review_Title: was not able to wear it
links_Review_Text: This is a velour dress, very pretty and could be worn with over the knee boots for winter. It was too small for me and did not wear

This is a very pretty dress. Velvet material, substantial feeling, and very well made. The skirt is VERY short. There was no way I could wear this out anywhere. You would need to be very short to not look ridiculous wearing this. I would say 5'1" or shorter.

This dress was for a formal dinner party outside. The material was velvet and warm enough that I was not cold. I got so many compliments on my dress. The gathered material around the waste was flattering and I danced the night away it was so comfortable!! I probably could have worn the medium but the large fit so I didn’t have to wear any spanx or suck anything in.

links_Review_Title: Was a liitle too sexy for my job but loved!
links_Review_Text: Didn't wear sadly
Runs small in bust, I have a small B cup so not a problem. More busty won't work.

links_Review_Title: Got many compliments for the print!

links_Review_Text: This elegant dress was such a sunny and light option for my honeymoon in Sydney. I felt polished yet cheerful in this colorful pattern and it was easy to dress up or dress down. The silk is nice and airy and the dress wears well from day to night.
Perfect dress for our tropical vacation to Bora Bora

This dress was great for Thanksgiving in Miami. The fabric was light and flows nicely. Beautiful colors. The straps were a little long and fell a few times. Can go braless, I wore a strapless. Nice length mid calf and the ruffle is a Stylish touch. Comfortable
Couldn't wear due to running so small in bust.

links_Review_Title: I paired this with a purple turtleneck and a houndstooth jacket.
links_Review_Text: It fits tight, the material doesn't have any stretch but it wasn't uncomfortable.
This runs tiny!! I am a 2 and sized up to a 4 and that was perfect all around but it is short! Perfect for Zoom meetings.
Cute and flirty, a bit short but is perfect for my height
I wore this to a rehearsal dinner at a bbq place. I wore a denim jacket to casual it up and wore ankle boots. I loved it!! I highly recommend you try this cute dress!

Rented this as part of my unlimited rental and have worn it for my birthday dinner, to work, to a holiday party, the list goes on. Love it! It can be dressed up or down and flows away nicely on the bottom to cover up any tummy insecurities. Super flattering, this one might just be staying home with me.

links_Review_Title: So cute! I needed a 2 tho
links_Review_Text: Loved this so much but I should've gotten a 2. It was so tight on my waist. I almost sent it back But my friends said it looked great so I wore it out to dinner. I wore pasties since the back is shear. So pretty and I will rent again one size up. The bust and hip tho we're perfect. I'm 33,26,33 rented a 0.

links_Review_Title: Finally something that kind of fits me!
links_Review_Text: For context, I'm 4 foot 11 and 85 pounds. So I am PETITE and the size of a child. Nothing ever fits me, but this actually did! It could've been taken in on the waist a teeny bit, but I know that's my problem haha. Really happy they run size 0s on this app. This dress was light and flowy. It didn't feel heavy at all. I'm very happy it fit my shoulder frame well, as most things are too loose.

links_Review_Title: SHORT GIRLS THIS IS THE DRESS FOR YOU
links_Review_Text: Listen if you're over 5'5, this is probably isn't the dress for you. I'm 5'2 and I constantly struggle with dresses being too long for me. This was the perfect length! I felt amazing in this dress! :)

I love a micro mini dress but this is MINIIIII - even sizing up won't help with the length here. Don't rent if you're over 5'2" :( for reference, I'm 5'8". Ive rented ref before & have never encountered something this ill-fitting! Such a bummer. Stuff i did like on @thanksitsrtr or thanksitsrtr.com

The color is beautiful - not an intense red, but still bright. However, everything about the fit was off. The sleeves were extremely tight - the ties are just for looks they are not adjustable. I am also quite short and this dress was way too short for me. Ended up not wearing the dress.
I'm no prude but this was incredibly short. I'm 5'2" and it was still "wow" short. I should have paid more attention to the reviews!!!
I liked this dress, but it was incredibly short. It fit well at the top, but I had to wear pants with it because it was way too short.

I own 2 dresses from Reformation that are both size 2 - but per the reviews on this one I sized up to a 4. It is TINY! My arms are squeezed in (unflattering), I can barely zip the back up, and it's WAYYY too short. I'm 5'7" and it's pretty much up my butt which isn't the bridal shower look I was going for. Size up at least 2 sizes!!

links_Review_Title: Shorter and smaller than my usual Reformation
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress! I have other reformation dresses in a size 6 that fit fine this one ran short maybe because of the sleeves. I would go up a size next time.
Soft, flowing dress with fitted top.
Really cute dress! It is very short so I wouldn't recommend for anyone over 5'4
material is thinner than i expected so didn't end up wearing - will rent again when it's a bit warmer outside. cute, fun. it is pretty cropped. could be dressed up or down
Unless you love your midriff, pair this top with high waisted jeans! The colors are happy and the ruffles and balloon sleeves are fun for a girls' dinner!
The closure could be a little more secure but it's a nice top

I'm obsessed with this shirt. I wore it twice during my 4 day rental and got so many complements. Definitely is a bit of a weird fit (loose and short!) but wear a lacy bra and high waisted pants or shorts and it looks great! Want to buy!
I loved the colors on this but wasn't a fan of how cropped it was. Had to wear a another crop top underneath just in case the tiny tiny chest clasp came undone or the wind caught the top

This shirt was sooooo flipping cute. I knew it would be but it's huge. I rented xs and i was still swimming in it! It only has one tiny button. You need a safety pin or your gems will be falling out all night long!
fabulous print and light, airy feel, but the top seemed way too big in the bust and could have benefitted from another snap closure. I had to tape the neckline because it was way too revealing.

This top was really fun! It was a great color and shape, and was a really nice material for the summer. It did feel a little big, but not by much. There's only a small snap at the front to keep it closed so I pinned it to keep it shut

links_Review_Title: Took a chance, it didn't pay off
links_Review_Text: In seeing this on the model, I knew there was a risk the fit wasn't going to work for me. That's the beauty of RTR though, right? The top was way too low cut for me (and came pinned by a previous renter at the bust, so I'm sure I'm not the only one with that issue), was way too short (I am all torso though, so that may not be the case for everyone) and the sleeve were way too big. I think I wore it for 4 seconds before I took it off.

I wanted to LOVE this so bad-- so, so bad. But the fit, the bagginess at the bottom, and large gaps at the breasts, so bad-- so, so bad. I have a wide rib cage, small chest and waist and it just wasn't meant to be. It's a super fun print and cut-- this would look killer on someone with a larger bust.
The sleeves were a little too dramatic and puffy for me.

This is not a true crop top on me and I love it. It's just the right deep v (gotta wear the right bra) and hits just at the top of my jeans. Can be worn with high waisted jeans for more coverage. I've worn it so many times!

links_Review_Title: I love this top! It is so cool and perfect for summer. I wore it all the time!
links_Review_Text: It is very flattering and fits well.

If this had been a bit cheaper, it'd be in my closet permanently! It's light and was a good length for my petite frame. I wore it with thigh high boots and a chunky shawl sweater. Got lots of compliments!

I loved this very comfortable, easy dress. The fabric is quite light so it's not for cold days. It hangs very loose in the waist so could easily be used as a maternity dress. For those of us who are not pregnant, it's equally great! I wore it to work but would definitely wear to a party or event.

I love the pattern of this dress - it is delicate and pretty. The dress is very light weight and super comfortable. I love the pockets!! It runs big and is shapeless. My husband's first reaction was "it looks like a nightgown". I wore a large but easily could have worn a medium.

This dress is of a single layer chiffon material. Best for late summer, early fall, but it can get a little stuffy on a hot day. I think you can also wear with a slip for colder weather. Overall nice pattern but defs not something worth to own long term.

links_Review_Title: Adorable and super comfortable. Great with tights or layered with a sweater.
links_Review_Text: IT HAS POCKETS++++

links_Review_Title: Cute print; nice fabric; very oversized
links_Review_Text: This dress was much bigger than expected and shapeless. I wore it anyway because the print was cute and the fabric was comfy. Overall, kind of blah but I think it has potential to be more exciting if sized down.

links_Review_Title: So many people stopped to tell me how much they love the dress.
links_Review_Text: Wore on my second and third trimester with plenty of room. Felt pretty and I constrained.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for work or a party!
links_Review_Text: I got a Small but should have gotten an XS. I'm 5'8 and it was not too short at all on me.
This is a beautiful pattern. I will definitely rent agin I will just size down or two.
Average shift dress.

This dress has a very pretty print and color. It fit me a bit large overall but the length was at my knees which is nice since I am petite and often dresses are too long on me. However the dress has no shape and I felt like I was wearing a tent. I did not wear it because it looked like maternity wear on my body. I think one could wear a belt to make it a bit better but I'm not a belt person so that would not work on my end.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to work and received many compliments.
links_Review_Text: Fun print on a classic cut - you can't really go wrong!

Beautiful and very lightweight silk dress. The colors are really lush in person, and the silk was great for a warm fall day. I will say that it's probably not going to be great in winter if there are tights involved - it would probably just have way too much static cling. I love a good tent-style dress, and this one was perfect: well cut, good length (hit just above my knee) and has pockets!

This is a perfect dress to transition into fall. Very light weight however has nice coverage. Comfortable and Flowey with a thin silky material. This does run large due to its loose fit. I recommend to size down.

This is a great shapeless day dress- if you like this look, the print is pretty! It's a tiny bit see through if you don't wear nude undergarments. I thought it was fun but if you want a waist in a dress, this one is not for you.

I ended up returning without wearing. The length was a little short on me ( I'm 5'8" and was planning to wear heels but the hem was at the top of my foot). The quality was gorgeous and I loved how feminine it was. The size was true, but because it is a more fitted maxi dress I would've sized up to a 6.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous floral maxi with a sophisticated style
links_Review_Text: Loved this maxi! It was perfect for a princess party with my daughter at our county club. The fit was flattering with the fathered waist band. Length was a little long so need to wear heels.
I adored this dress, the open back gave it some glamour. It was quite comfortable. I think I could have worn either the 8 or the 10, the 10 fit better on my belly and the 8 fit better up top.
Loved loved loved this dress!! I paired it with a blue velvet blazer because the back is open and I wanted to wear it to work.
I loved everything about this dress, the size fit great. I liked that the back was open, it gave it a nice flare. The only con for me was it was not quite long enough.

links_Review_Title: Stunning gown, sleek and feminine, perfect for summer black tie wedding.
links_Review_Text: Absolutely adored this rental. Wish I could keep it forever! I got endless compliments and felt so confident. Color is light light pink, not "white" which makes this perfectly appropriate for a wedding. I'm 5'8" and it was the perfect height with 2.5" heels.

links_Review_Title: AMAZING IF YOU WANT TO HIDE BIG ARMS
links_Review_Text: I personally have an insecurity about my arms. This dress was perfection. It fit perfectly and hid my arms. I wore it to a baptism and got so many compliments.
Fit is a little weird - big in the top and narrow through the hips- great for someone who is probably apple shaped.

Dreamy print and fabric that drapes so elegantly! I wore this to a family wedding in Chicago, and even though it was chilly the floral print still seemed classic. A completely appropriate cut for a family event (high neck, long length), and I find myself dreaming of wearing it to every event that comes up! Stunning, elegant, something you'd imagine Kate Middleton would wear, and you'll feel like a princess in it!
So feminine and figure flattering! I LOVE THIS DRESS!
Fit's like a glove and is so so pretty and flowy

links_Review_Title: such incredible muted colors on such a beautifully flowy and sheen fabric. SOOO many compliments!!
links_Review_Text: everything about this dress was perfect. the colors were bold but muted, the flowers were so lowkey, the material was flowy and almost like silk, the empire waist gave way to the long flowy skirt (it was too long on me so i tied the front to give it more edge and make it more length appropriate), and the sleeves were also so cute!! definitely recommend!!!
I really wanted to love this dress but it just made me look like a Victorian schoolmarm.

links_Review_Title: great fit and flow, feminine elegance
links_Review_Text: i love the print, cut and flow of this dress. how the sleeves are designed it is very open and comfy and breathable for hot summer outdoor event. the only way for this to be rated higher is if it were silk instead of synthetic.

links_Review_Title: My fav. Compliments galore, "you're always the best dressed @every event" from a Super Bowl wife.
links_Review_Text: Perfection in fabric fit and feel. I'm in love. The back is elegant, slightly forties. A stunner. I'm in love. Can't seem to send it back.
A very long dress with nice prints. Didn't wear as I will need really high heels. Probably good with someone taller.

This was super comfortable yet chic and elegant for my birthday dinner party. Got many compliments but was able to sit and eat as well as dance comfortably. Very flattering and forgiving as has room in waist. Great piece!
Fit great and was comfortable the entire evening.
Long in length but there are buttons around the ankles so I just let it drape over. Asymmetrical top was super cute and I wore more than once!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful Piece but Just Ok for Petites
links_Review_Text: Loved this jumpsuit. Top fit but my girls are large. The length was long on me, however the snaps on the bottom of the pant leg kept the length from dragging. Still legs were too long on me so you lost that jumpsuit vibe in favor of "slacks." (Ha!) Got boatloads of compliments anyway.

You guys....this is IT! I had about given up hope that my body would ever work in a jumpsuit. I'm 5'8", 153lb and generally between a 6 and 8; athletic build, () and 34B. The proportions were perfect. The top might be too tight on someone with a larger chest. I rented this for a work party in Miami. Folks remarked how "Miami" i looked- glamorous, effortless and COMFY! Pockets. Yes, pockets! I could have dressed it up with heels, but I dressed it down with sparkly flat sandels.
Very easy to put on and take off. Fabric is so soft and doesn't wrinkle. Flattering and very sexy. Wore to a nice dinner date and it was a perfect selection.

The fit was definitely true to size , I'm 5'2 about 120 with hips and it fit like a glove. I wore this on Christmas and got many compliments on it. The detailing and fabric was perfect. Highly recommend this jumpsuit !
Loved this jumpsuit. It was comfortable and the quality was amazing. Trendy and flattering. Would rent again and again.
So fun and fits great! Nice satin feel - perfect length

I liked this jumpsuit a lot and typically I have a hard time finding jumpsuits that fit properly. There was enough room in the bust and the length was great with the buttons at the bottom so it did not drag. They had a nice accent with the gold buttons but they were a little difficult to get on and off. My boyfriend had to help. Overall great rental for a work dinner!

LOVED this jumpsuit. Loved. I’m typically a 6 in jumpsuits, but the 10 was available so I took a chance. I'm pear shaped. The legs/hips fit perfectly, but it was definitely too big on top. But since it’s one-shoulder, I was able to sweep the long sleeve over and let the top hang loose a bit and it looked fabulous. The material is luxe and beautiful and I felt amazing and so stylish and sexy. Would definitely rent again.

I wear this pant suit for a birthday party, it was so pretty. It was elegant and on trend and I got so many compliments, and even signed up a fellow partygoer for a rent the runway subscription! It's that pretty…

NWT! I put this in and Loved it!! BUT I think I needed to be 2-4 inches taller (5ft) pants billowed at ankle and my arms weren't long enough to keep sleeve pulled so my arm just "hung" out of the split sleeve which actually is what pushed me to return Make sure to unbutton legs and arms before getting dressed Hammered black silk looks textured. tie at waist is sewn so won't slip off Size was true I'm between 2-4 silk is not forgiving if I went up in size top would have been looser than I would want
Comfy and easy to wear! Dressy enough for evening event and casual enough for date night.
I have a long torso, so this was tight in crotch & shoulders but not to the point of discomfort to wear. Will rent many times again - it's been my fave date night outfit from here thus far!

links_Review_Title: Classy and feminine. I enjoyed the small details of the piece.
links_Review_Text: Slimming fit, complimentary lines and thick material to hide any imperfections.

links_Review_Title: I am size 6, they sent size 8...
links_Review_Text: The fit was too lose, too big!

links_Review_Title: Great out, not for shorter people.
links_Review_Text: It's cute, but I'm too short in the midsection. It also runs small on top of you are a bit busty.
Incredibly comfortable, received many compliments
It's a beautiful material and I'm sure a smaller size will be perfect. I'm usually a 4 but tried a 6. I'm 5'9" and it was too long and looked baggy through the leg.
Loved, loved, loved this jumpsuit.
I couldn't even zip this dress up. It was way too tight. Had to send back.
rented for a bachelorette party but it was just slightly too small

This shirt is absolutely gorgeous. The weave is completely open but it somehow gives the impression of not being able to see through it if worn with a nude bra. I wore it over a blacks sleeveless dress for work and on the weekend with jeans.
Beautiful blouse. Comfortable and had so many compliments
This shirt was really cool and different - a perfect example of why RTR is so great. A high-quality piece that I wouldn't normally buy, this was perfect for a night out in winter. Highly recommend.
Rented 6 because 4 was unavailable but it worked out nicely anyway
Totally my style. High quality, forward enough to make a statement, but not too extreme. High quality, but definitely cropped. I wore a silk cami underneath.
What a stunning top! Perfect for Nashville. It's all cotton and it breathed beautifully. An easy wear. Really elevates the look
Absolutely beautiful construction and material. It's a bit heavy so despite the openness/crop it was a bit warm on a humid night.
I wore this see through top with a nude bra. It is a little cropped, but love the look. The shirt itself if a tad "stiff" but overall great.

links_Review_Title: I wore this top for a birthday dinner with friends.
links_Review_Text: This shirt was really cute. The see through design made it sexy without being too revealing and comfortable enough to wear even in summer. It was pretty structured with no stretch to the fabric. I wear size 10, and the 10 fit perfectly. Measurements: 5'4", 150lbs, 34D chest

This shirt is really beautifully made! I do think it ran on the smaller side- it's is a fairly short crop and flows throughout except for the waist. I liked how while it was sheer throughout there was paneling in the chest area. I wore it with high waisted jeans for a baby shower with nothing underneath. I plan to wear it with a nude tank and jeans for work. Very cool and different :)

I got so many compliments it really elevates an outfit. I wore a camisole underneath to work to make it less sexy. The shirt is definitely thick and very structured and a lot of fabric. The holes were nice for a breeze though. I seriously wore this shirt for 3 days straight. If it wasn't so expensive I'd buy it in a heartbeat.
Showstopper top that works well with a tank under.
Loved this too- not the most ideal for larger chests but can be worked around. Be sure you're confident with your tummy because it will show! Absolutely stunning and can be worn for any occasion

links_Review_Title: Ideal for transition from work to play!
links_Review_Text: I paired this with a leather mini skirt for work and then changed into jeans for a date in the evening. I got so many compliments on the top. The quality is amazing and the fit was even better. It fit like a glove but my arms didn't feel restrained when I raised them up, etc. Will definitely be renting again!
Cropped slightly, and a little snug in chest (34DD), but generally great fit. Lots of compliments from strangers, doesn't feel too bare
Not only did it have a special body odor smell but hard to zip up as a gal who lives solo, and for long toros it will ride very high. I did not wear this garment at all
Read contradictory reviews on this top; one saying that it ran large and the other saying it ran super small. I can confirm that this top runs SUPER SMALL.

links_Review_Title: Love the fabric, it's heavy and luxurious but fine for warm weather bc of the wide knit.
links_Review_Text: Overall I love the shirt. Love the style of the shoulders and the sleeves. It's a little tight around the bust, and definitely flattened my 36D chest. It's a bit cropped but not overly so and perfect with high wast jeans. It's a beautiful piece and I got lots of compliments!
I cannot wait to rent this again - such a quality piece with beautiful lace details.

links_Review_Title: Very thick fabric (super high quality), absolutely GORGEOUS lace
links_Review_Text: Runs large but in a nice baggy way

Really cool looking top, but overall felt it was uncomfortable. It ran small, so I felt myself pulling at the neck aot of the day, and the zipper was hard to get up. I think it's fine to wear for a couple hours but I would size up.
This top was really pretty and had a great weight to it, but ran super small and didn't even cover my belly button.
I loooove this blouse! It is so fun! It's just the right amount of sexy with the lace but covers up a lot. It is also great for summer since it is very breezy! Definitely recommend!!
Fits well but hard to zipper alone.

links_Review_Title: RTR does it again! 4 months postpartum and I felt incredible in this dress!
links_Review_Text: I loved the fit of this dress! The fitted bottom offsets the billowy top and made my waste look extra small! I loved this dress and received SO many compliments;)

links_Review_Title: Very cool dress with a strange fit
links_Review_Text: Wore this for NYE and while I finally got it working and loves it, there were a few huge issues. One being the top is very large and creates a gap, two being the bottom is small and tight. Lastly, the zipper is not easy to get up and kept splitting. Great color and outfit if you have none of those issues.

Dress was more beautiful in person. Gorgeous color but fabric wrinkles easy. Normally wear 4/6 in dresses and Sz Small in tops, the Medium fit great and was very comfortable. The top portion fit loose however, but wasn't noticeable when my arms were down. I loved wearing the dress! So flattering on!

links_Review_Title: LOVE IT but need to size up (runs small)!!
links_Review_Text: This dress has so much style and the pink is a show stopper color. I don't think I would have branched out to try on a bright pink but have a thing for one shoulder necklines and went for it. Just need to get the right size (size up) and it's a winner!

links_Review_Title: Fun Dress for a Night Out in the City
links_Review_Text: I absolutely love this dress for its vibrant color and fun, yet elegant style. This was the perfect number for celebrating my birthday dinner and drinks out in the city. However, it is not so forgiving in the tummy area, so you might wanna throw on a pair of Spanx.
Beautiful dress that just fits weird. Too loose up top and very tight around the hips. Loved the color and satiny feel. Very feminine.
Fit was perfect except the top gaped several inches. I had to pin a safety pin to stop my top half being exposed. Overall it was a great fun dress to wear.
I loved everything about this dress. I have nothing bad to say about it! Rent it if you can!!!!! I'm obsessed!
I ended up sizing up to XL for this one. Perfect for a night out in Vegas. Very flattering and fun! Wish I took more pics in this one.
Dress was very pretty and as my young son said..."It looks expensive!" Shoulder pad needs fashion tape to stay in place and zipper had a trouble spot, but other than that it was great!
Loved this dress. Felt super sexy & chic in it. Only draw was that the side without the sleeve was slightly big, so needed to pin it. Other than that, lovedddd

This pink sensation fulfilled all my cocktail dreams! I wanted something elevated and mature, ravishing and effortless - this was it! Only thing was I could have worn a small. Highly recommend using fashion tape to keep the shoulder pad in place if you get it and it's a little big

links_Review_Title: Super cute for a rehearsal dinner!

links_Review_Text: Fun dress for an 80s event. Great material and color. Lots of compliments. Although I had to pin the zipper which was broken. Could have worn a medium.

links_Review_Title: The shoulder pad is very thick. The fabric extremely thin and silky so it is unflattering.
links_Review_Text: The shoulder pad is very thick, not removable. The fabric is extremely thin and silky so it is unflattering, gave me a pouch and I am slim 125lb 5'6 wore a small. I think this dress would fit someone who is very tall and petite. Although I still like the design. Also the zipper got caught when passing through the waist & I could not remove it.
Runs small in rib cage but super flattering once zipped. In love
runs big in the top, had to pin it

links_Review_Title: I really wanted to be able to give this a 5-Star review...
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for the first time in a small. Typically wearing a 2 and analyzing the material, I thought that would be the best option. It came in and was very oversized so I sent it back and waited for it to become available in a size XS so I could rent it for a wedding at the end of the month. Unfortunately, the size XS came in and still was oversized on the left arm. It fit everywhere else but was unwearable as-is and the shoulder pad would not stay in place or sit correctly (maybe I have skinny shoulders, idk??). At the end of the day, I wanted to make this dress work so badly it just didn't. I wouldn't recommend it for a wedding like I was trying to wear it for, but if you're in need of a dress for a 80s Prom style social, I'd give it a try.
Love the color and side ruching, but weird shoulder pad that's sewn in so you can't take it out.
Great dress and color

links_Review_Title: This dress was so fun! The vibrant color really stood out and the leopard straps accented perfectly.
links_Review_Text: Such a fun dress!! I ordered the dress in my usual size 8, with a backup in a size 10. When the dresses arrived, the 10 came without straps! I began to panic, but I put the 8 on and it fit perfectly, hugging my curves in all the places. It was a hit! I wore it for my partner's Barrister's Ball, and I loved how I stood out with such a loud vibrant color. It was classy and the material was great. I felt amazing in it.

I was so surprised at how well this dress fit and accentuated my curves (since i don't have many!) the fabric was so soft and i don't think I've ever worn a nicer dress. The color is amazing and while the fabric is tight; I didn't need to wear spanx. This dress set the bar high!!

links_Review_Title: This dress is a showstopper! My event was a gala with a neon theme, and this dress was perfection.
links_Review_Text: I think a size 6 might have been a little better on me, but the 8 worked out just fine. I have an hourglass shape with a little bit of a tummy so it's always hard to figure out exact sizing.

links_Review_Title: Loved the color! Wore it to an art gala.
links_Review_Text: Fit like a glove, except for the bust. If you have an A cup like me, consider wearing two bras.

links_Review_Title: You need super Spanx to wear this but otherwise amazing.
links_Review_Text: Color was amazing- not for everyone but worked great for me. Super tight so double Spanx for sure.
Fit like a glove! Very fattening, life of the party. Just need to be super mindful of under garments!

This dress was beautiful. The fabric was heavy so it didn't cling where it shouldn't. I'm on the shorter side (5'4") but with some serious heels it worked perfectly. I will buy this dress if RTR puts it up for sake!

links_Review_Title: Standout at a formal event or wedding
links_Review_Text: Fit great and nice texture. The color was a statement maker and the leopard print tie straps were great! This is a long dress so heels are a must-would suggest statement heels with the opening in the front. Bigger bust needed so I wore a strapless padded bra to fill out.

links_Review_Title: Great evening dancing and meeting new people.
links_Review_Text: Great dress but super tight! I doubled up on the Spanx including Spanx panties to avoid my belly button showing through dress. I would recommend sizing up. I felt very confident in this dress and received many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color & sexy fit!! Fun to dance in!
links_Review_Text: Super comfortable even though I was a little bloated from good booze & food!
This was a great rent. The straps were perfect for any busy size. However, I would've like it to fit a bit more snug in the hips and waist...I would get a 6 next time.

links_Review_Title: Perfect 4 summer black tie optional event
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for me! I sized up to accommodate my 4mo mini baby bump, but it got so perfectly and it was so comfortable and lightweight. I was able to dance all night! Highly recommend this dress!

I rented this for a gala event in New Orleans and I must say it was pretty on theme. The color of this dress is so bright it stands out in the crowd and the leopard ties are a nice touch. It was pretty comfortable for being tight. I would totally rent again.
Showstopper. This neon green is great with a tan and was perfect for this beach wedding! Very form fitting so keep that in mind for undergarments. Love!

The dress is beautiful! As always, Christian Siriano dresses tend to run a little big, so definitely size down so that it hugs your body....it's not a dress that should be loose! I'm a 32D and the chest area was still a little loose. The ties do come down a lot and so you have to tie them quite tightly. The dress is overall a great pop of colour for a summer wedding.

This dress is STUNNING! The color is amazing, it has stretch and hugs every curve without being restrictive or uncomfortable. The length is nice and long but not too much for my height (I'm 5'9"). I got so many compliments and felt so beautiful! I highly recommend this dress!

links_Review_Title: The fit and color of the dress was really stunning. I got numerous compliments on it.
links_Review_Text: This dress fit like a glove. It's fun and colorful. It's very form-fitting, but I loved the way it hugged my curves. The color is really stunning and the details such as the high-low hemline and leopard print ribbon straps are simply lovely. A true showstopper for anyone wanting to add a bit of splash to their formal attire.

links_Review_Title: I wish I sized up. Didn't end up wearing this.
links_Review_Text: Sorry if this is a duplicate review--first time doing this! I wish I sized up because you could see every curve of my belly button indentation, which is not cute! I'm 5'9" and 135 and typically wear a size 4 in dresses. It hugged every curve of my body in a good way otherwise. I loved the color of the dress and the style, just wished you couldn't see the topography of my stomach and I didn't want to think about it all night.

links_Review_Title: This dress makes you feel like Cinderella and Tinkerbell at the same time!
links_Review_Text: What a fab dress. It's hardy too -- I could cinch the straps tightly without them snapping (my biggest concern). The fabric dries quickly (it was hot out and when I picked up a water glass, some dripped off the bottom, dried right up). It was the greatest dress I've ever worn!

If you want an endless amount of compliments, rent this dress. It's stunning! The material is nice and thick. I typically don't love tight clothes but this was very comfortable. Only the size 6 was available and it was slightly big on top but I wore it anyway! The 4 would have been perfect. I'm 5'8", 130lbs, 34DD for reference.
Fit was large, the top has adjustable straps which are perfect to tighten/loosen and make the chest area more secure. Dress has structure - loves how I felt in this and would definitely rent again.
Love this dress so much--it is gorgeous and so flattering. It's a little loose on top so ladies with a smaller chest may want to size down.

This dress, clearly, is a standout. The color is something you really don't see especially in a formal dress which I would consider this mostly because of the fit and flare at the bottom. The 4 fit perfectly and the material is a dream silky and smooth with a little stretch to it as I was on vacation and eating more than usual but it still fit and was pretty comfortable. This was a backup dress and I ended up going with my first choice to the main formal event but wanted to wear this very much as it was such a statement piece and I'd never worn anything like it. My husband loved it and convinced me to wear it to brunch but that to me definitely ended up feeling like an inappropriate occasion and I was super overdressed. But the dress is still fabulous. Only lost a star because the flare at the bottom is a little awkward in my opinion. I'm 5'4" and have about 3.5" heels on and the back of the dress barely missed the ground. I did not wear a bra and have 34b/c bra size. The straps are adjustable and have a cute but not that noticeable leopard print. I was about 130 pounds at this point approx 28 inch waist 36 inch hips.

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a Havana Nights themed party and got compliments all night long! Loved it!
links_Review_Text: I really needed the next bigger size but I put on my spanx and made it work! Fit was pretty true to size.

I wore this dress for my wedding rehearsal because i wanted something fun and different. And it was amazing! The fit was amazing and the color, leopard ties were perfect. Very on trend and flattering. Received so many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Such a fun dress!! Got so many compliments on the color.
links_Review_Text: Fit very true to size!

links_Review_Title: Color = fabulous, fit was very comfortable! LOVED IT!
links_Review_Text: This dress was so fun to wear - the color is STUNNING in person - very bright lime green. Shows up/contrasts really well with darker skin tones. I received many compliments. I'm normally an 8 but sometimes a 10 - wore the size 10 and was very comfortable. Fabric is thick and seems very high quality. While it's very form fitting, because of the quality of fabric, it's fairly forgiving (although I did have on Spanx underneath). Another review noted the back touched the ground, I didn't have a problem with that although I'm 5'9 and wore 3-4 inch heels. I thought the high/low for front and back were very flattering as well (unfortunately none of my pix were full length) Highly recommend this dress!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a Miami wedding. All of my friends adored the color.
links_Review_Text: Fit was perfect. I'm not a busty girl so there was a little space in the bust area. Other wise, the dress hugged all my curves perfectly.

links_Review_Title: This dress definitely stands out in the crown
links_Review_Text: #glam #redcarpetready

I picked this dress for my birthday dinner. I loved the color and the leopard tie straps. I read one too many reviews about this designers other dress and went up to sizes. That was a huge mistake the dress swallowed me. I had to pin and belt it because is didn't order a backup size. The dress is gorgeous, the length is excellent for taller ladies. I think if you're on the shorter side this is not the dress for you.
I sort of want to because of the color and amazing comfort but the bottom is very fluted and unflattering on me. So close to perfect!!

This dress was perfect for a Miami wedding. I usually wear 4-6, sized up to a 6 and it was a perfect fit and not too snug. The back of the dress almost touched the floor without heels on my tall frame, however, straps are adjustable. Color is a bright lime green. Lots of compliments!
This dress is made of heavy fabric that looks even better in motion. I highly recommend it for your next formal event!

links_Review_Title: Bummed runs very small and not for those under 5 ft 7 inches
links_Review_Text: Did not fit runs small
This dress was so cute and fun. Didn't even up wearing because it was too wide across the chest. If you're small up top, recommend sizing down
It fit like a glove, spanx were required. It was a very comfortable dress. Leopard heels and clutch were perfect.

links_Review_Title: Great in theory but not in execution
links_Review_Text: The color is amazing, the fit is true to size, but I had to return the dress because the bottom has become deformed over time and has totally lost its shape, making it look really awkward. Also, can't be conscious about any curves as this dress will hide nothing.
I didn't end up wearing this because it was just too big. The waist and bust didn't work for my body and it was too long. It is such a fun color, so wish it had worked.
Great color that looked amazing on vacation. I probably shouldn't have worn it after a week and a half of being in an all inclusive resort because it was definitely a little on the smaller size.
I got a size bigger cause I had read it was short, but it was pointless. It's just indecent. If you are tall and don't have a small butt, this isn't the right dress..
Rented this for my birthday dinner. It fit perfectly, and I love the pattern. It's definitely short, so I wouldn't wear it to work or anything, but for a night out or casual with sneakers it's great!

links_Review_Title: My first RTR order! Beautiful dress, lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: I wore this for a New Year's Eve party, the dress was so fun! I read other reviews and agree it runs a little short and flirty- it worked great with tights. I'm curvy with kind of broad shoulders so the size 6 fit but was a little tight in the arms/chest and felt a little restricting. Overall loved it for one night!

links_Review_Title: Perfect 20 yr high school reunion dress!
links_Review_Text: Such a fun dress to wear! I felt great. The cut is very flattering- I have a long torso but it nipped in my waist perfectly. Dress is short (and it was raining out) so I paired with black opaque tights and black leather booties. I added a studded leather belt to tie it all together. Absolutely loved the dress and got tons of compliments. Made me feel stylish and slim, and like i wasn't trying super hard- all things necessary for a good class reunion look! Want to own this one.

links_Review_Title: First time wearing animal print - loved it!
links_Review_Text: I'm not really a "bold dress" kinda girl, but for this informal film event I had, I wanted to play it up a bit. The dress is playful, and paired with some black tights and shoes, it's a nice clean look that is still classy. Fits true to size, and is comfy! Maybe a hair on the short side, but I had tights on so...didn't care much!
Runs small, which is why I got a 12. I normally wear an 8 or 10 and even the 12 was snug.

I loved this Reformation dress so much! I'm usually a size 6-8 in dresses but based on other reviews I sized up accordingly. I'm so glad I did that because my usual size would have never fit. The 10 felt ok but it's was just a little too tight in the abdomen area that it would have made me uncomfortable. I ended up wearing the size 12 (bust area was big) and paired it up with white sneakers and a belt to cinch the waist a little. I may be too curvy for Reformation but I made it work somehow.
Great dress, definitely short but no problem with tights.

This dress definitely runs small. Thank goodness I read the reviews and ordered a bigger size and I was able to wear it to my event. This dress is more beautiful in person. The fabric is light, comfortable and I felt modern and edgy! I wish I can buy it when it goes on sale!

This dress was super short.. I didn't end up wearing it because I needed to bend down often to pick my up toddler at the event. However, it was so cute one. This one would be easy to dress up or down. Perfect for fall!

Runs snug across the shoulder area so felt a bit constricted when moving my arms up. Keep that in mind if renting for an event you will move your arms a lot during (dancing). I wore it paired with a blazer for pattern clashing and loved the look. Also loved how short it was. I can never find dresses short enough for a true "mini" look.

This dress is adorable!! You can dress it up or dress it down as I did. This is the first reformation dress I've ever worn and man do they run small. I have an athletic build - my back, shoulders, and arms are a little bigger so my quarter sleeves on this dress were pretty tight. I thought the waist would be tight as well, but it actually highlighted my figure and that's why I suffered through the tight sleeves - it was worth it! I suggest sizing up or renting multiple sizes of this so you have options

links_Review_Title: Conservative cut with the kick of leopard print!
links_Review_Text: This dress was an overall win for a night out on the ranch for a fundraising event. Paired well with cowboy boots! I typically wear a size 4, but being 3 months postpartum, I've been closer on most things to a 6. I wore this dress in an 8, and could not have gone any smaller! I'm busty to begin with, but breastfeeding has made me even more so. The chest and shoulders were restricted, but not a deal breaker. Fits slim through the waist. The back of the skirt has pleats and a little extra length, so my booty wasn't over exposed. I loved the print! The fabric does not give, so if in doubt, size up 1 or 2 sizes. The back as a peak hole between where zipper ends and top buttons.
I want to buy this dress! It's on the short side but it's flattering and trendy.

links_Review_Title: So hot!!! Reformation dresses are the best
links_Review_Text: Obsessed. Will 100% rent again! Wore this to an album release party and it was such a flattering shape. LOVE.

This dress is fabulous! I couldn't stop wearing this while i was in Barcelona! As all Reformation pieces do, this runs small! I would definitely recommend ordering up a size! I typically wear a 2-4, wore a size 6, and it fit perfectly!
Love the print and style of this dress. I am generally a 2 in all reformation dresses but this was on the smaller side for me. It was very flattering and lightweight.
I ended up just not zipping this dress up all the way- it worked well under a jacket but just looked like a bigger hole than otherwise so it worked well! I felt great in it for birthday drinks!

I almost didn't want to give it back! I love this dress. It's short, flirty, yet classy. I wire it with sneakers and ran through the streets of Osaka in it! Love, love loveeee to sleeves and detail in shoulders. One warming- it's a little bit short. I was challenging when I had to tie my shoes in this dress! But it's still my fave!

links_Review_Title: Just the right amount of cute + sexy!
links_Review_Text: Super flattering for curves, and nice coverage of arms. Small at the waist and then really forgiving in the hips, so ideal for hourglass shape. Love the pattern and the length is great for short girls.
I loved this dress! It fit me so well and really flattered my waist. I felt like you could dress it up or down. Would definitely rent it again.

Loved this dress - it was the perfect cut and easy to wear. Dress up or dress down with booties & leather jacket. I am typically between a 2 and 4 in dresses, and went with a 4 for this one, Reformation I find runs small. Felt like this dress was made for me, may have to purchase!

I ordered this for a winery weekend with friends and the sizing was way off. I ordered my normal sizes, 4 and 6. I tried the 6 first and it would hardly zip and barely covered me. The 4 honestly fit me better, which made no sense that the 6 was so small. I think even an 8 would have been snug. Definitely size up.

links_Review_Title: Cute dresses but 2 sizes too small
links_Review_Text: I love this dress but it's very small. I'm usually a 6 and ordered an 8 and it's still too tight. Will order a 10 bc the dress is super cute.

links_Review_Title: SO short - not for tall girls
links_Review_Text: I wanted to wear this so badly, but if I lifted my arms at all the hem was above my butt. I'm usually a 4/6 but would have done better in the 8. This dress is probably best for petite girls where the length isn't as problematic. That said, the pattern is quite cute and would look great on people of the right height! (For reference, I'm 5'9").
This was a outfit for a night out with my husband. Flirty short length and overall I'd rent again!

links_Review_Title: Very flattering dress, hugged every curve.
links_Review_Text: Reformation runs small, size up.

links_Review_Title: I couldn't wear it because it was too short. The size runs really small so keep in mind.
links_Review_Text: I couldn't wear it because it was too short.

links_Review_Title: Unfortunately I could not wear this dress.
links_Review_Text: I generally wear a size 4 in Reformation. The size 4 was way too small. I was able to get the size 6 on but the length was way too inappropriate for my height.
LOVED this dress! I'm usually a 2 but know that reformation runs a tad small so the 4 fit beautifully! SO many compliments on this dress!!

links_Review_Title: Very Cute, Runs Small and Short
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a family photo shoot and it worked great. It does run EXTREMELY small. I'm normally an XXS petite, and while I could zip up the size 2, it was very uncomfortable—no way I would want to wear it for any amount of time. The size 4 was also pretty snug, but it worked. I probably would have been more comfortable in a 6. As for the length, it was very short, and on the border of what I feel comfortable wearing, and I'm only 5'3".
Top part fit true to size, but the skirt was sooooo short.

links_Review_Title: Super cute dress for a fall baby shower, but TIGHT!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress, but I definitely should have done my research and gone up a size! I fit in the 4, but it was really snug and there was no way I could have fit a single leg into the size 2. It was also shorter than I anticipated. I ended up wearing tights and that made me for comfortable. Overall, great autumn dress and I would wear again, but would go up in size (for me a 6).

links_Review_Title: super cute to wear as a skirt or dress!
links_Review_Text: the sleeves were a tad tight but the dress is super flattering

links_Review_Title: Cute print but not for summer.
links_Review_Text: Way to short. If it were cold weather you could pair with tights, but for summer it's unwearable.

links_Review_Title: Such a cute and comfy dress! I wore it to a rehearsal dinner and received so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: After reading the reviews, I ordered a size bigger than I normally wear. The bust was a little too loose, but overall the dress was extremely comfortable and looked great! Next time I order, I will get a size smaller.
I'm usually a 2 in Reformation dresses but decided to get this in a 4, and It was still a bit too tight. It's a really beautiful dress but definitely make sure to size up!

I'm usually a size 0 or 2 and sized up because of the reviews. The 2 was so small that I could barely fit my arms through and my butt was sticking out of the bottom. I'm 5'1". I would have had to remove three ribs to zip it up. I was really looking forward to wearing it. I'll try again and size up to a 6 or 8. That's 4 or 5 sizes bigger than I would normally wear.

links_Review_Title: Fun little dress but sooooo tight
links_Review_Text: This dress was so cute and I was really looking forward to wearing it. I went up a size because the reviews said it was tight, should've gone up two sizes. Holy geez. And short
Im usually a 4/6 and needed the 8 in this. Cute pattern, sleeves, etc. however, very short, waist seam at an odd place and I ended up not wearing it.

This dress is beyond beautiful-- so much prettier than the photo! It is really low cut and short like the other reviewers say, but I am 5'2" so it worked for me. Made me feel so beautiful! Straps are a tiny bit finnicky but worth it.
I rented this for a rehearsal/welcome reception for a wedding in Mexico. I love the unique details like the bows on the straps. The dress fit well and was super comfortable. Definitely recommend.
I'm not very blessed in the cheats department and the top was very big on me and I didn't end up taking it.

This dress is so fun and flattering, but it is REVEALING. I'm 5' 3" and it showed way too much leg and I couldn't bend over. You can adjust the straps but even still it was showing a ton of cleavage and side boob. I think it would work better on a smaller girl.

Such a beautiful dress for a fall outdoor wedding! I am between sizes and ended up wearing the smaller size I ordered. It's nice and flowy so you don't need shapewear. It is definitely big at the top - I tied the straps as tight as possible and still had to safety pin the top closed for more coverage, but it was easy to do. I wore a sticky bra for additional support but it isn't needed. Word of caution, it is SHORT - I am 5'2" and it felt a tad too short on me.
Great w sandals for the day or heels for the evening... fits great, but a little big in the chest although not terrible.

I loved wearing this dress. I rented it for a rehearsal dinner and I got so many compliments! It's very flowy (perfect for eating+drinking) but on the shorter side. I am 5'5 and 130 and the medium fit perfectly. I had to tie the straps a little tighter. Would recommend for a summer wedding/party!

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner and fell in love!
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for a late August rehearsal dinner in Southold NY. It was so comfortable and I felt like a million bucks. I didn't have any issues with the straps and loved dancing the night away in it. Received so many compliments. I'm short and curvy but didn't spend one second adjusting/readjusting. If you're on the fence about this dress, take the leap and get it!

This was a great rental- the fit was very TTS , it was comfortable and I received many compliments. Note that it is a little low- I wore a sticky bra with it and still had to tape it a bit at the bottom to cover the clasp. Otherwise this dress was great!

links_Review_Title: I got a lot of compliments! Fun to dance in. A little short but super fun.
links_Review_Text: Fun to dance in! A little short but I am short so it worked!
Most favorite dress I've rented so far!
Dress ran true to size, and was super fun and comfortable to wear! Loved the detail as well as the adjustable straps. Would rent this again for sure in the future.

links_Review_Title: Fun floral dress - perfect for summer occasions!
links_Review_Text: Received many compliments on this floral, pleated dress at the wedding I attended. Only downside is the straps wrinkle easily and the bows are tough to tie. I found wearing it as a halter actually looked better! (Just tuck in the back straps). Overall very happy with the dress and how it fit!

This dress was amazing but ohhhh so short. I'm 5'4 and it barely covered my butt so I made sure I didn't bend over at all lol. I had great cleavage in this dress and it covered my problem hips and stomach well. I got a TON of compliments!

I rented this for a bridal shower and got compliments all day. This size was probably a little too big, but I was able to keep it up with the tie straps that are adjustable (and need to be steamed/ironed). Super comfortable and covered my chest with low zip closure in the back. Not too short for those of you with big butts. Would definitely rent again.

Beautiful dress but honey it's sooo short. There is a small slip under it and because I'm blessed with a booty my entire butt was out. I still wore it because I wanted to look beautiful for my anniversary. The bust area was a good fit for me as I have larger breasts and because you can't wear this with a bra it gave me good coverage to go bra-less. If this dress wasn't so short it be a hit.

So pretty in person! Just not the right dress for a wedding so I didn't end up wearing it but would love to in the future again! Short, but loved the metallic thread throughout the dress and low cut back. The waist was a little too tight for me too

I really wanted to like this dress but I think it just wasn't my style. The size I ordered was too large on me but not noticeable. The colors are nice and the details are cute. It's a good girly dress.
Loved this dress! Flattering and super fun. I don't have a big bust, so I definitely suggest using some tape as the top is quite flowy.
Perfect for a really nice date night. I feel confident and beautiful and perfect. Really made me feel ready to take on the night! Loved this dress!

I'm not sure who it is for. I'm 5'2" and it was VERY short on me. The waist hits far too low to accentuate my thinnest point, making me look extremely wide. Its already a very voluminous dress with the fabric and pleating, so this was not at all flattering. I'm a 32 DDD at Victoria's Secret and my bust did not fit quite right in the dress. The space for the boobies was just way too large to accommodate an actual human being shape. I even tried criss-crossing the straps in the back to see if that would help. It did not. I opted to wear a friends dress, a size 12, which was better than wearing this dress. I'm not sure what kind of body type this dress if for: if you are tall, it will be too short; if you aren't busty, it will be baggy; if you are looking for a dress to give you an hourglass shape, this will hit you in all the wrong places. I'd HIGHLY advise picking a different dress unless you'd like to look like an ugly cake topper.

links_Review_Title: Everyone LOVED this dress. Was something that I’d never spend the $ on, but they RTR got to wear!!
links_Review_Text: It’s a little big in the chest (and I’m a DD!) but you can fix that by tightening the bows. I accidentally ordered 2XL - but was able to tie it tight enough to make it worked.

Definitely runs super small! I'm no longer the size I even got- lost weight & every other designer on here now needs a size smaller - 2 sizes smaller than this but even then it fits me exactly, so if you're an actual US 16-18, PLEASE get a 4x if it comes in that, I can't remember. If you are smaller busted you won't need to pin the front but at a DD cup I had to pin it. Still super loved it to see Avengers Endgame with my partner in it!

Love love loved this dress. The reviews were very true. Beautiful dress and well made. However, the chest is pretty larger. You can easily tighten the strap and apply some fashion tape to combat that but, smaller chested girls should be mindful!
I worn this for a more formal work event. I love the bow straps and the pattern. It runs short.
Very pretty dress, but the breast area is way to big, I am 34DD and still was huge! I have to put a pin on it and the straps even I adjust it still loose Pretty though

I'm not girly by far. All of my dresses are usually bodycon or I wear leggings and a hoodie or blue jeans and a white tee. I stay away from frills. VERY short but just don't bend over, bend at your knees. Major compliments. My back is broad so i needed help from hubster to zip up. I wear a G/H size bra so i had to pin the front before i put over my head. If I pinned after it wouldn't have been tight enough. Felt so odd going braless but it worked.
It's overall not very flattering. I was disappointed. Do not rent if you are flat chested. The fabric will gape & is hard to make straps tie in a cute way!
It was nice to be able to adjust the straps and I loved the flirty length (I'm short so it worked for me) Everyone who saw it loved it

links_Review_Title: Didn't wear it outside of my bedroom!
links_Review_Text: Cute skirt, but the top was cute way too low to wear in public for a large-busted woman like myself!

I rented this dress for a bridal shower and was so excited when it came in. I loved the colors and beautiful bow ties. I was not able to wear it as it was super short on me, I am only 5'8 but it was too loose on top to go up a size. Beautiful dress for someone on the shorter side.

Ii wore this to a wedding in Mexico and had so much fun! This dress is beautifully made. It was super easy to pack and was light for a humid evening in Mexico where we were outside. It's super fun to dance in and has that adorable girly touch. Would definitely rent it again

links_Review_Title: LOVED this dress, just couldn't justify buying it in winter!
links_Review_Text: This dress is so cute! I didn't end up wearing it but I loved the way it fit and looked on.

links_Review_Title: Pretty dress. Beautiful colors. Not for larger women tho. Can't wear bra.
links_Review_Text: This would be adorable on someone shorter, thinner and smaller busted. I could technically fit into the dress, but it was not flattering. Plenty of room in the bust area, but I could not wear a bra. I'm going to exchange it for something more flattering.
I wanted to like this dress, but it was a no go. I didn't really like the shoulder bows and planned on coping another RTR person and wear it like a halter, but that made it gap in the chest.

links_Review_Title: The dress is very cute, but the straps are a little strange.
links_Review_Text: fit perfectly on bottom, but not on top.

links_Review_Title: Wish I could have made it work
links_Review_Text: Just too big on top. I am a 38C and just couldnt fill the top no matter how much I pulled the straps
This fit well and I got tons of compliments. The colors were vibrant and its well made.
The top fits super strangely no matter what your bust

Way too big for me on the top but fit well on the bottom. Loved the ties on the shoulders because it can be adjusted. The colors & pattern are adorable but I just couldn't wear it because made me look much bigger.
Super comfortable and flattering with no bra! Was in love... but was long!

links_Review_Title: Perfect in every way! I felt like a princess in the dress.
links_Review_Text: I enjoyed this dress in so many ways: The fit in the top half of body was perfect. I love that the bottom half was flowing and non-restrictive. The colors go with EVERYTHING! I decided to wear cowboy boots since the wedding was outside on a cold afternoon, and it worked out well!! One con about the dress, for me, was the length. At 5'2" I had to keep picking up the dress to avoid stepping on it. Overall, I enjoyed this dress tremendously and recommend it to anyone!!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, but not for large chests!
links_Review_Text: The dress was gorgeous but I found myself making sure my boobs weren't popping out all night. I would definitely recommend for smaller chests woman. For reference I'm a DD.
I loved this dress so much! I received tons of compliments and felt comfortable all night. The top was fitted and I didn't need to wear a bra. It was perfect for a beach wedding.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress on a sunny day for my engagement photos :)
links_Review_Text: Absolutely love this dress and loved how it photographed. Perfect for a sunny warm day. Perfect fit and didn't even need a bra, I'm a solid 8 for most brands and usually need a bra. The regular length worked perfect with my platform heels.

It's literally impossible not to have a good time in this dress. It's sexy and flowery and flowy and super fun to dance in. I wore it on vacation in Ghana and almost wore it two days in a row (but that would have been weird). Will definitely rent again!!!

links_Review_Title: A little big in the mid-section but good length.

links_Review_Text: I ended up wearing the 8R - which was honestly a bit too big for me. The 2R exposed farrr too much underboob for me to be comfortable. I think a 4R would have been better for me. I'm 5'5" and was still tripping over this even in my heels. Other than that, it was fine!
Loved this dress but decided it wasn't right for the occasion I was attending. 8R was a perfect fit but was a little nervous about the cutouts.

LOVED this dress! Was perfect for a beachside wedding. It's light and airy and the colors are gorgeous. I could've worn the 6 but it was a little tight around the torso so I sized up for comfort. Photographs well too :)
