Wore this to an outdoor wedding looked amazing against the green grass in photos and got tons of compliments!
The dress has a lot of cleavage out of your okay with that. Otherwise, absolutely lovely. I adore the straps.
Stunning! But beware: if you have any boobs whatsoever you MUST invest in fashion tape or you will be NSFW all night. Worth it!

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments on the dress all night!
links_Review_Text: Dress is long....but absolutely gorgeous.
Dress fit great. I’m at 32DD and couldn’t wear a bra. A little more bust than I’m used to wearing. Other than that, it was great.

I absolutely loved this dress. It was perfect for a summer wedding in a rural setting. It felt amazing and fit perfectly. Maybe a little long, but no problem with heels. It felt great on and was very comfortable to wear all night. I could not recommend more and wish I didn't have to send it back!
Fit perfectly

I loved every second of wearing this dress. I could have worn the 8 but the cups and straps felt a little loose for me to feel really comfortable all night. So I decided to wiggle my way into the 6 and felt super comfortable. I'm 5'11 and usually rent long when choosing dresses. This was a regular and hit at a really nice spot, maybe just an inch or so from the floor. Got a ton of compliments all night and would definitely look for an excuse to wear this again!

links_Review_Title: Obsessed and got so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: I ordered the 4 and the 6. I fluctuate between both sizes. The 4 fit perfectly until the zipper hit my breast line. I'm a 34C with a large rib cage so I was bummed I couldn't get it to zip all the way. The 6 fit fine, zipped right up but was a little loose. It's also pretty long (kept tripping when my heals came off) and I am 5'6". Overall a beautiful dress! And photographed so well!

I actually ended up wearing a different dress for the event I was attending, but I LOVED this option. The reason I didn't wear it was because the event was on the conservative side and this dress, for bustier women, is a bit busty. In the best way possible. I adored how this floral dress felt — fabric was so luxurious and the print was feminine and bold at the same time. The straps were sturdy and loved the different design. Will rent again!

links_Review_Title: Absolutely loved this dress, wish I could have kept it!
links_Review_Text: This dress is perfect for a summer wedding! Very light weight, comfortable and flattering. Recieved so many compliments!
Received compliments all night- absolutely stunning and easy to wear.

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress got so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: The top was a tad big but wasn't too bad
Was planning to wear to a gala, but it's not formal enough for me. Great summer wedding guest dress!

Absolutely loved this dress! The body fit wonderfully but the straps were a little long and not adjustable. The dress length was also a bit long even in 5 inch heels and I had to hold up when walking around. However, I felt beautiful and comfortable.

Obsessed with this dress and so was my fiancé! The colors were even more vibrant then in the picture. The dress is pretty low cut but classy. I''m a 34 C and could fill out the top without adding cups or any tape for security. The main issue was: the straps became loose throughout the night - I had to pull up the dress a couple times and move the straps around to make sure things stayed in place. But that was a small issue compared to the amazingness of the color, cut, flow, and magical feeling of this dress! One of my all time favorite rentals!

links_Review_Title: The dress was the highlight of my night
links_Review_Text: Loved the dress. The colors were great for a June wedding and it was so comfortable. I wore a size 6.
Beautiful dress for a wedding. Compliments galore.

links_Review_Title: This dress was beautiful! It fit perfectly, I felt comfortable in it and could move freely.
links_Review_Text: So comfortable, not constricting.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments thought the night! I'm 5'10 and the length was perfect with comfortable flats.
links_Review_Text: Women with a larger chest should rent up a size.

The dress is more beautiful in person. At first, I thought it may fit weird since I'm more of a pear shape and was worried about the ruffles, but it turned out beautifully. I received so many compliments and it's beyond unique. For reference, I wore the 2 (I usually wear a 4, but both fit fine!). It was a little long since I'm only 5'4. Waist: 27, hips: 37, bust: 32

This dress is everything! Wore it to a formal event and it was PERFECT! I love AMUR and this dress does not disappoint. It's gorgeous!!! Now, I will say that it's definitely made for a tall person- I'm 5'9" and had to wear 3 inch heels in order for the dress to not drag. I would also say that it would work best for an A-C cup as the top part of the dress and straps are not adjustable. Fits true to size.

links_Review_Title: This dress was simply beautiful. I wore it to my prom, and I received so many compliments on it.
links_Review_Text: The chest was form fitting, and from the waist down it was flowy. I absolutely loved the cutouts and the v-cut of the chest area.
The straps were a little big, but fit perfectly everywhere else!
I got more complements on this dress than i could have imagined. It was so fun and fit great! I'm 5'5 and 140. The 4 fit a little snug but overall great. I would 10/10 rent again
Fits very well. I don't have a large chest and it fit great. Lots of compliments received. We were in New Orleans and the pattern was perfect for the vibe of the night. Great to dance in!
Great fabric and fun cutouts make this one stand out.
Perfect for a summer wedding and so flattering!

Was excited to wear this dress but sad to find that it is very very long, I am 5"4 and with 5 inch heels it was still long for me, I didn't want to worry about tripping on it. It also runs small so I recommend sizing up.
Loved this for a date night
Beautiful top. Able to dress up or dress down depending on the occasion. It did run a little bigger in the busy area, but other than that it was gorgeous!

I would have preferred a size larger but had to size down because of availability. The hook dug into my skin but this may have been because it was right. Might run slightly large since I was able to get away with the size down
I wore this shirt to a college football game and it was perfect. Such a good fit, true to size. I got so many complements, and it was super comfortable. I wore it for most of the day.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous statement top that goes with everything.
links_Review_Text: The perfect fit, forgiving peplum shape, and sexy one-shoulder neckline make this crisp white too anything but basic. Probably best for smaller cup sizes.
Like this top. It was extremely wrinkled when it arrived and was a bit difficult to iron. I would suggest bringing it to the dry cleaner to press or using a steamer.

links_Review_Title: So fun and easy to dress up
links_Review_Text: LOVE THIS TOP the bottom peplum is a bit sheer for anyone that doesn't like that type. I couldn't fit a bra with it cause it definitely runs small but so flattering
Love this top! Perfect for a date, party or drinks.
It's a cute top. I do recommend sizing up. The 10 fit perfectly and I usually wear an 8 or a 6 so I'm glad I decided to go up.

links_Review_Title: Looks like a beautiful shirt, but runs soooo small for any woman with a medium-to-large bust
links_Review_Text: Looks like a beautiful shirt, but runs soooo small for any woman with a medium-to-large bust. Sized up and couldn't even come close to zipping around the chest.

Rented a size 6 (normally a 4-6) and it looked like a babydoll top. Had to take my bra off to even get the zipper sides to touch. Could've zipped if I wanted to be wearing a corset all day, haha. Also didn't even make it long enough to reach my hip bone. Would be great on someone petite- not 5'8" with 34C.

links_Review_Title: Wanted to love this, but runs super small if you have any sort of chest

links_Review_Text: This looked pretty work and the white looked yellow-ish. It is super small. I'm almost always a size 4 and I ordered a size 6 and it was still VERY tight around my chest. I didn't wear it.

links_Review_Title: great top for a summer night date
links_Review_Text: great top for a warm summer night
Really cute idea, but sort of tight and unsure if it was washed with something but the one I recurved was not white but an off white-blue

links_Review_Title: I didn't actually wear the top.
links_Review_Text: The top looked very worn when I got it.

links_Review_Title: Runs small. Not for large chested individuals.
links_Review_Text: Runs super small and not a great fit for large chested individuals

links_Review_Title: Rented for an afternoon party with friends
links_Review_Text: Unfortunately, I have a long torso so this came up quite short on me. I couldn't wear a bra with it but couldn't zip it up on the sides anyway. I rented a size 10 but I would've gone larger if that was possible. I couldn't zip it up on the side and was unable to wear it. I'm a 38B and it was too tight.
I usually wear a size 2 but couldn't even get this on so I never wore it. Really pretty top though and good quality material.
This shirt is neat, but awkward. Tight in the naval and bigger in the bust. Didn't work for me.
Super cute. Would have loved it if it were just a few inches longer

links_Review_Title: Don't rent if you have a chest
links_Review_Text: Not the most flattering top if you have a chest
Cute top super fun for a vacation! I thought it ran a little small

links_Review_Title: This shirt did not fit me whatsover.
links_Review_Text: Very short top. It didn't close and it also didn't cover my entire torso. It runs extremely small, and isn't made for people with a chest. Very cute, if it fit normally.
Runs very small. I am a size 4 and I could not zip the shirt.

This top was really cute and the peplum and one-shoulder silhouette added more detail than your average white blouse. Note: it easily wrinkles and so I had to iron it upon arrival and even after ironing, it was still a little wrinkled. I think part of it is an issue with the pleats but if that is a pet peeve of yours, beware! It is true to size but VERY fitted, there is no stretch.
This was a OK rental...when i received the item i had to iron it which was difficult. It fit well in the chest area (36D) but the waste was too big.

links_Review_Title: It would be cute except the fit is weird. It was a little crooked when worn.
links_Review_Text: It looked messy when worn.
This shirt is so small. i ordered way up in it and still couldn't wear it. runs really small in the bust area and has no give
Order 2 sizes up...ex 10 for a 6.
Runs really small. Size up a few sizes if you're bigger chested
Super small and it made me look like a whale. Sending it back
The fabric is great! The perfect summer top!
I have a long torso and this just seemed a little ill fitting length wise. Wound up not looking very flattering
The off-the-shoulder side sat too low on my bust. May be because it was too big on me. I also have a long torso so the waist sat higher than usual.

This top was really cute but it was loose in the chest area, made me nervous it would slip to low but it didnt! Its incredibly tight in the rib cage and was okay while standing but unbearable while sitting

links_Review_Title: Fun summer top, but adds fullness in the wrong places
links_Review_Text: I wanted to love this top, but the fit was just off. I ordered my normal size 4. It fit, but it was definitely on the snug side as many reviewers have noted. More problematic was the fact that the seam for the peplum hit a bit high on the waist. I'm busty with a small waist and normally styles like this look great on me, but I found having the peplum start so high on my waist added undesirable fullness to my abdomen rather than making it looks smaller. I might try a 6 at some point to see if the seam hits in a lower, more flattering place in a larger size.

links_Review_Title: Runs small but cute once its on
links_Review_Text: The cut of this top is awkard and it runs about 1.5/2 sizes small but very cute once its on. I wore with destressed denim and wedges/chunky earrings in South of France on vacation and it was the perfect mix of casual and elegant
So the 14 was really uncomfortably tight and the bow didn't stay pressed like the photo. The shirt was wearable. But not one of the better Rtr pieces I've gotten
Cute and fun for the summer. Was pretty wrinkled on arrival so it looked a bit sloppy at first but I steamed it and it looked great. I usually wear size 0 but would recommend sizing up for this one
I wanted a little wow for my bday dinner and normally struggle with pants because I'm so short (4'10") but this jumpsuit was perfect. Loved the adjustable straps, the color, and the cut.
Had to adjust the straps and use double sided tape but overall I would rent again!
True to size and amazing
I wore this for a 70s themed party, love it, have to be a bit careful when bending or sitting to avoid a nipslip but otherwise a gem!
I loved this jumpsuit and received a lot of compliments. It's not made for women with larger busy...I'm a D cup. However if it were mine I could easily have it altered to work.

This was a stylist pick because my original rental was unavailable. I had rented for family Christmas and it was a bit too sexy for a family day, but I had to take pics with it. I want to rent it again for a date and actually get to wear it! Super sexy jumpsuit... very low cut... I'm am A cup and it was fine, but if you're bustier it might be too much or you would definitely need some tape. They sent me a 4 and it fit great, but I could probably also have worn the 2. The red is dynamite!
I rented the jumpsuit for a 70s themed party and it was perfect. I'm 6' so it was a bit cropped on me but fit well everywhere else. Got many compliments!
so cute and comfy and perfect for a party

links_Review_Title: Fun outfit with a great fit!
links_Review_Text: I loved the way this piece hugged every curve just right without being too grabby Around the mid section. The chest area can be a little gaping, but this is easily fixed by optionally closing a subtle clasp to alleviate the opening into something mildly more conservative

links_Review_Title: So hard to wear, I can't imagine who would look Good in this really...
links_Review_Text: This was extremely open on the top but was not tight enough to hold in natural breasts for sure. Maybe a small chested girl would look best in it? But in that case you would have to also be more pear-shaped in my opinion because the bottom is very loose. Not flattering...hard to imagine it fitting anyone very well.
Loved this jumpsuit. It was the perfect length and looked amazing. I got so many compliments. Would definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Perfect outfit for my husband's work holiday party!
links_Review_Text: This jumpsuit is fairly large on top, especially since I'm a true pear shape, but the straps are adjustable so I was able to get it to the right fit over my chest. It fit perfectly on my wider hips. For those with larger chests, it has a clasp that you can button on the front to keep from spilling out, though I do recommend tape as well. I got tons of compliments all night and would definitely rent it again.

I cannot express how lovely this dress made me feel. Its silk and feels absolutely amazing. I just love the way it draped and flowed. The color is divine. I got so many compliments on it. It was truly a stand-out dress. I don't think I every would have picked it off the rack, but the stylist at the Georgetown store grabbed it for me. She was so spot on!

links_Review_Title: I wore the dress to a formal masquerade event.
links_Review_Text: Runs large, definitely order down. I normally wear a 4 and needed a 2. Deep V in front is significant, beautiful color, very comfortable and easy to dance in. BTW, this was a backup dress. The first choice didn’t work and RTR overnighted this to me. They were amazing!!

links_Review_Title: Love the color but runs very large
links_Review_Text: I wanted this dress to work out so badly but it certainly did not! It was so huge in every area for my body.

links_Review_Title: didn't want to give it back
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a black tie optional wedding and LOVED IT. The color and pattern are stunning. I got many compliments all night long! My only complaint was that it was a little tight in the top, sizing up made it too loose and revealing so I went with the smaller size and with some bra switching it worked perfectly!

links_Review_Title: Pretty but didn't work for my body type
links_Review_Text: I'm a short waisted, slim shouldered pear. This is the type of dress that would be great if I owned it and got it altered. It was very flattering on my hips and butt but the top was way too large for my bust and shoulders. If you have a longer torso / broader shoulders / bigger boobs / hourglass figure, I think it would work.
This is a pile of formless frumpy green silk. Not youthful or attractive...and it runs a little big.
Even sizing up a size this dress was too small.

I wore this for a holiday party. I received so many compliments!! The dress was perfect. Very light and flowy! I felt wonderful in the dress! It accentuated my body in all the right places!! The fabric was gorgeous and you could tell the garment was well made! Buttons were super cute!

LOVED this dress! I rented for my company holiday party and when I was running around the office before we left I got so many compliments! It was a little staticy so definitely have some dryer sheets on hand.

links_Review_Title: Great dress! If a subtle dress is your style you might not like it.
links_Review_Text: I typically wear either a size 2 or 4. I ordered a 4p and 2r. The 4p was too loose but the length was good. The 2r was just a bit too long and loose around the top. I wish I had ordered a 2p (this is a size I never wear!).
This dress fit and looked great! Tons of compliments, thumbs up!

links_Review_Title: So gorg and easy to wear. It has pockets!
links_Review_Text: Comfy, beautiful, sparkly and fun. Rent it. It's awesome. I went petite sizing because that's all that was available and it was perfect on my 5'4 frame. Has a bit of stretch. Lower neckline on me than in the pic.
The top is going to show a lot of cleavage. Be prepared with a black body-shaper or a dicky if that's not your style.
Fit perfect even though I am short. I felt great and was showing alot of cleavage!
Definitely low cut, but still manageable. The colors were gorgeous. And it has pockets!
Comfortable and flattering. Practical, professional, but a bit more fun than the typical work dress.

I wore this to a play. It was a fun to wear. I especially love the pockets. The neckline plunged too much for me, so I put a black cami under it. I think a 10r would have been a better fit, but it wasn't available when I wanted it. It was just dressy enough to feel dressed up, but not too over the top for a date night. I got several compliments from random strangers :)
The dress runs true to size. I ordered a size up because that's all there way and it worked too. The dress is very flattering and effortless! Would totally rent again!
Loved this dress but way too long and the top too big. Wasn't form fitting and couldn't wear bra. So bummed.

Felt great wearing this dress and received tons of compliments. It is comfortable, has pockets and you can wear a regular bra! I had hoped to get the 4P but it wasn't available so I got the 4R. With heels it looked fine but I had to be careful not to step on the back hem

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a formal event representing my company
links_Review_Text: This dress is flattering and fun, while still offering a modest silhouette. Dress has pockets. 10 fit well, but 12 was more comfortable around the waist when sitting down.
Fit was great, hugs in the right places and has a flattering fall. It's a really comfortable dress. Pockets were a huge plus. Recieved a lot of compliments.

This dress was beautiful. I wore it to a formal wedding and received a lot of compliments. It was comfortable to wear all night. The only con to this dress was how large the top black portion was. The rest of the dress fit perfectly but the top gaped open whenever I sat down. I wear a 38D and the top was still very very large. I had to wear a black satin bra underneath so that way when it showed it didn't look too obvious. Otherwise it was a great dress- easy and fun to wear!

I loved everything about this dress. It was comfortable and made me feel good wearing it. I loved the way it moved when I walked, the pockets, the beautiful jewel-toned sequins...all around winner. You can wear a regular bra, so long as it plunges a bit. If you have a large chest and are not comfortable showing cleavage...this would not be for you.

links_Review_Title: This dress fit perfectly and was flattering and comfortable!
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'7", 213lbs, and wear a 42F. I rented the size 18 and it fit comfortably and was really flattering- I got compliments all night!!

links_Review_Title: Just the right amount of sparkle!
links_Review_Text: I wore this for a Black Tie New Years wedding and it was perfect! It was really comfortable, flattering and beautiful. I got so many compliments. I loved the little sleeve on it and the waist line was just right at the smallest part of my figure. The neck line is quite low so be prepared to show a little skin!

I forgot it had pockets!! I could've sized to the 14L but then the shoulders would've been too tight. HOLY CLEAVAGE!! Be prepared for that. I had forgotten about the reviews that said that. Absolutely loved this dress and will likely rent it again! I didn't even wear spanx!
Very unique to have the plaid sequins. I stood out from all the red and black dresses! Fit perfectly.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress- got tons of compliments!
links_Review_Text: Much lower cut than I expected. I'm not very busty, so I had to wear a tank top under the dress. I found that although the skirt fit me perfectly, the top part was very large on me. I think if I had tried to size down, the top would fit better, but the skirt would have been too tight. I got tons of compliments overall, just wouldn't recommend for someone who is small chested like me, unless you have a cute tank to go underneath!

I wore this dress to a holiday party for work, and it was a stunner. Got compliments on the skirt all night. The colors are perfect for a festive event without being "too holiday", and so comfortable. My chest is small (barely b cup) which made the top a tiny bit loose, but a strip of garment tape on either side of the plunge fixed it perfectly. The a-line starts just above the waist which made it super flattering. I wish I owned this dress, I would wear it every chance I could get!
Fits true to size or a little smaller. Sequins are well afixed and don’t fall off. Has pockets and flows beautifully!
LOVED this dress! So comfortable, yet so gorgeous! Loved the sparkly bottom! The cut of the top was very flattering. Wish they had it in other colors, as I would definitely rent again!
So comfortable. Hemline is gorgeous and sparkles on the skirt made it a conversation piece! True to size.

If you love sequins and showing off the girls, then this dress is for you. It's a bit aggressive in the cleavage arena but even still, I loved it. Keep it in mind if you're thinking of renting it. But loved it on the whole.
Loved this dress and received so many compliments on it. The dress runs on the smaller side, so i recommend go up a size.

This dress is awesome! It's comfortable and stands out. No crazy bra or shape wear required. True to size. The front dips down pretty low and is snug fit up top so may be tough for ladies with a larger bust.

links_Review_Title: Tons of compliments! This dress was totally me!
links_Review_Text: I saw the pics of this dress, and I just knew if was for me! Sequins, color, pockets, and sleeves! In a room full or ordinary dresses, this was a standout and I'll admit I loved the attention. #fashionshow #fundraiser #gala

links_Review_Title: Comfy, fun dress! Lots of compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size. Front is low so wear a plunge bra.
A little bit plunging but held everything in great!

This dress was so much fun to wear. It was comfortable, flowy, and gorgeous. The skirt is irresistible- I've never gotten so many compliments at a wedding. And it has pockets! Your arms will get a little scratched up from the sequins but it was worth it.

If I could wear this dress forever, I would. IT HAS POCKETS! It fit like a dream and I got compliments all night, strangers stopped me in the street, shouted at me from cars. It was not heavy & no itchy armpits like other all sequin gowns thanks to the fabric top. It was impossible to raise my arms up above my shoulders, but who cares. The high/low of the skirt made it so flowy & dreamy. I felt like a million bucks & seriously want to wear it for the rest of my life! Such a beautiful gown!
Great dress that is comfortable. Length is not too long so don't need super high heels. It is very popular dress and few others were wearing it at the event.

This dress is amazing. Unfortunately the 2P was unavailable so I took a chance and ordered the 4P and 0R. After trying both on it was clear the 2 would have been perfect for me but the 0 definitely worked. The 4P was good in length (I'm 4'11) but too large in the top. I wore 4" heels and the 0's train JUST grazed the floor. It was perfect. I'm 4 months pregnant and the bump was accentuated just right. I was stopped in the street and at my event multiple times to be complimented. The dress is just so stunning in person. Plus - Pockets!!!

links_Review_Title: Loved it but couldn't wear it because my event was canceled!
links_Review_Text: Will definitely rent again. Very flattering dress!

links_Review_Title: Fun to jazz it up a little
links_Review_Text: I've never worn sequins and I loved it. The skirt is so fun, the hi/low hem is super. The 8L was a little long for me (5'5") and I wore higher heels than usual to make up for it. The dress also has pockets! Need i say any more.
Love the style but not very forgiving up top. Didn't wear because of how tight it was but overall a beautiful gown!
I wore this dress 7 weeks post partum and it fit beautifully- accommodated a full bust and bit of a tummy very well. Lots of compliments! I am normally a 4/6 and wore the 8R.
Wore this to a Mardi Gras formal ball and it was perfect! So flattering and comfortable with the necessary sparkle! 5'4, 190 for reference, fit TTS, 16
Runs a little small. Lower cut than on model.
Very comfy and true to size. Wore it to my birthday dinner

Got this romper on a whim and it was AMAZING!! It fit like it was made to fit my my body exactly and it was perfect for NYE in Aspen. The material was heavy so it was good for winter, and the cutout in the front is really flattering. Really high quality overall and I want to wear it again sometime soon!

links_Review_Title: Cute but have to be careful
links_Review_Text: I loved the look of this and felt it was very flattering but the way everything was cut meant I couldn't wear a bra. The armholes also cut pretty far in so there was a lot of side boob showing.

links_Review_Title: I've never had so many compliments in my life.
links_Review_Text: This jumpsuit is just the cutest. At my age the only place I would ever want a cut out is right at the top of my abdomen. And the fact that this has pockets and is very fitted down to the ankles just made the whole thing so flattering. Extremely comfortable, too.
Loved the fit and loved just a little peek a boo. Would not recommend for people with bigger chest. I am an A cup and there wasn't much stretch to it.
Wore this for NYE and it fit perfect! I couldn't wear a bra with it but it was tight enough. I got compliments all night. I have a short torso and it still fit very well.

links_Review_Title: Fun plus up to the normal jumpsuit (and works for hourglass)
links_Review_Text: Fits great. Super fun. Only thing to watch out for is the ladies on the side. They weren't going to fall out, but you got some side views if I raised my arms too high. I am an hourglass and it actually fit great.
Loved this jumpsuit, fit like a glove, and got so many compliments!

links_Review_Title: It was like it was made just for me.
links_Review_Text: I have never --ever-- found a jumpsuit that actually fits every curve of my body and is long enough for my legs. This jumpsuit was like a well-tailored second skin. Classy, sleek and sexy all at the same time. It had a lot of stretch and the fabric was thick enough to keep me warm on a cool night. My cons: the shoulder fabric kept flipping up throughout the night but it wasn't a big deal. It's also a little of a bit challenged zipping and unzipping it solo.

Good stretch - very comfortable fit. I am wider in the hips and thighs, so it was a little snug there, but the stretch of the material is giving and made this a very comfortable piece for a fun night out. Could easily be dressed up. Cut out in front is not over the top.

The girls night out I was going to wear this to got cancelled, but I ADORE it. Will be renting again at the first opportunity. I'm 5'3" and it's was still great with heels. I would probably take an inch off at the seamstress if I owned it, but it was still everything that is right for a one piece.
Very cute, however, I was nervous about falling out the sides. I do not wear it. Size otherwise fit well.

I LOVE the look of jumpsuits, but can never find one that doesn't have a bunch of extra material that bunches up around the stomach or rides up way too high in the crotch. This fit perfectly and true to size. The cut out is cute and not too revealing and I think it's what helps it fit so flat in the front. I also love the off shoulder look and skinny leg fit. As with all jumpsuits, its a bit hard to zip yourself...but I could get it up enough to walk out of the bathroom before I made my husband zip it all the way :)

Better for a small chested person. Everything fit perfect except the top. The photos show it worn off the shoulders, but there is no way this could be worn that way unless you size way up. I'd be worried the large would be too big but I may try it because this jumper is adorable.

This jumpsuit was very comfortable and was perfect for a dressy occasion. I received so many compliments. The cutout shows just enough skin to make this outfit pop! I'm 5'3" and was able to cuff the pants to be the perfect length for ankle strap heels. I could have worn the small but it was tight in the rib cage. I wore the medium and was much more comfortable.
This jumpsuit fit perfectly and was super flattering, especially for someone small chested.
Nice

i only had to cuff this once in order to wear ankle strap shoes. it's so difficult to find things that work for my short legs, but this was great! there is a little stretch, but it was very fitted. no bra needed. loved the pockets and button details. i did find myself adjusting the top a bit, but it was otherwise comfortable the whole night. highly highly recommend, esp if you're my height!

links_Review_Title: Cute but Didn't end up wearing
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size and cute, but preferred my back up jumpsuit. Difficult to get out of on own. Beautiful material. Cute, form fitting style .

links_Review_Title: Wore this jumpsuit for a Bat Mitzvah. It was perfect
links_Review_Text: This jumpsuit is very slimming and flattering. I have long legs and a shorter torso and it fit perfect

links_Review_Title: I wore it for my bridal shower and dress was beautiful!!
links_Review_Text: Honestly on the night I received the package, I was devastated cause it was super sheer, just like others have said, and there was nothing to hold the breast area and it was just wide open! I managed to wear spanx skirt underneath and used a pin to hold the breast area, where I also covered with my hair. And voila! In the end it turned out to be beautiful dress.

1. The size runs slightly larger than your normal size but i think that is the perfect look/fit the brand pursues you to have 2. The breast should be covered by a safety pin, period x 2 3. Perfect white dress for a vacay.

links_Review_Title: Very pretty details and delicacy to this dress. Flowed beautifully. Just too sheer and low cut.
links_Review_Text: Reason I’m giving 4 stars is because it’s gorgeous but very sheer (I had to find a slip to fit underneath that was also very low cut ) and then I ended up pinning the front because of how low it was. Not practical for wearing out and about it you’re not stick thin. But it did work for our family photos. Loved the sleeve detail and the flowy movement of the dress. The off white color is very striking.

links_Review_Title: Love it and it's perfect for our trip! Can't wait to wear it.
links_Review_Text: So pretty, see through though. Runs a bit small.

links_Review_Title: Loose fit but so cute and comfortable!
links_Review_Text: Wore it for rehearsal dinner (it was a more casual event). Nice and loose for a warm day!

links_Review_Title: Could be better, could be worse.
links_Review_Text: As everyone else has mentioned, it's completely see through. I wore mine with a slip and it was fine. Fun and flowy but wouldn't purchase or rent again. It was for our engagement party and sufficed.

I rented this dress for my bridal shower. The small fit best however because it was completely see though, I ended up layering BOTH the small & medium (back up size). I loved the style and the weight of the dress but was very disappointed how sheer the material was. If you rent this dress be prepared to find a slip, or other undergarment that matches your skin tone completely.
I rented this dress for my backyard engagement party. I received a lot of compliments on it. It was super flowy and light but very sheer and low cut. I had to wear a slip and pin the cleavage area.

links_Review_Title: Daytime dress for bachelorette in Nashville
links_Review_Text: I wanted to love this dress so badly and I think I made it work ultimately - but it's completely see through and it's very "booby" in the front. I ended up wearing nude shorts and nude bralette and pinned the bra area so that I'm not flashing everyone. Overall, it looked cute but I don't think I would ever rent again.

links_Review_Title: This dress was beautiful except that the top is very low. We had to safety pin the wrap closed.
links_Review_Text: The dress has wonderful detail and great fit everywhere except the top where it wraps over the chest. It hits so low, I’m not sure what body type this would work on. We safety pinned it closed. And the fabric wrinkles very easily. But it photographed well.

Love the details on this dress! I normally would have ordered a M and L as backup, but I waited until the last minute to order so grabbed what I could! I ended up with the large and it worked but could have prob gone for the medium. The details around the neck and the arms are so delicate and beautiful. Would recommend a slip as any under garments can be seen under. For my bigger breasted friends: double sided stick tape! That was my only downside

links_Review_Title: Got so many compliments! Love this dress!
links_Review_Text: I wore this for my bridal shower and loved this dress so much. The medium fit however because it is a wrap dress the slit went up high. It might be because I am tall. So I wore the large and it was great! Would recommend this dress.

links_Review_Title: nice fit, great for warm weather
links_Review_Text: it was a little transparent - and maybe too much cleavage for a wedding

links_Review_Title: It 100% did not fit as advertised. Super see-through and did not fit around the bust
links_Review_Text: Hard to wear a bra, the bust was massizve and the waist fit well. Overall. this is a VERY tough dress to wear. Would suggest it more for summer.
I usually wear an 8 -10 and I do have wider hips. I rented this dress in an XL and the slit was so incredibly high that my underwear was visible in the front. It was unwearable.

links_Review_Title: Way too revealing even if you like a little leg
links_Review_Text: I love how sexy reformation is, but this was a miss for me. The cut of the bottom was right up between your legs and so short. It fit nicely otherwise so I suppose the dress is supposed to look this way. I could only see wearing something like this in private, if you know what I mean...

links_Review_Title: This dress is made for long-torsos and models
links_Review_Text: I read the reviews and saw the photos and thought "that won't happen to me!" And, it did. I have had a hit or miss experience with Reformation. They either fit me perfectly or I am swimming in it. This dress is made for a gazelle, and I am a 5'3 umm... non-gazelle. The XS would probably fit someone who is at least 5'10. Because the waist hit in the wrong place the fabric was bunched around my torso, boobs exposed and sleeves were oversized. It was unwearable, looked like I was playing dress up.

links_Review_Title: I was looking forward to wearing this dress at an all whites event, but I was left disappointed.
links_Review_Text: I was not able to wear this dress because it was too tight around the waist, and the bust was way too loose. The material of the dress was also scratchy and rough.

links_Review_Title: see-through, ran slit too high, runs very small
links_Review_Text: order a size up

links_Review_Title: Wore this to my Wedding Brunch , got SO MANY compliments !
links_Review_Text: Several people were asking to borrow this dress after my Wedding Brunch! Had to direct them to RTR!! The M (my normal size) ran waaaaay too small, but the large was great. Just had to safety pin closed to keep mildly conservative. Unfortunately, the L had a small hole in the sleeve , but made it work and people were still hugely complimentary.

I ordered the XS and SM and went with the SM. It looked super shear on the hanger, so I tried to wear a slip under the dress, but with it being a wrap dress it just did not look right. I wore a nude bra and nude spanks underneath and you couldn't see anything at all. The top was a bit big on me (34B) and needed a safety pin to keep it closed, but it didn't look bad. A fuller chest would def expose some cleavage, as it's a pretty deep V. Despite some challenges, I still felt very pretty and bridal at my rehearsal dinner.
barely wrapped around chest
Beautiful dress but too big at the top and long in the back. I will try a smaller size.
hard to find appropriate undergarments for this to work, very sheer.

links_Review_Title: the fabric is very dreamy but VERY see through
links_Review_Text: This was extremely see through!! Meaning it could make for a good swim cover up but other than that nah... the fit was weird too. It was tight at the waist and loose in the chest area. Unfortunately had to return this item without wearing
This dress is very pretty, but nearly sheer. Top fits poorly, you will be fidgeting with it all night if you choose not to pin closed (as I've seen many do here). Pretty, but not practical.

This dress is SHEER. Wish I had known that before I rented because I do not own a slip. Be prepared to go commando, wear a slip, or a backless bra. Otherwise, the dress is super cute and lightweight. Perfect for summer. Fabric feels amazing too.

I really wanted to wear this dress for my bridal shower, but when I put it on it was completely see through. I even tried it with different under garments. In the end I ended up wearing a different dress.

links_Review_Title: This was for my bridal shower
links_Review_Text: Unfortunately this dress is completely sheer, so the day of my bridal shower I had to run around looking for the right thing to go underneath it. Luckily, i found something but the dress overall fits a little odd and wrinkles quickly.
I didn't wear this dress because you could see everything through it! Including my nipples!
I usually love Reformation, but this dress was see-through from top to bottom, and the bust was loose. I ended up getting a replacement that worked much better for my engagement party!

links_Review_Title: It showed up at my house wet and gross. Also weird smells.
links_Review_Text: It was really drapey in the front. Hard to wear if you are petite and slim. Front exposes a lot of chest.

I rented this dress for a summer evening party. It was so beautiful and I really loved it. Note that it is very sheer. I wore an adhesive bra because otherwise the straps would have shown in the back. Also, I sized up based on reviews and was happy I did.

I couldn't wear this dress. I have large Brest, 5'7, 142 pounds and I got a 4 size. The dress was too small on my Brest. The material was almost shear where you could see my underwear and it didn't fit right around my belly. I have a 6 months old baby and I needed to hide a small baby belly I still have, well this was not the dress for that.
Wore this to a couples shower with fun earrings and got tons of compliments. Low cut top so wore a bralette with it.
This dress is like totally see through. You can see your underwear and if you're top heavy, you cannot wear a bra and then you're girls are showing. Beautiful dress but can't do it

It looks beautiful on the model. I’m 5’1, 34C, 5 months pregnant. The material was see through and thin and showed everything, the chest was baggy, the length was fine with heels, but overall just bad. The husband said it was the worst dress.
I rented this dress for my bridal shower. Complete waste of money because I could not wear it. Even with nude underwear it does not work.
It was very sheer so definitely wear skin colored underwear. The v is very deep and the wrap skirt also blows open very easily so maybe don’t wear in windy locations. Lol

The material is gorgeous, but you can see right through it. And the sleeves were dopey-looking. I wear roughly a size 6, and RtR suggested the large, which was too big. Ultimately it just didn't work out.
The zipper is in the front, which was a bit odd and the arms were a little too baggy for my taste. Very short. But fun for a party.

This dress is short but still modest. I'm 41 and I felt cute and appropriate. Love the long sleeves for winter. Love this with a bomber or nothing. Wore this to lunch and during the day on a weekend. Love this shape on me - so excited I discovered a new style of dress that works.
I was so confused trying on this dress but once I got it on...ta da! The greatest going out dress I've put on in a while. Got so many compliments. Would def rent again
Great twists and ruching in this frilly dress. Wore it to a party, then again to work! Tightish in the hips, so size up if you're hourglass.
Loved this dress even if a bit short for me! Flattering bottom fit and comfortable!

links_Review_Title: @thanksitsrtr - awkward ruching at the stomach but otherwise flattering, i love the sleeves
links_Review_Text: You guys like this dress on me so much more than I do - the stomach is so awkward i think!!! But i love the sleeves, pattern & rest of it :) more on @thanksitsrtr
Once you figure out the hooks, snaps, and strings it's a great dress! Just took a bit to figure out. I'm normally a 6 and this 8 was a bit big in some spots.

Absolutely love the design of this dress. Great for fall. Lightweight and see-through sleeves. Short length, fine to transition from work to out on the town. Love the detail around the hips. Very forgiving.

I wore this for a bridal brunch with over the knee brown boots and it was the perfect casual fall dress. I'm typically a 12-14 and went with a 14 and it fit great (though the 12 would have probably worked also, just been more fitted in bottom). Hugs in all the right places and so flattering!

links_Review_Title: Cute dress and fit, but extremely short.
links_Review_Text: I'd say the dress has a cute and flattering fit, but the dress is extremely short. The picture doesn't give the full view of the issue. The bottom of the dress has about a 3" ruffle that hangs from the skirt, so when you sit the skirt part of the dress shoes A LOT of leg!! Other than the length the dress was comfortable and stylish

Fabulous print and cut. I absolutely loved it but somehow took on vacation before trying to zip. I was ready to wear and just no go on wearing and breathing. I had another Veronica Beard that I wore on the trip in a size 4 which was perfect in size, so you never know! So disappointed!
Great fit, length and runs true to size

Sized one size up (what was available) and it fit. Could have done regular size and probably had similar fit, but would have likely taken a little sucking in to zip (zip is near waist, and near delicate fabric so sizing up ended up being nice to not worry about grabbing any delicate fabric with zipper) forgiving for small belly bumps. This is a mini dress I'm 5'8" for length reference. I wore with front a little open. Does tend to open a little in front, next time would wear black bra (wore tan and occasionally it would show slightly). The top is loose and flowy. Would rent again.

I liked the fit of this dress. The material was nice and the dress can be worn year round. It was very comfortable. But the snaps and hooks were hard to fasten. I actually broke a sweat trying to figure out the hooks.

Loved the fit of this dress. Not too short, very flattering. The body is not sheer but the sleeves are. Loved that it barely needed any accessories- just a cute pair of earrings and heels and you're all set!
This dress fit great. I had so many compliments. I wear a 6 in jeans but ordered a 8 in the dress and it fit perfect!!!!
Really short!!!!

I loved the idea of a neon sequin midi skirt and I paired it with a black top and coat to tone it down during NYFW. I was shocked at the construction for the price tag. I opened for an oversized top bc the waist is weird. There is no hole to pull the tie through so you are basically just wrapping a long rectangular piece of fabric around yourself and it gets a little bunchy regardless of how you tie it. Still enjoyed wearing it and got many compliments :)

Tying it was a little funny I'm not sure I did it right but it didn't matter. Great piece and color is almost highlighter yellow - I thought I'd wear it to the office but ended up wearing to a Mardi Gras event and received loads of good comments. Fun piece for sure!

I got so many compliments on this skirt shirt combo. Pros: adjustable because it's one piece that ties around. Highlighter yellow - you'll stand out in a sea of black dresses. Perfect for a black tie option wedding. And flattering! Sequins didn't itch or catch on anything. Cons: it is highlighter yellow LOL. Thought it could have used a button to hold it as the tie, while adjustable was a bit unusual. One side felt smooth and the other felt bumpy along my waist. Overall would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Sorry RTR but I may never send this back!!!
links_Review_Text: Omg this has to be one of the most fabulous piece I've rented. I've been with RTR for over 2 years!! This piece is a party and I cannot wait to wear it again!! No shame. I'm wearing this everywhere!!

Loved this skirt, loved the color and the tiny sequins. I paired it with a white tshirt, Jean jacket and platform tennies. Be warned: it's a literal wrap around... like a giant towel... no slots for the sash. So I did wear leggings underneath. But very cute and I got a ton of compliments!

links_Review_Title: I did not like how the waist fit with the wrap around tie, no holes to pull through, had to overlap
links_Review_Text: too long for a 5 "3" person
Very fun to wear. Had to keep on tying since it would fall down. Adds a little bulk but fun color. Almost a maxi skirt and a little scratchy but very fun

links_Review_Title: Wow! Beautiful Dress! Tons of compliments!
links_Review_Text: I chose this dress for a wedding... I wanted tea-length, comfort, nice, moveable yet sexy i.e. (you can eat, drink and have a good time). When this arrived I immediately tried it on - perfect fit! I am 160lbs, 34C, usually a six but this I chose an 8R to allow some room and not too tight - yet this fit me exactly in the right places with an athletic build was very pleased. Love the scarf /ribbon effect in the back which hides the two openings and one hook of closure. Ladies, best worn with Spanx! Yes, Spanx, to give the smooth front and back look... :). Tons of compliments 'lady in red', I wore this with similar shoes as the model which worked well! Will definitely do again - arrival was as expected early part of the day... packaging was great too along with a 'backup' dress. That one, I wasn't as happy with due to being tighter than expected but this red one was right on. Return - simple, easy in the same packaging back to UPS drop off.
I usually wear an 8 and the 8 fit perfectly. It was comfortable and looked amazing!

This dress was gorgeous!! Color was perfect, especially for a holiday wedding. Giving 4 stars because it does run slightly small - I typically wear a 4 and it was a bit snug. Also the long neck tie/ ribbon did come untied a few times throughout the night. It is VERY long so be extra careful when going to the bathroom! Overall it is a beautiful dress!
I held onto this dress for a wedding that was Valentine's Day Weekend. It was so worth it! Beautiful dress! Recommend getting underwear that does not show through.

An absolute must. I got so many compliments on this dress and it was so comfortable and fun to dance in. I did have to do a little adjusting to the sides since I'm bustier but all and all I loved it and would rent again.
This dress was very comfortable and absolutely beautiful color. I would definitely recommend.

Dress fit beautifully and received a ton of compliments!! The color was perfect for the occasion/holiday-a true red. The bow in the back was adorable! The length was perfect with 3 inch heels. Would definitely recommend this dress for a petite lady!

links_Review_Title: Slipped on, instantly felt dressed up!
links_Review_Text: Neckline is closed with a rubber band around the button which I elected to use just the ribbon to close the back. Did not wear a bra with this as the back is somewhat open. True to size, fabric is silk and flows nicely. Would highly recommend! Received many compliments in person and in photos. I would rent again for a formal event.

this dress was hot without trying too hard. received endless compliments all night long both on the dress and the fit! loved the tie in the back. it was also super comfortable. i wore my usual size and it fit me great! one of my favorite dress rentals so far for sure!

This dress is simply gorgeous. I am 5'7", 149lbs and was very nervous about wearing a satin dress as it can show everything. This dress was as beautiful on as it was in the RTR pics! Fit was perfect. I received so many compliments but beat of all I felt sexy and beautiful while wearing it!
This dress is absolutely to die for! It was the perfect mixture of simplicity & elegance and had great attention to detail. I would say the top part was a tad big but not too noticeable.
I really don't even need words. It was so perfect and lovely. Received tons and tons of compliments all night

links_Review_Title: So many compliments, SUPER comfy and flattering dress!
links_Review_Text: Considering keeping this one, I received so many compliments and felt great in it all night long. It honestly feels as though you're wearing a silk nightgown, it's very comfortable! Fits perfectly, rented my usual size 8.
I wore this to a wedding and loved it, it is comfortable and got many compliments on it!!

links_Review_Title: Amazing material. It is very beautiful on.

links_Review_Text: Top was just a smidge too big for a small Chet but not noticeable. Overall the dress was perfection.

Was a little large in the armpits but I just fashion taped it to myself so you couldn't tell. You may want spanx - I always wear spanx with this material but it did flow nicely so I probably could have gone without.

links_Review_Title: The dress was beautiful. Received many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fit was good. I originally bought this dress but then decided to rent and return the original. I felt the bust was a little stretched out from use compared to a new one. It also came very wrinkled as if someone had slept in it. Took me forever to steam out! Besides that it was gorgeous! #glamorous #wedding

links_Review_Title: The whole experience and dress were amazing!!!
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size. I'm 5'2" and 110 pounds and the OR was perfect with 3 inch heels! Beautiful dress and color for our Christmas party.

links_Review_Title: Dress was pretty, but very thin material.
links_Review_Text: Fit really well, but because of how thin the material was I ended up wearing the second dress I rented. It's very risque and almost silky night gown material.

This dress is beautiful in person, but it was an awkward length for me. The very end of my ankle and entire foot showed, so it just looked like I had a dressed hemmed too short. I would definitely wear if it were offered in varying lengths. For reference, I am 5'6.5.
Very soft !

This dress was chic and glam. I am 5'2" and it hit at my ankles. The dress does require pressing before your event. I carried dryer cloths with me in my purse to help with the static. This dress is revealing in the stomach area. I ended up picking the spanx thong to help with my midsection without a line. I also needed to wear a backless bra because the back is not fully covered.

This was replacement #2 for a black tie optional wedding and I was not hopeful but luckily I was surprised! I LOVED this dress. I want to keep it, it fit perfectly. While the more form fitted other dresses had trouble with my hips this was my true size. The back has a couple openings and I was worried about my bra showing so I wore stickies but you might be able to get away with a strapless as the bow covers the back. I can't emphasize how great this dress was and all the compliments I got.

With reformation I always size up 1 size 2 fits like a zero Modest yet flattering and sexy at the same Time Love the tie arms adds a feminine touch Very slimming Came to my shin at 5'6 Light weight fabric good for warmer temps
Really loved this dress but the slip did come out of the bottom of the dress. Overall was perfect for the occasion.
I love the colors and style of this dress. It hit my ankle and is good for every day, more so than going out at night. It's was a little tight so size up!
Big Reformation fan. This didn't disappoint. Wore this to photograph a wedding-- comfy and elegant.
Perfect fit- especially if you have a straight and narrow body type. If not, I can see how you'd want to size up. Also, I'm 5'9"- so I liked the length. This wouldn't be ideal if you're shorter.

links_Review_Title: Effortless dress perfect for date night
links_Review_Text: When I first tried this on it felt a little snug in the arms and torso. But when I actually wore it for a night I was never uncomfortable and felt great. This also did a great job of showing some curve while still feeling modest.
Loved this and not too long for 5'2". Conservative enough for work but absolutely made me feel like a million bucks. Size 2 was snug but not uncomfortable.

Like all Reformation dresses, you gotta size way up. This one was especially tight across the chest and shoulders, which usually isn't an issue for me. I went one size up and it was fine. I also got two sizes up and I could have easily worn that one too. It was a good ankle length that didn't touch the ground at all. I was able to hide leggings underneath (it was cold outside!)
Sweet dress for everyday wear. Fit really nicely in chest area, waist and hips. Now I know why everyone's obsessed with Reformation. Very tempted to buy this!
Reformation dresses tend to run 1-2 sizes small, as was the case with this one! Loved the fit and looked super flattering, got a ton of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a day on Lake Como!
links_Review_Text: Still not sure if the lining of the dress was distressed, or if it was suppose to hang below the hem, but even that couldn't stop me from loving this dress! It was the perfect sundress for a day on the water.

links_Review_Title: Unique print and cut - but I loved it!
links_Review_Text: I rented 2 sizes larger than normal after reading the other reviews. Glad I did! It was fitted in the top down to the waist. From there it had slight flare and cut right above ankle on me - which I thought looked great with heels! Added a belt - felt less matronly with that added piece. Overall I loved it! Endless compliments and fit the wedding venue perfectly!
It seems like it wouldn't be flattering, but it's cut really well and looks awesome on. It's pretty clingy and may require spanx, but otherwise easy to wear.

links_Review_Title: A little snug, but worth it for the look.
links_Review_Text: Which not uncomfortably tight, this was a big snugger of a dress than I normally wear to work - however, it was incredibly flattering. I work this to a casual work event and it was the perfect middle ground between dressed up and understated.

links_Review_Title: A stranger stopped me in the street to compliment the way I looked!
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect and flattering. Love the cutout in the back, love the length, love the cut. Debating buying, especially since it will transition well to fall/winter.
This dress was definitely figure flattering but just a tad conservative. I live in Utah so I think it made me look Mormon Nice lined dress though.

links_Review_Title: Very figure flattering and great for short girls
links_Review_Text: Nice to have a couple maxi options for petite girls on RTR. Comfortable fabric just not very breathable fabric.
I rented an 8 and a 10. I'm usually a 4-8 in dresses. The 8 fit perfect. I'm a 32DD
Sized up two sizes and it fit perfectly. Hem was longer than dress. Liked but didn't love.
Sized up and it was still pretty tight in the mid section

links_Review_Title: Flattering cut for a spring dress
links_Review_Text: Really beautiful cut that's quite flattering, especially to the waist since it sits so high. I found it quite tight in the upper arms, even though they tie I definitely had to loosen them. Hard to get the back zipped and buttoned by yourself. Plus the length is sort of weird. I'm 5'5" and it hit me exactly on the top of the foot so sort of looks strange with flats or with heels.

links_Review_Title: I just looked awesome. It was modest sexy.
links_Review_Text: #chic

I am usually a 4 or 6 (likely 6 in reformation since i think it tends to run small for larger chested and wider hipped girls like me. But at 5.5 months pregnant I wore the 8 and it fit like a glove. It was super flattering and comfortable. I loved the sleeve detail and the midi length.

Very nice, full stop. Nothing earth-shattering, but very very nice. My favorite part of this dress is the length. Runs a teeny bit small especially if you are fuller in the bust or the hips (or both). The dress is a little bit restrictive around my arms, but then again I probably need to size up. Keep in mind the material doesn’t stretch at all & the silhouette is more revealing than you’d expect because of how it is meant to hug the body. If you are worried about the hole in the back, don’t be. I wore a regular bra & it did not show at all.
Be sure to size up in Reformation. I'm normally a 4 and got a 6, which was just right. I'm 5'3" and this dress hit above my ankles. It's a very flattering dress and great print. I love it!
I love the feminine styling and the cut of the dress. It’s form-fitting without being too snug. Really slows off my subtle curves.
I loved this dress. It was a little snug in the hips, but was comfortable. I am short so it was the perfect length on me!

links_Review_Title: Fun take on the ankle-length dress trend
links_Review_Text: Cute tie sleeves and a sweet but edgy pattern that looks great with a black leather jacket and black mules. I ended up buying this dress because I loved the fit and have always wanted to try a Reformation dress. I'm usually an 8 or 10, and since the fabric doesn't have much give, I'm glad I went with the 10.

links_Review_Title: I have wanted to rent this for awhile and it did NOT disappoint.
links_Review_Text: It fit really well once I found the right size that would fit me. This is 2 sizes larger than my normal size. Fit tea length as noted. Did show all part of my stomach, so don't plan to eat that much that day :)

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for family pictures, followed by date night.
links_Review_Text: Cute tie detail on sleeves, ran large.

Very pretty dress. You can dress up or down with it. Love this dress. But it's definitely runs way too small. I went one size up and it was still tight. I wore it to the wedding but had difficulty eating. I think if I went two sizes up then it would've been perfect!

Perfect transition dress for desk to dinner. Matched the office look with black pumps for a trendy yet office approved look. Switched into heeled booties & a leather jacket for a night out. As with all Reformation dresses size up - runs small for sure!
Tight around the chest and arms but still flattering.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress as we transition to Fall
links_Review_Text: Loved the dress and it was perfect for an outdoor wedding I attended this Fall. My only watch out is that this brand does run a bit more snug. I'm typically a size 4-6 and had to suck it in a bit for the 6!

I usually wear 0 or 2 and I rented this in 4R because I read that it runs small but even 4 was uncomfortably fitting. And im not sure if i got a weird batch but the under layer (black sheath) was longer than the outer layer of the dress... wouldnt rent this again.

Gorgeous look for the weekend - this brand always runs small so I ordered 2 sizes up to be safe and I was so glad I did. The waist was a bit big but the shoulders and bust were a good fit. The material is very lightweight and thin so this is probably better suited to fall than winter - plan to wear a jacket if it's chilly!

This dress made me feel pretty, sexy, and confident. It was very flattering. I'm usually a size 4-6, and I sized up to a size 10 as recommended by the reviews and RTR, and it fit perfectly with no issues. So definitely size up!

links_Review_Title: I am always a 2 or 4 in Ref and I struggled to get this zipped and the sleeves were so tight.
links_Review_Text: Fabric has no stretch so DEFINITELY size up.
Liked this more than I expected to! Modest but also very flattering. It does run small so if between sizes, size up.

links_Review_Title: I sized up from the 4, which was tight. The 6 was too loose, so I went with the 4. Did not wear.
links_Review_Text: I sized up from the 4, which was tight. The 6 was too loose, so I went with the 4. Did not wear.

links_Review_Title: Got so many compliments on this top everywhere we went!
links_Review_Text: Got so many compliments on this top everywhere we went! Rented it for a bachelorette party in San Diego and it was perfect, I have a broad rib cage so had to size up but loved it!
Nice little knit top. Don't know that I would rent again. Kind of stressed out throughout the day
Wish I owned this, came so close to buying it! Stunning top. It's knitted and thicker so you don't need to wear a bra. Open back, amazing quality! So many compliments. A combo of sexy and preppy!
The crop hits perfectly where it should with a good pair of high waist jeans
Loved that the material is actually a thicker woven than it looks in photos. It was very comfortable, and the open back was pretty. Needs high waisted pants bc it's pretty cropped.

links_Review_Title: Wore it different than the model photo
links_Review_Text: I wore this different than the photo, not sure if that was accidental but I liked it more this way anyway!

Rtr recommended a medium, but I rented a small. A medium would've been too big! I'm small chested (34b) but tall. It was really comfortable. I chose not to wear a bra which was fine because the material is slightly thick (but very stretchy). Total strangers came up to compliment me on this top. Wore it with high wasted jeans and sports sandals. Would do strappy flat sandals if I wore shorts. LOVED IT!
This top runs short, so if you don't want it to be midriff-baring, opt for one size up.

links_Review_Title: loved the back detail! Such a great casual shirt. I bought it in the end, can't part with it.
links_Review_Text: True to size

links_Review_Title: Nice summer top, sexy back, a little stretched out.
links_Review_Text: Nice top, I wore this once on vacation. I am not big chested, so the top of the shirt was a little stretched out and the sticky part that is supposed to keep it up was a little worn out. I still enjoyed wearing it and got lots of complements.

links_Review_Title: fits nicely, no bra needed, for everyday wear or work
links_Review_Text: fabric thick enough that not wearing a bra isn't noticeable
Must wear with high wasted pants or else you'll look a fool. Very cute for a summer day out
This top looks great on and is a very cute summer/fall transitional piece. It is very flattering and you do not need to wear a bra because of the thick material

The fabric was sort of stiff but the pattern and gross cross back were very fun! I wore the top for a night out with a mini skirt and got tons of compliments. Plus, I didn't need a bra because of the thick material.
I loved this top! I size up for the chest, but probably would have been fine with the medium. The material of this top is high quality and I would absolutely rent again.
Maybe this requires you to have larger boobs, it didn't fit on me at all.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous fabric and overall look - just flawed
links_Review_Text: I really loved this shirt, or wanted to, I paired it with high waisted wide leg pants. It was really short, but awkwardly so, it could have been an inch longer or even an inch shorter, I have a short torso so that could have been me. but it was very large in the chest and i couldn't tie the back tight enough... I dont think that a small would have worked though
If you want it to fit like in the picture you should order up a size. Got my usual XS and it was very tight and short. Super cute just not what I expected.
This was a complete belly shirt and was not flattering at all. I couldn't wear it.
Size up! It's beautiful but definitely runs small
Great top for going out. Tempted to buy it!

Lovely printed top and actually makes chest look incredible. But I wore an XL and the shirt was far too short to wear comfortably since much of the material was dedicated to holding up chest. Did not wear since it's def not appropriate for Fall, but could be a summer crop top look.
A little too tight, but wow what beautiful fabric!

links_Review_Title: Little small but gorgeous! Made it work
links_Review_Text: This was a little small overall. Would recommend sizing up for comfort. I definitely was very uncomfortable while wearing because it was too small but I loved and would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Eye catching color and flattering fit
links_Review_Text: This shirt was a snug fit and was really flattering! Wore it sightseeing all day, and was comfortable the whole time!
I loved this top so much. It was flattering and expensive looking. I received many compliments and loved it. It is a beautiful top.
Great for a fun brunch or dinner.

This shirt made me feel so pretty. Was a very fun top to wear to an outdoor concert. For me, the chest area was tight while the waist was a little big. Honestly, it just gave me nice cleavage which is great for a concert but would not be something I'd be able to wear to work.

I love everything I've rented by this brand. They feel like pieces of art and this top was no exception. Quite lovely and feminine; wore leo underneath because it's pretty short but pretty flattering cut I found.

This top is winner! The colors are vibrant and the details are beautiful. It was a little short on me, but with high waisted jeans it worked fine. The wrap can be tied in front or back. Due to very deep V, I paired it with a cami - plenty of color options. I went with pink but it also looked nice with a green or red cami.
Too small. Could not wear. Too bad, the print was so nice.
This shirt runs small. I ordered XL it was more like a medium.

links_Review_Title: Fit is off but made it work.
links_Review_Text: I wore this top wine tasting on Valentines day weekend. Cute top but the fit is way off. Top runs small but I think the fit issue is based in the pattern itself. There is just not enough cross over in the torso of the top. When wearing the top with out an under shirt the V neck showed well below (2"-3") the center of my bra however the armhole and sleeves were very large. I needed and XL torso with S armholes/sleeves. I wore this top with an undershirt and it was still cute. Got many complements.
Gorgeous fabrics, partly lined, well made, but WAY to short, unless you don't mind showing your midriff. With arms at my side, size XL came up to my waist.

I loved the pattern & style of this shirt. Unfortunately, I did not wear it. I had rented it to wear as an everyday type item. I found the shirt to be too short ( & I am short waisted) & the neckline was too deep & wide to wear without a tank underneath. This shirt would have been great for an date night with strategically placed double sided tape. I ordered the Extra Large & am usually a Medium in tops & found this shirt to run very small.
This was cute but ran very small. I couldn't wear the small and probably won't try the medium. It is also very low cut.
Beautifully made, however the item ran small just as previous women had stated.

links_Review_Title: Was planning on wearing this out to a girls night!
links_Review_Text: I didn't end up wearing this because I skipped the event I rented it for, but it was super cute and unique when I tried it on. I loved that it was a little sexy, yet classy. I do not recommend this for work, but would recommend it for a fun date night or dinner with friends.
Couldn't wear. Runs small
This was fun for something different but I wouldn't rent again. Didn't love the fabric and the fit was a little off
Fits true to size however very low cleavage hard to keep in place. Nice fit otherwise.
Definitely runs small and kind of low cut for work without a cami. Loved the fabric, color, and wrap styling and very playful sleeves.
This is a really cute top but it is a lot more low cut than what is shown in the pictures.
Lots of compliments - great top!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful top worn with white pants and jeans.
links_Review_Text: Top runs small. If you want to hide tummy you'll have to wear longer shell underneath.

Wore this to a fancy luncheon with white pants and it looked great. I was a little confused on how to wear it, since it has really long ties like a wrap around but doesn't have the slit to put the ties through so I just wrapped it around the outside. Still looked good. I am normally a size 6-8 and I got the Large, which fit OK but was a little tight.

links_Review_Title: Did not fit in the arms
links_Review_Text: More of a Mid then at the Waist

links_Review_Title: Very cute but unique so cannot wear it too many times
links_Review_Text: Fits good in the body Tie is a little strange Sleeves are long

I selected this as a replacement piece for my RTR Update but was unable to wear it. I erred on the side of caution and ordered an XL (I'm normally a L). I couldn't believe how small it was. I actually re-read the label more than once to convince myself that it was actually an XL. If you are flat chested you may not have quite as much of an issue. That said, I loved the style, color, print, etc. Fun party top! Ashame I wasn't able to wear it.

links_Review_Title: Exquisite but not for chesty ladies
links_Review_Text: This blouse was a work of art that I did not get to enjoy. I have a DD and the wrap around was a universe apart despite ordering a large. If a big chest is not your situation, I would highly recommend this top. It was more beautiful than in the photo IMHO.

links_Review_Title: Small, can’t wear without something underneath
links_Review_Text: Runs small
I usually wear a medium, but this XL was incredibly small. Couldn't wear it. Cute top though.

links_Review_Title: Rented for an appearance on TV. Was too busy and not flattering enough to wear out to dinner.
links_Review_Text: Ruffle sleeves looked like an ice skating costume.

links_Review_Title: It's very sexy! The arms fit perfect but I'm showing lots of breast
links_Review_Text: It's very sexy! The arms fit perfect but I'm showing lots of breast

links_Review_Title: Super cute but runs VERY small
links_Review_Text: Beautiful top but runs small around chest area.
I loved the pattern and bright print of the top, but the cut was just too low for a work setting.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful top- if you are 5 feet tall
links_Review_Text: True to size, gorgeous fabric and trim. That being said it is very low cut (which I don't mind) but incredibly short. The wrap sat at my natural waist. I had gapping with my highest rise skinnies. Practically a crop top.

links_Review_Title: Runs very small, not for large chest
links_Review_Text: I should have known! The large fit like a small, very cropped and barely covered half of my chest when wrapped as tight as possible. I'm a true size 8, 34DD, and wouldn't have felt comfortable, I assume, even in the XL

I loved this dress. I didn't get to wear it out because of the COVID 19 lockdown but had to put it on and take a few pics. The fit is great. I didn't have on a bra and would caution if you're going to wear one since the diagonal cutout design goes right over the top of your boob. It fit perfect on my curvy frame and I will definitely rent again when I can get out of the house!

links_Review_Title: Wore the dress to a Moroccan Gala. I received compliments the whole night in a room full of gowns.
links_Review_Text: The fit was great. I wore the medium only because the small had a whole in the back.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color! Didn’t wear it but I would have loved to have another occasion to show it off.
links_Review_Text: The lace detail was perfect. I loved the back most of all. It showed just enough to make it sexy yet elegant.
Wore this to a wedding in the mountains and got so many compliments on the unique color and silhouette. It was so comfortable too.
This dress was a perfect fit. It's comfortable and light. The details were incredible and the compliments never stopped

Wore this to backyard/museum/floral engagement party, and it fit with the theme :) Loved the fit and the color was so complementary! Didn't need to wear any special shape wear, and that was a relief because I really wanted to be able to eat without restrictions (Ha!)! RTR sent the back up in a different style because the one that I wanted wasn't available. The backup dress was WAY too large. Glad that the original size was a proper fit. This was my second time renting from RTR and I will rent again for all of my special event wear needs!

I got the xs and s and surprisingly both fit well, though the xs was very tight in the neck for me and irritated my skin and the s seemed to gape a little in the back but I don't think most people would notice either issue. The lace pattern is very flattering and the color is really pretty. The liner was pretty short but with the lace covering I felt okay after a while. Overall a great choice!
Received many compliments.
I wore this dress to a fancy Thanksgiving dinner, and it was perfect! The yellow crochet/lace effect looked like fall leaves and the cutouts made it feel very glamorous.
Loved this dress and all of its unique, gorgeous details. It was tts (possibly even a little generous) and comfortable. I was worried about the bra situation but I ended up not wearing one (34b).

I loved this dress! I received so many compliments!! The material is thick but has a bit of stretch. I did end up wearing a sticky bra to give me some shape but it probably wouldn't be necessary for most people. I am sad to have to send this one back. I usually wear a 4-6 depending on the dress and a small fit perfect.
I got tons of compliments! Back is ah-mazing. 10/10 would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a Fall Wedding
links_Review_Text: Stunning dress! Fit well, was comfortable, and got a lot of compliments!

All prior reviews were spot on! The color of dress is stunning for a fall wedding and the fabric is both substantial and elegant. The back of the dress is the best of the many details to this dress. I am normally 0-2, 34 A and XS for like a glove. The compliments were flowing all night! I would absolutely wear again!
Would have been a 5 star if it had a clasp by zipper, I felt it unzip a couple of times!! Fit like a glove! Love it and got lots of compliments!!
Very nice dress! The fabric is a little thicker, so it's nice I didn't need to worry about wearing a bra. The open back is a very nice touch!
Beautiful dress! Appropriate length for over-30s but still sexy with open back. Lace adds some flair and the color is perfect for autumn events.

Rented this for a wedding and received so many compliments on this dress. It's so comfortable and my favorite part was the open back (I wore a sticky bra). You cannot go wrong with this dress and I felt like I was magic on legs!

The dress was a beautiful color for a fall wedding. Got a few compliments. It has an open back so you need a stick on bra. The fabric is a bit stretchy and has some give, except for where the waist is. The thin waist band is also see through, so you'll want nude stockings not black if you pull your stockings up high.
Perfect fit, I'm 5'2, 140 lbs. size medium. I got compliments all night and it was super comfortable!

I loved this dress and received SO many great compliments. It was perfect for an autumn wedding. I didn't realize the little cut out details were sheer, so that was alarming. Also the slip would not stay down with my wide hips...luckily I wore nude Spanks shorts underneath so it was not noticeable.

Loved wearing this dress to welcome drinks the night before a black-tie wedding. The only reason I didn't give this 5 stars is because I didn't realize the cut across the top was so open and I was worried it would slip down and show too much. I think it was lower because I am pretty flat chested. I works have felt more comfortable if I used dress tape to keep it in place. It should also be noted that this dress is pretty heavy.

This dress caught my eye because of its rare mustard color and beautiful silhouette. It looked chic and modern. Open back was a nice bonus. I wore it to a wedding at the botanical gardens. Dress looked fitted while providing comfort and ease of movement. I absolutely loved it!

links_Review_Title: Compliment city! A statement dress perfect for a wedding.
links_Review_Text: The lining is very short so be mindful. You cannot wear a bra so stickies are your friend! I absolutely loved this dress and would totally wear it again.

links_Review_Title: The dress was a total highlight and I got so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for the derby party we went to.
