The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because one of the lace details was slightly larger right by the bum which seemed to be from excessive wear which was a bit frustrating. Also, as the other reviews mentioned, the slip is extremely short and is definitely something to be aware of. I do have a long torso so I think this may have been worse for me. The dress seemed to fit true to size and the lace at the arms and back definitely do not lie flat as the other reviews also mentioned, but this did not bother me. Overall, the dress fit great and I would recommend it.

Wonderful dress! I standby claims from other wearers about the slip being incredibly short and the back zipper not having a clip, so falling down just a bit. BUT I would 110% rent this again. Beautiful color & style. The material is thick and detailed so you don't need a bra necessarily (I'm like a 34B/C). I didn't wear another slip, just nude underwear and kept my boyfriend on radar if something went wrong (ha!), which it didn't even with a lot of dancing! Would definitely rent again.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a fancy fall wedding!
links_Review_Text: Both the XS and S fit but the S felt a little easy to move and dance in. Perfect color and pattern. Great length and LOVE the open back.

I loved this dress - it's a very dark mustard color and absolutely perfect for a fall wedding. I loved the length and the more conservative front paired with the open back to spice it up a little. The lining underneath is very short, but I wore nude color Spanx shorts and you couldn't even tell. Would definitely recommend planning to wear some sort of shorts or longer slip with the dress. An easy fix to wear a beautiful dress!

Loved this mustard lace dress!!! Standout style and color. The lace detail is beautiful. Open back - so no bra or backless bra. Fits true to size, not too snug, easy to dance in! Definitely recommend!!
Loved this dress and would wear it again 10000000 times

links_Review_Title: Unique dress that was perfect for this event!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to a fundraising event for childhood cancer. The ribbon color for childhood cancer happens to be gold so this was perfect. I received a lot of compliments and loved that it was so different than anything else I've worn. There was no room for any sort of bra since the back is cut out and it is super form fitting but I went without and thought it was fine.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color! Perfect for a spring or summer event!
links_Review_Text: The fit was true to size. Material hides imperfections, while maintaining the wearer's form. I received numerous compliments on this dress- from the mustard color, to the texture of the material, to the subtle floral pattern in the thick lace! I felt sophisticated, while fun in this dress!

links_Review_Title: Flattering, girly style for a non-girly girl. ;)
links_Review_Text: Fitted dress, flattering style, sexy open back. Length was a bit longer on me than expected (I'm 5'4"), but worked out great. I didn't wear a bra (I'm relatively flat chested) but pasties would work because of the open back.

links_Review_Title: What a beautifully made dress. I wore it to a summer evening wedding and received compliments on it.
links_Review_Text: I am 5’6”, 150 lbs, 34DD and I took the medium size. I am very curvy and found this to be a flattering dress. I wore my nude stick on bra and spanx skirt slip underneath because the lace cutouts hit my curvy butt at a place where you would have been able to see everything. For this reason I gave 4 stars. If you are curvy, you will want to wear a slip. There is enough fabric on top to go braless. Overall, this is a fantastic dress that I would rent again despite everything I mentioned.
I wore this to a big family Thanksgiving dinner and it was a total hit. The color is gorgeous and the the back is sexy. I think everyone complimented it.

links_Review_Title: Obsessed with everything about this dress. The back is amazing!!!
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size

Cannot go wrong with this dress! Such a stunning shape, soft mustard yellow lace...I had compliments all night and felt like a princess! The open back is gorgeous. It's a very flattering and forgiving cut. I tried both the 0 and the 2, and the 0 was too tight around the hips; 2 was perfect and still fit everywhere else too.

This dress is AMAZING with a capital A ! I wore this for my fiancé birthday dinner. The color , the details of of the lace it's super fabulous. I felt so beautiful in this dress. If I had to do this all over ago I would wear this dress 10x (no exaggeration).
Lots going on but has a demure feel. Loved the dark mustard color too!
I wore this to lunch with the girls on Valentine's Day. Got several compliments. Very feminine and fun! Was pretty short though so high waisted pants are a must.

I rented this for everyday but I liked it so much I ended up wearing it for my birthday. The color is so vibrant! I did wear a camisole underneath since I have a small chest and I didn't want to flash anyone.
Beautiful material and flattering fit! Sleeves are a bit tight so if you have big arms size up.

Didn't get a good photo so sorry about that, but this top is very cute. A bit cropped but not too much, hits a couple inches under the belly button so can still be worn with regular jeans. Cute puffy sleeves, nice material, cinched but not tight around waist.
Very pretty! Only complaint is that sleeves were an awkward length and it was hard to push them up since the opening was narrow. Otherwise, very cute!
I'm pretty much a size four. It was a bit tight across the chest and very short. Unless you have very high waisted pants/skirt this will not work.

Love this top! Super cute. Cropped and pairs well with high waisted jeans. I had a little trouble with the snap in front coming undone throughout the day. I'm not particularly busty, which makes me think a larger size would have for better.

links_Review_Title: Not good if you have a long torso
links_Review_Text: Cute top does have a little button to keep it together in the front it is extremely short wasted so if you have a long torso this might not be a good fit for you or just wear high waisted jeans

I ended up wearing this to work instead of vacation. As you can see, the upper sleeve is floppy and the blouse is short waisted. I pulled the blouse down frequently despite pairing it with high waisted pants.

This shirt is really something I wouldn't pick for myself, but it is very unique! The downside is the fit. It's a small, but I don't know if it's due to the fabric, but the arms are tight if you move in certain ways. Probably won't rent again but was okay to try!

Was a but concerned about the pug sleeves but they turned out to be just right. For me this blouse worked perfectly for a not for formal day in the office, but it can be jazzed up or down for very different occasions

I rented this to wear to my birthday dinner and wore it to work that day and then out to the dinner and it transitioned awesome. I'm usually a size S/M in tops depending on the brand and this top was mostly true to size. It was a little tight in my shoulders, but I have broad shoulders so that usually happens. My only real complaint is that the class that holds the top together is a little fragile and pops open if I move my arms too much. I wore a black tank underneath to avoid any malfunctions, but for my bigger chested friends you may want to size up

links_Review_Title: Cute top but have to wear a cami under
links_Review_Text: I loved the quality, pattern, and sleeves on this top! The downside is that it is extremely short, the peplum cinch was right under my ribs and the peplum ruffle was not even long enough to cover my belly button. It is also a cross-over front and will not stay closed if you have a bust. So I solved by putting a cami underneath. For context, I am 5'4.5" and wear a 34D bra.
I generally wear a size Small top. I expected this shirt to be short, but it was even more than a crop top and was extremely tight through the arms and bust.
Run incredibly small, especially the sleeves. Beautiful top though - I will he exchanging for a larger size and update my review then.

links_Review_Title: Super cute top, great for a Christmas or Valentine's Day party.
links_Review_Text: Definitely a short top but fit my upper torso just fine. I wore a white tank top underneath and blue jeans. I got lots of compliments.

Wore this for my office christmas party with black jeans and ankle boots. Fabric is comfortable and light. This is definitely a crop, so pair with something high waisted. The cut is quite low for work - can get away with it if you are not busty (i am not, so the button closure was enough for me). I didn't mind the shortness on the sleeves, but the stitching is a bit weird and was pulling on my arms in places, particularly on the underside near my armpit and bicep. Was fun and festive for a one-time rental but wouldn't rent again because the arms were a bit uncomfortable.

links_Review_Title: I wore this top twice- dressed up with velvet slacks and pumps then dressed down with skinny jeans.
links_Review_Text: Lots of compliments. The shirt has a sheen pattern too that's hard to see in pictures, but is really pretty. The sleeves are tight around the wrist. I'm glad I sized up because it was a little short even with high waisted pants.

This shirt fit true to size and the puffed sleeves were a fantastic added detail. I was worried it would be too short but with high waisted jeans the length fit just like it does on the model. I was comfortable and felt so stylish all night. I wish I took a good picture while wearing it. You won't regret this rental!
Beautiful blouse with sexy styling. Wish it would've fit.
I didn't wear this. It is so short. It's almost a crop top. Not what I expected.
The shirt is short, also pretty slim in the shoulder. Super cute, though.
I couldn't wear this as it was way too short and rode up when I moved.
Super weird fit. Cropped so your belly shows and then super-tight arms and shoulders that restrict motion. I didn't end up wearing it b/c it was so weird.
The top is amazing - beautifully made and on trend however its very cropped and the proportions just didn't work for me for an everyday look
Great fit. Lovely sleeves that narrow your torso. Wore to work and nights out.
Lovely soft silk, gorgeous color but the boxy shoulders and too-short length made it a one-time rental for me.
Fits well
Arms were TINY but I know this shirt had great potential. I'll rent again and size up one from my normal size.

links_Review_Title: too small - the size 3 says its like an 8/10, I would say it fits closer to a 4/6
links_Review_Text: gorgeous color, fabric and construction
The sleeves were too puffy. It was too short which was weird with the ruffle at the bottom and overall the fabric seemed cheap
The fabric on this top is so pretty! I received so many compliments. The fabric is thin and breathable.

links_Review_Title: Cute top but cut too small, very uncomfortable.
links_Review_Text: Very cute, love the snap at the bodice that keeps the top closed at the bodice. I wear size 6 in almost everything, sometimes a size 4 in the top. The cut of this top was too small, cutting into my underarms and the elastic waist hitting my ribs instead of the waist.

links_Review_Title: I got a lot of complements on this top.
links_Review_Text: Good color, nice fit.

I ordered this dress as my backup because I never wear colors like this, but I LOVED it the second I got it. It was the perfect dress for the luncheon I attended & was light and comfortable. The gold is super metallic, which I loved, and the colors popped really well but weren't too bright. I'd definitely suggest this if you have a nice event to go to and want something different! #luncheon
Needed a festive dress for a casual Holiday party and this was perfect. Great fit. Ended up wearing multiple times.
Beautiful colors, comfortable/loose fit, short length flattering for legs. Wore in Miami and fabric was not too warm even with long sleeves.

links_Review_Title: I would give this 10 stars if I could!
links_Review_Text: I felt like Megan Draper in this dress-- mod and gorgeous!! It was a little short for my taste, but with tights it didn't matter. The colors are vibrant and eye catching. The metallic adds a touch of elegance. It doesn't have a lot of shape, but it moves nicely. I would rent this again in a heartbeat and would highly recommend!
Photos don't do this dress justice. It's SO cool and pretty and expensive looking and current! I'd wear it again in a heartbeat. One of my fave RTR picks ever.
This is really cute for the holiday season, however it is slightly itchy with the gold dots. It also is pretty shorty but it does come with a slip when rented.
Love the sparkle and casual flare. It's very short so I wore thick leggings with booties. Super cute!!!

So many compliments on this gorgeous print shift! I wore it with navy tights and my favorite velvet Frye's and couldn't have felt prettier at an event. Saloni runs small so I went up a size and was comfortable. Love!

A modern standout dress worn for an art party. Fits true to size. Can be dressed up or down based on occasion. A slip is included which was helpful as the material is slightly itchy. Overall loved the look and got lots of compliments!

links_Review_Title: This is an all time favoritei could wear this over and over
links_Review_Text: Fit perfect

warning, this dress despite not being very fitted at all does run small. usually i am a 2 or 4 in dresses, but the 6 fit perfectly. super fun pattern, it is quite short. and it does come with a slip underneath. and the dress is red and navy not black and red - its hard to tell in the pics! i rented for a rehearsal dinner and loved it

The fit is true to size and fabric very pretty! With beautiful gold ... it's navy blue background, not black... It comes with a blue slip ... it's short so be careful! I wore with a black sheer stocking and a black bootie snd simple gold earring! A fun look for a valentine charity event. I recommend!
Cute-ish but super itchy and not comfortable.

links_Review_Title: The print is gorgeous, and exactly like the photo.
links_Review_Text: Too tight around the chest and shoulders so I didn't wear it. But loved the style!

Great fit, perfect length for either flats or heels. I am 5'4" so very happy to find a maxi that doesn't drag on the ground. Beautiful full skirt and flattering cut. If I had the lifestyle for this I'd buy it!

I rented this dress for a Hawaiian themed baby shower and I almost didn't want to return it. The color is even more beautiful in person and the cut of the dress is so flattering. Loved the ruffled asymmetrical bottom and the fabric is just heavy enough that it lays super flat around the middle. Fit like a glove and that's normally hard for me since I'm small on top and wider around the hips.

So many complements on this dress and photos do not do justice to the vibrant color and texture and feel of the material. I took a close up to show how the material has a slight texture and sheen. Great movement when you walk. Runs small. I normally wear a L and the XL was just right on the fit.

links_Review_Title: Fun print, wrap dress both formal and everyday
links_Review_Text: Super fun print and flattering dress that was great for a wedding but also for everyday wear when traveling. I really like the semi-hi-low effect with a long dress. The wrap is nice for making adjustments. Would rent again!

I'm usually between a size 2 and 4 and the small fit great. It's a wrap dress so it easily adjusts to your waist. I loved the bright green floral print (almost tropical) and the dress slit and ruffles move so well (a flamenco vibe). Would definitely rent this again

This dress is an absolute show stopper but be warned it is very low cut. The fabric is thick but not heavy and drapes really beautifully. I'm a 4-6 and wore a Medium so I think it runs a little small.

links_Review_Title: Sexy flattering elegant bright summer goddess
links_Review_Text: Wore so many times and constant compliments. Just so comfy and flowy felt like a Goddess
I absolutely loved this dress! The material is heavy enough to hide what I'd like to hide, but not so heavy it didn't have movement. The color was even better in person. Will likely rent again.

This dress is perfect - fun, flirt, flattering. The green is gorgeous and the skirt has so much movement. I went to dinner with some girlfriends and both asked where I got it and that they were going to rent it for upcoming events. There is no better compliment in my book!
The color, the fabric, the shape, and super comfortable. So tempting to buy
Great stand out color, fabric, fit, bottom don't opens like many wrap dresses
The picture doesn't do this dress justice, it flows beautifully when you walk. I received multiple compliments. Did have to wear a cami to make it work appropriate.
Hiked up the mountains overlooking Lake Louise in Banff, Canada then decided to change into this dress for pictures at the top with hiking boots on, haha. Dress is flattering and gorgeous in person!
This was a great dress! It was very low so I wore a cami under. It's also a true wrap so be careful if it's windy

I wore this to a summer outdoor wedding and it was the perfect dress!!!! I was hesitant based on original model photos and the color but I can't tell you how perfect and beautiful it is. I got so many compliments! I wore an XS but could have worn a small just for the arms but I wasn't uncomfortable. Such a fun fit and beautiful pattern for summer!
Pretty but too low cut to wear to work.
I wore this in Hawaii. Fit great, was comfortable and flattering

links_Review_Title: Way too low cut for a full chest
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress for a formal event but i was so uncomfortable because it was way too low cut and kept getting loose. Too exposed if you have a large chest.
loved it
Nice fabric, nice fit. Was great for the end of smr.
Love the fabric!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress, got lots of compliments!
links_Review_Text: This is one of my favorite dresses that I've rented- it has a comfy and high quality fabric that is almost like a heavy textured silk if that's a thing. There's a lot of nice detail that was put into this dress which really elevates it. I would just caution anyone with a larger chest- the wrap top is fairly low in front so you'll need to safety pin this dress closed. There is no hook and eye to secure it and if I didn't use one it would have been a mishap for sure!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but it runs small
links_Review_Text: The fabric is lovely but the dress runs extremely small! I read all of the reviews, sized up to a large and it still don't fit.
It's light weight, flows well and no wrinkles. Length is just right with either flat sandals or heels. I love everything about this dress, perfect!

links_Review_Title: The dress was so fun and cute! Wore it on vacation in the Bahamas, got a lot of compliments!
links_Review_Text: I am 5’5 about 120lbs. The color of the dress was spot on. The dress felt a little short but worked out because of the flare at the bottom. It was also flattering but comfortable. Definitely would recommend and will rent again.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for bridal activities! It was a hit
links_Review_Text: This dress is stretchy. It is short. I was nervous and got an XL but I def could have done a Large. For reference I am 5'2 and 175 pounds. Honestly, I am thinking of buying this dress. It's so cute and flirty!

Dress can be dressed up or dressed down. Was very comfortable. I wore spanx under bc of the bodycon fit. Was very unforgiving without it. Overall loved it for the event I had and would rent again (just make sure you have spanx lol)
Like the other reviews said, it is a pretty short dress, so I'd recommend for smaller frames/petite like me. The material feels luxurious and you can dress up or down!
I loved this dress- I am 5'10 so it was short, but I still wore it and loved it!

I wore this dress on the last night of our trip to dinner. I loved the fit and the fun sleeves. My only issue with it was it was SO SHORT. I am only 5'2 and this dress barely covered my bottom. Other than that, I loved it.
5'3. 34C-D. 140lbs. Fit was great. Usually do medium in for love and lemons and it's pretty consistent. This was a tad short so I wore pantyhose and boots.
Flatters all the right places! And I love how versatile it can be worn
I went ahead and rented a size up based on previous reviews and was so happy I did! This dress fit me like a glove. I wore it on my 21st birthday and it made me feel like a princess!
Fits perfectly and is so flattering and comfortable, would definitely buy.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress but needed spanx
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress with detailed waist. The material showed off my stomach and I should've worn spanx. Follow @saidbymelissa on IG for more RTr looks
I received so many compliments on this dress! The stretchy material was very flattering.
I absolutely loved this dress, it fit amazing and got many compliments on it. The only con I'd say is the lengths, which ran a bit short.

links_Review_Title: Oh so cute, felt like a princess but oh so short. Just covered my butt so couldn't wear it :(
Beautiful dress! But not meant for girls with boobs!
links_Review_Text: Super short and small area for breasts but so cute

links_Review_Title: Lovely White Dress, Perfect for Summer!
links_Review_Text: This dress made me feel like a princess. I loved the puff sleeves and the smocked body. It does run small though, so I would size up. And be aware that it is very short! For more of my RTR looks, check out my Instagram @hannahkahn.

Overall, I loved this dress. I wore it for a friends picnic in prospect park on Memorial Day, and it was a perfect weekend dress! It did fit a little large since the middle ruching material has a lot of stretch. It made my stomach look a little frumpy because of it; I recommend sizing down. Still, I received a lot of compliments, and felt super pretty and summery for our picnic festivities!

links_Review_Title: Getting the dresses 2 days in advance to when my start rent date. Thanks!
links_Review_Text: #Montauk
Works great for short girls! If you are tall it might be a little short.

Wore this to a birthday brunch and I felt like a damn celebrity !! You can wear this dress two ways and it's hella comfortable (fabric is stretchy, so perfect for a meal haha). It's a little on the short side but I loved it!
The material falls nicely and the stretch is awesome and makes for an easy fit. I sized up to a medium because I was worried about the small being too short.
Love this dress. I even wore a skirt on top of it, and wore it as a "top." Very light and flowy for daytime, but short enough to wear out on a weekend night

links_Review_Title: This was meant for a graduation dress, but it's too short.
links_Review_Text: I really love this dress, it's super trendy, cute, and very comfortable to wear! The only downside is it is SO SHORT. I couldn't really wear it out because it is just too short on me. If you were maybe a shorter person, this dress may work for you. But, I have long legs and I'm taller so it just too short.
Love the dress but the sleeves would go down!
A tad short but oh so darling

links_Review_Title: Rented for a party during the day
links_Review_Text: Runs very short, the scrunchy part did not cover my butt so I felt like it was too short to wear, but I love the dress, its very comfortable and I want to rent it again in a size up
Absolutely love
Super cute and flirty!

This dress looks SO cute on the model but I am not sure it is made for my body type. The material in the boobs to midsection to waist is stretchy and the sleeves are a really nice chiffon. The length ran a little short and I don't love how it fit my boobs. I also think the slouchy/ruche waist did much for my figure. I rented a small.

links_Review_Title: The dress definitely accentuates the bootay!
links_Review_Text: The dress definitely accentuates the bootay! I wore it as off the sleeve, and it was very pretty.
Immediate return. Dingy off-white color. I sized up based on reviews and the fit was so bizarre - so short and so baggy. I don't think sizing down would have worked.

links_Review_Title: cute, but not the most flattering
links_Review_Text: super cute, but too tight on my stomach that it wasn't the most flattering.

links_Review_Title: I rented this for my birthday party!
links_Review_Text: This dress was so cute, but SO short! I know this brand runs short, so I sized up and it still was unwearable. Even in the larger size it barely covered my bottom. I don't recommend this dress for anyone over 5'6.
- it is really quite short but that is the style!

links_Review_Title: If you're over 5'5 - forget about it!
links_Review_Text: Couldn't event bend down without flashing everyone a full moon in the afternoon. Soooo cute, super bummed it couldn't wear it :-(
Rented for my vacation but it felt ridiculously short even for that! But very cute otherwise
Expect shortness.
I thought that I would be a Large for this dress, but I should've picked a medium. The mocked material was too loose on me and wasn't fitting.

links_Review_Title: Top is so cute, very short though.
links_Review_Text: I was so disappointed when I tried to wear this because it was too short on me (im about 5'7)
Very cute top, perfect for skirt or jeans but it does run big, I'm 5 months pregnant and M was way too big. Size down!

Love the top, however it is a little shorter then I expected. I tucked it into my jeans and you couldn't tell at all. Very flattering on the shoulders but of you have long arms beware of right arm feeling a right snug when you lift.

This shirt is one of my absolute favorites that I've ever rented. I was a able to wear it braless because of the boning in the bare shoulder side of the cup and it worked perfectly. Got so many compliments. Definitely will rent again!

It's basically winter in new york city so I had to find a way to wear this beauty without freezing to death. I decided to pair a white button down shirt underneath and I received so many compliments. It was so fashionable. I impressed myself haha. Fit is true to size but you definitely need an extra hand with the zipper since it's all the way in the back. Definitely a cute rental.
This top is lightweight and comfortable. Loved it!
3 people asked where they could get this top. It is such a special piece! Fits true to size and is super comfy.
Sexy.

links_Review_Title: Cute top for a fun date night.
links_Review_Text: I really liked that this was a back zipper vs. side as I have a wider rib cage. Loved the material and structure in the bust area. I wore with a black skirt, tights, and boots, but could have easily paired it with jeans as shown on the model.
I rented this and ended up not being about to wear it bc it was so so big. Its also pretty short, not quite a crop top but close. The fabric and cut of the top is really cute though.

I love this top, but the size that was sent as a *great fit was way too big. I'm not large chested so this could be why. I want to rent in a M when it's available - the sleeve is so fun and flowy and it's a sexy and feminine top.
Loved this top. Very different from what I'd normally wear but the asymmetrical style drew me to it. The sizing was a bit large.

links_Review_Title: Great piece, I need a smaller size, runs bigger than I expected.
links_Review_Text: I am going to try and order it in a different size, love the piece, just to large.
Didn't ware it, it was too big

I really liked the look of this top! Looks very cute with a high waisted jean with strappy sandals. Unfortunately the top ran a bit large for me in the waist and chest, but if I would have sized down I think it would have been perfect for me. I love the sip back, pattern and flows sleeve.

links_Review_Title: Fun, flirty dress for our Havana Nights Gala!
links_Review_Text: Received many compliments on this dress. It fits true to size and was comfortable to wear all night! Would rent again!

I'm between a 0-2 usually so this was a tad big, but with a padded strapless bra and the stick liner along the top I was good! I got more compliments than I could count. Wore to a black tie wedding in Mexico!
This dress made me feel like a queen. Wore for a December black tie wedding. It's gorgeous and forgiving in the stomach area.

links_Review_Title: Loved it, but didn't wear it!
links_Review_Text: This dress is gorgeous, and very well-structured. It has no stretch, and the bodice has boning that really works to hold everything in and up. The split allows easy movement below the hips. I felt it was a bit smaller on me than I wanted, though, and opted to wear a different RTR dress.
Fit great! Comfortable
Runs slightly small; was still able to wear it and lived it!

links_Review_Title: Rent this iRed stunner, It gives you shape!
links_Review_Text: I'm so happy I rented this red dress for our holiday ball this year. It fit perfectly. I added a belt to personalize it. It was very comfortable, FYI, It has no give. The only reason it was a 4 out of five is because the top of the dress rolled over, exposing the inside of the dress. I needed to "tuck" it back under a few times throughout the evening. I'm an 8/M in a jean/clothing at White House black market. I wear 10 mostly from RTR. Great dress!!

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress. I wore it for a Christmas Ball.
links_Review_Text: I did not need to wear a bra. It stayed up very well and the fabric is thick and beautiful. The red is vibrant. I received lots of compliments. I'm 5'5, 135 lbs and wore a size 6.

This dress was a last minute switch. I rented a different dress that didn't work out. The staff at RTR went above and beyond to find something that would work. This dress made me feel confident with my curves. I normally wear a size 12/14 so this was large in the chest however after wearing my strapless bra and a little fashion tape and no one could tell. And although it was long it made a fun 2inch train. I think this runs true to size so I'd definitely get a 12 or 14R next time.

links_Review_Title: Retro style, arunninf color and fabric ...
links_Review_Text: I originally rented this gown for a black tie gala, which was canceled so I couldn't wear it. The bottom fit perfectly but the top - particularly around the bustline - was saggy. I would have needed a fuller bra to fill it out properly as I am small-chested. And as another reviewer mentioned the top buckled out so it would've required fashion tape or a pin. But I would rent it again.

links_Review_Title: Didn’t end up wearing this one but it was a great fit and very pretty.
links_Review_Text: No issues with this one. Great length and fit.

links_Review_Title: Sadly, I wasn't able to attend due to a family emergency.
links_Review_Text: Fit beautifully, but the last inch of the zipper was very stubborn and was a two-person job! My only complaint was that the bust was uneven, which was annoying. Overall, I adored it and would rent it again!

links_Review_Title: I order this dress for the Heart Ball and loved it but unfortunately it was too small in the chest.
links_Review_Text: I am 5’3” 130lbs 36C and always wear a 4. I ordered to petite because of the length which was perfect but I could not zip the top. Was so disappointed!
Pros - True to size. (I'm 5'4" and 125-130 lbs. Usually wear 2 or 4 for dress, 26-27" for jeans) Beautiful and comfortable. Lovely bright red color. Cons- Started to fall down while dancing.
Dress was very pretty with a nice thick material but it runs very small. Order at least one size up.
The dress fits great. The material hides the stomach area well and the slit gives the dress movement. Wore it to a bridal shower.. perfect for that!

This dress was the perfect stunner for Valentine's day! I had tried it on in a Medium at the RTR store and it did not fit quite right (way too big on top; too much fabric in back torso area), so I took a risk and ordered it in Small just to try. I was not disappointed! The ruching in the stomach area has a lot of give to fit a range of hip sizes and the clasp in the front of the chest allows you to either be more conservative with cleavage or more covered. The slight leopard print on the dress was really cute and the fabric was so silky smooth. Felt super confident and sexy with the small details (like the peek-a-boo in the back) and low-v. Rent and you will not be disappointed!
Wore this dress for a wedding and loved it. Very comfortable and pretty!! Got many compliments on it all night! May run a tad on the bigger side, I normally wear a size S and wore an XS in this!

This dress is so pretty. The ruching was in all the right places to accentuate my curves. The pink is electric and there is an underlying cheetah pattern. The only con was that I had to pin the top or I would have been showing too much cleavage. I have larger breast which worked in my favor because it filled out the loose top part. It's true to size in the waist. It could have been a little tighter, but still unique and cute.
Great dress! Absolutely loved the color and the flow of the dress.
The waist was too tight. Would have been a great dress for someone who was expecting.

I rented this for a wedding. I went with a different one, but my boyfriends jaw dropped when I tried it on. Cool back - you can still wear a normal bra. It is low! I would have used fashion tape. Comfy.
The color was amazing! I think the fit and overall look is way better than the model picture represents. Def try!

Dress is such a great color and the cute is lovely. Cute open detail at back. Does not interfere with a traditional bra. Dress was flattering, slightly sexy but fairly conservative. I liked it. Fabric is a great weight and does not require a slip.

links_Review_Title: Super comfortable + memorable pattern and color
links_Review_Text: Wore this for NYE and got compliments all night. I'm curvy with a smaller waist and a bigger butt and this dress was great for that. A little loose up top but in a nice way. I would say this dress runs just a little bit big - I'm a 4-6 and the small fit perfectly. I'd definitely rent this dress again!

links_Review_Title: Not sure how this should look...
links_Review_Text: I had a Holiday party to go to, so thought the bright color would be good, but this was not a flattering cut for me. I wasn't entirely sure where the seams should lay, and being loose in the busy but tight in the stomach just didn't look good. I didn't end up wearing it anywhere.
Loved this dress SO much and complimented all night. Great for the pear shapes out there but this is definitely short so I wore black tights and was glad I did.
I wore this dress on vacation. It has a gorgeous print, cut, and colors - a lovely and fun rental. Since is silk, it feels nice against the skin and flows beautifully.
Was a little short but fine with flats. Probably could have rented a bigger size

I love this dress!! It worked well with tall boots for work. Can be made more night-appropriate with a different show. I used fashion tape to make sure the neckline didn't reveal too much. I plan to rent again for an upcoming party.

links_Review_Title: Saloni for the win per usual!
links_Review_Text: Wore with a cami to work. Great dress. Really liked i! This brand never disappoints me!

Such a cute dress! Super flattering and easy to dress up or down. Wore for a rehearsal dinner and got so many compliments! I was scared the silk material would 'cling' but fit in all the right places.

Beautiful fabric and cute style perfect for a date night. Pros; the print, skirt shape. Cons; more low cut than I would have liked (it gaped a little), the lining had dropped which I fixed with safety pins.

links_Review_Title: The slip part of the dress is longer then the dress in the front.
links_Review_Text: Love the colors. Very comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for hosting an Art Show! Colorful, stylish, artsy!
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit. Incredibly comfortable. Compliments from everyone! Low cut but exactly what I envisioned.

I am pear shaped so the top didn't fit all that great, there was extra fabric over the shoulders. The waist fit perfectly, I have a 33 inch waist and it zipped without a problem. The dress is beautiful and so comfortable and lightweight, I would rent it again.

I'm between a 6 and and 8 and the 8 was perfect. The pattern is gorgeous and I received multiple compliments. I really liked the fit. The downsides though were annoying. The zipper on the back was too stiff and went up my neck and stuck out in the back at the bottom a bit. The material, while gorgeous, felt a little cheap. And the buttons on the front kept pulling to the side - maybe the dress was cut on a weird bias because the were constantly pulling to the left and I had to adjust. Definitely a mini dress, I have a long torso and it was barely but thankfully appropriate. I would wear again for sure because it's lovely but with the design issues would never buy.

I'm 5'9" and I had to wear sneakers because it was short. The cut made it a loose fit so I could have sized down but not in the length. I was constantly keeping my hands down so the dress didn't blow up from the wind.

Fabric is light & comfortable. For expecting mama's, this dress highlights the bump perfectly in your first and second trimester. Wouldn't advise for third as the hem maybe too short in the front. So fun and flirty!

Rolled this dress up and packed it in my suitcase for a two week trip to Italy. It didn't wrinkle! What a great dress for daytime sightseeing with flats. It looked even better when paired with wedges and a wrap for dinners out on the town.
Fits true to size. I'm a 4/6 and the 6 fits perfectly. It's low cut but not obscene for me. It's A-line like an ice skating dress. Thin material. Short but not too short.
Gorgeous dress. Gapped on me in the chest. Strangely the liner is longer than the dress, so it sticks out on the bottom in some places. I had a very red line around my rib cage after wearing.

links_Review_Title: Rented for 4th of July family outing.
links_Review_Text: Fit: Im normally a size 8 but I sized up based on recommendations but I felt like I could have easily fit into my regular 8. The 10 was too big around my waist and due to my 36B I didn't have enough to fill it from the front. The front ended up sagging down so I had to wear a little tube top. The sleeves were too long for me so I ended up srunching them up. Material: The material overall was light and airy, you could wear it during a hot summer day and be fine. The underskirt (the white part) not sure if its by design but it does show. Overall: I think if you size it right this could be cute but I wasn't feeling it.

links_Review_Title: Great Dress!!! Perfect jump of colors
links_Review_Text: I wore this to work and it was very unique - other than the slip showing a little - so nice!

For true to size for me -- no trouble with the lining and immediately felt the beautiful fabric. Lovely feeling of lightness . Wore it to a concert with a jean jacket And to a casual party... lot of compliments and it was nice to have for weird midwestern weather for a cool night at beginning of summer.
Perfect fun and flirty fit
Paired with tall boots since it was still a little chilly and I want sure if tights would work with this one. Fun print and comfy to wear.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress so much that I wore it to two events!
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size. I am 5'6" and it was a great length for showing off my legs. Top is pretty low cut, would have loved one more button, but I liked the neckline. I used fashion tape to make the top lay flat, it seemed to gap a little, not sure why, but the tape did the trick.
I was apprehensive to rent because I have a larger chest, but I am so glad I took the risk. I felt so gorgeous in this dress

Awesome dress!! The colors are so pretty and bright-I love the long sleeves and length- great for a cooler spring night. Flirty, fun and still work appropriate. It is lined, very well made and super easy to zip and wear. Beware-it is low cut on the chest, depending on your comfort level, I had to wear a black bandeau top underneath. A very memorable dress!!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but lining is too long
links_Review_Text: This is a colorful summer dress and easy to wear. The v is a bit low for work as my bra pops out here and there. It didn't bother me as much as the white lining that stick out so much in the front right and back. Feel like RTR need to do a better job at hemming this before renting it out again because it's very unflattering. Besides that a really nice dress

links_Review_Title: Fun print and easy to dress up or down
links_Review_Text: I honestly wished the skirt was fuller (it somehow made me look a little top heavy and I'm definitely more of a pear shape) but the deep v was shockingly flattering. A bit more cleavage than I usually show, but it was still appropriate around family and didn't show any of my bra. The cuffs and waist are very stretchy but the fabric itself has no stretch. I wore it with white sneakers, flats, sandals, and heels and they all worked equally well. The fabric is absolutely beautiful. Lightweight and doesn't wrinkle. I'm slim to begin with but I thought it made my waist look super tiny from the side view. The lining does show a little when you sit down but it's easy to pull the skirt down to cover it.

Fits great. Looks flattering. I'm glad for RTRU because at $600 this dress is grossly overpriced. I could find this fabric in DTLA and have my seamstress make it for me for $50/$70. That said, it's a fantastic spring dress that offers lots of styling options.

Absolutely beautiful printed mini dress. Fully lined so good for weather where spring hasn't completely started temperature-wise. Fitted at top and loosely grazes lower half. Low cut so probably not work appropriate for all, but perfect for a date or similar occasion.

links_Review_Title: Lining shows at the bottom! Wanted to love, but couldn't wear.
links_Review_Text: I've rented this before and absolutely loved it. The dress i got this time seems to have shrunk a bit and the lining is showing at the bottom. So sad to not be able to wear this.

Very cute dress, wore it for a night out in south FL. I am 5'8" and it does have a shorter skirt so I paired it with an over the knee boot (flat) to balance it out. I've got a more athletic build so the chest was a little tight but otherwise it fit super well. Would rent again, maybe in a larger size.

The fit and style of this dress are cute. However the lining was hanging below the hemline on the dress I received. Maybe time to retire this one. RTR promptly opened a spot for me to rent something else.

links_Review_Title: Wore this for my first trip to the opera in Australia. Perfect!
links_Review_Text: Fit me well. I am usually a 10-12. I couldn’t have gone one bit smaller than a 10 on this dress. It looked very classy!
Fun and flirty

links_Review_Title: Colors pop and fit is great.
links_Review_Text: The zebra accents were fun! This is a really great dress and very fun. Lots of compliments.
I loved this print and the fit was through the chest and waist, except for the length. I rented this to spice up my day wardrobe but ended up returning without wearing.

Love this dress. Very comfortable, pretty pattern. I wore several times, to work, on vacation & on a date with my hub. The neckline is very low, but narrow so it's not revealing. There are small fabric covered buttons down the center of the dress which is a pretty touch. The sleeves can be worn pushed up too - the cuffs are elastic. I'd purchase this dress.
Was worried it would not fit my 34GG chest. However it did and I loved every minute in this flirty dress!

Silk fabric was high quality and the dress was lined. Style is cute and fit is flattering. The bust area is a bit large if you're small chested. I gave it a 4 because the fabric colors are much brighter than in the pictures and I would have preferred a more muted print.
I loved the pattern on this dress and wanted to wear it to a wedding but couldn't bring myself to do it. It was too short and too reveling. Secondly size up because there is no give.
Wore this twice and loved it. Super flattering creates hourglass shape and just really fun to wear.

I got so many compliments on this dress at a baby shower I was hosting over the weekend. It allowed me to move without showing too much, but it was elegant and hugged me in all the right places. Loved it!!!
I got this as a replacement dress for a wedding in February. It was a true fit and length worked fine with 3-4" heels. I felt super comfortable in the dress and would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Easy to wear, comfortable, and attractive. Not a showstopper dress, but elegant and classy.
links_Review_Text: I am 5'3", 146 lbs. I wore a size 8 R for a perfect fit. It is soft and stretchy, the pattern and gathers make it very forgiving. I wore 3" heels without platform. The short front means length isn't an issue!! Everything is too short on me! Not this one! For this event, I wish I had gone a bit dressier, but I was still dressed appropriately.
This dress was beautiful! Lots of compliments. It was very low cut-almost used tape to hold it up but decided against it last minute. Was perfect for a formal wedding!

This dress is really pretty. However, it was too big on me, but I'm used to that and just pinned it in the back. It's pretty low cut, so be prepared to show off the girls. I wore 4" heels and this was still slightly too long. I had a 2P for back up size (no 0P available) and the length was better but top way too big. The ruching and ruffling is very flattering. I wore this to an outdoor wedding at a barn and it was really a good choice. Overall I was very happy with it.

Rented 2 dresses as possible NYE wear for a party I had to work. This was more low cut than I felt comfortable working in, didn't wear it. Killed me to send back without wearing! Husband said "stunning." Amazing, photos don't do it justice!!The mid-section ruching makes it flattering on many body types (I'm pear-shaped). Wearing plunge-style bra, no bottom shape wear needed. Got a petite as I didn't want to wear heels, great length. MUST find a reason to wear this dress, WILL rent it again!

This dress was perfect! My first formal rental from RTR and it was amazing. I got so many compliments. Although it's a regular length, I'm a petite girl and it fit great. The pattern looks so much better in person. Great for curvy shapes. Would definitely rent again!
This dress fit like a glove and was comfortable. I received compliments the entire night, with a mention of 'best dressed'. I downsized to a 2R even though I usually wear a 4.
I almost didn't rent because it didn't look like it stood out. I stand corrected, this dress was perfect. Lovely cut, and beautiful fabric.

links_Review_Title: Very sexy - overall satisfied for a curvy body
links_Review_Text: I felt pretty great in this dress - I'm 5'2", 230 lbs, 40D, and probably could have gone with an 18 (however, the 16 almost had too much room for me in the shoulder area), but I threw on some shaperwear and was pretty satisfied with the fit for my body type. Just keep in mind that the plunge it pretty low and the material isn't particularly stretchy (it has a tiny bit of give and is pretty lightweight).
Great dress- black tie event--a little low coat but I draped with black wrap but otherwise Just Right for this party!

links_Review_Title: Effortless elegance! One of my very favorite RTR rentals of all time.
links_Review_Text: This dress is so flattering. With the ruching and slight stretch to the material, it is quite forgiving and covers any problem areas beautifully. I wore it with high heeled booties which was super cute for fall. I would highly recommend this dress. I didn't want to send it back.

This was the perfect dress for a fall wedding! It was fully lined and a great fit! It was the perfect length to wear with heels (5'7"). The ruffle in front did a great job camouflaging my stomach/pouch. However, it was a little too low cut for my comfort, so I wore a lace cami to add more coverage. Couldn't even tell! Overall it runs TTS, but the 8 was my backup size as I am between an 8 and a 10 (145lbs). Lots of complements all night!

Very comfortable and flattering! Only negative is the deep v neck which was lower than I would have liked. Had to use safety pins to keep it from gaping open too much. Beautiful print and shape of this dress! I felt beautiful in it!

I typically wear between an 8 and 10. I got this one in an 8. It was a tad snug on my hips (but that's typical for my frame) the material helped making it look not as tight. It also pictures wonderfully.

I rented this dress for the HBO Golden Globes party. I received so many compliments. The dress bugs you in all the right places. It’s ruched in the front so it hides any belly budge. Absolutely loved it!!!

I am between 4-6, usually accommodating a wider rib cage. This dress has nice stretch to hug curves. Very comfortable, received many compliments. I wore with "leather" leggings and black suede 3' wedges for a great winter look. I'm 5'8, and with the wedges, the Long was just right.

I wore this on a date. It's low cut in the front so I didn't wear a bra. The fabric design allowed me to do this without being overly revealing. The front slit with the ruffles is the right length with the right amount of discreetness. It will fall open if you sit with your legs crossed but won't show too much. The ruffles helped hide my tummy, too, so I didn't need to wear shape wear. While on the date, I was stopped 4x by strangers telling me they loved the dress and I looked beautiful in it.
I usually wear between an 8 and 10. This was a bit snug and very low cut, so I didn't feel comfortable wearing it. Otherwise was pretty.

links_Review_Title: Comfortable, form fitting without being too revealing. Easy to walk and move in
links_Review_Text: Slightly low cut, can wear any bra. A little tight on the bottom. Looks better in real life over photos.
The dress fit perfect. I'm 5'6 and the length was great with 3 inch heels.
just too big in the mid section. Not sure if it was due to the rouching or if it was stretched out. So disappointed because it's gorgeous

links_Review_Title: Stunning dress for a fall wedding!
links_Review_Text: Low bust, but not inappropriate. Very comfortable to wear all night! Received so many compliments.
Fit for me was great. Very flattering on an hourglass figure, and good for someone who needs to wear a bra (like me). Great for a fall wedding that's outside.

I wore this dress out for a nice dinner date. I found the dress to be extremely flattering. As someone who has a defined waist and hips, it's sometimes difficult to find dresses that don't make me look double in width! I'm 5'3-5'4 and with 3 inch heels, hit the floor perfectly. Size 8 dresses usually fit me better but this 6 was spot on. The dress has some give. I would definitely rent again.

This jumpsuit was perfect for a Studio 54 themed party! I received endless compliments. Sequins are always a bit scratchy, but this was great for dancing; it stayed in place and I had very little irritation afterwards. I'm only 5'2" so I think the legs and torso would be a bit short for someone much taller. Not pictured: I actually wore gold strappy heels to compliment this glittery outfit

This is such a fun and sparkly outfit! Lots of compliments all night! I'm 4'11 and it was full length on me, but if you are taller, it would fit more like a cropped length. The top ties so you can adjust how must chest you want to show, so I liked that option. I wore the MR, and it says it's an 8 on the label and I usually wear a 4,6, but I have hips and booty and this fit nicely without being tight! Very comfortable and easy to wear! So fun!

I loved this jumpsuit so much. I felt amazing in it and it was perfect for my birthday party! It's incredibly sparkly and fun, but some of the sequins on the pant legs did catch on things (including the other pant leg). However that's a small price to pay for a fabulous outfit. Overall I would definitely rent again for the right occasion!

links_Review_Title: If you want to be a human disco ball...
links_Review_Text: Pro: you will be notices. Comfortable to dance in. Even if you have no boobs (size A) you can rock this. Hides any pudge because you manage to blind your frenemies with your dazzle Cons: don't drink anything bc peeing is very hard. Sequines will cut you, so will the halter strap Just get it, it's kinda awesome to wear

This jumpsuit is amazing. I wore it to a work party and received so many compliments. It was very soft too. The sequins didn't scratch or both me at all. It was very comfortable and loved every second wearing this jumpsuit.

Double sided tape is a must! Usually I can't wear jumpsuits because I have a long torso but I was very happy that this one fit spectacularly. The pant part was not particularly long, it hit me at a little below the ankle. Rent if you're looking for a fun departure from a basic sequined mini!

I wore this for my 30th birthday party and absolutely loved it. Fits true to size, pretty comfortable, and got lots of compliments (my boo s looked great!). Looks best with strappy heels. Watch out for nip slips because it is very low cut.

links_Review_Title: I wanted this to work so much but it wasn't to be.
links_Review_Text: The zipper was close to working but it was too short in the torso for me. Just didn't work.

links_Review_Title: I SOOOO wanted this to work but the top is problematic for larger chests.
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a video shoot for my own company where the video would be selling our entertainment and music services to brides (I'm also the lead singer). I absolutely fell in love with the disco ball effect of the jumpsuit online and, when I tried it on, the overall fit through my legs, butt, stomach & hips was perfect. However, I needed to be able to move and groove in this outfit without feeling like I was going to fall out up top, and the fit of the bodice was just not cutting it. For reference, I'm about 5' 5", 135 lbs. 32/34 DD. First off, the strings that hold up the bodice are like bikini top strings and, I don't know about you other full chested ladies, but I never wear those kind of straps even on the beach because they can't hold up my breasts enough. Same problem here. I guess I just didn't notice how thin the straps were when I rented it but I ended up having to cinch up the strings so tight to be able to hold my breasts in place that I could barely move my neck. Then, even when in place and cinched tight, I had to stay almost still for my breasts to not pop out the sides. We tried putting double-sided tape on both sides of each breast and it helped but I just still couldn't move normally or freely. So, had to scrap it for this shoot and didn't wear it at all (drat!). I still give this outfit a 4 out of 5 since it's a beautiful jumpsuit. Especially in person, it's just scrupmtious and magnetic! A real showstopper. AND, if I had rented it to go clubbing or out on the town in Vegas, I would have had zero problem relaxing the strings a bit and using the double-sided tape, and just being a bit "cheeky" with my ladies. Big chested ladies -- just beware before renting, make sure you know that you will be showing a lot of middle and side boob. :)

I was So excited to rent this sparkly jumpsuit for my Vegas birthday party. However, the jumpsuit ran very small and does not work for curvy women. I was not able to zip it over my behind. The fabric has no stretch or give and hits a weird part of the legs
The fit was amazing, it hugged in all the right places. I have never gotten so many comments on an outfit and I felt so cool wearing it. Would totally recommend getting this!

links_Review_Title: I felt amazing in this jumpsuit! A walking disco ball. Perfect for my 21st birthday party!
links_Review_Text: The fit was great. I loved the open back. There is no need for boob tape or sticky boobs because the material is super thick and protects your bust.

links_Review_Title: Not flattering for shorties like me
links_Review_Text: I looked like a perfectly sequined sausage in this one! Overall not flattering for my body type!

links_Review_Title: The outfit was perfect for NYE. Looked great it pictures and I received tons of compliments!
links_Review_Text: Had to double tape so my boobs would nip slip when I bent over but overall the outfit was great! Comfy and easy to move in, not itchy on the inside. Could have worm with flats or heels. I ordered a 6 and a 8 and the 8 was better for my long torso. I loved it! Easy to dance and move in all night long.

links_Review_Title: Great night but this outfit didn't work.
links_Review_Text: not good for long torso.

links_Review_Title: Pretty color, weird fit at bust - didn't wear it
links_Review_Text: I had rented this for date night, but wasn't able to wear it due to the fit in the shoulders and bust. The skirt portion of the dress was fitted (as expected), but the shoulders were a bit big and the seaming around the bust would not lay nicely - it folded over and out so you saw the inside of the dress. I'm a pear-shaped 34B w narrow shoulders, so it's not unheard of for the top of a dress to be big on me, but the fit at the bust is just odd. Not sure if my rental just needs to be pressed.
Amazing dress, wore it for a presentation for a public speaking conference.

links_Review_Title: Great fit and beautiful color! Lots of compliments.
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for a hospital benefit. It fit loose in the arms, but accentuated my waist line. It does show some cleavage, but you are able to wear a normal bra, which is always nice! Overall--highly recommend and would rent again.

I enjoyed this rental but i wasn't at "love it" stage. Fit was super flattering but material is thin and unlined and facing at the neckline rolls a little, a problem I easily solved with dress tape. Length is fine, even without tights. Nothing shows when you sit down. Color is gorgeous, and would look great for camera interviews.

Nice color and flattering cut but it had a few issues: a little tight in arm holes, looked a little worn across the neck and chest, and it felt a little too short for work. Not the best Shoshana garment I rented.

Great dress for work. Vibrant blue and the sash is super fun. Only complaint is the fabric is a bit thin. Very low cut so I needed a cami. The lining along the v-neck/lapel kept coming out so I had to use fabric tape. But very cute overall.

links_Review_Title: Dress stands out love the color.
links_Review_Text: I wore this to our dept christmas party and I got a lot of compliments its true to size. Im petite however stands 5'4" so it was just above the knees. Match this with matte makeup and accessorize it so it stands out. Will rent again:)

Beautiful color not really displayed in photo here. Hangs nicely, not tight. A bit loose around my smaller chest but generally fit nicely and was flattering. Good for day to night. Material is quite light despite the longer sleeves. Comfortable.
Love love love this dress. This was a last minute replacement for another dress and I'm so happy I picked it. It fit perfectly and wasn't too revealing.

I read the reviews over and over before finally committing to this dress. Ordered it in 2 sizes, and both were WAY too tight! I feel like the ruffle would've potentially hidden some of my "mom belly," but I could barely move my legs since it was so tight on my thighs. So disappointed.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful great, great fit and very flattering
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a rehearsal dinner and loved it. The blue color is very bright, the length and style in the front is very flattering, and the chest fit really well, which is something I struggle with. Highly recommend and definitely will rent again.

links_Review_Title: Nice color, too low for work.
links_Review_Text: I rented this for work, but it is too low-cut for work, so I didn't end up wearing it. Great color and material though.
This dress is pretty basic and was good for work. The facing on the neckline doesn't lie as flat as I would like, but it's fine. Fits very true to size.

Love the Shoshanna brand, but this dress was super short for the size and with no stretch in the midsection, it was slightly tight and was sent back without a wear. Too bad though as this dress's color was beautiful.
Very flattering. Wore with tall boots and tights. Gorgeous!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for work to holiday dinner
links_Review_Text: The color of the dress is stunning and very flattering. Sexy but ok to wear to work. Loved it!
I wore it for work so I had to put a bralette under it to hide my cleavage other than that, cute dress
So many compliments on this dress. The colors are amazing!

links_Review_Title: This was my backup dress and it ended up being anything but a backup.
links_Review_Text: I litterally received compliments all night. The standout color, pattern, neck and back lines made it stand out among all the "little black dresses" surrounding me. Love love love this dress!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful fabric, but not flattering for my body type.
links_Review_Text: I am larger on top than on bottom. This dress was not flattering for my body type. Also, the style reminded me of Betty from the Flintstones :-) . Beautiful, but not for me.
Stunning with great quality. I'm unsure about the neckline as a personal preference. However, I might rent it at a later date.
I normally don't wear a lot of patterns but rented this for my first time in the Philippines. The dignitaries commented on how lovely and appropriate it was. #WellPlayedGirl!

This dress is just amazing. The details of the blue lace with the raised pink flowers is a showstopper. I was at a formal event at a private golf club and was stopped so many times with compliments about my dress. I am 5'10 and it came right above my knees so I am thinking it might run a bit longer for petite gals. The bust fit perfectly without a bra and I am a 36c. Just loved this dress! Wished I had a reason to wear it again!!
Absolutely loved this dress! Amazing colors and comfortable! So many compliments and perfect for our friends wedding.

links_Review_Title: Could not have been more easy to access and use
links_Review_Text: Compliments all night long! Love the fit, vibrant color. Very comfortable and flattering dress.
Wore for NYFW - very cute, but the fit was a little awkward (especially the top).
Fit wonderful. And packed easily. No wrinkles! I would normally wear with a less chunky heel but those were the only heels I took to Italy.

Great dress and got lots of compliments. Ran large- would have been nice if a smaller size was optional on ordering. Dress had a bit of a smell to it when it arrived, but otherwise the experience was great! Dress even showed up early which was nice.

links_Review_Title: The dress was perfect for a cocktail event.
links_Review_Text: The dress is flattering and super comfy! Like other reviews have mentioned, it does run a bit big on the chest... I just wore one of those thicker strapless bras and it worked out great.

links_Review_Title: Super fun dress that everyone loved!
links_Review_Text: I attended a beach-formal wedding and this was the perfect pick. True to size and the material/cut was very flattering.

links_Review_Title: This dress is stunning! Tons of compliments all night!
links_Review_Text: The neckline makes this dress! I wore the smaller size so my boobs would stay inside! And they did ;-)! It fit very nice and I was comfortable all evening even on the dance floor!

I normally wear a 14 but the 12 was a better fit- especially up top. I tried sticky supports instead of a bra and they were worthless, but the snug fit of the dress helped support the girls. The neckline initially was a bit itchy but it was not noticeable throughout the evening.
Everything about this dress was fabulous. Fit like a dream. I received so many compliments on it.

This dress was perfect for a late summer, Minnesota wedding!! The colors of the dress are more beautiful in person and o got compliments the whole night!! The only negative is the lace atriums the neckline is very scratchy. After hours of wearing and dancing, it was very uncomfortable.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, but not a good fit for small chested women
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress overall - beautiful color, plenty of pop, and really fun. I had a friend comment that you might need to have a certain body type to look good in it - I think if you have bigger arms/shoulders, it might not be he most flattering, but I think it worked well for my frame. The fit that didn't work for me, however, was the bust. Since it’s lace, it's a fitted bust with no stretch. I’m an A cup and did not fill it out, which left the top looking somewhat deflated. I would not recommend this for another A cup person, unless you have a very good push up bra. But for B or C cups, i bet this would be great.
Perfect fit and I didn't even need a bra! Color is spectacular. I had nonstop compliments on this beautiful high end piece! Amazing lace details and creative design. 10/10

Absolutely loved this dress and how it fit on my body! Covered my stomach area and made me look skinny. Loved the color of this dress. It was so beautiful. The only thing about the dress is the bust area was a little big but I made it work with a low strapless bra. Also be careful of snags because of the lace overlay. Great dress!

Size 4 fit well, however if you have a smaller bust you will not fill out the top. It still would have looked okay, but looked better with the addition of one of those sticky cup bras. Length was perfect for me at 5'11. Short enough to show leg but long enough to allow for bending over and dancing. I got many compliments on the dress including from a stranger who said she'd been admiring it all night. I would highly reccomend this rental! It is comfortable, sexy but classy, and has beautiful details.

links_Review_Title: I got tons of compliments on the dress. It was form fitting and comfortable.
links_Review_Text: I got a lot of compliments on the dress at the wedding we went to. I loved the fit, the colors and the style. Only down side is that the delicate lacing is coming undone on the bottom part of the dress. No one else could tell though.

links_Review_Title: Different style for me. But I liked it!
links_Review_Text: I wore this for a barn style wedding and it was perfect. The cut kept me cool enough. And I was able to dance all night. Got a lot of compliments. One of my fave rentals to date.
Got a lot of compliments on the dress. Chest was a little roomy but manageable. Did not experience itchy neck line as other reviews mentioned. Will definitely rent again.

I wore this for my best friends wedding - outdoors July, beach/garden wedding attire. My measurements: 32-27-35, wore size 2. Pros: Received so many compliments! Lace work is gorgeous Perfect length - sexy but not scandalous Chic neckline Cons: The bust was a little large for me Seriously no other cons
...except for the bride, of course. Fit was great, got tons of compliments. Good for small-chested athletic body types.

I wore this dress to The Magic Castle in Hollywood. It's definitely a dressy kind of night, and this dress was perfect! I wore without a bra. But this designer fits me perfectly in a 12. It's just snug enough to keep the ladies controlled, but not too tight.

This dress looked great, and I felt great in it. The blue is vibrant and the pink flowers are subtle. Fit true to size and the fun neckline made the outfit feel a little different and exciting. Definitely recommend this dress!

Perfect dress for a summer wedding. Very beautiful and with a cool back. Definitely a pretty, but not a sexy, dress. If you are going for a classy look, it's great. If you want something a little sexier, I don't recommend, based on the length and fit.

Love the details on this dress. I received a lot of compliments. Like all other reviews say, this dress runs big on the top. You also can't wear a bra because the back and sides are too low. I think if I would have requested a smaller size it would have been a bit better.

I am 5'9, 159lbs. Loved the dress. I recommend taping the dress at the neck and top of chest to hold it up. The dress is gorgeous. Some reviews said fabric was itchy, I did not experience that. I thought dress was comfortable and easy to dance in, etc.

links_Review_Title: Love it! Back of dress is a show stopper and love the flower detail!
links_Review_Text: Perfect for a spring summer wedding!

links_Review_Title: Wore it for a wedding and it was a huge hit!
links_Review_Text: Great dress, especially as someone with a bigger chest (couldn't wear a bra, but didn't even notice it!). I was also pleasantly surprised to size down. Very comfortable, flattering, and I got a lot of compliments. Would absolutely wear again.

I wore this dress for a friend's wedding and loved every minute in it. The dress was super comfortable and flattering. I received a ton of compliments all night. I would definitely rent this dress again.

links_Review_Title: So pretty BUT a challenge for the small-boobed
links_Review_Text: Love this dress, so pretty and I received many compliments. I usually need the four so I ordered the four and the six. Should have ordered the four and the two. Who would've thunk it. That's because you need boobs for this dress!! The top was wayyy too big. If you look at the picture you can see that it's dragging low on my side boob...Yet I still have body tape and 3 safety pins keeping the top on in that pic. Im a 34B on a good day. The rest of dress seemed true to size. That being said, it's really pretty. So much so that I was determined to wear it anyway. Some people said they thought the neck was a little itchy, I did not find that to be the case. Hope this helps!
Great colors and fit on this stunner. It's long enough to dance and not worry about showing anything. Sticky bra needed!
This dress was super flattering and comfortable. I usually wear a 4 but after reading the reviews sized down to a 2. The bust was a bit big but the length and waist were perfect!

links_Review_Title: Top is large. Middle panel over stomach makes 'pooch'
links_Review_Text: This dress is beautiful. I had compliments all night. But the top is really long and loose. If you don't have at least a C cup. Don't bother. I had to size down to the 0 and still pulled it up all night. Also had to wear stick on cup bra. Can't wear a strapless. The pink flowers design end at the waist and then start back up at the bottom - right under your stomach. It looks like there is a porch where your tummy is - and I have no pooch!!! The top around the neck is itchy too.

This was my alternate dress for a gala and I'm so glad I chose it. I'm short-waisted with an athletic build and no real waist definition, and this still fit me perfectly. I thought the halter might look weird, but the overall look was very flattering. I paired it with a dark cranberry purse and blue heels.

links_Review_Title: Great spring dress for Kentucky Derby
links_Review_Text: Beautiful detail and color. I ordered a 0 and 2 and went with the 0. It was actually a little roomy in the bust but i wore a padded strapless. The lace detail around neck gets a little uncomfortable but the style is so flattering. I'd rent again-lots of compliments!!

links_Review_Title: Wore a million times, great everyday fall / winter
links_Review_Text: LOVED this coat. Super cute. Wore it day and night in 30° weather. Got lots of compliments. Pattern of stars is faint enough.
A gorgeous coat. The slight sparkle to it definitely dresses it up but you can easily dress it down with jeans. Love the versatility
The coat is fairly thin but it added warmth over my minidress for a party night. I loved that it had deep pockets! People were very complimentary and wanted to run their hands over the fabric.

This jacket is AMAZING! So fluffy, and the gold detail makes it that much fancier. I got so many compliments when I wore it out. The inside liner makes it feel cool but still kept me warm throughout the night.

This jacket is so beautiful in person. The gold detailing makes it even more luxurious feeling. It was great for a formal affair, but could absolutely be dressed down with jeans. I got a small because XS wasn't available, it was very roomy, but it worked to be an oversized fit with my dress.

Runs TTS, not super thick which was perfect for what I needed for--May be too thin for very cold weather. Loved the sparkly accents of silver running throughout. Would rent again for NYE or holiday look.
A one time rental. A little too much for me to rent again.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to KC Chiefs Super Bowl Parade. It was 30 degrees out and it kept me warm!
links_Review_Text: I had to order XS as the S was unavailable, but it fit great! Gold accents are not overbearing, but a perfect touch. Fairly light weight, but kept me warm!

links_Review_Title: super cute jacket for going out to dinner
links_Review_Text: Felt like it really finishes off my outfit and gave it a dressed up feel. My only complaint is that the metallic is a bit scratchy and made it feel a little cheap. Ordered a size XL, usually between L + XL but wanted the room to layer a sweater underneath. Fits great, and is thin so can layer thicker item under to stay warm.
Kind of worn. Would have liked to have rented a newer, less used item BUT this coat is AWESOME. I feel like a freakin ROCKSTAR!

When I first put this on I thought it was not going to do the trick to keep me warm because of how light and thin the material felt. But thankfully I was wrong this is so warm i was sweating. very stylish

This jacket gets some serious attention. Random chicks in the bathroom were like, "let me feel how soft it is!" Of course I wore it with high heeled black boots and leggings so that I would look like a real housewife of new New Jersey. And a black top underneath so that the jacket would do the talking.

links_Review_Title: warm and comfy, Looks good on
links_Review_Text: I might want to own it
This cost is cute but beware it has a little dazzle dazzle with the gold accents in the diamond pattern.
Loved this skirt. Almost bought it. Wore it twice and got so many compliments. Sophisticated style but the sparkly fabric takes it up a notch.

This has been my favorite rental so far! I received so many compliments on this skirt, and might even purchase once I'm done with it for the month. It is perfect for work, and could also be dressed up for a night out on the town or work event. It is comfy, and extremely flattering. Best rental yet!

links_Review_Title: Great skirt with a little sparkle
links_Review_Text: Wore to work but could have transitioned to a nighttime event. Sparkle and shape gave it a special flair. Looks better in person than pictures
Was more sparkly than I expected. Very nice construction. Would be great closer to the holidays or evening out. A little loose in the waist but other than that great overall fit.

links_Review_Title: I bought it I loved it so much!
links_Review_Text: So flattering! Worked well for my narrow (no hips) frame. Great day to Night option.

links_Review_Title: Fit. Too much flair on the bottom, too long and too hip hugging. Just didn't work for me.
links_Review_Text: Snug around the hips, made booty a little too bootylicious for work so didn't wear.
Lovely fit and flare skirt. It is shimmery, which doesn't show in the picture. Nice for the office around the holidays. It has two little pockets sown to the front that I could've done without.

links_Review_Title: Great skirt! Sad it's didn't fit better.
links_Review_Text: Due to the seams a little tight across the hips and butt
I was surprised by how sparkly this skirt was.. I expected it to be more of a flat tweed (with the contrast being neutral threads, not metallic ones). Did not wear as it was too loud for work.

Loved everything about this skirt. I got so many compliments! My one complaint is that it is not super comfortable when sitting down but I got used to it as the day went on. Highly recommend. I will be renting again
Beautiful fabric with interesting details( pockets).

links_Review_Title: Pop of color, bright and fun
links_Review_Text: This dress was a 10, I received many compliments on the color, shape and cut of this dress. The dress itself felt comfortable to wear, the slit had to be minded a little bit didn't cause any issues. Highly recommend

This dress was so beautiful and versatile. I didn't know how formal the event would be so this shorter hemline made it easy to dress up or down. The gathering on one side sat perfectly to hide any tummy imperfections. The color was blood orange and stood out in a sea of red and maroon. One of my favorite rentals.
True to size
ran big

links_Review_Title: Very classy and high quality dress!
links_Review_Text: This dress hugged me in the right places and looked very classy! I am a 32b cup and top needed a little push up but otherwise was a beautiful dress!

links_Review_Title: The dress is lovely but it did not look that great on me.
links_Review_Text: Pros were the color. Cons were how it fit against my stomach.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful orange material. Thick fabric. Head turner.
links_Review_Text: Nice quality and sexy

links_Review_Title: Open back for work? On Zoom that's a yes.
links_Review_Text: Who knew zoom and virtual would mean I could wear the most ridiculous shit to work?! (Probably everyone?) anyway.... This dress was comfortable on a warm day, no stretch cotton was very breathable. It was edgy enough to make a statement on ZOOM, sexy enough to make a statement during an intimate SIP HAPPY HOUR. Try it! I loved that I could open the back for ventilation and sex appeal as needed!

This jumpsuit is freaking fabulous!!! The material is AMAZING!!! It almost feels like a stretchy athletic material but is so nice and flattering. I think I could have sized down since it was so stretchy. The neckline is amazing and I got tons of compliments. Would def buy if it wasn't so expensive
Sexy and fun but the fit was a bit off. Really wish it fit better because I loved the top cut of the neckline. Also its very revealing in the bust area.
This jumpsuit is amazing. It fit so well. I wore it for Valentine's Day dinner. I received so many compliments. It is also very comfortable and sleek.
I'm 5'3 /130lbs /34D - I wore a 42L -(42R was unavailable) size wise, fit was good, obviously it was too long but some temp hem tape did the trick. Also gives you a nice subtle cleavage
Absolutely loved this jumpsuit. It was so comfortable and super chic. Will def rent this again.

I got a ton of compliments wearing this one. Overall very sexy but chic. The torso was a little short on me- if I pulled it down it showed too much cleavage so it was a balancing act all night. Length was perfect with heels.
Rented this for a solstice party. It was fun and I got a got a ton of compliments. It was surprisingly comfortable except I was very self conscious about the cleavage.
Wore this for a night on the town for 2 milestone birthdays. Looked and felt great! Was sad to send it back.

links_Review_Title: The most comfortable formal outfit EVER!!
