links_Review_Text: Such an amazing pantsuit. I felt like I was wearing my yoga leggings because it is stretchy and thick. I don't think you could find a more comfortable formal outfit. It even has pockets!! So many compliments!! Rent it, you won't be sorry!
Super comfortable jump suit, that you can dress up or wear more casual/party.

Wow. Fit like a glove. I ended wearing a red jump suit to the Christmas party instead, but it was a close call. The material feels like a soft wetsuit. It is very flattering. And the pockets!! It was just a little more boob-a-licious for this party than I wanted. But I will DEFINITELY rent again for another night out. Love! The bracelet is from RTR as well. The necklace is mine.

This jumpsuit was an absolute dream. My company holiday party was on a Thursday and I can't imagine a better garment to wear to work and then straight to party (note: it wasn't exactly work appropriate, but oh well). I loved how it didn't have zippers - probably the only jumpsuit where I didn't dread going to the bathroom. I sized up so I would t have cameltoe - end result is that it was too big and I still had cameltoe, but it didn't even bother me.
Great outfit. I wore it to a rehearsal dinner for a wedding. I felt confident and comfortable in it. It's a very flattering and comfortable fit.

I absolutely loved this jumpsuit! It fits like a glove and I felt so elegant all evening. I got a ton of compliments. I did wear spanx to make sure everything was in place. I am 5'5" and wore 4" heels. I am 150 lbs right now (baby weight) and wore the equivalent of a 10. The pockets were a great touch. it runs very true to size. Rent it! You won't regret it!

links_Review_Title: Comfort and fabulous all in one!
links_Review_Text: This was my all time favorite rental! The material is amazing. It is so flattering and comfortable. You could wear it all day and night. I didn't wear a bra and had no problems with it not staying put. I went with the 38L because I wore taller stiletto heels. It was the perfect length (I'm 5'6"). Wish I could own this fabulous outfit!!

links_Review_Title: Heck yes! Rent this and feel amazing all night!
links_Review_Text: This fit like a glove and was super comfortable. I'm 5'4" and the 4R length fit perfectly with 2.5-3 inch heels. Heads were turning all night! My husband knows my wardrobe is RTR so when he took one look at me and asked "do you own that?" I knew I looked good.

This jumpsuit is made out of super stretchy material. There's no zipper or buttons and you just pull it up. I rented the equivalent of a US size 8 and it was true to size, however, it was extremely long. I had to use fabric tape to shorten it up about 5 inches at the hem. It worked great and I got tons of compliments.

This jumpsuit is incredibly comfortable and stretchy although it looks expensive and structured. I was comfortable in it and also love how it looked. I'm tall- 5 ft 9 and was wanting this to be longer since i hat 4 inch heels. It worked but didn't hit the ground. I had this in a larger size and it didn't look great. It definitely needs to be fitted. Great for an event! If you are super busty this might not work for you!

I absolutely loved this jumper! I rented it for a fundraiser and wedding and loved it. It fit perfectly, stretchy material that is very forgiving. I added spanx to help control my midsection. Seriously it was so comfortable and I felt so sexy. It even gave me a thigh gap lol!! You won't regret this rental I promise

I can't rave about this jumpsuit enough!!! It for like a glove, was comfortable, and had just enough sex appeal. I wore to an outdoor wedding and got compliments all night. Rent this jumpsuit! You'll LOVE it!

Quality of material is amazing very forgiving and flattering especially for full bottom girls like myself. I am 153lbs only 5'3. Bottom heavy and small waist. FYI. This is a jumpsuit you pull it on, no zippers. Love love love this outfit and it has pockets. So many compliments, I will rent this again

I wore this fabulous jumpsuit to a champagne event and received lots of compliments all night long. Pros: the thick material hugs all the right curves and is very forgiving. Cons: the length is very long even though I ordered a Regular. I used double sided fabric tape and paired it with high heels. Also, there's a weird seam at the torso that makes the jumpsuit bunch up.
So comfortable! Stretchy and flattering. Felt really good wearing it.

links_Review_Title: The outfit smelled awful out of the bag. I didn’t realize I would need to step into the outfit.
links_Review_Text: The material is stretchy and thick. This quality is good a person who has hips...like myself. The front was too loose and left a sagging look in front by my belly. That was not cute at all. It probably looks good on a person who is very thin and tall.
Gorgeous!!! Fit like a glove. Extremely sexy and surprisingly comfortable. My favorite RTR rental so far. I'm going to buy it.

links_Review_Title: Fabric and fit is spot on. Amazing!
links_Review_Text: Show stopper for sure! I'm 5'11 and wore 2.5 inch heals and was perfect length. I wore a 42 (size 6) and I usually wear a size 6 (150 pounds). My back up was a 40 (size 4) and while it fit it was about 1.5 inches shorter than size 6 and wouldn't have worked for heals. Make sure and wear a black strapless bra because some turns and bending over, the top gaps a bit, but not a big deal. The fabric is thick and hides all the body's imperfections. I will be renting this again!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for Bachelorette Party...except no zipper!
links_Review_Text: I wore this to my friend's bachelorette party. I am a bridesmaid and we were all instructed to wear black. I have been wanting to try a jumpsuit and the cut out at the chest was super sexy, but not too much since everything was covered. I had to wear the larger of the two sizes I got because you have to really shimmy it on since there are no zippers. I got a ton of compliments throughout the night! Only downside is that with no zippers, bathrooms visits took a while so watch your drinking!

links_Review_Title: Worn for photoshoot. So amazing, fits like a GLOVE, tight and flattering!
links_Review_Text: The best black jumper ever if you want to show off your figure

I absolutely love this jumpsuit! It's a thicker stretchy fabric and is super flattering. I am 5'6" and wore the regular length with a pointy flat. It was too short for heels, but that was fine because I was on my feet all night. I am considering renting it again for another event I have coming up.

You won't be sorry - this lovely stunner works all the perfect angles and oh by the way POCKETS!!!! I needed to size down but it still looked great. Hubs loved how it looked for our anniversary dinner!

links_Review_Title: The fabric is forgiving. The pockets are convenient.
links_Review_Text: Con: can be tricky getting your arms in
perfect for date night. the slit is eye-catching. perfect black jumper paired with red accessories = trendy and sexy. it is long but simply used cloth tape to adjust length to my height.
This is an easy A. An easy fit, lots of compliments great fabric.

I rented this for a bachelorette party. Its very sexy and elegant! It's made with thick material that is comfortable and very forgiving. I recommend it to anyone! I would normally not rent a Long size, but with heels, it fit just fine.

links_Review_Title: I felt so beautiful in this!
links_Review_Text: It is such a flattering jumpsuit. I felt beautiful in it, and received so many compliments. The only negative is that the arms are a bit restricted. If a woman had bigger arms, it might feel tight across the top. I usually wear a 12, but ordered in a 14 long. I'm glad I did. It fit perfectly.

links_Review_Title: Rent this miracle suit! I had it on for over 12 hours and I felt like $1 million the entire time.
links_Review_Text: Fit was on point! I am 5'7" and I wore the 44L. Used hem tape for the length & had plenty of fabric to work with. So comfortable. It is constructed so beautifully - absolutely the most flattering cut of any garment I've had on. It stretches! It has pockets! It holds you in and holds you in place. I had it on for 12 hours (including a flight home) and never it was perfection the entire time.
This designer gets a gold medal from me for comfort and overall sexiness and flattering fit!

The jumpsuit fit like a glove!! It was comfortable, never felt snug AND it has pockets!! I've rented this twice, and will again! #TheMoreYouKnow #onedayORdayone #ChooseYourHard #HealthCoachLivin #HealthyMommaHappyMomma #HabitsOfHealth #Convention2019
Wore this on my birthday trip and absolutely loved it. It just pulls on, no zipper, and is so comfy! The little chest slit is just sexy enough.
This dress was darling and different. Worked well with a bump, comfy and flattering. Fabric wasn't as luxe as I thought it would be, more of a daytime look.
So cute and comfortable and perfect for my friends baby shower! The pockets stuck out a bit but I steamed them down and it was OK. We're be great for vacation!
I rented this dress a couple times in the summer and absolutely loved it. The best thing about it is it is super lightweight and breathes well for hot summer days. Perfect vacation dress, too.

links_Review_Title: So cute but need c cup or less
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress/pattern - and there were no larger chested people who had tried it so I took a chance - as you can see - did not work out so well. Super roomy and forgiving everywhere but obviously wouldn't work for me.
This definitely has a lot of fabric and runs large, even well into my second trimester. It was still really pretty and comfortable for a hot summer day -- would rent again.
Great summer dress. A little low cut but made it work

links_Review_Title: Too low cut and big in the chest to wear
links_Review_Text: My bra was hanging out so I couldn't wear. Dress was too low cut and too big in the chest. Otherwise a comfortable sun dress. Probably not the most flattering fit-wise?
The color and fabric is beautiful and the light cotton is so comfy to wear. Perfect sightseeing dress!
Runs large, looked frumpy. Didn't feel comfortable wearing it.
I read other reviews and sized down from my usual M to a S. I am very glad that I did. The bust on the dress is a little wide and the M would have definitely gaped on me. The S was perfect!
Top gaps If you are small chested. Otherwise fabulous dress. Runs big

Wore this for a busy Sunday running errands and meeting up with friends - It was perfect to be comfortable but also able to sit down to a nice lunch after. I thought it ran a little larger for a Medium but it's intended to be flowy, and I preferred it to be comfortable.
Easy maxi dress and flattering
Worked well with a Jean jacket over it for fall
LOVED this dress, wore it so many times and got so many compliments! Was very comfortable, able to wear without a bra

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress, and got so many complements
links_Review_Text: Slightly large in the chest area, but wasn't an issue
Too big

links_Review_Title: Size up, but it will be big in the chest
links_Review_Text: I read the reviews and sized up because i have a wide rib cage, but the rest of it was definitely baggy. Regardless it's extremely comfortable, but definitely not a formal dress. I'd just throw it on and go.
The dress was too big. I should have gone with a med.
Wanted to love this, but it was way too boob-y. Tried layering a cami, but it wasn't great. Wore once on a Saturday with a jean jacket over it.

links_Review_Title: beautiful dress, color and print was amazing
links_Review_Text: was a big big on the sides and the cleavage, otherwise it was a great dress

I loved the color and print and I liked how light the fabric felt. The only downside for me was how low the plunge is on the front I tried to pin it but it still felt like my boons would fall out of the dress. Still loved the look might be better to wear under a bathing suit for the beach.

I rented this b/c I'm 6 months pregnant and thought I should size up but I really didn't need to. It runs large, is lower cut as well so the large was huge on me and made me look even bigger. Returning asap!

links_Review_Title: Lovely pattern, not the most flattering fit.
links_Review_Text: Was loose around the bust- I had to pin it for it to be acceptable to wear to work.

links_Review_Title: Cute but runs big. Rented during 3rd trimester and thought all the ruffles weren't flattering.
links_Review_Text: Cute dress but runs large, even at 25 weeks pregnant. Would rent again in an xs
Loved this dress but ran SO large. I got my normal medium and I was swimming in it. I just ordered a small and think it will be perfect. If you are on the fence, go with your smaller size!
I wanted to love this dress but if you're hour glass shaped make sure you size down! It was so baggy on me. I didn't love the fabric either to be honest, it felt and looked cheap.
Great fit across the chest (I'm a DD cup)

links_Review_Title: Love. But low cut and low in back. I just pulled my bra down.
links_Review_Text: Kind o shear too. Nude spanks work.

links_Review_Title: I felt super girly in this it's super lightweight so it was perfect for Vegas weather

links_Review_Text: The dress was adorable but is quite short. I just had to be very careful with how I moved around

Absolutely stunning on & extremely flattering in all the right places! The only minor complaint I had was that my bra kept peeping out, but that's an issue that could easily have been fixed with some fashion tape. Absolutely loved this dress!

Brought on vacation and wore for date night. Really pretty details, puff shoulder sleeves, more pink than it looks in the RTR photos. Shortish but not offensively so. Loved! Will rent again for a wedding shower next year

Fave item I rented so far! Super cute light floral dress with slight puffy sleeves. Loved the deep v neck too. Back is lower cut so a bra would show a bit, but I didn't mind. The button detailing on the back was ahhhmayyyzing

links_Review_Title: Did not want to take this dress off!
links_Review_Text: The fabric and all the little details are very cute. The open back is a nice contrast to how girly and frilly the dress is. The front is very low cut so I had to wear a tank top under it for a work event, but I was able to go without when I wore it for a day in the city

links_Review_Title: Beautiful details, a romantic and classy dress.
links_Review_Text: Loved the details in the dress from the stringed sleeves to the corset style and lace in the dress. I wore this for my 40th birthday and felt so good in this dress. Definitely recommend.
Nice for a warm weather date night. It is very low cut in both the front and the back. I loved the button details.
This dress is perfect for a warm-ish day out with friends. It was simple and cute and I loved the sleeves. The fabric is a little thin and easily wrinkled. Just make sure to hang it up!
A little booby, but super fun for a night out.

links_Review_Title: The fit is perfect! Definitely size up!
links_Review_Text: This dress hugs you at the right places. I wear a 6-8 but rented a large that fit just right. The cleavage is low but flattering and nothing a safety pin can't fix. Absolute favorite rental thus far.
This was the most dreamy floaty dress. I wore it without a bra and it was fine. I couldn't have felt more feminine!
Nice summer dress, not too short, very cute.
This dress is so cute and I got tons of compliments for it. Considered holding on to it for much longer!

links_Review_Title: I rented this for vacation and returned same day to rent another option
links_Review_Text: The back is low, so you can’t wear a bra, which I didn’t like. The dress is also really short- picture doesn’t really do justice for the length, but my bottom would be out on show if I bent over even just a little. I’m 5’6’’ 155 and could have worn a medium.
The fit was just right for me! I'm 5"3 -115 lbs a true size 2 any taller or more lbs it wouldn't feel comfortable.

The fit was true to size. Low cut for a lot of cleavage which gives a sexy for love and lemons vibe. The material seemed thin but it was actually perfect for a hot summer day spending the day with my boyfriend. Loved this dress so much I considered buying it! Only con was that if you Sot down the material wrinkles but hey nothing in life is perfect!
Very flattering dress and so perfect for a vacation in Florida! Shows a good amount of cleavage. Sort of sheer so I had to wear spandex!

This dress is so pretty and flattering. I wore it for my birthday with family. Probably not as great for girls with bigger boobs as the v neck if very spread, but it was perfect for a smaller chest. I ended up wearing it with a white lace bralette for more coverage and that looked great.

links_Review_Title: I love for love and lemons
links_Review_Text: It fit perfectly and was perfect for the occasion. The only issue was it was a bit loose in the bust area - but I was not wearing a bra and if I was it would have been fine.
Cute and summery dress - drawstrings make it a classic For Love & Lemons style. (Runs a little bit short like many dresses from this brand.)
Wore this to a baby shower and loved how cute and feminine it is! Would consider buying from RTR
Fits perfectly, not to short not to long just alittle boobie
Love love this dress. I will say the dress ran a bit large in the chest area...which is so rare for Love and Lemons!!
Could have been so sexy and summery. Unfortunately it was shear and far too short for my height.
Loved this dress!!!!
This brand always gets the fit perfect! I love this dress - wore it during the day with flat sandals and at night with heels. Easy to dress up or down.

This dress was perfect & so comfortable. I wore the size Small instead of the XS for the extra length. I have a small chest so the fabric was a little concerning when I slouched forward- but it made me aware of sitting straight. I loved everything about this dress and the print. Must rent for a date or fun day event!

links_Review_Title: Got a large because I read it ran a little small but could have done fine with a medium
links_Review_Text: loved it overall

Loved this dress! So easy and romantic, perfect for a summer wedding on the beach. Light, breathable fabric so was able to keep cool while dancing inside and had some extra comfort with the sleeves while outside on the beach at night. Paired great with a strappy sandal. Went with nipple covers for underneath and could have used tape but was ok for the night!
Wore this dress for a concert, it was perfect! It has very light and soft material. It the right length for me and I'm 5'2''. The colors are pretty and light pink.

links_Review_Title: I didn't wear, it was too big but I loved it!
links_Review_Text: I thought I could fit in a large but it was too big. So i think it's true to size because I am usually a medium. Very cute!

Loved this dress. I was unsure if it was going to fit me since I'm not too familiar with this brand but it fit like a glove. I didn't wear a bra with it and it worked fine but was a little lower cut than in the pictures. I'm short so no issues with the length. Overall great dress!

links_Review_Title: Wore this for my university graduation in Manhattan and for pictures in Central Park after.
links_Review_Text: Great fit. Love this dress, would buy.

Loved this dress but I had to wear shorts under it because it was very short. I didn't mind that too much except with the open back I didn't want to wear a bra but the fabric is see through so you had to. Overall Loved it but probably wouldn't rent again
great dress
great fit, cannot wear a bra though.
Got so many compliments!
Little loose on the top...I used a lace slip to cover up a little.

links_Review_Title: This dress amazing. Looks so unique
links_Review_Text: You can't wear a bra with this dress. I would suggest wearing it with pastys

Beautiful! And honestly, perfect for a petite frame. I am short, so I often find rentals to be too long but this one was perfect. With flats, it would have hit the floor in the back but with 3" heels, it was just above floor. It is definitely short in front so may not work for tall ladies. I wore no underwear with this dress. I think it will be difficult for me to find a dress I enjoy as much as I enjoyed wearing this one!
Great fit I'm 5'6 155lbs. 33in waist and large hips/behind. Fits amazingly!!! Sexy and flowing.
This dress fit like a glove. Unique look. Tons of compliments. Comfortable to wear and back is amazing.
This dress was comfortable and the length was perfect!

links_Review_Title: Fun, but SHORT for a tall girl
links_Review_Text: This wasn't jaw dropping but it was pretty, comfy, a little different, and overall nice. My biggest issue was that it was way too short in the front- borderline inappropriate. I'm 5'10" and I wore the XL and it barely covered my lady bits...
Didn't end up wearing this one but it's GORGEOUS. Fits true to size. Nice material, and comfortable! Very flattering.

links_Review_Title: Love! So unique and breezy for a warm weather party/event
links_Review_Text: I found this to be very unique and flattering. Quality of fabric isn't as high as some other Alexis brand stuff, and definitely requires ironing when you receive it. Nonetheless, awesome dress!

This dress makes such a statement, from the open back to the bright colours to the way the bottom sways when you walk. I'm 5'1", even with high heels it dragged ever so slightly, as to be expected. I was worried the straps would feel loose, but I was able to dance all night without the need for any tape or readjusting.

links_Review_Title: Great for short women! Order one size larger than you think
links_Review_Text: This dress is incredible!!! I am 5'3 and consider myself to have a narrow rib cage and needed a large. This dress is truly only sized off your ribs and height. The medium fit me in my rib case, but was way too short in the front if I was going to wear heels. You can get away with wearing flats and a medium, but if wearing heels- you need a large. I wish I could purchase it!
Absolutely loved this dress for a September wedding! Got so many compliments on the color and style. It's certainly a unique showstopper!

links_Review_Title: Originally rented for a wedding but arrived late so wore for a concert and date with my boyfriend
links_Review_Text: Fit was great and beautiful dress. Material was more rayon than silk or taffeta but really loved it! Tons of compliments!

This dress is beautiful!! It flows in every breeze, looks beautiful on, and is definitely an eye catcher. Two negatives: showed up suuuuper wrinkly -- it was hard to keep from creasing. It's also super short, so I opted for the larger size to get a bit more length in the front.

This is what my wedding guest dress dreams are made of! I felt amazing wearing this and got so many compliments. I sized up to a medium for a more flowy fit, but could have worn a small if the medium was not available. The dress flows behind when walking, and lays against your body in a flattering way when standing. The dress was worn to an outdoor California wedding with flats (the venue was rocky), but could be worn with nude heels for a more elegant feel. I'd also like to highlight Jesse from the RTR staff. Our flights from FL to CA were changed several times and Jesse ensured I received the dress on time. This last experience with RTR has deepened my appreciation for company.

I loved everything about this dress. Perfect for summer - I wore for a pre-wedding mixer in Italy and got some many compliments. The open back is amazing combined with the high neck in front. Materials is flowy and makes you feel like queen when walking. Didn't want to send it back but it's definitely one of those statement dresses that should only be worn once.

I rented this dress for a friends wedding this past August and it's 90% perfect. The color, the material and the cut are perfect. The only issue I had bc I have a short torso is that the top was a bit loose. The straps kept sliding off my shoulders (not super dramatically) but enough to make me uncomfortable. I received tons of compliments on it and loved dancing the night away in it! Super fun dress!

I was worried this was going to be too long for me but, surprised to find it wasn't. I'm 5'3", wore 3 inch heels and the back of the dress just grazed the floor. The material is really comfortable. The straps stay in place pretty well. I received many compliments on the dress. A must rent!
Color was even better than expected, flattering and different. Highly recommend.

This is absolutely beautiful on, the colors and fabric are amazing, and it's super comfortable to wear. Random people were complementing me all night. :) One thing to consider is that it is not as long in the back as I expected. Get the L if you want it to look like the model photo.
Went with the MR instead of the SR because the SR hugged a little at the hips. Dress was easy to wear all night and the back is great!
I only wore it once and had to turn it in for dry cleaning because water spotted the fabric. I love it tho its a classy sexy piece that can be casual or semi dressy.
The high low cut was too drastic and not flattering in the front. Beautiful color and print, wish I was able to wear.

I think I gained weight! Well, this dress is super cute. I am top heavy so it didn't look super cute on me and although yes, I've gained weight it was a little tight around the bust, but that's understandable. I love the back it's super sexy, but be ware! The skirt is short! Careful when you are getting out of cabs!

links_Review_Title: The perfect combination of classy meets sexy
links_Review_Text: Both the XS and S fit similarly up top, midsection is where you see the difference. I usually rent a 0 (xs) but per some other reviews rented a 2 (small) as a backup. The small fit more like on the model. I thought I would need fashion tape to keep the straps from falling, but the high neckline and cut of the dress made it so I didn't have to use the tape. The dress is incredibly light and was perfect for an October wedding in Mexico. My favorite rental to date!

I rented this dress for a "dressy cocktail event" and it was perfect! It fit well, TTS. It was a nice change from a little black dress. I am 5,6 and the front was a bit short, and the back blew up when walking so I needed a free hand to hold it down.
The design is gorgeous. Unfortunately, on me it was too much. On a taller girl it could be stunning. It seems to wear me instead of the other way around. Lots of leg, complete chest coverage.
This was stunning and flattering in every way!

links_Review_Title: This dress was amazing! So fun to wear and I received compliments throughout the night.
links_Review_Text: Top fit great, the bottom was a little long while barefoot but with heals it was perfect!

links_Review_Title: Loved the high-low and the flowy "train" on this dress!
links_Review_Text: Fit was true to size, even works well for short girls! I'm 5'2 and the back didn't drag with 4 inch heels on. I loved the flow when you walk in this dress - feels v glam. The front is pretty short so might be an issue with girls over 5'2. I was even able to wear this to work with a white blazer and it was appropriate. Big fan!

Wore this to an outdoor summer wedding. The hi/low was sexy but classy. The fabric looked expensive. The pattern and colors were beautiful in person. The straps are meant to hang a bit on your back, so I did find myself pulling the front back up to my collarbone throughout the night - but nothing obnoxious. I didn't have luck getting fashion tape to stick to the lining. Side boob was not an issue for me, but it was an initial concern I could see for someone with a larger chest.
This was such a fun top!
So cute
Have rented this several times in XS and S, and it's always a hit! Perfect with high waisted jeans or shorts.
I love this top! I wore it to a Friendsgiving and received so many compliments. It's so cute, especially paired with high waisted jeans as it is a crop. So fun and flirty. Definitely will rent again.
Runs small but it's just enough for a high-waisted jeans. Super cute and stylish. No need for a bra!
I love all for love and lemons shirts - always run small so I ordered a size up and fit perfectly. Got so many compliments on this one, I would definitely rent again
Cute but very short.
Loved it! Wore it with a high waisted skirt. Made me feel super feminine!
Loved this top. Definitely cropped so suggest wearing with high waisted pants. I felt really good in this top. Can wear the sleeves up or off the shoulders - cute either way!

links_Review_Title: Romantic FL and L Summer Cropped Blouse
links_Review_Text: Beautiful floral-printed summer crop top - one of their cutest blouses! lf small or medium were available at the time of my order, I would have selected one of those sizes - the extra material was ok, though, because the design is cinched at the waist anyways!

(My titles are my boyfriend's commentary on the items.) This top fit my larger chest quite well because it was ruched and turned out exactly as I envisioned l. I styled it with high waisted jeans and a white blazer one night and felt awesome. I wore the sleeves up but you could push them down for an off the shoulder thing if you wanted. Note for girls who always wear a bra (like me) that I had to go strapless on this one because the neckline is so square. Loved it, would rent again.
LOVED this top I don't want to send it back! Didn't have to wear a bra with it either (34C)
Such a cute top. I run small on top, but the medium was perfect. Cute and casual- but a stand out!

links_Review_Title: I feel so pretty in this top!
links_Review_Text: In fact, I just texted my mom those exact words. It's so pretty and feminine, and you don't need a bra. Easy to wear on- or off-shoulder. Don't pay attention to the S, M, L sizing, but go by the number. Im wearing an XL, which says 8-10, and I'm generally an 8 (sometimes 6) and would normally rent a M. Of course, it is stretchy. I love it because I'd never pay for it out of pocket!
It's very fitted , running to the small side ( but still comfortable). Lovely pattern and looks brand new .
Great on vacation and with high waisted jeans. So many compliments
Super cute top! Pairs great with high waisted loose jeans and little sandal heels. Thinking about buying

links_Review_Title: Wanted to love but did not
links_Review_Text: I have been looking at this top for almost a year and have wanted to buy it in the past. After renting it I am happy I did not because I didn't even end up wearing it on vacation. If you have bigger boobs it will cause the top to be incredibly cropped and it made me look kind of wide. Disappointed but happy I never pulled the trigger and put purchased. Prime example of why I love RTR

This shirt is adorable. If I felt more comfortable in cropped shirts, I would have worn it. Having a large bust made it especially cropped as much of the fabric in front was accounted for by my boobs. I sized up anticipating this some, but it was still an issue. If you love your mid-drift, go for it!
loved it
Perfect fit
Loved this top! Worked great with a strapless bra. So cute and girly.
fit great!
Looks so cute with a jean skirt and a pearl hair clip
This top was very flattering. I was looking forward to wearing it but due to unforeseen circumstances I didn't get the chance to. I'll probably rent it again.
Seems to run a bit short/small and seems way overpriced for what it is--that said, I felt casually pretty both times I wore this top!
Runs true to size and in great condition.
Adorable little crop top! Great with shorts or jeans.
This was the cutest shirt ever i loved it so much got so many compliments only weird thing was that you couldn't remove the tag otherwise adorable Shirt
Wore to my baby shower. It was such a sweet and pretty dress. Perfect for the occasion!
This was such a cute dress. It fit true to size and I got so many complements at work on this dress.
A little tight in the arms but I loved it!!! So pretty.

Loose through the body but quite fitted in the shoulders/chest/arms, so size based on those areas. Rather sheer - I wore it layered for winter with black tights and I added a nude jersey slip dress and a white long sleeve tee with a higher neck for both warmth and to get a seamless look underneath - if you wore light-colored tights you could probably do just a shirt or even no shirt at all. Very pretty.

I rented this for a party, but the weather was warm and I opted for something else. So, I wore this to work, and it was great!! I'm 24 weeks pregnant and it was perfect on my little baby bump. It was cool enough for late summer, but with long sleeves that were work appropriate. Everyone asked why I was all dressed up. The frills and light colors made me feel like a little doll. I loved it for maternity! I even considered purchasing it. Maybe later.

I love this dress- took off one star because it is sheer and needs a slip. Runs true to size- I'm usually a 4 and got the 6, but could've done the 4. So pretty and feminine. Love the length, fit and fabric.
So many compliments on this dress. The top is more sheer than anticipated but with a strapless bra works perfectly. Great for covering the bump.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress more than I thought!
links_Review_Text: This dress was kind of a random pick for me but I ended up loving it! It felt true to size - I usualll wear a 10 or 12 and the 12 fit great and was a little loose at the same time, which was what I wanted. I wore a slip underneath to make sure it wasn't see through, but if you don't have one I think you'll definitely want to wear nude underwear. So many compliments!
This dress is pretty adorable! 70's Twiggy vibe for my parent's 50th wedding anniversary. Had to wear a cami and slip so it wasn't too shear. Everyone loved it!
Loooved this dress. So many compliments. Very comfortable and surprisingly flattering. A little tight on the arms but other wise great fit. The colors are perfect for summer.

Wore to my nursing school pinning ceremony. I unfortunately ended up in a boot & on crutches 2 days prior to the ceremony but the dress was absolutely perfect! So comfortable and flowy! Definitely not the most figure-flattering, but such a cute and fun dress!!!

links_Review_Title: Felt like a princess at work
links_Review_Text: I absolutely loved loved loved this dress! I received endless compliments all day long. The dress is light. The colors on this dress were very complimentary.
Such a fun easy dress to wear and I received so many compliments. I wore it at The Charleston Food and Wine festival
Beautiful fun dress, lots of compliments, this is one I hated returning!

I was on the fence when I rented this dress because I worried it would look childish, but it ended up being very cute. I wore it to fashion week and got lots of compliments. The colors are even more lovely in person and the dress is to comfortable. It's feels like s nightgown.
Wore multiple times with a jean jacket or dresses up with a blazer for work. Loved this for an easy maternity look.
Great Dress, Easy to wear, spent the day sightseeing in Barcelona in it

I loved this dress. Got a million compliments. Wore it to work on a Friday then straight to happy hour after and it was absolutely perfect for both occasions. I loved it flowy but I wanted to make it a bit more fitted so I threw on a belt. It looked amazing both ways! I would definitely wear it to a fancier event too so it kinda hits all targets!

links_Review_Title: Loved! Perfect for a baby shower.
links_Review_Text: Originally tried the 4 but the chest was tight. 6 was perfect, flowy and got so many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Made me feel like fancy candy!
links_Review_Text: Love this dress! It's such a sweet dress that could easily go from day to night!
Absolutely adored this dress and the soft vibes. I paired with black accessories to toughen it up a bit. Fit like a glove.

I rented this with Unlimited and wore it to my future SIL's bridal shower. I received endless compliments on this! It is loose and swingy - perfect for twirling... and eating! It runs slightly large, but the shape of it is loose fitting so it works. I wore it with a high bun, and light blue heels. Rent this; you'll love it!

I love this trendy dress by Cynthia Rowley. Running true to size with loose fabric. I recommend wearing your true size for your primary and sizing up for your back up. This style is loose though out the midsection and roomy at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this dress. At 5ft, the length hit mid thigh on me. This dress is the definition of fun. Pair with heel and hand bag.

links_Review_Title: Everything about this dress is to die for! It's so flattering!!
links_Review_Text: The fit is perfection! I was about 5 months pregnant and this dress was so perfect for the bump. The fabric and print are stunning and great for any occasion!
Appropriate length to wear to work, and my office is always freezing so I loved the long sleeves. The ruffles are very feminine and the flow hides any tummy troubles.
I didn't have the right slip so I couldn't wear it but it was so cute
Made me look bigger. Too short. Too youthful. Looked like a curtain. Lovely colors.

Love the sintle himts of color and the flow of this dress. Being curvier on the bottom half, I knew to size down so that it wasn't too wide. Even then, I threw a belt on it to help bring the waistline in.
So comfortable and my favorite rental to date!
Very pretty and comfortable.
I wore this to a pastel themed day at work. Perfect!
I loved this! Would totally rent again. So feminine, lightweight, and pretty. Received tons of compliments. Fits true to size.

links_Review_Title: I wore this for my bridal shower, it was a hit!
links_Review_Text: I wore a size 4 and it was loose (as it should be) and super comfy. I didn't want to wear white and this was the perfect dress for me. Highly recommended!

Absolutely loved this dress, I had to buy it. I ordered the 6 but probably would have been okay with my normal size 4, too. Really cute print, nice fabric and great dress length and sleeve length. I was worried this may be too big / I'd get lost in it because I'm petite but it fit well. I received many compliments and look forward to wearing again! Very beautiful.

I wish I had a picture but I paired this with a black leather jacket and heels and really liked the look. My only issue was that the ruffle fell right on my 36-week bump so it made me look even bigger. But I would definitely rent this again.

Loved this dress on the hanger but it didn't work on my body. Too much fabric, maybe to sweet looking, also it was transparent even though it has a liner. I think it might look great on someone taller. Still love the look and colors though.
Was very excited for this dress! However it is very large and did not work for me.
Absolutely love this babydoll dress. Seriously considering buying it... will definitely rent again.
Very fun and flirty while still being modest. I wore this dress for a Monday at work and also to a brunch on Saturday, just changed the shoes! I will definitely rent this dress again!
very feminine and flowy. tight and a bit uncomfortable around the neck though.

Like this a lot. Thought it might not be the greatest since it's so inexpensive. But I thought it hung really nicely. S looked cute! I work it to work with a jacket over it since it's low in the back. It's winter and I work that and boots. I could see it be a REALLY great summer dress.

links_Review_Title: Didn't end up wearing; not the right fit for my body type.
links_Review_Text: I wanted to love this; it looked so cute on the model! I didn't end up wearing this one. Dress runs slightly large overall, but the reason I didn't like it was because of how it fit up top. I wish I'd taken a photo, because it's kind of hard to describe. It was super baggy up top, and appeared to just kind of hang off of my body - not ideal with a straight neckline and elastic waist - it kind of just looked like I was wearing a sack. That being said, I may have just needed an XS versus my usual size S. The fabric was beautiful though - great drape and no wrinkling. Wish I had time to order and wait for a size XS before my event! Probably ideal for someone with larger breasts since there is plenty of room up top. The modesty factor & coverage is also very good if that's what you're going for.

I love that the back feels sort of low cut, but wasn't able to wear a bra. Loved the way the dress looked in the front, but the back bow was really hard to tie on my own because the fabric is only black on one side - so you have to tie the bow just right in order for it to not look inside out. Overall, really cute. I normally wear a S and the M was perfect.

links_Review_Title: The prettiest, sexiest, sequin top I have ever worn! Would definitely rent again.
links_Review_Text: Glamorous and fit perfectly!
Easy to dress up or down. The length came right to my high waisted jeans. Comfortable considering all the sequins. Definitely would recommend

links_Review_Title: Perfect to dress up or down
links_Review_Text: Loved this top. You can dress up or down and wear it for different occasions. Great for any age! Wore it with a leather skirt and it looked awesome. Compliments guaranteed!!!

Loved it! Great fit. I’m a 34 A and even though it’s pretty low cut, it was still very flattering. I had tried a medium before but the sleeves were very big/wide for my arms. This one was just right. Wore these with high wasted black pants.

Wore this to dinner on my 30th birthday. I wanted something sparkly but not over the top, since it was a casual dinner, and this worked well. It's very comfortable and lined well - not scratchy on the arms - but it is pretty solidly cropped above the belly button. It was also a little strange to tie. Would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Favorite top! Perfect for the holiday season

links_Review_Text: Lined well so it's not really scratchy. Runs true to size. Perfect amount of sparkly. Doesn't look tacky
Really cute, high quality top but it's definitely a crop top! Loved it but I didn't wear it because it was too small for me in the bust and arms.
I wore this to a concert. I don't like to bare stomach, but was able to wear with high waisted jeans. It fit great and was a cute, fun top.

I loved this top! The color is rich and gorgeous, fabric elegant and was super flattering. I received many compliments. It did run a little bit loose but not making it too big more like making it very comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Great for a party or a night out, but wrinkles easily.
links_Review_Text: I wore these with latex pants. Can really go with any bottom. The only downside is that it is silk and wrinkles easy. I wore it in the car for 45 minutes and had to iron it when I got to my destination. Also stains easily. I gave it 5 stars bc I love the way it looks and feels on and is high quality material.
Favorite top ever

This dress was perfect for my mother in laws big birthday party. The crowd was young and old and I received compliments from everyone on my dress. There is some structure to the rib cage area which keeps the dress looking nice and staying in place all night. Definitely a major style night
The perfect #cocktail dress! So flattering, a strapless with great structure and did not have to constantly pull up at the busy! The print is #sexy but #classy because the length is modest!
I rarely wear animal print but this dress gave me the edge I wanted for my 30th birthday. Very flattering cut and got tons of compliments. Highly recommend!
Perfect way to wear this seasons animal print trend. The material is nice, it holds you in and does not slip. The longer length tames down the print so that it doesn't feel dated or tacky.

the fabric fits like a glove but it doesn't have much give, almost made it hard to get into a car! but overall amazing dress, perfect rental bc it's such a statement. fits pretty true to size and has great support, no need for a bra!

I am 5'8 and 122lbs and this dress hugged my waist perfectly. A lot of the time RTR strapless dresses are stretched out in the bust for women more well endowed than I, but this one was perfect for my flat chest and waist, but had enough give for my hips and butt to fit too. If you're on the thinner side looking for a body con that won't be baggy up top, this is your dress.

links_Review_Title: Being able to wear something I would have never purchased due to price. Felt like a million dollars
links_Review_Text: The fit was great. The little straps for hangers though were annoying. If i owned I would have cut them out. I had to keep tucking them in. But overall i loves it and got many compliments on it! ❤️❤️❤️

links_Review_Title: Pretty dress but it wasn't as fitted as I'd hope.
links_Review_Text: So many compliments for a fall rehearsal dinner. The fabric and quality of the dress are gorgeous but it was a little bigger than I thought it would be as I'm usually torn between a 0 and 2 in this brand. The extra fabric would bunch a bit but not enough of an issue to not wear it. Also at 5'4 with 4 inch pumps, it still fell before the knee which made it classy.

links_Review_Title: Sizing was all off, fabric felt cheap.
links_Review_Text: It was stretched out (or simply way too big) on the bust - for reference I'm a 34-36DD. this never would've stayed up all night at a wedding I'd be the girl tugging up my dress which is my ultimate pet peeve. The body was not cut for curves, would be great if you're busty and athletically built. I'm 5'10 the length was perfect but the body was uncomfortably tight on my hips and butt. Not a great look overall I chose not to wear it.

links_Review_Title: Way too tight - runs a full size too small
links_Review_Text: Really wanted to love it, but I could not zip it up at all. I have worn other, similar dresses from this same designer without the same issue. Definitely size up.
Wasn't great for my body type, but it was fun and cute
Top wouldn't stay up, not flattering on me.
Perfect form fitting strapless dress. Fun print and great fit. The bust area fits well with no worry of slipping down. Highly recommend for a cute date night or party dress!

I rented this just to throw in my bag for an easy option on my bachelorette party to Vegas! I thought it was really cute, it definitely ran small by at least one size as I would usually wear a 4 or six and 8 fit great. It is not at all my most favorite thing that I ever wore, but the patterns are fun! Good for unlimited rental.

Loved this skirt. I'm usually a 4 or 6 but rented the 6 for length (I'm 5'8") and it fit like a glove. No stretch so if you're between sizes I say go up. Could have dressed up more or dressed down with sneakers. Great rental!

links_Review_Title: Perfect fit! So many compliments. Different print was so fun!

links_Review_Text: I loved this skirt, I wore to a premier and it was the perfect dressy item without being too fancy. I loved that with the leopard it is trendy but the color makes it super unique. Fit true to size I had enough room I didn't feel like I was suffocating.
Absolutely loved this and my husband liked it even more. Super sexy. Very comfortable. Loved wearing it. Just a warning it is very short when you are sitting.

Got a lot of compliments on the skirt. Fun skirt to wear for any occasion. I wore it to work. Wish I had a 80s rock tee to wear with it , But I didn't so I wore it with my poodle tee. Don't mind my white legs. 😝

links_Review_Title: Fun outfit. Can be dressed up or down
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size. Really fun to wear.

I wore this skirt on a trip to Mexico. It's a fun pattern and an interest cut that makes it sexy! It traveled well in the luggage with no wrinkles. It was a bit shorter than I would normally wear. I did have to pull it down throughout the night. I would wear it again but probably size up to see if this would decrease the ridding up.
Loved this skirt! Fit great! The length was perfect for me - I'm 5'8. Very versatile - can style it casual to dressy. I'll definitely be renting again!
Rented this for Ole Miss game day and got stopped by SO many people in the Grove to compliment me! Ran a little large but made it work
Wore for a Lizzo concert and I felt 100% good as hell channeling my inner diva in this all night
Great little skirt. I opted for a little sexier look with a bodysuit. Love it
I love this fun flirty skirt. Can wear for work with tights or sexy it up for a night out!

links_Review_Title: Too much fun not to wear
links_Review_Text: Really the color blocked print and the ruffle make this a fun unique piece. Definitely felt sexy without having to show a lot of skin. Excellent choice for a fun night out.
Wore this to a party brunch and dressed it down with a plain T-shirt and booties. Fit well overall. Material is super soft and the skirt is super comfy. Would definitely recommend

links_Review_Title: Fun piece for a night out!
links_Review_Text: Fit was perfect.
The print is stunning, it's very fun piece to wear, I toned it down and made it more modern by pairing it with platform boots. Skirt has a little stretch to it, and it's very lightweight.
I normally wear an 8 and took a 10 in this skirt. As long as you are standing it's great but it does ride up while sitting.
So flattering! Works for day and night! Even easy to wear while baby is around
Im super curvvy and it was a bit snug so the skirt kept twisting around but the look was so cute!

links_Review_Title: Super cute for night out with girls!
links_Review_Text: This skirt is short and runs on the smaller side. I loved the contrasting colors!

This skirt is so amazing. Got many compliments. I got a size 10 because it was the only size available in the store. So I paired it with a red belt. But it should run true to size or a little small if I had ordered my normal 6/8.

links_Review_Title: Best for petites or long and lanky.
links_Review_Text: It fit, but...

This skirt was super flattering and a total show stopper. Paired with a simple black bodysuit, I'm 5'7 so it was on the shorter side but still totally acceptable. Ended up deciding to purchase because it was just too good!

links_Review_Title: Not great for small hourglass figures
links_Review_Text: The skirt is very cute however was really large on my waist - dont recommend for hourglass figures
it fits really cute
Love the colors but it does not have slimmer fit to the waste. I have small waste so the skirt kind of sits on hips.

links_Review_Title: Versatile, Dress up or more casual
links_Review_Text: I’m an athletic curvy size 2. It fit snug and a bit short for me, but I love with heels and a sexy sweater or blouse, or dress down with a tank or tee and ankle boots or flat sandals.
How fun is this pattern! It fits very well and is very comfortable. Will be renting it again.
It is so stretchy and fun. Got tons of compliments.
Very hip and stylish skirt. I could have gone down one size.

links_Review_Title: Super cute design, got a lot of compliments on it.
links_Review_Text: The fit was good but I did have a lot of issued with the lining of the skirt hiking up while I was walking. It was literally impossible to keep it down haha. Maybe because I'm in NYer and I walk a lot... IDK. Got to be a bit annoying after a while.

links_Review_Title: Not too ~sexy~ for work! Just sexy enough with tights.
links_Review_Text: This skirt is EVERYTHING. If it wasn't so expensive, I would buy it. I wanted to try something out of my/the ordinary, and I was blown away by this skirt. As was my bf. It's so flattering and funky and fun. Would be perfect for a girls night out as the other reviews mention. Do not hesitate. RENT THIS! 100% I am renting again.
Cute skirt. Short and form fitting. Best worn with tights

links_Review_Title: Wore to a concert- was perfect!
links_Review_Text: Comfortable sexy and so cute- wanted to keep but didn't
I would rent again, if not buy! I wore the dress slightly tilted to the side because it gave the animal print more "flaire" but I loved it. I;m 5'8 so it was a litte short on me, but it was gorgeous.
I'm curvy so it fit great across the hips but was big in the waist.
This skirt is so great! I wore it to a NBA game with a jean jacket and flats and got so many compliments. Great length and super comfortable material. Would definitely rent again!
Nice fit, and just long enough on me (5'4) , the ruffle on the skirt and the split pattern is super flattering!
Fits a little tight and short. Will have to wear with black tights.
Loved this dress for a spring wedding! It was comfortable, allowed for dancing, and was so feminine. I had so many compliments and I felt really beautiful. Highly recommend!

The 10 was a bit tight in the rib cage and was difficult to sit in. I wish I ordered a 12. If you are shy about cleavage showing, skip this dress. I could wear a regular bra. The length was perfect for my height of 5’9. But overall I got a ton of compliments and felt very confident.

links_Review_Title: My favorite dress! Received so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for a Valentine's wedding brunch for the bridesmaids! I loved everything about it and the details were even more beautiful in person. It also can be worn with or without a bra!

links_Review_Title: Ruffles and cuteness, totally flattering and very comfortable.
links_Review_Text: Fits slightly small - I’m typically an 8 and while the 8 fit, the 10 was comfortable. You can wear black or navy shoes with it and the color was gorgeous. Ruffles hid all of the problem areas Gaps a little bit when sitting in the chest, but otherwise lovely and I got so many complements. Perfect dress for a wedding or spring / summer event.

This dress is beautiful! I am not normally a ruffles person-I went out of my comfort zone to try this dress and am so glad I did. They make this dress flow when you move and it's very light. I wore it in the winter so I threw a cardigan over it-would be a perfect summer dress. It is higher in the front and longer in the back- I'm 5'4" and the back was about half an inch from the ground without shoes. Be warned-It is very booby-I'm 34dd and it was all cleavage! I wore with a bralette for modesty.
Dress fit a little tight but was beautiful nonetheless. Deep plunge line FYI that favors a larger chest.
I wore this dress to my brother's wedding and had a lot of compliments! I had to pin it up though because it was very revealing!

links_Review_Title: Felt like a princess! Flirty, feminine, comfortable dress.
links_Review_Text: Fit was snug. Really flattering cut for those who aren't as curvy because the ruffles give you some shape.

As soon as I saw this dress, I knew it was the perfect choice for an outdoor wedding in Barcelona in late August. It was even prettier in person, very flattering, light, and easy to enjoy a night of dinner and dancing in. For me, it was a tiny bit big on top, but nothing too inconvenient. Would definitely rent again.
Dress fit well. Maybe not the best for those with large bust as it was snug on me and I am a B cup though it did house my broad shoulders nicely

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a spring/summer wedding.
links_Review_Text: This dress is gorgeous and very flattering. There are a lot of beautiful details on this dress - the additional stitching of flowers on the fabric, how the ruffles laid, and the added belt really add to this dress. The size was pretty true to size and I felt comfortable in it the entire day.

I wore this dress to a wedding and got several compliments on how beautiful it was. It fit true to size and was very comfortable. Really pretty color and great length for black tie optional (long enough but not too long where I was tripping on it while dancing). Would rent again in a heartbeat.
Perfect for a warm evening. Pretty and great for women who are smaller on top.

links_Review_Title: Flowy beautiful dress. Perfect for a beach wedding.
links_Review_Text: I really liked this dress. It fit well and it was easy to move around in. A very beautiful dress.

OBSESSED with this dress! I wore this to a semi-formal wedding and was so happy with it. The ribbon highlights your waist in a very flattering way and the ruffles were a fun element for the dance floor. If you have a larger chest, there will be some cleavage but I still found it to be classy and elegant. It has blue in it but since it was pretty dark (close to black) I chose to pair with some black heels.
Very flattering dress, great length, and most importantly, easy to dance in!
Beautiful dress, runs small

This was the perfect dress for the Tonys - just the right amount of chic & glam, with the ruffle layers giving it a pop of fun. The quality was amazing and everything I could have hoped for. Highly recommend!

I ordered a 6R knowing it might be large but my sizes (4R) wasn't available with the RTR Unlimited program at the time. I got this for our spring family photo shoot, during Easter time. It ended up fitting perfectly and comfortably once I pinned the shoulder areas up. Would rent my size or this size again if needed.

the fit of the dress was great... i am usually a 10 but am 4month pregnant so i had to go up a size to accommodate my little bump. the only issue i found is the neck like is a little loose so i had to pin the back top to make it fit my chest better. Wouldn't recommend for anyone with a large chest unless you want to use a good amount of tap to hold the girls up.

I'm on the shorter side, but the ankle-grazing length was great! I didn't wear a bra with the deep v cut, but it wasn't noticeable. This dress would look amazing on someone with a larger chest to show off!
This dress fit me perfectly. It was fun and different and I got tons of compliments - from friends & strangers! Super fun & flirty dress.

links_Review_Title: Easy, flows dress, perfect for spring.
links_Review_Text: The size 2 cane with a big rip... thankfully the zero fit and the dress was sensational

links_Review_Title: Very pretty, feminine and figure-flattering dress. Perfect for spring/summer function.
links_Review_Text: The dress is very light and feminine. The ruffles/layers do a really good job hiding any stomach bumps. Perfect length too. One flaw for me was the top--it was too loose. The top might fit better for larger-chested people. I made it work with by wearing a lacy bra of a similar color, to make it look like it's part of the dress. But highly recommend this dress. Tons of compliments and people asking if I've lost weight (I didn't).

I'm typically a size 8 but I was 17 weeks pregnant so I ordered up and rented a 10 and 12. I went with the size 10 because the size 12 had a rip in the top layer of fabric along the side. The dress was really light and comfortable and the ruffles were really flattering. However by the end of the night the area right below my chest felt a little snug. Overall I would definitely rent this dress again!
Had to size up twice because the chest area runs small, otherwise I LOVED this dress. Wore it to a bridal shower & felt very comfortable all afternoon.

I loved wearing this dress! It is romantic and flattering. I am 5'2 and the length was perfect with heels. I am usually a size 0 but it was too tight in my rib cage. The 2 gaped a little in the bust but still fit very well. I seriously LOVED it.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for any spring occasion
links_Review_Text: This dress was one of my personal favorite rentals, ever. I received many compliments and felt like a million bucks! The only downside is I have a super tiny waist and wished I went with the 0R. This dress fit well and the length was perfect for my frame but the navy ribbon sat oddly on my waist line. The accent made me look a bit wider than i am as it is detailed to accentuate your waist but was a bit baggy on mine. Overall a great dress though!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a derby party. The compliments didnt stop all night! Felt absolutely beautiful.
links_Review_Text: Definitely felt true to size. But if you are bustier, it might expose more than you would like. I probably could have gotten away with no bra, but wore stick ons. The waist is quite fitted as well. I think I have a wider ribcage though. Pretty straight and narrow shaped. I would still wear again!
I loved the high waistline, fluttery sleeves and detail. Comfortable, lightweight.

links_Review_Title: It was a perfect dress for Easter!
links_Review_Text: Loved the dress; I felt it ran a little small on the top. I normally wear a 12 and this was a 14.

Loved the way this dress fit and I received so many compliments. It was very figure flattering but not constricting. I could easily pick up my kids and didn't have to worry about showing too much. As a bonus--no wrinkles after sitting and carrying kids around. Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: This dress is more beautiful in person than in pictures. I was the center of attention all night.
links_Review_Text: Fits great but the damn zipper is an odyssey to close. Once that is done, You are set to go.

The dress is a lovely light silk and the colors are great. It fit perfectly a little low cut in the chest - at the end of the day it was just too many ruffles for me! I was looking for a nice dress to wear to a wine tasting dinner for my bachelorette party and this just wasn't it and it wasn't really me.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, comfortable, and fit nicely!
links_Review_Text: True to size!
Don't size up!! This dress fits true to size, most likely...I ordered up to a 4 based on the reviews, but it was enormous on me! I'm going to switch it out for the 2 and see how that fits...
This dress is stunning and fits well. It's prettier in person and has a great flow to it

links_Review_Title: It was a gorgeous and very complimentary dress
links_Review_Text: It was fitted, but not tight and very flattering.
Comfy and cute for beach night dinner date! Love!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous if you're comfortable going braless
links_Review_Text: Rented the 12R and it fit and zipped easily without assistance. The bottom of the dress was incredibly fun and frilly while being forgiving and comfortable. The black band around the rib cage is snug but not too tight. I sent it back without wearing because the front is low, and I'm not comfortable going braless to a wedding where I know I will be drinking and dancing. I also didn't want to go buy a special bra or cutlets for the occasion. Wearing Veronica Beard Amal dress instead.

Wore this for a beach wedding in late November. The fabric was perfect for floating in the breeze and the length was great so I could easily walk with out tripping when my shoes were off on the sand. I paired this with a scarf/wrap and beaded clutch
A little low cut for me so I wore a cami underneath. Beautiful colors and just a great fitting dress.
Loved wearing this dress for my 50th birthday. Fit perfectly. Comfortable, beautiful dress.

links_Review_Title: Gave me curves where I don't have any!
links_Review_Text: Wore to my rehearsal dinner we and loved this dress! Form fitting but gave me some curves as I am very straight and narrow. Loved it!!

This dress is super flattering, really pretty and fun, and is extremely comfortable. I HIGHLY recommend it. The only thing I had to do was pin the straps because the top half of the dress was a little big on me, but once I pinned up the straps with two safety pins, it looked great.

Loved this dress! It fit so well and was extremely comfortable. Received many compliments through the night! I did not wear a bra with this but feel like I could have if I had a plunging strapless bra.

links_Review_Title: Perfect formal dress to dance in all night! So many compliments!
links_Review_Text: The dress was a little snug around the rib cage so I had probably should've gone a size up, but other than that the dress was PERFECT. The colors were amazing, the length was great for petites, and the fabric was so light and soft.

Loved this dress! Wore for a late September wedding. I normally don't wear dresses that are fitted over my stomach but this one was super flattering. Straps were a little long but nothing anyone but me would notice.
Unique. Well cut; used a cup insert with double sided tape and fit like a glove. Ruffles are super fun providing some movement on the dance floor. Lots of compliments.

links_Review_Title: OMG, this dress was perfect! Great fit, true to size, loved it!
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for my sister for Travers Day (mid summer Derby) in Saratoga Springs, NY which is a big dress-up day. Not as much as the Kentucky Derby but pretty close! I wore this dress with a hat, heel, big earrings... you get the idea. And it was perfect! Felt good all day: was comfortable and dress did not pull anywhere... Lots of compliments too. BTW, she's 5' 3" and weights 124 lbs. Bust size is 34C. Athletic body type.
Loved this dress. Very pretty and well made! It is very low cut. I ended up wearing the smaller size because the straps on the larger size were too long. I wore without a bra which is was fine.
Light weight silk, skims the body, very low cut, couldn't wear a bra. Gorgeous silk pattern in person, amazing dress overall!
Love this for any summer event, can be more formal or a summer dinner dress. very flattering, true to size. I would say the bust is a little big for me.
Wore this for my bros rehearsal Dinner. Runs small but was so pretty!
Gorgeous dress!
Rented this for a black tie optional wedding in Saratoga. Perfect fit, great quality, and super comfy!
Loved this dress. The fit was great, the shoulders were a little big I wish I could have tightened them a bit. Otherwise beautiful dress- I received so many compliments
This dress was super flattering and very comfortable. I received so many compliments! I highly recommend it for a summer wedding or any summer event!

links_Review_Title: so different from what I'd buy myself!
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! it's high quality and was in good condition. As others said, it's a bit tight in the chest. The black band under the bust doesn't offer any give. One size up wasn't available for my dates so I crossed my fingers and was pleasantly surprised. I probably would have still sized up if trying on in store, but once I was zipped up and moved around it was fine. The dress is flowy in the hips and thighs and was a great length for me.

This dress is high quality, great material and beautiful colors. Received so many compliments on the fit! Tight in the waist, forgiving in the hips but ran a little large in the chest. Not for small cups!
The dress fit perfectly! It was a very flattering style and I got so many compliments. Would definitely recommend for a wedding or more formal summer party.

I LOVED this dress so much. The fit was amazing and the dress is unique. The ruffles at the bottom make it flow so nicely. I wore this to a black tie optional wedding. Comfortable and beautiful dress that I hope to rent again!
This dress is light, airy and comfortable. The chest has LOTS of room, and you don't really need to wear a bra with it. Got a million compliments.
Light as a feather, fit like a glove, elegant and beautiful. I wish I could keep it!

Absolutely loved this gorgeous floral dress. Flattering fit, beautiful floral pattern and airy material. Perfect for an outdoor event in warm weather or paired with a light jacket or wrap. Received many compliments for the rehearsal dinner I wore it to. I am usually a size 4 and the 4 fit great. Would definitely rent again or purchase it.
Loved the fit of this dress. The straps were a little bit big for me but it worked fine for an art opening I was going to. Comfortable and great fit. I got lots of compliments!

Wow... take it out of the bag, zip it up, and look amazing... it should always be this simple, right? Fit like a dream, incredibly flattering and comfortable, the perfect balance of sweet and sexy. Looks like it will pack well, it is my top contender for a wedding in Italy this fall!
A bit tight in the ribs but overall good fit. Wore with sticky bra
Fit perfectly but definitely low cut if you are busty!
Beautiful dress that fits true to size and was perfect for a derby party! Will be renting this one again for sure!
Pretty dress, fits nicely. Only issue is bra straps show a bit unless you wear a strapless. Works for petites bc of length
this dress fit me like a glove and the pattern is beautiful in person. absolutely loved it! wore no bra, but could have done strapless.

I wore this to a spring wedding and it was the perfect choice. Got compliments all night and my fiancée loved it. The print and quality of the silk are a dream. I rented this in both an 8 and a 10, since Saloni usually runs small in the bust. I'm glad I got both, since though the 8 fit, the lack of structure in the chest kinda pushed the girls flat. I opted for the 10, which was a little too big on my waist/hips, but the ruffles and midi length balanced everything out, and I had plenty of room to dance, eat & drink in this dress. The straps also run a little long (even though I'm 5'11.5"!!). Despite those minor fit issues, the pattern and look of this dress was absolute perfection. This dress is exactly why I do RTR unlimited - rather than spend $700+ on a dress I'll wear maybe twice in one season (& would have spent even more on tailoring the straps/taking in the waist), I can just size up here as needed! I will definitely rent this one again.
Perfect fit and lightweight. I was in Palm Springs and felt great.

I loved this dress! It's very flattering with the v neckline and the ruffles with the floral pattern are very beautiful. I am a true 8 in dresses and I felt it was a little tight in the waist/rib cage area. I know this brand runs small so I ordered it in a 10. But it was big in the bust for me. I'm a 36C. Plenty of room in the hips and thigh areas.

links_Review_Title: Fit an athletic body like a glove!
links_Review_Text: I generally struggle to get a dress to fit top to bottom. This dress fit me everywhere! I couldn't believe it. I could lean over to talk without feeling like the top would reveal something d dance without fear of embarrassing moments.
Fit like a glove! Beautiful neckline and perfect length! Beautiful!!!
Amazing dress. Felt fantastic, lots of compliments, fits beautifully.
Great dress! Flattering and forgiving. Note there is a side zipper, I completely missed it the first time I put it on. Nice amount of sparkle without being overwhelming. My fiancé liked it too.

I wanted this so bad that I risked getting a size 10 when I wear a 12. The stretchy fabric allowed me to get in it. Cut low for full chested women but maybe wouldn't have shown so much cleavage if it was my size. Beautiful dress! Photo doesn't do it justice
Perfect dress for a wedding. Perfect for me - 55 years old. Fabulous for fit, fun and it was not a middle age lady dress -

links_Review_Title: Echoing previous reviews while this dress is bomb and gorge it's definitely not work friendly.
links_Review_Text: Very low cut what makes it non work friendly. Material very shiny. Good for a cocktail or work related party

Material thin and stretchy but detailing around the stomach was forgiving. Deep v-neck and mid-calf length creates food shape. Perfect for Miami anniversary dinner. I dressed it down with white Air Force Ones.

links_Review_Title: It's okay. The metallic is the most exciting thing about it.
links_Review_Text: Could have sized to regular size. Decently flattering. Snags easy. It was meh.

I chose this quickly thinking I could wear it to work but it's far more metallic than it appears in the main app photo (look at the closeup photo in the app). The fit is TTS & the fabric has plenty of stretch. I liked that the draped piece has a large snap to detach it while putting it on. Unfortunately the draping adds a lot of bulk that's not very flattering from the front or right side - as you can tell from my photos. It only looks good from the left. Also it's a bit too long for petites. Not something I'd rent again, even if I had an event. There are much more flattering styles to choose from.

Just received this brand-new, tags still on dress in a Sz 16. Stretchy material, very comfortable. Yet to try it on with a bra or spanx, or wear it for my anniversary, but it's incredibly flattering, not overly accentuation my lower stomach. Very cool design.

Honestly this fabric is KILLING me. It feels & looks itchy & very cheap, which is a little shocking. Very shiny & stretchy, flattering, comfy otherwise, but it reminds me of a bargain-basement junior's fabric.

This dress is rather tight fitting and form flattering. However, the fabric is thin and itchy. It's way more metallic looking than it seems in the photo. It was a little more formal and revealing than what I'd anticipated. This would be better for a party or event and wasn't quite as work appropriate as I'd hoped.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress that was comfortable to wear!
links_Review_Text: Fit well, the stretching fabric made it comfortable to sit, stand, and dance in. I really loved it.
Cool dress. The sash hit me in the wrong spot, but I am 5 10". Preferred another dress so I did not wear this one. Overall, true to size.

Didn't use this one. Definitely clingy and low cut (even for me!). There is a snap that holds the bow pieces together and I felt like that was going to come apart all night. I think a bigger size would have helped....just ran out of time to switch.

links_Review_Title: LOVE how it hugs all my curves
links_Review_Text: Omg! I never get dresses this shaped and it wasn't impressive when I first unwrapped the package, but after putting it on I feel so sexy! I wish I had the right size, I usually wear size 12, but got a size 10 cuz that's what's available. It's just a little tight, and it makes my boobs and buns looks real curvy. But so did my stomach, so I'm planning on wearing spanx underneath. Ps: the photo doesn't show how really glittery silver it really is.
Runs a little big with the stretchy fabric

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but awkward/unflattering from side profile
links_Review_Text: First off, I absolutely LOVED the look of this dress. The material is beautiful & it's absolutely perfect from the front view. However, I rented it for a heavily photographed event & didn't like the way the dress looked from either side profile. The the 4 fit perfectly though, true to size.

This dress was the backup dress but I actually almost wore it. I felt it was super flattering for my hourglass figure. The only downside was that the length was a little off because I am so short. Please note that the fabric itself is very stretchy however the waist has a seam which is less forgiving than the rest of the dress. Also, the comments about the fabric being a little itchy are true although I really didn't mind. The only reason I didn't wear this dress is because I loved the other one more!
The dress was great. Very comfortable, bra friendly. I'm not curvy & this dress added curves thanks to the details on the dress. Fit true to size. I'm a 6/8 36c this was fabulous.

links_Review_Title: This dress was HOT! Loved it!
links_Review_Text: AWESOME dress!!!!

links_Review_Title: Stunning...very flattering...lots of give in material, very stretchy....
links_Review_Text: perfect fit, but lots of give for extra room if needed.

links_Review_Title: When you're attending a black-tie event solo, you need a little extra boost of confidence!
links_Review_Text: Dress was comfortable, stretchy and just the right combination of modest yet fitted. I felt great in it!

I really loved this dress -- if it wasn't so expensive, I would have kept it!! It fit great, I loved the way it wrapped around my booty. I got TONS of compliments on it at work -- would definitely get again!

links_Review_Title: Way more bright silver than picture
links_Review_Text: This dress has a beautiful fit. The metallic threading is super scratchy on the skin around the seams of shoulders and neckline. It is also not the muted dark grey as the picture shows. The metallic is bright silver. Very stretchy and flattering though. Fits TTS

Really fun dress with flattering fit and drape. I didn't wind up wearing it because I chose another option but it's a great dress and would be perfect for a party or a night out. It felt chic and fun and wouldn't need much in the way of accessories to style. Christian Siriano always delivers and the cut is perfect. Definitely recommend!

This dress is all that! Made it work appropriate with a sweater and wore into an evening awards event. Sleek, lightweight, with a luxe silver lining, I am likely to buy this one! By some optical illusion magic, it upped my bra cup appearance two sizes :-)

Very comfortable and a perfect date night/girls dinner/everyday dress. It's really versatile. I wore it another time with a loose black sweater on top and engineer boots. For a more polished look, add a black blazer. Recommend if you're up for such a bold print. It's definitely as eye catching as the photos

This dress is a keeper. It fits like a glove, soft and comfortable, and it definitely turns heads!!! Despite the form-fitting silhouette, it does not seem to require shape wear. I guess the zebra stripes do the camouflaging trick. And ... wait for it ... the lining is silver! It is so beautiful. I was really impressed by that detail.
I wore this dress three times! It was just simply so comfortable. It was a little much without a blazer over top but really great.
TTS and stretchy. Easy everyday. Fabric absorbs sweat so even though it's dry cleaned it does stink a bit.

LOVE this dress and got so many compliments on it. I paired it with sneakers to make it more casual but you could def dress it up, I'm still holding onto it as we speak and hoping to get another wear out of it!

links_Review_Title: This dress was to die for
links_Review_Text: What an amazing dress! It felt like being in pajamas all day. So comfortable and yet so stylish.
Love the midi length. You can really see the shiny under layer in the picture, it is not as visible in person. The neck is not restrictive.

Loved the look of this dress but not the scent. As others have stated you sweat in this frock. Someone before me was in love with garlic, I could tell as soon as The fabric warmed up. This was unfortunate, luckily I had some perfume to mask while wearing but I removed immediately following work! Styled with silver combat boots and a red bag.
I love this dress! It was perfect for a fun night out with my girlfriends and I got a ton of compliments. It's sexy but not overtly due to the neckline and sleeves.

links_Review_Title: Obsessed with this dress!! Wish I had purchased.
links_Review_Text: This dress worked for several different occasions! I wore it to work with black boots, and also wore it to a Christmas parade with a festive jacket. It fits like a dream. Definitely rent this dress!!!
Beautiful and comfortable dress. It's slinky and stretchy and confirms to the body but not too much. Great if you want something fun without showing a ton of skin.

Wore with high waisted pants from Cinq a Sept, the sparkles are kind of multicolor but overall gold. I have a short torso so even though it's cropped it was a little too long with high waisted jeans, it overlapped the pants I rented perfectly though. Thick, sweatery material but beautifully made and comfortable. Worked well for a large chest
