Got this for a Vegas trip- canceled will have to rent again.
I had gaps around the armholes. This could be solved by getting a small however the medium fit me perfectly otherwise.

This top is so fun!!! ALC is a great brand - I find that they typically run between a little large and true to size - I'm typically a 4/6 with a larger chest and the S was perfect. The sparkle is so fabulous in person and the material is so structured making it SO flattering. My favorite rental in a long time!!!

I'm a "chunky" 2 with a small chest so I went with the 2. It's form hugging definitely. It was tight in the chest but I'm a 30A so if you have small boobs it makes the girls look awesome! This dress was very easy to style vintage. I wore this as a guest to a wedding and I got several compliments. I would buy this dress if I could afford it! I have a feeling I'll be renting this dress again (cons: fabric thinner, hard to wear jacket/purse)
Gorgeous dress, feels great, comfortable and elegant.

links_Review_Title: I felt like a super hero!
links_Review_Text: This dress is amazing. I absolutely loved the cape & people complimented me on it all night. I felt like a superhero with it on! The fabric was thick enough to not show my undergarments, & it had enough stretch to give throughout the night. I'd never have bought something like this, so I'm glad it was available to try on RtR!
Pros is that is looks beautiful. Cons if you have a large chest it can get a little tight, consider sizing up. Material is a little thin too. Overall happy with it.

links_Review_Title: I wish I could wear this dress every day!
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a charity gala and it was PERFECT! I received compliments all night long, from friends and strangers alike! The cape was so fabulous. The only complaint if there is one is that it gapped out a little. I am 34DDD... it didn't really matter because the cape just flows so beautifully, but you'll notice in the picture. I am kicking myself for not wearing my red bra!

Felt a little like cosplay, but still work appropriate. Very flattering from the back as the cape hides all flaws. It was comfortable for sitting in an all-day conference. Simple good accessories and black flats as the Cape adds enough drama.

This dress literally makes you look like a movie star! I was complimented left and right, and even stopped by another guest asking who I was and said how stunning I looked in this classy dress. I highly recommend this dress - it's super gorgeous and sooo flattering !

links_Review_Title: The perfect dress for work holiday party
links_Review_Text: The dress is very comfortable. I normally wear a 4 or a 6 and 6 fits perfectly. I got many compliments all night.

links_Review_Title: Wore this gorgeous dress for Christmas mass
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! It was so elegant and the material was thick and forgiving. I have broader shoulders and am 36D and found it a bit snug up top but it was fine. I received a lot of compliments and would definitely rent this again.
Such a fun dress! I felt so fancy in it and it was super flattering. It does not stretch so is a little snug if you don't size up.

I loved this dress! It was for a New Year's Eve wedding and it was perfect. I got so many compliments throughout the night. The cape just made it more fun and dressy. But it was still comfortable enough to dance and move in. I ended up buying it to wear it again!
Fits true to size.
Great dress! I rented it for my mom and it fit perfectly which she was worried about. The quality is great and she felt like a dream!!

I wore this dress to my work holiday party and it was so unique. I loved the cape and felt like a Queen all night, I even ended up with a crown to finish the look. The color is very vibrant and will definitely draw attention to you but with that comes a lot of compliments.

links_Review_Title: This dress was very comfortable and looked amazing!
links_Review_Text: The fit was spot on with sizing. I wear a 14/16 with 36F chest. The 16 fit perfectly without gapping or pulling anywhere. I was worried the cape part may pull when sitting or blow out like an actual cape when moving or dancing, but it fell beautifully! I received a ton of compliments and told I should buy it to wear to other events. Highly recommend!
I received tons of compliments, I kept it simple, minimal jewelry. I wore it to Chair a fundraiser. Perfect dress.

links_Review_Title: Senator Kyrsten Sinema wore this on the Senate floor today
links_Review_Text: just thought everyone should know that

links_Review_Title: Perfect office holiday party dress!! Runs TTS.
links_Review_Text: I am usually size 8-10 in dresses and this size 10 fit perfectly.

links_Review_Title: Great party dress - busty gals beware
links_Review_Text: If you are hourglass it is certainly snug - size up. If you have a DD or above beware because this thing boosts your boobies so although I wore it for a holiday party I would never wear it to work. Maybe if I sized up but the chest is tight so I don't see that happening.

I really loved this dress! I had so much fun wearing it and I got so much compliments! My only issue with it is if you're well endowed it was pretty tight on the chest area but other than that it was awesome. I felt so confident in it 😊
Fit perfect - statement piece

Had planned on wearing a NYE-y long-sleeved sequined situation for a friends' Vegas themed birthday party, but was sold on this caped dress instead. It's super flattering and even better in-person. Runs a little large -- I'm typically a 4, and the 2 fit nicely.

links_Review_Title: I was having my super hero cape dress moment!!
links_Review_Text: I usually am a 10-12 in dresses and tried the 10 and 14 (as that's all they had in store). They both fit but I decided I didn't want it to be too tight on my tummy as I'm pear shaped. Luckily it wasn't too big in boobs or shoulders as it had the cape. This dress was a huge hit by me and everyone at the wedding. Dancing with the cape was so fun. Bull fighter, disco queen, red riding hood, scarf dress - so much fun! Length was almost perfect as I would have hemmed 2 inches if it was mine.
very pretty but short
It is a beautiful cool red, nice medium weight fabric with great drape

I finally quit counting the number of times I was stopped and told how much they loved my dress. It was almost awkward! Every view steps ALL day long. It truly is a beautiful dress. Will be keeping this one for sure!

links_Review_Title: Wore this for a holiday party and received complements. Very fun dress.
links_Review_Text: The fit was fantastic. Looks great on a curvy build. Length was a little long on me but wouldn't keep me from renting again.

links_Review_Title: This was a beautiful dress and color. I received many compliments all night.
links_Review_Text: I am a very curvy 12ish, but seeing how it’s after the holidays I wore the 14. Fit like a glove and I felt amazing in it.

links_Review_Title: Received lots of compliments as it's like you have a cape.
links_Review_Text: Fits true to size.
So many compliments - this dress is amazing.

links_Review_Title: Color and fit are amazing. I received tons of compliments wearing this to a work event.
links_Review_Text: Color and fit are amazing. I received tons of compliments wearing this to a work event.

links_Review_Title: Such a cute dress but runs small
links_Review_Text: I really really wanted this to work but it runs small and I couldn't get it zipped up passed my boobs! I even sized up, I usually wear a 14, rented a 16 from what other reviewers were already saying about it running small. So if you're bigger in the chest you may need to go up 2 sizes.
Wore this to church Christmas Eve. Got lots of compliments. Comfortable yet elegant!

I loved this dress! I am usually a 0 in RTR dresses, but around a 2 in other dresses, so I got the 0 and the 2 and the 0 fit well, but was a little tight. The dress is very much a statement piece, but not over the top. Definitely recommend if you want to stand out at a holiday party with a dramatic cape!
This is a very cute dress!! If you have a full(er) bust area, going a size up is best and will give you a very flattering fit.

Wow...everything about this dress was perfect for an upscale Christmas Party. The cut was so flattering on my wider hips and smaller waist. The cape was extra and fun. I wish I could have kept this dress!
Amazing dress, fits true to size.

links_Review_Title: Borrowed for my boss' big birthday bash at the Encore in Boston.
links_Review_Text: Loved it! I am petite, so it was slighty large along the hem of the neck and shoulders and would lift occasionally, but the waist fit perfect.

Loved wearing this dress to see an opera in NY. The dress arrived brand new-- tags on. I usually wear a size 14 but the 16 fit better. The weight of the cape does pull the dress a little. I found that the neckline shifted a lot and I had to keep adjusting it so my slip wasn't showing. Still, an awesome dress. My wife and I share a RTR account so my measurements don't match the ones in the bio. Here are mine: Height: 5'4 Bra size: 38C Usual size: 14 Size worn: 16

links_Review_Title: I felt like I was super supervisor.
links_Review_Text: Very Cute. Very Different. No hesitations when I saw people they complimented. Not just did the elevator look but actually said wow that's a dress!

links_Review_Title: Flattering fit with just enough hug and cut to feel sexy/confident
links_Review_Text: Felt wonderful in this dress, but unfortunately the wedding I had planned to wear this beauty to was cancelled due to the Coronavirus outbreak. Fit like a dream, and was a perfect combination of classy and sexy. Wish I was able to wear it out!!
Absolutely loved this dress. It's lace is great quality and beautiful colors. It runs very small so size up! I received so many compliments. I highly recommend this beauty!

I'll miss this dress. I got so many compliments left & right & felt beautiful wearing it! I ordered the L & M & ended up wearing the large with spanx. It's very true to size (which I'm not used to wearing) but it's flattering & makes you feel beautiful!

links_Review_Title: Stand out at a black tie optional
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous comfortable dress. It was fitted but not too tight/restrictive. Beautiful green color. Got lots of compliments and just felt great in it. Will rent again!!

So many compliments!!! I loved the fit of this dress. It was sexy in a classy way. Material was very high quality. The colors were gorgeous- a bold green lace with navy stitching and a mauvey-tan underlining to mid thigh. I'm 5'9" and it was a great length. Straps were adjustable which I loved.
This dress looked great but was pretty tight, should have gotten medium.

I never get complimented on what I wear and was tired of recycling the same wedding outfits. All night people asked me where I got this from. Spent most of the night on the dance floor, so comfy, different, and flattering. Must rent!

links_Review_Title: This emerald green grass is gorgeous!
links_Review_Text: I am 5'4 180lbs 36C - for an idea of body type. Dress fit nice! I little tight around the rib/waist area but not uncomfortable. The dress was very flattering all over. Felt beautiful and got lots of compliments.

links_Review_Title: The colors were prefect for a winter wedding!
links_Review_Text: Fit like a glove. Ordered the small and medium and I ended up wearing the small. I received many complements on the dress.
Lovedddd this dress! Received so many compliments. Fits true to size
This dress fit like a glove and was comfortable and flattering to wear to a formal wedding. Would definitely rent again!
Loved this dress, ran true to size, so may compliments! Comfortable and flattering. A must rent!
The fit at your hips makes you feel tucked and secure!! Had difficulty stepping up into our SUV, but besides that, I give it 5 stars.

I was unsure which size to go for, I usually wear a size small and sometimes xs, both fit but the xs length was nicer and was more of a bodycon fit which I liked. It really hugs the curves but is also flattering! Definitely recommend this dress!

Loved this dress! It was a great choice for my sisters wedding and I received several compliments. The bust was quite tight on me, and I ended up forgoing a strapless bra to give myself a little more space. I would have worn it without the cardigan... but nyc is cold in January.

This is a stunning dress, the fabric is thick and looks very luxurious. It lays beautifully and the nude liner stayed in place with no issue. Straps were adjustable, zipper was no problem. I got compliments all night. True to size. Would definitely recommend and would rent again.
Got lots of compliments and felt so confident in this dress!

I wish I could own this dress. I received so many compliments. It was extremely comfortable and very nice quality. There isn't a lot of stretch to It, but was still able to eat freely and dance the night away.

links_Review_Title: This was the perfect option for New Years Eve.
links_Review_Text: Fit like a glove.

links_Review_Title: Stunning dress! Amazing quality. Received many compliments.
links_Review_Text: Wore medium, true to size.

links_Review_Title: This dress is stunning. I got so many compliments! I will always RTR!
links_Review_Text: The dress runs a bit small so I had to size up one but it has a tiny bit of stretch to make sitting and dancing comfortable. I love the length of this dress and the material just make it incredibly flattering. If you are on the fence about renting this dress just do it! You will not be disappointed!

After reviewing several pictures & reviews from others between 120-130 lbs staring they wore a size small (but acknowledged it was a bit tight) I was convinced this was my primary size since I'm 125 lbs. I picked a size medium as my backup size and I'm super happy I did. The small was very tight, but the size medium was perfect. I could dance it and freely move around without any issues. I have an hour glass shape (curvy hips & bottom), I'm 5'4, and a 34C.

I wore this for a 1920's themed party. Went perfect with my fur stole. I ordered the XL and XXL because others close to my size wore an XL but it ended up being a little too big but it was ok. Quality fabric and beautiful colors. Would get a L if I rented it again.

I rented this dress for formal night on a cruise. It's unfortunate that this dress was so tight even after wearing a shaper because it's beautiful and complementary, but not flattering on my thick body. Size up ladies.

I wore this dress for a rehearsal dinner. I received so many compliments and felt confident! I would say it runs a bit small. The dress does not allow for any stretch so keep that in mind! Overall it was a winner!

links_Review_Title: Wore it to a wedding- So many compliments
links_Review_Text: Felt like an XS. Was super cute and good quality. I'm normally a size 4 but recently lost some weight and it still felt a tiny bit tight when I tried it on in the evening. Trying it on in the morning however it was fine. I got so many compliments and it was a great dress for a wedding!

This dress looked so great and it was perfect for my body type. Got lots of compliments. The only thing that was off was that the XS had adjustable straps and S did not. I definitely need the adjustable straps bc I'm petite. Otherwise very happy with it! (Sorry didn't have a full length photo but did hit about halfway down my calf).

Loved the dress, I'm in between a 4 and 6 and this felt a bit large, but the SR wasn't available, so went with the MR. it worked overall, just was a little baggy/bunched in some place. Received a lot of compliments, will likely try to rent again!

Rented the MR - a little baggy in the stomach area for me; would have been a bit too large in the chest, but a padded push-up strapless bra helped. The lining rode up a bit at times (which was already shorter). The dress also has no stretch. Other than that, it was comfy! I'd imagine the SR would have fit better in the mid-section for me but may have been more difficult to dance or walk up steps in. Beautiful dress. Love the color and lace. Adjustable straps - did not dig in or slip off.

links_Review_Title: Fit like a glove! Huge hit!
links_Review_Text: The straps were a little loose and kept falling down. It was tight in my chest area. Due to the dress being very straight it was hard to get into the car or bend down. Overall I felt great in this dress and loved how it looked. I wish I owned it! I got a lot of compliments!
This dress is tight, but forgiving and flattering! I was a little worried about the midi length, but it was comfortable. This is a great dress!

Rent this dress and you will show up the bridesmaids! The photos don't do the pattern, lace, and leaf print justice- it is stunning/ I am usually a 4 or 6 and wore the small, it fits like a glove so be ready for a tighter fit, I went no bra!
Gorgeous details, length, and color! It was super comfortable & had adjustable straps. I loved wearing this dress & would rent it again.

links_Review_Title: Unique color, great fit, classy dress
links_Review_Text: I'm short 5"1 with athletic build. This dress was form fitting and one of my favorite RTR dresses ever !!! So unique the color and pattern ! Great for a fall or spring wedding !!

I wasn't sure what sizing to get bc my body shape is a lot diff than others. I have a broad back (34b) so I would recommend sizing up to a medium if you are 34 or higher. Sizing up wasn't ideal bc then it was pretty loose fitting everywhere else but this dress is pretty and photographs well. The caviat -like others mentioned- is that the straps are not safe. One popped off mid-wedding and luckily I brought a safety pin based on reviews and just seeing they looked barely held on by the threading.

links_Review_Title: This fit me so well! Loved the material

links_Review_Text: I wanted to love this dress but the fabric by the zipper was coming apart from being zipped so many times that I was nervous to wear it. It's also a little too long. Came to my shins

links_Review_Title: Got way too many compliments on this dress! Will 100% be renting again. GREAT for petite!
links_Review_Text: Clings to the right spots. I wore with spanx and loved how it fit! I'm 5"0, 34B, 105lbs. I wore with 4 inch Steve Madden blush leather heels. My fiancé is begging me to rent this again
True to size. Very sexy dress that was comfortable to wear.
Wish it was a little more stretchier
It fit well and is comfy. Great for weekends or vacations. Goes well with flats.

Such a last minute pick but the best choice of them all! This wasn’t even under consideration when I was trying to choose dresses for vacation. In an act of desperation I ordered at the last minute and never regretted it! This dress is beautifully made, is so feminine and has vibrant colors that don’t quite come across in the pictures. And the trendy mixed patterns with colors just give you the ultimate push to stand out in any event. It is true to size with little give. If you have heavy boobs you may have to pin the cleavage area as the button kept popping open- minor downside.... a MUST rent! 38D, 185lbs, 5’6” & curvy.

This dress is so freaking COOL. The print got comments from so many people, and when I show people pictures from this trip they always comment on the dress. It is so unique and funky without being too crazy so it is super wearable. The waist/bust situation worked for me and I'm pretty comfortable braless, but I could see it becoming a problem for others. I loved the fit in the end, but I definitely had to finesse the wrap portion and the straps when I first put it one. Still a winner though!!!
loved this dress- slightly small and not stretchy, but beautiful!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress. My husband wanted me to buy it.
links_Review_Text: I sized up in this dress to accommodate my 34 DDD girls and it worked. The armholes gapped a bit but the girls were secure. If I owned I would have the dress altered to take care of this. Otherwise the dress fit great. The attached belt let me take up some of the slack around the waist. I will rent again and may end up purchasing.

Everything about this dress is well thought of. Including the button around the chest, the wrap, the under skirt that allows u to reveal just enough skin to be sexy but not too sexy. Argh! Love this designer!

I rented this dress for a welcome reception the day before a wedding. I loved the dress, the color, and how it hanged on my body. My only complaint was that the button that held everything together was pretty flimsy. If you're busty, you will definitely have to grab a safety pin or under shirt.
Photographs weird so don't rent if you'll be in a lot of pics. Otherwise super fun rental
Wore this to work. It's a really flattering wrap dress and the button up top helps keep it conservative. Got a ton of compliments!
I'm normally and 8 in dresses but I'm pregnant so I ordered a larger size. This runs small but fit my growing bump (boobs were another story)

links_Review_Title: Great dress for a sunny summer wedding
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a summer wedding and I loved it. I loved the mixed prints and the length. The wrap was fun and the dress moved beautifully whenever there was a breeze. I received a lot of complements on the pattern and the way the dress fit me! The XS fit snug but wasn't uncomfortable--the top of the S was too big and the wrap too loose. The small clasp at the top did pop open a few times when dancing or moving quickly, but it wasn't a big hassle and I felt supported all day long. Pair this with a cute pair of sandals and some light earrings and you've got a winner!
Casual and lightweight- loved the colors- it was perfect for wine trip to the finger lakes

Beautiful dress! Three people stopped me on the street to ask where it was from! I wore this dress to go shopping, to brunch, and to work. It is really comfortable and doesn't wrinkle too much. It's also opaque and has a slip layer underneath, so was easy to wear. There's also a button at the neckline so it was easy to keep it in place, unlike other wrap dresses I've worn. Runs true to size. I usually wear a 0-2 in dresses, and the XS fit perfectly.

links_Review_Title: Received compliments all night on this dress
links_Review_Text: After reading through the reviews, I took everyone's suggestion and ordered a size up, and it fit perfectly. I was so happy that the straps were adjustable. It was very comfortable and perfect for the summer heat in Texas. I loved this dress and would definitely rent again. I wore it to a rehearsal dinner and everyone loved it.
Wore it on a girls night out. I ordered the XL and it fit well but I'd usually be a Medium. It's very revealing in the bust , even with the snap. Still I loved it and would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Pretty design. A bit challenging in chest area
links_Review_Text: I loved how it looked but the snap closure on the bust kept popping open. I suppose the dress was not meant for 34DD girls. It was a bit too fussy to wear all day at work. Other than that the dress was flattering.
Sized up one and worked well. Slit underneath so was not see through. The side zipper could be tight on large chested ladies

I looooved this dress! I would buy it if I didn't like to always wear a different dress. It was so flattering. I felt thin and got so many compliments. Very pretty and fun pattern. I would say it runs small. I am usually a large, sometimes a medium, and I wore this is an extra large. There is a zipper side. It's a faux wrap, it does tie, but you can't wrap it to your size so you need the right size.
Quality material, adjustable straps and waistline. Haven't worn yet, but I can tell already that I will like this one.

links_Review_Title: Cute but too narrow through the chest for me
links_Review_Text: Cute but too narrow through the chest for me
Perfect fit everywhere but the neckline was too deep for my little ladies

links_Review_Title: Too small, couldn't zip it up
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress, great fabric... I couldn't wear it because the rib cage part runs super small. I'm disappointed, but will rent it in one size larger. (I rented the XS and I'm 5'5", 124 lbs, hourglass shaped.)
I didn't end up wearing this as it runs very small. It's a beautiful dress and will definitely try a size up in future but such a shame.

I LOVED this dress- it looks exactly as described in person but I was unable to zipper it up because the chest area was so small. It also constricted my arms a bit as it dug into my arm pits. Great dress, not a good fit for me- should've gone a size up.

The material is very nice. The top is kinda baggy and the waist could fit tighter. I feel like it is nice, but the pattern makes me feel more casual and "country". Not sure that I will wear it to the wedding I was planning on.

I wore this dress to a friend's wedding and loved it! It was gorgeous, and perfect for the hot day. The only complaint I have is that the top was a bit baggy, I had to be careful that no one was seeing anything they weren't supposed to if you catch my drift. Overall, a great choice, I would rent it again!!
Fit: a little tight in the chest and the wrap showed a lot of leg when walking, so recommend sizing up. Fabric: light & airy, and comfy despite being polyester-y. Style: Absolutely gorgeous!

links_Review_Title: A bit large on the chest but otherwise really great dress
links_Review_Text: My dress arrived really wrinkled so I had to spend a while steaming it. Very light, comfortable and flattering and gorgeous print. Definitely recommended!
Small in bust

links_Review_Title: Yumi Kim always has flattering fits. Adjustable straps and tie are great. Small fits 4-6
links_Review_Text: Slit is also not too high and doesn't blow away too much in the wind.
Very easy fit, with adjustable straps!

I rented this thinking it was a light breezy dress to wear while it was hot, and that was not at all the case. The bodice runs tight, and the zipper likes to get stuck at a seam, so it's not the easiest to put on. Then, there is this short, clingy thin white layer underneath. While I appreciated some coverage, since the wrap piece would fly up, it was just not comfortable in any way. Returning after one wear. Didn't have the problem other review noted about the top being giant and the clasp not staying shut.
Note that the chest area is very generous and the clasp does not stay closed.
I received this dress was tags on it. Absolutely stunning dress. The front has a little snap so you don't have to worry about the girls hanging out.

Definitely revealing! I'm typically a 16 but this 18 for my waist perfectly. However, the top was so loose that I didn't feel safe at all without some sort of bra. The tricky part is you need to either wear cups (for large chested women this doesn't work) or a special super deep bra of some sort. I ended up using pasties just for an event. Great for large chested women!
My favorite dress ever will probably be buying it ! I rented it for my honey moon it's so comfy and flattering

I liked the shape and the fabric however it was very low at the front and I decided to wear a top underneath. In my case the size was correct. The only think I didn't like was that it tends to open on the sides of the neckline.

links_Review_Title: Felt absolutely amazing in this dress!
links_Review_Text: So pretty, light, delicately sexy. Had to use fashion tape to secure fabric near breast otherwise might have peeked out while bending over but was a perfect fit and received a ton of compliments. One of my favorite rentals.
So comfortable and silky smooth. Very low cut (but I like that style).
Fit was perfect. It was a bit low cut but nothing a low cut bra couldn't fix. Material was silky and smooth and I loved the length and interesting hemline.

links_Review_Title: This dress was super sexy. Great for a date night, party or just about any occasion.
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress on vacation and it was definitely a head turner. Double stick tape is a must.
I love the pattern and style of the dress, but it was so huge in the chest and required a very annoying type of bra. Even sized down and didn't fit properly!

I felt like a goddess in this dress. The fabric, the way it hangs...the craftsmanship is incredible. It's 100% silk, so you feel like a princess pretty much. It cuts low but in a tasteful way- I think wearing a cami underneath compromises the look, and I recommend rocking it out sans bra.

I loved this dress. It's super lightweight so it's great for a summer party, even if you're out in the sun you won't sweat through it. It's very flattering. The neckline is very low cut, and if you have a smaller chest you'll likely need fashion tape. I got a lot of compliments and the colorful dots are actually little hearts.
Absolutely gorgeous dress. Cute but sexy, comfortable but flirty. It's everything!

Received compliments from strangers. The boob part is huge. My boobs are a good size but the area for it was gigantic. The label says made in China and they usually make disproportionate clothing. The length for me was good with flats I didn't need heels but it would have been better with some heel. Fabric was mediocre. Felt like the seams would rip if I did too much activity.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, got it for my wedding rehearsal dinner! Fit so perfectly.
links_Review_Text: I ordered a 6 and a 4, I am usually a 6...but the 4 fit a lot better. I would say it runs large.

links_Review_Title: Excellent plunge dress, runs slightly big
links_Review_Text: This is a beautiful, feminine, flowy and fun dress. It's very low cut, so you'll need some type of tape, or far younger and smaller boobs than I've got. (34 years old, 3 kids, 34C) but I loved it and felt it was well worth the time it took to tape myself into a younger looking lady. I normally wear an 8, on the line of being a 6. I wish the 6 had been available, it would have fit better in the chest and waist. Comfortable dress that I loved, go for it!

This dress was incredible for my bridal shower!! I got so many compliments!!! The top was pretty big, I had to pin several inches at the back of my neck, but it looked totally fine (little pleats). It's a low low chest, so I used fashion tape that worked out great. It was a hot day, 90 degrees, but the dress felt cool and light. I love it so much that I almost considered buying it, but don't have enough occasions to wear it. It's the perfect balance of sweet with a hint of sexy! Showed my shape perfectly! The whole time at my bridal shower I kept hearing how perfect the dress was for me. Loved it!!!

Love this dress! It's super light and airy and very feminine. Runs BIG in the waist, I could've gone down to a 6 for sure (I'm reliably a size 8 in everything) but it still looks nice. I'm wearing this to my post-wedding brunch. It is quite low cut so it's better for someone with a smaller chest.
This dress is so beautiful! I just rented to wear to dinner but I want to rent again in the future for a more formal event. Definitely requires fashion tape in the front.
This dress is beautiful! Received countless comments. It's polyester but feels like silk. The way this dress moves or catches a breeze is so feminine and dreamy! I felt like a princess in this dress!

links_Review_Title: Its flow-y and lovely, but wear a scarf while in AIRCON. My chest was cold. Love this dress!
links_Review_Text: Double sided tape would be helpful.

I got the 4R as a potential reception dress. The material felt nice, it was just too big all around. It was also much longer in the back than I anticipated, so a few inches would have dragged on the ground if I didn't wear heels. The cap sleeves also restrict raising your arms a bit. I might try the 2 in the future.
Long and large in the bust but very pretty and romantic

links_Review_Title: A fun bridal shower dress that isn't just white!
links_Review_Text: Runs a little big in the bust + cannot wear a bra

links_Review_Title: cute print and fabric, but really odd fit
links_Review_Text: the fit on this one is WEIRD. I had to gather a bunch of material in the back and pin it to make it wearable. Otherwise the front is way too droopy. I have long curly hair, so it was no problem and I still enjoyed wearing it.

links_Review_Title: VERY OPEN in the chest but super cute!
links_Review_Text: This dress is VERY open in the front. You will need tape or something under it if you have anything more than a B cup. I didn't prepare properly so I had to keep my jacket buttoned and I still got tons of compliments on this dress.

links_Review_Title: That I couldn't zip it up all the way and didn't want to break the zip
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress, but I think it runs a bit small, but then again Ive recently gained 15 lbs that Im working off so I am a size 8 again
Love this dress. It's flirty and fun. Lots of cleavage so I did wear a bando under it but it's super cute and fits very flattering.
it was too loose all around for me!
The material felt great, the print was adorable, and the cut would've been great if it had fit- but alas, even the 6 (I usually wear an 8 or 10) was too big and I didn't end up wearing it.

links_Review_Title: What human body was this made for???
links_Review_Text: The Top on the 22WR was ridiculously long. I mean, I would have had to have the torso of a snake woman to wear this thing. Sizing up is a science, brands can't just make every measurement equally larger and expect their garments to be wearable at higher sizes. This is definitely what happened with this dress.
The top is too low cut. I couldn't wear it :( Beautiful dress though.
This dress is really pretty! It's just very low cut. I wore a lace tank top underneath it to avoid spilling out of it.

links_Review_Title: Too big in the top. Very comfortable and nice material just too big.
links_Review_Text: Fit very big. The top needed to be taken up by a few inches, otherwise was beautiful and very comfy but I didn't wear.

links_Review_Title: Soooo soft and flowy. Lots of compliments!
links_Review_Text: Front is revealing, so lookout. Great for a hot day.

links_Review_Title: Couldn't wear this out of the house
links_Review_Text: Way, way too low cut, and couldn't find a bralette or cami that looked good with it. Otherwise, cute print, light, floaty fabric, good length for me.
The dress kinda fit but was big and lose up top. It wasn't flattering and couldn't be worn due to the way the top was made
A little low in front, wore a lacey bralette over my regular bra to cover it up (instead of a camisole). A little loose on the bottom but fits well.
It hit my curves just right. It's extremely low cut and big at the top but I found a way to make it work.

links_Review_Title: Couldn't wear, too big in chest and shoulders.
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress and wanted to wear it so bad, but couldn't bc it did not fit properly.

This dress is beyond low cut. I am tall (5'8") and busty (40DD) and while the fit was not a problem, the "V" of this neckline was beyond my breast bone. It was as if the shoulders needed to be brought up 1 to 2 inches. I would have to wear a camisole with this and that would just look silly.
The dress was light and very pretty, but there was no way to wear a bra under it. I tried stickys but they still showed. I would've maybe sized up so it wasn't so tight on my rib cage.

Wore this for back to back trips- perfect for summer evenings! Colors are so vibrant and pretty. Wore a sticky bra underneath because it was too low cut for a regular one. Super comfortable and easy to wear for long periods of time.

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments for a super comfy dress
links_Review_Text: I had to stitch the bustline closed about 1" above the bottom of the V to keep the girls from being too much on display at a work evening event, but the dress was very comfortable and flattering!

links_Review_Title: LOVED this dress! Will definitely rent again!
links_Review_Text: Just wore this around town - could've dressed it up if I wanted to do a night out or a beachy vacation. Material is light but not super light so might be too warm over like 80 degrees. I'm 28 weeks pregnant in this pic and still had plenty of room in the small because it's elastic and very forgiving. Would probably have needed an XS if not pregnant.
Loved this dress! A little long, but with wedges was perfect!

I rented this to wear to a beach vacation. It was a great coverup and I loved the pop of color! When I got back in town, I didn't want to lose the feeling of vacation so ended up wearing it to work and felt the ~good vibes~ all day! I just paired it with a cami underneath to make the neckline more modest.

I ordered this dress more or less on a whim in my unlimited subscription and didn't really expect that I would wear it since it's kind of bright. Boy, was I wrong. I couldn't wear it enough! I wore it to work, drinks, and church and just LOVED it. It's bright and beautiful, fits like a dream, and is SO comfy and light. Rent this--you'll feel like a 70s Palm Springs babe with hoop earrings and wedges.
Ordered the dress for my trip to mexico, super comfortable! It's very long therefore I paired it with block sandals. Super comfortable!

I rented this for a beach trip and it was perfect. Fabric is light and sheer, with flats it's great for daytime. Could easily be dressed with with heels and accessories for a dinner but might still be casual. It's lower cut than I expected but I liked the fit.
Get size to fit bust. Long and flowy below bust. Perfect for summer evening out.
Rented for a reunion but sending it back. Lovely pattern, nice cut but the dress is enormous. I'm 5'5" and with heels it drags on the floor and bags at the top.

Pretty print in person. Fabric was light but stiff. The elastic waist came up way too high on me - even being just 5'2 it didn't sit at my waist and kept riding up. Didn't end up wearing. Long on my frame but would've been fine with wedges.

links_Review_Title: colorful, easy to throw on and great for a house party, cook out, vacation
links_Review_Text: it runs a little large but I liked it
Perfect beach party dress

Absolutely loved this dress. It is simple, cute, and perfect for a night out to dinner. The one I rented had a very small hole in one of the sleeves, but it wasn't noticeable enough to not wear it. Plus, it was super cute and I liked it too much!

links_Review_Title: It's a beautiful dress, fit well. Be aware, the neckline is low cut.
links_Review_Text: I rented this for an event when I was a week post partum, so the umpire waist was essential. I ended up not wearing it as the fabric and print was too summery/springy for the winter weather we were experiencing, plus the neckline was too low cut for the occasion and my figure at the time.
I wore an XS and normally use S or M, so it runs quite large and is also very long!
Dress was too big. I need to order again in smaller.
This was my go to dress in the last month of pregnancy. Great color and pattern and very comfortable.
The dress was very comfortable and breezy in the heat. The material is cotton so it does wrinkle easily.

links_Review_Title: this dress was on the longer side but very comfy and bright fun colors!
links_Review_Text: this dress was on the longer side but very comfy and bright fun colors!

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! Lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: Dress was a pretty good fit, could have been a little smaller but since it was a looser fit dress it was okay!

links_Review_Title: I did not wear it as it was not flattering.
links_Review_Text: This is huge. It did nothing for me. The fabric was lovely.
Didn't wear. It's see-through

links_Review_Title: Beautiful vibrant color and comfortable fit
links_Review_Text: I wore this as a beach and pool coverup for my extended vacation. It was beautiful!
should of ordered the small, but still love it
Fit great, lose and a lot of material, but it was light and breathable. Definitely a long dress! I am 6'1 and a size 2 . I can imagine it would be too long if you were petite.
I am almost 5' 3" and it was too long. Had to wear very y'all heels to make it work
Runs really big!!

links_Review_Title: I attended a small low-key summer wedding in Philadelphia, I didn't wear this dress to it.
links_Review_Text: Based on the photo this dress looked like it would be perfect for a low-key wedding. When I received it though, the fabric felt and looked cheap, it ran large, and the cut did nothing for my figure. There is an odd opening in the bust under the vee, almost like an ill-executed cut out. It made the neckline sit weird and was just odd. I would not recommend this dress for an event past going to the farmers market, and even then I am sure there are better options.

links_Review_Title: Wanted to love it. But didn't!
links_Review_Text: This dress run very large. The waist is very, as is the neckline, making it impossible to wear. Plus, the dress is unlined and VERY sheer. Too bad, because the print is lovely as is the quality.
I am shocked by the negative reviews on this dress. I absolutely loved it. It felt very expensive (it is) and fit beautifully! I wore it on vacation and felt fabulous (note: I am).
This dress was great. I wore it to a dinner party. It was so long and voluminous and very dramatic while still being sort of boho. It was very me. I received tons of compliments.
Neckline was much deeper than I thought, didn't wear because of this, but would be cute for another occasion!

This had a really billowy fit, I could probably have gone with a small. I got compliments on this dress and it was really bright and cheerful so great for a summer day. However, this is completely sheer, particularly in the sun and is cut very low. So, choose carefully as to where you wear it. I was in a beach town, so it was ok, but this is really more of a coverup than dress.
It was too big and very lo cut in the front
Runs really large. I wore it but would have loved it in small. Perfect for a dinner out in Hawaii. Light fabric. The elastic on the arms and waist didn't feel as well made as a typical Trina Turk
Heavy, inflexible material. The dress is huge and looks like a tent

links_Review_Title: Cute print and fun flowy hemline!
links_Review_Text: This was a very pretty dress, loved the print! I added a belt and boots, and wore it to a baby shower. The neckline was a bit low, as other reviews mention, I had to safety pin just so everything stayed put! Would for sure rent again though!

I loved this dress, although I probably could have gone a size down. I wore this for a work/fun dinner in Napa Valley, so the Boho style with booties was fitting. I had to pin the v-neck up a little bit, but it was fine. Great dress, lots of compliments!
Did dip a little low for work in the cleavage area, but nothing that made it unwearable. There are also slits on the sides that give it great flow.

Loved it! Was a little worried because I am curvy and prints can be unflattering at times but decided to give it a go anyways. I Wore it to work and got lots of compliments. Even decided to wear it after work I loved it so much! I dressed it down with a jean jacket and some white sneaks. Would totally rent again.

links_Review_Title: I like it, I got it...
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress so much I bought it! It's so flowey and comfortable! Perfect for twirling! You can dress it down or dress it up as you like! The top is very low cut so wear something underneath unless you REALLY wanna show off.

links_Review_Title: LOVED, but had to clip the v-neck
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress. It is extremely comfortable, chic, and fun. The flow of the bottom part was so fun and I got so many compliments. I did have to clip the v-neck because it completely opened and exposed me. No one seemed to notice though. Would absolutely rent again!

I had to send this dress back because it was far too long for my 5'0" self. Even with heels it was too long. I'm standing on my tip toes in the picture and it's still extremely long. It's low cut in the front and a bit large at the top.
Awesome dress to pair with leggings and booties! I'm 5'6 and wore this with 2.5 inch heels and still tripped on it going up stairs so it's a bit long, beware!
I really loved the look of this dress but I rented it to wear to work and the neckline was way to low cut to wear to work. The overall fit was true to size and is very flattering.

links_Review_Title: Amazing to find a maxi for tall ladies!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress for a winter wedding! It is so hard to find a maxi that comes down to your ankles if you're tall, but the very slight high-low cut of this made it the perfect length! It came right to the top of my feet and I was able to wear it with a kitten heel. I found that it runs slightly large and I definitely needed a pin for the neckline, but it was otherwise amazing!
The fit was wonderful. I loved the way it flowed. This one is a keeper.
Great dress. Very flattering. Lots of compliments. Wore black high heeled boots - no problem with length.

links_Review_Title: This was a winter evening wedding and this was perfect for getting to the event, but not too heavy.
links_Review_Text: It was very comfortable and true to size. Other reviewers comments on low neckline, but a safety pin adjusts it to comfort level.
A bit low-cut for my small chest, but with the right bra it was just right without feeling like I wasn't revealing too much. Wore with flats but also looked cute with booties.
Loved this dress it falls very nicely. I wore it all day with suede tan booties for a causal look. I am usually a size 6 but somehow fit into a 4, but I think a 6 would have been way better.

links_Review_Title: Love but runs a bit a large and is surprisingly long - short girls BEWARE
links_Review_Text: I have been eyeing this dress for weeks, just waiting for my size to be available. Finally! The 4R is available! I have never added something so to my cart and confirmed shipment so quickly! RTR recommended a 2R but I am a pretty true 4 all around and so I went with the 4R (plus, RTR size recommendations are seldom correct for me). The 4 fits me fine, I had to pin the top together so I wasn't exposing my bra, but I'm almost certain I could have gotten away with the 2R. I have a good inch to inch and a half of fabric at the waist that I could have filled out. Walking in the dress is fine for me but if you have stairs or a rolling chair at work, you will need to bunch and hike so you're not tripping over it - and I'm 5'7 in 3.5-inch heeled booties. So if you're short, this dress is probably not for you. The hem is uneven which wasn't very clear on the model so it would take some maneuvering to tape a shorter hem. All in all, I love this dress and will definitely rent again in a smaller size.
Perfect dress for the fall! I felt so cute and on Trend in this dress. The length was great for me (5'8) in 2 inch boots and I loved the neckline and sleeves! Would definitely rent again
Beautiful, but definitely shows off a lot on top. I wore with a cashmere scarf because it was chilly, but if you are busty, you may want to wear a camisole!
Felt so beautiful in this dress, low neckline had to pin it but really gave me a great shape, very flowy
Too big at the top

Rented this for an everyday work look. It was too low cut for work, but a great weekend dress. The bottom cut is great and dynamic. Does run large. It would have been better with a belt (I didn't have a waist-sized belt).

Got this yesterday and already obsessed with it. Nicer than I thought it would be. It's a perfect autumn dress with material that is flow-y but also warm enough. It's thick enough to wear with no bra if that gives an indication! Fits wise, I am usually a 4 and went for a 2 and it is the perfect size. But the reason for that is that the only place that's really 'fitted' is the waist - so judge the size by your waist size. If you have a smaller waist (like me), keeping it as your normal size or going one size down is a great move. If not then you may want to size up. Length wise, it's true to the photos here. I'm a bit over 5"9 and the length was spot on, exactly like you see in the photo on this page (long but not touching your feet). In short, a keeper!

I really wanted to wear this dress to work, but it was WAY too long for me, even with 3.5" heels on. I rented a 4 (am usually a 2 or 4) and am 5'5" - even with the heels, this dress was dragging on the ground. Really designed for taller folks.

links_Review_Title: Great fall dress to pair with booties
links_Review_Text: Runs big in the waist but super cute. I paired with white booties for a fall day!

links_Review_Title: It was very flowy and nice print.
links_Review_Text: The top is very large -- be careful of cleavage showing for events.
Wore to a brunch and received tons of compliments! Flattering fit. Very deep neck though, had to pin it. Would rent again for a fall occasion
Wished this outfit could've worked for me. It was way too long and I needed it in a smaller size. Cute slits and playful colors though!

links_Review_Title: Got so many compliments! The dress is a little long. I wore it with black booties. V cute for fall!
links_Review_Text: Wear with booties and a leather jacket! Loved for fall

It was a comfortable yet flattering dress. Loved it so much and wish I could wear it out but it was still so nice to wear on Easter Sunday inside during the NYC lockdown. Everyone we talked to on the phone that day complimented the dress :-*
I wore this for my birthday dinner. Super comfortable. The straps are adjustable which is good because I am short. This dress is very lightweight too.

Comfortable fit. At first the top part with the design that doesn't line up with the natural breast line was weird...but I really like this dress. Beautiful pattern. Lightweight material. Another weekend wowwer for looking well put together. I wore it with black roman sandals #Designer #Pattern #DerekLam

links_Review_Title: Incredible dress for vacation in Mexico
links_Review_Text: This dress was stunning! I loved the print and style - my only complaint is that it's slightly large in the chest but nothing a padded strapless bra couldn't help with. I would probably reorder one size down next time.
beautiful dress, should buy it if not so expensive
Wore this to work and then a boat cruise! Very fun print but I didn't love how the lining is at the top - feels like it should cover under your boobs but it doesn't. Overall pretty Dress.

LOVED this dress so much. I could make the 40 (Size 4) work because of the adjustable straps and the tie around the waist, but the 38 would have been better. I will 100% rent again but a size smaller! Also I'm 5'6 and could have easily worn flats or heels of any height. Love this dress!!!!

This dress is gorgeous. The picture doesn't do it justice. The quality is amazing, the fabric is thick and heavy (but not hot), and you can tell it's an expensive dress. Perfect maxi dress length for shorter girls. I wish I could buy it. Not tight, you can wear a bra under.

I love this dress! The material is great (does wrinkle after sitting for awhile though), but not see-through. The straps are adjustable! I got a size 12, although I may have been able to order a size 10. I'm in between sizes right now, so I felt more comfortable in the 12. I'm 5'5" and loved the length with a wedge, but could have worn flat sandals too!

links_Review_Title: Stunning summer dress makes you feel special!
links_Review_Text: This dress is so easy-Breezy and oh-so perfect for summer! I'm in love! I rented this for my corporate company picnic, and I'm glad I did because it's going to be 90 degrees this weekend. I've already worn the dress to dinner last night and work today. Getting a lot of looks and smiles and I feel so pretty! I'm in between a 14/16, but ordered a size 18 (Italian size 54) and it was just perfect! Size up one for comfort if you can, as there isn't much give or stretch to the dress, but it's very comfortable one size up. I'm thinking about purchasing I love it so much!
Runs small. Odd fit with the lining that is not meant to go fully under the bust.
Beautiful print but not flattering

links_Review_Title: It was such a cute dress that works for day and night
links_Review_Text: I am shorter but the straps were the perfect length, and it also wasn't too long for me at all. I wore it during the day with a sweater then easily transitioned to heels and a jacket for the evening event, versatile and I loved it.

This dress is probably better for a taller, straighter body but I did like it. The pattern is great and the buttons keep it from flying all over. It's a heavy fabric which doesn't quite go with the causal print, and the price is ridiculous, but I enjoyed wearing it.

links_Review_Title: doesn't work well with larger chest
links_Review_Text: i struggled with the chest portion a bit since it was more sectioned out, doesn't work v well w larger chests. also sized down when i shldve gotten my reg 2, but that's on me!
Pattern was prefect for fall, paired with a jean jacket and boots, tons of compliments.

Super confusing belt cord situation. My dress also came with a button missing and the fabric had a huge snag. The chest area was super large, though and the rest of it fit well. It was cute, but for the price this runs, I was surprised at how wonky it fit.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful fabric which has a bit of weight. Loved it
links_Review_Text: The picture doesn't do this dress justice!! The bust is interesting, stitching that isn't meant to go along the bra underwire line, but across.
It was lovely fabric but it was unwearable. The bust gaped SO LARGE. It's like built for a super tall, super busty woman. Ech.

I hate I didn't take a pic in this dress! It was so fun and perfect for a summer concert that I wore it to. It's appropriate for mostly anything, just maybe not the office. The fit was slightly large but you can adjust the straps and the wrap. It was feminine, chic, summery- will be renting again. I was one click short of buying it, but beware it sells for $1k plus on RTR! Fingers crossed for a sale.
Fits perfectly. Material is lightweight. Felt so pretty
Love everything about this dress except for the fabric. I gotta say, I would love to buy this but the fabric is this cheap crepe material, not a $1500 dress!!
This was a beautiful dress with fantastic details. It had a lot of extra details on the back and at the hem that made this very special. I wore it without a bra and it worked well.
Got so many compliments on this dress. Fit true to size in the body (maybe a little small) except the chest was a little baggy...

links_Review_Title: Incredible color, I just wish it had fit
links_Review_Text: I ordered my normal size 8 but didn't wear because it was just too tight over my imperfect belly. The dress gathered above the hips and across the belly to accentuate imperfections. It also gaped across the bust (I'm a 36C/D) and cut into the skin under my arms creating rolls I don't usually have. I have returned it and will try the 10 because the emerald green color is stunning and uncommon. The color is perfect for fair-skinned ladies and the fabric feels totally luxurious
Loved the colors and fit of this dress! I rented a 4 because they were out of my usual 6, and the dress fit fine even in the hips (my biggest part). Great length for my height. Lovely!

This dress is beautifully made and so comfortable to wear! I usually wear a 2, but it was unavailable so opted for the 4. It fit just right actually, making me think it runs small. The V- neck, wrap top is very flattering in the front. You really can't go wrong with this dress. Just make sure you're somewhere warm so you can show off the back detailing :)
Great dress for a wedding. As in other reviews, the top was a bit too large on me but otherwise a great fit and flattering. I wore a regular strapless bra that I pinned beneath the strap in the back.
Loved it! Beautiful colors... pics don't do it justice :)
This dress fit like a glove and was nice and light. Wore it to a daytime wedding and got lots of compliments! Will def rent again!
Perfect. So many compliments!

Very pretty fabric, colors and detail. It's true the chest area is large so expect it to be loose if you are small chested like me. You can't wear a full bra but I wore some of those sticky things. At 5'1" I needed heels for the back to not touch the ground. Was comfortable and not super fitted on me - room for a big meal and to breathe. It could have been a tiny bit more flattering but overall I still found it flattering and enjoyed wearing to a fall wedding. The back detail is beautiful too.

Loved this dress! The fit was true to size. I did have extra extra room in the chest. The bow and open back are so pretty - I ended up going braless and that probably contributed to the extra room in chest. It fit perfect everywhere else. The flow of the dress was beautiful and fun for dancing.
The waist band doesn't stretch, but fit my waist perfectly. The V wasn't too deep, the fabric was soft and forgiving and the colors popped. Loved this dress.
Big in the boobs, but the waistband is tight and has no give. If you're more of an hourglass than I am, it'll work.

links_Review_Title: Great for summer wedding - see sizing info below
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a friend's wedding in Hawaii. The pattern and material is gorgeous. Re: fit- the waist runs true to size or a little small. The chest area was big on me but I am not well endowed by any means. Would look best on someone w narrow waist and c cup or larger but don't be discouraged if you have smaller breasts, you can wear with a strapless bra for extra padding

I rented a couple dresses for this wedding and this was was the last one I just threw in the bag as a backup. It was the one I went with. The fabric is great, you can tell that it's very high quality!
Beautiful color and amazing fit. Solid but light fabric. The back is a showstopper. Nice fitted top for a 34D and no bra needed. I will definitely track this one down again.
This dress was amazing!! Fit very true to size. I loved every moment I wore it!!

Fits true to size but I rated it a 4/5 because the back opening isn't very fitted. It fit perfectly everywhere else and it isn't noticeable but it bothered me a bit. Had lots of compliments and was fun to dance in!

links_Review_Title: Pretty and got lots of compliments - but runs big
links_Review_Text: The dress is tit shaming me! Was very roomy upstairs :) nice fabric and great for summer. A bit dramatic but hey, so am I.
Such a fun summer dress, loose everywhere but the ribbon waist. Loved

links_Review_Title: This dress made me feel so pretty
links_Review_Text: This dress was just lovely. The colors are beautiful the hemline is flowy and moves nicely when you walk. The back is a sexy detail as well. I felt like a million bucks out to dinner with my husband in this dress. Fits true to size.
So huge in the chest Must wear a strapless bra

I have a long torso and I'm smaller up top, so sadly the dress was too large in the waist and bust. If you're pretty proportional then the dress should fit perfectly. It's a great dress that I never got to wear.

links_Review_Title: Nice and flowy a little snug around the waist if curvy
links_Review_Text: Dress was nice and thin material, good if you get hit easily. Only downfall was the ribbon area around the waist, had no give so if you are a little curvy/have a tummy it is a little tight and creates an unflattering tummy pooch.

This dress is gorgeous. I love the vivid colors and print. Fabric feels great and I like the way it is cut. The skirt moves beautifully. I just didn't like how the back is cut - showing too much flesh! Not great for me, but you might love it.

This dress is beautiful in person. The colors are vivid and the fit is very flattering. I'm only sorry I don't have a photo to share. I wasn't able to wear a bra, but there was enough support in the dress I could get away with just nipple covers. I would rent this again for the right event.
Absolutely beautiful dress but was way way too small!

links_Review_Title: Stunning gown. Ribbon waist is very beautiful
links_Review_Text: Wore for a wedding rehearsal. Beautiful fabric and very comfortable. The perfect summer dress.

links_Review_Title: LOVE this dress. Comfortable and flattering.
links_Review_Text: I've rented this twice. Great for large boob small waist/rib cage gals.

links_Review_Title: nice dress for a wedding or photoshoot
links_Review_Text: Rented this for a fall photo shoot. It coordinated perfectly with my little one's green dress but the colors are not vibrant. I had to wear a cami underneath as I have a big chest. It was ok, didn't make me feel wow.

The dress is beautiful in person, but the top was tighter than expected. The zipper was also difficult to get up and down. I was so nervous I was going to break it, just unzipping it to get into. I'm sure this would be beautiful on someone less busty though!
Ribbon is tight around the waist but looks really good

links_Review_Title: Sweet dress, but too big on top and too small on bottom
links_Review_Text: It was wearable, but a little baggier on top than I'd want it and a touch tighter around my hips than ideal.

links_Review_Title: Just ok for cocktail attire wedding
links_Review_Text: I didn’t think fabric was fancy enough for my event. This dress would be great for an outdoor beach wedding but not an evening cocktail wedding. The fit was snug. Wore my backup dress instead!

links_Review_Title: This dress is gorgeous but I ended up not wearing it because of the fit.
links_Review_Text: It was very snug in the bust area - I will size up next time!
Fits great and it very fun and thrirly!
Very comfortable and beautiful dress. Loved it. Felt confident and beautiful the entire night.

links_Review_Title: Pretty dress but there's a tricky back bra-wise so I opted to wear another dress in my batch.
links_Review_Text: Fit seemed true to size and the side zipper is nice and long.

links_Review_Title: Great dress, large in the bust
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for a wedding and loved it. The bust was a little big but was able to clip tighter since the bow in the back hid the clips.
Fun dress, slightly gaping in the back for me but otherwise great fit. Not too much cleavage.
Made well and has a slip underneath however it was super baggy on me. Size down and it should for perfect.
So beautiful and love the colors in person. Perfect for vacation as well. Size S is comfortable for a Willow pumping mom. Probably be fine with XS without pumps
Super comfy & easy to wear. You could definitely dress it up! Runs a bit large

Fit super large overall! Not very cute or shapely. If that's what you're going for them this is the dress for you. Would not recommend this dress to anyone. Especially if you are smaller than a size 4
Really lovely dress and lightweight for a comfortable fit. It would be perfect for any spring/summer occasion.

I rented this for a vacation to Morocco. It was a beautiful silk fabric that was lightweight and it came with a removable slip although I wore it without, the fabric was not see through. I loved wearing this dress, I felt so chic while still being conservative.

Such a girly pattern, flowy and proper looking- great for work! It comes with an under slip that looks tiny and short, but you have to wear it or the dress would be a bit see through. Dress runs large (under slip small).
Got tons of compliments. Considering buying it!

This is one of my favorite pieces I've ever rented. It's absolutely gorgeous! The color, the material, the pattern, the fit. Stunning. I got so many compliments on this. It is long and oversized except for the tie waist but I loved the way it fit me.

This dress feels so good to wear and show off. Worked well for 2nd trimester maternity. It's flowy, light and hangs perfectly. Other reviews mention shapelessness - I would agree this is a dress for a taller person. Having a bump, being above-average height, and the front tie made it a non-issue for me.

I chose this pretty floral dress to wear to our Mother's Day Luncheon. It is so pretty with its pastel pinks and yellow feminine print. This dress is soft and silky, even comes with a separate satin slip to wear underneath it. I appreciated the long billowy sleeves, being on the coast. Yet I was still comfortable in the California sunshine. Oh my- do I like pockets on a dress! I felt casual with the drawstring tie and simultaneously dressy for the occasion. Paired it with sandals and a light pink purse.
Loved this dress - great material, comfortable and beautiful print. Paired it with brown boots and gold hoop earrings

I read another review that said this dress reminded them of a nightgown, and that's not entirely inaccurate. I wore this dress for a friend's baby shower and it was super comfortable all day. Although it wasn't my husband's favorite, I received a lot of compliments from everyone. I'm tall which I think is helpful for this dress.
Defiantly a larger silhouette but can clinch at the waist. Very flowy and revived lots of compliments
Wore to Palm Sunday service & a social. Wore with gold jewelry & I thought it was lovely. Very comfortable.
loved this dress for a family bunny brunch! I unbuttoned the top 2 and bottom button to make it less pajama/ish! Super cute and tons of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Cute pattern, but a little matronly
links_Review_Text: The model makes this look very chic and springy. But I felt like I was in a nightgown. I ended up using double stick fashion tape to bring the sleeves up and opened the top two buttons. The waist tie helped to give a little shape, but I have very curvy hips and I felt like most of my shape was lost in the fabric. I wore it anyways because I didn't hate it, but, a little frumpy and more yellow than the model photos.
This is a lovely print, but didn't work for me. I was hoping to wear this for a maternity photo shoot, but the waste is too low to meet my bump. Also, bc it is not stretchy, I just looked huge.

links_Review_Title: The large was too big. Too long in the sleeves.
links_Review_Text: I would need a medium in this dress but I loved the print and was really excited about it. Hopefully the medium will become available soon.

really gorgeous material and love the bottom part, it's flowy and light. But the top really isn't flattering, especially at the shoulders and the sleeves are a bit too long on the XS even for a reasonably tall girl.
I really loved this dress the color is very soft. It was big perhaps size down. I needed this for a modest event and it was perfect.
So pretty! Very flowy and comfortable. Loved this dress. Paired with light beige suede platforms sandals.

Rented for work during the summer and wore while traveling on a plane. Was really comfortable and lose and the tieable waist means it's not so frumpy. Great work dress for summer although it's pretty light fabric so bring a jacket for the office AC!

links_Review_Title: Pretty pattern, but was way too big.
links_Review_Text: It would have probably looked better on a different body type, but it looked like a nightgown on me.
It's a beautiful dress and lightweight. It comes with a slip. It is slightly large but the waist has a drawstring. I'm short and it is more like a maxi dress.

links_Review_Title: Dress is ok. Slip underneath runs about 45 sizes small
links_Review_Text: The dress itself is fine. The muted colors and the overall style are a little boring. My husband told me I looked like "little house on the prairie" so that's not great.... and the top layer runs a little on the big side. The slip underneath (which you need because the dress is sheer) runs literally 10 sizes smaller than the dress. If you want to rent this, rent your regular size or a size smaller than usual, and just plan on using something else underneath.
I adored this dress and loved how it looked. My only negative is the slip was very small so I had to wear one I own. Received so many compliments!
The dress is HUGE so size down and the color made me look washed out, its really pretty on the hanger, on me not so much.
I'm all for oversized, but even sizing down I was swimming in this. The print is really what does it in though. You have to work hard at styling around this one

links_Review_Title: I wore this for a daytime wedding ceremony at a church, and besides the weird sizing, it was great.
links_Review_Text: Super cute dress, though it ran really big (I could have easily worn the small), except the accompanying slip was TINY - barely fit. I think you could probably size down and wear with your own slip or with longer Spanx (it wasn't see-thru, just had some static cling otherwise to your legs).
not flattering on me
This dress is perfect for business meetings. Very comfortable and the colors are lovely. I sized down and it fits great.
I wanted to love this beautiful, simple dress. It was WAY TOO LARGE! I'd suggest 2 sizes down. I tightened the waist and tried to roll the sleeves but it was too much fabric. Silky, lovely print.

Very beautiful and billowy. I left the top button unbuttoned as it looked a bit too conservative for me with it buttoned - not quite like the model. Only con is that it's a little longer than midi length on me. Would buy it outright from RTR if it weren't so expensive.
Wanted to keep it! I was so pretty and feminine! I loved it
Does run large but cute and flowy

links_Review_Title: Super large dress, awkwardly small slip
links_Review_Text: Nice material but did not find flattering and agree with matronly comments. I paired with structured blazer and wore my own slip to give it a little shape. Might be better if you add belt?
I don't like wearing yellow. This dress is not pink, not beige, it's yellow. It is also very big. I had to safety pin it at the neck to get it to look normal.
It is big! Very large! Size down!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful print, WAY TOO BIG. Size down.
links_Review_Text: Size down!

links_Review_Title: Easy breezy... just what you want on vacation
links_Review_Text: The fit was loose and I may have been able to go down to an 8 but I liked the loose fit for vacation. Beautiful fabric!

Wanted to love the dress but overall it made me look/feel larger. May try and order down for my upcoming vacation. Material was lovely and flowy; it just wasn't the right fit for me. Could be dressed up or down depending on accessories and situation.

My 6 year old picked this one and it was a lot of fun. At first I thought it would be too long, but it was just right on me. I'm 5'5". It went right above the ground with flats and I just had to remember to lift up the skirt on stairs. Super fun and flowy and lightweight. Fun colors. I got lots of compliments. My only concern was getting the waist over my chest. There is no zipper. The waist was fitted, which was nice, but thankfully I am small chested. Size B. Any bigger I don't think I could get the dress on. But there were some ribbons at the waist and maybe it was adjustable. I just couldn't figure it out.

The dress had a comfortable fit especially after I worked with the side ties. I loved the way the silky fabric flowed in the breeze! Lots of compliments including "you look like a sunset!" Will rent again.
Draws compliments for sure !

Besides this dress being in my favorite color combo-- it really is beautifully made and designed. It's adjustable to either wear loose or sinched, and in a really beautiful silk. The patchwork colors make it a fun dress that I think can be pretty versatile.. really loved it! Would say since it's adjustable the size is a little roomy but it all depends on how you want to wear it
This dress is bright and fun. You can use the strings on the sides for a more fitted less boxy look
This dress is stunning. It's a loose fit but don't let that deter you - the way it blows in the wind or as you walk is a true head turner. Would highly recommend and rent again.
Loved the soft flowy silky material. But it runs really large!
Cute. Just fits really large.

This is a top ten rental! So many spontaneous compliments from strangers! The definition of stunning! I wore this a few times. It seems overdressed for many things since the fabric is so nice, but on the other hand it just makes you feel fabulous!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for an outdoor summer wedding!
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! It was elegant and comfortable!

links_Review_Title: I got engaged in this gorgeous dress, and am so happy I did!
links_Review_Text: I am obsessed with this dress. I got it for everyday wear, and had it on when my boyfriend (now fiancé!) proposed!! It's a great material, silk, flowy and the colors are so vibrant. They looked amazing in all our pictures. Can't say enough great things about this dress!

Like another reviewer I couldn't wait for this dress and when I finally got it was so excited to wear it. The colors are beautiful and it worked well for my 25 week bump but it was still a lot of dress and I wasn't dying to wear it again but enjoyed it the one time I did.

Rented this amazing Amur dress for party. This dress is SO versatile!! Not a maternity dress but might as well be! The ties make it so you can ruche the dress in various places and play with the shape of the dress- I was able to accentuate my 6 month bump. The fabric and color is gorgeous. Incredibly comfortable for an outdoor summer soirée- light and airy and effortless!

links_Review_Title: Not as special as I wished.
links_Review_Text: I highly anticipated this dress, but it was just okay for me. One of my least favorite rentals. Too bad because the colors are killer.

links_Review_Title: MOST VIBRANT DRESS YOU WILL EVER WEAR
links_Review_Text: The second I put it on, I couldn't stop smiling... it is so STUNNING! So many compliments. The colors are so vibrant and it really stands out. I tied the strings differently to make it a little "figure forming." I wish I could buy it!!!

This dress is amazing. Rented for a night out in Charleston- love the color and material. Can be dressed up or down. Ties are a little hard to handle but I was able to tie as a belt it rather than cinch at the hips. I'm 5'8 but wasn't able to wear heels because the dress was a little short which helped dress it down.

I loved this dress so much. It did not have the tags on when it arrived, although I suspect I was one of the first renters. It was featured in the new arrivals email and I got it days later. I wore it twice and was very gentle with it, out of fear. I noticed a few pin holes here and there. I took it off before doing anything crazy. Therefore, if you want it, I'd rent this one soon. It possibly won't have a long lifespan. The 8 fit like a roomy medium. TTS. The fabric is matte in some spots and shiny in others (two colored fabrics with two different sides used). It looks a bit like a parachute, but it doesn't feel like one. I'm 5'6" and it was the perfect length. Didn't drag on the ground in flats. It'll be far too long for. 5'2" gal. Sorry.

Everyone love this dress including me. Perfect for a heat wave. Beautiful silk. Great colors. Good length with flats for my height 5 fr 7. Ties are adjustable. So you can tighten/loosen. Arm holes were a little low. Probably best to size down if smaller bust/shorter torso, but seemed TTS over all for me.
Great fit! I was able to wear flats at 5'2" with little issue.
Loved the vibrant colors! Runs large, I ended up tying the side strings around my front and back to synch it a bit up top. There were some stains as well - silk is hard to clean I get it.

links_Review_Title: I didn't end up wearing this dress due to intended fit.
links_Review_Text: The fit of this dress wasn't all that flattering. Although the colors were fun and vibrant, the dress didn't wasn't anything special.
Fits great! Loose and effortless

I wore this several times during my trip to the Caribbean. Once to a fancy dinner, and then a few more times for a more casual day by the pool and a lunch. The colors really pop. It does run quite large and is basically a circus tent if you don't use the ties to cinch it at the waist. It wound up being really flattering.

links_Review_Title: One of my faves (quite long tho!)
links_Review_Text: Color, fit, texture all winners. However, walking up stairs can prove difficult if you're on the shorter side.

this dress is a gorgeous fabric, unforgettable colors and the detailing makes you feel luxurious. It does run large, and it does show cleavage if ur like me (32E/F). Its a bit long on 5'3" but 2" platform/wedges solved that problem.

links_Review_Title: Couldn't pull off the colors, but a fun and size-flexible dress.
links_Review_Text: The ties made this dress super flexible, you could easily scrunch both ties up to the maximum and really define your waist. I just wasn't into the color pairing, I wish it had been all fuchsia or a different two colors.

links_Review_Title: Felt wonderful to wear. The fabric is so smooth
links_Review_Text: So much extra fabric makes for a great, flowy feeling.

This dress is versatile in terms of sizing. The drawstrings allow you to customize the fit to your liking, so you can size up or down from your normal size and still have a wearable garment! The colors are vibrant and beautiful. Be prepared for LOTS of compliments!

I have never received so many compliments on my attire from strangers in my life. I felt amazing in this dress. I would love to own it. It can be dressed up as the bright silk is formal or dressed down with flat sandals and a denim jacket. Love love love.

links_Review_Title: super photogenic dress, my favorite rental so far!
links_Review_Text: felt a little large around the waist

links_Review_Title: Beautiful colors and interesting / unique fit.
links_Review_Text: I don't think this dress photographs very well despite the beautiful colors! Very pretty in person. Fit is a little odd because of the drawstrings, which some might like but which make for weird buckling in the material. Very comfortable and appropriate for maternity! Wore this 5 months pregnant.
I ended up wearing this dress backward and felt it was more flattering on me - probably due to the size (it was a bit big).

WOW this is an incredible dress. I've really falled for AMUR. The fabric itself is like a silk satin with a nice light shine. The piece drapes over your body and you cinch it at the waist and just above the hips. No zipper or wiring or anything uncomfy - just a perfect dream of a vacation dress. Runs true to size - I probbaly could've done a 4 and the 6 isn't too long to wear with sandals.
Was waiting for this dress forever and it did not disappoint! Colors are so eye-catching and it's great to be so comfortable in such a show-stopping dress.

Really loved this one...the fabric is amazing and the colors are super bright. I wanted to be able to wear it casually and it was just a little too long and too much fabric for flat sandals but I would love to own this one and have it tucked away for special events!
Beautiful colors, amazing to hide some extra pounds.
The straps are a little long on this dress- which is saying a lot Brooke am pretty tall. The shape is reminiscent of Donna Reed, but that made what would be a casual dress feel a little more special
