This dress is amazing quality, really beautiful, and got me tons of compliments. But it also got me highly squished boobs and an angry red line all around my ribs. It fit wonderfully through the bottom but the top is ... whew, the top is tight. And I'm an A cup.
Fit wonderfully in the 4. I would say this runs small as I typically wear a 0 or 2 and this fit like a glove in the larger size. Fabric is think and the dress is extremely well constructed.

links_Review_Title: Great dress but tight in the chest
links_Review_Text: Beautiful pattern, nice heavy material, great style! Like other reviewers, I found it tight through the chest. I wore it with a minimalist lace bandeau "bra" to minimize the over the top cleavage that I had with a traditional bra. Also provided a little extra coverage for the low cut front. Would probably work better with smaller bust. If it weren't for the tight chest, I would have really loved this dress!!
It's a little heavy, but such a beautiful dress!
This dress is really cute and very summery. The only thing is the chest area is a bit low.

This was perfect for my México vacation. It photographed well and is great for small waists. No stretch and very thick fabric. It took up a lot of suitcase space! Somewhat low cut if you're not into that. I'm a small C cup and it was tight in the chest.

I loved this material & pattern! It was heavy but perfect for an engagement party or bbq! Sweat does not show and the pockets are great for not wanting to carry a bag. I did wear a sticky bra because it's a bit low in the he front but not bad.

Like other reviews, this dress is tight around the rib cage. I have a narrow upper body/rib cage, so I usually size down (to a 0) in dresses but the 2 was still a little snug in that area. I was still able to wear it and the rest of the dress fit fine. Fabric was great quality and didn't wrinkle!

Like others describe, this dress is tightest at your natural waist, and around the ribcage. The length is nearly longer than tea length, it hit me mid calf. The pockets are huge and super fun and the print is bright pink.

links_Review_Title: So cute, but not right for post-breastfeeding bust
links_Review_Text: This cute dress was too low-cut to wear a bra with, and my breasts (having nursed two children) just didn't look that great. Too bad, because otherwise it is adorable! Probably easier to wear as a medium- to smaller-chested woman.
Much more pink in person. The waist has no give whatsoever and the chest is small/tight. And the sleeves are far too big, they never would have stayed up. But it does have a pretty pattern.

I fluctuate between 4/6 but I know Saloni tends to run and bit small and therefore I selected a 6. Size was spot on. Dress could be a little small/minimal coverage for a larger bust but was just right for me. I also liked how it was fitted at the waist (no stretch at the waist). I found it to be flattering while also comfortable. Dress is ideal for an hourglass figure.
Like most other reviews, it was too tight around my ribcage, which normally is never a pinch point for me. Definitely order a size up!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but small on top
links_Review_Text: Loved the print and thickness of the dress. It was so cute but was unfortunately unable to wear it because it was way too tight under my chest. My ribs stick out and it was really hard to button the dress only in that area. The rest of dress fit fine except for the band/design right under the chest.

links_Review_Title: Size up two sizes if you have any boobs at all
links_Review_Text: Very small in the chest and even waist

links_Review_Title: Tight on top and thick material
links_Review_Text: Was too small to close around my ribs and chest- wasn't as pretty as I'd hoped - quickly returned and did not wear
Beautiful dress but runs small. I normally wear a 4 and ordered a six. The bust was so tight. Will be returning.

links_Review_Title: Eek, too tight to get on!
links_Review_Text: I loved the details and structure of this dress. Beautiful and great material. I could not get it on though, my chest is wide and there was no way it would fit. So if you're wide in the check area this will absolutely not work
The bodice was a little small. Recommend sizing up

links_Review_Title: Couldn't button up in chest area
links_Review_Text: I rented this to wear on vacation to Mexico. The print is fun and I think the silhouette would be nice but it was way too small in the chest area. (I'm pretty average in the chest area)
Beautiful pattern, but runs incredibly small.
Cute dress! Low cut so I layered with a denim shirt for work.
Love the fit and fabric, but again too small over the chest; I need to size this one up as well
Could't wear, too small
super cute dress it was just a snug tight in the waist i didn't wear because it was too low in the bust for me

links_Review_Title: It did not make my event unforgettable.
links_Review_Text: This dress was really small in the waste. Very tight in the chest area as well. I should have sized up.
An absolute hit for a bachelorette weekend! I wore it to a wine tasting event and everyone loved it!

I got this in a 4 even though I'm normally a 6, because often that'll work for me with a dress that's narrowest around the rib cage, like this one. Not this time! I could barely get the buttons closed, and my squished boobs looked a mess. Obviously, this is not the dress's fault. I'm going to try it again in a size 6 if it ever becomes available, because this thing looks beautifully, casually expensive.
very tight on top. Too much 'cloth' at bottom. Not just flared; way too much extra cloth.
As many reviewers say it's way too small. Couldn't even button across my chest

links_Review_Title: Way too small in chest and rib cage, and I'm a 32 bra band so usually wear size 2
links_Review_Text: Couldn't even button it
Couldn't even a little get this buttoned
the bust is tight, and i have a small chest
As other people saying, around the chest was really tight. I wasn't able to wear it although I have a very flat skinny chest. The material was very tick. It could have been nice if I could wear it...

links_Review_Title: So tight on ribs! Couldn't breathe & I have small torso Next size would be too big everywhere else.
links_Review_Text: So cute but proportionally off!
I couldn't wear this as it was incredibly tight (I am a 32 D).

links_Review_Title: too low cut and runs very small
links_Review_Text: I'm usually a 0 in dresses and the 2 was tight. It was too low cut to wear too. I'm 5/5 120 lbs.

links_Review_Title: I ended up not wearing this item, I did not like the metallic embellishment at the waist
links_Review_Text: fits well, overall cute, did not notice the metallic embellishment at the waist, I would not have ordered it otherwise

links_Review_Title: Could not wear this dress, which is so sad because it is so pretty. to tight on upper torso
links_Review_Text: Nice weight to the fabric and the print is much nicer in person, am going up a size.
Lots of complements for this dress! Rented for a black tie wedding. I am 5'5 and wore 4 inch heels with the 6 Long dress. Definitely rent the long version if you want to wear heels.

I felt so great in this dress. It fit like a glove and I got a lot of compliments. I actually had two older women come over and start taking pictures of me😂 they loved the dress so much and wanted it for their granddaughter.

Wore this dress to a formal wedding. Very comfortable: I never felt constraint sitting down or dancing. It was perfect for the tone of the event. Received many compliments throughout the evening. Would definitely recommend!

links_Review_Title: Lightweight and easy to move around and dance in.
links_Review_Text: Unique pattern. Sheer panel adds some youthfulness without taking from the classic style.
Runs small. I am 5'3" and 140 lbs. I wore the 12R. Length perfect for me. I felt like Lady Mary in Downton Abbey! Very beautiful quality dress. Would rent again.

Ugh I loved this dress. It was a little long on me as you can see (I'm 5'3"). It fit a tiny bit loose around my waist (28") and a little tight around my arms and shoulders, which are a little wide. It is a statement all by itself and did not need much other effort on my part to finish an elegant and unique look. Definitely stood out from the crowd and got a lot of compliments! I love the little peep-through mesh at the waist.

This was perfect for a Mardi Gras ball! Fits true to size but a little snug on the hips. Beware...this dress runs short! I had to buy shorter heels so that the 8L wasn't too short, and I'm 5'7"! The regular didn't have the band detail at the bottom of the dress. The embroidery is beautiful and NOT scratchy! A bra is not required with this dress, but I used tape to feel more secure on the dance floor. The back of the dress would be too low for ladies with thick banded strapless bras like myself.

This dress is everything. I wore it to a black tie charity ball and it was to die for! It is classy and conservative yet edgy and sexy. You can get away with it all! Only warning is it was a weee short! I wore a 2 r and I'm 5'6, I got by in 1 inch heels! You'll love it

I rented the dress for a black tie wedding and my first time using RTR. The dress was slim fitting but comfortable. I would normally wear an 8 or 10 but went with the 12L to account for being top heavy and to wear 3inch heels. I was able to sit, stand and later dance the night away, without feeling like uncomfortable or like the dress might tear. Definitely a great dress and I can't wait to use RTR again.
I am a true size 4. the 4 fit comfortably but the 2 fit my body like a glove. It was perfect length.

Wore this to a formal winter wedding going with the old Hollywood glam look. Felt like a movie star! My favorite RTR rental so far! The detail on the dress is stunning! I am 5'1" and the dress fit perfectly with 4" heels. Very comfortable. Danced all night in it and no problems sitting down or messing with the dress all night. Loved the sleeves...they kept me warmer and made my arms look smaller which is a plus! Received compliments all night and even the next couple days after still!

links_Review_Title: Wore this to the CMAs, such a fun rent.
links_Review_Text: Got SO many compliments and felt like one of the stars. I noticed that it ran slightly short, and there isn't really any give in the hips so I'd definitely get the free extra size if you're renting this & see what works best.

links_Review_Title: Sophisticated dress for black tie wedding in NYC. Received many compliments!
links_Review_Text: I originally ordered a 4R because I'm 5'7" and 125 lbs, but after ordering I noticed that several reviews claimed this dress ran small and short. Other women around my same height rented a 6L, so I changed my order from a 4R to a 6L and I am so happy that I did! The 6L dress fit perfectly. The wedding was also black tie preferred so I did worry a little about being under dressed... I shouldn't have worried at all because once I received the dress I saw that the stitching and fine details were so lovely and sophisticated that it was definitely formal enough for this particular event. It was perfect!

links_Review_Title: So many compliments on this dress.
links_Review_Text: Great fit! I'm 5'4 and wore 4 inch hills.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a winter black tie wedding!
links_Review_Text: Fit perfect in all the right places and I was so confident all night. Tons of compliments, I wish I could keep it forever!!

links_Review_Title: Longed to wear this dress forever and finally got my chance
links_Review_Text: Last year I was heavier (14-16) and couldn't find a large enough size in this dress, as it does run small. But this year I'm slimmer (10-12) and was so excited to rent this beautiful dress for my husband's formal holiday gala. I think I had the most beautiful dress at the event. So, it definitely runs small; don't kid yourself, but get your backup in the larger size. It was snug, but I was able to dance, sit, etc. I got a million compliments. I didn't wear a bra and that was not a problem (the pattern obscures any "headlights" I might ordinarily worry about, hehe). I was super happy and I wasn't even dying to change out of my formalwear by the end of the night!

I'm 5'5", 130lbs and have an athletic/thicker build in my lower body. Normally my dress size is smaller 4-6 but after reading other reviews I went with 8R and it was perfect. The dress is really comfortable- no need to wear special undies or strapless bra, which is a big plus for me. So many compliments from others, at the event and on social media. Loved it!

links_Review_Title: Elegant embroidery, unique design, lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: I've never felt so elegant in a dress before. This dress had so many details on it that made it even more special. Would love to buy this dress. For sure no one will be wearing he same dress as you!

I felt sooo amazing in this dress! I received so many compliments while wearing it. It was extremely comfortable, but I did go a size up than I normally would wear. It fit like a glove. I wore short heels and it came to the perfect length. Any higher would have made it too short. I didn't want to get out of this dress!

links_Review_Title: Got so many compliments in this dress!!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to a formal wedding and got so many compliments all night. It ran true to size for me - I am 5'7 and the long was the perfect length with 3 inch heels. Fit me well throughout the hips and gaped only a little bit in the back. Would definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Such a stunning dress. I received so many compliments that it stole the show!!!
links_Review_Text: The fit is definitely snug around the hip and butt and I'm glad I had the 10 as a back up. It is not the most comfortable dress around the neck as it has such a high neckline, but it was such a hit that I just went with it.
Gorgeous, eye-catching dress. Received many compliments. Runs tight.
Beautiful details, fit perfectly. Not a lot of give in the material. I'm 5'3" and wore 3.5 inch heels to a company gala. I'm 32D, 26 waist and 36 hip and this fit perfectly.

links_Review_Title: This dress should be awarded an Oscar!
links_Review_Text: I personally did not wear this, I rented it for a coworker attending the same gala event. Based on reviews, she wore one size up and the regular length skimmed the floor perfectly on her 5 foot frame with 3" heels. The dress honestly looked as if it was tailored specifically for her, and had heads turning all night. The gala had a futuristic theme, so she styled the gown with a sleek high ponytail, a bright red lip and a pop of yellow with her bag. She usually wears a size 4 and rented the 6R.
I'm 5'3 and about 125lbs I wore a size 2 R and it fit perfect. It does run a little short but that becomes unnoticeable once you wear it. I received tons of compliments. Just beautiful!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a gala with an "old Hollywood glamour" theme
links_Review_Text: Tons of compliments on this stunning dress! Even from the woman who wore the same dress to the event. We had a lot of fun with that! I'm glad I got the 8L & 8R, as the long had more room in the shoulders and waist. Otherwise I think it would have been an uncomfortable night. The lace bodice helped keep me cool.

I desperately wanted an Art Deco dress for a NYC Central Park black tie affair wedding. Thanks to RTR that dream became a reality. Due to sizing availability and the reviews, I ordered an 8L. I'm a 4 or 6 but have been leaning towards 6 lately. The 8 was a little big on the waist, but fit comfortably on the hips. I was able to wear this the entire wedding (11AM -4AM the next day) and be comfortable. I'm 5'8". In the photo I'm not wearing heels, but my heels also fit and showed just the toes.
Fit like a glove, elegant, comfortable, loved every minute in this dress!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress! Got a lot of compliments:-)
This dress made me feel like a Glamorous Warrior Goddess!
links_Review_Text: Pros: Beautiful detailing, the peek-a-boo midsection, the fit makes the booty pop. Lot's of compliments throughout the night. I loved that it covered my shoulders as I have a tattoo that I don't like to show off at formal events. Cons: Backup dress came with a strange velvet bow that was not advertised in the photos. At 5'9" the 8L did not touch the floor so it hovered above my shoes. Could not wear this dress with shapewear due to the tight fit and the peek-a-boo midsection. If you have wide hips then you will need to size up because this dress has absolutely no stretch or give to it. It is made for hourglass proportions, not the apples or the pears of this world. Overall this dress made me feel so strong, confident, and glamorous at the gala. Unfortunately there was another woman there wearing the same dress but we had a good laugh about it.

links_Review_Title: Lovely dress with great detail! I got so many compliments on it!
links_Review_Text: There isn't a lot of stretch in this dress, so while it it lovely, it's not the best dress for dancing. It's also shorter than I expected, I am about 5' 4" and had to wear flats with the size 2. I did receive a lot of compliments on it and felt good in the dress. I runs a tad small, I usually wear a 0 in dresses but sized up.

links_Review_Title: Everyone asked who I was wearing
links_Review_Text: Initially I was disappointed when receiving this dress because it does run small. I sized up to the 6 and found it to still be more form fitting than preferred (the zipper seemed to curl and there was visible pulling in the front). However I stopped myself from calling for a backup after viewing other renters' photos and seeing how the fit of the dress is supposed to be. I packed a pair of Spanx instead and hoped for the best. Also the dress runs short. The picture of the model shows a horizontal band of fabric but this band is not included in the regular length. I'm 5'2" and the dress did not hit the ground when I stood on bare feet. Keep this in mind if you are taller than me and expect to wear high heels. I wore a 3" heel and was fine with the length. The third point I will note is that the zipper comes up to your mid back, making it uncomfortable to lean back against a hard surface since the zipper will press into your spine. Despite these challenges, the dress turned out to be a gem. I received a million compliments and everyone asked who I was wearing. I would definitely recommend this dress to others, but be aware of sizing when you order (size up and consider length). Perfect dress for an Indian wedding!
Such a classy and gorgeous timeless dress! Received compliments all night! Runs a little small, I'm usually a size 2. Such a beautifully made dress!
This dress is beautiful. It fits well and garnered compliments at a Roaring 20s event where everyone was dressed up. Loved it!

The dresses fit and detail work were sublime. Surprisingly, it's incredibly light weight considering all the stitching and dark fabric, which made this the ideal summer gown. As a short girl, the length is lovely which is not a common affinity in long dresses . No tripping , and no dragging . Just a well fit dress

links_Review_Title: Received TONS of compliments on this stunner!
links_Review_Text: As others noted, this dress runs small. I can fit a size 4 in other dresses by the same label, but this dress in a 6 barely fit me. The embroidered detail is stunning and accentuates an hourglass figure. The regular was barely long enough for kitten heels on me (5’6”).

links_Review_Title: Amazing detail, stitching accentuates all the right curves.
links_Review_Text: Absolutely stunning. I received so many compliments and felt so comfortable wearing this.

Went to a Distillery wedding and felt like a goddess. I typically wear size 10L but had a size 14L. Thankfully I had the bigger size and it worked perfectly. If you want to catch people's attention get this dress!

I am usually a size 2, but the 4 fit me better. I am about 5'6 and the 4L was a perfect length with heels on (would have been too long with short heels.) Fits a little snug in the midsection, but not too uncomfortable. This dress is a showstopper and I received so many compliments. Was perfect for a Manhattan black tie wedding.

links_Review_Title: This dress is GORGEOUS! I received so many compliments while wearing it!
links_Review_Text: Order a size up and go with the long! I typically wear an 8 and ended up wearing the 10L, but it fit like a glove!

This dress is beautiful! Fits true to size and is very flattering. The cuff details are velvet and the lace really does shimmer and shine making it look very evening and pretty. felt super comfortable!
Great dress.

Love the pleats in the body of the dress. The zipper like most hidden ones is a PITA. But once on feels so elegant and beautiful. Lace detail is intricate and has a shimmer to it. The only negative I could say is the mat the zipper falls throughout the night. Need a eye loop latch at the top.

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments, loved this dress
links_Review_Text: Fitted but comfortable. More shiny than I realized but perfect for a holiday party.

I rented this dress to attend a company dinner party. I felt this dress was very classy and appropriate for the event. I am 5'5" and 134 lbs. I ordered a 44r and 42r. The 44r was too big! I would say it's true to size.

I didn't realize this dress had velvet cuffs! I thought that was a sweet detail. The lace is a lot more shimmery in person. I loved the was the bottom looked! I ended up wearing another dress for this occasion, but will keep this dress in my back pocket for another event. It really is lovely.
Runs small (I usually wear a 40). This dress looks better in person than it does in photos. The sleeve cuff is a fun soft velvet. Not too itchy.
I wore this dress to a formal English wedding. It received many compliments. It was beautiful and appropriate without being too dowdy.

I absolutely love this dress! My favorite details are the velvet cuffs in contrast with the lace (semi see through) sleeves. This dress accentuates your waist and the skirt is very flattering! The pleats are so well done and it doesn't add any bulk to the skirt. It flows so well with movement; I had so many compliments on this dress! The built in slip revealed too much cleavage for me even though it was covered with the lace. I wore a black camisole underneath to add a bit more coverage. A+++++
Literally loved everything about this dress!!! The fabric was dreamy and just gorgeous. Pleated skirt was amazing. The cuffs on the wrist were velvet! I want to keep it forever!!

I'm a size 6, and this felt true to size. Very flattering and made my waist look super small. Wore it to a baptism and it was perfect for a cold fall day going to church. Received several compliments. I'm a pear shape and while the dress was not the best cut for my shape, it overall looked good. I could see the pleating not being complimentary for fuller figures. The zipper didn't lay perfectly flat and bubbled up a bit on the booty. Wanted to wear the size up as a result, but it was too big.
Thai dresses tight around the waist. I would size up. Loved the split skirt bottom!
I felt confident and sexy in this dress. One of my favorite rentals to date.
Great dress for a fall wedding, the sleeve and hem were perfect length. Runs a little small in the waist and rib cage area in my opinion, glad I sized up.

I absolutely loved this dress! I received so many compliments on it! The detail of the fabric is fantastic and just beautiful! The length is a true midi, which is very flattering. The dress is not at all heavy and would be easy to dance in!

links_Review_Title: Classy dress for a Classy Wedding
links_Review_Text: After a recent pregnancy I'm really closer to a size 8, but only the 6 was available. It was a bit tight to zip around my nursing sized boobs, but once on it was very slimming and forgiving on the 2 month postpartum bump! Lots of compliments and perfect choice for rooftop NYC fall wedding!

Fitted in the bust with the right amount of stretch elsewhere. Perfect tea length for me and I'm only 5'3. The details in this dress are gorgeous and i loved the hem line and the sleeves. A strapless bra worked fine. Very elegant!
unique dress with beautiful details, felt very comfortable and loved how it made me look and feel!

So happy I rented this! Length was perfect (meaning I'm too short and I'm just happy it's not too long) and the fit is a little tight but have enough room to feel comfortable. It's a little sparkly which I didn't mind at all. Will definitely rent again!
I loved everything about this dress. I'm small chested and managed to wear this without a bra! Major bonus! Both the 42 and 44 fit but went with the larger for breathing room.

Beautiful dress but size up. Like two sizes. I rented a 36R which is equivalent to a US size 4. I typically wear a 0 or 2. I was disappointment when it didn't work for me so if you're reading this..I hope this review helps you!
Easy to dance in, comfortable to wear
SO many compliments all night long! Dress fit great and was super comfortable. I'm 5'1 and the length still looked cute!

links_Review_Title: Pretty dress for winter but runs small
links_Review_Text: I got my suggested size from RTR and it would barely zip. Planning to swap for the next size up to wear to a office holiday party

This dress was phenomenal!! I ordered it on a whim but was unsure if I would love it since it was a little out of my comfort zone! It was so flattering and comfortable! The only con was that the waist was a little lower than I normally wear but not so much that I couldn't wear it!

links_Review_Title: Add a little glam to low key events
links_Review_Text: Wore this to a small laid back wedding and got lots of compliments. Was very comfortable to sit around playing board games in and was not restrictive.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful and flattering dress for a date night
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly around shoulders and waist. I loved the cuffed sleeves and the flowy-ness of the dress. Got so many compliments! Would wear it again.
Beautiful dress, perfect for a slightly chilly Michigan autumn outdoor wedding. But was light enough to dance the evening away! Would highly recommend

This dress is really pretty. It's pretty dressy because the fabric is shiny. I would've worn this dress if it fit properly, but the sleeves were too short. I'm 6 feet tall, so I have long arms, but usually long sleeved stuff fits me, but sometimes not.

links_Review_Title: Perfect late fall/winter wedding guest dress
links_Review_Text: The dress gives a beautiful shine in compliment to the sheer sleeves and velvet cuffed sleeves. The movement of the skirt is fantastic and the dress is both stretchy and structured.

links_Review_Title: Pretty dress, just not for me.
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size
Sits tight in the waist. High end fabric and really flattering. Would buy if it ever came on sale. Gorgeous.

links_Review_Title: The perfect feminine pant for any occasion
links_Review_Text: I can't say enough about how lovely these ankle length silk floral pants are. They are truly stunning. Easy to dress up or down and perfect for all occasions. Feel beautiful instantly! #feminine #SilkPants #Floral #wedding #everyday

These were great for a casual dinner out on vacation. The waistband is very stretchy so they were less restrictive than I was expecting. They were a tad short so if I was going to rent them again, I'd go for the 2L.
My pair was missing the hook part of the hook and eye, but still wearable. True to size. A little out of my comfort zone, but I loved them!

The print on these pants is beautiful and they're super comfortable. I have a 26 inch waist and the size 0 sat just barely below my natural waist, unstretched. The whole back of the waistband is elastic, so they could definitely fit a larger size person. They were the perfect length for me to wear flats without stepping on them. They're great quality and lined above the knee, not sheer at all. I'm not sure if the short lining would be noticeable outside in the sun but I don't think it was noticeable in my office. They felt nice and lightweight so I think they'd be good for year round weather. They did wrinkle pretty easily, but I don't think they looked too terrible because of it.

True to size, but a bit of elastic in the back of the waist adds a bit of give. Color was fun, super comfortable, and a breezy vibe for summer. They are lined to about the knee, which I found just made it hot. The polyester has a nice drape, but lacks breathability. Good for an air-conditioned office in the summer, but would be too hot for outside on a summer day.

I loved these pants! They were cute and so comfy, even in the 100+ degree weather. My teenaged brother, who normally makes fun of me and my clothing choices, said they were cool. Some adults complimented them as well. They are slightly cropped, which I didn't expect, but it wasn't a problem. I sized down based on other reviews –I normally wear a 10– and the fit was perfect.

I wore these pants for an event and also to work. For work I paired it with a pink blazer and nude heels. For the evening event I paired the pants with all black and loved the look! They are the perfect length - not too long.

links_Review_Title: Love these! Very comfortable and flows nicely.
links_Review_Text: Fit in my waist and hips. Was easy to match a shirt with.

These pants are beautiful. I ordered the 2, but likely would've been better off in the 0. Still the 2 was fine, just a little big in the waist, but nothing too concerning. The pants are a bit cropped. I assumed they'd go to the floor (I am 5'6"), but they cut a little closer to the low shin/ankle. I thought it looked funky at first, but it ended up working out! I also rented the top the model is wearing. Great outfit for a grad party!

In between TTS and large as I am usually a 4, sometimes a 2. Was scared about the length as I am on the shorter side, but these worked with flats as well as heels (as shown in the picture). Super comfy and flowy!

As others have said in their reviews, the pants have a stretchy waistband so if you are in between sizes, size down. These fit perfectly on me. They were short on me (not sure if they are supposed to be that short), so I pulled them up higher to make them look like culottes. Received a lot of compliments.

I received new with tags. I am usually a 4 or 6, ordered the 4 but it was way too loose in the waist, should have done a 2. There is elastic in the waistband, so there is some give if you need it. I think they are supposed to be high waisted, but hung in my hips so the crotch of the pant was 4 inches too low. Oddly, with them hanging on hips and low crotch, the pant length was just right for me at 5'4", so tall girls beware, these pants may be too short for you
These would be so fun for brunch with the girls, on vacation, or even work if styled appropriately. Damn you quarantine!
These were really cute, and would be great for a bridal or baby shower. Got lots of complements on them, and they were comfy.
Super fun pants worn with a tight top. Very comfortable, and loved the print. I sized down since they are loose, so that they would fit my waist and not be too long and they were perfect.

links_Review_Title: Rented for work, but too small to wear.
links_Review_Text: I wear a 14 in jeans, and this 14 didn't button. Sadly I couldn't wear.

Cute and colorful. They were a bit tight on my holiday/cruise-stuffed belly but pretty. On the longer side and the lining makes them heavier and warmer than you might expect based on their summary appearance.
Colors are easy to work with. Pants are comfortable and length is fair. Elegant and attractive.

links_Review_Title: I got a ton of compliments on these amazing pants.
links_Review_Text: The pants fit true to size. Pair with a longer tshirt to avoid front bunching
Love these pants. A little hard to find tops to go with them but still love them for every day.
Wore these to a casual work event. Very comfy and cute.
True to size. Not much give due to fabric, and did wrinkle after wearing. Easy to dress up or down. Fun look!

These are fun! It's an off-white base (I think the top it's paired with in the RTR photo makes it look like a brighter white). This is such a fun, pretty pair of pants. The floral pattern is really beautiful and unique, and the cut is pretty flattering. I often have to size up in bottoms (2 or 4), but I'm glad I went with the 0 - it was even a little roomy, and certainly comfortable. I didn't like that the lining of the pants stops at the knee. It didn't look obvious or bad, it just felt kind of weird having a hem rub against my knees. These are excellent for petite ladies! They run quite short, just hitting the ground on my 5'2" frame in flats.
Very comfortable and totally gorgeous! I love these pants!
Elastic waist so a bit large didn't really matter. Works best with top that hits just below waist of pant.
Great pants! I'm 5'6" and these were a good length. They have elastic in the back and the fit is looser so I was able to size down. Great work pants!
Loved these pants. Wore with white shirt to a luau. Perfect - but a bit hot since they were lined (which was nice).

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a summer work day
links_Review_Text: I normally wear an 8, or 28 in jeans, but I am so glad I ordered the 6. These pants are nice and flowy, they will flow over any problem areas nicely. They do wrinkle pretty easily. Very vibrant pants, got lots of compliments!
This was fun to wear to work. I love the beautiful fabric and the gorgeous pattern. I received a lot of compliments.

I am 5'4" and I wore adidas to commute. These pants didn't seem too long but my feet got caught in their width going up & down stairs. Not a pretty sight. The waist slips down. Be careful if you aren't tall.
Super pretty but shorter than expected. I wore heels and the hem was at my ankle. I still wore them but wish they were long enough to reach the floor.

I'm all for a cropped pant, but this trouser didn't look cropped, it just looked strangely short. I returned it the day I received it. I don't think this is a good choice for medium height to tall, it would be better on a petite person.
Cute, perfect for petites, tall girls beware. Side note, if you're not a fan of clothing that wrinkles automatically stay away. These get wrinkle lines ASAP

Lovely pants. I went up a size but didn't need to - there is a elastic waist. They just hit floor on me when I was barefoot and I'm 5'8" so taller ladies may want to rent the L Wore with flats, fancy sandals and a white silk blouse for an afternoon garden wedding. Fun alternative to a dress

These pants are fully lined and zip on the side. They are very high waisted. The waist has a few inches of elastic in the back. Pros: amazing pattern, flow beautifully, very comfortable. Cons: they are cut very straight in between the waist & hips, so I don't get the flow off the waist that I would like. Additionally, the elastic in the back causes the fabric below it to bunch and stick out, so instead of seeing my shape and my ass, it looks like I have a flat butt and that I'm very wide. All of this to say, these pants look amazing from the hip downward, but are a hot mess from waist to hip for someone curvy. I got the bigger end of my pants size range and they are too big around the waist, but oddly tight around the tummy. Anyway, all of this to say I am still wearing these, but with something that goes to hips: a stretch white button down that is tight, creates shape to my hips and then the pants flow from there. I could not wear these with a shirt tucked in.

Never in my life will I attend an event fancy enough to wear this. So working from home glamour it is! Very comfy and gorgeous. Runs TTS I'd say, the top was a little big for me but I have pretty small boobs. Might try the small if I ever get the chance.

links_Review_Title: Head over heels in love with this garment
links_Review_Text: There are absolutely no words to describe how stunning this gown is. Pictures do it no justice whatsoever. The fabric is this heavier embroidered and sequined tulle with a lighter tulle lining. The bottom is a full circle pattern, which makes spinning in this dress really fun. And the top is beautifully fitted. It was a smidge large on my 32B chest but didn't gape at all. This dress is such a stunner. I'd rented it for WFH for a day but am going to hang on to it for a little longer!

I got this for my entertainment while in quarantine. BF loves it, although refuses to follow my black tie quarantine dress code and spent the day in PJs. If I was to leave the house, I might size down. I'm a solid 6 with no boobs but wide rub cage and I feel like a small would have fit better...but again, this gorgeous frock didn't leave my house. Stay safe and wash your hands!

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress - you feel so glamorous!
links_Review_Text: Fit was great - the waist was a little tight for me due to my chest size but not to the point of being uncomfortable. Rest of the dress fit perfectly. Great dress for short girls - I only wore three inch heels and it was the perfect length! Felt so glamorous and got tons of compliments!

Wore this to a formal wedding and it did not disappoint! I received so many compliments and felt so confident all night long! It was elegant, comfortable and fit perfectly. Can’t wait to rent it again.

links_Review_Title: The event was themed around ‘Japanese cherry blossom’ and this dress was perfect match for it!
links_Review_Text: I am 5’6”, 120lbs and ordered a XS(R in length) and the fit was perfect! I wore 4.5” heels and even the length of the dress was just right! I received many compliments on the dress and I highly recommend this dress!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress! Felt like a princess. The skirt glittered in the light. Many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress. Take note though, even though size is a large, the I size tag says US 8. I usually wear a 10 and had to squeeze myself into the dress. It was worth it!

This dress was absolutely stunning on. Totally flattering if you're looking to give the allusion of an hourglass figure. The deep v sheer neckline and side panels add a hint of sexiness that is balanced by the full floral embroidered skirt. My only complaints were that the top was a bit tight (I'm a 36 DD with a big rib cage) and the it was skirt was a little long. But with all the compliments I received all night, I was ok with that :)

This is probably my 15th rental from RTR & is definitely my favorite dress I've ever rented. The bust area was a little big and the darting made my boobs look slightly pointy as other reviewers have mentioned but it didn't distract from the overall beauty of the dress. I wore 2" heels & the length was perfect. Just know it's only lined to the knee.

links_Review_Title: Flattering, comfortable, and tons of compliments!
links_Review_Text: I felt classy and confident in this dress all night! I got the MR and the LR, wore the LR because the chest was too restricted in the MR for me. Though in wearing the LR, the straps were too long and I needed to pin them and shorten them by about and inch. The length was perfect for 4 inch heels. And I really liked the weight of the dress skirt! It glided beautifully when I walked, never felt like it was going to float away from me. I'm so glad I rented this! I felt amazing the entire time.

I have never used RTR before, but absolutely loved this dress and the service. I received so many compliments on this unique and flattering dress. I'm a little over 5'3 and the petite size length was perfect (hem kissed the floor) with flats. I have a small chest, so the straps did fit a bit loose, but they never fell down or made me feel I would be exposed. The dress is beautiful and pictures really don't do the elegant floral details justice
Received tons of compliments!! It was easy to dance in. My only complaint was the sequins started to dig into my bottom and legs while we were sitting at dinner. Other than that the dress was great!!

links_Review_Title: Felt so beautiful in this dress!
links_Review_Text: This dress was amazing and so fun to wear! Fit great and was comfortable. I received so many compliments on it all night!

links_Review_Title: It felt like a dream. I rented this for a night at the Met Opera.
links_Review_Text: Fit was perfect. I rented the LR and at 5'9" (32inch inseam) it floated above the ground. I wore flat mules. I have 34DD/36D chest and I felt secure in the dress with no bra or tape. I will rent again at any chance.
The dress was a perfect fit - in size and for the occasion. The flowery pattern made it stand out and give it a different feel versus a standard robe. Almost bought it ;)!

links_Review_Title: Didn't wear this time but I'm coming back!
links_Review_Text: This was my backup dress and I almost wore it because it's so fun, I'll definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: The most boho chic gown that will receive compliments all night
links_Review_Text: The dress ran a bit small in the waist but other than that it was one of the most comfortable dresses I have ever worn!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a charity gala!
links_Review_Text: This dress was absolutely perfect and the quality was amazing! I have never in my life received so many compliments on something before! I am 5’3” and 3” heels made it the perfect length. The top part was snug enough to not have to wear a bra, but I wore a stick on bra to lift myself up a little more. The dress twirls perfectly on the dance floor and is comfortable enough to wear to dance the night away!

links_Review_Title: Figuring out where else I could wear this!
links_Review_Text: Photos don't do this beautiful dress justice! The embroidery work is stunning, and the bodice is chic, and just the right amount of sexy without being too much (due to the lining). I received so many compliments throughout the night. Most importantly- it was SO fun to dance in!

Statement gown! It was beautiful and I received so many compliments at the fashion show. I dressed it down with a leather moto jacket and black wedge Nike sneakers. It was so long (I ordered the long length because that was all that was available).

I wore this to a gala and received so many compliments. It was very comfortable. I am only 5 feet tall and the length was fine with tall heels. The dress is beautifully made with high quality fabric. The customer service from Rent the Runway was incredible when we hit a problem in shipping.

I LOVED this dress. I didn't want to return it when I was done. I wore this to a formal work party and got compliments all night long!! It was a little bit tight, and I might have been more comfortable in a medium but I don't think it looked too small on. I wore this with three inch heels and it was the perfect length. It really wasn't even too long when I switched to flats halfway through the night. Beautiful detailing on the skirt! Highly recommend.
Many people were complimenting me on my dress!! Loved it

I rented this along with a few others for a 50th birthday party. I loved this dress but it was just slightly small in the chest and was very tight when zippered. It is stunning and elegant and hope I have a chance to rent it again (in a bigger size) for another event.

I frequently rent for work events, and this was by far the easiest to wear dress I've nabbed. Sizing is fairly flexible, and the cut is super flattering. The sheer panels are sexy, and simultaneously help avoid a need for fashion tape. Would 10/10 rent again!

This was my favorite RTR rental hands down. The detailing on the skirt is gorgeous and the top was a nice thick material so no sticky bra needed! People literally stopped me at the event to tell me how much they loved my dress. I'm 5'8 and wore 2.5 inch heels and rented the long. Happy I did- the length was perfect. Rent this dress for your next formal or black tie event! You'll look and feel amazing!

links_Review_Title: Run don't walk and rent this dress
links_Review_Text: I needed the ML. Possibly even the small, not sure, but i just had to have this dress! It is so unique and beautiful. I had to pin up the straps to make it work, so don't order too big. I'd say all the way up to a size 8 would most likely fit in a M. I will be renting this again in the future.... but I doubt it is the type of dress to be forgotten.

links_Review_Title: Holy sh*t this dress was stunning!!!!
links_Review_Text: I had such a blast in this dress! Pictures do not do it justice. Comfy even though some parts are Tulle which can be itchy if sensitive skinned. My only negative is the Tulle would get a stuck in my heel if not fully held on steps. But honestly I would own this dress or ones like it since it was so flattering!!!

links_Review_Title: This dress is absolutely gorgeous in person.
links_Review_Text: Fit was perfect. I wore no bra and it was comfortable. So many compliments all night.
I received so many compliments on this dress. I got a petite after reading other reviewers say the dress was long and with heels it worked out perfectly.

I have a short torso and the straps were still a little long/loose, but not so much that it was a problem. I loved everything about this dress! I am 5'2" and still needed a heel with the petite size. I have a small chest and did not need (nor could you really wear) a bra. I would definitely recommend!

links_Review_Title: Awesome dress. Local photographer pulled me aside to photograph it!
links_Review_Text: Super comfortable. Got compliments all night. At 5'6 and 110 lbs, the XS was perfect. The nude panels do not allow for a bra, but I was able to tape some soft cups inside easily. One random thing - when I went to take it off, I discovered the zipper as half way down! No idea how long it had been like that. Make sure you check it periodically. I would love to wear this dress again.

links_Review_Title: I discovered the dress shimmers when I spin! Definitely tons of compliments
links_Review_Text: This was one of my favorite dresses to date. I was nervous about not wearing a bra, but I didn't have any problems at all. The dress is eye catching on it's own and will make your night unforgettable!
A little long but completely stunning- got compliments all night

links_Review_Title: I felt GORGEOUS in this FLATTERING and UNIQUE dress!
links_Review_Text: This dress is beyond beautiful. It's STUNNING. I am a little heavier right now so I ordered the M and L and the L fit best because I'm built straight up and down at the waist. The top was a little big but not bad. I used double sided tape to keep the straps in place. The skirt is AMAZING. There are sequins on the embroidered flowers that sparkle in the light. The bottom of the skirt has a wired edge that keeps its shape! I'm 5'5" and the skirt barely hit the floor with no shoes on.
This dress is beautiful! The bra situation is tricky, but I was able to get away with pasties. It was a bit long, even with 4" heels, but that was okay. The embroidery is gorgeous

I am usually a size 4. Rented XS and S and both fit. Ended up wearing S because a little more room at waist. Other reviews commented on boobs being a little pointy. Agree but bc it is black it wasn't a big deal or that noticeable. I wore stick on bra. Very comfortable. Also pretty long- tall heels recommended

links_Review_Title: this is the most beautiful dress I have ever worn. So glad tried it.
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress. The cut of dress is nice. The only 2 cons were the straps occasionally fell off my shoulder, and the dress is really long. I'm around 5'6 and I had to hold the dress up a lot of the time to stop it from being stepped on.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress but my size wasn't available
links_Review_Text: This was BEAUTIFUL. The 6 was way too big and the 4 was unavailable. I tried the 2p (which is what is pictured), but I couldn't get it zipped in back. TTS. I'm 5'3" and needed the petite.

I absolutely loved this dress! It is amstunning in person and I received many compliments. I am 5'1 and the XS petite was still a little long with heels. Additionally, I had to use fashion tape to secure the top into place as the shoulders were a little loose. Highly recommend this dress, would definitely wear again.

links_Review_Title: Meant for my birthday party: shiny and fun
links_Review_Text: Wore it for Zoom cocktails nonetheless Fits like a glove: body con without being unforgiving to the tummy
Loved the fit and how comfortable it was!

links_Review_Title: The dress was perfect for the 20's inspired event!
links_Review_Text: The dress was comfortable and not itchy at all! Perfect length for an early Spring, Evening themed event. Would recommend for anyone!

This dress was surprisingly very comfortable, with it being completely stunning made it perfect. The fit was perfect and the mesh on the top wasn't itchy at all. The gold details are made from a gold thread and it's almost on a patch made out of terry material so it's very comfortable. I loved it and I received complements all night!

links_Review_Title: This dress was made for my body!
links_Review_Text: We have an annual charity gala we attend and I decided to give this Rachel Roy dress a go. It hugged my booty and thick thighs well! The dress fit me like a glove. It is elegant and gives you a confidence as you move about the room. I could have worn my regular size of 16 but usually order up with designer gowns. You don't need to with this one. The fabric has some stretch and is very easy to zip up. I'm 5'3" and it hit me right at my knee caps. I can't gush about this dress enough!

links_Review_Title: Classy but eye catching made this dress a showstopper!
links_Review_Text: I appreciated the quality of this dress and the fit was perfect. I'm 5'8" and It hit right around my knee which was great because I was sitting down and standing up a lot. I didn't have to adjust the dress too much which was great, and It wasn't itchy at all. Great rental!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress! Fit like a glove and was comfortable enough to dance the night away!
links_Review_Text: Easy to wear… Fit like a glove without being confining. Covered enough but still sexy!
Was perfect for my sil's wedding. Got so many compliments. Danced all night in it.

links_Review_Title: Holiday party to welcome in 2020. Classed it up with this metallic-yet-low-key number.
links_Review_Text: I expected to wear the 6R. Tried on the 4R and surprisingly, it fit me. Comfortable dress, very easy to move in. I received 15+ compliments on the dress from people who didn't need to talk to me at all. Skipped the necklace. Wore a black and gold bangle plus earrings.

At 5'2" 130lbs the 4 fit perfectly- A 2 may have even worked but this was so comfortable and received so many compliments! It was perfect for being the soloist first 3 Christmas Eve services amidst a garden of Poinsettias! Loved this so much! It was a teensy bit long - it I kept it I would get it hemmed a bit to be closer to just below my knees.

Loved this dress. It's very sophisticated and formal. The gold pattern is gorgeous in person. I am 5'10, 150 pounds and a 34b and the size 8 fit like a glove. I'm typically a 6 or and 8, so I'd say go with your normal size or if between sizes, get the bigger one.

Got this for a night at the opera with my hubby and it was so comfortable yet very glamorous. The only con about this dress was that it seemed to stretch out a little towards the end of the evening. I'm 5'5" and 135 and size 6 fit perfectly, but I probably would have been able to fit in a size 4 as well if I had wanted it to be super skin tight.
Was perfect for the occasion, dressy, but not too dressy, and easy to dance in. Would rent again.

This dress is fire. My husband said I look "deadly" in it. The one I received with my rental items wasn't in the best condition - a bit pilled and about 6' of the hem was loose in back, so one side hung down further than the other. I'm sending back the rental but I love the dress so much that I decided to purchase a brand new one to wear to an upcoming wedding (and also just to keep around, because you never know when you're gonna need to look deadly haha).

links_Review_Title: Ran small was not able to wear
links_Review_Text: Ordered a size 10 . Could not fit my arms in could not zip in back at bust. Dress was beautiful super soft . Next size up was up dud not get to wear. I'm a 36 dd 5 6. 170

links_Review_Title: This dress was a gamble as I'm pretty busty (F/G) and dresses tend to be really tricky to get right.
links_Review_Text: Fits true to size. Got so many compliments. Comfy and flattering, highly recommend this dress!
Comfortable fit. Hid the undesirable areas and looked very classy.

links_Review_Title: Unbelievable, jaw dropping, compliments all night, love it.so comfortable.
links_Review_Text: I could have gotten a size 16 but the 18 was great on me. So comfortable, I was able to move all night with great ease. Best to take standing picture in this dress, the collar makes your neck tdissapears in sitting down picture. I love the dresssss.

links_Review_Title: Nice but a lot of gold
links_Review_Text: It's super comfortable but I didn't love the gold
Always wear Red on Friday for the R.E.D. campaign. Very sharp dress and my boss complimented how nice it looked. A little low cut as others mentioned but looked great in my opinion!
Fit great; quite comfy

links_Review_Title: It was a great fit! Very comfortable and elegant!
links_Review_Text: Fancy, beautiful, quality fabric. Loved it!!

links_Review_Title: Stunning dress. Fabrics gives you plenty of room
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly except the top was very low cut and I have DDs so I had to wear a cami to keep the girls under control.

I LOVED this dress! It hid my problem areas and showed off my assets hehe. The dress fit amazing and I got tons of compliments. I would definitely rent this again. Follow me on Instagram @saidbymelissa to see more of my RTR fits!

this fit so well, the fabric was such good material.. it was stretchy but still sturdy. It's defiantly a low cut outfit but i wore a sports bra under it to make it look like an undershirt. super comfy.
I think I should have worn a 2 or a 4, so keep that in mind if you are between sizes. The sleeves were long on the 6, and there was some gapping, but overall this was a show stopper at a fundraiser

links_Review_Title: Strange fit! Boxy, way too low cut (ie exposes most of ones bra)

links_Review_Text: Super cute! Please note it is low cut so I had to add double sided tape !!!
I would rent again! PROS -The length is work appropriate. -I felt comfortable in the sleeves. -I love this color! How do you not feel confident in red? CONS -None-
This dress is so short, it is not appropriate for work. I am 5'7" tall and the dress was so short I would not even wear it with tights.
Rented for work clothes but it's too short, right and low cut

links_Review_Title: Great color, fits true to size, a bit short
links_Review_Text: Fit was good. I'm relatively small chested but needed a cami underneath. Color is vibrant. In the end it was just too short for my work environment, and I'm only 5'5."
cute

Beautiful dress, well constructed of great quality fabric. Fit well on the bottom but too large on top. I typically wear a size 0 so the 2 was probably fairly true to size but I'm a 32 DD and don't usually have that problem.
Fit like a glove. Absolutely loved it and got many compliments!
I would have worn this if we weren't going to an event that was conservative crowd.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to work and then to dinner. It seemed a little fancy for work, but that's okay.
links_Review_Text: It was a little too open in the bust. I had to either pin it or wear a cami. In this pic I am wearing a cami.

links_Review_Title: Great color too bad I couldn't
links_Review_Text: Too short! Excellent quality fabric, wonderful construction. However absolutely no way I could wear those and work related evening event.

links_Review_Title: I didn’t wear this. The fit was so cute but it was a little too 80’s throw back
links_Review_Text: Fit was perfect

links_Review_Title: Too short and too low on the neckline
links_Review_Text: The dress was pretty but it was really short and super plunging. I'm tall so I get the short but I'm just a c cup and I'm not sure how you can wear it without a shirt underneath ...but it's really not a dress to wear with a cami. I didn't wear it.

links_Review_Title: Really pretty but zipper is tough at waist line.
links_Review_Text: Beautiful!
xx

Overall this was a great dress. Definitely runs on the smaller size, especially in the bust area. Material was slightly irritating to the armpit/upper arm area. Still would recommend because it was beautiful! No need to wear a bra because the top is very structured. Sheer bottom with slit was a lot of fun and I received many compliments on this all night. Perfect length in mid-height heels (I'm 5'6).

Wore this to the ballet and really liked it. Only problem was that it kept slipping down and I felt more exposed than I'd like. Loved the color and sheer train on the dress though. Would rent again, I felt really pretty and had a great night in that dress.

I felt beautiful in this! Loved that it was a longer overlay over a shorter dress; was great for a semi-formal affair. Pear-shaped girls: this was my normal size and it fit, but it was a little big up top, so I had to keep an eye on my bra and make sure it didn't poke out, but a size down would have been too small for my hips I think. Just something to be aware of!

links_Review_Title: Ended up not wearing this dress because of undergarments - however- absolutely stunning.
links_Review_Text: Dress is a dream and perfect for petites. If you have a larger chest, won't work.
Wore 3" heals and it was still the perfect length. Really pretty color and not another dress like it at the 200+ person wedding
Gorgeous fabric that felt so soft on your skin. Fits like a glove and very flattering for an hourglass body shape. Has some boning and structure in the bust area to keep the dress in place.

Gorgeous dress. Runs small - I am normally size 10. The 12 just barely fit me. I couldn't breathe but it was worth it. I love the neckline of the dress. It hugged all the right places and smoothed my stomach. I loved the slit up the one leg. I am short so even with heels I had to gather the train up when I walked to avoid stepping on it.

I loved this gown! I tried on about 7 in the Georgetown store and this fit perfectly and allowed comfort for eating/ drinking/ dancing without looking bloated! I am 5'7 and typically a 2/4 (sometimes 6 depending on the brand) and this was perfect for a black tie wedding in December!

links_Review_Title: Flattering Fit with a Sexy Side
links_Review_Text: I got this dress as a backup for a wedding, I loved it. It was very flattering and the slit and the sheerness at the bottom made it pop. I received a ton of compliments on the dress! I got the 12r and 14r. I went with the 12r, it fit really well and is true to size. I was able to wear a strapless bra with it, but probably would have been fine going braless as there was some boning in the dress (I just prefer wearing a bra). I paired the dress with a bigger earring, as I thought a necklace took away from the dress a bit.
The dress fit really well and I think the length would've been okay with heels. Didn't end up wearing it because the wedding was postponed.
This was a back up dress. So pretty and comfortable but was too tight around bust area.

links_Review_Title: Stunning fabric and vibrant color. Too long for a short girl even with 3 inch heels :(
links_Review_Text: Wish I could've worn it but it dragged on the floor. Taller girls definitely rent!
It was just about an inch or two too long for me.

links_Review_Title: Lovely design for straight body type.
links_Review_Text: Didn't wear it - not a great choice for women with larger chests.

I didn't end up picking this dress bc my other option looked better, but this dress is very pretty for a fall/early winter occasion. The strapless top felt secure and the waist fabric was flattering and forgiving of a little tummy. The liner hit mid thigh (I'm 5'8'') so it wasn't overly revealing but I didn't feel all that comfortable going to a formal given the strapless + mod-thigh combo.

links_Review_Title: I loved how it was formal yet a little risqué.
links_Review_Text: I gave it 5 stars but it was falling down a little on me. Maybe I could have benefited from some tape but didn’t think it was necessary when I put it on. Overall, super fun to wear and a perfect fit for the SF Ballet Annual Gala!
So breathable and beautiful!!! I got so many compliments on this piece!

This dress was the best. I ordered a small and medium and I went with the small. It was still a tad big though (just a tiny bit). It wasn't itchy at all and I got so many compliments! If you are on the edge, go for it. It's the cutest!
Received a ton of compliments!
longer than expected and was very scratchy material on underarms.

links_Review_Title: Wore this dress to my 21st birthday and it was a hit!
links_Review_Text: I am 5'6, 140 lbs, 32 D and usually wear a size 4/6. I would say this fit like a glove. The only con was that the tulles part on top was a little itchy on my armpit and that the inner part on the bottom tucked under and showed a little, but I don't think it was noticeable. Overall, I really loved it!

Wore this dress for a girlfriends birthday party and it was PERFECT! I got so many compliments on it, and I considered buying the dress because it looked so good, but figured I wouldn't have a reason to wear a sequin dress too often. Glad I ordered a large though, definitely fit snug.

Wore this for a 1920's themed holiday party and it was great! The medium was a little tight, couldn't wear a bra. I am typically a small or medium in dresses. It was also a LITTLE short. Overall loved it though! I’m 5'4, 145, 34D.

I wore this to my boyfriend's Frat's semi-formal. Fit is awesome, even for someone who is curvy but slight, which can be really challenging usually! I got tons of compliments all night and the stars are so fun if you like astrology or just space in general. Dress was in amazing condition, only had to iron a bit of the fringe around the top. Comfortable, no itching or irritating. Highly recommend!
I paired this dress with a long sleeve and made it a skirt! A random girl at a bar stopped me to tell me how much she loved my skirt, so that made me feel fabulous. New Years: this is for you

links_Review_Title: Didn't wear it, but still loved it!
links_Review_Text: I chose another option that I rented, but this was very fun and flattering. It wasn't skin tight, but still shaped your body well. You don't need a bra which was nice.

links_Review_Title: Got so many compliments, the dress was the star of the show...lol but seriously love this dress.
links_Review_Text: The fit was great and flattering, perfect length for my average height. I was sad to send it back!!

links_Review_Title: This dress was so fun to wear. Received so many compliments. Would recommend :)
got so many compliments! it's a tad itchy under the arm, but worth the discomfort!
links_Review_Text: fit really well for a curvy gal with big boobs and a big butt! definitely true to size!

links_Review_Title: Dress looked awesome on and was so comfortable. I'm actually a size M but got a L
links_Review_Text: Plenty of room for large chest, not too tight anywhere, and didn't need a bra. Great party dress.
The only problem I had is that runs very large and was very long on me as well
Great dress!

I got compliments from drag queens. If you know drag queens, you know that means A LOT. This was definitely a boxier top - but I don't think it's a bad thing. It's just another shape. I just made sure to pair it with tighter jeans. When I tried to pair it with looser bottoms, that's when the shape didn't work. I'm hoping to purchase this down the road.

I am obsessed with this and I think I might keep it! It is the perfect length- you get the shorter/crop style yet still flattering. The color is absolutely perfect. The lining stays in place and isn't tighter than the fit of the shirt. The sleeves are adorable. This would be a perfect top for Easter and spring!

links_Review_Title: Rented for corporate headshots, didn't want to send it back
links_Review_Text: What a gorgeous way to stand out in a sea of neutral. I loved this top: it was modest and office appropriate and yet had so much personality. Rich material, lined with a nude-colored fabric. The cut was flowy and generous without the garment losing its structure. Such a flattering piece! You absolutely need to rent it.
The shirt has such pretty details and the color is so nice. Really happy with this top. I wear S or XS tops and the 2 fit well
This was so fun to wear. I rented a size 2 and it still had a lot of room, so it is safe to say that you can size down with this top.
This top was a nice and easy top for work. It was a little boxy and I had to wear with high waisted jeans, but I still loved it! Will definitely be ordering again in the spring.

Lots of room in this top from chest to waist. The sleeves fit my arms well; they didn't feel as oversized as the other parts. The quality and detail of this top makes it look handmade and one-of-a-kind.
Amazing fit and quality! Would recommend 100%!
Cannot express how much I love the quality of this top. I'm still thinking about it months later. If it weren't $400 I would have bought it. TTS and flattering even with big boobs.

This is super intricate and beautiful — loved the detailing in the lace. It's pretty flattering although might look a little boxy. I recommend pairing with slimming dark denim if you're a bit curvier like me!
Was fine but didn't stand out
Fit was perfect. Great for work, date night, or just feeling special. would have loved to keep it, but the price tag made it easy to send back

links_Review_Title: I struggled with what to wear it with
links_Review_Text: This top is beautiful and clearly expensive. Loved the color! I only have 1 pair of white jeans and they're wide leg which was bad for this top. I ended up figuring it out though and got lots of compliments from coworkers

links_Review_Title: Beautiful detailed lace, pretty color blue!
links_Review_Text: Great top! It doesn't run big, it's just a boxy style. I got an 8 and it was true to size.
Gorgeous fabric and construction. Size down
It is such a cute and unique top. The under layer is nude-colored, which makes it look like your skin at first glance. It was a little too fancy for my work environment. But very fun to wear.

links_Review_Title: One of my all-time favorite tops!
links_Review_Text: Great fit and the lining underneath means you don't need a tank and you can wear a regular bra. The size 4 fit perfectly with my 34DD chest. Great color and works well with any bottoms, and can be dressed up or down. I would buy if it wasn't so pricey!

I was showered with compliments the day I wore this top. This was perfect for casual Friday in the office, followed by errands around town. I paired it with slim jeans and short boots. I have also rented this top in white and it was great, although I prefer the blue color. Well-made, comfortable, and so cute. I would definitely rent this blouse again.
Loved this top and would love to own it. It fit so effortlessly and was very cute and flattering. I wore it to work and to dinner. Sad I didn't get any photos!

links_Review_Title: Cute top - I didn't wear because it ended up being more of a summer look.
links_Review_Text: Loose fit - cute with jeans and could easily dress up or down.
Fit well. Got compliments on this. I wore to work, but it did have more of a bridal/baby shower vibe.

links_Review_Title: Pretty top for everyday. Lovely color, gives nice, professional coverage while being very comfortabl
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly!
Very cute top. Fits well. Vibrant, blue with nude lining. Great for work or garden party...I will rent this again.

Love this top with jeans for a casual but put-together look. Sizing is a little baggy but it works well with the look of the top - I'm a 32A and small on top in general, usually a 0-4 on top, and I probably could have sized down to the 0, but the 2 was perfect too. Highly recommend.
This top is so flattering. I got a compliment every time I wore it. I'd buy it if my husband didn't tell me I have to take a break from buying my rent the runway clothes
The only downside is that the lining sometimes bunches up under the blue lace. Still giving it 5 stars because it is very cute.

I wore this shirt to my daughter's first birthday party. It was very easy to wear, comfy, light, and very pretty. It does run on the larger side but that was OK with me. It hid the pregnancy pooch that seems to be sticking around. Loved this!
Because I have a slightly larger chest for my frame these styles generally don't fit me well. This fits PERFECT and is great quality.
Loved the look of this top with dark skinny jeans. Highly recommend and fit true to size!

links_Review_Title: Cute but only for white people.
links_Review_Text: This shirt is super cute and I loved the fit, but the undershirt is a light nude so if you have darker skin it looks weird.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous top, but a bit too large
links_Review_Text: This top is beautiful. I know it's supposed to fit a bit loosely, but I felt as though there was just too much material in the waist and it was larger and even less fitted than I expected it to be. I'm usually a size 2 or 4, and the 2 felt like too much material. I do have a larger chest/rib cage and so I'm not sure if a size 0 would work.

This shirt is so so cute! I am a size 12/14 in dresses M/L/XL depending in shirts I am 5'7'' tall. I have an athletic build and very broad shoulders. It was slightly snug in the shoulder area when I first put it on, but it stretched out throughout the day. It has a high low look to it. Very boho chic. My one friend at work kept telling me how cute it was and that I should buy it. Super comfy to wear all day. Super great for casual going out or work.

Wore this twice, once on vacation in Germany and once for work upon my return. It's super comfortable but a little short. Not quite a crop top but also not quite a full length top. I styled with high waisted pants and it was perfect.
Gorgeous lace top, and very comfortable. I wore this to work and to dinner out. Received many compliments both times. Would definitely consider buying this!
Cute sparkly shirt. I didn't want it to be too cropped so I rented a medium and it was perfect. Only bad thing is it was a very heavy shirt

I wore this top for my 30th birthday at a disco themed adult skate night. it was perfect! I'm a DDD chest size and I loved how this top flattered me and didn't make me feel like I had two big disco balls on my chest (was worried about that). Festive for the disco theme but still fashion. RENT IT!

I am so obsessed with this one I may buy it! I wore this for a girls weekend in Vegas (wish I had a better photo!) Everything about it is amazing and it can be dressed up or down which I love If you're on the fence - RENT THIS

I loved how I felt in this shirt! The color is like champagne gold and so flattering on my skin. The sleeves are a little heavy but so pretty. I wore it with dark jeans and navy heels and it got a lot of attention.

links_Review_Title: So amazing, why don't I have $500 to buy this?!
links_Review_Text: Rented this just for fun- such a great top! Well made, sparkles are amazing. Can dress up or down. I am mostly a size 12 and a M fit perfect, so I would consider sizing down for sure.
Runs a little big and would fall off the shoulders. Wore for NYE and received lots of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Perfect NYE top, but SIZE DOWN!!
links_Review_Text: This is such a pretty top and it gave me TONS of attention just walking to places. The top is heavy and feels nice. I am a consistent Medium but I can use a Small or maybe even a XS in this. Definitely size down!
Amazing top. The sequins were beautiful and high quality. Had so many compliments. It does run a tad big - so if you are between sizes maybe size down.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful top but lots of material and very big!
links_Review_Text: I wanted this top to work so badly. The sequins are a beautiful color and the style is so fun! BUT the arms have a lot of fabric and the sleeves kept falling off my shoulders. I am very busty so to find a medium top way too big on me is rare!

links_Review_Title: We stan a brand that runs large
links_Review_Text: Dress everyday like it's New Years Eve! I am a consistent large and def needed a medium in this top. It runs short and wide, but it's so lovely that it's def worth renting (reviewed by @mackinstyle)
The ruching is adjustable and the top is super flattering. Got a lot of compliments!!

links_Review_Title: Amazing PopPop! Very flattering for big chested women
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a costume party and I received so many compliments. It is very shimmery and shiny!

1. It is super comfortable 2. It is not a stretchy material but i would have ordered one size smaller. It felt like a Disney clothes because i dont have much chest-but i am telling ya- it is super pretty and flattering 3. Looks prettier than the photos 4. Good with either jeans or formal skirts @stylein.haeun
I liked this top in theory, but the front chest area was too loose to be flattering. Didn't end up wearing.

links_Review_Title: I loved this top. It was really fun and flattering.
links_Review_Text: I am usually a medium but ordered a small, and it fit.

links_Review_Title: This is the exact type of top I wanted for night out!
links_Review_Text: Be mindful that the sleeves are really big and it's more of a cropped top. I had originally planned to wear it with a skirt, but considering how flowy it was, it's much better to pair with tight pants/ jeans.

links_Review_Title: Loved the shirt. It was just really big
links_Review_Text: Beautiful sequins! But the shirt was HUGE and fairly heavy
Beautiful top but way too big

links_Review_Title: This top is fabulous. I paired it with high waist black pants.
links_Review_Text: The only thing I don't like about this top is the strings and how they create this bulk in the middle of the stomach and I wish it wasn't

links_Review_Title: Didn't wear because it was so big. I typically wear a small and this I needed probably an XXS.
links_Review_Text: Too big

I rented this for a fun night out. It runs true to size, if not a little generous. It's not quite as form fitting as I was hoping, but I really like it. I'm pairing it with some high waist jeans for a fun glitzy look.
Really cute top but hard to button. I wore it without a bra.
Was very comfortable, straps weren't falling off. Super flattering with a higher waisted bottom.

links_Review_Title: Super cute paired with a long printed maxi dress for vacation!
links_Review_Text: Fit TTS
Really liked the style of the shirt, it was just too tight.

links_Review_Title: I loved the look of this top. Great with anything high waisted.
links_Review_Text: The knot in the front of the top was not tied when it arrived and it was difficult to get it to look like the photo on the site. The material was a little wrinkly, as well. It was hard to tell if that was just how it arrived or it was the material itself.

I got this for a birthday party, but didn't end up wearing it because I didn't get the skirt I wanted in time. Overall it's a cute top, the bow definitely didn't look like the photos by the time I got it - this may have been able to be fixed if I put some time into it. Ran a bit small, if I got my usual 6 I would have had to go braless.
Rented for my teen daughter for a party. Very cute and comfy. Perfect for a fun evening out
The fit runs very small and suggest going up 2 sizes than normal.

I loved the easy, light fabric of this dress. It really stretches to fit every curve - very form fitted. The details on the neck, sleeve and bottom ruffle were perfect. I felt a little self conscious, it definitely does not hide anything - but it was a really beautiful, fun dress to wear while away on a trip.

links_Review_Title: Veronica Beard knows how to cut a dress
links_Review_Text: Great fit. Wear a full coverage high waisted panty for extra coverage. Fabric is a tad sheer. Plus, it will smooth out tummy area
I loved wearing this. Very light weight and a lot of stretch but still fitted. I did wear shapewear underneath but that was my preference. I'm usually a 12 in VB and went up a size bc of my chest.

Such a cute dress! Wore this dress to work and then out with friends for happy hour after. The scrunchy material makes this dress flattering, and very comfortable. I did feel as though I was pulling the dress down a lot because it felt short, but being 5'9 I run into this problem a lot. Would be purchasing this dress if the purchase price was right! Highly recommend!

This is a super comfortable and very flattering dress, however I gave it three stars because it is very sheer, short and it constantly rides up. My husband however loved it and couldn't stop telling me how great I looked!

The print is really pretty but I'm glad I didn't rent it for work! It is indeed sheer and tight, as the other reviews state. I definitely wouldn't have felt comfortable wearing this at the office, but it was perfect for a Friday night concert. This brand is hit or miss for me - some pieces are knockouts and some just don't flatter me at all - so I'm pleasantly surprised that this one is a win.
Added the belt since it was very form fitting- maybe not the most work appropriate but very cute and not too short which made up for being fitted. Also very comfortable

You could really dress this up or down. I rocked it with white tennis shoes and a cute bag. It's actually a more sheer material, but with the shirring, it's not a problem. I'm 5"4 and the length was utterly perfect.

links_Review_Title: Didn't end up wearing, wasn't a fan
links_Review_Text: I loved the design on this dress but it was just a bit awkward and not the most flattering. I feel like it could be really cute on really petite frames, however having a bit curvier of a midsection, it didn't do me any favors. Didn't end up wearing.
This is a short flirty dress. I loved the pattern and the ruffles. I was not the biggest fan of how it looked over my bust. It just made them look funny so that’s why I’m downgrading it a star.
I'm tall so this was very short. It has a very stretchy fabric so I could probably have gotten away with the next size up. But it was so cute and flattering. Could be dressed up or down.
I generally love Veronica Beard. The material of this dress is VERY thin. I just couldn’t bring myself to wear it. Maybe something for a beach/hot vacation...but not for me.

This dress is perfect all around. It's very light, extra stretchy and incredibly comfortable to wear. I would not wear it to work as it is too casual, but it's a great vacation or summer dress. I received a ton of compliments all day. Dress does a great job hiding unpleasant areas.

links_Review_Title: Forgiving with the stretch but short.
links_Review_Text: I got a ton of compliments and it was fun to wear however it was a bit short for my liking. I'm tall so I felt like I had to be careful that my butt wasn't hanging out.
