It may just have been that the bottom is flowy and the rest is tight so it just felt like I could be showing my bottom.
Great dress to show curves, if you are lumpy,definitely need spanx.
Loved it
Love VB, but the combination of tight and short is hard to pull off for me. Maybe when I was younger..haha. Beautiful colors in the dress! Wish it worked!

links_Review_Title: Great dress for those who aren't tall and curvy
links_Review_Text: I'm 5'9 and curvy. Would be great on a petite person

links_Review_Title: Nice dress for a summer day party!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress for a summer brunch party. The dress runs true to size and has some stretch so can fit any body shape. The length is short and the material is sheer but without risk of exposing yourself. I am rather conservative and felt comfortable in this dress the entire day.
I LOVE this dress! Stretchy & comfy! I ordered a size up (usually a 14 but ordered a 16). It's a bit short so it definitely helped! I received lots of compliments. Will likely order again!
Super cute and very comfortable!
Great dress for dinner out during the summer. Fabric is light and dress is girly and comfortable. Dress does run short and is figure hugging.

links_Review_Title: Very cute ! And form fitting , however it's completely sheer. Would need a slip under for sure
links_Review_Text: Form fitting !

links_Review_Title: Best dress ever - I bought it!
links_Review_Text: First, the bonus, I got this dress with tags still on! Never happened to me before! I wore this dress to a wine tasting workshop and it was a breath of fresh air in a sea of dark dresses! I got so many compliments on it all night. It is so flattering, feminine, and sexy. My husband and i loved it so much, I bought it!
Cute summer dress, very form fitting. I decided against the dress because I like my dresses not that form fitting.

links_Review_Title: This is not a work dress
links_Review_Text: I sized up per RTR suggestion. I am usually a small or a 4 in dresses. When I looked in the mirror at first I thought - really cute, super soft, comfortable material but it is extremely form fitting, I'll put a short leather jacket over it. THEN, I saw it in better lighting - this dress is completely, 100% see through. I mean it's like tissue paper. It's a shame because it is so friggin cute, fits well and is the softest material. Maybe for a casual event? Who knows?
Nice dress, true to size.

This is more of a fun party dress but I wore it to work with an oversized black blazer and loafers. The ruching is really cute and very forgiving. It's fitted but doesn't show any lumps or bumps. I'm not normally a floral gal but wanted to try something out of my norm and I'm really glad I did with this.

links_Review_Title: Was too tight on my mid section otherwise looked cute
links_Review_Text: Loved the dress but was too tight on my middle section

links_Review_Title: Really classic and warm for a winter event.
Super soft and comfy with an eye catching pleated skirt
links_Review_Text: True to size. Super comfy. Goes past the knees but if you're going for that look it's perfect.

This dress was everything I wanted and more. When you get it on the hanger it looks matronly but try it on! It's so flattering and comfortable at the same time. I got so many compliments - even from a stranger on the street.

I got this as a back up dress for a wedding and ended up wearing it to the rehearsal party bc I loved it. The bottom is so fun! They didn't have my size so I sized up which worked ok- my guess is that my size would have fit perfectly. The length was perfect on me (I'm 5'11). I was able to wear a normal bra (always a plus)!

links_Review_Title: Hides the lower tummy for 5 months post partum
links_Review_Text: I love the flow of the skirt. It shows up my curves beautifully. It didn't breathe well though
I didn't expect the top to be stretchy. It was very comfortable but did wrinkle around the waistline which I could not correct. Other than that it was lovely.

I joined RTR Unlimited to jazz up my work days in figure flattering options for my pear shape. I have rented with RTR before for black tie events & loved the selection then, but my oh my, this simple dress takes the cake. Not only is it heckin' comfortable, it's just the right amount of glam in the metallic skirt to make me feel a little extra something throughout the workday. And it falls at a perfect length to flatter my figure. It's going to be very hard to return this little number.
Very flattering and comfortable. Received many compliments. Wore to a work dinner and a cocktail party in the same week. Love and will rent again for sure.
Rented this for my rehearsal dinner. It's fun and dressy enough for a formal occasion, while still being the right length for something more casual. Will be renting this many times I think!
This is a very pretty dress. The pleating lays perfectly and it's quite comfortable.
Loved this piece. Would have purchased if I could afford! I got lots of compliments.
Loved this dress. It was very comfortable, and I got compliments on it all day. Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Fun twist for business cocktail dress
links_Review_Text: Good option for a business cocktail dress. Sleeves are slimming and the pleats are a nice touch. The top cut outs can pull a bit if you have a large chest.
The holes were very unflattering Material seems to get shiny in the chest area
The skirt was very pretty- but the fabric around the waist was very tight.
I loved this dress! It was super comfortable and I got a TON of compliments on it. I would 100% rent again.
Great fit, very comfortable in the arms and chest area.

links_Review_Title: Wore this for a holiday party. Lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: Stretchy material but the waist of the skirt is not. I needed to go up to a size 4 because of that and my larger chest.

links_Review_Title: Ehhh wish I would of liked it more
links_Review_Text: Didn't really like the fit on me but it's a beautiful dress. I'm 5'3 and wore this with flats. Think heels would of been a better choice. I'm 138lbs and wore a size 6. The waistband was a little tight but was otherwise pretty comfortable.
I absolutely loved this dress for my company's holiday party. Perfect mix of sexy and sophisticated while still being comfortable. I like that my arms were covered but I still felt sexy.

I absolutely loved this dress! It was very comfortable the arms fit so comfortably! It was a thinner material on top and the skirt was so pretty! It was a great fall/winter dress. I loved wearing it and it was comfortable all night long!

This dress fit perfectly and the quality was top notch. I've never received so many compliments in one day from strangers. I'm 5'9 the sleeves were a perfect length. The skirt came just above the knee so it was perfect for church and work. I it was very comfortable which was important because I had a 16 hour day.
It is a win for any size chest and very nice length. The material is very feminine and flows nicely when you walk.
I had several compliments on this dress! Only complaint is that the stitching km the cuff is a little so-so. It seems like it could rip easily.

I really liked this dress, but I felt like it was a little too formal for work, which was my intended purpose. It doesn't look formal in the picture, but the skirt portion of the dress is very shimmery. I gave it 4 stars because I also felt like it wasn't the most flattering dress for someone with a little extra weight around their hips.
The dress is so nice and make me look feminine. It is very comfortable. Material is light.

My husband joked that I could only wear this to the fundraiser for a mid-sized New Jersey town library. It is sooo buttoned up. Also really for short torsoed ladies (not me) so wasn't too flattering either.

links_Review_Title: Cute but not good for this heat
links_Review_Text: Super cute and will be even cuter in the fall, but didn't end up wearing it long because it was too hot. Will definitely rent again in the fall.

Love this dress just wish it was a little smaller up top. I have a big chest and it was very deep and loose fitting up top. Ended up using fashion tape to close the gap a little more and make sure the fabric didn't move. Overall would def wear again.
Runs a bit big on the waist, but overall it was great! The colors are so fun!

The dress is a lovely silky material and it looks great. I'm usually a 2/XS and couldn't make the S work. I tried tying the sash tighter, but it made the dress fit funny. There's no zipper, but getting in/out was easy. Not sure if you could wear a standard bra with this. Would definitely try again in the smaller size.

I still like this dress but should've been patient and waited to order the Small. Only the medium was available and I felt like I was wearing a robe. The blue tie is sewn in so there is a limit to how tight you can tie it .. it landed on my hips instead of the small part of my waist. This photo is after I pinned it in the back and it was still big. Will rent again but wait for small.

links_Review_Title: Fantastic dress! Silk is luxurious and print/color contrast is so fun and different.
links_Review_Text: Great for a night out. Can dress up or down. Ran a little bit big but tie at waist let's you cinch it as tight as needed!
Gorgeous satin material with bright colors! I love the sleeves and the rap on the front. Highly recommend it but it's a bit short so if you're tall size up
This dress isn't super form fitting, but very forgiving! Absolutely love the colors, runs large. Low cut but easy with a cami. Soft fabric and very comfortable.
I wish I could buy this dress. I received so many compliments and the fit was perfect. The material is silky and soft, thick enough to flow nicely as well.

Wow I love this dress!! The colors and fabric are absolutely beautiful. I received so many compliments on this. I ended up wearing a camisole underneath it for work because it was a bit low cut. I would probably size down if I rented again as it was a little long on me in both the dress and sleeves (however, I am 5'). The tie at the waist made it easy to make it tighter (and shorter) though so it was no issue. A different piece that really made a statement!
Top was large, deep V. Had to adjust all night. I think the small would have been too short. I would have been happier if I had a pin on me to pin top.

wore from work to night - toned it with the white booties to style it up while also keeping it casual. so many compliments and obsessed with the colors. The belt it part of the dress and can get a bit loose but it isn't annoying. There's also a few buttons on the mid part of the dress that you wouldn't know. material is super soft and comfortable, didn't want to take it off! will for sure rent again
Great pattern. Looked like a winner but fit like a potato sack.
This item was TOO big around the chest. Length was perfect though and LOVE the color.

Fits a little big but I like the oversized way it drapes. Super fun rental, not something I'd normally wear. Definitely looks cool. Colors are vibrant. I wore a bandeau bc it drapes a lot in the front and I thought it was too revealing.
I've had this dress for two weeks now and wore it to two parties. It's silky and soft and flattering. I love it. Low cut.

Buttery soft silky fabric, perfect construction. Fits roomy as shown. I'm borderline S in most dresses, sometimes XS. Ordered XS, could have gone with XS as it is already oversized fit but I still adored it. Length is long enough not to be obnoxious considering the loudness of the front and slightly plunging neckline.
I wore this for Easter and got many compliments. It was very flattering and hit me right above my high waisted jeans. Loved it!

links_Review_Title: It's so chic, trendy yet you still look classic... love it worn it multiple time
links_Review_Text: No con... it fits perfectly just be careful be the buttons

I oringially rented this piece to wear with high waisted jeans for a super casual look but when plans changed I threw on a simple skirt and some boots and it was perfect. The material is thicker than expected but still very comfortable. I was especially concerned about the sleeves but considering how much volume they had it didn't limit my mobility. Definitely going to try more things in this style now

If you can get past the time it takes to get into this top with its 20 micro buttons you will be rewarded for your effort, the colors are great, the fit is playful and it's comfortable. It is a bit on the shirt side.
This shirt fit so well and the sleeves were so puffy and cute. I wore it with white pants and heels as well as with jeans and sandals. Good for day or night look!

Oh my goodness, this shirt is to die for! It's so unique and feminine! It is definitely a crop top. I wore high waisted jeans and LOVED my outfit for a fancy girls' lunch. I can't get over this shirt-- it was so perfect and gave the look I envisioned exactly!

Probably my favorite rental top, ever. Great with high-rise jeans (it's cropped, even on me - and I'm really short-waisted). Was loose enough that I was able to pull it on over my head without having to unbutton it - which is a good thing, since those buttons looked tricky. Glad I sized up.
It fit perfectly & was very comfortable. The material was nice and not at all cheap feeling. I loved the clasps that were on the front! I love love love this shirt!
Loved this too. Great fit and a statement piece. I will be renting again.

I rented this top for my trip to Italy, and wore it around Florence. It was super cute and comfortable. Size up, as I normally wear a small and the medium fit well. The material is thick, similar to denim, so I would not wear outdoors if the temperature is over 70.

links_Review_Title: Puffy sleeves and buttons are so regal
links_Review_Text: I'm a 34DDD and 28 waist. I'm glad I got a large, but I probably could've worn a medium. If you're between sizes, I would recommend sizing up, especially if you have big boobs so the buttons don't gape. I'm also glad I sized up, because the arms weren't too tight and the midriff was loose, but not too loose. More just flattering and not tight on my stomach when I wore jeans. I love this top - material is high end and the fit is very flattering. Definitely want to rent again when it's warm.
Loved this top!! It was so much fun and stylish. The quality is excellent as expected and really enhanced my normal jeans and Top look.

links_Review_Title: Paired with Osman pants for a bold look!
links_Review_Text: Fantastic structured top with beautiful floral print and puff sleeve. Looks better in person!

Got tons of compliments on this one! The buttons are a pain, but absolutely worth it. I wear a size 6/8 in very structured/tailored items and was glad to have the L. No chest gap, no getting stuck in the armholes.
Very cute top with interesting detailing. The sleeves are VERY puffy so if you're not into that style I don't recommend.

The details on this top are gorgeous, the print, fitted shape, puff sleeves, stand up collar, this shirt is magic. The buttons can be difficult but it's worth the struggle to wear this beaut! Definitely a crop top, but I also wore this underneath a jumper.

links_Review_Title: Matched the bag I rented perfectly - didn't even try it!
links_Review_Text: It fit well; if you're not comfortable with big sleeves, this might not be for you. Button-up front was cute!

I rented this top for a date night with my husband to add a little flair to my wardrobe. My husband absolutely love this top on me! This top is fun feminine and flattering. It's sexy without being overtly so. The fabric has just the perfect amount of stretch to it. Be warned that this top does run on the short side. On my 5'6" frame it fell just below my belly button. While the buttons can be a little bit aggravating, be patient it is worth the small frustration.

links_Review_Title: I have never received more compliments on a top IN MY LIFE. I wore it twice.
links_Review_Text: Flattering fit. The buttons are a little tedious but worth it in the end. The puff sleeves are gorgeous. The pattern is adorable. I loved this top so much.

links_Review_Title: Loved So much I want to buy
links_Review_Text: Every single time I wore this, everyone made a comment or gave me a complement to tell me how nice I looked. It's a great spring keys. And it looks great with formal pants, a skirt, or even jeans. It's very versatile, anti-quality. The fabric is amazing and comfortable. The fit is also really great for someone whose size is like mine.

links_Review_Title: I'm a hairdresser and I like to dress like I'm on stage. And this top worked perfectly.
links_Review_Text: The body is fitted and the arms are full and not at all constricting. a material reminds me of drapery or upholstery which I like because I like the structure. It is very cropped so I knew it would go perfectly with my high-waisted wool pants. The buttons are tricky as others have said. works well to unbutton a few from the top and a couple from the bottom and pull it over your head. Tons of compliments. I will rent this again if not buy it.

That's what my boyfriend said as He stared at me, slack-jawed, over dinner when I wore this number! In his words, "you look so regal...like a matador." LOL. I wore this on a beach vacation. While everyone else was wearing tiny sun dresses and Long Beach waves, I topped this off with cat-eye glasses and a French twist. It's rare to find a midriff too with so much class. I thought about buying it, but it's a little too expensive for the narrow role it would have in my wardrobe
Loved it!
This top is very cute and I received many compliments. But it's definitely a crop.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful design, i received compliments every time I wore the top!
links_Review_Text: wear with high waisted pants!
Certainly cropped - I wore a medium, have a short torso, and still felt like a crop top.
LOVED this dress. Definitely runs small so size up one- so cute and comfy and sexxxxxy. Can't wait to wear again.
I absolutely loved this dress! The only thing I will note is that the shoulders are a tad large so if you have a smaller frame, size down! I would've preferred a size 2.
I loved this dress! I wasn't expecting too much, but once I put it on, I loved it! Flattering and such a pretty print. I did size up one and I'm so happy I did!
Wanted dress fitting for a luau in Hawaii that worked but wasn't over the top. Great fit. Black halo is always one of my faves!

links_Review_Title: This dress is SOOOO FUNNNN! I absolutely loved it.
links_Review_Text: I sized up because I was nervous it wouldn’t fit, so it was a little big in my chest/shoulders. It is such a flattering dress and the frilly details are so fun. I don’t want to compliment it too much because I want them to have my size in stock so I can rent it again... and again... :P

Super cute and comfortable dress. Runs fairly true to size, perhaps errs on the bigger side. If you want it super fitted, size down, but as it is a nicely structured dress, it keeps its form even with a bit of room.
I loved this dress but it depends how short you feel comfortable wearing skirts. I'm 6'3 and could get away with it, but someone else may be uncomfortable.
So cute but super small
Fit awesome! Good quality material
Fit was perfect. The straps were a little long but the dress I got someone already took them in so it was perfect. Would rent again

I wore this to an outside event, loved it! I ordered a size up from my normal. My normal size would have fit great, but I liked the larger size just to make the length seem longer. I have a long torso and at 5'7 this was just long enough. Great fit though, thick fabric and very flattering.

links_Review_Title: Cute, but straps a little too long
links_Review_Text: Very cute dress, but the straps were a tad too long on me.
Wore this dress for everyday and it fits in all the right places
Loved this dress. So cute. Straps were long but I wore a denim jacket over it for a more casual look so it didn't matter.

links_Review_Title: I went dancing. Good dress for dancing.
links_Review_Text: Nice Dress, great colors, make you look feminine, runs little small in the chest and waist area. But I like it overall
I liked this dress, but it was just too short to wear without leggings. Also, the waist is very high. I think it would be ideal for someone 5'6" or shorter.
Cute summer dress

links_Review_Title: Ordered this for a trip to Vegas. Didn't end up wearing it.
links_Review_Text: Dress definitely runs on the smaller side. I ordered my normal size and it was TIGHT. I probably could have pulled it off but I didn't feel comfortable in it.

I love Black Halo and have worn their dresses on many occasions. The quality is beautiful and the style of this dress was adorable but, sadly, I was unable to wear it because it was too small and I couldn't even get it to zip. I am a true size 2 in Black Halo and most other brands so I ordered a 2. For reference, I am 5'7" and 122 pounds and the 2 was way too small for me. A 4 probably would have fit perfectly. That being said, it's a super cute dress but size up!

links_Review_Title: Wore this for my bachelorette party and I want to buy it, this dress was incredible.
links_Review_Text: Fit was perfect, material was stretchy. So comfortable.
Not impressed. Big in the top. A little too basic.

Super cute dress, but was way too small for me to wear... Was barely able to zip it and it was especially tight in the hips and butt. The chest was fitted but it could have worked if the skirt portion was larger. Fabric was great -- thick enough not to show every line.

links_Review_Title: Perfect summer dress for a nigh out! Highly recommend!
links_Review_Text: 5"9 Size: 10 or L Longer legs than torso. Pro: Highlights curve without being too revealing and just the right length Con: If you are shorter this dress may be better for a day event.
A little tight! I would go 1 size up.

links_Review_Title: Adorable dress and very flattering, but runs small
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress. I wasn't actually able to wear it because it runs quite small ( I am a 10 and rented a 10, but will need a 12) and so I will be sending it back for the next size up. But aside from the fact that I couldn't zip it in the back, it was extremely flattering, the right length (long enough to dance in, short enough to still be considered a mini), and beautiful material. Would be great for daytime, date night, or a spring wedding.

The dress is very cute on the hanger, but I didn't care for the top portion. There is a large ruffle that doesn't quite lay right. Since the material is a bit heavier, the ruffle tends to stick out, instead of laying flat. It would be perfect without the ruffle!

links_Review_Title: Cute dress for a party, but too short
links_Review_Text: Way too short, too tight in bust

links_Review_Title: Not a good fit if you have any hips
links_Review_Text: The dress was snug in my hips but very loose on top. It was also much shorter than I expected considering I'm only 5'3''. I did not wear it
the dress was cute and the quality was good but the 8 was way too small and would not zip up. shorter dress but fun for a summer party.
Cute but a bit small through hips.
I wish the 6 fit but it ran a little small in the chest. Can't wait for the 8 to be available to rent!
Adorable fit perfectly

links_Review_Title: This is the perfect dress for graduation! I loved the simple, flirty looks it gives.
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect! I received so many compliments on this dress.

links_Review_Title: Was not able to wear this dress
links_Review_Text: Dress was too big in the breast area, and the bottom had more material than desired

links_Review_Title: I didn't end up wearing it because of size issues.
links_Review_Text: Very tiny! I am a solid size 4 but felt like a sausage in this dress, its so cute but if you're considering you should size up.

links_Review_Title: LOVE this, but too short for me :(
links_Review_Text: Absolutely LOVE this dress. Quality is very good and it is just such a sweet and feminine dress. It hugs your body in all the right ways but for me, it was just a little too short for what I'm comfortable with. Highly recommend renting this.

links_Review_Title: Didn't end up wearing, but I thought it was very flattering
links_Review_Text: Flattering fit, but a little to bold of a choice for the wedding I was attending. Would consider for a future wedding rental.

I usually wear a medium. I tried this on and was able to zip it up. It was very tight and would have worked if I didn't need to ever sit down! It is sooo tight in the hips and I was unable to even try to sit. I reordered a large the top was very loose but I made it work. It's almost like they need a size between medium and large.
Comfortable glam dress. Definitely a different look, but loved it!

links_Review_Title: Loved the shape of the dress
links_Review_Text: I was supposed to wear this to a gala but it Unfortunately got cancelled the day of due to the current health crisis. The dress fit great although it was a bit snug through my back. If I had ordered a large it would have been way too big. I am more on the muscular side so I am sure that’s why.

links_Review_Title: Matched my husband's tux perfectly! We felt like a million bucks!
links_Review_Text: Quality fabric and flawless fit! I've lost count as to how many compliments I received. The fabric is very thick which was perfect for a rare cold March evening in Florida. I would not recommend this dress for warmer weather. It does run small as I used the backup size. Only issue I had was that the top the dress kept rolling forward a bit. I had to readjust a couple times throughout the evening, but nothing to bothersome. I think this may have been happening due to the weight of the dress.

links_Review_Title: Dress is absolutely stunning, I haven't worn or seen anything like it. Received SO many compliments!
links_Review_Text: I planned to wear a small but wore the medium backup size instead - I felt this dress ran small. If you are petite like me, you may have an issue with fit. I thought the top half was a little big around the chest while around my hips it fit just right. I used dress tape to make sure everything stayed in place - mainly to feel more comfortable. If you like to dance like me, you might feel a little restricted because the style is very fitting. While sitting, I did have adjust the top occasionally. The cutout in the middle of the dress was hidden for me because I have a short torso but I still loved the style. You won't need a sticky bra for this dress - I didn't wear a bra at all. The material was thick but not too heavy. Would recommend for a Winter or Fall event.
Felt great in it and it was comfortable to boot! It's hard not to want to keep this dress for more events ahead!

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on this dress. It was very flattering in all the right places
links_Review_Text: It was a bit tight on the bust. I would recommend sizing up
I wore this to a wedding and it was perfect! It was a little tight on the top but I think any bigger it would have been uncomfortable pulling it up. Overall, a great dress!

SIZE UP! was fortunate enough to get a size M and L for the price of one, the Large was a bit snug and hard to bend over in but overall fit well. This dress does not give in the slightest but hugs you in all the right places. If you're doubting this dress, don't. just size up and you will love it!!

For this dress for a wedding inside wedding during the summer. I did not find the material to be heavy as some reviews said. The dress felt well through the stomach area but was a little big in the top for me. I think the dress looks better in person than online. Give it a chance if yo are thing about it!

I have a really unique body shape, and as usual, it didn't fit me the way it should have. but the dress itself is absolutely gorgeous and I loved it, Just make sure you don't have extra belly gas when you wear it LOL

This dress is gorgeous and comfortable! It was a standout for sure, and I definitely recommend saving it for nicer events and weddings because it is so not causal because of its thick material. I considered buying it because it fit like a glove, but figured how many times can I really wear it? (Perfect example of why we rent right). Loved it!
Very cute and unique dress worn for a rehearsal dinner! I wore the XS without any bra and it was perfect.

links_Review_Title: Nice fit. Heavier material than expected
Unique and a lot of compliments!
links_Review_Text: This dress is very unique, form fitting, and actually very complimentary!! It does run small. I am 5'6'' 145lbs with an athletic frame. I normally wear a size 4 and I needed the size Medium in this particular dress. I received a lot of compliments and it was perfect for walking, standing, and sitting. However I wore this dress to a wedding and I love to dance. It was not good for that at all, I had to hold up the top the entire time. Great for standing not for dancing! Hope this helps!

Wore to an early September beach wedding. Was nervous about the fit in my bust (30 F) based on other reviews but it provided more coverage than I thought it would! Definitely snug up top but not uncomfortable, was less fitted on the bottom. The top of the zipper doesn't have a clasp, but rather a button. The button alone didn't keep it zipped, so I had to use a safety pin. Overall a super fun and sassy dress!

I loved this dress, although it does run small, I would typically wear a medium in other styles. I have a larger bust which, thankfully fit into a size large, but I would recommend using tape to keep the top up as it keep falling down. Also, this dress is definitely made for taller women and fit as a full length mermaid dress. It actually hit in all the right places which I was completely shocked when I tried it on. Highly recommend for your next black tie affair.

I had to go with the XL (I normally wear an 8) because the L wouldn't come close to zipping up. However I am not close to an XL in the bust so it was loose in that area. The garments were delivered in a broken, unsecured garment bag which made it very difficult to return. I did manage receive a lot of compliments on it

links_Review_Title: Beautiful, form fitting dress perfect for summer wedding!
links_Review_Text: I really loved the pattern and quality of this dress! It fit perfectly everywhere except the bust area. I attempted a strapless bra, no bra, and even wonder tape to keep it from falling down with no avail. Beautiful dress, but not the most comfortable to dance in for this reason!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful, unlimited amount of compliments. You will feel amazing in this dress
links_Review_Text: If your chest size is C and above, go up a size for backup. The Medium fit everywhere except my chest. I ended up wearing the Large which worked out when standing up. Did not work out when sitting down. The mermaid structure and strong material made it look glamorous and the pattern is flattering. I recommend for any season event!
Looveddd this dress, got so many compliments all night! I would definitely size up, the bottom part is extremely narrow but once you get it on, it makes you feel so beautiful and svelte!

This dress was perfect! It hugged in all the right places and photographed beautifully. I received compliments all night. The dress Is made to be form fitting so there is not a ton of wiggle room and is a bit uncomfortable to sit in. Overall would wear this to every event if I could!
The dress was tight around my hips in the size large but fit comfortably everywhere else. Many compliments! Gorgeous dress! (Runs small in the hips!)

I was nervous when it shipped because my back-up size was not available and the wedding I was attending was the next day. I am small up top but curvy on bottom and there is no stretch to this gorgeous material. I am typically between a 6/8 and the large fit me well on bottom - a little big on top but overall, I LOVED IT!

I ordered this dress for a summer wedding and it was perfect for the occasion! I received compliments all night. I ordered the Large since I have wider hips and typically wear a size 6 or an 8. The bottom half fit perfectly, and although the top was a little big it was a quick fix with some fashion tape.

links_Review_Title: I absolutely loved this dress and got so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Okay, this dress would have been perfect if it had some kind of stretch to it. It fit a little tight for being an XL, hard to sit and my boobs were a little to big for it but I wore it anyways and hoped for the best! I would recommend this dress!

links_Review_Title: Got lots of compliments on the beautiful dress!
links_Review_Text: Beautiful print but fabric has no stretch. Typically I would wear a size small but there was no room to eat, drink or sit. The medium was a little big in the bust and long for my petite figure but nonetheless it looked fabulous!

links_Review_Title: Worn for a rooftop deck wedding in Chicago.
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress! I was nervous about it being too long on my 5’0” stature, but it was perfect and the mermaid style really accentuated curves in all the right spots. I have a wider back so it was a little tight up top but overall fit true to size. Highly recommend!

SO glad I rented a size up. Typically I wear a Large bottom or a medium dress if it's loose since I do have a booty! I couldn't even get the large around my thighs. The XL fit like an actual glove and it was sooo comfortable and surprisingly light weight. The ceremony was outside and I didn't sweat at all. I'm around a 34B/34C and didn't even need to wear a bra or covers. This dress is extremely flattering for girls with curves. Compliments for days!

links_Review_Title: Stunning dress- but hard to move/ breathe in!
links_Review_Text: As everyone said in the reviews the sizing is a little unusual. I'm a true 4 and the small fit everywhere except around the rib cage. I'm fairly certain that a medium would've been too big in the chest and hips but be warned if you're not a 30 Bra band size this will be right. I'm small 32B and needed a push up, without a bra the dress was a lot more breathable but lacked the "it factor". Comfort aside, it was a great pick. Got lots of compliments all night and it was perfect for an outdoor California wedding

links_Review_Title: Beautiful and formal dress but STRANGE fit!
links_Review_Text: This dress was beautiful but SO uncomfortable to wear! The material is thick and heavy and doesn't have any stretch. It zipped up all the day but was very tight in the hips, but super loose on the top. I tried to use fashion tape to secure the top. It was hard to sit in, go up stairs, and dance in. I was constantly adjusting the top. It looked great in photos but was not worth the discomfort. If I went up a size, it would maybe fit better in the hips, but still would have been WAY too big up top.

Received so many compliments, however it runs very small. I'm 5"7 122 pounds with wider hips and the Small was very snug! It was extremely tight in the back and stomach area but pain is beauty I guess!!

I loved the dress, but it was so tight on the top. After reading the reviews they suggested to size up and I did. Usually I am XS but went for the small. The top kept rolling down and I used double stick tape the problem still happened. If I did the medium the bottom half would of been too big. But in pictures the dress looked amazing and I got tons of compliments!

I rented the Medium and Large and my hips wouldn't fit into the medium. The large's bust area was a little bit on the bigger size (36c as a reference) but I made it work with a sticky bra. I got countless compliments!! The dresses material was thick and flattering.

I received so many compliments on this dress. It hugs the curves nicely and the design is eye-catching! However, I have a smaller chest so I was having to pull up the bodice of the dress most of the night. Overall I loved the dress, just might be better for women that aren't as small chested as I am!

Fit too tight around my hips in the medium so I went with the large but was loose up top (smaller chest) so I used garment tape. Was a beautiful dress and I received many compliments. It was overall fun to wear despite being nervous about the top sliding down.

Was excited to rent this super unique and fun dress for a friends summer wedding. The material is very soft and thick enough where no bra was necessary. With block heels and being 5'9 it was a mix of maxi and midi which I was expecting. Pretty colors and bold pattern resulted in tons of compliments as always with RTR

This dress was absolutely perfect for a summer wedding! The material was thicker than I thought it'd be, which worried me for a hot summer wedding, but it was still really breathable! I got so many compliments & it was such a comfortable dress. Wish I owned it because it fit so well & I felt so confident in it! The XS could've worked, but it was a bit of a struggle to zip, so I opted for the S & it fit me like a glove

links_Review_Title: Extremely stress free receiving and returning!!
links_Review_Text: Incredibly gorgeous dress!!! Love how classy it looked! HIGHLY RECOMMEND! Ordered an XS and Small but I am more of a size in between the two. LOVED IT!!
Rented for a vacation, it was very comfortable but the sleeves got a little in the way. Very breathable material.

Wore it to a safari and it was perfect for the heat. Light weight and ready to wear. I have small boobies but oh my lord did this make my boobies look perfect. It is cropped and looked great with skirt, shirts or jeans
It comes but wrinkled, but it's worth whipping out the iron. Perfect with high waisted jeans. The sleeve options and gathering at the waist makes this shirt unforgettable

links_Review_Title: Great nice fitting top that begged for compliments!
links_Review_Text: Loose in the chest - well designed for a large bust. Flowing. Beautiful. I felt so pretty in it!

links_Review_Title: The off the shoulder runs really nicely unlike others, and very flattering neckline
links_Review_Text: I wore this for a gameday and was nervous about the shoulders but I actually loved it. It was very flattering on the neck and shoulders and the bell sleeves looked great on. perfect length for jeans or a cute skirt!
I wore for a friends birthday dinner/party and got so many compliments throughout the night!
It was so flattering and so fun to wear. I got loads of compliments on it!!

links_Review_Title: Circus or big top: you decide
links_Review_Text: The pattern and sleeves of this are super cute however it was too loose in the top so it kept falling off my shoulders leaving my chest very exposed. It's lightweight and cozy otherwise. I tried to get it in a smaller size but it was unavailable for weeks so unfortunately I only wore it once to dinner and not on vacation as I intended.
Fun top to wear out! Fits true to size and the sleeves are cool. You can use fashion tape to hold the shoulders in place

links_Review_Title: It ran big so it didn’t look as structured as I thought
links_Review_Text: Overall was cute and was a good rental. Not something I’d buy.

Super summer-y and fabulous. I literally loved everything about it. It's not too cropped, it's not too big, the fit of the shirt overall is a little bit looser. I think I would have had luck with the XS (i wore a S) just because it was looser! I'd suggest ordering a size down due to it's billowy nature! Loved that I could wear it either off the shoulder or put it up on my shoulders since it's elastic underneath the fabric. A SUMMER MUST!!!!! Wore with shorts, and black leather pants- easy to dress up and down!
Loved this fun and unique top. Wore it three times and worked for each occasion perfectly. Paired well with white shorts, and white jeans.
I wore this for a pool party. The sleeves are HUGE, but totally cute. It was a little wrinkly... overall love

links_Review_Title: Over the top - yellow is IN
links_Review_Text: First of all this top is great. Super cute puffed sleeves with long dreamy yellow and cream stripes. Pair it with floral shorts for a fashion forward date or with simple jeans for an easier look. Very comfortable and everything stays in place with little to no fuss. Cons: not made for super large busts. The bust line hit about at my nipple so it looked a little odd. The waist flare and ruffles are larger than the picture making the area and shirt look huge especially from the side. Not slimming but a cool top.
This piece was beautiful and exactly what I needed for a casual day on the town in NYC! It was super flattering and fit me perfectly! It is a bit short, but I liked it that way!

I wore this top for a dinner celebrating a graduation and it was perfect-- very festive and good for something special. The sleeves are dramatic and puffy but that's what makes it so cute and fun! I wore with white jeans and got so many compliments. The top is memorable which makes it a perfect rental in my opinion! One of my faves so far.

links_Review_Title: Extremely well made and really fun to wear!
links_Review_Text: This top is extremely flattering and it looks high quality. The cut of the blouse is great, however, the XS fit more like a big small. I love it so much anyway and it worked because I'm not too petite. May be an issue for a true "XS".

links_Review_Title: Thumbs up for the sleeves staying in place!
links_Review_Text: Loose fit, this top has a side zipper but I didn't need it. It just slipped right over my head and shoulders. I loved how well the off the shoulder stayed in place. It wasn't perfect but for an off the shoulder top it did really well comparatively speaking. If I rent again I'm going to try the XS because I thought the small was a little big on me. Also, worked great with no bra!

Rented it for a party and it was perfect. True to size although short - i wore with high waisted jeans. Literally no support for your bust so I'm not sure what bigger busted ladies would do but overall the quality, color, and style is just superb!!
PERFECT FIT
Wanted to love this top but it was too big. Ended up not wearing.

Fun piece that's not exactly cut well for my shape (or maybe anyone) but was quirky and fit the bill for a weekend day time get together. The space for your chest is very small, so if I actually had it pulled down to line up properly, there would have been a lot of skin showing on top. So I left it higher up. It otherwise fit well and the billowy sleeves were so fun.

I rented this to wear during my bachelorette weekend in the Hamptons. It was SO much fun to wear, super flattering, and I got so many compliments! I will rent again! I'm a true 8 and the L fit perfectly.
cute a litttle much but thats my style sometimes. paired with light blue straight leg jeans.

This top is so cute and fun!!! Very different than something I would pick out. I have a bigger chest and it was pretty low cut. I didn't wear it because I didn't have the occasion but will rent again for another time! Super cute and different

links_Review_Title: So extra! The color is so pretty, feels like you're on an Italian summer vacation.
links_Review_Text: I was nervous about this top but I had no reason to be! It fits right in all the right places and those sleeves are just so dreamy! Loved wearing it with white paper-bag shorts, so the "baggy" look for top and bottom worked out well!
FIT GREAT, LOOKED GREAT, WILL RENT AGAIN
I really wanted to love this shirt but the sleeves are MASSIVE (wide and poofy) and the peplum has a ton of fabric which made me look really wide.

links_Review_Title: This top is such a flirty statement top!
links_Review_Text: It was a little baggy on the shoulders so would've felt "more secure" with a smaller size given I prefer to wear tops like this sans-bra.
